[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/'dul ba da ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_khyod kyi 'dod pa gnas bzang por skyes te/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dang phrad par 
[\[1b.2\]]bdag gis bya'o/_/des de rgyal po shar ba dang lhan cig phrad par byas te/_nor lhas byin de dang lhan cig shin tu chags par gyur pa dang /_gser phreng can gyis sbyor ba 'chang la lha ni 
[\[1b.3\]]gson te/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gi sras mo nor lhas byin la glang po che'i cho ga slob bo zhes spring ngo /_/des kyang rgyan lnga mi mngon par byas nas bdag nyid gos hrul po bgos te ming 
[\[1b.4\]]dpyid ldan zhes bya bar btags nas smyon pa'i cha lugs kyis 'phags rgyal du song ngo /_/de der lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu rgyug mchong rgal zhing 
[\[1b.5\]]dpyid ldan dga'o zhes smyon tshig kyang smra'o/_/gang dag gis 'di sbyor ba 'chang ba yin no zhes de ngo shes pa de dag la ni des rgyan byin pa dang /_de dag gis de blangs nas cang mi zer bar 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'gro'o/_/gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni 'di smyon pa zhig go zhes yal bar gtong ste/_de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang khyim bzang po gang du zhugs pa der bza' ba dang /_me tog dang gos dag kyang rnyed cing shar ba dang lhan cig 
[\[2a.2\]]gsang ste gros gcig go/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bu la smras pa/_lha gal te na bdag gi phas tshor du mchis tshur spyon 'bros so/_/des smras pa/_lha mo gal te de lta na song la pha la 'di skad ces yab bdag 
[\[2a.3\]]gis glang po che'i cho ga ni lobs na 'on kyang las su bgyi ba ma mthong ste/_de'i slad du lhas bdag la glang po che mo bzang ldan ci bder bgyid du stsol cig dang de la 'tshal nas las dag blta bar bgyi'o zhes gyis shig_/de song nas rgyal po la de bzhin 
[\[2a.4\]]smras pa dang /_rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis kyang glang po che'i rdzi rnams la shes ldan dag glang po che mo bzang ldan bu mo nor lhas byin la ci bder gyis la/_de la zhon nas las dag bltar chug shig ces bsgo'o/_/de dag gis de la glang po che mo bzang 
[\[2a.5\]]ldan ci bder byas pa dang /_de rgyal po shar ba'i bu dang lhan cig de la zhon nas 'bros pa'i thabs shom par rtsom ste/_res 'ga' ni snga dro song zhing nyi ma phyed na slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni nyi ma phyed na song zhing phyi dro slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni phyi dro song nas 
[\[2a.6\]]dgongs su slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni dgongs song nas mtshan mo nam phyed na slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni 'jing la slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni lnga tshigs la slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni nam chung na slar 'ong /_res 'ga' ni skya rengs shar na slar 'ong ngo /_/
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]shar bas sbyor ba 'chang la 'bros pa'i thabs smras pa dang /_des glang po che'i lci ba dag phyir dbyung bar brtsams so/_/chab sgo ba dag gis smras pa/_dpyid ldan 'di ci yin/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshos su byas te 'di dag der la dur 'gyur ro zhes byas pa 
[\[2b.2\]]dang /_de dag gis bgad nas 'di ni smyon pa'o snyam nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des kyang de dag khyer te kau shAm+bI'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la dpyangs so/_/yang glang po che'i gcin dag gis bum pa bkang ste bkur bar brtsams pa dang /_sgo ba dag gis de 
[\[2b.3\]]bzhin du dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag rgyal po'i bshos su byas te 'di ni der skyems su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_de dag de bzhin du 'di ni smyon pa yin no snyam nas bgad de 'khod do/_/des kyang de khyer te kau'u shAm+bI'i lam gyi bar bar du shing gi yal ga la 
[\[2b.4\]]dpyangs so/_/rgyal po shar ba dang /_sbyor ba 'chang dang /_gser phreng can gyis nyi ma che ge mo zhig la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu thams cad 'du bar bya'o zhes dus btab nas rgyal po shar ba'i bu dang /_nor lhas byin glang po che mo bzang ldan la zhon nas phyogs der song ste/_
[\[2b.5\]]sbyor ba 'chang dang /_gser phreng can yang de nyid la zhon te/_de rnams pi bang snyan pa len zhing dong ba na/_rgyal po shar ba'i bus pi bang snyan pa blangs pa dang /_sbyor ba 'chang dga' ba skyes te glu blangs pa/_bzang ldan ma dang dbyangs snyan dang /_/nor lhas byin dang shar ba 
[\[2b.6\]]dang /_/gser phreng can dang dpyid ldan dang /_/'di dag don mthun 'dong ba yin/_/dus gang du de dag slar 'ong ba'i dus de yang myur du thal/_dus tha ma gang yin pa de yang thal nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis gsos pa la smras pa/_gsos pa nor lhas byin 
[\[2b.7\]]deng thogs na 'di ci las gyur ces byas pa dang /_gsos pas btsal bar brtsams pa las ma rnyed nas/_des rgyal po la smras pa/_rgyal po shar ba'i bus glang po che mo bzang ldan la 'tshal te/_nor lhas byin khrid nas bros lags so/_/rgyal po sngangs nas smras pa/_gsos 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]pa myur du song la glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te shar ba dang /_nor lhas byin khrid de shog shig_/de rings pa rings par glang po che 'dam bu'i ri la zhon nas bsnyags so/_/des bsnyags te slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis glang po che'i lci ba'i 
[\[3a.2\]]thum po bshig pa dang /_'dam bu'i ris de bsnam par brtsams so/_/ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad bcu 'das so/_/yang 'dam bu'i ris slebs la thug nas sbyor ba 'chang gis gcin gyi bum pa gcig pa dang 'dam bu'i ris 
[\[3a.3\]]de bsnams par brtsams so/_/ji srid snom pa de'i bar du glang po che mo bzang ldan gyis dpag tshad gzhan bcu 'das te/_gzhan gyi yul du phyin par gyur pa dang /_gsos pas bsams pa 'di ni gzhan gyi yul yin pas glang po che 'dam bu'i ri yang shor du 'ong gis ldog 
[\[3a.4\]]go snyam nas de re thag chad de slar log go/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis smras pa/_gsos pa ci grag_/des smras pa/_lha ci zhig gda' bros lags mod ces byas pa dang /_rgyal po lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/rgyal po shar 
[\[3a.5\]]ba'i bu yang srog stor ba las slar rnyed de/_kau shAm+bIr 'ongs nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa dang /_mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen rnams la sbyin pa dag byin zhing dga' ston chen po byas nas nor lhas byin dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' 
[\[3a.6\]]bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/dus gzhan zhig na khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog tu byung nas nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu bre mo gtam dag zer zhing 'khod pa las smras pa/_lha mo khyod kyang ngas de ltar sgyus phrogs pa yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha khyod kyang de bzhin 
[\[3a.7\]]du bdag gi phas thabs kyis bzung ste bzhag pa lags so/_/des smras pa/_lha mo ci ste khyod kyi pha 'dir bkug ste thag pa'i las slob tu ma bcug na/_nga rgyal po shar ba'i bu ma yin du zad ces byas pa dang /_de khros bzhin du cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/rgyal po shar bas 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]sbyor ba 'chang la smras pa/_nga'i mi dga' ba khyod kyis bsal bar nus sam/_lha ci zhig bgyi/_rgyal po gtum po rab snang mgul pa nas thogs te 'dir khug la thag pa'i las slob tu chug shig_/des smras pa/_lha gang gi tshe khyod kyis nor lhas byin dang glang po che mo bzang 
[\[3b.2\]]ldan phrogs pa'i tshe don gyis na khyod kyi mi dgyes pa bsal lags mod kyi/_'on kyang gal te rngo thog kyang gdas bsams te bgyi'o zhes byas te/_des 'phags rgyal du 'gro ba'i zong dag sta gon byas nas ded dpon spro ba bskyed de/_smad 'tshong ma gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan 
[\[3b.3\]]pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa zhig kyang ded dpon gyi chung mar byas nas de rim gyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang rnams su tshong dus dag lta zhing 'phags rgyal du phyin to/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis nor mang po dang ldan pa'i ded dpon 
[\[3b.4\]]zhig 'ongs so zhes thos so/_/des thos nas kyang bdag nyid nor rtsir song ste des 'gron po de dag la dris pa/_shes ldan dag ded dpon gyi khyim gang yin/_de dag gis ded dpon gyi khyim ni 'di yin no zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po der song ste sgor 'dug nas ded dpon 
[\[3b.5\]]gang na 'dug ces dris pa dang /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_sgor byung ste song ngo /_/des smras pa/_'di na su 'dug de rnams kyis smras pa/_ded dpon gyi chung ma mchis so/_/des sgo gtan phye ste nang du zhugs pa dang ji tsam na ded dpon gyi chung ma gzugs dang na tshod 
[\[3b.6\]]bzang bas 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhig mthong ngo /_/des de mthong nas kyang rab tu chags par gyur te smras pa/_bzang mo nga dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na ded dpon gyi sho gam gtang ngo /_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na mal 'dir 
[\[3b.7\]]'dug shig ces byas pa dang /_'dod chags kyis log par gyur pas ni mi bya ba ci yang med pa'i phyir de der 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis sgo bcad de khyogs su bcug nas mi bzhis bteg ste glu len cing sgo gcig nas 'phags rgyal du zhugs so/_/de na kha cig ni 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]thal mo rdob/_kha cig ni rgod/_kha cig ni 'di skad du glu len te/_sbrang ma dag gis zla ba zos/_/rnam thos bu ni gnyer pas ded/_/sa gzhi nags bcas mkha' la 'phags/_/smad 'tshong mas ni rab snang khrid/_/ces byas pa dang /_'phags 
[\[4a.2\]]rgyal na gnas pa rnams kyis bsams pa/_ci'i phyir tshong pa 'di dag de skad ces zer snyam pa las/_de rnams sgo gzhan du byung ste/_smyags bcad de bros te song ngo /_/gsos pa yang phan tshun du rgyal po tshol zhing de rim gyis kau shAm+bIr song ngo /_/blon po dag 
[\[4a.3\]]gis rgyal po shar ba la smras pa/_lha dgyes par mdzad du gsol/_rgyal po rab snang ni 'dir khugs lags so zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po shar bas smras pa/_shes ldan dag deng la de thogs te thag pa'i las slob tu chug shig_/rgyal po rab snang 'dir 'ongs par nor 
[\[4a.4\]]lhas byin la su yang ma zer cig par khrims su yang chos shig ces bsgo'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shar ba'i bu nor lhas byin dang lhan cig tu khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du byung ste 'dug pa na rgyal po gtum po rab snang thags kyi gra khang nas bya ba zhig gi phyir sgor 
[\[4a.5\]]byung ba dang rgyal po shar bas de mthong nas/_des nor lhas byin la smras pa/_mi 'o ni su yin khyod kyis shes sam/_des kyang ring zhig du brtags pa dang /_rgyal po de spyi gcer yin pas ngo shes nas de mchi mas brnangs bzhin du 'dug ste des bsams pa/_rgyal po 
[\[4a.6\]]ngan pa 'dis nga'i pha 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su byas kyis gal te rgyal po ngan pa 'di ma bsad na nor lhas byin ma yin du zad/_ji ltar bsad pa yang bdag nyid kyis mi tshor ba de ltar gsad do snyam mo/_/rgyal po de yang yid rno ba zhig pas de khros par shes nas des sbyor 
[\[4a.7\]]ba 'chang la bsgo ba/_sbyor ba 'chang dgra la sha lon zin gyis song la rgyal po gtum po rab snang khrol te khrus [(]gyis [,]kyis [)]zan byin la bkur sti chen pos 'phags rgyal du skyol cig ces bsgo ba dang /_des kyang ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du 'phags rgyal du bskyal to/_/nor lhas byin 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]gyis bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis 'di nga nyid gsad pa'i thabs brtsams na g.yon can 'dis 'phrigs par 'ong bas dus chung zhig gis bar du brid do snyam nas/_des de la re zhig cung zad cig bgad pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_dga' mgur spyad pa dag 
[\[4b.2\]]gis brid do/_/de nas de gos dri ma can gyon te khri'u dra ba can la nyal zhing 'dug pa dang /_rgyal po shar ba'i bus smras pa/_lha mo 'di ci'i tha tshig_/des smras pa/_lha lha rnams 'khrugs lags so/_/des smras pa/_lha mo mi bdog gam/_ci ji ltar dam bcas pa 
[\[4b.3\]]gzhan gyis shig_/des smras pa/_lha gang bdag gis dam bcas pa de mi 'grub lags mod/_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod kyis dam ci bcas/_gang gis na khyod mi dga' bar gyur pa smros shig dang thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas/_khyod mi dga' 
[\[4b.4\]]bar ma byed cig_/des smras pa/_gang gi tshe bdag gi phas lha bzung ste bzhag pa de'i tshe bdag gis lha la 'di skad du ci ste lha dang bdag lhan cig bde legs su kau shAm+bIr phyin na/_der lha dang bdag lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du zas mi bza' zhing zhag bdun 
[\[4b.5\]]'das nas/_lha ni me tog gi phreng bas rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du dkris te ra ba'i khar 'dug par bya'o/_/bdag ni dka' thub rdzogs nas bram ze stong la zan byin la mchod pa dang bkur sti cher bya'o zhes dam bcas na da lta btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che bar gyur pas ci'i slad 
[\[4b.6\]]du 'di lta bu mdzad par 'gyur snyam du bdag de sems shing mchis te/_mdor na gum lags su bas so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_lha mo khyod kyis lha la gsol ba btab pa yang don gyis na nga'i ched kho na yin pas longs shig dang thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes byas pa dang /_
[\[4b.7\]]de langs te des khyi gu gnyis shig ra ba'i drung du btags te bzhag nas/_de ji tsam mi tsam gyi sha za nus pa de tsam du sha gong nas gong du bskyed de byin no/_/gang gi tshe khyi gu de gnyis sha de tsam za nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po dang lhan cig nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du 'dug cing de ni mtshan mo za/_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]rgyal po shar ba ni chung ma de la chags pas nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du ma zos pas de lus skya bo bseng bseng por gyur cing sha bri ngan pa dang /_nyam chung ba dang /_rmya bar gyur to/_/zhag bdun lon pa dang /_nor lhas byin gyis me tog phreng rgyud mkhan rnams 
[\[5a.2\]]la yang rgyus pa dag gis me tog dri zhim po dag rgyus la myur du khyer te shog shig ces bsgo'o/_/sbyor ba 'chang la yang deng du lha'i dka' thub rdzogs kyis khyod kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la bram ze stong dang /_rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon 
[\[5a.3\]]po dang /_grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i zan sbyor cig ces bsgo'o/_/blon po gzhan dag ni mi tshor bar bya ba'i phyir gnas gzhan dang gzhan dag tu las su bskos so/_/sbyor ba 'chang yang rgyal po la snying nye zhing rjes su chags pas grong khyer de rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_
[\[5a.4\]]gyo mo ni med par byas/_tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/_bdug pa dri zhim po'i pog phor ni bzhag_/rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag ni bsgreng /_mu tig dang /_dar gyi chun po dang /_lda ldi ni dpyangs/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs ni bkram ste lha rnams kyi skyed 
[\[5a.5\]]mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du dga' dga' ltar byas nas gnas dang gnas rnams su rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs ni bsgrags/_gar mkhan dang /_snyan dngags mkhan dang /_'jo tshar can gyi bro mkhan rnams kyis ni bro gar bya bar brtsams so/_/ca co chen po byung ba 
[\[5a.6\]]de'i tshe nor lhas byin gyis rgyal po shar ba'i bu ra ba'i khar rkang pa'i rtse mo nas spyi bo'i bar du me tog gis dkris nas bsnyal lo/_/de nas ra ba'i kha nas phul nas lhung ma thag tu gson por khyi dag gis rus gong 'ba' zhig lus par byas te/_bya rog dang /_bya rgod dang /_wa 
[\[5a.7\]]dang /_mi ro la za ba'i srog chags gzhan dag kyang 'thab par gyur to/_/kau shAm+bIr lha ra ba'i kha nas grong khyer mdzes pa lta ba las lhung ste/_khyi dag gis zos so zhes ku co'i sgra cher gyur pa dang /_de na kha cig ni ngu /_kha cig ni dga'/_kha cig ni tha mal par 'dug_/
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]kha cig ni 'phrog rlom byed par gyur to/_/ku co chen po byung ba de'i tshe kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i dge slong dag so sor bros nas kha cig ni mnyan yod du song ngo /_/kha cig ni gnas gzhan dang gzhan du song ngo /_skabs der sbyor ba 'chang ba dang /_blon po gzhan rnams dang /_
[\[5b.2\]]kau shAm+bI na gnas pa'i mi'i gtso bo dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis ku cho zhi bar byas te de nas sbyor ba 'chang gis ji ltar rgyal po ra ba'i khar song ngo /_/ji ltar ra ba'i drung na khyi 'dug par gyur ces kun tu brtag par brtsams so/_/des de ltar brtags 
[\[5b.3\]]pa dang /_nor lhas byin gyis ji ltar thabs kyis bsad pa rtsad chod de de khros nas nor lhas byin rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so/_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun 
[\[5b.4\]]pa rgyal po shar ba'i bus las ci zhig bgyis na/_las de'i rnam par smin pas khyi dag gis 'tshal te dus las 'das lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bu nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba 'ong 
[\[5b.5\]]ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags te/_dge slong dag rgyal po shar ba'i bus las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan sus so sor nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol 
[\[5b.6\]]gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_
[\[5b.7\]]bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na bram ze mdun na 'don zhig 'dug go/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na rang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]sangs rgyas phongs pa dang /_dman pa la thugs brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal dag la dga' ba/_sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du 'byung bas rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu ba rgyu zhing ri 'or der phyin pa dang /_phyogs zhig tu nub mo 
[\[6a.2\]]gnas so/_/de phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs nas ri 'or gyi grong der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_mdun na 'don de yang khyi khrid nas phyir byung ste/_des rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa de la 
[\[6a.3\]]khyi sbad do/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni rgyal po shar ba'i bu 'di yin te/_'dis de'i tshe de'i dus na rang sangs rgyas nyes pa med cing gnod pa mi byed pa la khyi sbad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar khyis 
[\[6a.4\]]zos nas dus las 'das te/_da ltar gyi bar du yang khyis zos te dus las 'das par gyur to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar/_'dren ma rnams 
[\[6a.5\]]kyi yang 'dren ma ste/_dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag kho na la brtsal bar byas te/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[6a.6\]]nas/_dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal po shar ba'i bu dus las 'das nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang 'gran zla med par rgyal po byed par gyur to/_/de dus gzhan zhig na khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du byung nas blon 
[\[6a.7\]]po'i tshogs kyis bskor te gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer zhing 'khod de/_shes ldan dag grong dang grong khyer dang gnas gang na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo yod/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rdo 'jog na smad 'tshong ma bzang mo zhes bgyi ba gzugs dang na tshod dang /_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ldan pa sgyu rtsal drug bcu rtsa bzhi la mkhas pa zhig mchis te/_mthong ma thag tu chags par mi 'gyur ba'i mi gang lags pa de ni sa'i steng na 'ga' yang ma mchis so/_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de'i gzugs dang na tshod dang ldan pa thos nas thos ma thag tu 
[\[6b.2\]]chags par gyur te smras pa/_gsos pa ci byas kyang mi phan de lta bu'i bud med la dga' mgur spyad dgos pas rdo 'jog tu song ste de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par bya'o/_/des smras pa lha rgyal po pad ma'i snying po can ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi gshed mar gyur 
[\[6b.3\]]pa/_phyir rgol bar gyur pa/_mi mdza' bar gyur pa lags la/_de ni rtag tu rdo 'jog na mchis lags pas ci ste lha rdo 'jog tu gshegs na gdon mi 'tshal bar des lha brlag par bgyid lags so/_/des smras pa/_mi rnams kyi nang na mi gzu lums can 
[\[6b.4\]]dag lta yod mod kyi/_'on kyang khyod ni 'di la 'dug shig_/nga ni 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_ci ste lha de lta bur dgyes na lha nyid mkhyen mod [(]gyi[,]kyi[)]/_'on kyang bag mdzad pa'i rigs so/_/rgyal po rab snang bud med la brkam chags can yin pas des de'i tshig ma mnyan 
[\[6b.5\]]nas glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te rdo 'jog tu song ngo /_/de rim gyis song nas gtun shing ri la phyin pa dang /_des der glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bzhag nas rdo 'jog tu song ngo /_/de nas mu tig gi do shal srang brgya stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te bzang 
[\[6b.6\]]mo gzugs kyis 'tsho ba'i gan du song nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shes ldan dag rgyal po mi snang na gar bzhud ces dpyod pa la zhugs pa dang /_de na 
[\[6b.7\]]kha cig gis smras pa/_de ci mi phal pa yin nam/_des na mi mngon mngon par 'gyur du zad kyi/_de gar yang ni ma bzhud do/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_de ni btsun mo'i 'khor rgya che ba yin pas ci'i phyir phyi rol du 'byung ste/_btsun mo'i 'khor nyid na dga' 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]ba dang rtsed mo so sor nyams su myong bar byed do/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la the tshom byar ci yod/_tshur sheg gsos pa la 'drir 'dong ngo /_/kha cig gis legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas de dag thams cad 'dus te gsos pa'i drung 
[\[7a.2\]]du dong nas smras pa/_gsos pa lha mi snang na ga shed du ma bzhud grang /_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag ci [{]rings [,]ring [}]mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis smras pa/_gsos pa ji srid na mthong bar 'gyur/_des smras pa/_lo bcu gnyis lon nas so/_/de dag khros 
[\[7a.3\]]nas smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir de skad smra ba las na gdon mi za bar khyod kyis lha bsad nas bdag nyid rgyal srid byed par 'dod do/_/de'i phyir re zhig gal te zhag bdun na lha ltar yod na de lta na legs ji ste med na ni nged kyis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya'o zhes 
[\[7a.4\]]byas pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas thos nas bos te dris pa/_gsos pa khyod ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug_/des smras pa/_lha mo 
[\[7a.5\]]bram ze dag 'di skad ces mchi na ji ltar sems khong du chud cing mi mchis/_des smras pa/_gsos pa gal te de lta na song la nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa gser snod kyi nang du lugs te/_rta mang lag la rgyus pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du zhog la 'di 
[\[7a.6\]]skad ces gang zhig nged nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba de nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smros la de ltar bya ste rta bzang po gang gis zos pa nged la sbron cig_/gsos pas ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du byas na 'ga' yang za bar spro ba med do/_/phyogs 
[\[7a.7\]]gzhan zhig na rta rid rke ba lus rmya bar gyur pa/_ngan ma za ba/_dbugs rgod pa/_rna ba chag pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung du de song ste mdun du 'dug nas/_gang zhig nged nyid rdo 'jog tu 'gro bar spro ba de nas kyi chas mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus pa 'di dag zo shig ces smras pa dang /_
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]des de dag zos so/_/gsos pa song nas/_ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gsos pa song la stod cig_/gal te stod pa'i tshe mi srun byed na khyod kyis ma 'jigs par dpung skyed cig_/sems stobs dang ldan pa la ni 
[\[7b.2\]]sus kyang mi rdzi'o/_/de song nas de bstad par brtsams pa dang /_de stod pa'i tshe rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs su bdag nyid sprul nas/_kwa'i mi khyod kyis sngon chad 'di lta bu'i rta mthong ba 'ga' yod dam zhes smras so/_/des ral gri shubs nas phyung ste bsdigs 
[\[7b.3\]]nas kwa'i rta'i srin po khyod kyis sngon chad rta zhon pa su la yang lcag 'di lta bu mthong ba yod dam zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_kye mi sngon ma mthong ngo /_/des kye rta'i srin po gal te re zhig mi srun mi byed na de lta na legs/_ci ste byed na mgo drungs nas bcad de 
[\[7b.4\]]sa la dor bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_kye mi ci ste de lta na gal te bdag phyir 'dir khrid de mi 'ong bar dam 'cha' na 'gro'o/_/des smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin dus byas 'dod do zhes smras nas/_des de la zhon te song nas rim gyis rdo 'jog tu phyin to/_/rgyal po 
[\[7b.5\]]gtum po rab snang gis mthong nas smras pa/_gsos pa 'ongs sam/_des smras pa/_lha mchis so/_/dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir zhes byas pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa re zhig zhag bdun gyi bar du rtses la zhag 
[\[7b.6\]]bdun 'das pa dang dus shes par bya'o/_/zhes byas nas zhag bdun gyi bar du gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad de zhag bdun 'das nas song ngo /_/gtun shing rir phyin nas bdag nyid kyis glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri bstad par 
[\[7b.7\]]brtsams pa dang /_des bstad pa na skad phyung ba/_de dang mi ring ba zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan long ba zhig gnas pa des thos nas/_des smras pa/_glang po che'i gtso bo 'di'i skad dang sbyar na/_'di ni 'di nas dpag tshad brgyar song nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po rab snang dang gsos pa glang po che'i gtso bo 'dam bu'i ri la zhon te song ngo /_/re zhig cig na phyogs zhig na rdza mkhan zhig 'dug pa de'i snod so ma btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas brdzis nas rdza mkhan gyis mya 
[\[8a.2\]]ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /_gsos pas smras pa/_gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rnams ni khwa bzhin khu 'phrig za ba yin pas rgyal po rab snang gis bsams pa/_gsos pa 'di bdag la zur za ste/_de ci bdag gcig pu sas 'tsho ba yin nam mjal 
[\[8a.3\]]to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo /_/yang phyogs zhig na thing ril gyis lam kar tshang bcas pa de'i sgo nga dag 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas des kyang mya ngan bya bar brtsams pa dang /_gsos pas smras pa/_gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 
[\[8a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rab snang de bzhin du rtog pa skyes nas bsams pa/_yang 'di bdag la zur za ste/_ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gi spyod yul ma yin nam mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo /_/yang 'dam bu'i ri shing drung na mar song ba dang /_shing de'i yal ga la 
[\[8a.5\]]sbrul zhig gnas pa des bsnyabs nas rgyal po rab snang bza' bar brtsams so/_/re zhig na gsos pas mthong nas des de ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur gtubs nas sa la bor ba dang g.yo zhing 'gul ba gsos pas bltas te smras pa/_gang dag don du gnyer bar 
[\[8a.6\]]bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po rab snang de kho na bzhin du rtog pa skyes nas bsams pa/_'di bdag la lan gsum gyi bar du zur za ste/_ci smad 'tshong ma bdag gis don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam mjal to snyam du bsams nas cang mi zer bar song ngo /_/
[\[8a.7\]]dus gzhan zhig na 'dam bu'i ri bang theg ste song nas/_rgyal pos de bzung ba dang ma thub nas gsos pas smras pa/_lha bram ze ltas mkhan gyis 'di dpag tshad brgyar song nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po las chu 'thung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan gyi de'i slad du myur du shing gi yal ga la 'jus 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]te glang po che thong shig ces byas pa dang /_des myur ba myur bar shing gi yal ga la 'jus so/_/gsos pas kyang shing gi yal ga la 'jus pa dang 'dam bu'i ri 'das te song ngo /_/rgyal pos gsos pa la smras pa/_gsos pa song la ma tshor bar zhi ba la lha ni byon nas skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so/_/
[\[8b.2\]]zhes gyis shig_/de song nas de la brjod pa dang /_de dga' ba skyes nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/rgyal pos kyang stor khung nas 'dzul bar brtsams pa las/_re zhig na bu mo gnyis shig bshang sar byung ba dang /_de na gcig gis smras pa/_grogs mo lha 'ongs so zhes grag go/_/cig shos 
[\[8b.3\]]kyis de stor khung nas 'dzul lo zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos thos nas des bsams pa/_gsos pa la bdag gis khyod kyis ma tshor bar zhi ba la smros shig ces bsgo na des khyim na 'dug pa ril la smras so snyam du bsams te de khros nas des gsos pa la ji ltar gyur pa dran par byas nas klan ka btsal 
[\[8b.4\]]ba/_gsos pa khyod ko nga la gnod pa byed par zhugs pa lta nga gcig pu sas 'tsho ba yin nam/_ci na gang gi phyir khyod nga la phyogs che ge mo zhig tu gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/_smad 'tshong ma nga'i spyod yul ma yin nam ci na yang phyogs zhig tu gang dag spyod yul ma yin 
[\[8b.5\]]par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/_smad 'tshong ma ngas don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin nam ci na yang phyogs zhig tu yang gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur za/_da gzod kyang nga skyed mos tshal na 'dug pas khyod song la ma tshor bar zhi ba 
[\[8b.6\]]la lha byon te skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes gyis shig ces bsgo bsgo na/_khyod kyis khyim na 'dug pa ril la smras pas khyod ni nga la gnod pa byed par zhugs so/_/de dogs shing mi dga' nas yid ches par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/_lha sdig pas ni brlag ste bdag gis lha la zur bgyis pa ma mchis so/_/
[\[8b.7\]]bdag gis lha la ji ltar zur bgyis/_lha 'di skad du gnas che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der rdza mkhan gyi snod so ma btang ba dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas brdzis nas rdza mkhan des mya ngan 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bgyi bar brtsams pa dang /_bdag gis de las bsams nas/_'di skad du gang dag sas 'tsho ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par bas so/_/phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so 
[\[9a.2\]]zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der srog chags thing ril gyi sgo nga dag cig 'dam bu'i ri'i rkang pas bcom nas de yang mya ngan byed par brtsams pa dang /_bdag gis de las bsams nas 'di skad du gang dag spyod yul ma yin par spyod pa de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis 
[\[9a.3\]]par bas so/_/phyogs che ge mo zhig tu khyod kyis nga la gang dag don du gnyer ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes zur byas so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa ni phyogs der shing gi yal ga la sbrul zhig gnas pa des bsnyabs nas lha bza' bar brtsams pa dang /_
[\[9a.4\]]bdag gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ste dum bu dum bur bcad nas de sa la lhung ba dang /_bdag gis de las bsams nas/_'di skad du gang dag don du gnyer bar bya ba ma yin pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bgyis par bas so/_/ngas khyod la ma tshor bar zhi 
[\[9a.5\]]ba la lha skyed mos tshal na bzhugs so zhes gyis shig ces byas na khyod kyis khyim na gnas pa ril la smras so zhes gsung ba gang lags pa de yang bdag gis ma tshor ba kho nar zhi ba la bgyis na bdag ji ltar lha la gnod pa bgyid par zhugs pa lags/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod 
[\[9a.6\]]kyis nga la lan thams cad legs par glan na/_da gzod nga stor khung nas 'dzul ba na nga bdag nyid kyis bud med gnyis shig las gcig gis grogs mo lha byon to zhes grag go zhes byas pa dang /_cig shos na re de stor khung nas 'dzul lo zhes zer ba thos na de sus byas zhig gu lha de dag 
[\[9a.7\]]ni phra men ma lags na lags kyang 'tshal mod/_der yang bdag gis lha la gnod pa ma bgyis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de de lta yin mod kyi ngas khyod bgams par zad kyis mi dga' bar ma byed cig_/'on kyang nga rdo 'jog tu song ba'i tshe bram ze gang dag 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]gis gzhan zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar brtsams pa de dag thag gzhug pa'i dus 'di yin pas de rnams gsad par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_lha bram ze rnams re zhig gzhag tu gsol/_phra [(]man [,]men [)]ma de rnams je dgum par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa de rnams ji ltar gsad 
[\[9b.2\]]par nus/_lha bdag gis de rnams khums pa'i thabs zhig bgyi'o/_/gsos pa legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces byas pa dang /_gsos pas mdun na 'don gyi khye'u rig sngags smra ba mkhas pa zhig yod pa de'i drung du song nas bu phra men ma 'di dag skye bo mang po gsod par byed na/_
[\[9b.3\]]de dag gzung bar bya ba'i thabs de 'ga' yod dam zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_yab ci bgyir mchis bdag gis gzung bar bas so/_/bu legs so zhes byas pa dang /_des mi'i lag pa las ut+pal 'dra bar bsgyur nas mi'i lag tu bskur te smras pa/_kye mi khyod song la srang du phyin 
[\[9b.4\]]nas 'dug la/_su rin gyis nyo ba de la ma sbyin par gang zhig mthong na dgod pa de'i ming dris te glegs bu la bris shig_/des de thogs te 'dug nas gang zhig rin gyis nyo ba de la mi ster/_gang zhig mthong nas dgod pa de'i ming ni dris nas glegs bu la 'dri bar byed de/_des de ltar 'phags 
[\[9b.5\]]rgyal gyi phra men ma lnga brgya'i ming dris nas bris so/_/de nas gsos pa la bstan nas gsos pas kyang rgyal po la bstan pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa phra men ma mang po 'di dag ci ltar kha btag_/des smras pa/_lha de rnams ji ltar dgum pa'i thabs bdag la 'tshal gyis 
[\[9b.6\]]lha thugs khral bskyud du gsol/_des smras pa/_gsos pa legs te khyod nyid shes so/_/des 'phags rgyal gyi phyogs zhig tu 'khor gyi khyams zhig byas nas/_des lha ni ma'i dam tshig la 'jug gis 'phags rgyal na srin mo ji snyed gnas pa thams cad 'khor gyi khyams su 'du bar 
[\[9b.7\]]gyis shig ces dril bsgrags pa dang /_de dag gis bsams pa/_lha 'khor gyi khyams su ma'i dam tshig la 'jug pa der bdag cag la rdzas bzang po mang du ster gyis 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas gang dag mi mngon par 'dug 'dug pa de dag kyang rnyed pa la chags pas bdag nyid nye bar bstan te srin mo 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]lnga brgya lhag tsam 'khor gyi khyams su lhags so/_/de nas mdun na 'don gyi bu des de dag thams cad rig sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang /_gsos pas kyang de rnams kha btag go/_/rgyal pos 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams bos nas shes 
[\[10a.2\]]ldan dag gis phra men ma 'di snyed cig bsad pas bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed kyis/_khyod kyis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa de las dbyung ba'i phyir nyin gcig bzhin 'khor gyi khyams su 'du zhing zan zo shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de rnams kyis shis pa brjod pa byas nas 
[\[10a.3\]]khas blangs so/_/rgyal po rab snang gis sgo ba la bsgo ba/_kye skyes bu bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams su zan zos nas 'gro ba de dag thams cad khyod kyis legs par grongs te nga la snyod cig_/des smras pa/_lha de ltar bgyi ste gsol bar 'tshal lo/_/rgyal pos 
[\[10a.4\]]blon po rnams la yang bsgo ba shes ldan dag 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze ji snyed cig 'khor gyi khyams su zan za ba thams cad la kha zas bsod pa phal cher byin cig_/bram ze rnams ni phal cher lto mdun can yin pas rgyal po des de ltar byed du bcug go zhes thos nas 
[\[10a.5\]]thams cad lhags nas zan bza' bar brtsams so/_/de rnams zan zos nas 'khor gyi khyams nas phyir byung ba dang /_sgo bas bgrangs na lhag chad med par bram ze brgyad khri byung ste/_des rgyal po la lha lhag chad ma mchis par bram ze brgyad khri mchis so zhes gsol to/_/
[\[10a.6\]]rgyal pos gang gis na 'di rnams dus gcig tu mgo bcad pa'i thabs de gang yin snyam du bsams nas des zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/_bram ze zan za ba re re'i rgyab tu gshed ma mi ral gri thogs pa re re zhog la/_gang gi tshe ngas zho 'on cig ces smras pa de'i tshe thams cad 
[\[10a.7\]]kyi mgo chod cig_/rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis de ltar byas pa dang /_'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams las 'chi bdag gi zhags pas zin pa brgyad khri tham pa 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus pa de dag sbyor ba des cig car mgo bcad do/_/de na 'phags rgyal na gnas pa'i 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bram ze las bram ze brgyad khri rgyal po rab snang gis bsad do/_/des de dag bsad nas nub mo mal chen por nyal ba na rmi lam du sa bla'i sgra drug dang /_bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/_rmi lam rnam pa brgyad ni mthong ngo /_/sa bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drug_/med/_bdag_/
[\[10b.2\]]ngan/_sems/_bdag cag 'di rnams zhes bya ba ste/_'di dag ni 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po yin no/_/de la drug ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang /_/lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru/_/sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams 
[\[10b.3\]]kyi/_/nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/_/med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod/_/nga dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni/_/mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba/_/de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so/_/bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_
[\[10b.4\]]bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag_/mthun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa/_/gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/_/ngan zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/_/bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang /_/
[\[10b.5\]]longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid la ni phan ma byas/_/sems zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_sems kyis su ni bslus gyur cing /_/mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyis/_/gnya' ni su zhig byed par gyur/_/bdag 
[\[10b.6\]]cag 'di rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru/_/song ste dge ba mang byas nas/_/de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing /_/shis pas byas rnams mtho ris 'dong /_/bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad/_su/_gang /_
[\[10b.7\]]da ni/_de rnams/_'di dag ces bya ba ste/_'di dag ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po yin no/_/de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te/_/'di la snying po tsam zhig lus/_/rgyal po srin te snying po la/_/dga' ba med pas 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]re ba bor/_/su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i/_/mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/_/des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang /_/bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas/_/gang zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_rdzing 'di 
[\[11a.2\]]nya dang rus sbal ni/_/mang po dag gis gang ba las/_/da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi/_/bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro/_/da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la/_/bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i/_/long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/_/
[\[11a.3\]]da ni mgon yang med par gyur/_/de rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/_/chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag_/bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/_/bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o/_/'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_'di dag 
[\[11a.4\]]khrus byas zos nas ni/_/phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/bdag ni rnyi yis bzung gyur pa/_/sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas/_/rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs pa dang /_tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba dang /_klad la me 'bar 
[\[11a.5\]]ba dang /_mchan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang /_rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa dang /_ngang pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang /_ri nag po zhig mdun na tshur 'ong ba dang /_chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong ngo /_/de gnyid sad nas 
[\[11a.6\]]'jigs par gyur/_bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed nas gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/_/des rmi lam de dag bram ze rmi lam gyi dpyad shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag bos te bsnyad pa dang /_de dag gis bsams 
[\[11a.7\]]pa/_lhas rmi lam de dag bzang po zhig mthong mod kyi 'on kyang bsngags par ni mi bya ste/_gal te bsngags na 'di ji lta ba ngan par gyur nas bram ze lhag ma gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par byed par 'ong ngo snyam du rig nas gros byas te smras pa/_lha rmang lam ni mi bzang ba dag 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]cig go/_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'bras bu cir 'gyur/_de dag gis smras pa/_gzhi de las lha rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag gang gis nga rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing srog 
[\[11b.2\]]gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ba'i thabs de lta 'ga' yod dam/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha khyod kyis sdig chen po byas te bram ze brgyad khri bsad pas de'i slad du gal te spyod na thabs gcig cig mchis so/_/de bram ze bsad pa dran nas snying kun tu 'dar te smras pa/_shes ldan dag 
[\[11b.3\]]ci bya smros shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha skyed mos tshal du rdzing bu rkor stsal te/_/brkos nas rdo thal gyi nyug tu stsol cig_/de nas der yan lag gi mchog lnga po gsos pa dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /_
[\[11b.4\]]gzhon nu ba lang skyong rnams bsad de bcug la de rnams kyi khrag gis khrus mdzad de rdzing bu nas byung la pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas bram ze rnams kyi rkang pa la lces bldags nas/_de lta na khyod rgyal srid las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur 
[\[11b.5\]]ro/_rgyal pos bsams pa/_gal te bdag gis yan lag gi mchog lnga po gsos pa dang /_mdun na 'don dang /_ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /_gzhon nu ba lang skyong rnams bsad na bdag rgyal po byas te yang ci rung snyam du bsams nas bram ze 
[\[11b.6\]]rnams la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis gang smras pa de ngas thos kyis deng shig dang re zhig bsams te bya'o/_/bram ze rnams dong ba dang de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas mthong ste des smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du phyag 'gram 
[\[11b.7\]]pa la gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs/_des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad de la bsnyad pa dang /_des smras pa/_lha bram ze de dag ni rtag tu mi rigs pa bsten pa lags pas de dag ci 'tshal/_bzhud la 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la zhus shig_/des smras pa/_zhi ba legs 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]so legs so/_/khyod kyis dus su 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la gtad pas 'gro'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu ga la ba der song ngo /_/der song ste song nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[12a.2\]]gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gtum po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/slob dpon ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'di na bdag mtshan mo mal chen po zhig na nyal zhing mchis pa'i tshe rmi lam du sa bla'i sgra drug dang /_bar snang gi sgra drug ni thos/_rmi lam 
[\[12a.3\]]brgyad ni mthong ste/_sa bla'i sgra drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_drug_/med/_bdag_/ngan/_sems/_bdag cag 'di rnams zhes bya ba ste/_'di dag ni 'dir tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po lags so/_/de la drug ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_lo ni stong 
[\[12a.4\]]phrag drug bcu dang /_/lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru/_/sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi/_/nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/_/med ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod/_/nga dang khyed cag nyid kyis ni/_/mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 
[\[12a.5\]]'gyur ba/_/de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so/_/bdag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_bdag cag gis ni longs spyod dag_/mthun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa/_/gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/_/ngan zhes bya ba 
[\[12a.6\]]las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/_/bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang /_/longs spyod dag ni yod pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid la ni phan ma byas/_/sems zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_sems kyis su ni bslus gyur cing /_/mi shes pas ni 
[\[12a.7\]]bdas gyur pa/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi/_/gnya' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur/_/bdag cag 'di rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru/_/song ste dge ba mang byas nas/_/de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing /_/shis 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dong /_/bar snang gi sgra drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad/_su/_gang /_da ni/_de rnams/_'di dag ces bya ba ste/_'di dag ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gi yi ge dang po lags so/_/de la thams cad ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_thams cad 
[\[12b.2\]]gsog tu phyung zin te/_/de la snying po tsam zhig lus/_/rgyal po srin te snying po la/_/dga' ba med pas re ba bor/_/su zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i/_/mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/_/des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang /_/bdag kyang 
[\[12b.3\]]sdug bsngal las thar byas/_/gang zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_rdzing 'di nya dang rus sbal ni/_/mang po dag gis gang ba las/_/da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi/_/bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro/_/da ni zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_gang zhig ri bo gtum 
[\[12b.4\]]ldan la/_/bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i/_/long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/_/da ni mgon yang med par 'gyur/_/de rnams zhes bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/_/chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dag_/bde blag nyid du rnyed par 'gyur/_/bdag kyang da 
[\[12b.5\]]ltar der dga'o/_/'di dag ces bya ba las tshigs su bcad pa ni/_'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni/_/phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/bdag ni rnyi yis bzung gyur pa/_/sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas/_/rmi lam brgyad ces bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tsan dan dkar pos 
[\[12b.6\]]lus byugs pa dang /_tsan dan dmar pos gtor ba dang /_klad la me 'bar ba dang /_mchan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba dang /_rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa dang /_ngang pa gnyis nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang /_ri nag po zhig mdun nas tshur 'ong ba dang /_chu skyar 
[\[12b.7\]]dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong ste/_gnyid sad nas 'jigs par gyur/_bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes bgyid nas/_gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam bgyid do/_/'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la bdag don 'di 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]zhu na/_gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am/_srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur ba lags grang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sgra de dag dang /_rmi lam de dag gzhan 'ga' zhig la bsnyad dam/_des smras pa/_'phags 
[\[13a.2\]]pa bsnyad do/_/su zhig la/_bram ze rnams la'o/_/de dag gis khyod la ji skad du lung bstan/_des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po de dag ni rtag tu 'dod pa la longs spyod pa dang /_lha'i 'jig rten mngon par 'dod pa yin te/_de dag 
[\[13a.3\]]ci shes/_khyod kyis sgra bzang po dag cig kyang thos/_rmi lam bzang po dag cig kyang mthong gis/_khyod ma 'jigs shig dang /_gzhi de las khyod rgyal srid las nyams par yang mi 'gyur/_srog gi bar chad du yang mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 
[\[13a.4\]]rmi lam na sa bla'i sgra drug thos pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhe na/_khyod kyi mdun rol gyi rgyal po drug cig gis chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug pas lus zhig nas sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam 
[\[13a.5\]]po nyi shu dgu pa//_//de na gcig gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen nas tshigs su bcad pa/_lo ni stong phrag drug bcu dang /_/lo ni brgya phrag drug bcu ru/_/sems can dmyal bar 'tshed rnams kyi/_/nam zhig mthar ni phyin par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba smras 
[\[13a.6\]]so/_/gnyis pas tshigs su bcad pa/_mtha' med mtha' lta ga la yod/_/nga dang khyed cag gnyis kyis ni/_/mtha' nyid dmigs par mi 'gyur ba/_/de ltar sdig pa'i las byas so/_/zhes bya ba smras so/_/gsum pas tshigs su bcad pa/_bdag cag gis ni 
[\[13a.7\]]longs spyod dag_/mthun dang mi mthun pas bsgrubs pa/_/gzhan dag bde bas dga' byed kyi/_/bdag cag sdug bsngal skal can gyur/_/ces bya ba smras so/_/bzhi pas tshigs su bcad pa/_'di na bdag cag 'tsho ba ngan/_/bdag cag gang bdog de ma btang /_/longs spyod 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]dag ni yod pa'i tshe/_/bdag nyid la ni phan ma byas/_/zhes bya ba smras so/_/lnga pas tshigs su bcad pa/_sems kyis su ni bslus gyur cing /_/mi shes pas ni bdas gyur pa/_/sems can dmyal bar skyes rnams kyi/_/gnya' ni su zhig byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba smras so/_/
[\[13b.2\]]drug pas tshigs su bcad pa/_bdag cag 'di rnams bde 'gro ru/_/song ste dge ba mang byas nas/_/de nas bsod nams byas gyur cing /_/shis pa byas rnams mtho ris 'dong /_/zhes bya ba smras te/_de dag ni de'i ltas yin no/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bar snang las sgra drug thos 
[\[13b.3\]]pa gang yin pa de gang gi ltas yin zhe na/_khyod kyi khyim gyi gdung ma de la srin bu zhig gnas pa des de'i snying po ma yin pa thams cad zos nas snying po nyi tshe lus pa dang /_de der mngon par mi dga' nas tshigs su bcad pa/_thams cad gsog tu phyung zin te/_/'di la snying po tsam zhig 
[\[13b.4\]]lus/_/rgyal po srin de snying po la/_/dga' ba med pas re ba bor/_/zhes smras so/_/nam mkha'i sgra dang po ni de yin te/_de bas na khyod kyis phyung la gdung gzhan zhig chug shig_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang khyod kyi rta rdzi [(]gnyar [,]gnyer [)]len zhes bya ba des bya rog mo'i sgo nga byung zhing byung ba rnams 
[\[13b.5\]]bcom pa dang /_de bu dang bral bas yid mi bde ba skyes te/_snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing dal bus tshigs su bcad pa/_su zhig gnyer len tshul ngan po'i/_/mig ya gcig kyang 'jor byed pa/_/des ni bdag gi bu tsha dang /_/bdag kyang sdug bsngal las thar byas/_/zhes bya ba 
[\[13b.6\]]smras te/_nam mkha'i sgra gnyis pa ni de yin gyis/_/khyod kyis de 'joms su ma gzhug shig_/gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na rtse ba'i rdzing bu bya rog gis btung slebs tsam du chus kha da chad du gang ba nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_sbal ba mang po gnas pa de na chu skyar gcig cig 
[\[13b.7\]]nya dag za zhing 'dug pa las deng skams te chu med par gyur pa dang /_chu skyar des de lta bu de mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa/_rdzing 'di nya dang rus sbal ni/_/mang po dag gis gang ba las/_/da ni sbal bas 'tsho mod kyi/_/bdag gis gnas ni mi 'dor ro/_/zhes bya 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]ba smras te/_nam mkha'i sgra gsum pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de chus khong shig_/gzhan yang khyod kyi yul na ri bo gtum ldan zhes bya ba de la glang po che dang glang po che mo dmus long zhig gnas te/_de gnyis la bu gcig yod pa de de dag gi rim gro byed do/_/
[\[14a.2\]]de de gnyis kyi zas kyi phyir song ba na glang po che mo zhig dang lhan cig 'dus par gyur pa las/_de khyod kyis thabs kyis brongs te khrid de 'ongs nas btags te bzhag pa dang /_de ma dang pha'i rjes su mya ngan byed cing rtswa yang mi za chu yang mi 'thung bar de dag rjes su dran zhing mi dga' 
[\[14a.3\]]bar gyur nas tshigs su bcad pa/_gang zhig ri bo gtum ldan la/_/bdag la rkang pas nom byed pa'i/_/long ba nyon mongs de dag ni/_/da ni mgon yang med par gyur/_/ces bya ba smras te/_nam mkha'i sgra bzhi pa ni de yin gyis/_pha ma'i grogs byed pa shi na mi 
[\[14a.4\]]rung bas khyod kyis de thong shig_/gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]zhig bzung ste 'dug pa de khyu dang bral bas dgon pa'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rnams dran nas tshigs su bcad pa/_de rnams mtsho ni bzang po las/_/chu ni bsil zhing zhim pa dang /_/bde blag nyid du rnyed par 
[\[14a.5\]]'gyur/_/bdag kyang da ltar der dga'o/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_bar snang gi sgra lnga pa ni de yin gyis khyod kyis de thong shig_/gzhan yang khyod kyi khyim na ngang pa dag cig bzung ste 'dug pa de dag gis ngang pa gnam la 'phur ba dag mthong nas mi dga' ste tshigs su bcad pa/_
[\[14a.6\]]'di dag khrus byas zos nas ni/_/phyogs dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/bdag ni rnyi yis bzung gyur pa/_/sngon go sdig pa ci zhig byas/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_nam mkha'i sgra drug pa ni de yin pas de dag kyang khyod kyis gtang bar bya ste de ni de dag gi ltas yin no/_/rgyal 
[\[14a.7\]]po chen po khyod kyis rmi lam brgyad mthong ba gang yin pa de ci'i snga ltas yin zhe na/_re zhig tsan dan dkar pos lus byugs par mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos gos be'u ras yug po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de zhag bdun na 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam dang po ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyod kyis lus la tsan dan dmar pos gtor bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod las 'dzin gyi rgyal pos la ba rin po che zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/_de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas rmi 
[\[14b.2\]]lam gnyis pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyod kyis klad pa la me 'bar bar mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la yul ya ba na'i rgyal pos gser gyi phreng ba zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/_de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas rmi lam gsum pa ni de'i snga ltas yin 
[\[14b.3\]]no/_/khyod kyis mchan khung gnyis nas sbrul gnyis 'phyang ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la rgya'i rgyal pos ral gri zung cig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste/_de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam bzhi pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyod kyis 
[\[14b.4\]]rkang pa gnyis la nya khar ba gnyis ldag pa mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la sing ga la'i rgyal pos nor bu'i lham zung cig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam lnga pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyod kyis ngang pa gnyis nam 
[\[14b.5\]]mkha' la 'phur ba mthong ba gang yin pa ni khyod la b+haM ga la'i rgyal pos rta gnyis zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bar khyod kyi rmi lam drug pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyod kyis ri nag po zhig mdun nas tshur 'ong ba mthong ba 
[\[14b.6\]]gang yin pa ni khyod la ka ling ka'i rgyal pos glang po che'i gtso bo zhig skyes su bskur ba lam du zhugs shing 'dug ste de yang zhag bdun na phyin par 'gyur bas khyod kyi rmi lam bdun pa ni de'i snga ltas yin no/_/khyod kyis chu skyar dag mgo la rtug pas 'thor ba mthong ba gang yin pa de ni khyod 
[\[14b.7\]]dang ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba shes par 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyis bram ze rnams la yang ngan sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po rab snang srog stor ba las phyir rnyed pa bzhin du dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_rangs pa dang /_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bde ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos bshad pa la rjes su yi rangs nas rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te song ngo /_/de rang gi khyim du song nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos ji skad smras pa de thams cad bsgrubs te 
[\[15a.2\]]gdung ma yang gzhan zhig bcug_/rta rdzi gnyer len yang de ltar byed du ma bcug_/rdzing bu yang chus bkang /_glang po che dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_ngang pa rnams kyang btang ngo /_/zhag bdun na de'i skyes ji skad bstan pa thams cad kyang phyin nas de nor rnyed pas yid bde ba 
[\[15a.3\]]skyes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la je sems mngon par dad par gyur te bsams pa/_bdag gi khyim na dpal dang dbang thang phun sum tshogs pa gang cung zad yod pa de thams cad ni 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la brten nas byung ba yin no/_/de'i phyir re zhig gos be'u 
[\[15a.4\]]ras yug po che 'di bskur la phyis rgyal srid bstabs par bya'o snyam du rig nas mi zhig la smras pa/_kye skyes bu khyod tshur gos be'u ras yug po che 'di khyer la 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la phul cig ces byas pa dang /_des gos be'u ras yug po che de khyer nas 'phags pa 
[\[15a.5\]]ka t+ya'i bu chen po la byin no/_/de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /_gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang /_gsos pa dang /_mdun na 'don la smras pa/_shes ldan dag nga la yul sna tshogs la dbang ba'i rgyal po rnams kyis skyes 'di dag bskur gyis 
[\[15a.6\]]khyed gang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin khyer cig_/de nas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi bas ni gser gyi phreng ba khyer/_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol mas ni la ba rin po che/_gzhon nu ba lang skyong gis ni rta gnyis/_gsos pas ni ral gri zung cig_/mdun na 'don gyis ni nor bu'i lham zung 
[\[15a.7\]]cig khyer te glang po che'i gtso bo lus pa de rgyal pos khyer ro/_/de nas rgyal po rab snang yan lag gi mchog lnga la rin po che dag gi bgo bsha' byas nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa sman 'dogs shing gces spras mdzad pa lags te/_de'i slad du bdag 'phags pa la rgyal srid stobs na thugs 
[\[15b.2\]]brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong la rgyal srid byed pa bkag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de ltar na 'dod pa thams cad stobs na/_'dod pa 
[\[15b.3\]]thams cad yongs su spyad du gsol/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa thams cad kyang bkag go/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa gal te de lta na longs spyod dang /_longs spyod kyi mchog rnams stobs na yongs su spyad du gsol/_
[\[15b.4\]]des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po re zhig bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa de ltar mdzod cig de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das ni mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/skabs de lta bu la 
[\[15b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa dang /_mi rig pa dang /_rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong ka t+ya'i bu chen po longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams don du gnyer ba ma 
[\[15b.6\]]yin mod kyi 'on kyang skye bo phyi ma rnams la phan gdags so snyam du dgongs nas 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/_/chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe/_srog chags grog spur rnams kyis kyang bcom 
[\[15b.7\]]ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so/_/gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na/_byol song gi skye gnas su song ba rnams kyis lta smos kyang 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]ci dgos/_don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po'i thugs dang sems su 'phrod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba mngon par 
[\[16a.2\]]bsgrubs nas phan tshun lta ba dang nyan par yang zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi ched du longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog dag blang du rung lags sam/_bcom ldan 
[\[16a.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ka t+ya'i bu chen po skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /_sbyin pa po rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir rung ste/_de lta bas na dge 'dun la longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang gi gang zag la ni ma yin no/_/de la 
[\[16a.4\]]longs spyod ni 'di dag yin te/_grong dang /_zhing rnams so/_/longs spyod kyi mchog ni ba lang dang /_ma he dang /_ra dang /_lug rnams so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la zhus nas rgyal po rab snang la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen 
[\[16a.5\]]po bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phyi ma rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang /_sbyin bdag rnams kyi longs spyod 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dge 'dun la longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po rab snang gis tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po las brten nas 
[\[16a.6\]]yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul nas longs spyod dang longs spyod kyi mchog rnams kyang phul lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i dge 
[\[16a.7\]]bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar 'dod pa thams cad stobs pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/_'phags rgyal gyi rgyal po rab snang 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar bshos 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/_
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gnas mal 'bul ba rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/_mnyan yod kyi khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di yin no/_/dge slong dag 
[\[16b.2\]]nga'i dge bsnyen nga'i nyan thos dge 'dun la thog mar gtsug lag khang byed pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/_yul bA rA Na sI'i khyim bdag bzang ldan 'di yin no//_//bar sdom ni/_'dod pa kun gyi rab snang ste/_/dge 'dun bshos kyi bzo sbyangs yin/_/gnas 
[\[16b.3\]]mal mgon med zas sbyin te/_/gtsug lag khang gi bzang ldan no/_/rgyal po rab snang btsun mo'i 'khor du res kyis zan za ste/_nyi ma gcig ni ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i drung du/_gcig ni skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma'i drung du'o/_/de dus gzhan zhig na dgongs pa/_ba 
[\[16b.4\]]lang skyong gi ma zhi ba'i thad du zan za ba na rgyal po de zho la dga' bas ba lang skyong gi ma zho'i phor ba thogs te de zan za ba'i mdun na 'dug go/_/ji tsam na phyogs der skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma song ste/_des la ba rin po che bgos pa dang /_des glog byung ba lta bur rgyal po de ba lang 
[\[16b.5\]]skyong gi ma zhi ba dang bcas te snang bar byas so/_/zhi bas snang ba de mthong nas ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/_lha 'di ci lags/_glog cig glo bur du byung ngam/_'ga' zhig gis zhugs mar 'tshal/_des smras pa/_zhi ba 'di ni glog gi 'od kyang ma yin/_mar 
[\[16b.6\]]me'i yang ma yin gyi/_'on kyang skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma phyogs 'di nas song ste/_des la ba rin po che bgos pas 'di ni de'i 'od yin no/_/khyod kyis la ba rin po che de lta bu btang ste gser gyi phreng ba blangs pa ni khyod blun no/_/ji bdag gi khyim na gser gyi phreng ba med dam/_
[\[16b.7\]]nyis na rigs ngan pa las skyes pa de the gi'o/_/des smras pa/_lha de la de lta bu'i shes rab ga la mchis/_gdon ma 'tshal bar khyod nyid kyis la ba rin po che long shig ces bstan te des na des blangs lags mod/_rgyal pos smras pa/_ngas de la ma smras te des rang gi 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]blos blangs so/_/khyod kyis smras so/_/ngas ma smras so zhes de gnyis 'thabs par gyur nas/_zhi bas de'i mgor zho'i phor bas bsnun pa dang /_rgyal po de spyi gcer zhig pas de'i klad pa zhom mo/_/des lag pas mnams te bsams pa/_bdag gi klad 
[\[17a.2\]]pa yang zhom/_bdag gi klad rgyas kyang lug pas 'dis ye bdag bsad kyis ji srid srog dang ma bral gyi bar du je 'di bsad do snyam nas/_des gsos pa la bsgo ba/_gsos pa ngas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gis sod cig_/gsos pas bsams pa/_de 'di 
[\[17a.3\]]la shin tu 'phangs na 'di khros pa'i kun nas dkris pas 'di skad du zer bar zad pas 'phral la gsad par mi bya'i kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas bsam pa shes par bya ste gsad kyis re zhig gnas dben pa zhig tu gzhag go snyam du rig nas/_smras pa/_lha de ltar 'tshal te dgum mo 
[\[17a.4\]]zhes byas nas/_des de gnas dben pa zhig tu bzhag go/_/rgyal pos kun nas dkris pa dang bral nas smras pa/_gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba ga re/_des smras pa/_lha khyod kyis ngas ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba yongs su btang gis sod cig ces bka' stsal pas bdag 
[\[17a.5\]]gis de lha'i bka' bzhin du bkum lags so/_/des smras pa/_gsos pa legs so/_/da ni nga dang /_skya bseng gi bu mo sgrol ma dang /_gzhon nu ba lang skyong dang /_mdun na 'don kyang song la khyod nyid cod pan chings te rgyal srid byed la rag go/_/ngas ko des nga la ma gus pa byas 
[\[17a.6\]]pas ngas de nan thur byas la phyis dga' bar bya'o snyam du bsam bsam na khyod kyis mod kho na la bsad pa lta zhig_/des smras pa/_lha 'di na skyes bu mkhas pa kha cig smras pa'i don dpes kyang kun 'tshal bar 'gyur bas re zhig dpe gsan du gsol/_bsdus pa'i sdom ni/_khra 
[\[17a.7\]]bo dang ni sgren mo dang /_/rnyed par dka' dang slu ba dang /_/mi ngoms pa dang gnyid gtogs par/_/bsdus pa'i sdom du yang dag bsdus/_/sdom ni/_khra bo spre'u dang 'jig rten na/_/long ba dag ste tha ma yin/_/rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ri'i phyogs mi 'du ba dang 'jigs pa ma 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]mchis pa shing sna tshogs kyi tshal gyis brgyan pa/_seng ge dang /_stag dang /_dred dang /_byi la dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang /_phag rgod rgyu ba/_bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis bsten pa gcig cig tu srog chags thi bas shing chen po zhig gi khar tshang bcas te/_des de 'bras bu smin pa 
[\[17b.2\]]rnams kyis bkang nas chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste/_da lta ni gang yang rung bas bdag nyid 'tsho bar bya'o/_/nam rlung dang /_yul ngan byung ba de'i tshe 'di dag bza' bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_legs te de bzhin bya'o/_/ji 
[\[17b.3\]]tsam na rlung dang nyi mas phog pas 'bras bu rnams skams te tshang de 'gribs par gyur pa dang /_thi bas smras pa/_bzang mo ngas khyod la khyod kyis 'bras bu 'di dag bza' bar mi bya ste/_rlung ngam yul ngan byung ba'i tshe bza' bar bya'o zhes ma bkag gam/_'o na ci'i phyir khyod 
[\[17b.4\]]kyis zos/_des smras pa/_bdag gis ma zos so/_/des smras pa/_ngas tshang 'di bkang ste bzhag na/_gal te khyod kyis ma zos na 'o na tshang 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs par gyur/_des smras pa/_tshang 'di ci'i phyir 'gribs ma shes/_bdag gis ni 'di las 'bras bu cig 
[\[17b.5\]]kyang ma zos so/_/khyod kyis zos so ngas ma zos so zhes de gnyis lan dang yang lan 'debs pa na thab mo byung ste des thi ba mo de mchus bsnun nas srog dang bral te de de nyid na 'phyang zhing 'dug go/_/re zhig cig na dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab pa dang /_yang tshang de de kho na 
[\[17b.6\]]bzhin du 'bras bu de dag gis gang nas des bsams pa/_tshang 'di 'bras bu dag gis yang gang ba las na des 'di dag ma zos so snyam nas/_des de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa/_khra mo sdug pa longs shig_/'di dag khyod kyis ma zos te bdag gi tshang 'di gang gis 
[\[17b.7\]]nyes pa cig bzod par mdzod cig ces byas pa dang /_lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nags tshal rgyu ba'i thi ba ni/_/'dab ma khra bo mig dmar ba/_/rang gis sdug ma bsad nas ni/_/blo ngan ci zhig mya ngan byed/_/ji ltar thi ba bab col spyod pa yis/_/'di na sdug pa 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]nyes med bsad nas ni/_/blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes/_/de la bzhams te nyes cig bzod gsol ba/_/de bzhin rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa yis/_/zhi ba yid dang 'thad pa 'dir bsad nas/_/blo rmongs mya ngan byed cing bzang mo zhes/_/de la bzhams 
[\[18a.2\]]te nyes cig bzod pa gsol/_/zhes bgyi ba lags te/_lha khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don ni bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do/_/lha gzhan yang khyim bdag cig dbyar 'das pa dang ston gyi dus su sran ma'i khur 'tshal nas zhing thog tu chas so/_/des sran ma'i 
[\[18a.3\]]khur de shing drung zhig tu bzhag nas pha zad du bshang ba'i sar mchis pa dang /_ji tsam na spre'u zhig shing de las babs nas sran ma las spar gang blangs te yang shing de las 'dzegs so/_/de 'dzeg pa na sran ma 'brum bu gcig shor de sa la lhung nas des sran ma spar gang po de 
[\[18a.4\]]bor te/_sran ma 'brum bu cig po de btsal bar brtsams pa na/_khyim bdag des de la bong ba cig bsnun te de dus las 'das pa dang lhas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sran ma spar gang bor nas su/_/gang zhig 'bras bu gcig tshol ba/_/shin tu tshogs mang ldan pa yi/_/
[\[18a.5\]]spre'u 'di kye ma re mi mdzangs/_/zhes bgyi ba lags te lhas gsungs pa'i don gang zhig ba lang skyong gi ma bkum nas/_yang bzod pa gsol bar bzhed pa ni bdag dpe de dang 'dra ba snyam bgyid do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis tshig cig kho na'i kha la ba lang 
[\[18a.6\]]skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_ston pa gang zag zla med pa/_/gcig pu tshig ni gcig gsung ste/_/gsung ba de ni nges lags pas/_/'di la bdag blo 'gyur ma mchis/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis 
[\[18a.7\]]gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga long bar byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_lha dang mir bcas 'jig rten 'dir/_/long ba gnyis ni nges grub pa/_/rang bzhin gyis ni dmus long dang /_/gang yang chos la mi gnas pa'o/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]rol du/_/gzhan yang long ba gnyis lags te/_/gang la sdig lta de yod dam/_/gang zhig khrims la mi brten pa'o/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_/sdom ni/_sgren mo cir yang mi rung dang /_/ma spyad gtun dang lan gcig dang /_/nad dang bag tsha brnyas 
[\[18b.2\]]pa dang /_/de bzhin du ni bags kyis so/_/byis pa dang ni bshes dag dang /_/skyes bu tha shal nyid dang ni/_/shing rta yis ni 'khor lo dang /_/g.yo gtogs par ni yongs su rdzogs/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba 
[\[18b.3\]]bsad pas nga sgren mor byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha sgren mo gsum gyi mi mdzes pa khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gsum gang yin/_lha/_klung ni chu med sgren mo ste/_/yul 'khor 'gron med sgren mo'o/_/gal te ming po bcu yod 
[\[18b.4\]]kyang /_/khyo med bud med sgren mo'o/_/zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga cir yang mi rung bar byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha 'jig rten na cir yang mi rung ba gsum mchis par 
[\[18b.5\]]khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_des smras pa/_gsos pa gsum gang yin/_lha/_rta bo thal kar bang bul dang /_/ston mo bya na med pa dang /_/bud med gang zhig khyim sun 'byin/_/'di gsum cir yang mi rung ba'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa ba 
[\[18b.6\]]lang skyong gi ma zhi ba longs ma spyad par khyod kyis bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_sol ba byed pa'i gos dang ni/_/bkru bshal byed pa'i lham dag dang /_/rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ni/_/longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis 
[\[18b.7\]]ma gsan tam/_lha de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma bas gzhan yang gsum ste/_nags kyi shing gi me tog dang /_/dka' thub can gyi lang tsho dang /_/shing rta mkhan gyi chung ma dag_/longs ma spyad par dengs par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni gtun gyis brdeg pa'i rgyu'o/_/des smras pa/_lha/_shing mkhan rtsang rtsing 'jog pa dang /_/bzang mkhan skud pa ring po dang /_/kha lo sgyur ba mig rgyang thung /_/de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o/_/zhes 
[\[19a.2\]]bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_lha de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma bas/_gzhan yang gsum ste/_pho nya'i pho nya gang yin dang /_/mngag gzhug pa yi mngag gzhug dang /_/bud med 'phyon ma byed pa gang /_/de gsum btun gyis brdeg rgyu'o/_/lha de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma bas 
[\[19a.3\]]gzhan yang gsum ste/_gnag rdzi grong na rgyu ba dang /_/'breg mkhan nags na rgyu ba dang /_/mag pa rtag tu 'ong byed pa/_/de gsum gtun gyis brdeg rgyu'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba lan gcig gis bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_
[\[19a.4\]]rgyal po smra ba lan gcig ste/_/bu mo sbyin pa lan gcig go/_/'phags pa'i gzigs pa lan gcig ste/_/de gsum lan re lan re'o/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas 
[\[19a.5\]]khyod ni rang gis nad bslangs so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_sdar ma sna tshogs go gyon dang /_/rtswa mjing chung ngu nor mang dang /_/rgan po chung ma gzhon len pa/_/de dag rang gis nad bslangs so/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi 
[\[19a.6\]]phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga ni khyod la bag tsha'o/_/des smras pa/_lha/_dka' thub can ni blun mthong dang /_/dpa' bo rma mtshan med pa dang /_/bu mo chen mo mthong nas ni/_/snying la bag tsha skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal 
[\[19a.7\]]pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga brnyas so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_cal le col le smra ba dang /_/gnyis pa gos ngan gyon pa dang /_/skru zhing za ba gang yin pa/_/de gsum brnyas par bya ba yin/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas ngas khyod dgra zhig bags kyis spel to/_/des smras pa/_lha/_nya ni bags kyis bza' bar bya/_/ri bo la ni bags kyis gzeg_/don rnams bags kyis 
[\[19b.2\]]bsgrub bya ste/_/'di gsum bags kyis bags kyis bya/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni byis pa'o/_/des smras pa/_lha/_ma 'dris pa la yid rton dang /_/ma 
[\[19b.3\]]rungs pa la sten pa dang /_/gya tsom du ni yongs gtong ba/_/byis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam gsum mo/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni bshes pa 'byed pa yin no/_/
[\[19b.4\]]des smras pa/_lha/_bshes rnams la ni mi sten dang /_/gnyis pa ha cang sten pa dang /_/dus ma yin par slong byed pa/_/des ni bshes rnams 'byed par byed/_/ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod 
[\[19b.5\]]kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni skyes bu tha shal yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rtag tu gzhan gyi nor dang ni/_/bdag nyid 'dod pa rnog byed dang /_/de bzhin sdug bsngal la dga' ba/_/de gsum skyes bu tha shal yin/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma 
[\[19b.6\]]gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni shing rta'i 'khor los gsad rgyu yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_ri mo mkhan ni tshon gtong mi shes dang /_/'khrul 'khor mkhan ni 'byor ka mi shes dang /_/gyad [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]bu 
[\[19b.7\]]ni dor thabs mi shes pa/_/gsad bya gsad par rtag tu bzlog pa med/_/ces bgyi ba lhas ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni g.yo can yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_bud med khyo gsum 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]brgyud pa dang /_/dge slong phyir ni 'ongs pa dang /_/bya ni rgya las shor dang gsum/_/g.yo can nang na de g.yo ngan/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_sdom ni/_rnyed par dka' dang gzhan dang gcig_/bsags dang de bzhin mi mthun dang /_/brdungs 
[\[20a.2\]]dang med pa nyid dang ni/_/mi 'tsham pa ni don med do/_/gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma rnyed dka' ba bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_ri bong rwa can rnyed par dka'/_/ru sbal spu can rnyed par dka'/_/smad 'tshong gcig pu 'dug pa dang /_/gzu bo drang por smra rnyed 
[\[20a.3\]]dka'/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis gzhan gyi ched du ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_gtams pa len dang gnya' bo dang /_/g.yon can gyi ni che bzhi dang /_/smyan byed blo zhan bzhi po dag_/gzhan 
[\[20a.4\]]gyi don du ma rung 'gyur/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga gcig pur byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_skye ba na yang 'di gcig skye bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin 'chi ba na yang 'di 
[\[20a.5\]]gcig 'chi/_/skye bo gcig pus 'di na sdug bsngal myong /_/'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba tshogs bsags pa bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_nya sgong a mra'i 
[\[20a.6\]]me tog dang /_/sdug bsngal gyur pa'i don gnyer ba/_/dper na ston ka'i sprin bzhin du/_/bsags pa rnams kyang don med 'gyur/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni mi 
[\[20a.7\]]mthun pa yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_nyi ma grib mar mi mthun zhing /_/snang ba dang ni mun pa dang /_/nyin par mtshan mor mi mthun te/_/chos dang chos min rtag mi mthun/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni brdung rgyu'o/_/des smras pa/_lha/_gos rnams brdungs na 'jam po dag tu 'gyur/_/bong bu brdungs na de dag mgyogs par 'gyur/_/bud med rnams ni brdungs na dbang du 'gyur/_/rnga dag ma brdungs sgra 'byin mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod 
[\[20b.2\]]kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni med par bya ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rlung gis sbun pa med par byed/_/skye bo'i sgra yis glu de bzhin/_/skyes bu ngan pa bsten pa dang /_/mi mdzes yon 
[\[20b.3\]]tan med par byed/_/ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rgyal po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_/sman pa gsung dang dge sbyong 'khrug_/
[\[20b.4\]]blo dang ldan pa kun rmongs pa/_/bzhi ni 'tsham pa ma yin no/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis don med par ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_nyin par mar me bus pa don med do/_/rgya mtshor 
[\[20b.5\]]char pa bab pa don med do/_/'grangs la ston mo byin pa don med do/_/skyes bu ngan pa bsten pa don med do/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_sdom ni/_slu dang blta dang ma legs dang /_/bskrad dang 'jigs dang mi dga' gtang /_/sred dang ma bsams 
[\[20b.6\]]mya ngan gtogs/_/de ni tshogs su yang dag bsgrags/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni slu ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_slu ba bzhi mchis par khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_bzhi gang yin/_lha/_mi 
[\[20b.7\]]'dod pa la 'doms pa dang /_/gnyid kyis dub la 'chad pa dang /_/don du gnyer min don gnyer dang /_/stobs dang ldan rnams 'gyed pa'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni blta bar bya ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]lha/_g.yul ngor dpa' bo blta bya ste/_/mi bzad dug la gsang sngags blta/_/bza' btung tshe na nye du ste/_/don rtogs bya la mkhas pa blta/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod 
[\[21a.2\]]kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas ma legs pa byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_khyim pa le lo ma legs chags ma legs/_/rab byung yang dag sdom pa min ma legs/_/rgyal po gzu lums spyod pa'ang ma legs te/_/mkhas gang 'khrug byed de 
[\[21a.3\]]yang ma legs so/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni bskrad par bya ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_mi mkhas shing rta gcog pa dang /_/khal chen 'gel 
[\[21a.4\]]bas glang gsod dang /_/ha cang bzhos pas be'u gsod dang /_/nye du'i khyim 'dug chung ma bskrad/_/ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod mthong na nga 'jigs so/_/
[\[21a.5\]]des smras pa/_lha/_'ur pa dang ni chu skyar dang /_/gsum pa phyag dar srin bu dang /_/bzhi pa lham bu chu gsher ni/_/'jigs bya min la 'jigs par byed/_/ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba med pas 
[\[21a.6\]]mi dga'o/_/des smras pa/_lha/_spre'u ni grong na mi dga' ste/_/chu srin byis pa gsod ri la/_/chom rkun dge sbyong khyim du ste/_/byi po rang gi khyim mi dga'/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis 
[\[21a.7\]]ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni gtang bar bya ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rigs kyi phyir ni gcig gtang ste/_/grong gi phyir ni rigs gtang ngo /_/yul gyi phyir ni grong gtang ste/_/bdag gi phyir ni yul gtang ngo /_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga'i sred pa 'chad du mi btub po/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rtsa med gzhan gyi bud med dang /_/lag pa gcig gis chu 'thung dang /_/gzhan gyis chang blud gang yin pa/_/
[\[21b.2\]]de dag sred pa 'chad pa med/_/ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis ma bsams pa kho nar ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rgyal po rgyal po'i mdzod ni ma bsams par/_/lam du zhugs la chom 
[\[21b.3\]]por ma bsams par/_/khyim na bud med thab mo ma bsams par/_/rab tu byung ba'i rnyed pa ma bsams par/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas mya ngan bya ba yin no/_/des 
[\[21b.4\]]smras pa/_lha/_chags can rgas pa'ang mya ngan bya ba ste/_/mi bzang por mo'ang mya ngan bya ba yin/_/smad 'tshong rgas pa'ang mya ngan bya ba ste/_/rab byung gtum po'ang mya ngan bya ba yin/_/sdom ni/_blta bas mi ngoms yid 'thad dang /_/brtse bar mi bya nor dang ni/_/smra bar 
[\[21b.5\]]mi bya rab sdang dang /_/mgon med bshes dang yid brtan pa'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis nga'i ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba blta bas mi ngoms pa bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_glang po'i gtso dang rgyal po dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab dang /_/sangs rgyas smra ba 
[\[21b.6\]]rnams kyi mchog_/blta ba yis ni mi ngoms yin/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba nga'i yid dang 'thad pa bsad do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_gzugs bzang mo dang rigs ldan dang /_/des dang 
[\[21b.7\]]rigs ni 'phel byed pa/_/dar la bab dang bud med lnga/_/rgyal chen yid dang 'thad pa yin/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod dang lhan cig rtse bar mi bya ba yin no/_/des 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]smras pa/_lha/_byis pa sbrul dang sbal ba dang /_/gang gi ma ni g.yem pa dang /_/mi gang mdza' ni mi rtag dang /_/lhan cig rtse bar mi bya'o/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi 
[\[22a.2\]]ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod kyis nor 'phrog pa byas so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_rol mo mkhan dang dmag mi dang /_/sman pa chom rkun btson rdzi ste/_/de dag nyam thag gyur pa la'ang /_/nor ni 'phrog par byed pa yin/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras 
[\[22a.3\]]pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni smra bar bya ba ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_ha cang phyug dang ha cang dbul/_/dma' dang ha cang mtho gang dang /_/ha cang ring dang ha cang nye/_/de drug smra bar bya ba min/_/zhes bgyi
