[\[22a.4\]]ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni sems rab tu sdang ba yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_sbyin pa mi snang mi mthun byed pa dang /_/mthun par mi byed nyes spyod sgrogs pa dang /_/
[\[22a.5\]]sbyin pa byin nas rim gyis ldog byed pa/_/de dag rab tu sdang ba'i rtags yin no/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga mgon med par gyur to/_/des smras pa/_lha/_
[\[22a.6\]]gnas brtan rgyal po rgan po dang /_/tshul med bka' blo mi bde dang /_/bla ma la ni gnod byed gang /_/de drug mgon ni med par bshad/_/ces bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa khyod kyis gang gi phyir ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad 
[\[22a.7\]]pas khyod dang lhan cig bshes par bya ba ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_bzhad gad mkhan dang gar mkhan dang /_/pho nya smad 'tshong chang dad can/_/ma ning de bzhin gzhung ngan pa/_/de dag dang ni bshes mi bya/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni yid brtan par bya ba ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_ske tsam nub pa'i chu dang rta dang ni/_/glang po che dang spre'u dang sbrul nag dang /_/spu 'greng ba dang gdong gnyer gang ba dang /_/kha spu nyung 
[\[22b.2\]]la yid ni brtan mi bya/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_sdom ni/_gnyid med 'dod pa ma yin dang /_/kun nas mnar sems dngos po dang /_/de bzhin snying rje khwa dang ni/_/zlog thabs tha ma stobs yin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir 
[\[22b.3\]]khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga gnyid med do/_/des smras pa/_lha/_g.yem dang skem nad can dang ni/_/cham pas thebs dang sdug bsngal dang /_/don sems khros dang brtson pa dang /_/'jigs pa de ni rnam kun tu/_/gnyid mi 'ong ste 'jig rten na/_/
[\[22b.4\]]brgyad ni rang bzhin sdug bsngal lo/_/zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga 'dod pa ma yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_'dod pa ma yin pa'i dngos po brgyad ces bgyi 
[\[22b.5\]]ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_gsos pa brgyad gang yin/_/na dang rga dang 'chi ba dang /_/sdug bral mi sdug phrad pa dang /_/ser ba thog tog mi rtag nyid/_/brgyad ni 'jig rten 'dod min rab/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang 
[\[22b.6\]]skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas nga khyod la kun nas mnar sems skyes so/_/des smras pa/_lha/_kun nas mnar sems dgu 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_gsos pa dgu gang yin/_lha 'di ni bdag la gnod par 'dod pa phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa bde 
[\[22b.7\]]ba ma yin par 'dod pa reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/_'dis bdag la 'dod pa byas so byed do byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas bdag gi 'di 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/_de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do/_/'di ni gang zhig bdag la gnod par 'dod pa phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/_rig 
[\[23a.2\]]pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/_de la gnod par 'dod pa/_phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/_reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa ste/_'dis de la gnod pa 
[\[23a.3\]]byas so byed do byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhan las bdag gi 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas bdag gis 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di 'grub par ga la 'gyur snyam nas/_de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar 
[\[23a.4\]]byed do/_/'di ni gang zhig bdag la gnod par 'dod pa/_phan pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/_reg pa ma yin par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde ba ma yin par 'dod pa/_de la don du 'dod pa/_phan par 'dod pa/_bde bar 'dod pa/_reg 
[\[23a.5\]]par 'dod pa/_grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa ste/_'dis de la phan par byas so byed do byed par 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_gzhan las bdag gis 'di ltar gyur na mi rung bas bdag gis 'di kho na ltar 'gyur bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di grub par 
[\[23a.6\]]ga la 'gyur snyam nas/_de de la kun nas mnar sems skyes pa sel bar byed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni snying rje med pa yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_khyod kyis snying rje med pa bcu po shan pa dang /_
[\[23a.7\]]bya gag 'tshong pa dang /_phag 'tshong pa dang /_nya pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rngon pa dang /_bya ba dang /_ri bong rgyas 'chor ba dang /_chom rkun pa dang /_gshed ma pa dang /_ba lang gsod pa lags par ma gsan tam/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni khwa lta bu yin no/_/des smras pa/_lha/_yan lag bcu dang ldan na khwa lta bu lags so zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_gsos pa bcu gang yin/_lha/_gcor ba dang /_mu cor smra ba dang /_thub chod byed pa dang /_'khu ba dang /_
[\[23b.2\]]byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_snying rje med pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_bsogs pa dang /_dgang dka' ba dang /_'chal pa lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa gang gi phyir khyod kyis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad pas khyod ni zlog thabs can yin no/_/des 
[\[23b.3\]]smras pa/_lha/_zlog thabs can bcu zhes bgyi ba khyod kyis ma gsan tam/_gsos pa bcu gang yin/_lha/_nyi ma zlog thabs can dang /_zla ba zlog thabs can dang /_me zlog thabs can dang /_chu zlog thabs can dang /_gzhon nu ma zlog thabs can dang /_bud med 
[\[23b.4\]]zlog thabs can dang /_bram ze zlog thabs can dang /_gcer bu pa zlog thabs can dang /_dge slong zlog thabs can dang /_slad sa zlog thabs can lags so/_/de la nyi ma zlog thabs can ni nyi ma ni dgun glo nas mchi na dro bar yang mi 'gyur la/_so ga thag ring po nas 
[\[23b.5\]]mchi na 'on kyang dro bar 'gyur te/_'di ni nyi ma zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/zla ba zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_zla ba ni gang gi tshe shas chung ba de'i tshe skye bo thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'gyur la/_gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe su 
[\[23b.6\]]yang phyag mi 'tshal te/_'di ni zla ba zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/me zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_me ni tshig pa me nyid du sreg ste/_'di ni me zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/chu zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_chu ni dgun rdzing na bsil na 'on kyang btung du mi rung 
[\[23b.7\]]gi/_khron pa na dro na 'on kyang btung du rung la/_so gar rdzing na dro na 'on kyang btung du rung la/_khron pa na bsil na 'on kyang btung du mi rung ste/_'di ni chu zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/gzhon nu ma zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_gzhon nu ma ni gang gi tshe ma byin pa 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]de'i tshe gyos po'i khyim la dga' la/_gang gi tshe gyos po'i khyim du khyer ba de'i tshe khyim la khong du yang dga' la ngu bar byed de/_'di ni gzhon nu ma zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/bud med zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_bud med ni gang gi tshe gzhon zhing blta 
[\[24a.2\]]na yid du 'ong ba de'i tshe lus bkab ste 'gro la/_gang gi tshe rgas shing yid du mi 'ong ba de'i tshe phye nas 'gro ste/_'di ni bud med zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/bram ze zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_bram ze ni gang gi tshe byis pa ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ma skyes pa de'i tshe 
[\[24a.3\]]tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa la gang gi tshe dar la bab ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags skyes pa de'i tshe 'dod pa dag sten par byed de/_'di ni bram ze zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/gcer bu pa zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_gcer bu pa ni gang gi tshe khyim na 'dug pa de'i tshe gos gyon 
[\[24a.4\]]zhing 'dug la gang gi tshe spyod yul du 'gro ba de'i tshe ni gcer bur 'gro ste/_'di ni gcer bu pa zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/dge slong zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_dge slong ni gang gi tshe gzhon nu lang tsho la bab cing zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang myangs pa 
[\[24a.5\]]rnams 'ju bar nus pa de'i tshe de dag mi rnyed la/_gang gi tshe rgas te zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams 'ju bar mi nus pa de'i tshe de dag rnyed de/_'di ni dge slong zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o/_/slad sa zlog thabs can gang zhe na/_slad sa 
[\[24a.6\]]ni gang gi tshe gsher ba de'i tshe chu'i steng na 'phyo la/_gang gi tshe skams pa de'i tshe 'bying ste/_'di ni slad sa zlog thabs can zhes bgyi'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu pa/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gsos pa thams cad go ste chog 
[\[24a.7\]]go/_/'di dris drang por smros shig_/khyod kyis stobs gang gis ba lang skyong gi ma zhi ba bsad des smras pa/_lha bdag la gang gis na ba lang skyong gi ma khums pa'i stobs ga la mchis/_lha 'on kyang 'phags pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po 'di gang gi nyan thos lags pa de ni de 
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa lags te/_de bzhin 
[\[24b.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur ba de la gang dag dang ldan na de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi 
[\[24b.3\]]nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad pa stobs bcu mnga'o/_/bcu gang lags zhe na/_lha de ni gnas la yang gnas su/_gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/lha 'di ni de'i stobs dang po 
[\[24b.4\]]lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des sems can rnams kyi las dang chos yang 
[\[24b.5\]]dag par blangs pa 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams la gnas dang /_gzhi dang /_rgyu dang /_rnam par smin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/des sems can rnams kyi las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa 'das pa 
[\[24b.6\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba rnams gnas dang /_gzhi dang /_rgyu dang /_rnam par smin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs gnyis pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas 
[\[24b.7\]]rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha/_gzhan yang des bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /_rnam par dag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/des bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi kun 
[\[25a.2\]]nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /_rnam par dag pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs gsum pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing 
[\[25a.3\]]tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab 
[\[25a.4\]]tu mkhyen to/_/des sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni de'i stobs bzhi pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi 
[\[25a.5\]]gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyis mos pa sna tshogs nyid yang dag pa 
[\[25a.6\]]ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/des sems can gzhan rnams dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs lnga pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs 
[\[25a.7\]]po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des 'jig rten khams sna tshogs pa dang /_khams du ma pa'o zhes bgyi bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/_/
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]des 'jig rten khams sna tshogs pa dang /_khams du ma pa'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs drug pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 
[\[25b.2\]]bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des kun du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/_/des kun du 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i 
[\[25b.3\]]stobs bdun pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs 
[\[25b.4\]]te/_'di lta ste/_tshe gcig kyang dgongs/_tshe gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun dang /_brgyad dang /_dgu dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum bcu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu dang /_tshe brgya dang /_tshe stong dang /_tshe brgya stong dang /_
[\[25b.5\]]tshe brgya phrag du ma dang /_tshe stong phrag du ma dang /_tshe brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /_'jig 
[\[25b.6\]]pa dang 'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma yang rjes su dgongs te/_gang du bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bya/_rigs ni 'di lta bu/_rus ni 'di lta bu/_kha zas ni 'di lta bu za za/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig nyams su myong /_tshe ni 'di tsam thub/_yun ni 'di 
[\[25b.7\]]srid cig gnas gnas/_tshe'i mtha' ni 'di srid cig yin par gyur pa na sems can ni de dag byung ngo /_/bdag gnas de nas shi 'phos nas ni che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/_/de nas kyang shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rnam pa dang bcas/_yul 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]phyogs dang bcas par rjes su dgongs so/_/des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dgongs te/_'di lta ste/_tshe gcig kyang dgongs pa nas/_'dir skyes zhes bya ba'i bar sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rnam pa dang bcas/_yul phyogs dang 
[\[26a.2\]]bcas par rjes su dgongs pa gang lags pa 'di ni lha de'i stobs brgyad pa lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par 
[\[26a.3\]]mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang des lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba dang /_kha dog bzang po dang /_kha dog ngan pa dang /_dman pa dang /_gya nom pa rnams kyang gzigs la sems can las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'gro 
[\[26a.4\]]ba bde 'gro dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_ngag dang /_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/_log par 
[\[26a.5\]]lta ba can yin te log par lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod pa 
[\[26a.6\]]dang ldan pa/_ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/_'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa/_yang dag pa'i lta ba can te/_yang dag pa'i lta ba'i las dang chos yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu dang rkyen des lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris su lha 
[\[26a.7\]]dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/lha'i spyan zhes bya ba nas/_bde 'gro mtho ris su lha dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/'di ni lha de'i stobs dgu pa lags te/_stobs de dang 
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/lha gzhan yang de zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos kho na la zag pa med pa'i 
[\[26b.2\]]sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te/_bdag gi zag pa zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa bstan to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes gsung 
[\[26b.3\]]ngo /_/de zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir mthong ba'i chos kho na la zag pa med pa'i sems rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba nas/_'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/lha 'di ni de'i stobs bcu pa 
[\[26b.4\]]lags te/_stobs de dang ldan pas de khyu mchog gi gnas rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad/_'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs par mdzad do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po rab snang spobs pa med nas 
[\[26b.5\]]cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/gsos pas bsams pa/_lha ni spobs pa med de cang mi zer bar 'dug na 'di dang ba [(]long [,]lang [)]skyong gi ma zhi ba ji srid mtho btsam snyam nas des de ngom zung gnag bzhin khrid nas rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_rgyal po la bzod 
[\[26b.6\]]pa gsol bar zhugs pa/_lha/_mi yi dbang pos 'dir rtag chos kyi tshul/_/bgrod cing rjes su bgrod pa yang dag gzigs/_/bzod pa rgyal po rnams kyi chos gtso lha/_/ba lang skyong gi ma yi nongs bzod mdzod/_/'jig rten blta bya legs gsungs rin po che/_/
[\[26b.7\]]ji ste gzigs par ma gyur gsan ma gyur/_/khyod kyis glang po che yang gdul bar spyod lags na/_/cung zad nongs bgyid bud med smos ci 'tshal/_/khyod las mi 'phyo gzugs dang yon tan ldan/_/sngon dang phyis kyang de bzhin btsun mo lags/_/rje slad kho nar 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]lha gcig ba lang ma'i/_/thams cad bzod pa mdzod ces de skad mchi'o/_/rgyal pos kyang gsos pa la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/_rab smras legs par smras 'di khyod kyis ni/_/nga la snying nye bskyed de smras pa yin/_/de ltas khyod la ka n+yA 
[\[27a.2\]]kub dza sbyin/_/nga yis zhi ba la yang snying nas bzod/_/gsos pa'i lan rdzogs sto//_//sdom ni/_drag shul can gyis gser snod dang /_/'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma dang dgon pa pa/_/'tsho byed dang ni 'bras sman dang /_/'khor ni mang po sun byed pa'o/_/
[\[27a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can gyi spre'u rdzing gi 'gram na khang pa brtsegs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po dpong sa na 'dus shing 'khod pa dag bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/_shes ldan dag 
[\[27a.4\]]dge sbyong gau ta ma dang de'i nyan thos rnams kyang 'dod chen che ba'o/_/mu stegs can dag ni de lta ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag drag shul can 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul gyis yangs pa can gyi bram ze 
[\[27a.5\]]dang khyim bdag mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag re zhig sdod cig dang /_ngas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chen che'am/_'dod chen chung ba dang /_de'i nyan thos 'dod chen che'am/_'dod chen chung ba dag khyed kyis mngon sum du bya'o 
[\[27a.6\]]zhes byas nas/_de gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel gyi snod dag bsdogs nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon sum du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu ba'i 
[\[27a.7\]]gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par len du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung bar 
[\[27b.2\]]bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs 
[\[27b.3\]]cig tu bdag gi sdum par sang gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gnang bar rig nas/_
[\[27b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas stan las langs te song ngo /_/des mu stegs can rnams la yang shes ldan dag sang bdag gi khyim du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la 
[\[27b.5\]]spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang de nyid du zan la shog shig ces mgron du bos so/_/yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la yang shes ldan dag bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /_mu stegs can rnams sang 
[\[27b.6\]]bdag gis khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis khyed kyang de'i tshe grogs byed du shog shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas rang gi khyim du song ste zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag zhal zas gtsang zhing bsod pa mang po dag sta gon gyis shig_/de dag gis zhal 
[\[27b.7\]]zas gtsang zhing bsod pa mang po dag sta gon byas so/_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa gdugs tshod sbyar lags te/_da de'i dus la bab na bcom ldan 'das 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes gdugs tshod gdas par gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te/_khyim bdag drag shul can gyi bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs 
[\[28a.2\]]te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can yul yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang lhan cig tu gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel gyi snod rnams sangs rgyas 
[\[28a.3\]]la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 'brim par zhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la khyim bdag drag shul can ni brtag pa'i bsam pas gser dang /_dngul dang /_
[\[28a.4\]]bai DUr+ya dang /_shel gyi snod rnams 'brim gyis dge slong khyed cag su yang ma len cig bar sgo shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[28a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag drag shul can bgam pa'i bsam pas/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel gyi snod rnams 'brim gyis dge slong khyed cag su yang ma len cig ces bka' stsal to/_/zhes bsgo ba dang /_btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom 
[\[28a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du mi blang bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas de dag gis ma blangs so/_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zangs las byas pa dang /_khar ba las byas pa'i snod rnams brims te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[28a.7\]]rnams bde bar bzhugs par rig nas rang gis lag dar te bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas yang dag par tshim par byed/_yang dag par stobs par byed do/_/rnam grangs du mar rang gis lag dar te bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas yang dag par 
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]tshim par byas/_yang dag par bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol te phyag bcabs lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig bting nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag 
[\[28b.2\]]drag shul can la chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/rnam grangs du mar chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis 
[\[28b.3\]]yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas yon bsngo ba brjod nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas mu stegs can ma dul ba'i cha byad 
[\[28b.4\]]can dag bab bab tu ca co zer zhing 'dug pa dang /_khyim bdag drag shul can gyis sgo ba'i mi la/_kye nang rje gal te mu stegs can 'ga' zhig gser las byas pa dang /_dngul las byas pa dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang /_shel las byas pa'i snod rnams khyer te sgor 
[\[28b.5\]]'gro na ma sbyin cig_/ji ste nged la khyim bdag gis byin no zhes zer dang /_kye khyed la khyim bdag gis zan gyi phyir yin gyi gtan ni ma byin no zhes byos shig_/de ste yang mi ster na rgyob la phrogs shig ces bsgo ba dang /_khyim bdag de ltar 'tshal lo zhes mi des khyim 
[\[28b.6\]]bdag drag shul can gyi ltar mnyan no/_/de nas khyim bdag drag shul can gyis mu stegs can rnams la gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i snod rnams brim par brtsams pa dang /_sgra mthon po dang /_sgra mang po bton nas la la na re khyim bdag 
[\[28b.7\]]bdag la gser las byas pa byin cig ces zer/_la la ni bdag la dngul las byas pa byin cig ces zer zhing de ltar de dag ku co 'don pa de'i tshe 'thab mo byung nas phan tshun du khu tshur dang /_thal lcag dang /_dbyug pa dang /_ltag dbyug dang /_rdog pas brdeg par 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]brtsams pa dang /_de dag khyim bdag drag shul can gyis bsdigs pa dang /_gzhom pa dang /_dbye ba'i sbyor bas nan gyi zan zar bcug go/_/gang gis snod gang du zan zos pa des de nyid khyer te 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_sgo bas gzung bar brtsams 
[\[29a.2\]]so/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_kye nang rje khyim bdag gis nged la byin na ci'i phyir bzung /_des smras pa/_khyim bdag gis khyed cag zan gyi phyir byin gyi gtan ni ma byin no zhog la deng shig_/de dag gis ma bzhag pa dang /_sgo bas de dag brdegs nas ku co rab tu che 
[\[29a.3\]]bar gyur pa dang /_yangs pa can na gnas pa'i skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo zhes bya ba skye bo'i tshogs chen po thams cad 'dus par gyur to/_/khyim bdag drag shul can gyis mi sdug pa de dag mthong nas yangs pa can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[29a.4\]]rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan dag khyed kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang de dag gi khyad par mthong ngam/_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag mthong ngo /_/des smras pa/_shes ldan dag de ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyang 
[\[29a.5\]]bzhed chen chung la/_de'i nyan thos dag kyang 'dod chen chung gis mu stegs can nyes par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba can 'di dag ni de lta ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la mngon par ma dad pa mang po ni mngon par dad par gyur to/_/
[\[29a.6\]]bar ma rnams las kyang kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas zhabs bkrus te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 
[\[29a.7\]]'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na/_tshod rig pa la phan yon de dang gzhan dag kyang yod pas de'i phyir dge slong gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel las byas pa la sogs pa rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]ste/_za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel la sogs te rin po che'i snod du bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong skyon dang bral ba gzhan dag ci yod pa de 
[\[29b.2\]]dag gi dbang gis so so'i skye bo dag lha'i gnas dang /_klu'i gnas su song ba las der de dag zan la bos pa dang /_de dag gi khyim na rang gi bsod nams las grub pa'i gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel gyi snod yod kyi gzhan med pas de dag der 
[\[29b.3\]]'gyod de zan ma zos so/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na gang du snod gzhan rnyed pa med pa der ni gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel la 
[\[29b.4\]]sogs pa'i snod du za bar gnang gis 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che 
[\[29b.5\]]ba/_yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/_rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/
[\[29b.6\]]de dang rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma de la sems can zhugs par gyur to/_/gang gi nyin mo de sems can zhugs par gyur pa de nyid kyi nyin mo nas mdangs bzang bar gyur to/_/de zla ba brgyad 
[\[29b.7\]]dam dgu 'das nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur nas mnyan yod kun du khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi bu mo 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa'i tshe de'i khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to zhes sgra de grags pa dang /_srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po ngo mtshar du gyur nas khyim 
[\[30a.2\]]bdag de'i khyim du 'dus so/_/re zhig na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de yang ngo mtshar gyi phyir de nyid du 'dus te des de la phan tshun du bltas nas skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/_shes ldan dag khyed kyis bu mo 'di mthong ngam/_de dag gis smras pa mthong ngo /_/shes ldan 
[\[30a.3\]]dag bu mo 'di ni ci nas kyang skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis smras pa/_bram ze 'di'i gzugs 'di ltar mdzes pa dang sbyar na 'di ni gdon mi za bar skyes pa lnga brgya dang dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro/_/mnyan yod thams 
[\[30a.4\]]cad du yang khyim bdag cig gi bu mo gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de btsas pa'i tshe de'i khyim de nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur to/_/de la mtshan mkhan gyis bu mo 'di ni skyes 
[\[30a.5\]]pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par lung bstan to zhes sgra grags nas gang gis sgra thos pa de yang der 'ong bar gyur to/_/zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya chen po byas nas ming 'dogs par byed de/_bu mo 'di'i ming ji skad du 
[\[30a.6\]]gdags/_nye du dag gis smras pa/_bu mo 'di btsas pa'i tshe khyim nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du snang bar gyur pas/_de'i phyir bu mo'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes gdags so zhes de'i ming 'od bzang ma zhes bya bar btags so/_/'od bzang ma ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis 
[\[30a.7\]]dang /_nu zho ldud pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /_dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /_rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la gtad de/_de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar dang /_mar kar dang /_mar gyi snying gu dang /_gzhan yang yo byad kyi khyad par gtso bo gtso bo 
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]dag gis bskyed bsrings te rdzing gi pad+ma bzhin du skye drag par gyur to/_/de gang gi tshe chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe gzugs dang /_lang tsho mdzes pa dang /_g.yer ba dang /_sgyu rtsal gyi yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pas nags tshal me tog rgyas pa'i nang na nags tshal gyi lha 
[\[30b.2\]]bzhin du khyim de na mdzes so/_/de'i gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_kha dog dang /_rgyu ba dang /_gnas pa'i khyad par gyis 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba'i drang srong dag kyang sems 'phrog par byed na thog ma med pa'i dus nas nyon mongs pa kun 
[\[30b.3\]]du spyod pa bsags pa rigs dang /_gzugs dang /_lang tsho dang /_dbang phyug gi dregs pas rgyags pa'i mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/_khyim bdag de yang nang mi'i skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te de srung ba lhur len cing gnyid kyang mi log go/_/yul ko sa 
[\[30b.4\]]la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang 'dab chags na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang /_blon po'i bu dang /_mdun na 'don gyi bu la sogs pas bslang bar bsams kyang 
[\[30b.5\]]bu mo 'od bzang ma skyes bu lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mtshan mkhan gyis lung bstan pas na 'jig rten gyi dpyas su dogs pa'i phyir sus kyang ma bslangs so/_/de yang de'i khyim gyi skar khung dra ba can dang /_skar khung dang /_stegs bu dang /_khang thog 
[\[30b.6\]]tu 'dug nas su slong snyam zhing skyes pa dag la lta bar byed do/_/khyim bdag des de'i spyod pa mthong nas rang gi rigs rgyud dang mthun pa gzhan dag la mi slong yang de bzhin du sbyin par brtsams na 'ga' yang len du ma btub po/_/de nas khyim bdag de de su yang ma 'dod pas 
[\[30b.7\]]yid mi bde ba skyes te bya ba thams cad kyi blo btang nas de sbyin pa'i thabs sems pas lus skya bo bseng bseng po sha bri ngan pa rke ba shig shig po zhig tu gyur to/_/de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des rigs 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]mnyam pa las chung ma blangs kyang de rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur to/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar blangs kyang de yang rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur to/_/de dag gis kyang tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas la des 
[\[31a.2\]]kyang dpya bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pas de'i ming chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes bya bar chags so/_/des gzhan du bslangs pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_nged kyi bu mo ci ste gsad ces zer ro/_/des yugs sa mo dag kyang bslang bar brtsams pa dang /_
[\[31a.3\]]de dag kyang nged kyi lus ci'i phyir dor zhes zer nas de la thams cad kyis kyang ma ster ba dang /_chung ma med kyang bla zhes chung ma 'dod pa'i re thag bcad nas dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu rnams dang lhan cig bsten par brtsams so/_/de'i pha 
[\[31a.4\]]sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen zhig pas des bsams pa/_bdag gi pha sangs rgyas pa'i dge bsnyen yin na/_bdag la dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa dang /_kun du rgyu ba rnams kyis ci zhig bya/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos pa rnams la bsnyen 
[\[31a.5\]]bkur bya zhing de dag la bya ba byas nas de nyid du rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas de yang dang yang du rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro bar gyur to/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mdza' bo zhig gis mthong nas/_des smras pa/_grogs po khyod rgyal byed kyi tshal du yang dang yang du 'gro na rab 
[\[31a.6\]]tu 'byung bar mi rtsol grang /_grogs po bdag rab tu byung zin na yang rab tu 'byung ci dgos/_bdag gis chung ma gcig blangs kyang rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur/_de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar yang rang gi las kyis shi bar gyur te/_de dag 
[\[31a.7\]]gis kyang tshe thung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas/_kho bos kyang dpya bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pas kho bo'i ming chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes bya bar chags nas bdag yi chad do dge slong dag la nges par bsnyen bkur bya ba ni bdag gi pha'i lugs yin te 'di mi bya na gzhan 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]su la bsnyen bkur bya/_des smras pa/_grogs po de yang bden na 'on kyang gdon mi za bar bu bskyed dgos te gzhan du na rabs 'chad par 'gyur na ci ste gzhan gyi bu mo slong bar mi byed/_des smras pa/_grogs po ci phan gang la bslangs pa de [(]ngad [,]nged [)]kyi bu mo ci ste gsad 
[\[31b.2\]]ces zer ro/_/des smras pa/_grogs po gal te de lta na yugs sa mo dag bslang na ci nyes/_des smras pa/_grogs po bdag gis bslang na de dag kyang nga'i lus ci'i phyir yongs su dor zhes zer ro/_/des smras pa/_grogs po gal te de lta na 'od bzang ma ci'i phyir mi 
[\[31b.3\]]bslang /_des smras pa/_grogs po 'jig rten kun du grags pa des ji smad 'tshong ma'i khyim du bya'am/_des smras pa/_grogs po khyod dad pa can yin pas khyod kyis khyim du dge slong las su zhig 'ong slongs shig_/des smras pa/_grogs po gal te de yang mi ster 
[\[31b.4\]]mod/_grogs po slongs shig dang /_de'i pha yang skyo zhing 'dug pas ster bar 'gyur ro/_/de khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste des smras pa/_bde legs su gyur cig_/bde legs su gyur cig_/khyim bdag des smras pa/_ci zhig 'dod/_'od bzang ma'o/_/
[\[31b.5\]]sbyin no/_/des de dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te lde mig dang /_lde mig kyog po dag byin nas khyim gyi bdag mor bcug ste smras pa/_bzang mo kho bo cag gi rigs kyi lugs kyis ni ston pa sangs rgyas dang /_dge slong dag sbyin gnas yin pas khyod kyis 
[\[31b.6\]]kyang de dag la bya ba byos shig_/des smras pa/_jo bo legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/khyim bdag de'i khyim du dge slong dag nyin gcig bzhin du zan za ba la 'od bzang ma rang gis lag dar te 'brim mo/_/de na dge slong gang dag kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_lang 
[\[31b.7\]]tsho'i khyad par phun sum tshogs pa de dag des mthong nas rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur to/_/de de dag la rtog pa 'phel bas yid bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/khyim bdag de yang ri 'or zhig tu don zhig yod nas des bzang mo kho bo ni ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu don cig yod de/_
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]bdag der 'gros khyod kyis yon gnas dag de bzhin du bshos gsol cig ces bsgo ba dang /_des smras pa/_rje'i sras legs kyis de bzhin du bgyis bzhud cig_/des dge slong rnams la yang 'phags pa bdag ni ri 'or che ge mo zhig tu bgyi ba 
[\[32a.2\]]zhig byung nas bdag der mchi'i khyed cag de bzhin du bdag gi sdum par bshos gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag song zhig nad med par gyur cig_/zan bza' bar bya'o zhes byas pa dang /_de yang ri 'or gyi grong du song ngo /_/dge slong dag 
[\[32a.3\]]kyang de bzhin du de'i khyim du zan bza' bar brtsams pa dang /_'od bzang ma bdag gi khyo med do snyam nas/_bud med kyi g.yo dang /_bud med kyi sgyu dang /_bud med kyi tshul 'chos pa gang dag yin pa de dag dge slong rnams la ston par rtsom pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[32a.4\]]gcig la gcig nyes dmigs byung na/_'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya zhes bgros pa dang /_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_'di la bsgrub tu ci yod/_sang nas mi 'ong du zad mod/_gzhan dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bdag cag ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas 
[\[32a.5\]]sang nas bsod snyoms la 'dong du zad mod/_gzhan dag gis kye legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag phyi de nyin nas bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de slar 'ongs nas 'od bzang ma la dris pa/_'od bzang ma 
[\[32a.6\]]yon gnas dag bshos gsol tam/_des smras pa/_nyin gcig byon nas de phan chad ye ma byon to/_/des bsams pa/_nges par 'dis de dag gi mdun du bud med kyi g.yo dag bstan te bkur sti ma byas pas 'dzem nas de dag ma 'ongs so snyam ste/_des de dag 
[\[32a.7\]]gi drung du song nas yang spyan drangs pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_khyim bdag bdag cag ni bsod snyoms pa yin pas bsod snyoms la rgyu'o/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag gis 'tshal gyis gshegs dang de lta bu'i nyes dmigs mi mchi'o/_/de dag gis khas 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]blangs pa dang /_de dag gi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas song ngo /_/dge slong dag phyi de nyin de'i khyim du 'ongs pa dang /_khyim bdag des 'od bzang ma khyim du bcug nas phyi sgo bcad de bzhag nas de nas de dag la rang gis lag dar te 'brim bar brtsams pa na 'od bzang ma khyim 
[\[32b.2\]]gyi nang na 'dug bzhin du dge slong zan za ba de dag la rnam par rtog pa skyes par gyur te 'phags pa che ge mo zhig gi rkang pa ni 'di 'dra/_byin pa ni 'di 'dra/_brla ni 'di 'dra/_rked pa dang /_rtsib logs dang /_rgyab dang /_lto dang /_bzhin dang /_so dang /_mchu dang /_sna 
[\[32b.3\]]dang /_mig dang /_dpral ba dang /_mgo ni 'di 'dra'o zhes de de ltar rnam par rtog pa na sa bcu pa'i 'dod chags kyi me byung bar gyur pa rnam par rtog pa'i rlung gi shugs bdo ba des spar bas rtul te de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas so/_/dge slong dag zan zos te yon 
[\[32b.4\]]bshad pa byas nas dong ba dang /_khyim bdag des sgo phye nas smras pa/_'od bzang ma tshur shog zan zo zhes byas na de dus las 'das pas su zhig lan 'debs/_des nang du zhugs na ci tsam na sa la 'gyel ba mthong ngo /_/des bsams pa gdon mi za bar 'di 
[\[32b.5\]]gnyid kyis log gis bslang ngo snyam nas des de bsgul bar brtsams pa dang /_re zhig na dus las 'das par mthong nas de ngom zung gnag cing sma bab nas nang mi dag la smras pa/_shes ldan dag bdag lta byur ngan pa chung ma rin po che 'di lta bu dang bral bar gyur gyis 
[\[32b.6\]]mdza' grogs dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dag la 'od bzang ma dus las 'das so zhes sbron cig ces byas pa dang /_de dag gis ku cho bton te/_kha cig ni sa la sgyel nas ngu zhing 'dug_/kha cig ni khyim bdag ngu ba'i lag pa dang /_rkang pa nas 'dzin par byed/_mdza' 
[\[32b.7\]]bshes dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen kha cig ni ngud mo'i sgra 'byin par byed do/_/khyim bdag de rang gi skye bo dang bshes kyi 'khor rgya che ba zhig pas de rnams ji srid du ngu ba de'i bar du nyi ma nub nas de dag gos sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag gis khyogs 
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]brgyan te/_bkur sti chen pos de dur khrod du khyer ro/_/re zhig cig na mi rgod lnga brgya tsam zhig ri 'or zhig tu song nas rnyed pa dang khe phyin nas dur khrod de dang ha cang mi ring bar 'ongs pa grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi zhig gis mthong nas des bsams pa/_skye bo'i 
[\[33a.2\]]tshogs chen po grong khyer nas byung ste 'od bzang ma skyel bar dur khrod du song ba rnams mi rgod de dag gis tshul ma yin par gnod pa byas na mi rung gis sbran to snyam nas de mgyogs par song ste/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la shes ldan dag mi rgod lnga brgya tsam ha cang mi ring ba zhig na 
[\[33a.3\]]'dug gis bros shig ces sbran pa dang /_de dag gis kyang sang rim gro bya'o zhes srung ma gzhag ste/_'od bzang ma ji ltar rgyan sna tshogs kyis bklubs pa dang /_dri dang /_bdug pa dang /_gos dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mdzes 
[\[33a.4\]]par byas te phyung nas bsnyal ba bzhin du bor te 'bros bslang nas grong khyer du zhugs so/_/ci tsam na mi rgod de dag phyogs der phyin pa dang /_srung ma rnams bros so/_/mi rgod rnams kyis rab tu brgyan pa de mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes so/_/de nas 'od bzang ma'i gos 
[\[33a.5\]]rnams bshus nas bltas pa dang /_de dag gis de'i gzugs gzhon la mdzes pa mthong nas rab tu chags te shes ldan dag gar bskor kyang bud med 'di lta bu dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par zad do zhes smras nas de dag gis de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad de kAr ShA pa Na lnga 
[\[33a.6\]]brgya bzhag pa dang /_'od bzang ma'i ro la yang skyes bu lnga brgyas kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin te dga' mgur spyod do zhes kun tu sgra grags so/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa khyim bdag gi mchis 
[\[33a.7\]]'brang 'od bzang mas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas 'od dang ldan par gyur cing btsas ma thag tu khyim thams cad 'od kyis snang bar bgyis pa dang /_gum nas kyang mi rgod lnga brgyas kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya stsal nas dga' mgur spyad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/_tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_dba' rgal bzhin du nye bar gnas pa nges par gyur pa yin te/_'od bzang mas las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 
[\[33b.2\]]'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_'on kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin 
[\[33b.3\]]pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang /_/las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/_/tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang 
[\[33b.4\]]po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 
[\[33b.5\]]byung ste/_bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na nye bar rten cing drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na rgyal po kr-i kI zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_
[\[33b.6\]]skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_'khrug glong rab tu zhi ba/_nad med pa/_sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos bzhin byed du 'jug go/_/ji tsam na 
[\[33b.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_rgyal po kr-i kI btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]'khor gyi mi dang bcas pas de'i sku gdung la bkur sti chen pos sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bzhi'i mchod rten kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig pa phang du dpag tshad phyed pa gcig brtsigs so/_/de na tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig dad 
[\[34a.2\]]pa skyes nas srog shing la me long cig btags so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la dad pa skyes nas srog shing la me long btags pa gang yin pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu mo de ni khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od 
[\[34a.3\]]bzang ma 'di nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten gyi srog shing la me long btags pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'od dang ldan bzhin du skyes la skyes ma thag tu yang khyim thams cad 'od kyis snang 
[\[34a.4\]]bar gyur pa yin no/_/gang yang shi nas skyes bu lnga brgyas kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin nas dga' mgur spyad pa de yang nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/_rgyal srid 'byor pa dang /_rgyas 
[\[34a.5\]]pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_thab mo dang /_rtsod pa dang /_nang 'khrug dang /_'khrug glong rab tu zhi ba/_chom rkun dang /_nad dang bral ba sA lu dang /_bu ram shing dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_chos kyi 
[\[34a.6\]]rgyal pos chos bzhin byed du 'jug go/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na bA rA Na sI na gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_skyes pa'i yid du 'ong ba/_sngon rgyal po tshangs byin gyi zhang pos yongs su spyad pa zhig 'dug go/_/
[\[34a.7\]]re zhig dus gzhan zhig na dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya bza' ba dang bca' ba mang po dag sbyar te skyed mos tshal du dong nas phan tshun shes ldan dag bdag cag gis skyed mos tshal gyi longs spyod thams cad ni bshams na bud med med kyis dong la smad 'tshong 'ga' zhig dgug go zhes 
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]smras pa dang /_legs kyis de bzhin du bya na su zhig dgug_/bzang mo'o/_/de dag bzang mo'i drung du song ste bzang mo tshur shog_/skyed mos tshal du 'dong ngo /_/des smras pa/_gal te kAr ShA pa Na stong byin na 'gro'i gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_kAr 
[\[34b.2\]]ShA pa Na lnga brgya je khyer cig_/lnga brgya ni dga' mgur spyad nas sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du byas byin cig_/de dag gis kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin nas/_des smras pa/_deng shig dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_gos dag bgos la 'ong ngo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag dong ngo /_/de 'gyod pa skyes 
[\[34b.3\]]nas gal te bdag dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad na bdag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur/_bdag gis kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya zhig kyang blangs na da ji ltar bya snyam pa las/_des bdag rgyal po'i zhang pos yongs su spyad pas de kho na la skyabs 'tshal gyi gzhan du ni ma yin 
[\[34b.4\]]no snyam pa'i blo skyes nas des de'i gan du bran mo mngag gzhug ma mngags te/_bu mo rgyal po'i zhang po'i drung du song la/_song nas 'di skad ces bdag ngan te dga' 'dun pa las kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya blangs na dga' 'dun pa de dag lnga brgya yod de/_ji ste bdag dga' 'dun pa lnga 
[\[34b.5\]]brgya dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad par gyur na bdag gi gnas skabs ci 'dra bar 'gyur/_khyod kyis sngon bdag yongs su bzung bas de'i slad du khyod kyis bdag de dag las yongs su bskyab pa'i rigs zhes smros shig_/bu mo des de'i drung du song ste smras pa dang /_de yang rgyal po 
[\[34b.6\]]la rten pa yin pas de dag las de phrogs so/_/sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /_phongs pa la thugs brtse ba/_bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas gcig pur gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/de nas rang sangs 
[\[34b.7\]]rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing bA rA Na sIr phyin te/_bdag nyid chen po zhi ba'i bdag nyid can rab tu dben par gnas pa de rab tu dben par gnas tshol zhing skyed mos tshal der phyin pa dang /_dga' 'dun pa de dag gis lus mdzes pa dang /_sems mdzes pa mthong nas de dag gis bsams 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa/_gar bskor kyang yon gnas kyi zhing 'di lta bu la bya ba bya dgos so snyam nas de dag gis gcig la gcig dris te/_de la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag gis lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag ni ngag gis chos mi 
[\[35a.2\]]ston gyi lus kyis chos ston pa yin pas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te 'bar ba dang /_gsal ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul bya bar brtsams pa dang /_so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis dad par 'gyur bas shing rtsa ba nas bcad 
[\[35a.3\]]pa bzhin du zhabs la gtugs nas gang bdag cag gis yang dag pa'i sbyin gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gzugs kyis 'tsho ba la tha na shi na yang kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin nas dga' mgur spyod par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/dge slong 
[\[35a.4\]]dag ji snyam du sems/_gzugs kyis 'tsho ba bzang mo zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma 'di nyid yin no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dga' 'dun pa lnga brgya po de dag ni mi rgod lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/_de'i tshe de'i dus na gang 'di dag gis rang sangs 
[\[35a.5\]]rgyas la bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam btab pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'di dag gis 'khor bar 'khor ba na tshe rabs lnga brgyar kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin zhing dga' mgur spyad de da ltar khyim bdag gi chung mar gyur pa las shi ba'i bar du yang kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya byin nas dga' 
[\[35a.6\]]mgur spyad pa yin no/_/de ltar na dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag pa yin/_gcig tu dkar ba rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma rnams yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag pa'i 
[\[35a.7\]]las rnams dang /_'dren ma rnams spangs te gcig tu dkar ba'i las kho na la brtsal bar bya ste/_dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro ba las 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong dag de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro bar mi bya bar mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyim bdag gi chung ma 'od bzang ma dge slong mthong nas rtog pa skyes te srog dang bral bar gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong dag dge 
[\[35b.2\]]slong gis gang 'di lta bu'i nyes dmigs 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong de lta bu'i khyim du 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/dge slong spong ba pa zhig yod pa yang dang yang dgon pa'i gnas su 
[\[35b.3\]]song nas bsam gtan byed do/_/der de la bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig gis tshul ma yin par spyad pa bsgugs pa las de ma btub pa dang /_des 'phags pa khyod ma btub dang gnod par bya'o/_/des smras pa/_sring mo nga ni dge slong tshul khrims can yin na khyod kyis nga la 
[\[35b.4\]]gnod pa byar ci yod/_des 'jal zhes byas nas de la glags tshol ba lhur len cing 'dug go/_/des dus gzhan zhig na snam sbyar pus khyud ltar mdud pa bor nas gnyid log par gyur pa dang /_lha mo des bsams pa/_'di la sha glan pa'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas 
[\[35b.5\]]des de blangs te/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na gnyid kyis log pa'i steng du bor ro/_/de sngangs nas gnyid sad de de mthong nas khyod su zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_dge sbyong ngo /_/dge sbyong gi nang na gang zhig_/shAkya'i bu'i dge 
[\[35b.6\]]sbyong ngo /_/'phags pa khyod ji ltar 'dir 'ong /_des de la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags pa khyod ci'i phyir de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal du gnas/_ji ste bdag bcom ldan 'das la dad par ma gyur na bdag gis khyod bsad par 
[\[35b.7\]]'gyur ba'am/_bstan pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag de lta bu'i gdug 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pa mang po can gyi gnas mal na gnas pa las gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong gis de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal du gnas par mi bya bar mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo/_/
[\[36a.2\]]de bas na dge slong gis de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal du gnas par mi bya'o/_/dge slong de lta bu'i gdug pa mang po can gyi gnas mal du gnas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/de'i tshe dge slong gzhon nu zhig kha zas dang spyod lam nyes 
[\[36a.3\]]pa las 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad kyis thebs nas/_de nad kyis gzer bas mkhun 'byin cing dge slong rnams kyis de bskor nas 'dug go/_/ji tsam na sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed 'ongs te/_des 'phags pa dag 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_'tsho byed 
[\[36a.4\]]dge slong gzhon nu 'di nad cig gis thebs na nad ci yin pa dang /_dpyad ci bya ba ltos shig_/des bltas nas smras pa/_'phags pa 'bras yin pas brtol na phan no/_/dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_gal te de lta na rtol cig_/des de la brtol ba dang /_de bya ba cung 
[\[36a.5\]]zad cig byung nas des der glan pa ma byas par song ngo /_/de rab tu na bar gyur nas dge slong dag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag gang mkhas pa des glan pa gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_de la dge slong gzhon nu gzhan zhig gis glan pa byas so/_/'tsho byed kyis bsams pa/_bdag 
[\[36a.6\]]gis 'phags pa de'i glan pa ma byas par slar 'gro'o snyam nas de slar log ste dris pa 'phags pa dag_/'phags pa gang zhig bdag gis 'bras brtol ba de ga re/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_de ci zhig bya/_'phags pa glan par bgyi'o/_/'tsho byed de glan pa byas zin 
[\[36a.7\]]no/_/'phags pa sus bgyis/_gzhon nu 'dis so/_/'phags pa ji ltar bgyis blta'o/_/zhes de de'i drung du song ste bltas na legs par glan pa mthong nas des smras pa/_'phags pa glan pa legs lags kyis bdag ma mchis na yang slan chad de bzhin du mdzod cig_/des 
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]smras pa/_'tsho byed 'di yang re zhig bdag gis gnang ba med par byas na yang bya ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ngam mi gnang gi gtol med do/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can lags pas ci'i phyir gnang bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[36b.2\]]skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gang mkhas pa des glon du gnang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang mkhas pa des glon du gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis 
[\[36b.3\]]khyams dang /_rdzing drung dang /_sgo khang dang /_bang rim dag tu glan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dben pa'i phyogs su gyis shig_/gzhan du byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can 
[\[36b.4\]]dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs nas dge slong rnams la 'phags pa bdag nad 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bus thebs na bdag gis g.yar zas ni ji lta bu zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/_sman ni ji lta bu zhig bsten par bgyi zhes zas kyi cho ga dris pa dang /_de na dge slong gang dag mi shes pa de dag ni ci 
[\[36b.5\]]yang mi smra'o/_/shes pa rnams ni the tshom du gyur nas ma smras pa dang /_bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams mi dga' bzhin du dong ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge 
[\[36b.6\]]slong gang mkhas pa des kha zas kyi cho ga dang /_sman dpyad rnams ston par gnang gis 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po bstan pas mu stegs can rnams ni thag bcug_/lha dang mi rnams ni kun dga' 
[\[36b.7\]]bar mdzad/_skyes bu dam pa rnams ni mgu bar mdzad pa de'i tshe yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i mi ma yin pa dag grong dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas kyang mnyan yod du 'ongs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_phya mkhan drang srong byin dang /_rnying ba dag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_gzhan 
[\[37a.2\]]yang dad pa can mang po mnyan yod du 'ongs nas der zang zing gi rnyed pa dang mchod pa'i bkur stis skye bo'i tshogs mang po yongs su tshim par byas so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gcig pa/_de lta bu'i 'byor pa mchog mthong nas mi ma 
[\[37a.3\]]yin pa kha cig ni de nyid du mngon par dga'o/_/kha cig ni rang gi yul gyi gnas nyid du dong ngo /_/gang dag der mngon par dga' ba de dag gang gi tshe sems 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris par gyur pa de'i tshe bud med gang dag gi khyo phyi rol du don gnyer du song ba de'i cha lugs 
[\[37a.4\]]su bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag dang lhan cig tu dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas bud med de dag las rgyu mthun pa las skye ba'i khye'u dang bu mo dag rkang lag dang mig dang lus mi sdug par skyes te/_kha cig ni gnag la mig dmar/_kha cig ni mgo che la lus chung /_
[\[37a.5\]]kha cig ni mgo ser/_kha cig ni skra ljang gu'o/_/de dag ma de dag gis mthong ba dang sngangs nas khyim gyi bar dang /_tshang tshing gi phyogs dag tu bor ba dang /_de dag mi ma yin pa'i mdangs kyis gso bar byed do/_/kha cig ni mi'i gzugs su mi gsal bar skye zhing /_gang gi tshe 
[\[37a.6\]]cher skyes pa de'i tshe 'gyur bar ston par byed do/_/de dag kyang mas lam po che'i khar bor ba dang /_de yang mi ma yin pa'i mdangs kyis gso bar byed do/_/drug sde rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni de dag ji snyed rab tu 'byin/_bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa de dag dang ji srid du gnas ngan len kun 
[\[37a.7\]]tu spyod par mi shes pa de srid du lhan cig gnas so/_/gang gi tshe yongs su shes pa de'i tshe rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te gzhan du na ston pa'i bkas dus gsum du ni ltar 'gro'o/_/re zhig tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na srang na skra ljang gu can zhig mthong nas des bsams pa/_'di ni lhung bzed nag po can dag gis phrogs par mi 'gyur bas gal te rab tu 'byung na 'di rab tu dbyung ngo snyam du bsams nas de'i 
[\[37b.2\]]drung du song ste dris pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khyod su'i/_des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag la su yang ga las mchis/_bdag mgon med pa zhig lags so/_/des smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gal te de lta na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /_des smras pa/_'phags pa skra ljang gu can bdag su 
[\[37b.3\]]zhig rab tu 'byin/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa ni snying rjes rab tu phye ba yin pas gal te sus kyang rab tu ma byung na tshur shog ngas rab tu byung gis 'dong zhes byas pa dang /_de yid bde ba skyes te rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas des de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs 
[\[37b.4\]]par byas so/_/de nas nyin zhag mi mang ba zhig tu kun tu spyad par bya ba'i chos rnams bslabs te bsgo ba/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mi gsos kyis mnyan yod rang gi spyod yul yangs pa yang yin la pha'i yul yang yin pas slong mo la rgyu bas 'tsho bar gyis shig 
[\[37b.5\]]de mi dga' nas phyi de nyin snga dro sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/re zhig na bud med gcig bsod snyoms khyer te phyir byung ba las des de mthong ba dang brang brdungs nas smras pa/_'phags pa khyod skra ljang gu can 
[\[37b.6\]]na sus rab tu phyung /_des smras pa/_sring mo mkhan po nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]snying rjes bdag rab tu phyung ngo /_/des smras pa/_gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa de ma yin pa gzhan su zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa kun nas mdzes pa sun par byed ces byas pa dang /_gzhan dag 
[\[37b.7\]]kyang de bzhin du 'phya ste/_ma dad pa kha zer ba rnams srang dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu dge sbyong shAkya'i bu pa rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go/_/tshangs pa'i tshul yang tshig ste/_da ni skra ljang gu can dag kyang rab tu 'byin to zhes mi snyan pa smra ba'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams de lta bu dag kyang rab tu 'byin pa las gyur gyis/_de'i phyir dge slong gis de lta bu dag rab tu dbyung bar mi bya'o snyam du 
[\[38a.2\]]mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba ni thog tu bab bo/_/de lta bas na dge slong gis 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o/_/dge slong gis 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar gzhag na 'gal 
[\[38a.3\]]tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis 'khor sun par byed pa'i 'khor nye bar gzhag par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis 'khor sun par byed pa ji lta bu ma shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 
[\[38a.4\]]'khor gyis 'khor sun par byed pa ni rgyu gnyis kyis te/_gang dag gis shes na rigs dang /_mtshan mas so/_/de la rigs kyis ni rigs gang yang rung bas te/_ma rabs/_dman pa/_phongs pa/_dkos thag pa/_bkren pa/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba chen po mi 
[\[38a.5\]]bdog pa de lta bu'i rigs dag las so sor skyes par gyur pa de dag dge slong rnams rab tu 'byin par byed na de lta bu ni rigs kyis yin no/_/mtshan mas ji lta bu zhe na/_skra ser dang ni skra ljang gu/_/de bzhin du ni skra dmar dang /_/mi rnams skra ni dkar ba dang /_/glang chen skra dang skra 
[\[38a.6\]]med pa/_/'di lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/'bar 'bur mgo dang glang po che/_/mgo smyung dang ni mgo leb dang /_/bong bu phag gi mgo dang ni/_/mi gang mgo ni gnyis yod pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/glang 
[\[38a.7\]]po'i rna dang rta rna dang /_/ba lang rna dang spre'u rna dang /_/bong bu phag gi rna ba dang /_/rna gcig dang ni rna med pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/mig dmar ha cang mig che dang /_/mig chung mig ni ha cang ser/_/shel mig dang ni mig 'bur dang /_/mig 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gcig dang ni mig med pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/glang po'i sna dang rta sna dang /_/ba lang dang ni spre'u sna dang /_/bong bu phag gi sna dag dang /_/sna sbubs gcig dang sna med pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa 
[\[38b.2\]]yin/_/rta dang glang chen kos ko dang /_/ba lang spre'u'i kos ko dang /_/bong bu phag gi kos ko dang /_/kos gcig pa dang kos med pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/glang chen so dang rta so dang /_/ba lang spre'u yi so dang ni/_/bong bu phag 
[\[38b.3\]]gi so dag dang /_/so gcig pa dang so med pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/'jing bu thung dang ske [{]rings [,]ring [}]dang /_/phag mig dang ni sgur po dang /_/mtshan rdum pa ni rlig rlugs dang /_/rlig gcig dang ni rlig med pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/
[\[38b.4\]]drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/ha cang ring dang ha cang thung /_/skem dang ngal skyen ha cang tsho/_/sha mdog kha dog bzhi pa dang /_/gyol po grum po so sto ba/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/lag rdum dang ni rkang rdum dang /_/lag sor zlum 
[\[38b.5\]]por 'jas pa dang /_/mchu med lus ni ri mo can/_/ha cang rgan dang ha cang gzhon/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/theng po smad 'chal zhar ba dang /_/sor rdum sgur po mi'u thung dang /_/lba ba can dang lkugs pa dang /_/'on pa rten 'phye rkang 
[\[38b.6\]]'bam pa/_/de lta bu yi mi dag ni/_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/mdze can 'bras can phol mig can/_/gta' gam shu ba g.yen pa dang /_/nad ni gzhan can thams cad kyang /_/drang srong chen pos spangs pa yin/_/bud med lam dang khur gyis dub/_/ya za ma lug 
[\[38b.7\]]gta' gam dang /_/de dag dang gzhan yan lag nyams/_/de kun 'khor sun byed pa yin/_/mdzes pa rab tu dbyung ba dang /_/yongs su dag pa bsnyen rdzogs par/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab mkhyen te/_/bden pa'i mtshan gyis bka' stsal to/_/nye [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]skra ljang gu can 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]de'i skra dag kyang gar mkhan gyi lag tu btsongs pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong gis skra btsong bar mi bya'o/_/byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/sdom la/_
[\[39a.2\]]bran can dang ni skyong ba dang /_/gleng gzhi dang ni zhu ba dang /_/cho 'phrul che dang snyan ldan dang /_/dmag kun dang ni srin bu ri/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 
[\[39a.3\]]gyis dge tshul gnyis po bran can dang /_skyong ba ste/_de dag phan tshun gtam 'dres pa/_phebs par smra ba/_smos 'drin/_'grogs bshes yin no/_/de gnyis las gcig gis khyod bsnyen par rdzogs shig dang ngas mkhan po dang khyod kyi rim gro bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[39a.4\]]cig shos kyis kyang de kho na bzhin du smras te/_de dag phan tshun stangs byed pas gnyi ga yang bsnyen par ma rdzogs par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs 
[\[39a.5\]]gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mkhan po gcig dang /_slob dpon gcig dang /_gsol ba'i las gcig gis gnyis bsnyen par rdzogs su rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor rung ngo /_/
[\[39a.6\]]de gnyis gang rgan lags/_gang yang ma yin no/_/btsun pa mkhan po gcig dang /_slob dpon gcig dang /_gsol ba'i las gcig gis gsum bsnyen par rdzogs su rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor rung ngo /_/de dag las gang rgan pa lags/_gang yang ma yin 
[\[39a.7\]]no/_/btsun pa mkhan po gcig dang /_slob dpon gcig dang /_gsol ba'i las gcig gis bzhi bsnyen par rdzogs su rung lags sam/_nye ba 'khor mi rung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nye ba 'khor tshogs kyis tshogs kyi las dag mi bya bas dge 'dun gyis dge 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]'dun bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gal te/_dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis de gnyis gsol ba'i las gcig gis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa dang /_de gnyis gang la phyag bya ba dang /_
[\[39b.2\]]las su ji ltar bsko bar bya ba dang /_rnyed pa ji ltar blang ba mi shes pa'i skabs de tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnyis kyis gcig la gcig phyag ni mi bya'o/_/rnyed pa ni gang sngar 
[\[39b.3\]]'ongs pas blang bar bya'o/_/phyis 'ongs pa de ni sngar las su bsko zhing rnyed pa phyis sbyin par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong dran pa nyams pa dran pa 
[\[39b.4\]]zhan pa dag 'byung ste/_de dag gis gnas dang /_grong dang /_grong rdal gang dang /_gang du mdo sde gang bshad pa dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi gang bcas pa ma 'tshal bar gyur na de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_gzhan yang mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon 
[\[39b.5\]]par bskyud par gyur na de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_gzhan yang rgyal po dang /_khyim bdag dang /_dge bsnyen rnams kyi sngon gyi bka' mchid dag la gnas dang /_rgyal po dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_khyim bdag dang /_dge bsnyen rnams kyis ming bskyud 
[\[39b.6\]]par gyur na de dag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_nye ba 'khor gang gis gnas la sogs pa'i ming brjed par gyur pa de dag gis grong khyer chen po drug las gang yang rung ba'am/_yang na de bzhin gshegs pa gang du lan mang du zhugs 
[\[39b.7\]]pa brjod par bya'o/_/ji ste rgyal po'i ming brjed na ni gsal rgyal lo/_/khyim bdag gi ming ni mgon med zas sbyin no/_/dge bsnyen ma ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga'o/_/sngon gyi gtan gyi gnas ni bA rA Na sI'o/_/rgyal po ni tshangs sbyin no/_/khyim bdag ni khyim bdag sdums byed do/_/
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dge bsnyen ma ni khyim bdag gso sbyong skyes kyi chung ma brjod par bya'o/_/mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa rnams brjed par gyur na glegs bu la bris nas bcang bar bya ste/_'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od 
[\[40a.2\]]ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_phyug po dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams kyis rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_phu dud du byas/_mchod pa byas pas 
[\[40a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_gzims cha dang /_snyun gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyang brnyes so/_/mu stegs rnams ni rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_phyug po 
[\[40a.4\]]dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams kyis rim gro ma byas/_bla mar ma byas/_phu dud ma byas/_mchod pa ma byas pas chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyang ma rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas bdud sdig can 'di 
[\[40a.5\]]snyam du bdag gis yun ring po nas dge sbyong gau ta ma la rnam par mtho btsams na glags ma rnyed kyis ma la bdag gis mu stegs rnams la rnam par mtho btsam mo snyam mo/_/de'i tshe rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mkhyen par nga rgyal byed pa 
[\[40a.6\]]rnams rgyal po'i khab na rten cing 'khod do/_/de nas bdud sdig can gyis bdag nyid rdzogs byed kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu'i mdun du 'bar ba dang /_snang ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 
[\[40a.7\]]'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul dag bstan pa dang /_kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bus smras pa/_rdzogs byed khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams thob bam/_thob bo/_/de bzhin du smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]gnyen gyi bu gcer bu pa'i mdun du 'bar ba dang /_snang ba dang /_char 'bab pa dang /_glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan pa dang /_des kyang smras pa/_rdzogs byed khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams thob bam/_thob bo/_/de bzhin du bdag nyid kun tu rgyu gnag 
[\[40b.2\]]lhas kyi bu'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas thams cad kyi drung du song ba nas de bzhin du bdag nyid mi pham skra'i la ba can du mngon par sprul nas thams cad kyi drung du song nas 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs rnams khyod kyis thob bam/_thob bo/_/zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de bzhin du 
[\[40b.3\]]bdag nyid smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can gyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de bzhin du bdag nyid ka t+ya'i bu nog can gyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[40b.4\]]de bzhin du bdag nyid gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas thams cad kyi drung du song nas zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_de rnams so so nas bsams pa/_bdag gcig pu ma gtogs pa 'di dag thams cad ni mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul che ba'o snyam mo/_/de nas dus gzhan 
[\[40b.5\]]zhig na rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams rtog khang du 'dus shing 'khod pa na bar skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dag gleng ste/_shes ldan dag sngon ni bdag cag rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_grong mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_phyug po dang /_
[\[40b.6\]]tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas pas chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyang rnyed par gyur to/_/da ni bdag cag la bkur sti mi byed/_rim gro mi 
[\[40b.7\]]byed/_bla mar mi byed/_mchod par mi byed ces bya ba nas chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma de la ni bkur stir byas/_ri mor byas/_
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]zhes bya ba nas/_dge sbyong gau ta mas ni chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyang rnyed do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/shes ldan dag de lta bas na bdag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma 
[\[41a.2\]]mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug par bya zhing /_gal te dge sbyong gau ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na bdag cag gis gnyis/_dge sbyong gau ta mas gnyis na bdag cag gis bzhi/_dge sbyong gau ta mas bzhi na bdag cag 
[\[41a.3\]]gis brgyad/_dge sbyong gau ta mas brgyad na bdag cag gis bcu drug_/dge sbyong gau ta mas bcu drug na bdag cag gis sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/_dge sbyong gau ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji snyed bstan pa las bdag cag gis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[41a.4\]]gyi cho 'phrul nyis gyur sum gyur du bstan par bya'o/_/de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams rgyal po gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag cag 
[\[41a.5\]]ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_ye shes can du smra ba lags/_dge sbyong gau ta ma yang bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_ye shes can du smra ba lags par sems na de'i slad du ye shes dang ldan par smra ba dang /_ye shes dang ldan par smra ba lhan cig tu mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 
[\[41a.6\]]ston du stsal ba'i rigs so/_/gal te dge sbyong gau ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na bdag cag gis gnyis zhes bya ba nas bdag cag gis mi'i chos bla ma'i cho 'phrul nyis gyur sum gyur du bstan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/dge sbyong 
[\[41a.7\]]gau ta ma yang shul gyi phyed du dgug tu gsol/_bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o/_/de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ro dang 'dra ba khyed kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug gam rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa dang /_de dag dong ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po rgyal po'i khab nas phyung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom 
[\[41b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /_de dag de'i lam kar song nas/_rgyal po la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag cag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ye shes can du smra ba lags zhes byas nas/_mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nyis gyur 
[\[41b.3\]]sum gyur du bstan par bgyi na dge sbyong gau ta ma shul gyi phyed du dgug tu gsol/_bdag cag kyang shul gyi phyed du mchi'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_kye 'di'i tshe ni der zad/_gal te khyed don 'di lan gsum gyi bar du zer na khyed spyugs te btang ngo 
[\[41b.4\]]zhes des de dag thag bcug pa dang slar song ngo /_/rang gi gnas su phyin pa dang /_yang bgros pa/_shes ldan dag ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po ni dge sbyong gau ta ma phyogs byed pas mnyan yod na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzu bo lta bu zhig 
[\[41b.5\]]yod ces grag gis/_gang gi tshe dge sbyong gau ta ma mnyan yod du 'ongs pa de'i tshe bdag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la dgug par bya'o/_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ji srid dgyes kyi bar du bzhugs 
[\[41b.6\]]nas mnyan yod gang na bar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so/_/rim gyis ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las mnyan yod du byon nas/_mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas rdzogs byed la sogs pa ston pa drug po 
[\[41b.7\]]rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin mnyan yod du dong ngo /_/de nas rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /_de dag lam gyis dub pa ngal bso nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la rgyal ba dang tshe 
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]spel ba byas nas smras pa/_lha bdag cag ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_ye shes can du smra ba lags/_dge sbyong gau ta ma yang bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/_ye shes can du smra ba lags par sems na/_de'i slad du ye shes can du smra ba dang /_ye 
[\[42a.2\]]shes can du smra ba lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston du stsal ba'i rigs so/_/gal te dge sbyong gau ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gcig bstan na bdag cag gis gnyis/_dge sbyong gau ta mas gnyis na bdag cag gis bzhi/_dge sbyong 
[\[42a.3\]]gau ta mas bzhin bdag cag gis brgyad/_dge sbyong gau ta mas brgyad na bdag cag gis bcu drug_/dge sbyong gau ta mas bcu drug na bdag cag gis sum bcu rtsa gnyis te/_dge sbyong gau ta mas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji snyed bstan pa las bdag cag 
[\[42a.4\]]gis nyis gyur sum gyur tu mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyis/_dge sbyong gau ta ma shul gyi phyed du dgug tu gsol/_bdag cag kyang shul phyed du mchi'o/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te de lta na bdag gis 
[\[42a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das la zhus te byas re zhig sdod cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha legs kyis de ltar mdzad du gsol sdod do/_/de nas yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[42a.6\]]'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa mu stegs can de rnams bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan 'dren na de'i slad 
[\[42a.7\]]du bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan du gsol/_mu stegs can rnams thag stsal du gsol/_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyir gsol/_skyes bu dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyir gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag khyed tshur bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing 'ongs pa rnams la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig ces chos ston par mi byed 
[\[42b.2\]]kyi/_'on kyang nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag dge ba ni ma spyoms shig_/sdig pa ni shogs te gnos shig ces chos ston to/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[42b.3\]]mu stegs can de rnams bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan 'dren na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan du gsol/_mu stegs can rnams thag stsal du gsol/_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyir gsol/_
