[\[42b.4\]]skyes bu dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyir gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag khyed tshur bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing 
[\[42b.5\]]'ongs pa rnams la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston cig ces chos ston par mi byed kyi/_'on kyang nga ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du dge slong dag dge ba ni ma spyoms shig_/sdig pa ni shogs te gnos shig ces chos ston to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[42b.6\]]nges par mdzad pa ni lnga yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_snga phyi med pa'i sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang /_nyan thos dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar mdzad pa dang /_yab dang yum 
[\[42b.7\]]bden pa la 'god par mdzad pa dang /_mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad 'dul ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi cho 'phrul chen po gang du bstan ces 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]dgongs na mnyan yod du yin par gzigs so/_/yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos dus ji tsam na khong du chud par 'gyur zhes dgongs na zhag bdun lon nas 'gyur bar mkhyen nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po song la 
[\[43a.2\]]de bzhin byas ci rigs par sgrubs shig ces gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das dus ji tsam na/_rgyal po chen po zhag bdun na'o/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste/_mu 
[\[43a.3\]]stegs can rnams la smras pa/_kye bcom ldan 'das ni zhag bdun na rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par mdzad kyis khyed cag gis bya zhing bsham dgos pa ci yod pa de gyis shig_/mu stegs can rnams kyis bgros pa/_shes ldan dag yang na ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'bros par 
[\[43a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/yang na ni grogs tshol bar 'gyur na de la ji ltar bsgrub/_de dag 'di skad ces kye dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gdon mi za bar grogs tshol bar 'gyur bas ji ste de ltar gyur na bdag cag gis kyang grogs btsal lo/_/de'i tshe ku sha'i grong khyer na kun du rgyu shin tu bzang po zhes bya 
[\[43a.5\]]ba rgas pa/_'khogs pa/_gtugs pa/_ku sha'i grong khyer gyi gyad rnams kyis dgra bcom par bkur zhing rim gro byas/_bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_mchod par byas pa zhig 'dug go/_/de rnams kyis gros bcas nas de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_shin tu bzang 
[\[43a.6\]]po khyod dang bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin te/_bdag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos kyis grogs gyis shig_/des smras pa/_kye khyed kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs 
[\[43a.7\]]pa zhig byas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni rdzu 'phrul che ba/_mthu che ba yin no/_/ji ltar shes/_'thad pa lags so/_/'di la gtan tshigs ci yod/_shes ldan dag gang gi tshe dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du ma byung ba de'i tshe kho bo dal gyis 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i mtsho 'gram 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]na nyin mo gnas shing kho bo bsod snyoms blangs nas mtsho chen po ma dros par song ste za'o/_/de na kho bo phyogs gcig na 'dug pa la ma dros pa na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis chu bcus shing sbyin par byed do/_/gang gi tshe dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe de'i nyan thos kyi mchog shA 
[\[43b.2\]]ri'i bu zhes bya ba de'i dge sbyong skul byed ces bya ba des phyag dar khrod pa khyer nas mtsho chen po ma dros par 'ongs pa dang /_ma dros pa na gnas pa'i lha de rnams de'i phyag dar khrod pa de dag bkrus nas 'bul bar byed la/_bkrus pa'i chu des kyang bdag nyid kyi mgo bor 'debs par byed do/_/
[\[43b.3\]]de lta bas na bdag cag gang gi yang slob ma dang yang mi mnyam pa de khyed kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs par byas so/_/de rnams phan tshun du kye 'di yang de'i phyogs zhig yin pas bdag cag gzhan tshol du 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de rnams kyis de la g.yo'i 
[\[43b.4\]]kun tu spyod pas bkur sti bya ba ltar byas te dong nas sa phyogs dben pa gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas bgros pa/_kye bdag cag gis grogs gzhan ji ltar btsal bar bya smros shig_/de las kha cig gis smras pa/_grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi nags zhes bya ba 'di na lnga mngon par 
[\[43b.5\]]shes pa che ge mo zhig gnas pas de'i gan du dong dang /_de bdag cag gi grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_des mi nus kyi 'on kyang dka' thub kyi nags tshal che ge mo zhes bya ba na dka' thub can lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhes bya ba gnas pa de'i drung du dong na de 
[\[43b.6\]]bdag cag gi grogs byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe gangs ri'i sul shing sna tshogs kyi nags tshal gyis brgyan pa/_chu mig dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/_'bab chu dang /_mtshe 'us mdzes par byas pa na drang srong lnga brgya tsam zhig gnas te 
[\[43b.7\]]phal cher mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o/_/de'i nang nas drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gcig grong khyer gyi nye 'khor du 'ongs nas de phan tshun 'phyan pa las de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang /_de rnams kyis de la byon pa legs so zhes bya ba kun tu spyad nas khyod gang 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]nas 'dir 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/_/de rnams yid bde ba skyes nas de dag gi drung du song ngo /_/de nas phan tshun yang dag par dga' bar byas nas lam gyis dub pa ngal bso ste/_kye khyed dang bdag cag tshangs pa mtshungs par 
[\[44a.2\]]spyod pa yin te/_bdag cag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos na khyed kyis kyang grogs gyis shig_/de dag gis smras pa/_kye legs te de bzhin du bya na 'on kyang nged la mtshan ma ston cig_/de rnams yid bde ba skyes nas de dag la gus par smra 
[\[44a.3\]]bas mgu bar byas te dong ngo /_/re zhig na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mas dben gyi nu bo rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu zhes bya ba de dri dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi drung na mar song ba las de'i btsun mo zhig steng gi khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]thog nas me tog gi phreng ba 
[\[44a.4\]]bor ba dang /_de'i lus la phog pa gzhan zhig gis mthong ngo /_/'jig rten na mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba dang tha mal pa yin pas des kyang blon po la byas so/_/blon pos kyang rgyal po la lha rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu ni lha'i btsun mo dang khri'o zhes gsol to/_/rgyal po rnams ni ma brtags 
[\[44a.5\]]par byed pa yin pas des blon po rnams la shes ldan dag ngas rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu yongs su btang gis deng la rkang lag med par gyis shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de dag gis de srang du khrid nas rkang lag med par byas te bzhag nas de'i gnyen mig mchi mas gang ba rnams dang /_skye 
[\[44a.6\]]bo'i tshogs chen po gzhan dag gis kyang yongs su bskor cing 'dug go/_/ci tsam na mu stegs can rnams kyang phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_de dag la de'i gnyen rnams kyis 'phags pa rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu'i yan lag dang nying lag dag ji ltar snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur ba'i 
[\[44a.7\]]bden pa'i tshig mdzad du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_de dag spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar langs te dong ngo /_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsod snyoms la rgyu ba las phyogs der phyin pa dang /_de dag gis de la smras pa/_'phags pa rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu yan 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]lag dang nying lag ji ltar snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur bar bden pa'i tshig mdzad du gsol/_des smras pa/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das la zhus te 'ong ngo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag 'di da ni sos zin to zhes dbugs phyin par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo rings pa 
[\[44b.2\]]rings par mnyan yod du song ste bsod snyoms bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/kun dga' bo song la rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu'i gnyen gyis yan lag dang nying lag 
[\[44b.3\]]dag gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'jog tu chug la bden pa'i tshig 'di ltar gyis shig_/bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis sems can rkang pa med pa dang /_rkang gnyis dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /_rkang [{]mangs [,]mang [}]dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs med pa dang /_'du shes yod 
[\[44b.4\]]pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gang su yang rung de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog tu gsungs pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na 'dod 
[\[44b.5\]]chags dang bral ba'i chos mchog tu gsungs pa dang /_'dus pa'am/_mang po'am/_tshogs pa'am/_'khor gang su yang rung de dag gi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog tu gsungs pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' 
[\[44b.6\]]thub dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag gi nang na 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog tu gsungs pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu'i yan lag dang nying lag dag sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces byos shig dang snga mkho bzhin 
[\[44b.7\]]du 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas de'i gnyen rnams kyis yan lag dang nying lag gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas 'di ltar bden pa'i tshig bya bar brtsams te/_bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]sems can rkang pa med pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_gang su yang rung de dag gi nang na 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog tu gsungs pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des de yan lag dang nying lag snga mkho bzhin du gyur cig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du byas pa dang /_
[\[45a.2\]]bden pa'i tshig gis de'i yan lag dang nying lag ji ltar snga ma bzhin du gnas par gyur nas skye bo'i tshogs kyis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i mig phye ste/_a la la 'phags pa kun dga' bos mu stegs can pham par byas so zhes sgra bo che bton to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal bu 
[\[45a.3\]]gzhon nu na gu khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces btsun pa rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu de ni 'di 
[\[45a.4\]]lags so zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu na gus bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de dang 'tsham pa'i chos 
[\[45a.5\]]bstan pa mdzad do/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu na gus de thos ma thag tu bden pa mngon par rtogs te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byas shing rdzu 'phrul yang thob par gyur to/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'phags pa kun dga' bos bden pa'i tshig ji lta ba bzhin du byas pas rgyal 
[\[45a.6\]]bu gzhon nu na gu'i yan lag dang nying lag snga mkho bzhin du gyur to zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_rgyal bu gzhon nu na gu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gzhon nu tshur shog khyim du 'dong /_des smras pa/_lha bdag ni bcom ldan 
[\[45a.7\]]'das la bsnyen bkur 'tshal zhing 'di nyid du mchis so/_/legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig ces des kun dga'i ra ba'i nang der 'chags byas so/_/de de na 'dug pa na de'i yan lag dang nying lag dum bu slar 'byor pas de'i ming dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba pa dum bu'i kun dga' ra ba pa 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]zhes bya bar chags so/_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 
[\[45b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis mnyan yod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal ji srid pa de'i bar du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po legs kyis 
[\[45b.3\]]gyis shig dang der gdon mi za bar skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan du yod pa dang /_rgyal byed kyi tshal ji srid pa de'i bar du sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs nas cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i 'dun khang bshams 
[\[45b.4\]]te 'dun khang gos brgya stong ri bas g.yogs pa/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/_dri zhim po'i bdug pa'i snod bzhag pa/_ba dan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/_dar gyi chun 'phyang gi tshogs dpyangs pa/_me tog sil ma sna tshogs bkram pa/_lha rnams kyi dga' 
[\[45b.5\]]tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du nyams dga' bar byas nas der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rdo rje dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_margad dang /_byi ru dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_an da rnyil dang /_mthon ka chen po dang /_pad+ma rA gas brgyan cing spras pa'i gser gyi seng ge'i khri 
[\[45b.6\]]yang bshams so/_/mu stegs can gyi dge bsnyen rnams kyis kyang rang gi 'byor pa dang mthun pa'i gos kyis g.yogs pa'i 'dun khang drug kyang byas/_stan drug kyang bshams nas de dag tu mu stegs can rnams rang gi 'khor gyis bskor nas sngar 'ongs te 'dug nas rgyal po la lha 
[\[45b.7\]]bdag cag ni mchis lags na dge sbyong gau ta ma dgug tu gsol zhes pho nya btang ngo /_/rgyal pos thos nas kyang btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas te cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du song nas des bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod tshur shog_/
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs pa der song la phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bdag gi mchid nas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg 
[\[46a.2\]]par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga'a'am zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces btsun pa mu stegs can de rnams tshogs shing mchis lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes kyang gsol cig_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bram ze'i 
[\[46a.3\]]khye'u bla ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar gyur pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/
[\[46a.4\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze'i khye'u bla mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kyai gau ta ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gau ta ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la 
[\[46a.5\]]reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' 'am zhes snyun gsol zhing mchis zhes gsol pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_khyod bde bar gyur cig_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mchid nas kye gau ta ma mu stegs can rnams cho 
[\[46a.6\]]'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du lhags nas 'dus shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bla ma song shig nga yang 'ong ngo zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_bram ze'i khye'u bla ma song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[46a.7\]]kyis ji ltar ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/_srog chags brgya stong du ma ngo mtshar gyi mig phye nas a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra bton te lta bzhin du nam mkha' las cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang du gshegs 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]so/_/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'byor pa de dag mthong nas ya mtshan gyis yid dad par gyur te mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te/_da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyis 
[\[46b.2\]]khyed kyis ston cig_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gzhes shig skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong gau ta ma lags sam/_'on te bdag cag gi lags sam gang gi lags sus 'tshal/_de nas de'i mod la dum bu'i kun dga' 
[\[46b.3\]]ra ba pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis ri spos kyi ngad ldang las shing a mra yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma dkar po du mas bklubs pa/_bya'i tshogs du ma skad 'byin pa blangs nas cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi byang phyogs su bzhag pa dang /_de yang rgyal pos mthong nas yid bde 
[\[46b.4\]]ba skyes te lan gnyis kyi bar du mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te/_da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyis khyed kyis ston cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_lha bdag cag gis khyod la 
[\[46b.5\]]sngar ma gsol tam/_lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong gau ta ma'i lags sam/_'on te bdag cag gi lags sam/_su'i lags sus 'tshal/_de nas de'i mod la khyim bdag ngan legs sbyin gyis rdzu 'phrul gyis sum 
[\[46b.6\]]bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing blangs nas cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang gi lho phyogs kyi ngos su bzhag pa dang /_de yang ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mthong nas yang shin tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas lan gsum gyi bar du mu stegs can rnams la 'di 
[\[46b.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te/_da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyis khyed kyis ston cig_/de dag gis smras pa/_bdag cag gis gsol lags mod kyi/_'on kyang lan gsum gyi bar du gsol ba 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]bgyi ste/_lha skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dir 'dus lags na cho 'phrul chen po 'di ci dge sbyong gau ta ma'i lags sam/_'on te bdag cag gi lags sam/_su'i lags sus 'tshal/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po lta bar spro ba'i srog 
[\[47a.2\]]chags brgya stong du ma yang 'dus/_lha brgya stong du ma yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dus par gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs bkrus te gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te me'i khams la snyoms par 
[\[47a.3\]]zhugs so/_/de nas sgo 'phar gyi gseb nas 'od zer byung bas cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang thams cad bsreg par brtsams pa dang /_mu stegs can rnams kyis smras pa/_lha da ni dge sbyong gau ta ma cho 'phrul chen po'i khang pa tshig cing mchis na gal te dge sbyong 
[\[47a.4\]]gau ta mas rngo thog na 'dir mchis la zhi bar bgyid grang zhes byas pa dang /_rgyal po cang mi zer bar sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang /_phya mkhan drang srong byin dang /_rnying pa dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[47a.5\]]mgon med zas sbyin dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dgra'i ma sa ga dang /_gzhan yang dad pa can mang po dang /_bar mar gnas pa kha cig kyang cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/mu stegs can rnams dang /_de'i slob ma rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas me des cho 'phrul 
[\[47a.6\]]chen po'i 'dun khang gi dri ma thams cad bsregs nas rang nyid zhi bar gyur te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang dri ma med cing gsal la mdzes par gyur cing 'dug go/_/de nas yang 
[\[47a.7\]]rgyal po srog shor ba las rnyed pa lta bur dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te/_da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyis khyed kyis ston cig ces 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]byas pa dang /_de dag spobs pa med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas par zhabs g.yas pa dri gtsang khang gi nang du bsnun pa dang sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur nas sa chen po 'di g.yos/_kun 
[\[47b.2\]]du g.yos/_kun du rab tu g.yos/_'gul/_kun tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul bar gyur te/_shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/_nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/_byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/_lho phyogs mtho na byang 
[\[47b.3\]]phyogs dma'/_dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/_mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to/_/sa g.yos pa des gangs ri'i khrod kyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa'i drang srong rnams bskul bas de dag phan tshun du shes ldan dag bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par 
[\[47b.4\]]spyod pa de dag gis mtshan ma dag bstan kyis 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba la gzigs te nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer bkye bas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas 
[\[47b.5\]]drang srong de rnams kyi bar thag ji srid pa de gser bzhun ma lta bur gyur to/_/drang srong de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang po shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes pa/_gser sbyangs pa'i dum bu'i tshogs spungs pa lta bu/_me tog ku ran da ka dang /_
[\[47b.6\]]mya ngan 'tshang gi phung po lta bu'i mdangs can/_gsung dbyangs sprin chu dang bcas pa dang /_rgya mtsho dang /_khyu mchog dang /_rnga sgra ltar zab cing brtan la rnam par gsal ba/_mnyan na bde zhing snyan pa/_'phral ba'i phyogs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang /_mu tig 
[\[47b.7\]]gi do shal dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang /_ngang pa dang /_me tog kun da dang /_shel spungs pa lta bur dkar ba'i mdzod spus rnam par brgyan pa/_yon tan rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa grangs med pa'i tshogs kyis gnas pa/_srid pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]dang /_bkur sti la mngon par dga' ba'i dri ma'i 'dam gyi skyon dang bral ba/_dus dpag tu med pa nas tshogs bsags pa'i ye shes bla na med pa phul du phyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grags pa can/_lha'i dbang po'i cod pan rin po che'i myu gus zhabs gnyis la 
[\[48a.2\]]gtugs pa/_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_sngags 'chang dang /_brang 'gro mchod 'os rnams kyis rjed pa/_mdor na sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad 
[\[48a.3\]]cus rnam par spras pa/_'od 'dom gang pas brgyan pa/_'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/_rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/ji ltar sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms 
[\[48a.4\]]pa'am/_bu med pas bu rnyed pa'am/_bkren pas gter mthong ba'am/_rgyal po mngon par 'dod pa dang po rgyal por dbang bskur ba ni de lta ma yin pas drang srong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/bcom 
[\[48a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang /_de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi 
[\[48a.6\]]rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/_/de rnams bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs 
[\[48a.7\]]pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de gdams ngag phog 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]pa dang /_de rnams kyis 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'jig pa dang /_ltung ba dang /_'gyes pa dang /_'joms pa'i chos can du rtogs te nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[48b.2\]]spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/_dgra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/_nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba/_tsan dan dang ste 'ur mtshungs pa/_rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom 
[\[48b.3\]]pa/_mngon par shes pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/_srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /_bsnyen bkur la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/_dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_rjed par bya ba dang /_gus par bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[48b.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas dge bsnyen ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma 
[\[48b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung ngur mdzad du gsol/_bdag gis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos 
[\[48b.6\]]bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing mu stegs can rnams thag stsal bar bgyi/_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi/_skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma khyod sems khral chung 
[\[48b.7\]]ngur gyis shig_/khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing mu stegs can rnams thag gzhug pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang /_skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi/_'on kyang 'di rnams 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]khyod mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi/_'di rnams nga mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la 'bod pas nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o/_/gal te khyod kyis 'di rnams dang lhan cig mi'i 
[\[49a.2\]]chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan na mu stegs can rnams dge sbyong gau ta ma la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi/_'on kyang 'di'i nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba zhig nged dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 
[\[49a.3\]]'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to zhes smra bar 'gyur bas/_khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig_/ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug ste/_khyim bdag ngan legs sbyin dang /_dge tshul skul byed dang /_dge tshul ma brjed med dang /_dge 
[\[49a.4\]]slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog dang /_gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa phal mo che dag kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[49a.5\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung ngur mdzad du gsol/_bdag gis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing /_mu stegs can rnams thag stsal bar bgyi/_lha dang 
[\[49a.6\]]mi rnams dga' bar bgyi/_skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig_/khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul 
[\[49a.7\]]gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing /_mu stegs can rnams thag gzhug pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang /_skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi/_'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi/_
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]nga 'di rnams kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pas/_nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o/_/gal te khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan na/_mu stegs 
[\[49b.2\]]can rnams dge sbyong gau ta ma la ni mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi/_'on kyang 'di'i nyan thos dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/_'di ltar mthu che ba zhig nged dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to/_/zhes smra bar 
[\[49b.3\]]'gyur bas khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig_/ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de yang rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa la mu stegs 
[\[49b.4\]]can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par gsol pa 'debs pa su yin/_de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[49b.5\]]btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams dang /_thabs cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing /_mu stegs can rnams thag stsal pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[49b.6\]]dga' bar bgyi ba dang /_skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi bar gsol ba bdag lags te/_de ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur lags 
[\[49b.7\]]so/_/zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/_/de 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na nyid kyi gdan las mi snang bar gyur nas/_shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste/_gshegs pa dang /_'greng ba dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_gzims 
[\[50a.2\]]pa mdzad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar 
[\[50a.3\]]po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'thon to/_/zung gi cho 'phrul sku'i smad nas ni me 'bar/_sku'i stod nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab pa dang /_sku'i stod nas ni me 'bar/_sku'i smad nas ni chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab pa dag kyang ston par mdzad do/_/shar 
[\[50a.4\]]phyogs su ji lta bar lho dang /_nub dang /_byang phyogs su yang de dang 'dra ste/_phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa btang ste seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po 
[\[50a.5\]]gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'di ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa mu stegs can rnams dang skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du bla na med pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[50a.6\]]chen po bstan par gsol ba 'debs pa su yin/_de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun 
[\[50a.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis mu stegs can rnams dang /_skye bo'i tshogs kyi mdun du bla na med pa'i cho 'phrul chen po bstan cing mu stegs can rnams thag stsal pa dang /_lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzad pa dang /_skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par mdzad par bcom ldan 'das 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]la gsol pa bdag lags te/_de ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu la yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung 
[\[50b.2\]]bas gnang ngo /_/de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go/_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 
[\[50b.3\]]'khor lo dang /_bkra shis dang /_g.yung drung can dra bas 'brel pa/_bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa/_'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas sa la reg par mdzad de/_kye ma klu rnams kyis pad+ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam 'dab ma stong dang ldan 
[\[50b.4\]]pa/_thams cad gser las byas pa/_rin po che'i chu ba dang /_rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te 'ongs kyang sla na snyam du 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags 
[\[50b.5\]]grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes par 'gyur la/_gang gi tshe 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes par mi 'gyur na/_
[\[50b.6\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba klu rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na cho 'phrul chen po ston par mthong nas de dag gis pad+ma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/_thams cad gser las byas pa/_rin po che'i 
[\[50b.7\]]chu ba dang /_rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te sa brtol nas byung ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das pad+ma de'i snying po la bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas g.yon du pad+ma de 'dra ba gzhan rab tu mang po dag byung bar gyur te/_de dag re re la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par gyur 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]to/_/de dag gi g.yas g.yon du yang pad+ma de 'dra ba gzhan dag byung bar gyur cing de dag la yang gzhan te de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas phal po che sprul to/_/de na sangs rgyas kha cig ni 'bar/_kha cig ni gsal bar mdzad/_kha cig 
[\[51a.2\]]ni char 'bebs/_kha cig ni glog 'byin/_kha cig ni kun shes pa lung ston/_kha cig ni zhu ba zhu/_kha cig ni lan 'debs/_kha cig ni 'chag pa mdzad/_kha cig ni gzhes/_kha cig ni bzhengs/_kha cig ni bzhugs/_kha cig ni gzims te/_ji ltar byis pa gzhon 
[\[51a.3\]]nu rnams kyis kyang sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong ba de ltar yang byin gyis brlabs so/_/cho 'phrul de mthong nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /_yul sna tshogs 
[\[51a.4\]]nas 'ongs pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dang /_nam mkha'i dkyil na lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing rgyun mi 'chad par phyag 'tshal lo/_/nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang rnga dag rdung ngo /_/gnas gnas na 
[\[51a.5\]]yang rnga bo che rnams ni rdung /_dung sgril ma ni 'bud/_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'byin cing /_la la ni glu len/_la la ni gar byed do/_/byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyang yid bde ba skyes nas rang gi ris dang 'dra ba'i sgra skad rnam pa sna 
[\[51a.6\]]tshogs sgrogs pa 'di lta ste/_rta rnams ni 'tsher/_glang po che rnams ni ngur/_rnga mo rnams ni 'khong /_ba lang rnams ni 'bod/_rma bya rnams ni 'gyur te/_lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba skyes nas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya bar 
[\[51a.7\]]spro bar gyur to/_/de nas lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar po dang /_man dA ra ba rnams gtor to/_/lha'i a ga ru'i phye ma dang /_rgya spos kyi phye ma dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /_lha rdzas kyi gos dag kyang gtor/_mi dang mi 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang de bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i dga' ston chen po byung ba na gdul ba'i skye bos rtogs par mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/brtsam par bya zhing nges 'byung bya/_/sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya/_/'dam bu'i 
[\[51b.2\]]khyim la glang chen bzhin/_/'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/_/gang zhig chos 'dul 'di la ni/_bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa/_/skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/_/sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur/_/lhag ma sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gcig car du 
[\[51b.3\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba/_/de srid srin bu me khyer gsal/_/mkha' la nyi ma shar ba na/_/mog mog por 'gyur gsal mi 'gyur/_/ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma byung /_/rtog ge can rnams sngon gsal te/_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[51b.4\]]sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang /_/rtog ge mi gsal de'i slob min/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag cho 'phrul chen po mi snang bar 'gyur gyis mtshan ma zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs ma thag tu mod la mi 
[\[51b.5\]]snang bar gyur to/_/de mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te/_da ni khyed kyi res la bab pas khyed kyis ston cig_/
[\[51b.6\]]de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed cang mi smra bar kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la gru phugs byas so/_/des kyang smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la'o/_/des kyang mi pham skra'i la ba can la'o/_/des kyang ka t+ya'i bu nog can la'o/_/des kyang gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la'o/_/
[\[51b.7\]]des kyang 'od srung rdzogs byed la byas na 'ga' yang smra bar mi byed do/_/de dag la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal pos de skad ces smras na/_de bzhin du gcig la gcig gru phugs byed cing cang mi zer bar gyur/_yul yul por gyur/_zhum zhum por gyur nas 
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]mgo smad cing spobs pa med de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go/_/de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'di snyam du skyes bu blun po 'di rnams yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la tho btsam pas de'i phyir gang gis na 'di rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur ba'i thabs zhig bya'o snyam 
[\[52a.2\]]nas/_des gang gis na cho 'phrul gyi 'dun khang de de rnams kyi mig lam du yang mi 'bab pa de lta bu'i rlung mar dang char drag btang ba dang /_de na kha cig ni bred nas ri'i gseb tu zhugs/_kha cig ni rtswa'i tshang tshing du/_kha cig ni nags thibs por/_kha cig ni 'dun khang du/_
[\[52a.3\]]kha cig ni lha khang du zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang na bzhugs shing tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/_'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni/_/phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang /_/kun dga' ra ba ljon shing dang /_/mchod rten 
[\[52a.4\]]rnams la skyabs su 'gro/_/skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing /_/skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin te/_/skyabs de dag la brten nas ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab mi thar/_/gang zhig gang tshe sangs rgyas dang /_/chos dang dge 'dun skyabs song zhing /_/'phags pa yi ni bden 
[\[52a.5\]]pa bzhi/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das bder 'gro ba yi/_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dag_/shes rab kyis ni lta byed na/_/skyabs de dag ni gtso yin zhing /_/skyabs de dag ni mchog yin te/_/skyabs de 
[\[52a.6\]]dag la brten nas ni/_/sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de la brten te gang thos na sems can brgya phrag mang pos khyad par chen po thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan 
[\[52a.7\]]pas kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/_kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so/_/kha cig gis 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/_kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_dge 'dun la bab par 
[\[52b.2\]]bkod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par len du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/_/de nas 'od srung rdzogs 
[\[52b.3\]]byed la slob ma rnams kyis dris pa/_mkhan po de kho na nyid ji lta bu lags pa gsung shig_/des slob ma de dag kha cig la ni bu 'di lta ste/_'jig rten rtag pa 'di ni de kho na nyid yin no zhes smras/_gzhan dag la ni mi rtag go/_/gzhan dag la ni rtag kyang rtag mi rtag kyang 
[\[52b.4\]]mi rtag go/_/gzhan dag la ni rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no/_/gzhan la ni mtha' yod do/_/mtha' med do/_/mtha' yod kyang yod mtha' med kyang med do/_/mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin no/_/srog de lus yin no/_/srog kyang 
[\[52b.5\]]gzhan la lus kyang gzhan yin no/_/de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod do/_/med do/_/yod kyang yod la med kyang med do/_/de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhes rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis 
[\[52b.6\]]bslus so/_/de yang ngo tsha nas mgo smad de mya ngan gyi mes gdungs pas chu bsil ba 'dod pa'i phyir rdzing bur song ba dang /_de nas lam du ma ning zhig gis mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_thug re rwa mthu chag pa lta bu yi/_/mdangs med khyod cig ga las rings par 'ongs/_/
[\[52b.7\]]shAkya'i chos ni rnam par ma shes pas/_/bong bu bzhin du 'dzem pa med par 'phyan/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_nga yi mdun na 'dug 'di 'chi bdag des/_/bdag gi lus la stobs dang brtson pa med/_/dngos po thams cad bde dang sdug bsngal sten/_/thar zin 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]nga ni bde ba byed du 'gro/_/nyi zer rab tu tsha bar byed rnams kyis/_/lus dang sems kun gdungs shing ngal gyur gyis/_/mi srun thong la rdzing rab bsil ba de/_/ga la yod pa bdag la myur du smros/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_pho ngan sdig can 
[\[53a.2\]]skyes mchog ma yin pa/_/mtshe'u ltar pad ma ngang pa dang ldan zhing /_/gangs kyi chu ltar chu yongs gtsang ba yi/_/rdzing bu shin du bzang po ma mthong ngam/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod kyang pho min mi yi chung ma'ang min/_/de brda phrad kyis zung la lam phye dang /_/rdzing 
[\[53a.3\]]bu chu bzang chu bsil gang bar ni/_/gdung ba bsil bar bya phyir bdag 'gro'o/_/de lam de nas bzur ba dang rdzogs byed kyang rdzing bu'i drung du song ste mgul du bum pa bye mas bkang ba btags nas der nub ste/_de nyid du dus las 'das so/_/de nas de'i slob ma rnams kyis gcig 
[\[53a.4\]]la gcig dris pa/_mkhan po khyed sus mthong /_de rnams kyis smras pa/_ma mthong ngo /_/khyed las mkhan pos lung bstan pa su yod/_de na kha cig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag nged la ni mkhan pos 'jig rten rtag pa 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhes lung 
[\[53a.5\]]bstan to/_/kha cig gis smras pa/_nged la ni mi rtag go zhes bstan to/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_nged la ni rtag kyang rtag mi rtag kyang mi rtag go/_/rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no/_/mtha' med do/_/mtha' yod do/_/mtha' yod kyang yod mtha' med kyang 
[\[53a.6\]]med do/_/mtha' yod pa yang ma yin mtha' med pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod do/_/med do/_/yod kyang yod la med kyang med do/_/de bzhin song ba shi phan chad yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin pa 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhe'o/_/
[\[53a.7\]]de rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag 'di lta ste/_sna tshogs su btags pas bdag cag thams cad mi mthun par gyur gyis ma la bdag cag gis mkhan po kun du btsal la de kho na nyid ji lta bu yin dri'o zhes de rnams dong ba dang /_de rnams kyis lam gyi dbus su bu mo zhig mthong 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]nas de rnams kyis de la tshigs su bcad pas dris pa/_chos kyi gos ni gyon pa po/_/dka' thub nal ze gang za ba/_/rdzogs byed 'di nas song gyur pa/_/bzang mo khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/_/des kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_ngan song sems can dmyal ba pa/_/
[\[53b.2\]]lag pa brkyang nas 'gro ba yi/_/rdzogs byed de ni chus g.yengs nas/_/rkang lag skya bor gyur cing 'dug_/de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/_chos kyi gos ni gyon pa po/_/chos spyod thub pa de la ni/_/khyod kyis smras de legs min gyis/_/bzang 
[\[53b.3\]]mo de skad ma zer cig_/des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_pho mtshan gyi ni rtags skyes pa/_/blo ldan des su 'jig rten na/_/rtag tu 'jig rten gyis mthong bar/_/gcer bur grong du rgyu bar byed/_/pho mtshan mdun nas dpyod byed pa/_/gang gi chos ni 'di 'dra ba/_/
[\[53b.4\]]de ni rgyal po rnam thos bus/_/mda' ni ste'u kas gcod 'dong shig_/ces byas pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar dong nas de dag rdzing bur phyin pa dang /_re zhig na rdzogs byed bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags nas dus las 'das pa mthong nas/_de rnams las gang 
[\[53b.5\]]dag bslab pa 'dod pa de rnams kyis shes ldan dag 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni rmongs pa yin no zhes smras nas/_de dag kyang bum pa bye mas bkang ba mgul du btags nas de nyid du dus las 'das so/_/lhag ma rnams ni slar log nas mtha' 'khob tu dong nas 'dug go/_/gang 
[\[53b.6\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i tshe mu stegs can thams cad kyis mi'i 
[\[53b.7\]]chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan drangs pa las mu stegs can thams cad thag stsal pham par mdzad rgyab kyis phyogs par mdzad/_spobs pa med par mdzad de/_de nas mtha' 'khob kyi ljongs rnams su rten par gyur to/_/de na dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/_btsun 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan drangs pa las mu stegs can thams cad thag stsal/_pham par mdzad/_rgyab kyis phyogs par mdzad/_
[\[54a.2\]]spobs pa med par mdzad pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_
[\[54a.3\]]sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su grol te/_thams cad mkhyen pa/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/_shes pa dang /_shes bya thams cad la dbang thob pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i/_kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[54a.4\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas mu stegs can thams cad thag bcug_/pham par byas/_rgyab kyis phyogs par byas/_spobs pa med par byas pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci che/_'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug 
[\[54a.5\]]dang bcas pa/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las yongs su ma grol ba na yang ston pa drug po 'khor dang bcas pa 'di dag thag bcug_/pham 
[\[54a.6\]]par byas/_rgyab kyis phyogs par byas/_spobs pa med par byas/_tshar bcad de mtha' 'khob kyi ljongs rnams su rten du bcug pa de bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i 
[\[54a.7\]]ljongs na rgyal po skyed pa zhes bya ba rgyal srid 'byor pa dang rgyas pa zhes bya ba nas/_byed du 'jud do zhes bya ba rgyas par ro/_/de nas rgyal po skyed pas btsun mo gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas btsun mo de la sems can zhugs par gyur nas rim gyis zla ba dgu lon pa dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa zhig btsas so/_/gzhon nu de btsas pa na lus 'phags kyi ljongs rnams lo legs pa 
[\[54b.2\]]dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba mod par gyur cing lhas kyang char dus bzhin du phab/_dus dang mthun pa'i rlung yang ldang ste/_des na rtag tu bza' ba dang /_btung ba mod par gyur to/_/de nas gzhon nu'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/_gzhon nu'i ming cir 
[\[54b.3\]]gdags zhes rgyal po sems pa na gang gi phyir gzhon nu 'di btsas pa na yul du bza' ba dang /_btung ba mod par gyur pa de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming bza' btung zhes btags nas/_de nas gzhon nu bza' btung ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad do/_/gang gi tshe de chen por gyur pa 
[\[54b.4\]]de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug pa dang /_ring po ma thogs par mthar phyin par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bzo'i gnas la yang ring po ma thogs par mkhas par gyur to zhes gong ma bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de yang dpa' ba/_tsham tshom med pa/_gtum pa rem 
[\[54b.5\]]par gyur to/_/de nas btsun mo bus snyems nas rgyal po yab kyi bka' shin tu mi nyan cing zlog thabs byed par gyur to/_/rgyu des rgyal po yang mi dga' bas gdungs pa dang /_de mi dga' ba blon po rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du mi dgyes par gyur/_rgyal 
[\[54b.6\]]pos smras pa/_nga'i btsun mo bus snyems nas da ni nga'i bka' shin tu mi nyan cing zlog thabs byed de rgyu des na nga mi dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha gal te 'di bka' bzhin mi bgyid na da gzhan zhig blang bar bgyi ste/_des na 'di yang dbang du 
[\[54b.7\]]'gyur la/_lha yang gzhan dang lhan cig dgyes pa bstar par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_gang nas blang bar bya/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'di'i de nas blang bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_de dang nga mi mdza' ba yin na ji ltar de nas blang /_blon 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]pos smras pa/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'di ni chung bas gnyen du bgyis na bshes par 'gyur lags kyis thams cad du thugs khral chung bar bzhugs shig dang /_'di bdag cag gis bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/de nas blon po rnams nyi 'og gi rgyal po de'i thad du song 
[\[55a.2\]]nas der de dag gis de shin tu rangs par byas pa dang /_des smras pa ngas dam zhig bcas nas bu mo sbyin te/_gal te nga'i tsha bo zhig yod la de rgyal tshab kyi thabs sbyin na de lta na ngas sbyin par bya'o/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[55a.3\]]re zhig sngar rgyal po de la gyis la/_de gal te dam bcas pa de bzhin du btub na de'i 'og tu sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_lha rgyal tshab tu stsal bar blon po rnams kyi dad par byas pas ci nas lha'i dbon po zhig mchis na de rgyal 
[\[55a.4\]]tshab du stsal ba ye bgyi'o/_/de nas thob ste/_dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs nas de dang rgyal po skyed pa lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas btsun mo de g.yer bag che ba zhig pas ji ltar rgyal po dam pa de ltar 
[\[55a.5\]]mnyes par byas pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_khyod la dam pa ci zhig sbyin/_des thal mo sbyar nas smras pa/_gal te bdag la lhas skabs phye na bdag gi bu btsas pa gang lags pa de rgyal tshab tu stsal bar stsol/_de'i tshig thos ma thag tu rgyal po mtshon gyis gnad du 
[\[55a.6\]]bsnun pa bzhin du ting zhes byed nas bsams pa/_bdag gis 'di la dam pa sbyin par skabs phye ba dang /_'dis kyang de lta bu'i dam pa bslang la bdag gi bu bza' btung 'di yang dpa' zhing brtson pa/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_rigs dang mthun par skyes pa'i bu gcig 
[\[55a.7\]]pa yin na ji ltar na 'di btang ste gzhan rgyal thabs sbyin par byas te/_da 'di la ji ltar bya zhes the tshom skyes nas sems pa la zhugs pa dang /_re zhig na blon po rnams kyis rgyal po yid mi bde bar rig nas lha ci dgongs zhes dris pa dang /_rgyal pos de rnams la rang bzhin smras te/_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]ngas btsun mo la dam pa sbyin pa'i skabs phye ba dang /_des kyang bu zhig mchis par gyur na rgyal tshab tu stsal bar gsol zhes gsol ba btab nas/_de'i phyir nga sems khong du chud par gyur to/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha 'dir yang ma bas te/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po 
[\[55b.2\]]gang las bdag cag gis 'di bslang ba de las kyang dam 'di lta bu bcas pas stsal mod kyi/_lha 'on kyang mchis par 'gyur ram/_ma mchis par 'gyur ram/_khye'u'am bu mor 'gyur ba da dung sus 'tshal re zhig de la mchog stsol cig_/de nas rgyal pos kyang de bzhin 
[\[55b.3\]]du bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur nas zla ba dgu tshang ba dang /_gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/_de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gzhon nu 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes 
[\[55b.4\]]ming 'dogs par byed do/_/de nas rgyal po skyed pas bsams pa/_gang gi phyir 'di ma btsas pa nas rgyal srid mngon par 'dod cing mngon par dga' bas na de'i phyir gzhon nu 'di'i ming rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar btags so/_/de ma ma brgyad po 
[\[55b.5\]]rnams la gtad nas de dag gis kyang dril ba dang /_phyi ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_'o ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dkar rnams kyis bskyed nas gang gi tshe chen por gyur kyang rgyal tshab tu ma bcug go/_/de nas de'i ma mes nyi 'og gi rgyal pos lus 'phags kyi rgyal 
[\[55b.6\]]po skyed pa la pho nya btang ste/_ji ste bdag gi tsha bo rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab tu ma bcug na bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te khyod kyi gan du 'ong ngo zhes spring ba dang /_des pho nya'i tshig thos nas 'jigs skrag nas yid mi bde zhing 'dug 
[\[55b.7\]]go/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po skyed pa skrag cing mi dga' bar rig nas smras pa/_lha ci'i slad du 'di ltar mi dgyes par mdzad/_skyed pas smras pa/_nyi 'og gi rgyal po des tsha bo'i phyir pho nya btang nas pho nya de 'di skad ces ci ste nga'i tsha bo rgyal tshab tu mi gzhug na nga 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]'ongs te khyod rgyal po las phyung la nga'i tsha bo gzhug go zhes zer ro/_/de nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_lha rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab kyi thabs stsal la/_gzhon nu bza' btung 'di dgum par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po skyed pas blon 
[\[56a.2\]]po rnams la smras pa/_chos dang mi ldan pa'i tshig de lta bu ma smra shig_/'di ltar 'di na bu pha gsod pa thos kyi pha bu gsod pa ni ma yin pas nga ni de ltar gtan mi byed do/_/de dag gis smras pa/_ji ste mi dgum na yang yan lag ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal 
[\[56a.3\]]po skyed pas blon po rnams la smras pa/_gal te yan lag med par byas na bsad pa kho nar zad mod/_de nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po skyed pa'i tshig thos nas rgyal po la smras pa/_lha 'di la gzhan bgyir ci mchis/_bskrad par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_nyes 
[\[56a.4\]]pa med pa ji ltar bskrad par bya/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_ci'i slad du'ang mi bsdo ring po mi thogs par gzhon nu la nongs pa 'byung bar rngo thog gis re zhig rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba la thabs stsol cig_/de nas ni gzhon nu bza' btung rang nyid kyis 'tshal bar 
[\[56a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas rgyal po skyed pas dbang thang gi nyi ma shis pa la bkra shis dang shis par brjod pa byas nas rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal tshab kyi thabs byin no/_/de thabs byin par gzhon nu bza' btung gis thos nas bsams pa/_lhas ni bdag spangs par gyur kyis 
[\[56a.6\]]da bdag 'dir 'dug kyang ci zhig rung ste/_bdag bsad par 'ong ngo snyam nas de ma'i thad du song ste mi bde ba'i lo rgyus bshad nas smras pa/_bdag rgyal po lnga len gyi yul du mchis mkhyen par mdzod cig_/de nas de yang sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ni myos/_bu dang 
[\[56a.7\]]bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang ni ldan/_bu'i mgul nas ni 'khyud de snying rje rje skad smre sngags bton te/_smras pa/_du gul ras kyi gding bas mdzes byas pa'i/_/mal stan che la 'os par bder nyal ba/_/bu gcig da ni sa steng thang bu la/_/gos kyis phyogs gcig bting nas 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]ji ltar nyal/_/mal du bde bar nyal nas rol mo dang /_/glu sgra sna tshogs dag gis sad byas pa/_/grang dang tsha ba'i chu yis phog gyur na/_/mdangs can lus ni ji ltar nags na dga'/_/sngon chad rgyal pos gnang ba'i bza' btung dang /_/sten dang bzhon dang theg mchog la spyod 
[\[56b.2\]]pa/_/byug pa rgyan dang gos kyis phongs bzhin du/_/su yi dbang gis sdug bsngal gyur par 'khyam/_/'jig rten dang phrad skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/thal mo rab sbyar rnga sgra glu dbyangs dag_/yid dang rna 'ong rnams kyis legs mchod pa/_/skom pas mngon 
[\[56b.3\]]par gdungs bzhin gang du 'khyam/_/gzhon nus smras pa/_gtan du bde ba yang ni su zhig yod/_/gtan du sdug bsngal ba yang su zhig yod/_/mi bde ma thob pa yang su zhig yod/_/'thob par mi 'gyur ba yang su zhig yod/_/'gyur ba'i dbang gis mi rnams bde 
[\[56b.4\]]sdug ste/_/rgyu skar 'khor lo mkha' la 'khor ba bzhin/_/bde bas dga' min sdug pas mi dga' med/_/mi dbang rigs rjes 'gro ba'i rtags yin no/_/des ma la de lta bu rnam pa mang po khong du chud par byas te yul lnga len gang na ba der song ngo /_/de der grong 
[\[56b.5\]]dang nye bar phyin nas lus ngal ba dang /_lus bkres pas shing gi grib ma zhig la nyal zhing 'dug go/_/ji tsam zhig na rgyal po'i bya ba cung zad cig gi phyir lnga len gyi bkrabs pa dag gcig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang /_bza' btung grib ma de la nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong nas smras 
[\[56b.6\]]pa/_'di lta bur gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mkhrang ba/_sra ba/_legs par 'brel pa ro stod che ba/_dpung pa ring ba'i skyes bu 'di su zhig ces de dag gis de bslangs nas su'i bu yin zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag ni lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed 
[\[56b.7\]]pa'i bu bza' btung zhes bya ba yin no/_/dgos pa ci zhig gi phyir 'ongs/_des de rnams la ji ltar gyur pa smras so/_/de nas bkrabs pa de dag gis rgyal po'i bu de skyes su khyer nas lnga len gyi rgyal po'i gan du song ste bza' btung de la phul nas/_lha 'di rgyal po skyed pa'i bu 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]bza' btung zhes bgyi ba lags te/_phas 'di lta bu zhig gi slad du bskrad nas 'dir phyin pa lags so/_/de nas bza' btung gis kyang lnga len gyi rgyal po la thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do/_/yang smras pa/_mi yi bdag po skyed pa ni/_/dbang po 'dra ba'i 
[\[57a.2\]]sras 'di ste/_/gzugs ldan yon tan phun tshogs pa/_/rgyal srid nyams nas 'dir mchis so/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos mgul nas 'khyud de/_dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs smras nas dga' ba khong du chud par byas te/_de la bu mo dang yul dag kyang byin no/_/
[\[57a.3\]]de yang de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las re zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo de sems can dang ldan par gyur te zla ba dgu tshang ba dang /_khye'u gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_mthong ga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/_dpung 
[\[57a.4\]]pa ring ba/_ro stod seng ge 'dra ba zhig btsas nas/_de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas gzhon nu'i ming cir gdags snyam pa las/_bdag gi ming bza' btung yin pas 'di ni bza' btung mang po'o/_/de nas gzhon nu bza' btung mang po ma ma brgyad po rnams la gtad 
[\[57a.5\]]pa dang /_de dag gis bsku ba dang /_phyi ba dang /_bkru ba dang /_'o ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar dkar rnams kyis bskyed nas gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/_khye'u yi ge slob pa'i grwar yi ge slob tu btang ngo /_/de'i pha bza' btung ni nad kyis btab nas de sman pa dang /_
[\[57a.6\]]sman dang nad g.yog rnams kyis kyang gso bar ma nus nas dus las 'das so/_/de dus las 'das pa dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo shin tu mya ngan gyis thebs nas cho nges btab ste smre sngags 'don to/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos bsams pa/_bud med thams cad kyi bsam pa 
[\[57a.7\]]ni phal cher skyes pa 'dod pa yin pas gcig la sbyin no snyam nas/_des de dang gzhon nu bza' btung mang po dang bcas par mdun na 'don la byin no/_/de nas mdun na 'don de de dang lhan cig dga' ba rgya chen po nyams su myong bar byed do/_/re zhig mdun na 'don de'i khyim drung na 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]bya gag cig skad 'byin pa phyogs de na bram ze ltas mkhan zhig 'gro bas thos nas des mi gang gis de'i sha zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_tshig de mdun na 'don gyis thos nas des bram ze de la yang dris te/_de nas mdun na 'don gyis bya gag bzung nas bsad de 
[\[57b.2\]]chung ma la smras pa/_bya gag 'di 'phral du tshos shig dang /_nga rgyal po'i pho brang nas slar 'ong ngo zhes byas nas de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ngo /_/ji tsam na khye'u bza' btung mang po grwa nas bkres te khyim du 'ongs na ma yang mi snang ngo /_/de nas des bdag cag gi ci dag btsos/_
[\[57b.3\]]ci zhig bza' snyam nas re zhig na ma ni mi snang gi bltas na rdze'u zhig gi nang na bya gag cig mgo gyen du byung zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas des kyang rdze'u'i nang na 'dug bzhin du mgo bcad de zos so/_/ji tsam na ma 'ongs nas de la mgo sus zos zhes dris pa dang /_des 
[\[57b.4\]]bdag gis 'tshal to zhes byas pa dang /_de nas zan byin te grwar btang ngo /_/mdun na 'don kyang 'ongs nas bza' zhes byas pa dang /_bya gag gi mgrin pa mi snang nas 'di'i mgrin pa ga re/_chung mas smras pa/_khye'us 'tshal to zhes byas pa dang /_de nas bya gag 
[\[57b.5\]]gi lhag ma zos nas bsams pa/_ci re zhig bya gag ril gyis zos pas rgyal por 'gyur ram/_'on te yan lag ma tshang ba zos pas kyang rgyal por 'gyur snyam du the tshom skyes nas the tshom gcad pa'i phyir thabs gzhan zhig gis bram ze ltas mkhan de nyid bos te kye bram ze 
[\[57b.6\]]chen po khyod kyis sngar gang gis bya gag zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ci yan lag ma tshang ba zos pas der 'gyur ram/_'on te ril gyis zos pas 'gyur/_des smras pa/_yan lag ma tshang yang gang gis de'i mgo zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/yang na gang 
[\[57b.7\]]gis de'i mgo zos pa de bsad de de'i mgo zos na de nyid rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/de nas mdun na 'don gyi blo skyes pa gzhon nu 'di bsad nas 'di'i mgo bza' na mas shes par ma byas na ni gsad pa'am bza' bar mi nus pas re zhig btub bam mi btub 'di nyid kyi ma'i nyam 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]drod blang ngo snyam nas/_des snyan pa'i tshig rnam pa du mas bzhams te/_bzang mo ci khyos rgyal po byas na legs sam/_'on te bus rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras pa dang /_des zur dang snol dag las legs par brtags te bsams pa/_gal te bus 
[\[58a.2\]]rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras na/_'di bdag las gyed par 'gyur bas ci nas kyang de dang mthun par smra'o snyam nas des khyos rgyal po byas na legs so zhes smras so/_/bud med de yang mkhas shing mdzangs la dpyod pa can zhig pas des bsams na/_bya gag gi mgo'i phyir khon 
[\[58a.3\]]du bzung nas bdag gi bu bsad par chad par 'phrigs te da ni dus la bab kyis ci nas kyang bu bsrung bar bya'o snyam nas des bu la gsang ste bu khyod kyis bya gag gi mgo zos pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas kyis yul 'di nas myur du song shig_/song nas mes po rgyal po byed pa de na 
[\[58a.4\]]khyod kyi rang gi skye bo'i tshogs yod pa der bde bar 'dug shig_/de skad smras pa dang /_de bros nas lus 'phags su song ngo /_/de ngal zhing bkren skom pas lus gzir te gnas kyi nyen kor gyi skyed mos tshal gyi shing zhig gi drung du gos zhig bting nas nyal zhing 'dug go/_/de'i 
[\[58a.5\]]tshe rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba nad kyis thebs nas sman pa dang /_sman dang /_nad g.yog rnams kyis gso bar ma nus nas de shi ste rgyal po rabs chad do/_/'di ni rgyal po'i chos nyid de/_ji srid du gzhan rgyal por dbang ma bskur ba de srid du rgyal po'i ro mi 'byin to/_/ci tsam 
[\[58a.6\]]na blon po rnams dang /_rgyal po'i mi gzhan dang /_bram ze dang /_ltas mkhan rnams gal te bsod nams kyis dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can 'ga' zhig rnyed na de rgyal srid la gzhag go zhes phan tshun tshol zhing song ste/_de rnams kyis btsal ba las grong khyer gyi phyi rol 
[\[58a.7\]]shing drung zhig na khye'u gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_mthong ka seng ge 'dra ba/_nyi ma yol yang shing gi grib ma shar phyogs su mi 'khor bar de'i lus mi gtong ba zhig nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas blon po drug po de rnams kyis de mthong nas 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]ngo mtshar du gyur te smras pa/_bdag cag gi bsod nams kyis dbang che bar grags pa'i sems can 'di las gzhan bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa ma mthong ngo /_/yang 'di ni gzugs bzang ba/_blta na sdug pa/_mdzes pa/_mtshan dang ldan pa zhig pas 'di ni rgyal srid la gzhag 
[\[58b.2\]]par 'os so zhes gcig tu nges par byas nas bu longs longs zhes bslang ngo /_/de yang langs te dris pa/_nga bslang ste ci bya/_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal por gzhug go/_/des smras pa/_rgyal po nyal ba de ltar bslang ngam/_blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_'o na ji ltar 
[\[58b.3\]]bslang /_gzhon nus smras pa/_glu dang /_sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra mi grag pas bslang mod/_de rnams kyis de thos pa dang 'di snyam du 'di ni rigs dma' ba las byung ba ma yin gyi 'di nges par rigs mthon po las skyes pa yin no snyam nas de dag gis dris pa/_khyod su zhig_/
[\[58b.4\]]su'i bu yin/_de nas khye'u gzhon nu des kyang seng ge'i bzhin du bsgyengs nas rang gi rigs smras pa/_lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed pa zhes bya ba de'i bu ni bza' btung ngo /_/bza' btung de'i bu ni bza' btung mang po zhes bya ste nga yin no/_/de nas blon po drug po rnams 'dzum 
[\[58b.5\]]phyung nas bdag cag gis ni bdag cag nyid kyi gzhon nu rnyed do zhes smras so/_/de nas gnas de nyid nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongs su bskor cing glu dang /_sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_shis par brjod pa la sogs pas mdun du drangs te grong khyer du bcug nas 
[\[58b.6\]]rgyal por dbang bskur to/_/gang gi phyir 'dis rgyal po'i rgyud chad pa bsabs pa de'i phyir ming skyed pa kho nar btags nas/_de'i ming bza' btung mang po zhes bya ba gang yin pa de med par gyur to/_/de nas de rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa na byis pa'o snyam nas blon po rnams kyis de khyad du 
[\[58b.7\]]bsad de de la dbang cung zad kyang med do/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po bza' btung mang po yul bltar song ste/_des grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_tshong dus rnams bltas nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ri 'or pa 'di rnams su'i yin zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis blon 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]po de drug kho na'i lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de gcig pus bsams pa/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ri 'or pa 'di su'i yin zhes de skad du gang dang gang las dris pa de dag thams cad de skad zer bas bdag lta zhig bza' ba dang bgo ba tsam la dbang phyug byed 
[\[59a.2\]]kyi gzhan ci la yang ma yin no snyam du rang gis rig nas de sems khong gi rgya mtshor chud nas 'di ji ltar bya zhes sems so/_/de de ltar sems pa na lha zhig gis rgyal po mi dga' bar ma byed cig_/'di ltar khyod nyid kyi yul na ri 'or gang po'i mtshan zhes bya ba de na sna la gtogs pa gang 
[\[59a.3\]]po zhes bya ba de la bu sman chen po zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur gyis de khyod kyis blon por chug shig dang /_des yul bdag gir byas nas khyod la 'bul bas khyod la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_'dod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o/_/de nas bza' btung mang pos mi 
[\[59a.4\]]dag mngags te ri 'or gang po'i mtshan de na sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de tshol to/_/gal te rnyed dang de'i chung ma la bu yod dam med rtogs shig ces bsgo'o/_/de dag song ste mthong nas dris na des bdag gi chung ma la bu yod do zhes smras pa dang /_de dag slar 'ongs nas 
[\[59a.5\]]rgyal po la gsol pa/_rgyal po sna la gtogs pa de mchis te de'i mchis 'brang yang sbrum lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos yi ge spring ste/_gang po bkug nas bshes pa'i tshig gis de la ri 'or de byin nas 'dir rang gi bu ma'i lto na 'dug pa de deng phyin chad yongs su 
[\[59a.6\]]skyongs la ci nas kyang de yan lag gang yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas de zla ba dgu tshang ba dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas ci 'byor ba'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te/_khye'u 'di ming cir gdags 
[\[59a.7\]]zhes byas na de'i mas smras pa/_bdag 'di ltar yun [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]nad bu can du gyur te/_sman pa dang sman dang /_nad g.yog rnams kyis nad zhi bar bya ma nus pa las gang gi tshe khye'u 'di ltor zhugs pa de nyid nas nad zhi bar gyur pas des na 'di'i ming sman chen por gdags so/_/smras 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]pa/_sman rnams kun gyi nang na ni/_/bdag gi bu ni sman chen po/_/'di ni sman pas lhag pa'i sman/_/de ltas 'di'i ming sman yin no/_/de nas sman chen po pha'i phrag pa la zhon te khrus bya ba'i phyir srang gi dbus nas rdzing bur khyer te song ba las re zhig na sa'i steng na nya'i dum 
[\[59b.2\]]bu zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/_des de la rin po che yin no snyam nas de rkang pa'i mthe bos sa'i steng nas blang bar brtsams pa dang /_ji tsam na sman chen pos smras pa/_pha gcig gang po rin chen lhung snyam ste/_/las btang mig mi 'dzums par nya dum la/_/rtog cing de nas rin 
[\[59b.3\]]chen yin par sems/_/pha gcig gang po rtogs shig rin chen min/_/nya dum dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar zad/_/rnam thos bu de bag med spyod ma yin/_/de nas de rdzing du song nas gang pos sman chen po dang /_gos rdzing 'gram du bzhag ste khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs 
[\[59b.4\]]pa na pad ma'i steng na chu skyar zhig 'dug pa dang des chu skyar de bzung ngo snyam nas de de'i drung du song ba dang /_de yang de nas 'phur to/_/de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_pad ma'i steng nas chu skyar 'phur/_/chu skyar 'phur bas pad ma lhags/_/pad ma'i steng nas chu skyar mo/_/'phur 
[\[59b.5\]]ba re zhig pha gcig gzigs/_/de nas yang dus phyi zhig na des sman chen po phrag pa la khyer nas chu bo gang gAr khrus byed du song ste/_des de dang gos chu 'gram du bzhag nas chur zhugs te khrus byed pa na khar gzhong zhig chu bos khyer ba de'i steng na ngang mo zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de mthong 
[\[59b.6\]]nas sman chen pos smras pa/_chu bo gang gAs khar gzhong khyer/_/khar gzhong de steng ngang mo 'dug_/khar gzhong ngang mo lhan cig tu/_/gang gAs khyer ba pha gcig gzigs/_/ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed cing sman chen po chu 'gram du gzhag pa dang /_re zhig na chu 
[\[59b.7\]]bo gang gA'i rgyun phyogs su bum pa zhig khyer ba de'i steng na chu sregs zhig 'dug pa de mthong nas sman chen pos pha la smras pa/_chu bo gang gAs bum pa khyer/_/de yi steng na chu sregs 'dug_/re zhig pha gcig bum pa ni/_/chu sregs gang gA bcas te gzigs/_/ji tsam dus 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed par 'dod nas chu bo gang gAr song ste/_des sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag nas der khrus byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_re zhig na chu bo gang gA'i rgyun phyogs su lug thug cig khyer ba de'i steng na bya gar zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[60a.2\]]de sman chen pos mthong nas smras pa/_chu bo gang gAs lug thug khyer/_/de bzhin de steng bya gar 'dug_/lug thug bya gar lhan cig tu/_/gang gAs khyer ba yab gcig gzigs/_/de nas sman chen po de na byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba las re zhig na byis pa de 
[\[60a.3\]]dag 'dus nas de rgyal por bcug go/_/des kyang kha cig blon por bcug nas de de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug go/_/ci tsam na bram ze rgan po zhig chung ma gzhon nu dar la bab pa zhig dang khyo shug lhan cig tu lam du zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las re zhig na 
[\[60a.4\]]bram ze bshang gci'i sar song ngo /_/de nas g.yon can pho zhig gis 'phrigs nas bud med de'i drung du song ste smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyi pha de gar song /_bud med kyis smras pa/_gang zhig_/de nas g.yon can gyis smras pa/_de mes po yin pa lta zhig_/smras pa/_'di 
[\[60a.5\]]ci zer ba zhig_/de nas g.yon can gyis smras pa/_de khyod kyi yang mes po yin pa lta zhig_/bud med kyis smras pa/_nga'i pha yang ma yin/_mes po yang ma yin/_yang mes po yang ma yin gyi de ni nga'i khyo yin no/_/de nas g.yon can gyis cung zad cig bgad de smras pa/_blun 
[\[60a.6\]]mo khyod grogs mo'am ngo tsha shes pa gzhan gyi drung du 'di lta bu nga'i khyo yin no zhes smra ba ngo mi tsha'am/_sa skal ba ldan pa 'di'i steng na skyes bu lha'i gzugs 'dra bas rab tu gang ba khyod kyis ma mthong ngam/_'di lta bu'i gzugs mdzes pa chud zos so/_/ngas khyod kyi khyo byas tshur 
[\[60a.7\]]bdag cag lhan cig 'dong /_gal te khyod kyi phyir bram ze rgan po dang nga 'thab mo byung dang der yang khyod kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po la nga'i khyo 'di yin no zhes nga khyo yin par phye shig ces byas pa dang de dang g.yon can 'grogs te song ngo /_/bram ze yang bshang gci dang bkru bshal byas nas 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]langs pa dang /_des de ma mthong ngo /_/re zhig na sgang bu mthon po zhig gi steng du 'dzegs nas bltas na skyes pa gzhan zhig dang 'grogs te song ba mthong nas bram ze des brgyugs te lag pa ya gcig nas bzung ngo /_/g.yon can gyis kyang lag pa ya gcig nas bzung ba dang de nas bram 
[\[60b.2\]]zes smras pa/_nga'i chung ma ci'i phyir dbrog_/g.yon can gyis smras pa/_'di nga'i chung ma yin na/_kye ma khyod re'o brgyal/_bram zes kyang nga'i yin no/_/zhes smras nas de gnyis lam kar 'thab mo byung ste phar drangs tshur drangs pa dang /_g.yon can de dar la bab pas 
[\[60b.3\]]stobs che nas bram ze las drangs te phrogs so/_/de nas bram ze bcom pas 'brog der bram zer ma byas kyis ra mda' log ces byas so/_/de'i tshe na sman chen po byis pa rnams dang lhan cig dgon pa na rtse zhing 'dug pa las bram zer ma byas so zhes bya ba de yang byis pa dag gis 
[\[60b.4\]]thos so/_/de nas byis pa de dag gis smras pa/_kye sman chen po khyed cag na re nga rgyal po'o zhe na/_bram ze pha bi bram zer ma byas so zhes 'bod na/_de ci'i phyir 'jigs pa las mi skyob/_de nas des byis pa rnams la song ste khrid de shog shig ces bkye ba dang /_byis pa de dag 
[\[60b.5\]]gis de kun khrid de 'ongs so/_/'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_bram zes smras pa/_bdag grogs ma mchis shing nyam chung ba'i chung ma g.yon can stobs po che 'dis phrogs so/_/g.yon can gyis smras pa/_'di [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mchi ste/_'di ni bdag gi chung ma lags so/_/bud med 
[\[60b.6\]]des kyang bdag gi khyo 'di lags so zhes g.yon can de nyid yin par phye'o/_/de nas sman chen pos bram ze de ma 'os par yi chad par shes nas bgam par bya'o snyam nas/_kye nang rje khyod da gzod bud med 'di dang 'grogs te gang nas 'ongs/_g.yon can gyis smras pa/_gyos 
[\[60b.7\]]po'i khyim nas mchis so/_/der ci dag zos sam 'thungs/_des smras pa/_sha dang snum khur dang be tang dang chang dag 'tshal to//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa/_sman chen pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang /_
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bden nam [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]blta'o zhes smras pa dang /_des mdzub mo khar bcug ste/_skyugs na kha zas de lta bur cang ma byung ngo /_/bram ze de la gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_bram ze des gyos po'i khyim nas mchis so zhes smras so/_/der ci zos des dar 
[\[61a.2\]]ba dang zan dang la phug dang nas kyi khu ba rnams zos zhes smras so/_/des skyugs shig ces bsgo ba dang /_des skyugs pa dang /_ci zos ci 'thungs pa mngon du byung ngo /_/de lta bur gyur nas sman chen pos skyes pa g.yon can 'dis ni gzhon nu ma bslus te bram ze'i chung ma 
[\[61a.3\]]phrogs so snyam bsams nas g.yon can de dbyug pa dang khu tshur gyis brdegs nas mi nub pa'i dong brkos te mgrin pa man chad bcug nas rma bya'i mkhris pas phral bar bris te gang su yang rung /_bud med la 'di bzhin du rku na sman chen pos 'di lta bu'i chad pas gcad do/_/gang 
[\[61a.4\]]gis bud med brkus pa bzhin du rgyas par byis pa rku ba dang /_glang rku ba dang /_la ba rku ba dang /_skud pa rku ba la sogs pa 'di lta bu lnga brgya tsam bzung nas dbyig pa dang /_khu tshur gyis brdegs te mgrin pa man chad dong du bcug nas phral bar rma bya'i mkhris pas de rnams kyi 
[\[61a.5\]]ming dang /_gzhan gang yang rung rkun po byed na thams cad sman chen pos 'di ltar chad pas gcad ces bris so/_/de nas blon po drug gis yul sa mngon du zos par rgyal pos mthong nas 'di snyam du blo skyes so/_/sman chen po de da ltar ci 'dra bar 'dug pa ltad mo blta'o snyam 
[\[61a.6\]]nas/_blon po rnams la nga ni [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro'o zhes byas la ri brags kyi grong rdal du blta'o snyam nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]shor du 'gro ba ltar byas te 'khor mang po 'dus pa dang ri brags kyi grong rdal logs su chas pa dang /_g.yon can lnga brgya sa'i dong du bcug pas rgyal po de mthong 
[\[61a.7\]]nas mang po kun gyis rgyal po zhes bos so/_/rgyal pos sgra de thos na mi mi snang nas kun du bltas kyang de skad kyi sgra grag nas de la g.yon can gcig gis mthong nas rgyal po la bzlas te/_rgyal pos bltas pa dang phral ba la rma bya'i mkhris pas bris pa bklags na/_gang bud med rku ba dang /_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]byis pa rku ba dang /_glang rku ba dang /_la ba rku ba la sogs pa rnams sman chen pos 'di lta bu'i chad pas gcad do zhes bris so/_/sman chen po la sogs pa byis pa de rnams rgyal po 'ong ba mthong nas kun du bros so/_/de nas rgyal po des de'i las byas pa mthong nas sems la dga' mgu 
[\[61b.2\]]ste byis pa yin mod kyi 'di lta bu byed pa la bltas na 'di dag nyes pa ni ma yin no snyam bsams nas rgyal pos de dag phyung ste bkye'o/_/pUr+Na kats+tsha na gang pos rgyal po der phyin pa thos nas bum pa chus bkang ba dang /_gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_rgyal mtshan la sogs pas bsu ba dang /_rgyal 
[\[61b.3\]]pos kyang ma 'jigs shig ces byas nas gang po la khyod kyi bu bltas khrid de shog ces smras pa dang /_gang pos lha byis pa chung ches pas na de lha'i spyan sngar mi dgug go zhes gsol to/_/rgyal pos yang khrid de shog ces smras pa dang /_de nas phas khrid de 'ongs nas rgyal pos 
[\[61b.4\]]bltas na gzugs legs shing /_blta na sdug pa/_bzang ba/_dpa' bo zhig na/_byis pa ste shed ma rdzogs nas de'i pha la rnam pa du mar bsgo zhing gtang nas slar chas so/_/dus phyi zhig na rgyal pos sman chen po de blo ci bdog pa bgam na ci 'dri bar bya zhes bsams nas 
[\[61b.5\]]rgyal po skyed pas pUr+Na kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du grong dpon gang po la pho nya btang nas bye ma las byas pa'i thag pa khru brgya pa cig 'dir skur cig ces spring ste/_pho nya de song nas ri brags kyi grong rdal du gang po'i drung du phyin nas rgyal pos bka' stsal pa/_bye ma las byas pa'i 
[\[61b.6\]]thag pa khru brgya pa cig bskur cig ces byas pa dang /_grong dpon gang pos de thos nas rab tu sems shing mi dga' skrag sngangs te/_bdag 'di tsam du skyes nas ma mthong ma thos pa'i klan ka zhig bdag la tshol lo zhes smras te shin tu mi dga' ba dang /_gang po la sman chen pos 
[\[61b.7\]]pha ci nyes te mi dga' zhes dris pa dang /_phas bu bdag gis tshor kyang ma thos ma mthong ba rgyal pos phas ni ci'i thabs zhig gis chad pas gcod par byed dam mi shes so zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_mi de bdag dang sprod cig dang rgyal po skyed pa la lan 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]bdag gis spring ngo zhes byas pa dang /_phas pho nya dang sprad pa dang /_sman chen pos pho nya la bdag gi gsol ba 'di rgyal po la ma brjed par gyis shig_/bdag cag yul skol ba blo rtsing la mi mkhas shing blun pas ma 'tshal te/_rgyal po bka' stsal na bkal 
[\[62a.2\]]bar 'tshal na lhas dpe khru gang pa cig bkal te bdag la skur na dpe de las bltas khru brgya bas stong yang bkal te rdo thog par bgyis nas bskur bar 'tshal lo zhes spring ba dang /_de song ste rgyal po la lha khong ta 'di skad mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_'di skad 
[\[62a.3\]]gang po zer ram bu zer zhes dris na pho nyas lha sman chen po gzhon nu 'di skad mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te bsams pa/_'di ni lhas bstan pa yang dag ste/_'dis ni bdag gi rgyal srid rgyas par byed par mngon no/_/de nas yang dus phyis zhig na 
[\[62a.4\]]rgyal pos sman chen po bgam par 'dod nas pUr+Na kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du gang po'i drung du pho nya btang ste 'bras chan gtun gyis kyang ma brdungs la dum bur chag pa yang med par gyis te/_khyim gyi nang na yang ma yin/_phyi rol kyang ma yin/_mes kyang ma yin/_me med 
[\[62a.5\]]par yang ma yin par tshos la/_lam du yang khyer te mi 'ong /_lam ma yin par yang khyer te mi 'ong /_nyi mas kyang ma phog_/grib ma yang ma yin/_bud med kyis kyang mi bskur/_skyes pas kyang ma yin/_bzhon pas mi bskur/_rkang pas kyang ma yin par 
[\[62a.6\]]'bras chan zhig bskur cig ces spring ba dang /_rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas pho nya de rim gyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal lta zhing rim gyis ri brags kyi grong rdal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gang po de bos te/_gang po de dang dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas 
[\[62a.7\]]nas/_de nas rgyal po'i tshig ji lta bu kun bsgo nas rgyal pos bka' 'di skad ces stsal to/_/zhes smras pa dang /_des tshig de thos ma thag tu de shin tu mi dga' rab tu mi dga' ba dang /_sman chen pos pha ci nyes te yi ma rangs zhes dris pa dang /_gang pos bu ci nyes te 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]mi sems/_rgyal po skyed pas rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bsgo'o zhes smras so/_/ji lta bu zhes dris pa dang /_gang pos snga ma bzhin du thams cad zhib tu smras pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_pha mi dga' bar ma byed cig_/bdag gis kun nus par bya'o/_/de 
[\[62b.2\]]nas sman chen pos 'bras nyi ma la bskams nas skyes pa dang /_bud med phal po che sogs te mi gcig kyang 'bras spar re re byin nas sen mos shus la ma chag par byos te 'bru re re nas sol cig_/de dag gis ma chag par bsal te rdze'ur blugs te sgo'i them pa'i steng du btsos 
[\[62b.3\]]nas mes kyang ma yin/_me med par kyang ma yin par tshos shig pa de ni de'i ngos su ni me steng du ni nyi mas btsos so/_/lam du ma yin/_lam ma yin par yang ma yin par khyer te shog shig pa ni skyes bu la bsgo ba/_rkang pa ya gcig lam du song la rkang pa ya gcig lam ma yin par 
[\[62b.4\]]song shig_/nyi ma la yang ma yin/_grib ma la yang khyer te ma 'ong shig pa ni mi de la bsgo ba dbyug pa'i rtse mo la rdze'u chings la gos srab mos g.yogs te song shig_/bzhon pas kyang ma yin/_rkang pas kyang ma yin par khyer te shog shig pa ni mi de la bsgo ba/_rkang pa ya gcig lham 
[\[62b.5\]]gyon ya gcig lham med par byos la song shig_/skyes pas kyang ma yin/_bud med kyis kyang ma yin pas khyer te shog shig pa ni ma ning la bskur ro/_/rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du des khyer te 'ongs nas/_rgyal po skyed pas mi de la dris pa/_des rgyal po la zhib tu smras pa dang /_
[\[62b.6\]]rgyal pos thos nas dga' ste/_ci gang pos bsgos te bskur ram/_'on te sman chen pos bsgo zhes dris pa dang /_pho nyas sman chen pos bskur ro zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_sman chen po de ni rtogs pa dang /_lan ldon pa dang /_tshul dang /_cho ga la 
[\[62b.7\]]sogs par ldan no/_/de nas dus phyis zhig na pho nya gzhan zhig btang ste 'di ltar skyed mos tshal ldum ra dang /_bza' shing dang /_rdzing bu ldan pa skur cig ces spring ba dang /_de nas pho nya de pUr+Na kats+tsha'i grong rdal du phyin pa dang /_gang po la rgyal pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[63a\]]
