[\[63a.1\]]to/_/skyed mos tshal ldum ra dang /_bza' shing dang /_rdzing bu bcas pa zhig skur cig ces bsgo ba dang /_gang pos de thos nas mi dga' ste/_skyed mos tshal 'di sngon ma mthong na thabs ji lta bur bya zhes rab tu sems pa dang /_de nas sman chen po 
[\[63a.2\]]gzhon nus pha sems pa mthong nas sman chen pos smras pa/_pha ci zhig mi dga' zhes dris pa dang /_gang pos de la bu ci'i phyir mi dga' bar mi 'gyur/_rgyal pos bdag la 'di skad du bsgo ste/_skyed mos tshal ldum ra dang /_bza' shing dang /_rdzing bur ldan pa zhig skur cig ce na 
[\[63a.3\]]ji lta bur sbyar zhes smras pa dang /_sman chen pos smras pa/_bsam pa ma mdzad cig_/rgyal po ji ltar mnyes par 'gyur ba bdag gis de ltar bgyi'o/_/de nas pho nya bos nas sman chen pos smras pa/_rgyal po la slar 'di skad ces gsol cig_/ri brags kyi skyed mos tshal 'di 
[\[63a.4\]]dag ni legs par ni ci yang ma 'tshal na ji ltar bgyis na mchi bar 'gyur ba rgyal po'i pho brang gi skyed mos tshal zhig rgyal pos bskur bar gsol/_phas kyi skyed mos tshal de ji ltar mchi ba bltas te bslabs nas/_de'i rjes bzhin du gtang bar 'tshal lo zhes spring ba dang /_de nas 
[\[63a.5\]]pho nya de slar btang ste rgyal po la des ji ltar spring ba bzhin gsol to/_/rgyal po dga' ste ci gang po rang gi blos smras pa yin nam/_'on te sman chen pos smras pa yin zhes dris pa dang /_de nas pho nyas sman chen pos spring ba lags so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_'di 
[\[63a.6\]]ltar gzhon nu de ni shes rab dang ldan pa zhig go zhes bsams nas/_yang dus phyi zhig na pho nya de lta bu zhig btang nas/_ri brags kyi grong rdal der shing skyed la lo gcig lon pa de la me tog dang ldan pa'i 'bras bur ldan pa zhig skur cig ces spring ba dang /_pho nya de song ste gang po la 
[\[63a.7\]]bsgo ba dang /_gang po snga ma bzhin du rab tu sems nas mi dga' ba sman chen pos mthong nas smras pa/_pha mi dga' bar ma mdzad cig don de mi dka'o zhes smras nas/_des e raN+Da'i shing zhig bskyed nas bskur te de'i lo la 'bras bu dang /_me tog byung ba rgyal pos mthong nas 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]ngo mtshar bar bsams te/_pho nya la 'di ci gang po'i thabs sam/_sman chen po'am su'i zhes smras pa dang /_pho nyas smras pa/_sman chen po'i lags so/_/legs so legs so zhes smras nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal pos ri brags kyi grong rdal 
[\[63b.2\]]der gang po la glang lnga brgya bdas nas 'di rnams la rtswa byin te zhos la 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_pris ma dang /_chur ba rnams byos la skur cig_/pho nya des rgyal po'i bka' mnyan te rim gyis grong du song nas gang po la yid ches pa'i tshig gis byas nas bos te 
[\[63b.3\]]smras pa/_rgyal pos glang lnga brgya po 'di bdas te 'di rnams zhos la 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar dang /_pris ma dang /_chur ba gyis la skur cig ces byung ngo /_/gang po de skad du thos nas yi chad de grong mi gzhan dag la smras pa/_rgyal po ni thabs 'di lta bus chad pas gcad 
[\[63b.4\]]par nges nas glang las 'o ma gyis shig ces byung nas rab tu sems shing 'dug pa dang /_sman chen pos smras pa/_pha khyod mi dga' bar ma mdzad cig dang /_bdag gis de'i lan bsams la ji nas rgyal po mnyes par gyur cing de rnams kyang byed du mi gzhug_/de nas sman 
[\[63b.5\]]chen pos spad gnyis shig bslabs te btang nas khyod grong khyer chen por rgyal po las mi ring ba zhig tu song la shing gi gzhong khung cig ltor chor la gos kyis dkris te sa la phar 'gre tshur 'gre zhing ngu ba ltar byos shig_/de nas khye'u khyod kyis phyogs kun du gsol ba thob la me tog dang /_
[\[63b.6\]]spos dang /_bshos kyis phyogs bcur gtor la pha 'di bde zhing legs la bkra shis par bu byung zhig ces brjod cig_/de spad gnyis ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du yul pUr+Na kats+tsha'i grong rdal nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ste/_mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug nas ji ltar bstan pa'i 
[\[63b.7\]]chos dang /_smre zhing ngu ba la sogs pa byas te/_gang 'jig rten na 'jig rten skyong bas bdag gi pha 'di srung la bde zhing legs la bkra shis par bu btsas par shog shig ces de skad du bos pa rgyal po skyed pas thos nas de ci rtogs shig ces mi gcig btang ngo /_/de song ste bltas na skyes 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]pa zhig gsus pa che la sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu ba mthong ngo /_/de'i bu yang gshin rje dang /_klu'i rgyal po dang /_ngal bso po dang /_ba sa la sogs pa lha'i dbang po rnams la gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ste/_de dag gis de ci'i phyir zhes dris na/_de nas khye'us 
[\[64a.2\]]bdag gis pha las bu 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de dag gis dong nas rgyal po la gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos de spad gnyis bos nas khye'u des bdag gi pha las bu byung bar shog shig ces de bzhin du smra'o/_/de nas rgyal pos bgad de ngas gang na yang 'di ltar skyes pa las bu byung ba 
[\[64a.3\]]ni ma thos ma mthong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de nas khye'u des lha khyod de bzhin du gsung ba bzhin lags sam/_de bzhin no/_/de nas khye'u des de ltar na ci'i slad du pUr+Na kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du glang lnga brgya bdas te 'di rnams las 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar dang /_chur ba dag skur 
[\[64a.4\]]cig ces byung na khyod kyis glang sbrum ste bu byung ba gang na gzigs/_gang na gsan ces smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos bgad de ci gang po'i yid brtan pa pha zer ram 'on te sman chen po'i 'am su'i zhes dris pa dang /_pho nyas lha sman chen po lags so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po 
[\[64a.5\]]rnams kyis shin tu ngo mtshar dang ldan par bzung ngo /_/de nas yang dus phyi zhig na rgyal pos bgam pa'i phyir pho nya dre'u cig bkri ste btang nas pUr+Na kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong du song ste/_gang po la dre'u 'di ma bcing bar srung shig_/bla gab yod par ma gzhug par 'tsho shig ces bsgo shig_/
[\[64a.6\]]pho nya de rim bzhin du pUr+Na kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong rdal du song ste/_gang po la khyod kyis dre'u 'di srung shig_/de lta bu'i tshul las brgyal shor na lus la chad pas cher gcad do zhes bsgo ba dang /_de de skad thos nas skrag ste/_de dag thams cad ni byar rung gi da ni 'di la mi rung ste/_
[\[64a.7\]]des bdag la 'di 'dra bar bka' stsal pa ni lhas kyang bde bar byed mi nus so snyam ste rab tu sems shing 'dug pa dang /_sman chen pos pha rab tu sems par mthong nas mi dga' bar ma byed cig ces smras te dre'u de nyin mo ni gzas la ci bder btsas nas nub mo mi nyi shus bskor nas mi lnga lngas 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]mel tse thun re rer byas nas rkang lag la mi re res bzung dre'u de'i steng du rtag par mi gcig zhon te 'dug go/_/thabs de lta bur mi nyi shus bla gab med pa la srung zhing 'dug go/_/rgyal po skyed pas mngag gzhug byed pa'i mi gcig gang po'i drung du de ji ltar 'tsho ltos shig ces rtog tu btang ngo /_/
[\[64b.2\]]des mthong ste rgyal po la lha 'di lta bu'i thabs su bgyid do zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos de ltar bsrungs na 'bros mi nus kyis mi de rnams las gcig kha drang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_blon pos gang kha drang bar bgyi zhes zhus pa dang /_rgyal pos nub mo steng na zhon pa de kha drangs na/_
[\[64b.3\]]gzhan gnyid kyis log pa dang /_de khrid de 'ong ngo zhes smras te/_de nas rgyal pos steng na zhon pa de kha drangs nas des kyang dre'u khyer te 'ongs so/_/nam langs pa dang gang po la dre'u de bros so zhes smras pa dang /_deng ni bdag gi 'tsho ba ma rung bar gyur to zhes skrag nas smre 
[\[64b.4\]]sngags 'don par byed pa ni gang ji ltar bya zhes de mi dga' zhing 'dug pa sman chen pos mthong nas de yang sems pa la zhugs te thabs de dag thams cad ni thabs kyis bsgrubs na 'di'i thabs ni mi snang ngo zhes mi smra ste/_de yang skrag nas de'i thabs sems pa las des pha la khyod kyis 
[\[64b.5\]]don de bsgrub par nus na thabs gcig yod do zhes smras so/_/phas ci zhig yod ces dris pa dang /_sman chen pos ji nas bdag nyid la mtho btsam par bzod na gdod don sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de nas gang pos smras pa/_ji nas bdag gi 'tsho ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur 
[\[64b.6\]]ba de ltar gyis shig_/de nas sman chen pos pha'i mgo bo skra khrem gnyer bdun du bregs te le kru dang /_snag tsa dang /_mthing shing dang /_dkar po la sogs pas mgo ri mor byas nas bong bu la bskyon te/_rim gyis grong khyer chen por dong ba dang /_sman chen po 'ong ngo zhes kun du sgra 
[\[64b.7\]]bsgrags so/_/des pha'i mgo bo khrem gnyer bdun du bregs shing bong bu la zhon te 'ongs so zhes kyang grags so/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dag gis de lta bur gyur pa thos nas smras pa/_de mkhas pa'o/_/mdzangs pa'o zhes gtam snyan pa thams cad du grags pa ni 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]legs na ci'i phyir na mi rigs pa 'di lta bu byas/_de nas rgyal po skyed pa blon po dang 'khor du bcas nas sman chen po ltar dong ste/_ci de 'dra ba dang 'ong ngam/_'on te [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas de lta bu mngon sum du mthong ba dang /_blon po dag 
[\[65a.2\]]gis rgyal po la lha ci'i phyir sman chen po la mkhas pa'o/_/gsal ba'o/_/mdzangs pa'o zhes bsngags/_des mi rigs pa 'di lta bu bgyid pa gda'a'am zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos sman chen po la sman chen po ci 'di lta bur pha la mtho btsam par byas zhes dris pa 
[\[65a.3\]]dang /_des smras pa/_lha 'di ni mtho btsam pa ma lags kyis mchod par bgyis te bdag kyang pha bas shin tu mang du 'tshal bas na bdag gis 'di la rnam par mchod par bgyis so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci khyod bzang ngam/_'on te pha bzang /_des bdag bzang gi pha ngan 
[\[65a.4\]]to zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_pha bas bu bzang ba ni ngas gang du yang ma thos ma mthong mod kyi phas bu grags par byed/_mas ni gso ba dang skyed pa dang srung ba'i phyir te/_de bas na nged kyis ni ci nas pha bzang ba yin no snyam du bsams so/_/de nas sman chen pos rgyal 
[\[65a.5\]]po la yang pha de ltar lags sam ma lags shin tu rtogs shig ces smras pa dang /_rgyal po dang blon pos de bzhin yin gyi gzhan ma yin no zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te lha de ltar lags mad na/_lhas bdag cag la dre'u 'tshor stsal pa de 
[\[65a.6\]]bros te/_lha dang blon po rnams kyis bka' stsal pa yang pha rab tu bzang ngo zhes bstod na/_dre'u de'i pha ni bong bu 'di lags na skyin par bzhes par gsol zhes smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal po dang blon pos de'i tshig gis thabs de lta bur sbyar ba thos nas ya mtshan du bzung zhing e ma ho zhes 
[\[65a.7\]]te rigs pa dang mi rigs par bya ba 'di lta bu mkhas so/_/de lta bur khong du chud de rgyal po mgu rangs rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes nas rnam pa mang po'i rgyan bklubs te blon po'i dbang byin no/_/pha la yang ri brags kyi grong de byin no/_/bar gyi sdom ste/_bye ma bkal ba 'bras can dang /_/
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]e ran Da yi shing dang glang /_/dre'u dang de ru song ba dang /_/de la blon po'i thabs byin pa'o/_/de nas sman chen pos blon po'i dbang byin pa dang ci bya ba dang /_rgyal po'i don ji ltar bya zhes rab tu bde bar sems pa la zhugs pa dang /_grong khyer kun tu yang sman chen po blon por 
[\[65b.2\]]bcug ste mdzangs la mkhas pa'i sgra sgrogs so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na bram ze zhig gis bu mo zhig bag mar blangs pa'i yo byad du nor mang zhig zad nas de dang lhan cig mang zhig tu yongs su spyad de bdag gis bag ma blangs pa'i yo byad du nor mang du zad pas da ni 'di ltar nor du 
[\[65b.3\]]'gyur ba chen po med la khyim na 'dug na ma legs par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams te/_bram ze de kha ton mang du lobs pa smrang dang smrang gi yan lag tu ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa nor bsgrubs pa'i phyir ljongs gzhan du song ngo /_/de yang de na mthar gyis rgyu zhing song ba las des gser gyi dong 
[\[65b.4\]]tse gna' ma lnga brgya rnyed de de khyer nas slar bdag gi khyim du 'ongs so/_/des bdag sngar nor khyer la khyim du mi 'jug go/_/bud med kyi sems kyi spyod pa sus kyang mi rig ste/_bram ze mo de yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang bas na bdag med pa'i phyin skyes pa gzhan dang chags shing 
[\[65b.5\]]'dug kyang srid kyis snyam du bsams nas/_des nam sros pa dang /_dur khrod du song nas shing n+ya gro d+hA'i drung du khung brkos nas de'i nang du bcug ste nam sros nas khyim du phyin pa dang /_chung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan bram ze rna bo che zhes bya ba de la chags te/_de'i tshe na lhan cig kha zas 
[\[65b.6\]]zhim po zos nas bsung zhim pos lus byugs te nyal/_mal gyi steng na de gnyis dga' ba myong zhing 'khod pa las bram ze de yang bdag gi khyim du phyin nas sgo phye zhes bos pa dang /_bud med des smras pa/_kye khyed su zhig ces smras so/_/des bdag gi ming phyung ba dang /_mo 
[\[65b.7\]]nyid kyis dga' dang mgu ba'i sgra phyung nas rna bo che nyal nas bslang ste/_mal gyi 'og tu sbas nas sgo 'byed du 'ongs te/_des khyo la g.yo byed cing rjes byas te 'ongs nas/_sgo phye ste ngus nas mgrin pa nas 'jus mchod pa dang yon 'bul lo/_/zas bsod pa byin no/_/bram ze de za zhing 'di 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]ni skyes pa gzhan zhig la chags par nges pas na 'di ltar mtshan mo kha zas 'di lta bu sbyar ro snyam du bsams so/_/de yang drang ba'i rang bzhin can zhig ste/_de la kye bzang mo tshes grangs can ni ma yin dus kyi ston mo'am/_grong khyer gyi dus kyi ston mo la ni ma 
[\[66a.2\]]bab na bza' 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_bdag la lhas khyod kyi khyo deng 'ong ngo zhes bstan pas na/_khyod kyi phyir 'di ltar sta gon bgyis so zhes smras so/_/bram zes e ma ho nga ni bsod nams can du bas te/_bdag gi chung ma'i rmi lam du yang lhas bstan pa lta zhes 
[\[66a.3\]]smras te/_des zan zos nas khrus byas te mal du nyal nas gcig la gcig mdza' bas dge'am/_nyon ma mongs sam zhes gtam 'dri'o/_/de nas chung mas jo bos cung zad mchis sam zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_cung zad cig 'ongs so/_/de nas chung mas brda tshig 
[\[66a.4\]]tu smras pa/_'di ni ci zer ba rnas nyon/_rna bo che des smras pa/_gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya po bdag la ma bstan na gar bzhag_/des smras pa/_nogs thub par gyis dang yod do/_/de gang du bzhag_/des smras pa/_sang bstan to/_/de nas bud med des smras pa/_bdag khyod 
[\[66a.5\]]kyi lus phyed na ci'i phyir gsang /_bram ze rang bzhin gyis drang bas na grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bzhag go zhes smras pa dang /_bud med des smras pa/_nyon cig rna bo che sa phyogs gang du bzhag ces smras pa dang /_bram ze des dur khrod kyi shing n+ya gro d+hA'i drung du sa brkos te bzhag go zhes smras 
[\[66a.6\]]pa dang /_de nas bram ze mo des jo bo lam nas brdab brdab ste mnyel ba bdag gis kyang gtses te/_da khyod mnol cig ces smras so/_/de nas de gnyid kyis log par rig nas rna bo che la gang khyod kyis thos pa de myur du sgrubs zhes byas pa dang /_de nas rna bo che dal bus 'jab 
[\[66a.7\]]cing khyim de nas byung ste dur khrod du song ngo /_/des ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du dur khrod kyi shing n+ya gro d+hA'i drung nas de blangs te rna bo che bdag gi khyim du song ngo /_/bram ze de de'i phyi de nyin bltas te dur khrod du song nas bltas na de'i phyogs nas ma rnyed do/_/de nas mgo dang brang rdung zhing khyim du 'ongs 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa dang /_chung ma dang /_gnyen 'dun dang /_gzhan grogs po dang /_phu nu dag gis ci nyes zhes dris pa dang /_des gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya bslangs nas khyer te 'ongs nas khar rtsang mi rgyun chad pa'i dus su dur khrod du brkos te bzhag nas khyim du song ngo /_/de ring bdag gis btsal 
[\[66b.2\]]na mi snang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis sman chen po'i drung du song dang /_blon po'i mchog de mkhas shing shes la brtag pa dang /_dpyad pa yang rtogs shing don rnams la rjes su dpog pas rig gis de la skyabs su song shig dang /_des gal te thob par byed kyang 
[\[66b.3\]]srid kyis skyabs gzhan mi snang ngo zhes bstan pa dang /_de nas bram ze de gdong la mchi ma zag cing ngu bzhin du sman chen po'i drung du phyin nas rgyal ba dang /_tshe ring bar shog shig ces brjod nas gsol pa/_lha 'di ltar bdag gis bslangs pa 'tshal te mchis nas khar rtsang mi 
[\[66b.4\]]rgyun chad pa'i dus na dur khrod du brkos te sbas nas khyim du mchis/_deng bdag slar der mchis na ma rnyed par gyur to/_/de nas blon po'i mchog sman chen po de ji lta bu zhig ces skad cig cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/_bram ze de la kye bram ze khyod kyis phyogs gang du bzhag_/dus ni ji 
[\[66b.5\]]tsam na/_kha cig gis mthong ba'am/_kha cig la smras pa lta med dam zhes dris pa dang /_des ji lta bur gyur pa zhib tu smras so/_/de nas yang bram ze mo de skyes pa gzhan la chags te de'i sgyu yin par gdon mi za'o zhes bsams nas/_bram ze de dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir khyod mi dga' 
[\[66b.6\]]bar ma byed cig dang /_de med na bdag nyid kyi nor las sbyin no/_/de ltar bram ze dbugs phyung nas smras pa/_khyod kyi khyim na khyi lta yod dam/_bram ze des mchis so zhes smras so/_/song la bram ze brgyad bos shig_/bzhi ni khyod nyid kyis bos shig_/bzhi ni chung ma la khyod kyis kyang 
[\[66b.7\]]bos shig ces bsgo la de nas 'di skad smros shig_/bdag khyim du slar dge zhing bkra shis par 'khor na bram ze brgyad zan sbyin par lha dbang phyug gi spyan sngar khas blangs so zhes byos shig_/de nas de khyim du song ba chung ma la bdag lam du zhugs te song ba'i tshe lha'i spyan sngar ji ste dge zhing 
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]bkra shis te slar 'khor na bram ze brgyad zan sbyin par dam bcas pa deng bod kyis khyod kyis ni bzhi bos shig_/bdag gis kyang bzhi bod do/_/de bzhin bya'o zhes mnyan nas bram ze des bzhi bos/_bram ze mos kyang bzhi mgron du bos so/_/de ltar mgron 
[\[67a.2\]]du bos nas sman chen po'i drung du song ste de dag bos lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de nas yang sman chen pos smras pa/_nam de dag khyim du khrid pa na bdag gi drung nas mi 'di khrid la de dag nang du 'dong ba'i tshe sgor zhog shig_/zan za ba'i tshe ci yang byed du ma gzhug par mdun du zhog shig_/
[\[67a.3\]]mi de la yang khyod kyis mtshan ma rnams bzung ste/_de dag nang du 'jug pa'i tshe bram ze gang la khyi zugs pa dang /_gang la mjug ma 'dril bar 'gyur ba ltos shig_/khyi'i tshul ni 'di lta bu'o zhes de la bsgo'o/_/bram ze de la yang khyod kyis bram ze de rnams la ma 'brim par bram ze mo de nyid 
[\[67a.4\]]'brim du chug shig ces bsgo'o/_/mi de yang khyod kyis brtag pa ni bram ze mo de 'brim pa'i tshe/_gang la mtshan mar byed mig btsugs shing lta ba dang /_dgod cing tshig 'byin la lhag par 'brim pa rnams shes par gyis shig ces bsgo'o/_/de ltar bstan pa dang /_bram ze 
[\[67a.5\]]des mi de khrid de sgo drung du bzhag go/_/bram ze mo la khyod kyis bram ze gang mgron du bos pa de dag khyod nyid kyis bos shig ces bsgo nas rang gis gang mgron du bos pa de dag kyang bdag nyid kyis bos so/_/de dag rim gyis nang du dong ba la khyi zugs so/_/nam rna bo che de 'ongs pa dang khyi des 
[\[67a.6\]]bltas nas rna ba phab mjug ma dril nas phyi bzhin du 'brangs te/_nang du zhugs nas khyi 'dris pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang /_rgyal po'i mi des rna bo che 'di yin par shes so/_/de nas des zas 'brim pa la bltas na bram ze mo de 'brim pa la zhugs pa dang /_rna bo che la smin ma'i brda byed 
[\[67a.7\]]cung zad dgod/_mig der chags/_de dang lhan cig gtam zer lhag par yang der 'brim pa dang /_de nas rgyal po'i mi des ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du jo bo tshul 'di 'dra'o zhes sman chen po la bzlas pa dang /_sman chen pos de thos ma thag tu rna bo che de khug shig ces rgyal po'i mi 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]btang ngo /_/de 'ongs nas sman chen pos de la gzhan gyi nor dbrog par bya ba de lta bu ci bram ze'i chos yin nam/_khyod kyis khyer ba de slar byin cig ces bsgo na/_des sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig bdag gis yong ma 'tshal to zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos mi rnams 
[\[67b.2\]]la ngan pa can 'di btson rar chug la ji nas rus pa byung ba de lta bur nan la 'or cig ces bsgo ba dang /_de de lta bus bsdigs pas 'jigs skrag shin tu gdungs pas na lhas skyobs shig_/bdag gis de slar 'bul lo zhes smras so/_/de nas rna bo che de bdag gi khyim 
[\[67b.3\]]nas gser gyi dong tse gna' ma lnga brgya ji ltar bcings pa bzhin du khyer te 'ongs nas sman chen po la phul lo/_/de nas sman chen pos kyang bram ze de la byin no/_/de nas bram ze de dga' mgu nas/_yid rab tu dga' bar gyur te/_de nas bram ze de 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/
[\[67b.4\]]bdag gi gser gyi dong tse gna' ma lnga brgya med pa las slar rnyed pa ni thams cad kyang sman chen po'i mthu yin te/_ji nas bdag gis de la bkur sti bya zhing lan glan no/_/sman chen po bdag la byams pa dang /_bdag gis kyang lan glon par 'gyur ro/_/snyam du bsams 
[\[67b.5\]]nas/_des gser gyi dong tse gna' ma de dag las phyed khyer te sman chen po'i drung du song nas skyes 'di bzhes shig ces phul lo/_/sman chen pos kyang blangs nas de nyid la slar byin no/_/de'i snyan pas kyang grong khyer der khyab par gyur/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer 
[\[67b.6\]]pa rnams kyis kyang de mkhas pa dang ldan no/_/zhes bya ba'i sgra kun du bsgrags/_bdag cag bsod nams dang ldan pas na 'di 'dra ba'i blon po bdog go snyam du sems so/_/de nas mi gzhan zhig rang gi don cig gi phyir yul gzhan du song song ba las slar log ste/_rdzing 
[\[67b.7\]]'gram zhig tu 'ongs nas phye'i rkyal pa kha phye ste phyung nas zan zos so/_/zan zos nas rkyal pa kha ma bcings bzhin du phyi rol gyi sar song ngo /_/de der 'dug pa dang sbrul reg na gdug pa'i dug can de'i rkyal pa'i nang du zhugs so/_/mi de slar 'ongs te des ma brtags par rkyal 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]pa'i kha bcings te phrag pa la thogs nas grong khyer chen por phyin pa dang /_de nas ltas mkhan zhig gis rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'tsho ba dang 'bral du nye'o zhes lung bstan to/_/mi des kyang slar log ste de la bltas so/_/de nas de la tshig de skad thos pa'i 'og tu ci'i phyir 
[\[68a.2\]]bdag gis ltas mkhan de la ma dris zhes 'gyod pa skyes so/_/de the tshom skyes nas bdag gis don de'i phyir blon po sman chen po la ma dris kyi bar du khyim du mi 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas tshig tu yang smras so/_/de sman chen po'i drung du song ste/_'di ltar bdag grong khyer du mchi 
[\[68a.3\]]ba'i tshe ltas mkhan gyis 'di ltar lung bstan pa'i don de dag smras nas/_de la slar bdag gis ni ma dris te de bas na khyod la gsol lo zhes dris pa dang /_sman chen pos gang nas 'ongs zhes dris nas des ji lta bur gyur pa zhib tu smras so/_/des bsams pa/_rkyal pa'i nang 
[\[68a.4\]]du sbrul reg na gdug pa yod yang dag gis ltas mkhan des kyang de'i phyir smras so snyam nas/_de nas sman chen pos skye bo mang po'i mngon sum du rkyal pa 'di kha khrol la rgyang ma nas shing gis kha phye shig dang gdod shes par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bur byas pa dang /_reg na gdug 
[\[68a.5\]]pa de'i nang nas mgo ni bteg_/dbugs ni rgod/_lce ni bskyod bzhin du phyir byung ba dang /_sman chen pos khyod kyi dogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes smras so/_/de nas sman chen po yul blta ba'i phyir yan lag bzhi'i stobs mang po rnams go bskon te phyir byung ngo /_/de nas grong dang /_
[\[68a.6\]]grong khyer dang /_tshong dus dag bltas na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 'dab 'di su'i yin zhes dris na/_yul na gnas bdag gis 'di ni blon po che ge mo zhig gi lags so/_/'di ni 'di dag gi'o zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos brtags te bltas na 'di 
[\[68a.7\]]ltar yul thams cad blon po drug gis kun bsnams te rgyal po skyed pa ni bza' ba dang /_btung ba tsam 'ba' zhig la dbang ngo snyam du bsams so/_/de nas sman chen pos lha grong dang /_ri brags kyi grong dang /_grong khyer rnams su dbang zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal po de 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]ji ltar bya de'i phyir snying brtse ba'i lha rnams kyis bdag la bstan pa ni pUr+Na kats+tsha'i ri brags kyi grong na gang po zhes bya ba'i bu sman chen po khyod kyi blon po chen por chug shig dang /_khyod kyi yul rnams rgyas par byas pas 'bul bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe na khyod nyid kyang thams cad la 
[\[68b.2\]]dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_khyod ni 'di lta bur dgos pa'i phyir bdag gis rum na 'dug tshun cad bde ba'i yo byad kyis bskyed pa yin/_da ltar yang blon po'i mchog tu bcug na da ni lha'i tshig dang /_khyod bdag gi blos lcogs pa ston pa ci nas 
[\[68b.3\]]bdag rgyal po'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar byos shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa la phyag byas nas thugs brtan par mdzod cig dang /_ji ltar bdag gis lha mnyes par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas sman chen pos yul dang /_grong 
[\[68b.4\]]dang /_grong khyer dang /_ri brags kyi grong de dag na gtso bo gang yin pa de rnams dbyen bcug ste so sor phye nas ci nas khyed bdag la dga' bar gyur pa de lta bur bdag gis bya'o/_/blon po de dag ni 'dod chen che bas dpya nar ma dang /_bla skyes dag kyang mi rigs par 'bebs te/_
[\[68b.5\]]gnod par gyur pas na de'i phyir rig par byas/_'di ltar bdag gi tshig bzhin du byas na bdag gis kyang khong du chud par bstan te dpya yang rigs par dbab/_gzhan yang bde bar dgod cing /_bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyis kyang bskyang bar byas/_ci nas khyod cag mi mthun 
[\[68b.6\]]par byos shig_/khyed mi mthun par byas pa las ji ste rgyal po dang /_blon po rnams lhags na yang bdag med kyi bar du de dag gi dbang du ma 'gro bar 'di skad smros shig_/de ste blon po'i mchog sman chen po 'ongs na de la bdag cag gis blon po de'i dbang du bya'i gzhan la 
[\[68b.7\]]ma yin no zhes smros shig_/de nas des 'di lta bu'i rig pa sngar sbyar nas yul de dag kun mi mthun par byed cing byed du bcug pas na bka' rnams kyang bcog par gyur to/_/de nas blon po de dag gis rgyal po la gsol pa dang /_'di ltar rgyal po skyed pas blon po drug po de dag 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]nyid yan lag bzhi'i stobs mang po dang lhan cig bkye yang de dag gis grong dang ri brags kyi grong gcig la yang dbang byed par ma nus so/_/de nas rgyal po la lha nyid ma byon na 'di dag dbang du bgyir mi nus so zhes pho nya btang ba dang /_de nas rgyal po nyid 'ongs 
[\[69a.2\]]kyang ri brags kyi grong gcig kyang dbang byar ma nus te/_'thabs pas mang zhig shi ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po drug po de dag kyang mi dga' bar gyur to/_/de nas ri brags kyi grong mi dag gis de ste sman chen po 'dir 'ongs na de'i ngag mnyan cing de'i dbang bzhin du bgyis te 
[\[69a.3\]]bdag cag rgyal po skyed pa dang mi mthun par bgyid pa ni ma lags kyi blon po rnams bdag cag la gnod par bgyid pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos sman chen po la nged kyis yul rnams phebs par ma nus kyis khyod tshur shog shig ces pho nya btang ngo /_/de nas sman chen 
[\[69a.4\]]pos yi ge de mthong ma thag tu rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs so/_/de mthong nas yul mi kun gyis phyag byas te yul mi de rnams la ma 'jigs shig_/dpya yang chos bzhin dbab/_dman pa dang /_dbul ba dang /_skyabs med pa rnams kyang dbugs dbyung bar byas/_yul na gnas pa 
[\[69a.5\]]dang /_grong khyer pa rnams la pha ma dang /_phu nu dang /_rang gi skye bo bzhin bkur sti dang bya [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]kun snyoms par byas nas pang nas 'khyud do/_/de nas yul na gnas pa'i rgan pa dang /_gzhon pa dang /_bud med de dag thams cad kyis kyang sman chen po la bu dang bdag gi ming po 
[\[69a.6\]]bzhin du lta bar gyur/_/des kyang thams cad la sems dga' bar byas shing /_de nas mthar gyis yul thams cad gcig tu bsdus te rgyal po skyed pa dang lhan cig slar rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs so/_/de lta bu'i las byas pas rgyal po gzhan dag la yang snyan pa'i sgra grags par 
[\[69a.7\]]gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po mnyes pas na bdag gi bu mo sman chen po'i chung mar byin te de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de nas yang yul gzhan zhig nas rgyal po longs spyod nyams pa zhig rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du 'ongs nas rgyal po skyed pas kyang de ma 'dod nas de sman chen po'i drung 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]du 'ongs so/_/des snying rje ba'i dbang gis blangs te longs spyod kyang byin no/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na bram ze zhig 'ongs te/_de nas bre gang zhig bslangs pa dang des kyang khas blangs te bang ka ba la gtad na sang sbyin gnangs sbyin las ma byin no/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po la blon po rnams 
[\[69b.2\]]dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_ljongs pa dag gis bskor te mi mang po phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas na 'dug go/_/des blon po rnams la kye blon po rnams gsang ba ni su la smra bar bya/_gang la yid brtan par bya zhes smras pa dang /_de nas blon po dag sems pa la zhugs so/_/de dag las 
[\[69b.3\]]gcig gis ni mdza' bo la smra ba'i rigs zhes byas/_kha cig gis ni lha de chung ma la/_kha cig gis ni ma la/_kha cig gis ni sring mo dang pha la/_kha cig gis ni phu nu la'o zhes gzhan dag gis de skad smras pa dang /_rgyal pos sman chen po gzhan gyis ni ji ltar bsams pa 
[\[69b.4\]]bzhin smras na khyod kyis ci'i phyir mi smra zhes dris pa dang /_de nas sman chen pos rgyal po la lha bdag gis ni 'di snyam du bsams te/_gsang ba de ni su la yang bgyi bar mi rigs na chung ma lta ci smos te/_de ni bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar mngon par bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de 
[\[69b.5\]]nas phyi zhig na rgyal po'i rma bya stor ba sman chen pos btsal te phyogs gzhan zhig tu sbas nas de dang 'dra ba gzhan zhig bzung ste/_chung ma khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho brang nas rma bya stor ba thos sam zhes dris pa dang /_des kyang bdag gis thos so zhes smras so/_/sman chen 
[\[69b.6\]]pos khyod kyis su la yang ma zer bar 'di myur du tshos shig dang bza'o zhes bsgo'o/_/des ri brags kyi grong mi 'dis rgyal po'i rma bya za ba ltos shig_/bdag gi pha ni 'di la shin tu yid brtan par byed na 'di ni rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed do snyam du bsams so/_/yang re zhig 
[\[69b.7\]]na rgyal po'i btsun mo 'dra ba bud med smad 'tshong ma zhig rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te bdag gi bud med kyi nang du bcug nas chung ma la 'di ni rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di zhes bya ba yin te/_bdag 'di la shin tu yid brtan gyis khyod bdag la sdug na su la yang ma zer cig ces bsgo ba dang /_
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]de nas rgyal po'i bu mo de 'di ni sman chen po dang lhan cig tu 'dug go snyam bsams nas khros pas 'khrug pa skyes te pha la 'phya nas bdag gi pha 'di lta bur don la rtog pa ci'ang med de/_ri brags kyi grong mi rigs ngan pa las byung na blon po'i mchog tu bcug cing ngan pa 'di 
[\[70a.2\]]la rgyal po'i don thams cad gtad pa ga la rigs/_de ci nas sngon gyi gnas rnying par gzhag pa de lta bur bya'o zhes bsams te song nas pha la yab kyis ngan pa de lta bu ma brtags par blon po'i mchog tu bcug cing yid brtan par bgyis pa ga la rigs/_des 'di ltar rgyal po'i 
[\[70a.3\]]btsun mo la glo ba [{]rings te [,]ring ste [}]yab kyi btsun mo 'di zhes bgyi ba dang lhan cig tu spyod/_rgyal po'i rma bya de yang 'dis zos/_yul gzhan nas mi 'ongs pa rnams kyang bsnyen cing yo byad kun sbyor bar bgyid na yab ni rtag tu yang bdag la sman chen po 'di thams cad pas sdug_/'di 
[\[70a.4\]]las yid du 'ong ba med do zhes gsung na de ni 'di lta bu mi bgyi ba rnams bgyid kyis ji lta bu yin pa mkhyen par gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal pos don de dag brtag pa'i phyir gshed ma mi rnams la sod cig ces bkri'o/_/de nas rigs ngan pa de dag gis shing ka 
[\[70a.5\]]ra bI ra'i me tog gi phreng ba ni mgul du btags/_bong skad lta bu'i rnga brdungs/_tshig rtsub pos spyos/_bsdigs/_tshar bcad de mtshon thogs pa gshin rje'i mi lta bu'i rigs ngan rnams kyis dur khrod du khrid mod kyi/_de gsad par ni gang yang mi dad do/_/grong khyer gyi 
[\[70a.6\]]skye bo dang ljongs pa rnams ni mig nas mchi ma zag cing bdag gi bu bsad pa ltar sdug bsngal nas nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin cing lha dag la gsol ba 'debs so/_/ci tsam zhig na sman chen pos rgyal rigs dbul po bsnyen cing longs spyod bgos te byin pa de dag gis rgyal po'i mi rnams la 
[\[70a.7\]]bdag cag gis 'di bsad kyis khyed cag slar log shig ces so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_ci tsam na de grong khyer nas byung ba dang /_bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' ma nas 'jus nas khyod kyis nas bre gang sbyin par 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]byas pa de byin la song shig ces zer ro/_/sman chen pos gnas der tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med/_/gdol pa la ni bshes pa med/_/bud med rnams la gsang mi brjod/_/rma bya'i sha ni bza' mi bya/_/bram ze mong rtul po yi ni/_/nas bre gang 
[\[70b.2\]]yang 'chags mi bya/_/des de skad smra zhing song ba dang /_de nas gshed ma mi rnams kyis smras pa/_sman chen po de ci khyod shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin na bla bar byed dam/_sman chen pos smras pa/_kho bo ni mi bla ste/_'on kyang de ci bla/_des smras 
[\[70b.3\]]pa/_lha bdag mi bla ste/_'on kyang bdag sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dgos pa smra'o/_/de ci yin/_des smras pa/_rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med ces bya ba rgya cher ro/_/des yang smras pa/_lha gsol ba 'tshal na re zhig gsan du gsol/_bdag gis rgyal po grogs 
[\[70b.4\]]su 'gyur ba med ces gang smras pa ni sngon lha grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal rnams kyi don gang la yang mi mnga' bar gyur te/_khyod gang gi phyir de skad smra ba smras pa de'i don khyod kyis ma go bar zad do/_/de rnams song ste/_rgyal po skyed pa la sman chen po ci zhig bla na de bla ba zlos 
[\[70b.5\]]su stsal bar gsol zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos bos nas dris pa/_zhal zas dang /_btung ba dang /_slas gang dag lags pa de la mnga' ba las lha deng sa la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal srid dang /_dpung dang /_mdzod dang /_dmag la mnga' mdzad par gyur pa gang 
[\[70b.6\]]lags pa de lta bu bdag gis bgyis na bdag la khyod kyis sngon byas pa gzo ba nyid ma dgongs par lhas dgum du btang bas de'i slad du bdag 'di skad du rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med ces mchi'o/_/gdol pa la ni bshes pa med ces bgyi ba ni lha gdol pa mal dang gos dang bral ba 'di rgyal 
[\[70b.7\]]po skyed pas bdag la 'tsho ba'i yo byad byin na des bdag 'tsho bar bya'o snyam nas lha'i drung du mchis pa las lhas yongs su ma bzung ngo /_/bdag gis ni bkren pa'o snyam pa dang /_yul nas 'khyams pa'o snyam nas bgo bsha' bgyis pa las 'di ltar deng sang bde bar gyur pa lags na deng 
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]bdag dgum pa'i slad du chas pas de'i slad du bdag 'di skad du gdol pa la ni bshes pa med ces mchi'o/_/bud med rnams la gsang mi brjod ces bgyi ba ni rgyal po dus gcig na 'khor gyi nang du bzhugs nas tshig 'di skad du ji ltar su la yid gcugs 
[\[71a.2\]]par bya zhes gsungs pa dang /_de na blon po rnams kyis pha dang /_ma dang /_sring mo dang /_ne'u ldangs rnams la'o zhes gang la smra bar bgyi ba de smras so/_/lhas kyang chung ma la brjod par bya ste/_'di ltar chung ma ni lus kyi phyed yin pas de'i phyir brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs 
[\[71a.3\]]so/_/de nas bdag gis don 'di lha'i spyan sngar bab par bgyi'o snyam nas bgam pa'i slad du rgyal po'i rma bya sbas nas rma bya gzhan zhig blangs te 'tshal lo/_/slas las kyang slas che ge mo zhig las rgyan btsal te smad 'tshong ma che ge mo zhig gi mgul du btags nas khyim du 
[\[71a.4\]]bzhag ste lha smad 'tshong ma de yang gzigs su gsol/_de nas rgyal pos bkug nas slas dang /_smad 'tshong ma phyogs gcig tu gzhag ste gnyi ga bltas na/_rtags dang /_kha dog dang /_tshul dang /_dbyibs mtshungs te gcig la yang khyad par dmigs pa 
[\[71a.5\]]ma yin la cig shos la yang ma yin no/_/de nas rgyal pos brtags nas bdag gis sman chen po ni nyes pa med par khong du chud do/_/bram ze mong rtul po yi ni/_/nas bre gang yang chags mi bya/_/zhes gang smras pa ni bdag lhas dgum par btang nas gshed ma pa rnams 
[\[71a.6\]]kyis khrid pa na des nas bre gang byin cig ces nas bre gang gi don du gos kyi mtha' nas bzung bas de'i slad du bdag gis de skad smras so/_/de nas rgyal po don de thams cad mngon sum du bstan pas dga' ste bkrol nas bkur sti chen pos bkur sti byas so/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[71a.7\]]la phyag byas nas gsol pa/_lha khyod kyis bud med rnams kyi gsang gzigs sam/_khyod kyi sras mo ni bdag la yong dgos pa ma mchis so/_/'on kyang rigs dang /_gzugs dang /_ngang tshul dang /_shes rab bdag dang 'dra ba de kho na lta bu'i mchis 'brang zhig blang 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]bar bgyi'o/_/des rgyal po la gnang ba gsol nas bdag nyid bram ze'i cha byad du byas te lag pa g.yas pa bya ma bum thogs/_lus mchod phyir thogs kyis mdzes par byas/_lus la [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa gos su bgos/_gdong la byugs ris gsum byas nas ri 'or nags kyi 
[\[71b.2\]]tshang tshing can ga la ba der bu mo btsal ba'i phyir chas so/_/ji tsam na lam gyi bar du grong zhig tu mun sros par gyur to/_/tha gi tsam na bram ze zhig gis dris pa gang nas 'ongs/_des smras pa/_lus 'phags pa'i ljongs nas so/_/gang du 'gro bar sems/_nags kyi tshang 
[\[71b.3\]]tshing can du'o/_/ci gang gi khyim du brang gdab pa'i ngo shes 'ga' khyod la yod dam/_des smras pa med do/_/de nas des khyim du khrid de tshul dang mthun pa'i 'byor pas phu dud byas so/_/des de'i chung ma la yang 'di ni skyes pa gzhan la chags pas rung ba ma yin no zhes 'phrigs 
[\[71b.4\]]so/_/de phyi de nyin dris nas chas pa dang /_bram zes kyang smras pa/_grogs po bdag gi khyim 'di ste/_phan tshun 'gro ba'i tshe phyin pa na rang gi khyim bzhin du soms shig_/de bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras nas chas so/_/ji tsam na lam gyi bar zhig na nas kyi zhing zhig 
[\[71b.5\]]yod pa de na bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug pa/_rigs btsun pa shin tu zhi ba dang ldan pa zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de'i yid de la zhen to/_/de nas dris pa/_bzang mo khyod gang zhig yin/_su'i yin/_khyod kyi ming ci/_des smras pa/_sa ga'o/_/
[\[71b.6\]]khyod su'i yin/_smras pa/_gang zhig grong thams cad kyi shing sgrub par byed pa'i'o/_/de nas sman chen pos bsams pa/_'di byad ni bzang mo zhig yin na da re zhig blo ci 'dra ba blo bgam par bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de gro zhing zhig tu zhugs te lag pa bsgreng nas lag pa phangs 
[\[71b.7\]]par bya ba'i phyir rkang pas gro phur ba dang /_de nas sa gas smras pa/_mkhan po ji ltar lag pa phangs pa de bzhin du khyod rkang pa gnyis kyang phangs par gyis shig_/des bsams pa/_bu mo 'di ni mdzangs ma zhig go snyam mo/_/de nas yang bram zes bgad nas smras pa/_bu mo 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]khyod kyis rna cha gdub kor gdu gu zhig ste shin tu lhang nge'o/_/sa gas smras pa/_mkhan po rna ba gnyis dgab pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_bu mo byad bzang zhing blta na sdug pa mdzes pa yin no/_/sa gas smras pa/_grong gi bdag po 
[\[72a.2\]]rnams kyi bka' drin gyis so/_/cung zhig 'dug nas smras pa/_khyod kyi pha gar song /_bu mos smras pa/_lam gcig gnyis su bgyid du mchis te tsher ma'i yal ga bsdus nas lam gcod par bgyid do/_/des na skye bo dag shul gnyis pa bgyid do/_/khyod kyi ma yang gar 
[\[72a.3\]]song /_zhing thog nas sa bon gyi phyir mchis so/_/bu mo nga'i chung ma bya'am/_bu mos smras pa/_gal te grong gi bdag po btub na'o/_/des smras pa/_nags kyi tshang tshing can du lam gang nas 'gro na bde ba dang mi 'khyog pa de ston cig_/yang smras pa/_nags kyi tshang 
[\[72a.4\]]tshing can gyi lam/_/tsher ma med cing thibs po med/_/bde zhing mi 'khyog 'jam pa ni/_/gang nas bdag 'gro dris pa ston/_/des de la lam 'khyog pa zhig bstan nas/_lam gzhan nas mdun du rgyugs te/_rdzing bu zhig tu gos rnams phud nas mig ya gcig btsums te ci ngo 
[\[72a.5\]]shes sam/_'on te ma yin zhes glo gcig gis snyes te 'dug go/_/yang smras pa/_gang gis za bgyid de nas bzhud/_/gang gis za bar mi bgyid pa/_/de ni dor bar bgyis nas su/_/zan gyi nags su bzhud par mdzod/_/de nas sman chen pos ji skad bstan pa'i lam nas 
[\[72a.6\]]song ba dang /_ci tsam na rgyang ring po nas de ngo shes nas smras pa/_ras bal thags su btags pa mi bdog pas/_/ma bkal thags su ma btags gyon byed pa/_/mdzes ldan g.yon pa'i mig can gang nas ni/_/me tog grong du 'gro ba bdag la ston/_/de nas bu mos cung zhig 
[\[72a.7\]]bgad nas smras pa/_'dir ni g.yon pa'i lam 'or la/_/gang na yos ni yod pa dang /_/pa la sha yi me tog rgyas/_/de nas bram ze bzhud du gsol/_/de song song ste phyin nas smras te sa ga'i pha'i khyim du song na de'i pha ma mi snang ngo /_/de nas grong gi bdag po rnams la smras 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]pa/_gal te khyod kyis gnang na sa ga 'di bdag gi chung ma bgyid do/_/tshig de smras ma thag kho nar grong gi bdag po de thams cad kyis tshig mthun par bram ze ngan pa slong mo pa khyod gang nged kyi sa ga lha'i bu mo 'dra ba slong ba ngo mi tsha'am/_yul 'di nas ye song shig_/khyod la khyi mi srun 
[\[72b.2\]]pa dag zar bcug ga re zhes spyos so/_/de skye bos bskrad nas de kho na'i drung du song ba dang /_sa gas rgyang ring po nas mthong nas byon pa legs so zhes smras so/_/de nas sman chen pos de rnams kyis de'u brdegs so zhes grong gi bdag po rnams kyi gtam smras pa dang /_sa gas 
[\[72b.3\]]smras pa/_khyod kyis ji ltar ram thabs ci zhig gis smras/_de nas sman chen pos gtam ji lta ba bzhin du bsnyad pa dang /_de nas sa gas sman chen po la smras pa/_bram ze chen po khyod tha gi mi sgom mo/_/bu mo bslang ba ji ltar khyod kyis mdzad pa de ltar bgyi'am/_bram zes smras pa/_
[\[72b.4\]]gzhan du ji ltar bya/_bu mos smras pa/_re zhig sngar nye bar bzhud do/_/de nas rjes su mthun par bgyi'o/_/rjes su mthun par bgyis nas mgron du 'bod cing zas skom bda' ba'i ston mos ston te slad kyis khyod kyi bgyi ba gang lags pa de bgyi mod/_des song ste ji skad bstan pa bzhin 
[\[72b.5\]]du grong gi bdag po rnams kha zas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]rnam pa bsod pas ston to/_/de nas langs te sa ga bslangs pa dang /_de rnams kyis deng khyod kyi yid la bsams pa bzhin rdzogs par bya'o zhes khas blangs so/_/de lta bu'i don la zhugs pa na tha gi tsam na de'i pha ma 'ongs so/_/de nas sman chen po 
[\[72b.6\]]dang grong gi bdag pos pha ma la gsol ba btab pa dang smras pa/_don de bsams dgos so/_/de nas grong gi bdag po rnams kyis smras pa/_'di la ci bsam du yod/_bram ze gzhon nu byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug la bstan bcos mang po shes shing rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan 
[\[72b.7\]]lag gi pha rol du son pa zhig yin pas cir yang mi 'gyur gyis byin cig_/de nas sman chen pos kyang bram ze rnams bos nas bu mo blang bar byas so/_/de nas nyi ma gzhan zhig la gyos po dang sgyug mo bos nas bkur sti byas te gos bskon nas gnyod bcug ste lus 'phags su skyed pa'i drung du chas 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]so/_/de nas 'gro ba na de bram ze zhig gis bcu bzhi pa'i ston mos ston te yon du nas bre gang byin no/_/des nas bre gang gos kyi mtha' mar phur te grogs po'i khyim du song nas sgo brdungs pa dang /_bram ze mos smras pa/_de su zhig_/des smras pa/_nga ni khyod kyi khyim 
[\[73a.2\]]thab kyi grogs po de yin no/_/des smras pa/_'di na de yang med la 'ga' yang med pas khyim bdag de med par skyes pa gzhan khyim du 'jug tu mi rung gis gzhan zhig tu brang thob shig_/ci tsam na sman chen pos bdag ci'i phyir 'jug tu mi ster snyam dpyad na re zhig na skyes pa gzhan 
[\[73a.3\]]bcug par mthong ngo /_/de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_'dis 'jug tu ma ster ba ni rung ngo /_/de de ltar sems pa dang /_tha gi tsam na bram ze de grong gzhan zhig nas 'ongs nas sgor bos pa dang /_des khyo'i sgra thos nas de ji ltar bya snyam nas mi dga' ste de spyad du bcug go/_/
[\[73a.4\]]de nas gnyi ga zhugs nas bde bar 'khod do/_/ci tsam na sman chen pos bram ze mo la smras pa/_nas 'di dag gar gzhag_/bram ze mos smras pa/_sa la'o/_/bram zes smras pa/_byi bas zos par 'ong mod des mal gyi 'og dang /_khyim gyi gra phan tshun du brtags 
[\[73a.5\]]na de mi snang ngo /_/tha gi tsam na phyogs gcig na spyad zhig snang ba dang /_des de ni 'di na yod do snyam mo/_/de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_spyad 'dir nas blugs so/_/bram ze mos smras pa/_'di na bdag gi nor gces pa yod na 'dir nas ji ltar blugs/_
[\[73a.6\]]de nas khyos smras pa/_bram ze mo skyon can de snod gang yang rung ba zhig tu byo shig dang /_de nas der nas ldugs so/_/sman chen pos kyang smras pa/_gzhan du ni nas rnams byi bas ma rung bar byed pas de'i phyir 'dir blugs par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze mos nges par 
[\[73a.7\]]rtogs nas 'jigs shing skrag ste smras pa/_spyad 'di yang gsher la nas rnams kyang ma rung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas sman chen pos bram ze mo la smras pa/_yang khyod kyis sems khral bya mi dgos par kho bos ci nas kyang gsher bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_nas kyang ma rung bar 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes des langs nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi pags pa snga log phyi log byas/_mchod phyir thogs nyis ltab tu mgul du thogs te spyad skam mo zhes spyad du ba lang gi lci ba dang shing dag bskya bar brtsams pa dang /_de nas bram ze mo sdug pa dang bral ba las 
[\[73b.2\]]skyes pa'i sdug bsngal mngon du mthong ste/_'di da ni med par 'ong ngo snyam nas byi bo de'i khyim du 'di ltar gyur gyis myur du sheg shig ces bang chen btang ngo /_/de nas de'i phas thos ma thag kho nas song ste sman chen po la smras pa/_spyad 'di rin gyis blang ngo /_/des 
[\[73b.3\]]smras pa/_bag rton la long shig_/ji ltar bya/_gser gyi dong tshe lnga brgya dag gis yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes de skad kyang zer zhing spyad de'i nyen kor du me sgron yang sbor bar byed pa dang /_de'i phas bsams pa/_don 'di ni bsnyad du mi rung ngo snyam nas khyim sgo phye ste mi 
[\[73b.4\]]stobs po ches bteg nas rang gi khyim du khyer ro/_/sman chen pos kyang phyi de nyin gser gyi dong tshe brgya phrag gcig ni khyim bdag de la byin te/_de la khyod kyi chung ma de ni 'di lta bu yin no zhes khyim gyi gtam de dang de bas na khyod kyis bag gyis shig ces smras so/_/gser gyi dong tshe 
[\[73b.5\]]lhag ma bzhi brgya ni bram ze de'i lag tu gtad nas 'di rnams nags kyi tshang tshing can du song la bdag gis bslangs pa'i sa ga la byin cig_/de dag la kho bo bram ze ma yin te/_kho bo ni lus 'phags pa'i rgyal po skyed pa'i blon po'i mchog sman chen po zhes bya ba yin te kho bo rtags 
[\[73b.6\]]'dis tshol ba'i phyir 'ongs par zad do/_/de'i phyir bu mo yongs su skyongs shig ces kyang gyis shig des gser gyi dong tshe de rnams brdzangs nas phrin yig kyang spring ste rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ngo /_/bram ze des kyang nags kyi tshang tshing can du song ste/_sa ga la phrin 
[\[73b.7\]]yig dang gser gyi dong tshe sum brgya byin no/_/ci tsam na sa gas bklags na/_bzhi po yi ni cha dag las/_/gal te ca gcig ma ster na/_/shing gi su mi 'dod blangs nas/_/der 'di chug la cha do shig_/des gser gyi dong tshe brgya phrag gcig ma thob par mthong nas de nas 
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]rings par mal gyi 'og tu tshol ba dang /_des smras pa/_der ci tshol/_des smras pa/_pho brang 'khor nas rgyal po'i mi 'ongs na gnod pa byed pa zung shig ces byung ste/_de'i phyir su ma 'dong tshol lo/_/des blangs te bram ze de la smras pa/_der de lta 
[\[74a.2\]]bu su zhig khrid kyang kho mos ma shes na re zhig 'dir rkang pa chud dam mi chud sad kyis thang cig chug shig_/bram zes kyang bsam pa mnag pa'i phyir rkang pa bcug pa dang /_des rings par gzer ba btab po/_/bram zes smras pa/_nga ci'i phyir gzung /_des smras pa/_des bzhi 
[\[74a.3\]]brgya bkur na khyod kyis de las brgya bskums pas so/_/de nas bram ze ya mtshan skyes te/_des bsams pa/_sman chen po dang /_'di ni 'dre dag cig ste/_'dre chen po gnyis gnas gcig tu 'dus par gyur to snyam nas des lhag ma byin no/_/tha gi tsam na pha ma 'ongs pa dang 
[\[74a.4\]]gsar de bstan nas de ni bram ze ma lags te de ni lus 'phags pa'i rgyal po skyed pa'i blon po'i mchog sman chen po zhes bgyi ba lags so zhes smras pa thos nas pha ma dang bu mo de'i gnyen 'dun gyi skye bo dag bdag cag gis ni chen po dang gnyen du byas so/_/bdag cag ni bsod nams 
[\[74a.5\]]dang ldan pa dang gtsang byed yin te/_da ni bdag cag gi rigs sman chen pos gsol bar byas so zhes shin tu dga' ba dang ldan no/_/de phyin chad sa ga de bsku mnye dang /_khrus dang /_zas skom dang /_gos dang /_rgyan gyi khyad par dag gis shin tu byi dor bya bar brtsams pa 
[\[74a.6\]]dang ring po ma lon par je khyad par gzugs shin tu bzang ba dang shin tu mdzes par gyur to/_/de nas sman chen po grong khyer du song ba dang /_rgyal pos 'ongs so zhes thos so/_/de nas rgyal po dang blon po rnying pa rnams sman chen po 'ongs so zhes shin tu dga' ba skyes so/_/rgyal po 
[\[74a.7\]]skyed pas smras pa/_ji ltar 'ongs/_des smras pa/_bdag gis mchis 'brang rnyed do/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ci 'dra ba zhig_/sman chen pos smras pa/_gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang /_blo phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste/_de ni bdag gi sbu la 'bab pa 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]lags so/_/de lta lags kyis kyang lha la da blang bar bgyi 'am zhes zhu'o/_/de nas rgyal pos smras pa/_nga ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig khyod kyi thog tu 'bab ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod ni blon po'i mchog yin no/_/de lta bas na de ci nas kyang nga mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta 
[\[74b.2\]]bu'i 'byor pas blang bar bya'o/_/lha de ltar 'tshal lo zhes smras nas sman chen po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor cing bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_skye bo'i tshogs mgron du bos pa gzhan rnams dang /_glang po che ba dang /_rta pa dang /_shing rta pa dang /_dpung bu chung 
[\[74b.3\]]gi tshogs mang pos bskor nas ri 'or nags kyi tshang tshing can du gyos po'i khyim du song ngo /_/song nas bag ma blang ba chen po byas te mthar gyis chung ma khrid nas grong khyer du 'ongs te de na de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas 
[\[74b.4\]]byang phyogs nas tshong pa lnga brgya zhig zong du rta khyer nas lus 'phags pa'i ljongs su rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du lhags so/_/gnas de na smad 'tshong ma tshul dang /_'dul ba dang /_gzugs dang /_rgya che ba dang mthun par byed pa dang /_bgad pa dang /_sgeg pa dang /_spro ba bskyed 
[\[74b.5\]]pa dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_zur stegs dang /_bsam pa mkhas pa de lta bu lnga brgya 'khod pas tshong pa gang dag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rdzas med par byed do/_/de nas de rnams kyis byang phyogs nas tshong pa'i 'gron pa ji ltar lhags pa thos nas de rnams kyis 
[\[74b.6\]]re res tshong pa re re la rim gro bya bar khas blangs pas nye bar bzung ste de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas de rnams kyi ded dpon gang yin pa de ni bag yod pa can zhig pas de de rnams dang lhan cig bag med pa 
[\[74b.7\]]mi byed do/_/smad 'tshong ma de rnams kyi nang na kun gyi gtso mo gang yin pa de ni ded dpon de 'dod na ded dpon ni mi btub po/_/de nas des tshong pa de rnams bsdus nas gsol ba btab pa bdag dang ded dpon mthun par mdzod cig_/de nas tshong pa de rnams dang smad 'tshong ma de 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin rgyun du phe'u byas na bag med pa'i dbang du mi 'gro'o/_/de nas smad 'tshong ma de rang nyid 'ongs shing ded dpon dang lhan cig bgad pa dang /_ga zha byas pa dang /_de nas ded dpon gyis smras pa/_nga la 'khrul bar bya 
[\[75a.2\]]bar mi nus na ci'i phyir nyon mongs/_des smras pa/_gal te 'khrul bar bgyi na shes ldan gyis ci stsal/_des smras pa/_rta'i mchog lnga sbyin no/_/'o na 'khrul bar ma bgyis na slad kyis kAr ShA pa Na ma mchis bzhin du rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o/_/de nas de 
[\[75a.3\]]ltar skugs btsugs nas 'bad de nye bar spyad pa las kyang ma nus so/_/ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa de rnams kyis smras pa/_ded dpon grong khyer gyi gtso mo smad 'tshong ma gzhag pa las ma thug gis 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis shig_/de nas ded dpon gyis de 
[\[75a.4\]]rnams la smras pa/_grogs po dag mtshan mo rmi lam na de la yongs su spyad do/_/tshong pa rnams kyis kyang de la bsnyad pa dang /_des ded dpon de rgyal po'i mi rnams 'dzin du bcug nas khyod bdag dang 'dod pa spyad kyis rta'i mchog lnga byin cig_/ded dpon gyis smras pa/_
[\[75a.5\]]ngan pa mo [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba zer ram zhes de gnyis rtsod cing rgyal po'i pho brang du dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa las shags bkye ba las nyi ma nub kyi bar du gcig kyang ma pham la/_cig shos kyang ma yin no/_/rgyal po dang blon po thams cad kyang skyo bar 
[\[75a.6\]]gyur nas bkres pas nyen te phyis dpyad do zhes rang gi khyim du dong ngo /_/de nas sman chen po nub mo rang gi khyim du song nas sa gas dris pa/_rje'i sras de ring ci'i slad du thogs/_des zhal che gcad par yang ma nus pa'i gtam de thams cad rgya cher bsnyad do/_/de 
[\[75a.7\]]nas sa gas smras pa/_khyod de ltar rtog pa dang /_sel ba phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu thams cad kyis gcad par ma spyod na khyod skyes pa'i tshul de lta bu lags pa lta/_sman chen pos smras pa/_de ni de lta bu yin na ci khyod kyis gcad nus sam/_des smras 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]pa/_rngo thog ste/_bdag gi blo'i nus pa la gzigs shig_/des smras pa/_gshegs la rdzing bu'i 'gram du rta'i mchog lnga bzhag ste/_de nas gnas de nyid du rgyal po dang blon po rnams kyang 'dus te shags 'gyed du stsal cig_/gal te smad 'tshong ma gnyis dang /_
[\[75b.2\]]gnyis 'dod pa spyad do zhes mchi na rta'i mchog lnga khyer ces gsungs shig_/'on te rmi lam na 'dod pa spyad do zhes mchi na de nas rta'i gzugs brnyan chu na mchis pa dag ston cig_/gal te blang du mi rung ba 'di dag bdag la ci dgos zhes smra na/_de nas ji ltar 'di blang du 
[\[75b.3\]]mi rung bzhin du rmi lam gyi 'dod pa spyad pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs shig_/de thos nas sman chen po nyid je ya mtshan du gyur to/_/de phyi nyin par rgyal po yang 'dus pa dang /_blon po rnams kyang tshogs nas rta'i mchog lnga khrid de rdzing bur lhags te/_der rta'i mchog lnga 
[\[75b.4\]]btags nas shags 'gyed du bcug go/_/de nas sa gas bstan pa bzhin du sman chen pos zhal che bcad pa dang /_rgyal po dang blon po dang khram gyi ru rnams kyis thos nas ya mtshan skyes so/_/rgyal pos smras pa kye sman chen po gang 'di khar tshang smras pa dang /_nga dang /_blon po 
[\[75b.5\]]rnams dang /_skye bo gzhan yang nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba zhig na khyod kyi thabs su las byung /_des smras pa/_'di ni sa ga'i thabs lags te/_des kyang khar tshang bstan lags so/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dag dang /_skye bo'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang ya mtshan 
[\[75b.6\]]skyes te/_kye ma 'o shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga ni shin tu mkhas so/_/sa ga blo dang ldan no zhes yul thams cad du sgra grags par gyur to/_/de nas byang phyogs kyi tshong pa zhig gis rgod ma gnyis shig rgyal po la skyes su phul te/_lha rgod ma 'di dag smad lags na/_ma 'am bu gang lags 
[\[75b.7\]]pa ni gzhan gyis ma 'tshal to/_/de la yang rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag skyo bar gyur nas de kho na bzhin du shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga la/_sman chen pos smras pa dang /_rje'i sras gang gi spu gshor ba de ni ma'o/_/gang gi spu 'jam pa ni bu'o/_/phyi de nyin de bzhin du sman chen pos 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]smras nas/_lha sa ga'i thabs lags so zhes smras pa dang /_de la yang rgyal po ya mtshan skyes so/_/dus gzhan zhig na sbrul khas sdigs pa zhig gis sbrul gnyis khyer te 'ongs nas de la gcig ni pho/_cig shos ni mo lags na gang pho gang mo lags 
[\[76a.2\]]pa ni ma 'tshal to/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_mdun na 'don rnams skyo nas de kho na bzhin du sman chen pos sa ga la dris shing /_gang zhig pho 'am mo yin par ma shes pa yang rgyas par smras pa dang /_de nas sa gas cung zhig bgad de smras pa/_gang dag don 'di 
[\[76a.3\]]lta bu mi rtogs pa de lta bu khyod kyang blon po'am/_yong rgyal po go blon po rtog pa dang /_sel ba phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu drug gis brgyan pa lta zhig dri yis ci khyod kyis shes sam/_smras pa/_ha cang mod 'od ma'i rtse mo'am/_smig ma'i rtse mo la ras bal gyi 'dab 
[\[76a.4\]]ma'am/_bal gyis dkris te gnyi ga'i rgyab tu reg par bgyis pa dang /_de dag las gang reg tu mi bzod pa de ni pho lags so/_/phyi de nyin de bzhin du byas pa las rgyal po mgu bar gyur to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na lho phyogs nas tshong pa dag cig tsan dan gyi sdong po zhig khyer 
[\[76a.5\]]te 'ongs pa de'i mgo mjug ma shes te/_de nas de kho na bzhin du chung ma la dris pa dang /_rje'i sras rdzing bu'i nang du bor dang /_rtsa ba gang lags pa de 'og tu 'bying ngo /_/de yang rgyal po skyed pa dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs dag gis thos nas ya mtshan skyes so/_/rgyal po 
[\[76a.6\]]skyed pa'i blo skyes pa nga'i blon po dag gi nang na nor bu rin po che rtog su mkhas shes par bya'o snyam nas/_des khang pa rtseg ma'i steng du rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la rin po che btags so/_/de'i 'og na rdzing bu zhig yod do/_/rgyal pos kyang sus nor bu rin po che 'di shes pa 'di la sbyin par 
[\[76a.7\]]dam pa bstabs so/_/rdzing bu der zhugs nas 'od de blang ba la zhugs na blang yang ma nus so/_/de nas shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga la smras pa dang /_rje'i sras steng du gzigs shig dang /_de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa de'i mthus gzugs brnyan gda' mod kyi nang du bzhud 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]de rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo las blang bar bgyi'o/_/des phyi de nyin de bzhin du byas pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_'di su'i thabs/_des sa ga'i thabs lags so zhes smras pa dang /_mgu nas rnam pa thams cad du shin tu mkhas so zhes bstod do/_/de nas sa ga shin tu gzugs 
[\[76b.2\]]dang ldan par blon po drug gis shes te/_de bdag cag gis nor bu dang /_dngul dang /_dbyig dang /_gser dang /_an da rnyil dang /_pad ma rA ga dang /_rdo'i snying po la sogs pas brid la lhan cig phrad par bya'o snyam pa las ma zug go/_/de dag rgyun du smra ba dang /_
[\[76b.3\]]des sman chen po la smras pa/_khyod kyis yul chos ko bud med gang su yang rung gzhon zhing gzugs bzang ba de gzhan gyi skyes pas slu ba de lta bu zhig lta/_des smras pa/_'di ni thams cad kyi chos te/_skyes pa rnams ni bud med thams cad la don du gnyer mod kyi bud med nyid 
[\[76b.4\]]kyis shes par byas te/_gal te bud med mdzangs na de byed du mi btub po/_/de nas sa gas smras pa/_rje'i sras gal te de lta bu la co dri ba'am/_gnod pa zhig bgyis na de la nyen du mi 'gyur grang /_sman chen pos smras pa/_bag rton la byos shig_/de nas des khyed kyis 
[\[76b.5\]]na'o zhes sgyu mdzod cig dang /_de nas mtho btsam par bgyi'o/_/de min par sgyu byas te 'dug pa dang /_des kyang de dag gi pho nya gang dag yin pa de dag las bzlugs pa 'di mi bde mod kyi/_ji ltar bka' stsal pa de bzhin du rim gro 'tshal lo zhes 'di skad du so sor spring ngo /_/des kyang 
[\[76b.6\]]shing las sman chen po'i gzugs brnyan byas nas de gos kyis g.yogs te mal du bsnyal lo/_/de dag so so la yang smras pa/_sman chen po 'di ni nyam chung ste/_che ge mo zhig dang /_che ge mo zhig gi dus su gzhan gyis ma 'tshal bar spyon cig ces byas nas sgrom chen po 
[\[76b.7\]]drug byas te rang gi khang pa drug tu bcug go/_/de nas de dag 'ongs pa dang sgrom du bcug ste bcings nas phyi de nyin sman chen po shi'o zhes sgra yang btang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs dag gis thos nas mya ngan chen 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]po dang ldan te/_bdag cag sems can 'di lta bu dang bral bar gyur to zhes rab tu sems shing mya ngan gyi rgya mtshor zhugs nas snying rje rje skad du smra'o/_/shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga des kyang blon po sgrom du bcug pa de drug legs par bsdams nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung 
[\[77a.2\]]du khyer te lha sman chen po ni dus las 'das te/_de'i nor gang lags pa dbyig dang /_gser dang /_dar dang /_rin po che la sogs pa de dag de nyid kyi rgyas btab pa 'di dag lags so/_/de nas rgyal pos/_de ni de ring shi nas deng nyid nga la 'di phul lo zhes shin tu mya ngan gyis gdungs 
[\[77a.3\]]so/_/de'i skabs su sman chen po nyid gnas gzhan zhig nas me tog gis brgyan te dgod cing rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin nas rgyal po la phyag byas te smras pa/_lhas bdag gdugs 'ga' yang byams pas ma bzung ste/_deng nyid sdum pa rgyal pos bzhes lags sam/_
[\[77a.4\]]rgyal pos smras pa/_ngas ma blangs te/_khyod nyid kyi khyim nas khyer te 'ongs so/_/yang smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sman chen ni/_/'di nas 'jig rten pha rol mchis/_/de yi rin chen 'di rnams lags/_/de dag mi dbang bzhes su gsol/_/rgyal chen bdag ni 
[\[77a.5\]]yugs sa ste/_/khyim thab dang ni bral bas na/_/bdag las brnyas pa bgyis nas lags/_/bdag las nor ni phrogs su mchi/_/de nas sman chen pos blon po'i mchog rnams kyi blo'i dpyod pa'i legs pa yang bstan to/_/rgyal po skyed pas kyang bltas na skra dang kha spu 
[\[77a.6\]]bregs/_rkang lag bzhi bskums pa'i blon po drug mthong nas/_bgad de sman chen po la smras pa/_sman chen po thabs 'di su'i yin smros shig_/des sa ga'i'o zhes thams cad rgyas par smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos bsams pa/_kye ma bud med kyi blo gros/_kye ma 
[\[77a.7\]]brtan pa/_kye ma blo'i dpyod pa/_des blon po'i mchog 'di dag 'di ltar co dris so zhes mgu nas de bkur ba cher byas so/_/yul thams cad du yang shing mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga ni de ltar blo dang ldan no zhes snyan pa grags so//_//sdom ni/_nga yang sman gyis de bzhin no/_/khyi dang 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]phyugs la bzas bsod sbyin/_/dam bca' rdo ba rol mo rnams/_/u dum bA ra sgyur mor 'dra/_/se mo do yang stor ba ste/_/ne tso gsang yang bsnyad pa'o/_/bar mdo gnyis pa'i tshigs bcad do/_/de nas rgyal pos sa ga mkhas shing mdzangs par shes nas sman chen po 
[\[77b.2\]]bsod nams dang ldan pas ni 'di lta bu'i chung ma blo dang ldan pa rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal pos sman chen po la smras pa/_gal te khyod dga' bar lta na nga la yang chung ma 'di ltar blo dang ldan pa zhig btsal te blangs na khyim gyi srid dang /_gzhan yang phyi rol rgyal po'i pho brang gi don 
[\[77b.3\]]'di la bde bar gnas so/_/sman chen pos smras pa/_gang nas btsal bar bgyi/_gang gi phyir rgyal po skyed pas smras pa/_lnga len gyi rgyal po'i bu mo sman ldan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/_gzhan yang dran pa dang shes bzhin can 'di ltar sa ga ci 'dra ba'i blo dang 
[\[77b.4\]]ldan pa zhig yod ces thos pa de chung mar long shig_/de nas sman chen pos smras pa/_lha 'di la thabs zhig bgyi na de yang lha'i mtshams las gzhan pa dgra lta bur mchis pa ste/_de la sngar thabs btsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas rgyal po skyed pas blon po mdun na 'don dag btang 
[\[77b.5\]]ste/_de dag slong ba la zhugs so/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos blon po rnams bsdus te/_ji ltar bya zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal po skyed pa 'di sngan chad lha'i bka' mi nyan te don 'dis 'o skol gyi dbang du 'gyur ba ni de dag mchis nas ji ltar bgyi ba gdod 
[\[77b.6\]]mdzad kyis re zhig stsol cig des byin nas che ge mo zhig na zla ba phyed kyi nyin par yud tsam pa dag dang sbyar te/_bag ma len du shog shig ces byas nas phyir song ste/_rgyal po skyed pa la bu mo sman ldan ni thob po zhes shes par byas so/_/ji ltar nam blang bar bya/_de dag gis tshes 
[\[77b.7\]]grangs che ge mo zhig dang /_yud tsam pa dang sbyor la shog shig ces mchi'o/_/dus de'i 'og tu lnga len gyi rgyal pos des bag ma gtang ba'i don du brtsams pa ni bza' ba dang btung ba dag sta gon byas te/_bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa thams cad dug dang bsre ba byas nas lnga 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]len gyi rgyal pos bsdogs pa 'di las ma 'phyi bar shog shig ces pho nya btang ngo /_/de nas de thos pa dang /_sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa la smras pa/_lha re zhig 'phral du bgyir mi rung ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de ni gang gi phyir lha'i mtshams las gzhan 
[\[78a.2\]]pa'i rgyal po ste/_de dang rtag tu rtsod cing 'dis rgyun du mi mthun pa lhan cig tu bgyis pas brtag par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_su rtog tu btang /_des smras pa/_rgyal po bde bar bzhugs shig_/bdag la ne tso spyod gsal zhes bgyi ba mkhas pa/_gsal ba/_
[\[78a.3\]]yid gzhungs pa de der btang la des thams cad la gtam bgyis nas slar mchi bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gyis shig_/de der song nas bsams pa/_su la bcar te gang gis na lhan cig 'grogs shing gtam bya/_des kun tu bltas na cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[78a.4\]]tha snyad gang gis bya bsam mo/_/ji tsam na rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs te der bltas na gdung gi bar na ri skegs zhig 'dug pa mthong ste/_de der song nas kyang de gnyis phan tshun gcig la gcig dga' bas yang dag par mgu bar byas nas gang nas 'ongs zhes dris so/_/
[\[78a.5\]]ne tsos smras pa/_byang phyogs kyi rgyal po shi bi zhes bya ba de nas kho bo 'ongs so/_/kho bo skyed mos tshal srung ste/_de la kho bo'i chung ma dam pa gzugs bzang ba mdzangs shing rjes su mthun pa yid du 'ong ba smra ba ri skegs mo zhig yod pa las ri skags de yang gzhan 
[\[78a.6\]]du song ba las khras khyer te/_des na kho bo mya ngan gyis sems gdungs shing phan tshun 'khyam pa las khyod kyi drung du phyin no/_/bzang mo khyod kho bo'i chung mar mi rung ngam/_des smras pa/_ji ltar na ne tso'i chung ma ri skegs yin zhes ma thos ma mthong ste/_de lta mod kyi ne 
[\[78a.7\]]tso'i chung ma ni ne tso nyid yin no zhes thos so/_/de nas spyod gsal gyis gzhan dag phan tshun 'ong zhing 'gro ba'i rnam grangs kyi rnam pas nye bar bsnyen to/_/yang smras pa/_bzang mo bdag ni shi bi'i rgyal/_/skyed mos srung bar gyur pa ste/_/kho bo'i chung ma ri skegs ni/_/'jam 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]pa'i tshig tu smrar gyur pa/_/byas ni nan gyis khyer bas na/_/bdag ni de yis gdungs par gyur/_/kho bo 'dod pas gdungs nas ni/_/khyod kyi gan du 'ongs pa yin/_/ri skegs kyis smras pa/_ne tso'i chung ma ri skegs ni/_/mi rigs par ni bdag gis bsams/_/ne tso'i 
[\[78b.2\]]chung ma ne tso bar/_/'di skad du ni mkhas pas bsgrags/_/de nas de bzhin du smras shing bsams pa bsgrubs nas/_de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas ne tso spyod gsal gyis rgyal po'i pho brang na bza' ba mang po sbrang rtsi'i 
[\[78b.3\]]mchog ces bya ba dang /_mya ngan med sgyur dang /_phe'u te'u dag dog ler 'tshed pa dang /_bu ram las byas pa'i kha zas mang po mthong nas ri skegs la smras pa/_ci'i phyir 'di dag 'tshed/_ci ste bdag cag gis thob bam/_de nas ri skegs la tshigs su bcad de smras 
[\[78b.4\]]pa/_dog ler mar sar mang po ni/_/'tshed par byed pa 'di rnams dag_/kha cig bdag cag gis thob bam/_/ri skegs kyis ni 'jam por smros/_/ri skegs kyis smras pa/_dog ler bca' ba khur ba dag_/'tshed par byed pa 'di dag kyang /_/ne tso mkhas pa 
[\[78b.5\]]spyod gsal ba/_/'di rnams khyod kyi bza' ba min/_/'di dag skyed pa'i ched du ni/_/dug gis thams cad bsres pa yin/_/de nas spyod gsal gyis rig pa sngon du btang nas ri skegs la thabs kyis yang smras pa/_lnga len rang gi bu mo ba/_/skyed pa la ni byin no zhes/_/
[\[78b.6\]]de lta bu yang sgra dag gis/_/phyogs kun du ni rgyas gyur na/_/de la su yi tshig bden zhing /_/gang gi tshig de de bzhin yin/_/ri skegs kyis smras pa/_ne tso mkhas pa spyod gsal ba/_/gtum po des ni mi byin te/_/blo gros ngan pa nyid dag gis/_/de la gsad pa dag tu 
[\[78b.7\]]brtson/_/de dag thos nas slar log ste ne tso spyod gsal gyis mthong zhing thos nas rtogs shing shes pa ni tshong pas don gyi rnyed pa thob pa yongs su grub pa bzhin no/_/ri skegs la shi bi'i phyir smras pa/_bdag gis chung ma 'dra rnyed pa/_/ri skegs 'jam par smra ba ni/_/shi 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]bi'i rgyal pos mkhyen bya'i phyir/_/bzang mo bdag ni 'gro bar bya/_/ri skegs kyis smras pa/_gal te rje yi sras gshegs na/_/shi bi'i rgyal po mkhyen gsol nas/_/dgung bdun dag las gzhan du ni/_/yun mi ring bar mkhyen par mdzod/_
[\[79a.2\]]bdag gi rigs dang rus dag dang /_/longs spyod kyang ni 'di 'dra bar/_/shi bi'i rgyal pos mkhyen par mdzod/_/bdag kyang slad rjes khyed ma dgum/_/de song nas phyin pa dang /_blon po sman chen po la rgya cher thams cad smras so/_/de nas sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa 
[\[79a.3\]]la mkhyen par byas so/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos kyang mi 'ong bar rtogs nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon nas glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du phyin nas rgyal po skyed 
[\[79a.4\]]pa'i pho brang bskor bar byas pa dang /_de nas blon po'i mchog sman chen pos bsams pa 'dis lhan cig thab mo 'gyed par yang mi nus na ji ltar bya dbyen zhig bya snyam mo/_/des lnga len gyi rgyal po'i blon po lnga brgya la rnam pa sna tshogs kyi skyes bskur te dbyen byas so/_/dbyen 
[\[79a.5\]]byas nas rgyal po skyed pas lnga len gyi rgyal po la pho nya btang ste/_kho bo khyod la rgol ba mi nus pa ma yin mod kyi kho bo dang khyod gnyen te/_khyod nyid gyos po yin pas mi rgal lo/_/'on kyang khyod nga'i lag tu 'tsho'am gshin pa ni shin tu rig par gyis shig_/nged kyis nus 
[\[79a.6\]]par gyur kyang khyod la mi rgal te/_gal te yang khyod the tshom du gyur na skyes 'di dang 'di dag ni blon po che ge mo rnams la bskur bar brtag par bya'o zhes des spring ba las skyes dang bcas su bzung ngo /_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal po de nyid kyi nub mo chas nas rang gi khyim du song ste phyin pa dang /_
[\[79a.7\]]blon po lnga brgya de dag bsad de/_de dag gi bu rnams kyang blon por bcug pa bden no zhes smras pa 'dis rgyal po skyed pa dang lhan cig pa dag dga' ba skyes par gyur to/_/sman chen pos kyang de dag bsad par thos nas bdag gis de lta bu dag byas so snyam ste dga' bar gyur to/_/
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]de dag kyang bsad nas rgyal po la sman chen pos gsol pa/_'di ltar bdag nyid dngos der mchis la thob bam mi thob brtag par bgyi'o/_/zhes smras so/_/gang gi phyir de der bdag nyid kyi dpung dang bcas nas lnga len gyi rgyal po'i yul du song ba dang /_lnga len gyi rgyal pos 
[\[79b.2\]]grong khyer gyi nang du shog shig ces smras so/_/des smras pa/_skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du mchis so/_/ji ste yang bdag nges par nang du mchi na/_blon po che ge mo zhig gi khyim du mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal po bag tsha ste/_ci'i phyir 'di 'di skad du smra/_
[\[79b.3\]]re zhig gzhan yang bdag dang blon po dag dbyen byed do snyam ste/_de ltar dga' na de nyid du 'dug shig ces spring ngo /_/de'i blon po rnams kyis 'di la bgros pa/_bdag cag gi pha chud gsan par byas pa de thams cad ni sman chen po 'di yin pas bdag cag gis sngon gyi sha khon 
[\[79b.4\]]rjes su dran par byas te/_rgyal po la de bzhin du gal gyis bcus la de ltar 'di phyir mi 'gro bar bya'o zhes 'dus nas rgyal po la de dag gis smras pa/_rgyal po skyed pa gang la blo'i dpyod tshul 'di lta bu de ni sman chen de'i lags so/_/de la rgyal po skyed pa ni pha rol 
[\[79b.5\]]la gnod pa bgyid mi nus te/_de ltar na de 'di nyid na mchis pa'i tshe bdag cag gis gzhan nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du mchi'o/_/des smras pa/_legs par smras so/_/de nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta pa'i 
[\[79b.6\]]tshogs dang /_shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs dag rgyal po'i pho brang gang na ba der song ngo /_/rgyal po skyed pa 'dis kyang sta gon byas so/_/sman chen pos kyang lnga len gyi rgyal po lam che ge mo zhig nas rgyal po skyed pa'i yul du song bar shes so/_/des kyang 
[\[79b.7\]]der cung zad zhig 'dug nas phyogs che ge mo zhig na rgyal po'i mdzod yod de/_mdzod de na rgyal po'i bu mo sman ldan ma zhes bya ba 'dug par shes so/_/de nas des nang 'khor ma zhig khrid de 'khor bzhag nas ji tsam na rgyal po'i mdzod du zhugs te mdzod phye nas bu mo dang /_'byor 
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]ba dbyig dang gser dag blangs nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te lam gzhan zhig nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ngo /_/de nas rgyal po skyed pa dang /_blon po dang /_grong mi rnams dang /_gzhan dag kyang las chen pos bsgrubs so zhes rab tu 
[\[80a.2\]]dga' ste rjed cing ri mor bya ba mang po dag byas so/_/lnga len gyi rgyal po'i blon po mchog kyang 'ongs na sman chen pos bu mo dang mdzod khyer ba dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang de dag gis spangs te rang gi yul du song ngo /_/rgyal po skyed pas kyang gang gi phyir bkra shis kyi rnam pa dag 
[\[80a.3\]]gis bu mo bag mar blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed/_dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos bu mo sman ldan la pho nya zhig btang nas 'di lta bu su'i thabs sus brtags/_sus dbyen byas pa dag gi don shes par gyis la rtogs 
[\[80a.4\]]la springs shig_/des brtags nas pho nya btang ba la sman chen po 'di la ne tso spyod gsal zhes bya ba mi'i skad du smra ba des 'di ltar brtags so/_/de nas lnga len gyi rgyal pos smras pa/_ne tso spyod gsal ci nas kyang slar thong shig_/de nas des rab tu 'bad pas rnyis bzung ste 
[\[80a.5\]]de la bskur ro/_/de nas rgyal po khro bas dkris pas rnam pa mang por spyos te sod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas ne tso spyod gsal gyis rkang pa la gtugs te rgyal po la gsol pa/_lha bdag gi pha dang mes po ji ltar bkum pa de bzhin du dgum par ci gnang /_gal te de lta na de 
[\[80a.6\]]bzhin du 'di gsad par gyis shig ces nas gnang ngo /_/ji lta bu nyid du pha dang mes po bsad ces des de la dris pa dang /_ras bal gyis mjug ma dkris te yungs mar gyis bskus nas bsregs te gtang ba dang /_de nam mkha' la phur te rgyal po'i pho brang kun nas 'bar bar byas chur 
[\[80a.7\]]zhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ba dang /_sman chen pos kyang dris pa khyod ga las 'dir phyin/_des ji ltar byas pa thams cad shes par byas pa dang /_de mgu bar gyur to/_/lnga len gyi rgyal po khro bas dkris pas yang yi ge bskur ba/_des rnam pa 'di lta bus 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]gnod pa byas te nges par slar thong shig_/des kyang bzung ste bskur ro/_/lnga len gyi rgyal po khros pas spu ril phyi nas sha'i ri lur bzhag ste 'gro na song shig ces phyi rol du bor ba dang /_khras khyer ro/_/des kyang khra la gsol ba btab pa/_kho bo zos pa ni nyin gcig gi zas su zad de kho bo 
[\[80b.2\]]btang na ni nyin gcig bzhin du ji lta bu'i dgos pa dang bza' ba mang po dag de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes des yid ches par mna' bor nas btang ste/_spyod gsal gyis smras pa/_phyogs che ge mo zhig na rgyal po'i gtsug lag khang der zhog shig_/des de bzhin du byas pa dang /_de 
[\[80b.3\]]gtsug lag [(]khong [,]khang [)]du song ste bu ga zhig tu zhugs pa dang /_phyi de nyin bram ze dag lha mchod pa'i phyir der lhags/_lha dri ma phyis te/_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_lha bshos dang /_gtor ma sbyin par brtson na/_spyod gsal des kyang smras pa/_kye bram ze rgyal po sdig 
[\[80b.4\]]pa can lnga len gyi rgyal po la nga'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/_/nyes pa 'di dang 'di dag byas pa de ni ngas gnod par byas pa yin no/_/gal te nga'i tshig bzhin ma byas na phyir yang bya'o/_/de ltar re zhig nyin re zhing sha rjen dmar po dang /_til dang /_'bras thug po che bre'u chung gang gi 
[\[80b.5\]]lha bshos byas pa dang de nas phyis bsam mo/_/song nas des lnga len gyi rgyal po la khong du chud par byas so/_/rgyal pos kyang de'i don kho nar lha bshos dang /_gtor ma bya ba la zhugs te/_nyin gcig bzhin du rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_mdun na 'don dag lhags nas 
[\[80b.6\]]lha la gnang ngam mi gnang bka' stsal par gsol ba btab pa dang /_de bzhin du bya'o zhes so/_/'di ltar dus mang du lon nas ne tso spyod gsal de'i gshog pa skyes shing 'phur nus par gyur pa dang /_yang 'gro ba'i blo skyes te/_de la yang smras pa/_'di ltar nga la 
[\[80b.7\]]gang khyed stobs kyi dpung dang /_lha mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dag dang lhan cig mgo gtun bzhin bregs la nga'i drung du shog shig dang /_'di ltar bzod cing gnang bar bya'o/_/des rgyal po la khong du chud par byas pa dang /_rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du byas te/_
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]de ltar thams cad mgo gtun bzhin du bregs nas lha gang du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas bzod pa gsol pa dang /_de nas ne tso nam mkha' la 'phur te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so/_/byed pa la ni slar byas te/_/phyi bas slar ni phyi la ltos/_/'dir ni 
[\[81a.2\]]gcig pu phyi ba yis/_/btsun mo kun dang legs par phyi/_/des 'di skad du smras te/_de nas yang sman chen po'i drung du song ba dang /_spyod gsal yun ring zhig tu ma mthong na gang nas phyin ces dris so/_/des 'di dang 'di lta bu'i thabs de dag bdag gis bgyis so zhes rgya 
[\[81a.3\]]cher smras so/_/de nas sman chen po yid dga' zhing mgu ste/_rgyal po skyed pa la ne tso spyod gsal gyis 'di ltar bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_rgyal po yang mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan nas smras pa/_e ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no zhes 
[\[81a.4\]]smras so/_/de nas yang dus phyi zhig na rgyal pos blon po rnams la gang rab tu mkhas pa nyams sad do snyam blo skyes nas de dag bos te so sor khyi re re byin nas 'di dag dus 'di tsam na thams cad mi skad du smra bar gyis shig de dag gis de khyim du khrid de gso bar byas pa ni shes kyi mi skad du zer ba mi 
[\[81a.5\]]shes so/_/sman chen pos khyi de khyim du khrid de song nas khri las mi ring ba zhig tu phur ba la btags te bzhag go/_/nam sman chen po'i kha zas drangs nas bca' ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_khu ba sna tshogs su sbyar ba za bar mthong yang len mi nus so/_/de nas ngan pa cung zad cig 
[\[81a.6\]]byin pas ma shi ma sos tsam du nyam chung la rid de skem par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal pos khyi de dag lobs sam/_ma lobs bltas khrid de shog shig par bsgo'o/_/de dag gis ni thabs la mi mkhas pas bslab ma nus so/_/de nas sman chen po la khyod kyi ci 'dra khrid de shog ces smras nas 
[\[81a.7\]]rgyal po'i mdun du 'ongs te bltas na skem zhing rid do/_/des 'di ci'i phyir rid ces dris pa dang /_sman chen pos lha bdag gis ci zos ci 'tshal ba de bzhin 'di la stsal to zhes smras pa dang /_khyis smras pa/_lha 'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mchis te/_bdag ltogs te de'u bkum mo/_/de nas sman chen 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]pos bdag gis 'di ltar 'di mi'i skad du smra bar bgyis so zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po dgyes par gyur to/_/de nas yang dus phyi zhig na yang nyam skyed par 'dod nas lug 'di rnams khyed kyis bza' btung zhim po stsal la tshil med la mthu dang ldan par byos shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas blon 
[\[81b.2\]]po lnga brgya po de dag ni thabs mi shes te/_de gsos te tshon por byas so/_/sman chen pos ni bza' ba zhim po mdun du bzhag nas shing la spyang ki'i gzugs cig byas te lug gi mdun du bzhag pa des de mthong bas ni skrag ste tshil ni ma skyes mthu dang ni ldan par gyur to/_/de dag kun bltas 
[\[81b.3\]]na gzhan dag ni mdog dang ldan zhing tshil mang bar gyur to/_/sman chen po'i ni tshil med la mthu dang ldan par mthong nas rgyal po dga' ste mdzangs so zhes bsngags so/_/de nas yang dus phyi zhig na gang mkhas pa bgams te blta'o snyam du bsams nas blon po de dag gi bu lnga brgya po de dag 
[\[81b.4\]]skyed mos tshal du sngon zan byas te za 'thung zhing 'khod pa las ngo mtshar dang ldan pa'i gtam rtsom ste/_su gang gis ngo mtshar gyi gtam mam/_khyim na yod pa ci thos pa smros shig_/de dag mdza' bas gcig la gcig ngo mtshar gang la ci yod pa dang /_khyim dang gzhan gyi phyogs 
[\[81b.5\]]na mthong ba rnams smras so/_/de nas khye'u dag gis sman chen po'i bu la khyod kyang smros zhes bskul ba dang /_sman chen po'i khyim du rdo zhig yod de de ka rten yin pa las de chu'i steng du bzhag na phan tshun du 'phyo zhing nyug cing mnye ba la sogs pa'i las kun byed do/_/de nas khye'u des bdag gi khyim 
[\[81b.6\]]na yod pa de dag la bsnyad de nged kyi khyim na ngo mtshar yod pa de lta bu ni su la yang med do/_/de dag gis de'i rjes nas bzung ba dang /_nged kyi khyim na rdo ba chu'i steng na 'phyo zhing 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bdag cag gis rdo chu'i steng nas 'phyo zhing 'gro ba de lta bu ni ma mthong ma thos so/_/
[\[81b.7\]]de nas de dang de dag gis gser gyi dong tshe lnga brgya la rgyal bkye'o/_/de nas gzhon nu des ji ltar gyur cing de'i phyir bdag dang rgyal bkye'o zhes pha la smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu ma bstan cig_/de nas de dag lhags nas ma bstan pa dang /_gser gyi dong tshe lnga brgya rgyal du phab bo/_/
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]de nas sman chen pos spre'u rnams bzung ste/_rol mo bslab nas bu la smras pa/_da ni song la sngun zan pa'i nang du sngar gtam glengs la khyod kyis ngo mtshar sus ci mthong ci thos khyim lta na yod pa smros shig ces byos la de nas khyod kyis nga ni rgyal nyis 'gyur du byas te/_bdag gi 
[\[82a.2\]]khyim na ni rol mo mkhan spre'u yod de glu la mkhas/_gar la mkhas/_rnga rdung ba la mkhas so zhes byos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_des kyang de bzhin du gtam gzhan las brjod de/_'di lta bu mthong ste yod do zhes smras pa dang /_de nas de dag na re bdag cag gis spre'u rol mo byed pa ma 
[\[82a.3\]]mthong ma thos so/_/des smras pa/_de ste bdag gis bstan na khyed kyis ci sbyin/_de dag gis smras pa/_sngar yang khyod la gser gyi dong tshe lnga brgya phab pa yin/_da yang de bzhin mi rigs mi tshul ba zer te/_de ste yang khyod kyis ma bstan na gser gyi dong tshe stong dbab bo/_/ji ste bstan 
[\[82a.4\]]na nged kyis sbyin no/_/de ltar dam bcas nas spre'u khrid de rgyal po'i pho brang du 'dong ngo /_/des kyang spre'u rnams rgyal po'i pho brang du ded de rgyal po'i mdun du glu dang /_gar dang /_rnga rdung ba kun bstan pa dang /_de nas de dag gis de la gser gyi dong tshe stong byin no/_/rgyal pos kyang ngo mtshar du 
[\[82a.5\]]bzung ste/_'di lta bu dag ni sngon yang ma mthong ma thos so/_/de nas rgyal po blon po dang grong ba rnams kyis kye thams cad yang de gcig pu mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa la ltos shig_/kun gyis sman chen po la bkur sti byas so/_/de nas yul be de ha'i bram ze zhig 'dug pa des bdag 
[\[82a.6\]]dang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/_de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las phyi zhig na bram ze mo de sems can dang ldan par gyur pas zla ba dgu 'das te btsas na bu mo zhig byung na gzugs legs shing blta na bzang mo zhig go/_/bram ze de yang smrang dang smrang gi yan lag 
[\[82a.7\]]gi pha rol tu phyin pa/_rig pa'i gnas [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_blo dang shes rab rno ba des 'di gang bdag dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba bdag gi drung na slob cing 'don par byed pa de la bu mo 'di sbyin no snyam du bsams so/_/btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te 'di'i ming cir gdags 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]zhes bgros na/_bu mo 'di'i ming u dum bA ri kar btags te/_de gsos bskyed nas chen mor gyur to/_/de nas bram ze gzhan zhig la bu kha dog ngan pa gzugs mi sdug pa mdog ngan pa mtshan ngan pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_de skyes ma thag tu pha mas kyang 'di lta bu mi 
[\[82b.2\]]sdug pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i phyir ming yang gzugs ngan du btags so/_/de gsos bskyed nas cher skyes pa dang /_phas bu ngo tsha bar 'gyur ba gzugs ngan pa 'di 'dra ba la bslabs te ci rung snyam nas ma bslabs so/_/de nas khye'u gzugs ngan de nam cher gyur pa de na bslab par 
[\[82b.3\]]'dod na phas ni ma bslab kyis yul gzhan du 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas/_bram ze gzhan zhig gi drung du phyin te/_bram ze'i khye'u de langs nas bdag ni bram ze 'di zhes bgyi ba'i bu lags te khyod la slob par 'tshal ba'i slad du khyod kyi drung du mchis so zhes gsol ba dang /_des kyang de
