[\[102a.3\]]'dul ba de yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_kun dga' bo dper na/_'bras sA lu phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing la ser ba'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa babs na/_'bras sA lu de nyid nyams par 'gyur/_rnam par nyams par 'gyur/_tshul ma yin pas ma rung 
[\[102a.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du chos 'dul ba la bud med rab tu byung na/_chos 'dul ba 'di yun ring du mi gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste kun dga' bo zhing rmed pa'i khyim bdag bu ram shing phun sum tshogs pa la btsa'i nad byung na bu ram shing dag ma rung bar 'gyur/_chud 
[\[102a.5\]]zos par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin du chos 'dul ba la bud med rab tu byung na chos 'dul ba 'di yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang kun dga' bo ngas bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad bcas pa la bud med kyis nam 
[\[102a.6\]]'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/de 'di lta ste kun dga' bo khyim bdag zhing pas dbyar 'das te ston kyi dus na chu bo'am yur ba yang rung chu bcad na chu de bgags pas 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de ltar de bzhin du bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i 
[\[102a.7\]]bla ma'i chos brgyad bca' bar bya'o/_/de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par gyis shig_/brgyad gang zhe na/_kun dga' bo dge slong rnams las bud med rnams kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ba rab tu rtogs par 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]bya'o/_/kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos dang por bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong ma dag gis dge slong pha rnams la zla ba phyed phyed cing ston pa'i lung rjes su 
[\[102b.2\]]bstan pa btsal bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos gnyis su bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong ma dag gis dge slong pha med pa'i gnas su dbyar 
[\[102b.3\]]tshul du mi 'jug par bya ste/_kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos gsum du bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong ma dbyar tshul du zhugs pas dge 'dun 
[\[102b.4\]]gnyis ka la mthong ba dang thos pa dang dogs pa'i gnas gsum du skabs dbye bar bya ste/_kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos bzhir bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge 
[\[102b.5\]]slong mas dge slong pha tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa la gleng bar mi bya dran par mi bya ste/_kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong pha la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba 
[\[102b.6\]]nyams pa rnams gleng ba dang /_dran par byed pa dag mi gnang ngo /_/dge slong dag gis ni dge slong ma la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa la gleng ba dang /_dran par byed pa la dgag pa med de/_kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med 
[\[102b.7\]]rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos lngar bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong pha la tshig ngan pa mi smra/_khro bar mi bya/_bsdigs par mi bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]slong la tshig ngan pa smra ba dang /_khro ba dang /_bsdigs pa rnams mi gnang ste/_kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos drug par bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun 
[\[103a.2\]]dga' bo bla ma'i chos nyams na dge slong mas dge 'dun gnyi ga la zla ba phyed kyi bar du mnyes par bya ba spyod cig_/kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos bdun du bcas te/_de la kun dga' bo bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i 
[\[103a.3\]]bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pas da gzod bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong la tshig snyan pa dang /_bstod pa dang ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_phyag bya ba bya ste/_kun dga' bo ngas 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing 
[\[103a.4\]]mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad du bcas te/_'di la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo de ste gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos bla ma'i chos 'di brgyad la yang dag par bzung zhing nan tan du byas na 'di nyid de la rab tu byung ba'o/_/de nyid bsnyen 
[\[103a.5\]]par rdzogs pa'o/_/de nyid nyes pa'i dngos po zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/gau ta 
[\[103a.6\]]mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gau ta mI bud med rnams kyis legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos por ni gnang mod kyi 'on kyang gau ta mI 
[\[103a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad bcas te/_'di la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/nan tan du bya'o/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bka' stsal pa de nyan kyis gsung shig_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'das kyis ni 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo dge slong las bud med rnams kyis rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos por rab tu rtogs par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[103b.2\]]bla ma'i chos bcas pa dang po ste/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong rnams kyi drung na dge slong mas zla ba phyed phyed cing ston pa'i lung rjes su bstan pa btsal bar bya'o/_/gau ta mI 
[\[103b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos gnyis su bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong med pa'i 
[\[103b.4\]]gnas su dbyar tshul du ma 'jug cig_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos gsum du bcas te/_'di la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_
[\[103b.5\]]kun dga' bo dbyar tshul du zhugs pa'i dge slong mas dge 'dun gnyis ka la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gsum du skabs dbye bar bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos bzhir bcas te/_
[\[103b.6\]]'di la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'di skad gsungs so/_/kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa la gleng bar mi bya/_dran 
[\[103b.7\]]par mi bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa la gleng bar bya ba dang /_dran par bya ba mi gnang ngo /_kun dga' bo dge slong gis ni dge slong ma tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa la gleng bar byed/_dran par byed pa la mi gnang ba med do/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos lnga par bcas te 'di la bud med rnams kyis nam 
[\[104a.2\]]'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong la tshig ngan pa smra bar mi bya'o/_/khro bar mi bya/_bsdigs par mi bya'o/_/kun dga' bo dge slong mas dge slong la tshig ngan pa smra ba dang /_khro ba dang /_bsdigs 
[\[104a.3\]]pa rnams mi gnang ste/_gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos drug par bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/gau ta mI yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[104a.4\]]bo bla ma'i chos byung ba'i dge slong mas dge 'dun sde gnyis la zla ba phyed phyed kyi bar du mnyes par spyod do/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos bdun du bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab 
[\[104a.5\]]par bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas da gzod bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong la tshig snyan pa dang /_bstod pa dang ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_phyag bya bar bya'o/_/gau ta mI bcom 
[\[104a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad du bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de ste gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo 
[\[104a.7\]]chen mo bla ma'i chos 'di brgyad yang dag par bzung zhing nan tan byas na de la 'di nyid de'i rab tu byung ba'o/_/'di ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'o/_/'di ni dge slong ma'i dngos po yin no zhes bka' stsal to/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad 'di rnams bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bgyi ba 'di ni bdag gis ngag dang /_yid dang /_spyi bos kyang mnod do/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo de 'di lta ste/_rgyal rigs kyi bu mo'am/_bram ze'i bu mo'am/_
[\[104b.2\]]rje'u rigs kyi bu mo'am/_dmangs rigs kyi bu mo yang rung rab tu bkrus pa/_rab tu byugs pa/_skra dang sen mo byad byas pa/_gos dkar po bgos pa la kha cig gis me tog ut+pa la'i phreng ba'am/_tsam pa ka'i phreng ba dang /_ba ri shi ka'i phreng ba dang /_a ti mug ti'i phreng ba yang /_
[\[104b.3\]]rung ba byin na des de la yid dga' rangs te lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas yan lag gi mchog mgo bo la 'jog go/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med rnams kyi nyes pa dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad po 'di rnams bcas te/_de la 
[\[104b.4\]]bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bgyi ba 'di dag ni bdag gis ngag dang /_yid dang /_spyi bos kyang mnod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos bla ma'i chos rnams nyams su blangs pas na rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong 
[\[104b.5\]]ma'i dngos por gnang ba de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni de ste gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos bla ma'i chos brgyad yang dag par bzung nas nan tan byas na de la 'di nyid rab tu byung ba'o/_/'di nyid bsnyen par rdzogs pa'o/_/
[\[104b.6\]]'di nyid dge slong ma'i dngos po'o zhes bka' stsal na/_btsun pa de las gzhan pa'i bud med rnams ji ltar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por bgyi zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li bud med gzhan ni rim bzhin 
[\[104b.7\]]du rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med gzhan ni rim bzhin du rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byos shig ces bka' stsal na dge slong dag gis ji lta bu rim bzhin du bya ba mi shes nas de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa shAkya mo lnga brgya rnams ni bla ma'i chos rnams khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos por gyur to/_/bud med gzhan ni 
[\[105a.2\]]rim bzhin byas te dge slong ma gang la yang rung rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa zhig gi drung du 'ongs nas des bar chad kyi chos rnams dris la gzung bar bya'o/_/bzung nas skyabs gsum dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi lnga byin cig_/skyabs gsum gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[105a.3\]]chos dang /_dge 'dun no/_/bslab pa'i gzhi lnga gang zhe na/_srog gcod pa rab tu spangs pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_chang dang 'bru'i khu ba myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas rab tu spangs shing chang dang 'bru'i khu ba 
[\[105a.4\]]myos pa bag med pa'i gnas las rab tu spangs pa de ltar 'di bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang deng gi nyin par nas nam 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_chang dang 'bru'i khu ba myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas 
[\[105a.5\]]rab tu spangs pa'o/_/'di bzhin du yang skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi sbyin par bya'o/_/thog mar ston pa la phyag byed du chug shig_/de nas dge slong ma gang gis skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi sbyin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing thal mo sbyor du chug la/_de nas des 'di 
[\[105a.6\]]skad du smra bar bya'o/_/'phags ma dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nam 'tsho'i bar du rkang pa gnyis kyi nang na gtso bo sangs rgyas la skyabs su [(]'chi'o[,]mchi'o[)]/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i nang na mchog dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/mang po'i nang na mchog dge 'dun la 
[\[105a.7\]]skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge bsnyen mar 'phags pas gzung du gsol/_de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o/_/de nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga byin cig_/'phags ma dgongs shig_/ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du srog 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las rab tu spangs pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang deng gi nyin par nas bzung ste/_nam 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las rab tu spangs te yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa'i 
[\[105b.2\]]rjes su slob bo/_/rjes su sgrub bo/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/gzhan yang ji ltar dgra bcom pa de dag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_chang dang /_'bru'i khu ba myos pa bag med pa'i gnas spangs shing rab tu 
[\[105b.3\]]spangs pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang deng gi nyi gnyis nas bzung ste/_nam 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_bag med pa'i gnas spangs shing /_chang dang 'bru'i khu ba myos pa bag med pa'i gnas nas 
[\[105b.4\]]slar log ste/_bdag yan lag lnga po 'dis 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa'i rjes su slob bo/_/rjes su sgrub bo/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/slob dpon mas thabs yin no/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge bsnyen mas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas dge 'dun gyi nang 
[\[105b.5\]]du sgrogs pa'i dge slong ma skos shig_/gang bskos pa des kyang dge slong ma de la khyod kyis 'di la bar chad kyi chos dris sam zhes dris shig_/ma dris par bsgrag par byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong ma des dge 'dun 'dus shing 'khod dam/_so so'i gnas 
[\[105b.6\]]khang du yang rung 'di skad du sgrogs shig_/gson cig 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ma rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las rab tu byung bar 'tshal te/_khyim pa mo gos dkar po skra ma bregs pa las legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen 
[\[105b.7\]]par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos por gsol na/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag par dad pas khyim nas khyim med par mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las rab tu 'byung na/_de yang bar chad kyi chos rnams yongs su dag go zhes mo nyid mchi na ci 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]rab tu byung shig gam/_thams cad kyis kyang de ste yongs su dag na'o zhes smros shig_/de ste 'di bzhin smra na ni legs/_'on te ma smras na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mkhan mor gsol ba bya ste/_slob dpon ma dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 
[\[106a.2\]]slob dpon ma la mkhan mor gsol te/_slob dpon ma bdag gi mkhan mor gyur cig_/slob dpon ma mkhan mo las rab tu dbyung bar gsol lo/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_tshig gsum pa la mkhan mo mkhan mo las zhes brjod par bya'o/_/mkhan mos thabs yin zhes 
[\[106a.3\]]brjod/_rab tu byung mas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas mkhan mos 'breg pa'i dge slong ma la skra breg par gsol cig_/des kyang nu mo skra breg gam zhes dris shig_/de ste breg go zhes smra na breg_/de ste ma yin no zhes smra na 'di nas song zhes smros shig_/dge slong dag gis 
[\[106a.4\]]skra 'breg pa'i dge slong mas de ltar mngon du spyad pa'i chos bcas te/_skra 'breg pa'i dge slong mas 'di ltar grang bar gyur na chu dron pos khrus bya'o/_/'on te tsha bar gyur pa'i tshe na chu grang mos khrus bya'o/_/de nas skad cig gcig la lus kyi chu bskams te sham thabs gyon cig_/sham 
[\[106a.5\]]thabs bskon pa na mtshan ma med pa'am/_mtshan gnyis pa'am/_gle 'dams pa ma yin nam zhes mo mtshan brtag par bya'o/_/skra 'breg pa'i dge slong mas de ltar mngon du spyad pa'i chos bcas pa yang dag par blangs te mi spyod na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas rab tu 
[\[106a.6\]]byung ba nye bar bsgrub par bya ste/_dang po ston pa la phyag 'tshal du bcug_/de'i 'og tu mkhan mo la 'tshal du bcug ste/_mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug la thal mo sbyor du bcug nas de nas des 'di skad du smra bar bya'o/_/mkhan mo dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 
[\[106a.7\]]nam 'tsho'i bar du/_rkang gnyis kyi nang na gtso bo sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i nang na dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/mang po'i nang na mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa shAkya seng ge shAkya'i rgyal po gtso bo de rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag rab tu byung ste khyim pa'i rtags spang ngo /_/rab tu byung ba'i rtags yang dag par len to/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum bzlas/_mkhan mos thabs yin no zhes brjod 
[\[106b.2\]]par bya'o/_/rab tu byung mas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de nas mkhan mos dge tshul ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'bogs pa'i dge slong ma gsol cig_/gang la gsol ba des ston pa la phyag 'tshal du chug la mdun du tsog pur zhog ste thal mo sbyor du chug la skyabs su 'gro ba dang dge 
[\[106b.3\]]tshul ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phog shig_/'phags ma dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nam 'tsho'i bar du/_rkang gnyis kyi nang na gtso bo sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'i nang na dam pa'i chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/mang po'i nang na mchog 
[\[106b.4\]]dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge tshul mar 'phags mas gzung du gsol/_de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du bzlas/_tshig gsum pa la slob dpon mas zhes brjod par bya'o/_/slob dpon mas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge tshul 
[\[106b.5\]]mas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de'i rjes la dge slong ma zhig gis grib tshod gzhal bar bya zhing /_skyes bu dang rtsa ba dang nyin mtshan gyi cha dang dus tshod kyang brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bslab pa'i gzhi bcu byin cig_/'phags ma dgongs shig_/ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom 
[\[106b.6\]]pa de dag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar log pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang deng gi dus 'di nas bzung ste nam 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las slar ldog go/_/bdag yan lag dang po 'dis ji ltar 'phags 
[\[106b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis bslab pa'i rjes su slob po/_/rjes su sgrub po/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/gzhan yang ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_'bras bu'i chang 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_brdung ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dang /_kha dog 'chang ba rnams dang /_mal stan mthon po dang mal stan chen po dang /_dus ma yin par za ba dang /_gser dngul blang ba rnams spangs te/_gser 
[\[107a.2\]]dngul blang ba las slar log pa de bzhin du bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang deng gi dus 'di nas bzung ste/_nam 'tsho'i bar du ma byin par len pa dang /_mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang 'bras bu'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med par 'gyur ba'i gnas 
[\[107a.3\]]dang /_glu dang /_gar dang /_brdung ba dang /_phreng ba dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dang /_kha dog 'chang ba rnams dang /_mal stan mthon po dang mal stan chen po dang /_dus ma yin par za ba dang /_gser dngul blang ba dag spangs nas gser dngul blang ba las slar log ste/_bdag yan lag bcu 
[\[107a.4\]]po 'dis ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gis bslab pa'i rjes su slob bo/_/rjes su sgrub bo/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/slob dpon mas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/dge tshul mas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/de ste khyim du gnas pa lo bcu lon pa'am/_gzhon nu 
[\[107a.5\]]ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lon pa de la ni lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa byin cig_/'di bzhin du sbyin par bya ste/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'dus shing 'khod do/_/nyung na yang dge slong ma bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i 'khor la phyag 'tshal du chug la rgan pa'i drung du 
[\[107a.6\]]tsog pur zhog la mkhan mor gsol bar bya'o/_/mkhan mo la phyag 'tshal du bcug la tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyor du bcug nas de ste mkhan mo yin na ni 'di bzhin gsol lo/_/dgongs shig mkhan mo bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan mo la mkhan mor gsol na mkhan mo 
[\[107a.7\]]bdag gi mkhan mor gyur cig_/mkhan mo las bslab pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blang bar gsol lo/_/de ste slob dpon ma yin na yang 'di skad du gsol bar bya'o/_/slob dpon ma dgongs shig bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba slob dpon las mkhan mor gsol te/_slob dpon ma bdag 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]gi mkhan mor gyur cig_/slob dpon ma mkhan mo las bslab pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blang bar gsol lo/_/de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum mo/_/gsum pa la mkhan mo zhes brjod/_mkhan mos thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/_/slob mas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o/_/
[\[107b.2\]]de nas bslab pa'i sdom pa gsol bar bya'o/_/gson cig_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te/_mkhan mo 'di zhes bgyi ba las rab tu rdzogs par 'tshal na/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan mo mtshan 'di zhes bgyi ste/_'phags 
[\[107b.3\]]ma'i dge 'dun las lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa gsol na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun mas bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon pa'am gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lon te/_chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa 
[\[107b.4\]]thugs brtse ba can brtse ba'i slad du stsal du gsol te/_de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma gcig gis gsol ba thob la las byos shig_/gson cig_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon 
[\[107b.5\]]pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad lon te 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma las lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gsol na/_de 'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnang la 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis 
[\[107b.6\]]ming 'di zhes bya ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma ste/_mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa stsol cig_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di 
[\[107b.7\]]bzhin du bya'o/_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma ste/_mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas 'phags ma'i dge 'dun las lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]drug gi bslab pa gsol na/_de'i slad du 'phags ma'i dge 'dun mas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma ste/_mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i 
[\[108a.2\]]chos drug gi bslab pa gsol na/_gang ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma ste/_chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa stsal bar 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams gang bzod pa ni cang ma gsung shig_/mi bzod pa rnams 
[\[108a.3\]]ni gsung shig_/ming 'di zhes bgyi ba khyim na gnas pa lo bcu lon pa dang /_gzhon nu ma lo [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad ma ste/_chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug 'phags ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis stsal te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams bzod cing gnang ste cang mi gsung bas na de de 
[\[108a.4\]]bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de nas de la chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug zhib tu ston cig_/drug gang zhe na/_gcig pu grong du mi 'gro dang /_/chu bo pha rol mi rgal lo/_/skyes pa dag dang reg mi bya/_/skyes pa dang yang gnas mi gcig_/smyan du 'gyur ba mi bya ste/_/kha na ma tho mi 
[\[108a.5\]]bcab po/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yis/_/gsung rab kyi ni chos drug gsungs/_/rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gang zhe na/_gser la sogs pa mi bzung ste/_/gsang ba'i spu ni breg mi bya/_/sa yang brko bar mi bya zhing /_/glen pas rtswa sngon mi gcad do/_/byin len ma byas 
[\[108a.6\]]zas mi bza'/_/gzhag pa rnams ni bza' mi bya/_/rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug 'di/_/bde bar gshegs pas ma gnang ngo /_/nam lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gis bslab par gyur na/_de nas tshangs par spyod pa la rim gror bya ba'i sdom pa sbyin par 
[\[108a.7\]]bya'o/_/thog mar mkhan mos chos gos lnga dang /_lhung bzed shoms la gsang ba ston pa dang /_las byed pa'i dge slong ma gsol cig_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_nyung na yang dge slong ma bcu gnyis 'dus pa'i 'khor la lan gsum 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]du phyag byas nas mkhan mor gsol ba byas te/_de ste mkhan mo yin na ni 'di bzhin gsol lo/_/dgongs shig mkhan mo/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan mo la mkhan mor gsol na/_mkhan mo bdag gi mkhan mor gyur cig_/mkhan mo las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol lo/_/de ste 
[\[108b.2\]]slob dpon ma la yang 'di skad du gsol ba bya'o/_/slob dpon ma dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba slob dpon ma las mkhan mor gsol te/_slob dpon ma bdag gi mkhan mor gyur cig_/slob dpon ma mkhan mo las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol lo/_/de bzhin lan gnyis 
[\[108b.3\]]lan gsum mo/_/de nas chos gos rnams byin gyis brlab par bya'o/_/mkhan mo dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i chos gos 'di sbyar mar byin gyis brlabs te byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos gos kun du spyad pa'o/_/de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum/_'di bzhin du stod g.yogs dang /_
[\[108b.4\]]bar du bgo ba dang /_khu sul dang /_rngul gzan rnams byin gyis brlab po/_/de nas lhung bzed dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma la bstan to/_/dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed bzang ngo zhes smros shig_/de nas lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs te/_mkhan mo dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i 
[\[108b.5\]]lhung bzed 'di ni drang srong gi snod de/_bslang ba'i snod du byin gyis brlab po/_/bza' bar kun du spyad do/_/de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum mo/_/de'i 'og tu thos pa'i gnas nas spangs nas mthong ba'i gnas su thal mo sbyar la mang po 'dus pa logs su ston la zhog shig_/de nas las byed pa'i 
[\[108b.6\]]dge slong mas ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gsang ba ston par su la gsol smros shig_/gang bskos pa des kyang ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'o zhes smros shig_/de nas las byed pa'i dge slong mas thog mar dad par byos shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bya ba ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba'i 
[\[108b.7\]]gsang ba ston par dad de/_de ste dad na des dad do zhes smros shig_/de nas las byed pa'i dge slong mas gsol ba nyi tshe byos shig_/gson cig 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gsang ste ston par ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dad na/_de 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnong shig dang /_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la gsang ba ston te/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/de nas 
[\[109a.2\]]gsang ba ston pa'i dge slong mas mdun du tsog pur zhog ste thal mo sbyar du chug la smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/'di ni khyod kyi bden pa'i dus/_'di ni yang dag pa'i dus te/_ngas khyod la cung zad cig dris pa de thams cad khyod kyis ma 'dzem par byung ba la ni byung zhes bya/_
[\[109a.3\]]ma byung ba la ni ma byung zhes ma nor bar smros shig_/khyod bud med dam/_bud med do/_/khyim du gnas pa lo bcu gnyis pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo nyi shu tshang ngam/_tshang ngo /_/khyod kyi chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du ldan nam/_ldan no/_/khyod kyi pha ma dang khyim thab rnams gson nam/_pha dang ma 
[\[109a.4\]]dang khyo rnams kyis gnang ngam/_bran mo ma yin nam/_phrogs pa ma yin nam/_rnyed pa ma yin nam/_btsongs pa ma yin nam/_rtsod pa med dam/_rkus pa ma yin nam/_gzhan gyi chags pa med dam/_sprul pa ma yin nam/_dud 'gro ma yin nam/_rgyal po la gtses pa ma yin nam/_
[\[109a.5\]]rgyal po dang 'khon pa ma yin nam/_rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed pa ma yin nam/_khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byas sam byed du bcug pa ma yin nam/_mi srun pa ma yin nam/_mya ngan gyis gdungs pa ma yin nam/_sbrum ma ma yin nam/_mtshan med pa ma yin nam/_mtshan 
[\[109a.6\]]gnyis pa ma yin nam/_gle 'dams pa ma yin nam/_rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa ma yin nam/_khrag med pa ma yin nam/_mtshan ma tsam yod pa ma yin nam/_dge slong bslus pa ma yin nam/_pha bsad pa ma yin nam/_ma bsad pa ma yin nam/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yin nam/_de bzhin 
[\[109a.7\]]gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma yin nam/_mu stegs can ma yin nam/_mu stegs can du 'gro ba ma yin nam/_rkun po'i rgyal mtshan can ma yin nam/_rkun gnas pa ma yin nam/_so sor gnas pa ma yin nam/_mi gnas pa ma yin nam/_ci khyod sngon rab tu 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]byung ba ma yin nam/_de ste rab tu byung ba'o zhes smra na/_'o na slar song shig ces smros shig_/de ste rab tu ma byung zhes smra na/_ci khyod kyis da ltar rab tu byung nas khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad dam/_khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 
[\[109b.2\]]'brang ba'i chos drug bslab pa gsol tam/_gsol to/_/khyod kyis lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa bslabs sam/_bslabs so/_/khyod la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa phog gam/_phog go/_/khyod la dge 
[\[109b.3\]]slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis sngar bya ba'i rnams byas sam/_bgyis so/_/khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyi sems gus par byas sam/_gus par bgyis so/_/bar chad kyi chos rnams las yongs su dag gam/_yongs su dag go/_/khyod la gzhan gyi bu lon mang yang 
[\[109b.4\]]rung /_/nyung yang rung chags pa med dam/_khyod kyi ming ci/_khyod kyi mkhan mo'i ming ci/_bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bgyi/_don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan mo'i ming ni 'di zhes bgyi'o/_/khyod ming 'di zhes bya ba nyon cig_/bud med kyi lus la gnod par 'gyur ba lus kyi 
[\[109b.5\]]nad 'di 'dra ba yod de/_de 'di lta ste/_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_shu ba dang /_phol mig dang /_tshad pa dang /_sha bkra can dang /_rkom po dang /_klog pa dang /_rab tu g.yan pa dang /_skyigs bu dang /_skyugs pa dang /_gzhang 'brum dang /_rims dang /_za ngad dang /_myos pa 
[\[109b.6\]]dang /_/chu bgags pa dang /_ngal ba dang /_rmong bu dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_lud pa dang /_skem pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_'jas pa dang /_dkar po'i nad dang /_rkang 'bam dang /_mtshan par rdol ba dang /_skran dang /_khrag nad dang /_mkhris pa dang /_rkub 'brum 
[\[109b.7\]]dang /_/lhog pa dang /_yan lag tsha ba dang /_rtsib logs tsha ba dang /_rus pa zhigs pa dang /_rims drag po dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_zhag gnyis pa dang /_zhag gsum pa dang /_zhag bzhi pa dang /_rims nyin re dang /_'dus pa'i rims dang /_rtag 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]pa'i rims dang /_rims ldang dub pa dang /_khyod kyi lus la 'di lta bu'i lus kyi nad dang /_lus la gnod par 'gyur ba/_gzhan dag med dam/_de ste yongs su gtsang bar gyur na/_gsang ste ston pas ji ltar bdag gis khyod la dris pa de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du 
[\[110a.2\]]yang smros shig ces bsgo la 'dir 'dug ste ma bos kyi bar du ma 'ong shig_/de nas gsang ste ston pa lam gyi bar du 'dug la 'di skad smros shig_/dgongs shig 'phags ma/_bdag gis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la bar chad kyi chos rnams bstan cing dris na/_yongs su dag go zhes nyid mchi na/_ci 
[\[110a.3\]]mchi zhig gam/_dge slong ma thams cad kyis kyang de ste yongs su dag par gyur na tshur shog ces smros shig_/de ltar smras na ni legs/_ma smras na ni 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas las byed pa'i dge slong mas mdun du zhog la tshangs par spyod pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol cig_/
[\[110a.4\]]gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_de yang bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams las tshangs par spyod pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol kyis don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te 
[\[110a.5\]]mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la tshangs par spyod pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol cig_/brtse ba can brtse ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum mo/_/de nas las byed pa'i dge slong mas gsol ba thob la las 
[\[110a.6\]]byos shig_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_ming 'di zhes bya ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams las tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i 
[\[110a.7\]]sdom pa gsol na/_de ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnong shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi nang du bar chad kyi chos 'di 'dri ste/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig 'di ni khyod 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]kyi bden pa'i dus/_'di ni yang dag pa'i dus te ngas khyod la cung zad cig dris pa de thams cad khyod kyis ma 'dzem par byung ba la ni byung zhes ma byung ba la ni ma byung zhes ma nor bar smros shig_/bud med dam/_bud med do zhes bya ba nas/_khyod kyi lus la 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis gnod pa 
[\[110b.2\]]dang gzhan yang med dam/_des med do zhes smros shig pa'i bar du sbyar ro/_/de nas gsol ba byos shig_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_khyim na gnas pa 
[\[110b.3\]]lo bcu gnyis pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo nyi shu tshang la chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yang ldan/_bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchi ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams las tshangs par 
[\[110b.4\]]spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol na/_de ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gnong la/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyi ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_de la tshangs par 
[\[110b.5\]]spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa stsol cig_/mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las kyang 'di bzhin bya'o/_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_khyim 
[\[110b.6\]]na gnas pa lo bcu gnyis pa'am/_gzhon nu ma lo nyi shur tshang la chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yang ldan/_bar chad kyi chos kyang gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchi ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams la 
[\[110b.7\]]tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_de la tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gsol na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams las ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_mkhan mo 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_de la tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa stsal bar gang la bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang la mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi 
[\[111a.2\]]ste/_/de la tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa stsal te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis bzod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste/_de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong pha'i dge 'dun thams cad 'dus shing 'khod de nyung na yang dge slong gi grangs bcu'i 'khor dang /_
[\[111a.3\]]dge slong ma thams cad 'dus shing 'khod la nyung na yang dge slong ma bcu gnyis kyi 'khor du las byed pa'i dge slong pha'i mdun du rtswa chun po'am/_stan khong tshangs can gyi steng du zhog la thal mo sbyar te dge 'dun gnyis ka las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol bar bya'o/_/gson cig 
[\[111a.4\]]btsun pa'i dge 'dun sde gnyis rnams/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba don gyi slad du/_mtshan nas smos te mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ba las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun sde gnyi ga las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol na/_btsun 
[\[111a.5\]]pa'i dge 'dun gnyis kas bdag bsnyen par rdzogs par bgyi bar gsol/_btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyis kas bdag dbyung bar gsol/_btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyi gas bdag rjes su gzung bar gsol/_btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyi gas bdag la thugs brtse bar gsol/_
[\[111a.6\]]thugs brtse ba can thugs brtse ba'i phyir ro/_/'di bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu las byed pa'i dge slong phas gsol ba gyis shig_/gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyi ga'i rnams/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba la 
[\[111a.7\]]bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_dge 'dun gnyi ga las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol na/_de ste dge 'dun gnyi ga'i dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gnyi gas gnong shig_/bdag gis 'di la dge 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]'dun gnyi ga'i nang du bar chad kyi chos rnams 'dri ste/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/'di ni khyod kyi bden pa'i dus/_'di ni yang dag pa'i dus te/_ngas khyod la cung zad cig dris pa de thams cad khyod kyis ma 'dzem par byung ba la ni byung zhes bya/_ma 
[\[111b.2\]]byung ba la ni ma byung zhes ma nor bar smros shig_/khyod bud med dam/_bud med do/_/khyim na gnas pa lo bcu gnyis dang /_gzhon nu ma lo nyi shu tshang ngam/_tshang ngo /_/khyod kyi chos gos lnga dang /_lhung bzed du ldan nam/_ldan no/_/khyod kyi pha dang /_ma dang /_khyim thab gson 
[\[111b.3\]]nam/_/gson no/_/pha dang ma dang khyim thab kyis gnang ngam/_gnang ngo /_/bran mo ma yin nam/_phrogs pa ma yin nam/_rnyed pa ma yin nam/_btsongs pa ma yin nam/_chags pa med dam/_sprul pa ma yin nam/_rgyal po'i gtses pa ma yin nam/_rgyal po dang 'khon pa ma yin 
[\[111b.4\]]nam/_/rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed pa ma yin nam/_khyod kyis rgyal po la gnod pa byas pa'am/_gnod pa byed du bcug pa ma yin nam/_mi srun pa ma yin nam/_mya ngan gyis gdungs pa ma yin nam/_sbrum ma ma yin nam/_mtshan med pa ma yin nam/_mtshan gnyis pa ma 
[\[111b.5\]]yin nam/_gle 'dams pa ma yin nam/_rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa ma yin nam/_khrag med pa ma yin nam/_mtshan ma tsam yod pa ma yin nam/_dge slong bslus pa ma yin nam/_pha bsad pa ma yin nam/_ma bsad pa ma yin nam/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa ma yin nam/_de 
[\[111b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba ma yin nam/_mu stegs can ma yin nam/_mu stegs can du 'gro ba ma yin nam/_rkun po'i rgyal mtshan can ma yin nam/_rkun gnas pa ma yin nam/_so sor gnas pa ma yin nam/_mi gnas pa ma yin nam/_
[\[111b.7\]]ci khyod sngon rab tu byung ngam/_de ste rab tu byung ngo zhes smra na/_'o na song shig ces smros shig_/de ste rab tu ma byung ngo zhes zer na/_ci khyod da ltar rab tu byung ngam/_byung ngo /_/ci khyod kyis tshangs par spyad pa yang dag par spyad dam/_ci khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]gyis lo gnyis su chos drug dang /_rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug bslab pa byin nam/_byin no/_/khyod kyis lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug bslab pa bslabs sam/_bslabs so/_/khyod la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis tshangs 
[\[112a.2\]]par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa phog gam/_phog go/_/khyod la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis sngar bya ba'i las rnams byas sam/_bgyis so/_/khyod kyis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyi sems gus par byas sam/_gus par bgyis so/_/bar chad kyi chos rnams las yongs su 
[\[112a.3\]]dag gam/_yongs su dag go/_/khyod la gzhan gyi bu lon mang yang rung /_nyung yang rung chags pa med dam/_khyod kyi ming ci/_khyod kyi mkhan mo'i ming ci/_bdag gi ming ni 'di zhes bgyi/_don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te mkhan mo'i ming ni 'di zhes bgyi'o/_/ming 'di 
[\[112a.4\]]zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bud med kyi lus la gnod par 'gyur ba lus kyi nad 'di 'dra ba yod de/_de 'di lta ste/_mdze dang /_'bras dang /_shu ba dang /_phol mig dang /_tshad pa dang /_sha bkra can dang /_rkom po dang /_glog pa dang /_rab tu g.ya' ba dang /_skyugs pa dang /_gzhang 
[\[112a.5\]]'brum dang /_skyigs bu dang /_rims dang /_za ngad dang /_myos pa dang /_ngal ba dang /_mgo g.yung dang /_tshad pa dang /_lud pa dang /_dbugs mi bde ba dang /_skem pa dang /_brjed byed dang /_'jas pa dang /_nad dkar po dang /_rkang 'bam dang /_mtshan bar rdol ba dang /_skran 
[\[112a.6\]]dang /_/khrag nad dang /_mkhris pa dang /_rkub 'brum dang /_lhog pa dang /_yan lag tsha ba dang /_rtsib logs tsha ba dang /_rus pa zhigs pa dang /_rims drag po dang /_rims zhag gcig pa dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_rims nyin re ba dang /_'dus pa'i 
[\[112a.7\]]rims dang /_rims ldang dub pa dang /_rtag pa'i rims dang /_khyod kyi lus la 'di lta bu'i lus kyi nad dang /_lus la gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_de las gzhan kyang med dam de las khyod kyis yang dag pa ji bzhin par smros shig//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa/_de nas gsol ba byed pa'i dge slong gis gsol ba thob ste las byos shig_/gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyi ga rnams/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gnyi ga las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_ming 'di 
[\[112b.2\]]zhes bgyi ba mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dge 'dun gnyi ga las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te/_bud med kyang lags/_bud med kyi dbang po dang ldan/_bud med khyim na gnas pa lo bcu gnyis sam/_gzhon nu ma lo nyi shu tshang ba ste/_'di'i chos gos lnga dang lhung 
[\[112b.3\]]bzed du yang ldan/_pha ma dang khyim thab kyis kyang gnang /_bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag_/'dis tshangs par spyod pa yang legs par spyad/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis 'di la lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa yang phog ste/_'dis lo 
[\[112b.4\]]gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug bslab pa yang bslabs/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis 'di la chos gsum gyis tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa yang byin/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis 'di la bya ba rnams kyang sngon du byas zin/_dge slong ma'i dge 
[\[112b.5\]]'dun rnams kyi sems mnyes par byin zin/_bar chad kyi chos rnams gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchi na/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_dge 'dun gnyi ga las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol na/_de ste dge 'dun gnyi ga'i dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 
[\[112b.6\]]'dun gnyis kas gnong la dge 'dun gnyis kas ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ste bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol cig_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar byos shig_/gson cig btsun pa'i dge 'dun gnyi ga'i rnams/_ming 'di zhes bgyi 
[\[112b.7\]]ba 'di mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ba gnyis ka'i dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par 'tshal te/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi bas gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol te/_bud med kyang lags/_bud med kyi dbang po dang yang 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]ldan/_/bud med khyim na gnas pa lo bcu gnyis sam/_gzhon nu ma lo nyi shur yang tshang ste/_'di la chos gos lnga dang lhung bzed du yang ldan/_pha ma dang khyim thab kyis kyang gnang /_bar chad kyi chos rnams kyang yongs su dag_/'dis tshangs par spyod pa yang legs 
[\[113a.2\]]par spyad/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis 'di la lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug bslab pa phog ste/_'dis lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa la yang bslabs/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis 'di la tshangs par spyad pa 
[\[113a.3\]]skyed pa'i sdom pa yang byin/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis 'di la bya ba'i rnams kyang sngon de byas zin bdag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi sems mnyes par yang byas/_bar chad kyi chos rnams gtsang ngo zhes bdag nyid mchi ste/_ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes 
[\[113a.4\]]bgyi ste/_dge 'dun gnyi ga las bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyi ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo'i ming 'di zhes bgyi ste/_dge 'dun gnyi gas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad na/_tshe dang ldan pa rnams ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di mkhan mo ming 'di zhes 
[\[113a.5\]]bgyi ste/_dge 'dun gnyi gas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/_dge 'dun gnyi gas bzod cing gnang na cang ma gsung shig_/gang la mi bzod pa dag ni gsung shig_/'di ni las dang po'i tshig ste/_de bzhin du las kyi tshig rnams lan gnyis lan gsum du smra bar bya'o/_/
[\[113a.6\]]ming 'di zhes bgyi ba mkhan mo ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ste/_dge 'dun gnyi gas bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/_dge 'dun gnyi gas bzod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/de nas grib ma gcal bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag gis ring po ring 
[\[113a.7\]]pos grib ma gcal ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis shing lcug ma ring zhing ring pos grib ma gcal bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/_/rkang pas gcal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang pas gcal bar mi bya'o/_/shing bu sor bzhi pas gcol cig_/shing bu ji srid 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa de tsam la skyes bu zhes bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dus tshod rig par byos shig_/dgun gyi dus dang /_dpyid kyi dus dang /_dbyar gyi dus dang /_dbyar zad pa dang dus ring po'o/_/de la dgun gyi dus ni zla ba bzhi'o/_/dpyid kyi dus ni zla ba bzhi'o/_/dbyar gyi dus ni zla 
[\[113b.2\]]ba gcig go/_/dbyar zad pa ni nyin zhag gcig go/_/dus ring po ni nub gcig gis nyung ba'i zla ba gsum mo/_/dus kyang rig par bya ste/_skya rengs dang po dang /_skya rengs bar ma dang /_skya rengs tha ma dang /_nyi ma ma shar ba dang /_nyi ma shar ba dang /_nyi ma shar ba'i brgyad cha 
[\[113b.3\]]dang /_/nyi ma shar ba'i bzhi cha dang /_nyi ma ma phyed pa dang /_nyi ma phyed pa dang /_nyi ma phyed yol ba dang /_phyi dro'i bzhi cha dang /_phyi dro'i brgyad cha dang /_nyi ma nub pa dang /_nyi ma ma nub pa dang /_skar ma ma shar ba dang /_skar ma shar ba'o/_/de nas gnas gsum smra bar bya'o/_/
[\[113b.4\]]ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mkhyen cing gzigs te/_'di lta bur rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma la gnas 'di gsum gsungs te/_dge slong mas de la 
[\[113b.5\]]gnas na legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te/_dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ba ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_chos gos kyi nang du rdul khrod pa ni rung ba dang mod pa ste/_gang la gnas na dge slong ma legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab 
[\[113b.6\]]tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ba rdul khrod pa'i chos gos kyis tshe dang ldan ma ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dus 'di nas nam 'tsho'i bar du chog par dad dam/_des dad do zhes smros shig_/lhag par byed na dar ram/_ras sam/_bgo ba'am/_
[\[113b.7\]]seng ras sam/_ldum bu sha na'i gos sam/_srin pa'am/_ras a mi la'am/_so mi la'am/_la ba'i kha dog srin bu smug po 'dra ba'am/_ka shi ka'i phra mo'am/_zar ma'i phra mo'am/_rtswa du gu la ka phra mo'am/_ras ko tam pa ka phra mo rnams te/_gang gzhan yang 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]rung ba'i gos dge 'dun las rnyed dam gang zag las kyang rung ste de dag las khyed kyis long la tshod zin par gyis shig_/ci de 'dra ba'i gnas la mngon du yi dam 'cha' 'am/_des kyang mngon du yi dam bca'o zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon 
[\[114a.2\]]cig_/zas kyi nang na bsod snyoms ni rung ba mod pa ste/_de la gnas na dge slong ma legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ro/_/bsod snyoms kyi zas kyis ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod deng nas nam 'tsho'i bar 
[\[114a.3\]]du chog par dad dam/_des dad do zhes smros shig_/lhag par rnyed na 'bras chan nam/_skyo ma'am/_thug pa'am/_rtag pa'i'am/_mgron du bos pa'i'am/_'phral la bos pa'i 'am/_spags pa'i'am/_lnga ston nam/_brgyad pa'i'am/_bcu bzhi pa'i'am/_nya 
[\[114a.4\]]ston rnams kyi ste/_gang gzhan yang rung ba'i bsod snyoms dge 'dun las sam/_gang zag las rung ste/_de dag las kyang khyod kyis long la tshod zin par gyis shig_/ci 'di 'dra ba'i gnas la yi dam 'cha' 'am/_des kyang yi dam bca'o zhes gyis shig_/ming 
[\[114a.5\]]'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bkus pa'i sman ni rung ba dang mod pa ste/_de la gnas na dge slong ma legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ro/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod deng nas nam 'tsho'i bar 
[\[114a.6\]]du bkus te bor ba'i sman gyis chog par dad dam/_des dad do zhes smros shig_/lhag par rnyed na mar dang /_'bru mar dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_bu ram dang /_rtsa ba'i sman dang /_sdong bu'i sman dang /_lo ma'i sman dang /_me tog gi sman dang /_'bras bu'i sman dang /_
[\[114a.7\]]snga dro ba dang /_phyi dro ba dang /_bdun pa'i dang /_nam 'tsho'i bar du'o/_/de lta bu la sogs te gzhan yang rung ba'i sman dag dge 'dun las sam/_gang zag las rnyed kyang rung ste/_de dag las kyang khyod kyis long la tshod rig par gyis shig_/ci 'di 'dra ba'i gnas 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]la mngon du yi dam 'cha' 'am/_des kyang yi dam bca'o zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mkhyen cing gzigs nas 'di ltar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par dge 
[\[114b.2\]]slong ma la ltung ba'i chos brgyad gsungs te/_dge slong mas gnas de la gang yang rung ste/_brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin no/_/dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/_dge sbyong ma'i yang med par 'gyur te med 
[\[114b.3\]]pa'o/_/bsrubs pa'o/_/ltung ba'o/_/phas pham pa ste/_de la dge sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do/_/'di lta ste shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin te sngon por mi 'gyur/_mi skye/_mi rgyas/_mi 'phel lo/_/cher skyer skal ba med pa de ltar de bzhin du dge slong mas gnas de 
[\[114b.4\]]brgyad las gang yang rung /_gnas de brgyad la brtun cing byas na de la brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin no/_/dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/_dge sbyong ma'i yang med par 'gyur te med pa'o/_/bsrubs 
[\[114b.5\]]pa'o/_/ltung ba'o/_/phas pham pa ste/_de la dge sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/brgyad gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du ma las kyang 'dod pa smad pa ni 'dzin pa'o/_/'dod pa ni chags pa'o/_/'dod pa ni sems 
[\[114b.6\]]pa'o/_/'dod pa ni sdug pa'o/_/'dod pa ni gnas so/_/'dod pa ni gdon mi za ba'o/_/'dod pa ni shin tu chags pa ste/_'dod pa spangs pa ni so sor bsngags pa'o/_/slar bskur ba'o/_/zad pa'o/_/'dod chags dang bral ba'o/_/'phags pa'o/_/rnam par

[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos su spyad pa lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yang dge slong ma dge slong ma dang lhan cig tu bslab pa mtshungs pa mnyam par gyur pa las bslab pa ma phul lam/_bslab pa stobs chung ngam/_ma bshams par mi tshangs 
[\[115a.2\]]par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos byas na chung ngu na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa dang lhan cig pa yang rung ste/_de lta bu'i gnas gang du yang rung /_dge slong mas brtun cing byas na/_brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma 
[\[115a.3\]]yin/_/dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/_dge sbyong ma'i dngos po yang med par 'gyur te/_med pa'o/_/bsrubs pa'o/_/ltung ba'o/_/phas pham pa ste/_dge slong mar slar dbyung du med do/_/'di lta ste shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin sngon por mi rung /_skyer mi 
[\[115a.4\]]rung /_/'phel zhing rgyas par mi rung ste/_de bzhin du dge slong mas 'di 'dra ba'i gnas la brtun cing byas na/_de brtun de byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin/_dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/_dge sbyong 
[\[115a.5\]]ma'i dngos po yang med par 'gyur te/_med pa'o/_/bsrubs pa'o/_/ltung ba'o/_/phas pham pa ste/_dge sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do/_/de la khyod kyis deng phan chad mi spyod pa dang /_brtun cing mi 'jug pa dang /_mi spyod par spong ba la smyur te sems srungs la/_dran 
[\[115a.6\]]pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson par gyis shig_/ci gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du ma las kyang ma byin par len pa ni rnam par smad do/_/ma byin par len pa 
[\[115a.7\]]spangs pa ni bstod do/_/bstod du 'jug go/_/bsngags so/_/bsgrags pa yin gyis deng phan chad ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod rku ba'i sems kyis pha rol po'i ma byin par til gyi phub ma na yang mi blangs na/_mA sha lnga'am/_mA sha lnga las 'das pa lta ci smos bcom ldan 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/_dge slong ma grong na 'dug pa'am/_dben pa na 'dug pa yang rung /_gzhan gyis ma byin par rku bar grags pa blangs na ni ci tsam ma byin par blangs pas de rgyal po'am/_blon pos kyang rung bzung nas bsad pa dang /_bcing ba dang /_spyugs pa 
[\[115b.2\]]yang rung de la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/kye khyed ni rku ba'o/_/mi shes pa/_blun pa'o/_/rku ba'o zhes 'di lta bu'i gnas su brtun cing byas na/_des brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin no zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin 
[\[115b.3\]]te/_/dran pas bag yod pa dang /_brtson par gyis shig pa'i bar du sbyar ro/_/ci gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes byos shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa ni rnam grangs du ma las kyang rnam par 
[\[115b.4\]]smad do/_/srog gcod pa spangs pa la bstod do/_/bstod du 'jug go/_/bsngags so/_/bsgrags pa yin gyis ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyis deng phan chad srog chags grog sbur yang bsams bzhin du srog mi gcad na/_mi'am mi lus su gyur pa lta la ci smos bcom ldan 
[\[115b.5\]]'das kyis gsungs pa/_gang yang dge slong mas mi'am mi'i lus su gyur pa yang rung /_bsams nas rang gi lag gis srog bcad pa dang /_de la mtshon byin nam/_de la mtshon thogs pa gnyer tam/_de la 'chi ba bskul tam/_de la 'chi ba'i yon tan 
[\[115b.6\]]bsngags kyang de 'di skad ces zer te/_kye mi khyod 'di ltar sdig pa mi gtsang bar sdug cing 'tsho ba ci rung gi kye skyes bu 'tsho ba bas ches shi na legs so zhes sems la bsam/_sems la brtun cing rnam grangs du mar 'chi bar de la bskul tam/_des 'chi ba'i yon tan 
[\[115b.7\]]bsngags kyang rung ste/_de yang de lta bu'i thabs kyis dus byas te/_de lta bu'i gnas su dge slong mas brtun cing byas na/_de brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin/_dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]'gyur ba nas snga ma bzhin te dran par gyis la bag yod pa dang brtson pa'i bar du sbyar ro/_/gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du

[\[116a.3\]]du mi'i bla ma'i chos [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_yang gang yang dge slong ma mngon du mi shes/_kun du mi shes shing med la/_kun med bzhin du mi'i bla ma'i chos kyi sgrub pa 'phags pa'i khyad par chud par shes pa'am/_mthong

[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]par dmar bar 'du shes/_rnam par 'thor bar 'du shes/_rus gong du 'du shes/_stong pa nyid du so sor rtogs par 'du shes/_ma thob bzhin du ngas thob po zhes zer ba bsam gtan dang po dang /_gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying 
[\[117a.2\]]rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rnams so/_/ma thob bzhin du ngas thob po zhes zer ba rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[117a.3\]]dang /_/lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rna ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas dang /_shi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang /_zag pa zad pa dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[117a.4\]]thar pa brgyad la sgom pa dang /_cha gnyis las rnam par grol ba de 'dra ba'i gnas la dge slong mas brtun cing byas na des brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin/_dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/_dge sbyong ma'i dngos po 
[\[117a.5\]]yang med par 'gyur te/_med pa'o/_/bsrubs pa'o/_/ltung ba'o/_/phas pham pa ste/_dge sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do/_/de 'di lta ste/_shing ta la'i mgo bcad pa bzhin te sngon por mi rung /_skyer mi rung /_'phel zhing rgyas par mi rung ngo /_/de ltar de 'dra ba la dge slong 
[\[117a.6\]]mas brtun cing byas na des brtun te byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin/_dge slong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur/_dge sbyong ma'i dngos po med par 'gyur te med pa'o/_/bsrubs pa'o/_/ltung ba'o/_/phas pham pa ste/_
[\[117a.7\]]dge sbyong mar slar dbyung du med do/_/de la khyod kyis deng phan chad mi spyod pa dang /_brtun cing mi 'jug pa dang /_mi spyod par spong ba la smyur te sems srungs la dran pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson par gyis shig_/gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa gang yang dge sbyong ma chags bzhin du chags nas skyes pa dang lhan cig man chad/_pus mo yan chad reg cing kun reg pa la dga' bar tshor ram/_dge slong mas 'di 
[\[117b.2\]]'dra ba'i gnas la brtun cing byas na de brtun te byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin no zhes bya ba nas brtun cing mi 'jug pa dang /_mi spyod par spong ba la smyur te sems srungs la dran pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson pa'i bar 
[\[117b.3\]]du sbyar ro/_/gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_gang yang dge slong ma chags shing chags nas skyes pa dang lhan cig tu brda'i tshig dang /_rtse ba dang /_
[\[117b.4\]]dgod pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_rgyug pa dang /_lus la 'tshog par byed pa dang /_bstan tam dus 'dor ram/_mtshan ma 'dzugs pa dang /_skyes pa 'ongs sam/_song yang rung dga' bar tshor na de dang 'dra bas phyogs der lus phab cing skyes pa'i dbang du bud med gyur te dngos 
[\[117b.5\]]po de lta bu brgyad dang ldan zhing dge slong mas 'di 'dra ba'i gnas la brtun cing byas na des brtun te byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin pa nas/_gang brtun cing mi 'jug pa dang /_mi spyod par spong ba la smyur te sems srungs la dran pa 
[\[117b.6\]]dang /_/bag yod pa dang /_brtson pa'i bar du bya'o/_/gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_gang yang dge slong ma zhig gis sngon phas pham pa byung zhing 
[\[117b.7\]]mi gnas par gyur pa dge slong ma zhig gis shes kyang des gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa'am/_slar babs par gyur pa'am/_yul gzhan du bros pa de'i 'og tu 'di skad du 'phags ma dag sngon bdag gis dge slong ma de ji ltar phas pham ste gnas su mi rung bar shes so zhes smras 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]te/_dge slong ma'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcabs pa de 'dra ba'i gnas la brtun cing byas na/_des brtun te byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin pa nas snga ma bzhin te mi spyod dam/_mi spyod do/_/skyo ba dang /_rab tu 
[\[118a.2\]]bsam pas kun du bsrungs te dran pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson pa'i bar du bya'o/_/gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/_gang yang dge slong 
[\[118a.3\]]mas 'di ltar dge slong pha dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pas spang bar 'gyur ba'i las byas/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'dus par gyur pas kyang de la phyag mi ster bar sdom pa bcas par gyur nas/_de skra langs pa dang /_nyal bzhin du dge 'dun rnams la spu nyal bar 
[\[118a.4\]]byed/_/'byung bar 'jug_/phyag byed par ston/_mtshams kyi nang na 'dug cing bzod pa gsol bar shes bzhin du de la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/'phags pa khyod skra nyal ba dang /_langs bzhin du dge 'dun rnams la spu nyal ba dang /_'byung bar 'jug pa yang 
[\[118a.5\]]ma byed cig_/phyag byed par ston pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang na 'dug cing bzod pa gsol ba yang ma byed cig_/bdag gis 'phags pa khyod kyi lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 
[\[118a.6\]]'byor yid la bya ba dang /_'phags pa la ci dang cis brel bar gyur pa de dang de dag thams cad kyis mi brel bar byed pa'i dge slong ma de la dge slong ma rnams kyis 'di skad du bsgo shig_/'phags ma khyed dge slong pha de ni 'dus pa'i dge 'dun gyis spangs pa'i las 
[\[118a.7\]]byas pa yin/_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang de la phyag mi bya ba'i sdom pa bcas pa yin te/_dge slong pha de skra langs pa dang nyal ba bzhin du dge 'dun la spu nyal bar byed/_'byung bar 'jug_/phyag byed par ston/_mtshams kyi nang na 'dug cing bzod pa gsol 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]bar shes bzhin du de la 'phags ma khyod kyis 'di skad ces ma smra shig_/'phags pa khyod skra nyal ba dang langs bzhin du dge 'dun la spu nyal ba dang 'byung bar 'jug pa yang ma byed cig_/phyag byed par ston pa dang /_mtshams kyi nang na 'dug cing bzod par gsol 
[\[118b.2\]]bar yang ma byed cig dang /_bdag gis khyod la kun sbyar te/_lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton dang /_rnal 'byor yid la bya ba dang /_ci dang cis 'phags pa khyod la brel bar gyur pa de dang de dag thams cad 
[\[118b.3\]]bdag gis mi brel bar sbyar ro/_/'phags ma khyod kyis spangs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gis lam de lta bu thong shig ces dge slong ma de la de lta bur dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgo ste/_don de ltar btang na ni legs/_de ste ma btang na lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du bsgo 
[\[118b.4\]]zhing ston cig_/don de slar spang ba'i phyir lan gnyis lan gsum du bsgo zhing bstan pa las don de slar btang na ni legs/_de ste ma btang zhing dge slong ma spangs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing de lta bu'i gnas su brtun cing byas na de brtun cing byas ma thag tu dge slong ma ma yin/_dge sbyong 
[\[118b.5\]]ma ma yin/_shAkya'i sras mo ma yin pa nas snga ma bzhin te/_rab tu bsams pas kun tu bsrung ste dran pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson pa'i bar du bya'o/_/gang su zhig gnas 'di lta bu la mi spyod dam/_des mi spyod do zhes smros shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod 
[\[118b.6\]]nyon cig_/brgyad po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'di ni rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong ma rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos su 
[\[118b.7\]]bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_ming 'di zhes bya ba bud med kyis dge slong rnams las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur bar rab tu rtogs par bya'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos dang por bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong ma rnams kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing dge slong pha rnams las ston 
[\[119a.2\]]pa'i lung rjes su bstan pa btsal bar bya'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos gnyis su bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong pha med pa'i 
[\[119a.3\]]gnas su dge slong ma dbyar tshul du ma 'jug shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos gsum du bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong mas 
[\[119a.4\]]dbyar tshul nas byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun sde gnyis la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_dogs pa'i gnas gsum du skabs dbye bar bya'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos bzhir bcas te/_de 
[\[119a.5\]]la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams sam/_lta ba nyams sam/_spyod pa nyams sam/_'tsho ba nyams kyang rung ma gleng shig_/dran par ma byed cig_/dge slong mas dge slong pha tshul khrims las 
[\[119a.6\]]nyams sam/_lta ba las nyams sam/_spyod pa las nyams sam/_'tsho ba las nyams kyang rung gleng zhing dran par byed pa mi gnang ngo /_/dge slong phas ni dge slong mas tshul khrims nyams sam/_lta ba nyams sam/_spyod pa nyams sam/_'tsho ba nyams pa la gleng ba dang /_
[\[119a.7\]]dran par byed pa la mi gnang ba med de/_'di ni ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos lngar bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong mas dge slong la kha ngan 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]mi bya/_/khro bar mi bya/_bsdigs par mi bya/_dge slong mas dge slong la kha ngan dang /_khro ba dang /_bsdigs pa mi gnang ste/_ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos drug tu bcas te/_de la bud 
[\[119b.2\]]med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/dge slong ma la bla ma'i chos shig byung na/_des dge 'dun gnyi ga la zla ba phyed kyi bar du yid dga' bar bya ba spyod cig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar 
[\[119b.3\]]bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos bdun du bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas da gzod bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong la tshig snyan pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo 
[\[119b.4\]]sbyar ba dang /_phyag bya ba byas te/_ming 'di zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni bud med rnams la dgag cing mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir bla ma'i chos brgyad du bcas te/_de la bud med rnams kyis nam 'tsho'i bar du bslab par bya'o/_/ci bla ma'i chos 'di brgyad yang dag 
[\[119b.5\]]par bzung ste spyod dam/_spyod do/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi po 'di dag ni snga ma bzhin te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes pa'i bar du sbyar ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_deng phan chad ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod ngan par smra 
[\[119b.6\]]ba la slar mi smra/_khros pa la slar ma khro shig_/rdeg pa la slar mi rdeg_/'phya ba la slar mi 'phya/_ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/khyod sngon 'di ltar bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por shog shig ces 
[\[119b.7\]]smon pa de ni khyod rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te/_mkhan mo tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_slob dpon tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_dge 'dun gnyi ga tshogs 'dus pas/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyi phyir bya ba med pa dang /_gzhag par bya ba med pas rab tu byung zhing 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]bsnyen par rdzogs so/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod nyon cig_/gang bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas bslab pa de ni deng bsnyen par rdzogs pas kyang de la bslab par bya'o/_/gang deng bsnyen par rdzogs pas bslab pa de bsnyen par rdzogs nas 
[\[120a.2\]]lo brgya lon pas kyang de bslab par bya'o/_/gang tshul khrims mtshungs par bslab pa mthun pa dang /_so sor thar pa'i mdo kha ton klog par mtshungs pa la deng phan chad khyod kyis mnyes par bya'o/_/mi mnyes par mi bya'o/_/deng phan chad ming 'di zhes bya ba'i mkhan mo la mar 
[\[120a.3\]]'du shes gzhag par bya'o/_/mkhan mos kyang de la bu mor 'du shes gzhag par bya'o/_/deng phan chad khyod kyis mkhan mo la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byos shig_/mkhan mos kyang khyod la nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byos shig_/deng phan chad ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod 
[\[120a.4\]]kyis 'jigs pa'i dbang du byas shing bla ma dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang /_gnas brtan ma dang /_bar ma dang /_gsar bu rnams la ri mo byos shig_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod deng phan chad lung nos shig_/lhogs shig_/kha ton gyis shig_/phung po la mkhas/_
[\[120a.5\]]khams la mkhas/_skye mched la mkhas/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/khyod kyis ma thob pa thob pa'i phyir/_khong du ma chud pa khong du chud pa'i phyir/_mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus ma gtang 
[\[120a.6\]]shig_/'di dag ni ngas khyod la chen po che ba'i rnams bslab pa'i gzhir bshad do/_/gzhan ni khyod kyi slob dpon dang /_mkhan mo dang /_slob dpon gcig pa dang /_mkhan mo gcig pa dang /_smra ba dang /_kun du smra ba dang /_bstod pa dang /_mdza' ba dag gis kyang de bzhin 
[\[120a.7\]]ston to/_/zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo klog pa la nyon cig_/'di ltar bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni/_shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la/_/da ni bsnyen par khyod rdzogs te/_/khom pa phun sum tshogs rnyed dka'/_/'di la skyo bar ma byed cig_/bzang mo las ni rab 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]tu byung /_/yongs su dag las bsnyen par rdzogs/_/bden zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/rab tu mkhyen nas gsungs pa'o/_/ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod bsnyen par rdzogs kyis bag yod par spyod cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_nam sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[120b.2\]]'das kyis gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo 'khor shAkya mo lnga brgya rnams kyis bla ma'i chos yi dam bcas te rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos po la rjes su yi rang ba de'i tshe de dag gis gzhan dag dge slong mar rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/_/
[\[120b.3\]]de dag gis kyang gzhan dag ste/_de na dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma mang zhing 'phel bar gyur to/_/de nas dge slong ma gnas brtan dang gnas brtan ma de dag skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la 'di skad smras so/_/e ma'o 
[\[120b.4\]]'phags ma dge slong ma gnas brtan ma 'di dag la gang dge slong pha gsar bu dang /_bar ma dang /_gzhon nu rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa de dag gcig la gcig rgan rims su phyag 'tshal dang ces 'di skad smras pa dang /_gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos dge slong ma de dag 
[\[120b.5\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de bas na nu mo dag sdod cig dang /_bdag gis 'phags pa kun dga' bo la zhus te bya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras so/_/de skad smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[120b.6\]]bos gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la de bas na gau ta mI sdod cig dang /_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/
[\[120b.7\]]phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la e ma'o bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma'i gnas brtan dang gnas brtan ma de dag la gang dge slong pha gsar bu dang /_bar ma dang /_gzhon nu rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa 'di dag gcig 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]la gcig ji ltar rgan rims su phyag 'tshal yang mi bsngo'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig phyin chad ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te kun 
[\[121a.2\]]dga' bo bud med dag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu ma byung bar gyur na ni da dung yang dad pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag gis dge slong la bsod snyoms dra ba bkang ste theg drod kyis ster ro/_/kun dga' bo bud med dag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba 
[\[121a.3\]]la rab tu ma byung na ni da dung yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa dag gis ma bgos pa'i gos sar pa kha tshar ring po dag srang gi nang du bting ste 'di skad ces smra bar 'gyur ro/_/dge sbyong dag ras sar pa kha tshar ring po bting pa 'di'i steng du gshegs shig_/bdag cag yun 
[\[121a.4\]]ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te kun dga' bo bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu ma byung bar gyur na ni da dung yang bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa dag gis yan lag gi mchog las skyes pa'i skra sa la bting ste/_dge sbyong 
[\[121a.5\]]dag skra 'di'i steng du gshegs shig_/de ni bdag cag la yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhes smra'o/_/gal te kun dga' bo bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu ma byung bar gyur na ni da yang nga'i nyan thos pa dag gi 'od kyis 
[\[121a.6\]]zla ba dang /_nyi ma 'di gnyis lta bu mthu che ba dang rdzu 'phrul che ba yang zil kyis gnon na mu stegs can rnams lta ci smos/_kun dga' bo bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu ma byung na ni da dung nga'i bstan pa lo stong tshang bar nyes pa med cing nyams 
[\[121a.7\]]pa med par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na kun dga' bo bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo brgya lon pa'i dge slong mas kyang da gzod bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong pha la tshig snyan pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_phyag bya ba la sogs pa'i las 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]byos shig_/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong ma rnams las sde bzhi 'dus pas bya ba dang /_sde lnga 'dus pas bya ba dang /_sde bcu gnyis 'dus pas las bya ba yang yod de/_de dag gis dge 'dun gnyi ga bsdus pa dang bya ba mang por gyur to/_/bya ba mang 
[\[121b.2\]]pos bshad pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_rnal 'byor dang /_yid la bya ba rnams kyi bar chad du gyur to/_/de ltar gyur pa'i dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyung ba dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /_spyis bya ba'i 
[\[121b.3\]]las ma gtogs par dge slong pha'i las kyang logs shig tu byos shig_/dge slong ma rnams kyang logs shig tu byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i dus na mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ste rigs mnyam pa las 
[\[121b.4\]]chung ma zhig blangs te de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te zla ba dgu 'das pa dang bu mo zhig btsas nas de btsas ma thag pha dus las 'das so/_/de mas gsos shing bskyed 
[\[121b.5\]]de chen por gyur pa dang /_de'i ma yang dus las 'das so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_des de srang zhig tu mthong ste bu mo khyod su'i yin zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma su'i yang ma lags te mgon med pa'o zhes smras 
[\[121b.6\]]pa dang /_des bu mo de ste de bzhin na ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung zhes smras pa dang /_des su zhig gis rab tu 'byin zhes smras pa dang /_des bu mo ngas rab tu dbyung gis tshur shog_/'dong zhes smras pa dang legs so zhes zer te de dang lhan cig tu dbyar mo khang du dong nas sbom dga' mos 
[\[121b.7\]]rab tu phyung ba dang /_de nyon mongs pas gzir nas slar babs so/_/sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_mthong nas des bu mo ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug ces smras pa dang /_des rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/_'phags ma sdug bsngal zhing 'tsho'o/_/bu mo de 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]ste de bzhin na ci'i phyir yang rab tu mi 'byung /_des smras pa/_'phags ma su zhig bdag slar babs pa las rab tu 'byin/_bu mo bdag gis rab tu dbyung ngam/_legs so zhes smras pa dang /_des rab tu phyung ste bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang bram ze dang khyim bdag 
[\[122a.2\]]dag gis mthong nas ma legs so/_/dge slong shAkya'i bu mo dag ni chos la ngal bsos shing ngal bsos shing chos la spyod do zhes 'phya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_
[\[122a.3\]]gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong ma dag babs shing slar rab tu byung ba'i phyir te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis babs pa las slar rab tu mi dbyung bar dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni rigs par 
[\[122a.4\]]'phya ste/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lan gcig babs pa mthu med pa dge slong ma rab tu ma dbyung shig_/rab tu 'byin na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_mdor na/_'phyan 
[\[122a.5\]]pa dag dang 'dod chen dang /_/gshe ba dang yang 'phya ba ste/_/dge slong la ni dge slong ma/_/'phya ba dge slong dge tshul ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe na yul 'khor 
[\[122a.6\]]mo 'jig na khyim bdag gau ta ma zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa phyug la nor mang la longs spyod chen po zhig ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs nas de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de dus phyi zhig na zong khyer nas yul rdo 'jog tu song ste khyim bdag gzhan 
[\[122a.7\]]zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang /_des de la bde bar 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i tshig gis snyan pa brjod nas ngal bsos te/_gcig la gcig byams pa las khyim bdag gau ta ma de dang lhan cig mdza' bor gyur to/_/khyim bdag gau ta mas zong rnams btsongs te slar gyi zong 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]rnams khyer nas grong khyer 'khor mo 'jig tu song ngo /_/yul rdo 'jog gi khyim bdag kyang dus phyi zhig na zong khyer nas 'khor mo 'jig tu 'ongs te/_de yang khyim bdag gau ta ma khyim du phyin pa dang /_des kyang de la ri mo dang mdza' ba'i tshig gis bde bar 'ongs 
[\[122b.2\]]sam zhes smras nas ngal bsos so/_/de gnyis gcig la gcig mdza' ba rab tu skyes par gyur to/_/yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis khyim bdag gau ta ma la grogs po bdag cag gnyis dus las 'das pa'i 'og tu bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum 
[\[122b.3\]]tsha dag mdza' ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i thabs ci yod ces smras pa dang /_gau ta mas smras pa/_grogs po legs te/_bdag gis kyang de snyam bsams so/_/de bas na tshur shog bu ma byung ba nas gnyen du byas te/_de ste bdag las bu pho zhig byung la khyod las bu mo zhig 
[\[122b.4\]]byung na khyod kyis bdag gi bu la byin cig_/'on te khyod la bu pho zhig ste/_bdag la bu mo zhig na bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_grogs po legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes zer nas yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag dang /_khyim bdag gau ta ma 
[\[122b.5\]]gnyis lhan cig tu bu ma byung ba nas gnyen du 'thams nas des zong btsongs te slar gyis zong khyer nas yul rdo 'jog tu song ngo /_/des de na chung ma dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 
[\[122b.6\]]'das pa dang btsas na bu pho zhig byung ngo /_/de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgyas par byas te/_de rigs dang mthun pa'i ming zhig btags so/_/'khor mo 'jig gi khyim bdag gis yul rdo 'jog gi khyim bdag las bu pho zhig 
[\[122b.7\]]btsas par thos nas/_des bdag gi grogs po la bu pho zhig btsas te khye'u de ni bdag gi mag par 'gyur yang srid kyis de'i gos dang rgyan rnams bskur ro snyam bsams nas/_des de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur te/_yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag de la grogs po khyod la 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bu pho zhig btsas so zhes thos nas grogs po las bu btsas pa bdag shin tu dga' ste khye'u'i phyir gos dang rgyan zhig bskur gyis long shig ces yi ge spring ngo /_/des spring yig bklags te slar gyi lan spring ba dang /_khyim bdag gau ta mas de bklags nas bu 
[\[123a.2\]]mo zhig 'byung du smon te chung ma dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang btsas na bu mo zhig byung ste/_gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa dang /_bzang mo zhig na
