[\[123a.3\]{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]du rid cing nyam chung ba zhig nas de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgyas par byas nas ming 'dogs pa la zhugs te/_bu mo 'di ming cir gdags zhes bgros pa dang /_gnyen dag gis smras pa/_bu mo 'di rid cing nyam chung khyim 
[\[123a.4\]]bdag gau ta ma'i bu mo ste/_de bas na bu mo 'di'i ming ni skem mo gau ta ma zhes ming du btags so/_/yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis 'di ltar 'khor mo 'jig gi khyim bdag gau ta ma la bu mo zhig btsas so/_/zhes thos nas des bdag gi grogs las bu mo zhig 
[\[123a.5\]]btsas te bu mo de ni bdag gi mna' mar 'gyur bar nges kyis de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur bar rigs snyam bsams te/_khyim bdag gau ta ma la grogs po bdag gis ni khyod las bu mo zhig btsas so zhes thos nas bdag shin tu dga' ste grogs po'i bu mo la gos 
[\[123a.6\]]dang rgyan rnams bskur gyis long shig ces des spring ngo /_/des yi ge bklags te slar grogs po mdza' bos byas pa de ni legs te/_bdag dang gnyen byas te bu mo skyes nas blang bar bya'o zhes lan spring ngo /_/khyim bdag gau ta mas yi ge bklags nas bu mo de bud med 
[\[123a.7\]]kyis bslab pa rnams slob tu bcug go/_/yul rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i khyim bdag gis kyang bu de bslab pa slob tu bcug ste/_des smad 'tshong ma dag dang sngon lhan cig 'dug 'dug pa de la bu mo 'di bslab pa rnams slob shig par gtad do/_/des de la bslab par 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]brtsams so/_/des ji srid tshig tu bslabs pa dang /_de na re bdag gis bslab pa rnams lobs kyis da ni 'gro'o/_/zhes smras pa dang /_bud med des bu legs kyis lobs par byas/_da dung du ma 'gro shig ces smras pa dang /_des ma ma bdag gis legs par lobs 
[\[123b.2\]]zin gyis nga 'gro'o zhes zer ro/_/des rgya skyegs kyi thum po zhig thogs te bu de ste khyod bshol bzhin du 'gro bar 'dod na bdag gis mgo bo brdung ngo /_/zhes smras pa dang /_des ma ma de ltar ma byed dang bdag mi 'gro bar bya'o/_/de 'dug pa dang /_mos smras pa/_bkren pa 
[\[123b.3\]]khyod na re ngas bslab pa'i rnams lobs so zhes zer na khyod kyis 'di tsam yang ma shes so/_/gzhan gyi bu'i phyir mgo bo brdung /_khyod ni shes pa can ma yin no/_/de yang ci srid cig tu 'dug nas ma ma 'gro'o zhes zer ba dang /_mos bu 'dug shig ces smras kyang de 'dug tu 
[\[123b.4\]]mi btub pa dang /_mos bu de ste khyod bshol bzhin du yang 'gro bar 'dod na bdag gi lus khron par mchong ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des ma ma de ltar na bdag mi 'gros ma byed cig 'dug go zhes smras pa dang /_mos smras pa bkren pa khyod na re ngas bslab pa rnams lobs zin to 
[\[123b.5\]]zhes zer na/_'di tsam kyang khyod kyis mi shes te/_'di ltar gzhan gyi bu'i phyir bdag nyid khron par ci'i phyir mchong ste/_khyod 'dug tu ma btub na bdag gis khron pa'i nang glod bcas pa der bdag 'dug tu zad kyi khyod shes pa can ma yin gyis 'dug shig_/des kyang ji srid 
[\[123b.6\]]cig tu 'dug nas ma ma mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_mos smras pa/_bu de ste 'di ltar dus kyis then na sdod la 'o thug btsos te 'thung la song shig_/de 'dug pa dang /_des 'o thug btsos te de nyid kyi mdun du snod du mar dang sbrang rtsis btab ste 'thungs nas snod de nyid du slar 
[\[123b.7\]]skyugs so/_/skyugs nas yang rdze'u de nyid du blugs nas mos bu tshur shog_/'di 'thung shig ces smras pa dang /_des ma ma 'di ni skyugs pa yin na ji ltar btung zhes smras pa dang /_mos ngu ba ltar byas pa dang /_khyim tshes de dag gis thos nas de dag thams cad 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]'dus te kye ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad zhib tu smras nas de dag gis bu khyod kyi phyir thug pa 'di sbyar na ci'i phyir mi 'thung zhes smras pa dang /_des kye 'di ni skyugs pa na skyugs pa ji ltar btung zhes smras so/_/de phyi phyir brang 
[\[124a.2\]]brdungs te ngu zhing 'dug nas/_kye ci'i phyir kho mos 'di la skyugs pa blud ces smras pa dang /_de 'khor gyi khyim tshes de dag gis nan gyis blud nas des 'thung bar brtsams pa dang /_mos de'i lag pa nas bzung ste/_gdong du thal mo zhig brgyab nas smras pa/_bkren pa 
[\[124a.3\]]khyod na re ngas bslab pa rnams lobs so zhes zer na/_ji ltar na khyod kyis bslab pa rnams lobs 'di ltar khyod kyis mngon sum du skyugs pa mthong yang 'thung bar shom na khyod ni shes pa can ma yin no zhes smras nas des de bskrad de btang ngo /_/de dus phyi zhig na tshong pa lnga brgya dang 
[\[124a.4\]]lhan cig tu zong khyer te yul gyi dbus su dong ngo /_/des tshong pa de dag gi mdun du phyi phyir zhing bud med la smod do/_/de dag rim bzhin du 'khor mo 'jig tu phyin to/_/tshong pa de dag sngon ni smad 'tshong ma de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de dag kyang de dang 
[\[124a.5\]]bsten pas kyang bud med la smod de smad 'tshong ma gang gi khyim du yang mi 'dong ba dang /_smad 'tshong ma de dag gcig la gcig gros byed de/_de dag las gcig gis che zhe sngon ni yul rdo 'jog gi tshong pa dag lhags nas de dag yu bu cag dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod par 'ong na da 
[\[124a.6\]]ni thams cad kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/_su yang bdag cag dang lhan cig yongs su mi spyod do zhes smras pa dang /_gzhan gyis che zhe bdag gis ni de dag gi ded dpon de ni g.yem pa'i cho ga la mkhas pas bud med la shin tu spyod do zhes thos so/_/de dang bsten 
[\[124a.7\]]pas na de dag kun kyang bdag cag dang lhan cig tu mi spyod do zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gi nang nas smad 'tshong ma rgan mo zhig gis smras pa/_bu mo de skyes pa yin nam 'on te ma yin/_de dag gis che zhe de ni skyes pa ste skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa'o zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]des de ste bdag gi bu mos de bsgyur na de ste khyod kyis dpon mor gzhug gam zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis gzhug tu mi rung na de ste ma 'gyur na khyod kyis ci sbyin zhes smras pa dang /_mos smras pa/_kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya khyod la sbyin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_legs kyis 
[\[124b.2\]]de bzhin bya'o/_/de nas bud med rgan mo des de dag dang nye ba'i khyim zhig glas nas snod spyad mang du bsags pa dang /_de ded dpon de'i khye'u dag der 'ongs shing lhags te snod spyad dag rnyen no/_/des de dag la bu khyed su zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_ma ma 
[\[124b.3\]]bdag cag ni yul rdo 'jog gi ded dpon gyi'o/_/des smras pa/_bu bdag gi bu yang ded dpon yin te zong khyer nas yul gzhan du song na/_de'i khye'u dag kyang ji ltar khyed bzhin du de dag kyang gzhan las snod rnyen pa snyam gyis de bas na khyim 'di na snod yod pa de dag kun khyed 
[\[124b.4\]]cag nyid kyi dang 'dras ci bde bar spyod cig_/de nas snod spyad nyin gcig bzhin blangs shing 'ongs pa dang /_de dag la ded dpon gyis kye khyed la nyin gcig bzhin snod spyad dang yo byad sus byin zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis ded dpon gnas 'di ni ded dpon gyi ma zhig 'dug 
[\[124b.5\]]ste/_/de na re bdag gi bu yang yul gzhan du zong khyer te song na de'i khye'u dag kyang 'di ltar khyed bzhin du gzhan las snod spyad rnyen du gdon mi zas de lta bas na khyim 'di na snod spyad yod pa de dag kun khyed cag nyid kyi dang 'dras ci bder spyod cig ces mchi ste/_de nas snod 
[\[124b.6\]]spyad 'tshal zhing mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_des de la byams pa skyes nas/_kye khyed de la de dang byams par byed na/_de bdag gi yang ma yin no zhes smras so/_/de dag gis de la smras pa/_ma ma ded dpon ni khyed la yon tan shin tu brjod do/_/'di ltar khyed la kun 
[\[124b.7\]]sbyor ba de bdag gi yang ma yin no zhes zer ro/_/mos de ltar na bu mthong yang ci ma rung zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis kyang ma ma legs kyis ded dpon la bgyi'o zhes smras nas de dag gis de la ded dpon ma ma ni khyed la lta bar 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kye legs kyis 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de de'i khyim du song ngo /_/mos de bsti stang du bcas pas bde bar 'ongs sam zhes bya ba'i tshig snyan pa brjod de bu bdag gi bu yang khyod ci 'dra ba bzhin no zhes smras pa dang des kyang ming smos so/_/mos smras pa/_
[\[125a.2\]]bu de'i ming yang de bzhin te/_mdor na khyod dang de gnyis bdag gi bu khyad par med kyis khyod gzhan du ma sems shig ces smras so/_/des smras pa/_ma ma de ltar na de bzhin te de nyid bdag ste/_khyod kyi bu dang khyad par med do/_/des khyim bdag gi chung ma des bu mo 
[\[125a.3\]]bos te bu mo tshur shog_/ming po'i zhabs la phyag 'tshol cig ces bos so/_/de'i phyir byung na na tshod dang des de'i gzugs bzang po dar la bab cing mdzes pa mthong nas rlung gi shugs bzhin du 'dod chags kyi mthus yog pas na bdag nyid kyis ma tshor bar gyur te/_des de la kun 
[\[125a.4\]]du brtags nas ma ma bu mo 'di su'i zhes dris pa dang /_mos smras pa/_bu khyod nyid kyi sring mo yin no/_/des smras pa/_ma ma gzhan la byin nam ma byin/_mos smras pa/_bu 'di su la yang ma byin no/_/des de ste de ltar na kho bo la ci phyir mi sbyin zhes smras pa dang /_mos smras pa/_
[\[125a.5\]]bu gzhan lta su zhig la sbyin/_cung zad du na khyod la nyes pa zhig yod de/_khyed ni bshes mi brtan pas chung mar blangs shing blangs nas bor zhing 'dong ngo /_/des smras pa/_ma ma stsol cig dang mi 'dor bar mthon dman du khrid de mchi'o/_/mos smras pa/_bu khyod kyis 
[\[125a.6\]]bdag gi rdzas thams cad 'dir bskyas te bzhag na gdong mthon dman du khrid ci 'gro bar kho mo yid ches so/_/des smras pa/_ma ma de ltar na gzhag par bya'o/_/des de'i khyim du rdzas rnams bskyas na/_de'i khyim gnyis yod de des ni sgo gcig nas nang du bskyas na/_mos 
[\[125a.7\]]kyang sgo gnyis pa nas gud du bskyas so/_/nam des nor rdzas thams cad bskyas pa dang /_mos kyang gud du bskyas nas gdod de la bu mo byin no/_/des zhag dang tshes grangs dang mthun par sbyar te bag ma len pa'i tshe mos smad 'tshong ma rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa kun mgron 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]du bos te des bag ma blang ba de na phan tshun du rgyu zhing 'khod pa dang /_ded dpon des smras pa/_ma 'di na thams cad kyang bud med de skyes pa gcig kyang med dam/_des brgyangs so/_/gzhan zhig gis de'i rna drung du gsang ste/_ded dpon 'di lta bur gyur pa khyod kyis ma shes 
[\[125b.2\]]sam/_/bdag cag kun kyang smad 'tshong ma yin na/_skyes pa ga la yod ces smras pa dang /_des bdag gis ni smad 'tshong ma zhig blangs ba lta ste/_mdor na 'di ni bdag bslus so snyam du bsams so/_/bu mo nga yang de dang lhan cig ji srid cig tu longs spyod de jo bo kAr ShA pa 
[\[125b.3\]]Na stsol cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bzang mo bdag gi nor rdzas ci yod do cog thams cad 'dir bskyas te/_'ongs na bdag la kAr ShA pa Na gzhan ga la yod ces smras pa dang /_de gnyid kyis shin tu log pa dang mos re lde'i nang du dkris te tshong dus kyi dbus su bor 
[\[125b.4\]]ro/_/nang par nam nangs pa dang grong khyer na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag 'ongs shing 'dong bas sad par byas nas bdag gis bltas pa dang /_des bdag nyid mi rigs pa mthong nas sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyu ba rnams nyams te mig mchi mas gang nas 'khor mo 'jig gi 
[\[125b.5\]]tshong dus dang /_srang dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag na 'khyams pa las bkres pas gzir te zas tshol ba'i phyir gla mi dag gnas par song nas 'dug go/_/de'i tshe na khyim bdag gau ta ma'i khyim rtsig ste/_der gla mi rnams tshol ba las de mi gzhan zhig gis khyim 
[\[125b.6\]]bdag gau ta ma drung du khrid pa dang /_des de mthong nas kye 'di ni rab tu gzhon zhing shin tu gzhon pa zhig ste sngon su'i las kyang ma byas pa zhig gis gzhan zhig tshol ces smras pa dang /_de'i mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim bdag gau ta ma'i gdong du lta'o/_/de la khyim bdag 
[\[125b.7\]]gau ta mas bu khyod su'i yin gang nas 'dir 'ongs pa smros shig ces dris pa dang /_de snying rje zhing dman la sdug bsngal bas mig mchi mas gang ste tshig kyang brnangs bzhin du ngal nas smras pa/_pha bdag ni byang phyogs na rdo 'jog gi grong khyer de nas sngon gyi las kyis 'dir bde bar 
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]phyin na da ni gar mchis kyang ma 'tshal te/_bar ma dor dus las 'da' ba zhig tu 'gyur yang ma 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_des de'i nyams dang tshig gi rgyud thos te/_khyim bdag gau ta mas de la yid kyis sdug par gyur te/_bu rdo 'jog na gnas pa'i skye bo mang 
[\[126a.2\]]po dag khyod kyis shes sam zhes dris so/_/pha 'tshal to/_/bu khyim bdag 'di zhes bya ba khyod kyis shes sam/_pha de ni bdag skal ba nyams pa'i pha lags te 'tshal lo/_/khyim bdag gau ta ma yid la yang shin tu sdug par gyur nas bu mi dga' bar bya mi dgos kyis ma ngu shig_/
[\[126a.3\]]khyod ni nga'i mag par 'gyur te khyim 'di dag khyod nyid kyi yin no zhes smras te/_de yang spro bsrings te de yang mi dga' ba dang bral lo/_/khyim bdag gau ta mas byug pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos dang rgyan dang /_khyim dang /_mal stan dang /_g.yog dang /_dga' 
[\[126a.4\]]ba'i tshig gis ngal bsos te chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyi mag pa 'ongs te/_bu mo bag mar gtang gis sta gon byos shig_/des de'i nyi ma dang /_tshes grangs dang /_skad cig ma dang /_skar ma dag brtags te/_rim bzhin du bshams nas phu nu dang /_mdza' bo 
[\[126a.5\]]dang /_/gnyen bshes su bcas pas bu mo long shig ces smras pa dang /_des pha skad cig mi blang gi nor rnams je btsal bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_des bu khyim na nor yod pa 'di dag thams cad khyod kyi yin no/_/nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang /_de yang smad 'tshong 
[\[126a.6\]]ma de la 'khon lan glon par 'dod nas smras pa/_pha de ni de lta lags mod kyi bdag mi ma rabs bzhin du bag ma mi len to zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de 'khor mo 'jig nas byung ste yan man du 'khyam zhing 'dug pa las chu 'gram du song ba dang /_chu de'i 
[\[126a.7\]]nang nas mi ro zhig khyer 'ongs te/_bya rog zhig chu'i 'gram du 'dug nas mi ro de za bar 'dod na mchus ma slebs so/_/de nas mchu de shing bu zhig la bdar ba dang /_ring po zhig tu gyur te des ro de zos so/_/de nas yang des shing gzhan zhig la mchu bdar ba dang /_ji ltar snga ma bzhin 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]du gyur to/_/ded dpon des kyang lag pas shing bu de gnyis blangs te khyim du song ngo /_/de nas kAr ShA pa Na lnga brgya khyer nas smad 'tshong ma de'i khyim du song ste bzang mo khyod kyis bdag la kAr ShA pa Na med pa'o zhes bskrad na/_da ni kAr ShA pa Na 'di re yongs su spyad kyis tshur shog ces smras 
[\[126b.2\]]pa dang /_de yang kAr ShA pa Na la chags nas de dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyad do/_/de nas ded dpon des de la yongs su spyad de/_de'i sna shing bu des bdar ba dang shin tu ring bar gyur nas des sman pa thams cad bkug ste bstan na yang de dag gis sman dpyad bya bar ma nus te/_de ltar de 
[\[126b.3\]]sman pa thams cad kyis spangs pa dang /_des ded dpon la jo bo bzod par gsol/_'di'i sman dpyad mdzod cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_de ste khyer ba de kun slar sbyin par dam bca' na gdod bya'o/_/mos jo bo nyi rim du yang slar 'bul gyis mdzod cig ces smras pa 
[\[126b.4\]]dang /_des shing bu gnyis pas bdar na/_ji ltar snga ma bzhin du gyur te des zong ci khyer ba thams cad de la slar byin no/_/de nas ded dpon des bu mo skem mo gau ta mI dpal chen po dang sbyar te bag mar blangs so/_/khyim bdag gau ta ma ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na zhing rmed de/_
[\[126b.5\]]des mag pa de la smras pa/_bu khyod kyis chung ma 'di khrid la ri brags kyi grong 'di zhes bya bar 'dug shig_/des de la ri brags grong gi zhing thams cad byin nas des skem mo gau ta mI shing rta la zhon te der song nas 'dug go/_/de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de de 
[\[126b.6\]]la rtse dga' yongs su spyod pa las dus phyi zhig na skem mo gau ta mI sems can dang ldan par gyur nas de bu 'byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang /_jo bo bdag bu btsar nyes bdag gnyen gyi khyim du mchi'o/_/der bdag la bdag gi ma g.yog bgyid do zhes smras pa dang /_des 
[\[126b.7\]]kyang legs so zhes smras nas des bu mo gnyen gyi khyim du bskyal ba dang /_de la der btsas na bu khye'u zhig byung nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgyas par byas te rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas/_des khye'u de khyer te slar ri brags 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]kyi grong nyid du 'ongs so/_/de phyis yang sems can dang ldan par gyur nas bu 'byung ba'i dus su bab pa dang /_jo bo bu 'byung ba'i dus la bab kyis gnyen gyi khyim du mchi'o/_/der bdag la ma bdag gi g.yog bgyid do zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang bzang mo legs 
[\[127a.2\]]kyis 'dong bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_des ma dang bur bcas te shing rta la bskyon nas dong ba dang /_de lam gyi phyed du bu btsas par gyur to/_/des bu btsas par mthong nas shing rta la babs te shing gzhan zhig gi drung du 'dug pa dang de nyid du gnyid kyis log go/_/de gnyid kyis cher 
[\[127a.3\]]log pa dang sbrul gdug pas zin nas dus las 'das so/_/mo yang shing rta'i steng nyid du bu khye'u zhig btsas te de shing rta las babs nas shing drung du song ste/_jo bo khyod kyi bu khye'u zhig btsas kyis dgyes pa skyed cig ces smras pa dang /_de sems med pas lan ma glan no/_/des lag pas 
[\[127a.4\]]bsgul te brtags na dus las 'das pa mthong ngo /_/mo de na ngu bar gyur pa dang /_ba lang yang ma byin par len pas phrogs so/_/de nas de ring zhig tu ngus nas mi dga' ba skyes te phyogs bzhir bltas te des bu da gzod btsas pa ni pang du thogs snga ma ni lag pa nas bzung ste song ba 
[\[127a.5\]]dang /_/de na dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po langs te des mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_khron pa dag chus gang nas de'i lam ka na chu bo rgal dgos par gyur nas/_des bsams pa de ste khye'u dang lhan du rgal na ni bdag kyang med khye'u yang med par 'gyur na re zhig khye'u je bsgral lo/_/
[\[127a.6\]]phu bo de chu bo'i 'gram du bzhag ste chung ngu khyer te rgal to/_/de nas de yang 'gram du bzhag ste phu bo'i phyir yang rgal te chu bo phyed du phyin pa dang khye'u chung ngu de was khyer ro/_/de nas mos chu bo'i dbus su 'dug ste lag pa g.yabs nas ku ku zhes bos pa dang /_khye'u phu bo de ma 
[\[127a.7\]]bdag la bod do snyam bsams nas de chu'i nang du mchongs pa dang /_chu 'gram yang gad pa chad pa zhig ste lhung ma thag tu dus las 'das nas de nas mo rings shing myur bar byung ste/_wa de'i rjes bzhin du bsnyags pa dang des de bor te song nas de la bltas na dus las 'das par mthong 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]ba dang mos ngus nas de chur bor te/_de nas bu chen po de yang chus khyer bar mthong nas de mi dga' ba cher gyur te ngu shing brgyugs pa dang de yang dus las 'das par mthong ngo /_/de khyo dang bu las bral bas yi chad par gyur nas gcig pu gos gcig gi smad g.yogs te chu bo'i 'gram 
[\[127b.2\]]na rlung dang nags chen po dang /_chu bo rnams kyi sgra dang bya'i sgra du ma rnams mnyan cing thos nas kyi hud kyi hud khyo/_kyi hud bu chen po/_kyi hud bu chung ngu ma zhes snying rje zhing brtse bas mchi mas brnangs bzhin du ngu ste sa la phan tshun 'gre zhing 'dug pa dang /_las kun rgyas shing rdzogs 
[\[127b.3\]]par nges pa gdon mi za bar rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_de ma thag tu 'di pha dang ma dang khyim gyi skye bo mang po dag gnam lcags kyis phog ste shi'o/_/de'i nang nas skyes pa gcig cig thar te/_snying rje zhing brtse bas mchi mas brnangs bzhin du myur bar 'gro zhing de'i mdun logs 
[\[127b.4\]]su 'ongs pa dang /_mos de skrag pa lta bur mthong nas kye skyes bu ci'i phyir rings par rgyug ces dris pa dang /_des de'i mdun du rang gi lus brdabs nas ngu zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du smras pa/_khyod kyi pha dang ma dang khyim gyi skye bo mang po kun gnam lcags bab pas phog ste bdag gcig 
[\[127b.5\]]pu ni las kyis thar ro/_/de thos nas phyi phyir mya ngan slos shing ngus par gyur pa bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rabs su sdig ci zhig byas na dus gcig tu khyo dang bu la sogs pa gnyen bshes dang bral/_de bas khyim na gnas pas ci zhig byas/_/skal ba med pas gang du ci snyed pa/_/khyo dang 
[\[127b.6\]]gnyen bshes dang yang bdag bral ba/_/bdag 'gro khyim na gnas par mi rigs te/_/dgon pa rnam par dben pa de dag dang /_/khyim stong de dag tu ni gnas par bla/_/khyim na gnas pa sdig ste cir mi rung /_/mya ngan sdug bsngal rnam par 'phel bar gyur/_/der phyogs 
[\[127b.7\]]gcig tu zhugs te song nas phan tshun du 'khyam 'khyam pa las ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig tu phyin nas/_de na bud med rgan mo gzhan zhig ras 'khal ba zhig 'dug ste de de'i drung du song ba dang /_des de la ngal bsos nas de dang lhan cig tu ras 'khal ba la zhugs so/_/de na 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]tha ga pa khye'u gzhon nu gzhan zhig rang gi bzos 'tsho ba la zhugs te/_de la bud med rgan mo de dus dus su ras kyi skud pa de la 'tshong ngo /_/de nas gzhan zhig tu des skud pa phra mo zhig khyer te de'i drung du song ba dang /_des ma ma khyod kyis sngon ni sbom por 'khol na da 
[\[128a.2\]]'di lta bu gang nas 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_des bu 'di ni bdag gis ma bkal lo/_/ma ma 'o na sus bkal/_bu bdag gi khyim na bud med gcig cig 'dug ste/_des bkal ba 'di yin no zhes smras pa dang /_des ma ma khyod kyis ci'i phyir na bdag la de mi sbyin bdag la yang chung ma 
[\[128a.3\]]med do/_/bdag gis de'i bza' ba dang bgo ba dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad dag sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang /_mos bu re zhig de la gsol bar bya ste ci zer ba las lan phyis sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_des de'i skud pa'i rin rgyal bar byin/_zan kyang byin nas de nas dri dang me tog gis brgyan te btang ba dang 
[\[128a.4\]]skem mo gau ta mIs smras pa/_ma ma skud pa su la btsongs na rin rgyal zhing legs te khyod kyang dri dang me tog gis sus brgyan/_des bu mo dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi zan kyang byin na zhes smras pa dang /_de'i phyir 'di lta bu ga las byung zhes 'dri'o/_/des kyang ji ltar 
[\[128a.5\]]gyur pa zhib tu smras nas khye'u tha ga pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par snyan par brjod de smras pa/_bu mo khye'u tha ga pa de khyod slong ste/_de'i chung ma med kyis khas long shig dang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/des ma mchog gis phyin chad 'di skad ma smra shig_/bdag ni khyim na gnas pas skyos ji lta 
[\[128a.6\]]bur yang rung de lta bu'i 'tsho ba mi bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo bud med rten med pa ni sdug bsngal ba'i gnas na 'dug ste phyi rol gyi skyes pa dag glags lta bar yang 'gyur gyis gnas su soms la khas long ste 'dug shig_/des khas ma blangs nas/_des de la nyes pa'i 
[\[128a.7\]]dmigs su 'gyur bar smras pa dang /_gdod des khas blangs so/_/de nas khye'u tha ga pas de nyi ma dang tshes grangs dang skar ma'i rim dang sbyar te khyim du blangs so/_/de yang mi srun cing smyo la khro bas rtag tu de la dbyig pa dang thal mos rdeg ste/_des bud med rgan mo de la smras pa/_
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]ma ma khyod kyis bdag srin po la phul te/_des bdag la nyin gcig bzhin du dbyug pa dang /_thal mos rdeg na ji ltar bya ma shes so/_/bu mo nam khyod la bu ma byung gi bar du khyod la kho rdeg go/_/khyod kyang bu mthur gyur pa dang /_khyim de yang khyod nyid dbang byed kyis mi dga' bar ma byed 
[\[128b.2\]]cig_/de dus phyi zhig na de sems can dang ldan par gyur nas khye'u tha ga pa de mo la byams par gyur to/_/mo yang de la brnyas par byed do/_/des kyang sdod cig ces byas nas mnags so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na khye'u de tha ga pa'i grogs po rnams kyis chang mang du blud pas ra ro nas smyo zhing 
[\[128b.3\]]khyim du 'ongs so/_/de yang sgo bcad de bu 'byung zhing 'dug pa'i tshe des sgo phye zhes byas na de bu 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis kun tu gzer bas sgo ma phye ba dang /_de rab tu khro ba skyes nas phyogs gcig tu song ste 'dug go/_/des bu byung nas sgo phye ba dang de nang du 'ongs pa la des gus par byas te smras 
[\[128b.4\]]pa/_jo bo dgyes par mdzod cig_/khyod kyi bu pho zhig btsas so/_/des de la khro bas kun khebs pa dang ni ma bral gyi gnod sems kyis kun du khebs par gyur te/_des 'di bu ma byung bas kyang bdag la brnyas par byed na/_gang gi tshe 'di'i bu skyes par gyur na 'di dang bus bsdongs/_
[\[128b.5\]]nas bdag la gdon mi za bar gsod par byed do snyam du bsams nas des smras pa/_bzang mo thab tu me bus la zangs tshugs shig_/des thab tu me bus te zangs btsugs pa dang smras pa/_yungs mar lugs la skol cig_/des yungs mar blugs te bskol ba dang /_des bu 
[\[128b.6\]]chung 'dir chug la skol cig ces smras pa dang mos jo bo 'di ni khyod nyid kyi bu yin na 'dir ci zhig nyes gzhon nur ma bsad ces smras pa dang /_des de la dbyig pas brdegs so/_/bdag las sdug pa med pas des skrag ste/_de yungs mar khol ba'i nang du bcug pa dang dus las 
[\[128b.7\]]'das so/_/nam de tshos par gyur pa na des smras pa/_da phyung zhes bsgo ba dang /_des de phyung ba dang /_smras pa/_zo shig ces bsgo'o/_/des smras pa/_jo bo bu'i sha ji ltar bza' zhes smras pa dang /_des de nyid kyi lus thams cad du brdegs rab tu brdegs pa dang /_
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]de des brdegs pas bu'i sha yang zos so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_'dod chags ni kha na ma tho ba chung mod kyi 'bral ba ni dka'o/_/zhe sdang ni kha na ma tho ba che la 'bral ba sla bas tha ga pa'i khye'u de phyis 'gyod pa'i mes gdungs te ring zhig tu ma log pas 
[\[129a.2\]]na gnyid kyis myos te de shin tu log par gau ta mIs rig nas bsams pa/_'dis bu bsad nas bdag la yang bu'i sha zar bcug ste/_mi 'di ni srin po yin gyis 'bros snyam nas rgyags ci theg cig khyer de bros pa dang /_byang phyogs kyi lam grogs dag cig yul 'khor mo 'jig tu zong 
[\[129a.3\]]rnams btsongs te slar gyis zong rnams khyer nas byang phyogs kyi lam du zhugs te 'dong ba dang /_de dag dang mo lhan cig tu song ngo /_/ji tsam na ded dpon gyis de'i gzugs mdzes par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas de la chags te des khyod su'i da gang du 'gro zhes dris pa dang /_mos smras pa/_
[\[129a.4\]]ded dpon bdag gi khyo ni sbrul gdug pas zos so/_/bu gnyis las gcig ni was so/_/gcig ni chu bo'i nang du dus las 'das so/_/ma dang pha ni gnam lcags kyis bsad do/_/bdag ni mgon med pas gar dga' bar 'gro ste 'gron pa mang po de dag gar 'dong ba der mchi'o/_/
[\[129a.5\]]des bsams pa/_ring du gar song yang 'di 'dra ba'i bud med dang lhan cig yongs su spyod do/_/snyam nas des de chung ma byas te/_ji tsam zhig na 'gron pa mang po de dag mi rgod kyis bcom ste/_ded dpon de yang 'thab pa las bsad do/_/skem mo gau ta mI ni mi rgod kyi dpon gyis 
[\[129a.6\]]chung mar byas pa dang /_mi rgod kyi sde dpon de yang phyogs kyi rgyal pos bsad do/_/skem mo gau ta mI ni rgyal po'i btsun mo chen mor gyur to/_/ji tsam na rgyal po de yang dus las 'das nas btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang blon po dang /_skye bo mang po dag gi de skem mo gau ta mI dang lhan 
[\[129a.7\]]cig tu bkur sti cher byas te mchad pa'i nang du bcug go/_/byang phyogs kyi mi rnams dur rku ste/_de dag gi mchad pa brus pa dang /_skem mo gau ta mI snar rdul song nas des sbrid pa byung ba dang /_dur rku ba'i mi rnams skrag ste ro langs so snyam nas de dag bros pa dang /_skem mo gau ta mI 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]khung bu brus nas byung ngo /_/des sdug bsngal rnam pa du mar brtags pas rlung rab tu langs shing kha zas med pa'i rkyen gyis smyon mar gyur nas des smad g.yogs bor te lag pa dang rkang pa gas shing rtsub skra ring zhing skya mo bsing bsing mor gyur te/_phan tshun 'khyam 'khyam pa las mnyan du yod par 
[\[129b.2\]]phyin to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab po/_/des sngon byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa myong bar gyur nas sngon gyi las kyis dze ta'i tshal du phyin to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[129b.3\]]slong brgya stong du ma'i mdun du chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa skem mo gau ta mI'i rgyang ma nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni yang dag par brgyan/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus ni sku la rnam par spras/_'od kyi dkyil 'khor nyi ma stong las 
[\[129b.4\]]'das pa'i 'od 'dom gang ba rin po che'i ri 'gro ba bzhin pa kho ra khor yug nas bzang ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bdag gi sems dran pa slar thob ste de ngo tsha ba'i tshul du gyur nas phyogs gcig tu tsog pur 'dug go/_/de'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mkhyen pa'am/_
[\[129b.5\]]mi gzigs pa'am/_mi rig pa'am/_rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang med de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos nyid kyis thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan 'dogs par gyur pa/_srung ba gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pa/_gnyis su med pa gnyis su mi smra ba/_zhi gnas 
[\[129b.6\]]dang /_/lhag mthong la gnas pa/_dul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa/_chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i mthil rab tu brtan pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa med pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/_
[\[129b.7\]]yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_gnas drug la rtag tu gnas pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyan pa/_lam gyi yan lag brgyad 'chang ba/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/_stobs 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan par grags pa rnams brgya phrag bcu'i dbang du gyur pa las rab tu nges pa ni mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs nas ye shes kyi gzigs pa 'byung ste/_gang la nyams/_
[\[130a.2\]]gang la 'phel bar gyur/_gang la sdug bsngal bar gyur/_gang dog par gyur/_gang gnod par gyur/_gang sdug bsngal dang dog pa dang gnod par gyur/_gang ngan song la gzhol/_gang ngan song la 'bab/_gang ngan song la rab tu 'babs/_ngas gang ngan song nas phyung ste 
[\[130a.3\]]mtho ris dang thar pa la gzhag par bya/_gang dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma skyes pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/_gang bskyed pa rnams la yongs su smin par bya/_gang smin pa rnams la rnam par grol bar bya/_yang gsungs pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin gnas de yang /_/gal te 
[\[130a.4\]]dus las yol yang srid/_/gdul bar gyur pa'i sras rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus las 'da' mi 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo ded dpon gyi chung ma skem mo gau ta mI la bla gos byin cig dang 'di la chos 
[\[130a.5\]]bshad par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ded dpon gyi chung ma gau ta mI la bla gos byin no/_/de nas ded dpon gyi chung ma skem mo gau ta mI gos gyon nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[130a.6\]]go phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin rnams mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad do/_/gang thos pas ded dpon 
[\[130a.7\]]gyi chung ma skem mo gau ta mIs 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu gyen du byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/de bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong ma'i dngos por gyur cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag tshangs par spyad pa spyod du gnang ngam bcom ldan 'das kyis skye dgu'i bdag mo 
[\[130b.2\]]chen mo la gtad nas des rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas 'dul ba bslabs te lung bsgo ba byin nas de brtson pa byas/_nan tan du byas/_bsgrub par byas pas na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo 'di g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba shes te 'dus byas kyi rgyud thams cad zhig pa dang /_lhung 
[\[130b.3\]]ba dang /_rnam par 'gyes pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis rab tu bcom ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas te dgra bcom par gyur to/_/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral/_bong ba dang gser du 'dra/_nam mkha' la lag mthil 
[\[130b.4\]]chags pa med pa bzhin du sems mnyam pa/_ste'u dang tsan dan du 'dra ba/_rig pas sgo nga'i mdzod bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa yang dag par so sor rig pa ni thob/_srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs te/_dbang po dang nye 
[\[130b.5\]]dbang po dang /_lhar bcas pa rnams kyis mchod cing phyag bya ba dang tshig snyan pas brjod par gyur to/_/de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos ma'i dge 
[\[130b.6\]]slong ma 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na 'di lta ste mchog ni dge slong ma skem mo gau ta mI'o/_/nam bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma gau ta mI 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog go zhes gsungs pa dang /_de'i tshe de'i drung du dge slong ma rnams 'dong ngo /_/des 'ongs pa de dag skyo ba bskyed 
[\[130b.7\]]pa'i phyir las kyi rgyud rnams brjod do/_/dge slong ma dag gis kyang dge slong dag la de lta bur gyur pa zhib tu smras so/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na skem mo gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir song ba dang /_dge slong dag gis mthong nas gcig la gcig de'i las kyi 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]rgyud rnams 'dzer to/_/de nas skem mo gau ta mIs bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/mkhyen bzhin du 'dri ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la ci'i 
[\[131a.2\]]phyir kun dga' bo dge slong rnams phan tshun du rna bar bcug ces smras pa dang /_des zhib tu gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sems can rnams kyi rgyud dang las kyi rnam par smin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/'jig rten pa'i rnams ni rang gi las so/_/
[\[131a.3\]]las ni skye gnas so/_/las ni nying mtshams so/_/las ni rjes su 'jug pa ste/_gang gis ji ltar las byas pa de rnam par smin pa so sor myong bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag the tshom skyes pa dang /_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa dge 
[\[131a.4\]]slong ma skem mo gau ta mIs las ci bgyis na de'i phyir 'di'i khyo sbrul gyis zos te dus las 'das/_bu gcig was bkum/_gnyis pa ni chu bos 'tshal te dus las 'das/_pha ma gnyis ni gnam lcags babs pas bkum par gyur/_bu'i sha yang 'tshal nas smyos shing g.yeng ba'i sems 
[\[131a.5\]]kyis de dang de dag tu 'khyam 'khyam pa las bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dul ba 'dzin ma'i nang na mchog go zhes ci'i slad du bka' stsal ces zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[131a.6\]]'das kyis gsungs pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma skem mo gau ta mI nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs pas rnyed cing rkyen smin pa ni chu bo bzhin mngon du 'byung ste nges par 'gyur ro/_/skem mo gau ta mIs las byas shing bsags pa'i gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams las 
[\[131a.7\]]byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par smin to/_/las rnams 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]stor par mi 'gyur ba/_/bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang /_/dus dang 'phrod nas 'thob pa ni/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ni ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag cig 'dug ste/_phyug la nor mang zhing longs spyod che gnas yangs shing rgya che ba ni ngal 
[\[131b.2\]]bsos po'i nor dang 'dra ste/_ngal bsos pa'i nor la sngo ba zhig nas rigs dang mnyam pa zhig las chung ma zhig blangs te/_de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/des rtse dga' yongs su spyad kyang bu pho yang med/_bu mo yang med de/_bdag gi khyim du nor du ma zhig 'dus na de la bu 
[\[131b.3\]]pho yang med bu mo yang med de/_bdag 'das pa dang bdag gi dbang ba thams cad bu med pa'o zhes zer te rgyal po'i dkor du 'gyur ro zhes de 'gram pa lag pa la gtad de rab tu sems shing 'dug pa de'i chung mas mthong nas/_jo bo khyod ci'i phyir lag pas 'gram par gtad de rab tu sems shing 
[\[131b.4\]]'dug ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bzang mo bdag gi khyim na nor du ma zhig 'dus kyang bu pho yang med bu mo yang med pas bdag 'das pa dang bdag gi dbang ba thams cad bu med pa'o/_/zhes zer te rgyal po'i dkor du 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu sems shing mi 'dug_/des bsams 
[\[131b.5\]]pa/_ci 'di'i skal ba chung ngam/_bu pho yang med bu mo yang med na/_ci bdag gi skal ba chung ngam 'di ni gzhan ma yin gyi bdag la nyes pa'i skyon btags te chung ma gzhan len par 'dod do/_/de'i phyir bdag gi mdun du 'gram pa lag par gtad de rab tu sems shing 'dug la 'di skad du 
[\[131b.6\]]bdag gi khyim na nor du ma 'dus kyang bu pho dang bu mo med pas bdag 'das pa dang bdag gi dbang ba thams cad bu med pa'o zhes zer te rgyal po'i dkor du 'gyur ro zhes zer gyis de bas na bdag nyid tham par bya'o zhes bsams nas smras pa/_jo bo 'di ltar bdag skal ba chung bas khyod kyi bu pho 
[\[131b.7\]]dang bu mo med kyis chung ma gzhan zhig long shig dang /_de las bu pho dang bu mo yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo khyod kyis skyes bu gang la chung ma gnyis yod na/_de ni nam yang chu grang mo'i skyo ma mi 'thung ste rtag tu de'i khyim na 'thab pa dang 'khrug pa dang mi 'dum 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]pa dang rtsod pas nang gi skye bo rnams dkrugs par byas te rang gi las la brtson par mi 'gyur ro zhes ma thos sam/_mos smras pa/_jo bo re zhig long shig dang de ste phu nu mo tsam du gyur na ni phu nu mor 'du shes kyis bskyang bar bya'o/_/'on te bu mo tsam zhig na ni bu mor 'du 
[\[132a.2\]]shes kyis bskyang bar bya'o/_/des de la g.yo byas te smras pas de yang bu mo tshol ba la zhugs so/_/de nas ri brags kyi grong gzhan zhig na khyim bdag cig gi bu mo zhig btsas nas skyes pa dang /_pha ma gnyis dus las 'das pa zhig ste/_des de la de'i ming po las de bslangs nas dpal 
[\[132a.3\]]chen po dang sbyar te bag mar blangs so/_/thams cad kyang chos nyid kyis sar pas rnying pa zil gyis gnon pas des de la shin tu byams shing sems zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de'i chung ma rnying pa de rang bzhin gyis phrag dog gis mngal gyi gnas dag par gyur te/_sems can dang ldan 
[\[132a.4\]]par gyur nas de dga' ba skyes te de la smras pa/_jo bo dga' ba skyed cig bdag ni sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo legs so/_/de ste bu pho zhig btsas na ni bdag 'das pa dang khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/mos smras pa/_jo bo khyod kyi chung mas mngal 
[\[132a.5\]]nas lhung ba'i cho ga zhig sbyar te lhung bar ma byas na ni khyim gyi bdag por 'gyur ro/_/des smras pa/_bzang mo sngon yang bdag gis 'di lta bu'i phyir smras na/_da dung bu cung zad kyang med par khyod kyis brtsam mam/_de lan med de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 
[\[132a.6\]]'das pa dang khye'u zhig btsas so/_/de btsas pa'i btsas ston cher byas te rigs dang mthun pa las ming btags so/_/des sngon las kyis 'di btsas na sems can 'di ma yar mo 'dis 'di mi gsod pa la phan gyis de bas na 'di nyid la gzhar ro zhes bsams nas des de la smras pa/_
[\[132a.7\]]che zhe khye'u 'di khyod dang bdag gi yin gyis bdag cag gnyis kas bskyed do/_/des legs kyis 'di bzhin bgyi'o zhes smras nas de skyed pa la zhugs so/_/des de bskyed na log par rtog pa skyes te gang gi bu yin pa de'i khyim ste/_de bas na 'di bskyed kyang 'di ltar khyim gyi bdag por 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]gyur pa dang /_bdag ni bran mor 'gyur gyis 'di ni gsad do snyam nas de log par rtog pas bskyod pas khye'u de'i khar smig ma'i thur ma zhig btsugs pa dang /_de sdug bsngal gyis gzir bas ngu bar gyur nas des smras pa/_khye'u 'di ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_che zhe 
[\[132b.2\]]ci'i phyir ngu ma 'tshal to/_/des de blangs te dga' bar bya bar brtsams te lag pas 'khyud de 'o byas nas pang par blangs kyang mi btub nas/_des de la nu ma blud nas ji tsam na bltas pa dang smig ma'i thur ma zhig khar btsugs par mthong nas/_des myur du kha phye ste lag pas drangs pa 
[\[132b.3\]]dang khye'u de dbugs med de dus las 'das nas des brang brdungs te ngu zhing sa la sgyel ba dang khyim gyi skye bo dag brgyugs nas 'di ci nyes zhes dris pa dang /_des snying rje zhing brtse bas mchi mas brnangs bzhin du smras pa/_kye ma ma yar mo sdig pa'i chos spyod pa 'di phrag dog gis 
[\[132b.4\]]khros nas bdag gi bu'i khar smig ma'i thur ma btsugs te bsad do/_/de dag kyang ngu bar gyur nas 'khor gyi khyim mtshes dag gis thos nas de dag gis kyang brgyugs te smras pa/_e ma'o 'di ni glo bur zhig byas te byis pa 'di nyes pa med cing gnod pa med par bsad do zhes zer 
[\[132b.5\]]nas/_de de la skye bo mang po dag gis e ma'o zhes zer zhing kun du bskor to/_/de ni brang rdung zhing ngu ste mna' bor ba de ste/_bdag gis khyod kyi bu bsad par gyur na bdag gi khyo sbrul gyis zos te dus byed par shog shig_/bu gcig ni was zos par shog shig_/gnyis pa ni chu bor 
[\[132b.6\]]lhung ste dus byed par shog shig_/pha ma gnam lcags kyis gsod par shog shig_/bu'i sha yang zos la smyos shing 'phyar ba'i sems kyis phan tshun 'khyam par shog shig ces mna' bor ro/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_khyim bdag de'i chung ma gnyis pa ni 'di ltar 'di bzhin 
[\[132b.7\]]dge slong ma skem mo gau ta mI 'di'o/_/'di shin tu nyon mongs pas kun du khebs pas na khye'u bsad na yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra zhing mna' bor ba de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas 'di'i khyo sbrul gyis zos te dus las 'das so/_/bu gcig ni was bsad do/_/gcig ni chu bor lhung ste dus las 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]'das so/_/pha ma ni gnam lcags lhung bas dog go/_/bu'i sha zos te sgren mor smyos shing yan man du g.yengs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun du 'khyam mo/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung las rab tu byung bar gyur te/_der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[133a.2\]]spyad kyang yon tan mang po gang yang ma chud do/_/gang la rab tu byung ba'i mkhan mo de bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu gsungs so/_/de na 'dis 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa/_gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'od 
[\[133a.3\]]srung bla na med pa yon gnas kyi drung du tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan mang po cig kyang ma chud de bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na gang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bram ze'i bu bla ma la bram ze'i bu khyod skye bo'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na shAkya thub pa de 
[\[133a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas nas/_ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo 'di la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[133a.5\]]rgyas kyis 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu gsungs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa shAkya'i rgyal po des 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu gsungs par shog shig_/'dis de na tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas na de nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung zhing nyon 
[\[133a.6\]]mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas so/_/gang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu shog shig ces smon lam btab ste/_smon lam de'i mthus na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i nang na mchog tu gsungs so/_/gzhan yang dge slong dag gis 
[\[133a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa skem mo gau ta mI pha ma gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na las gang gi rnam par smin pas gnam lcags lhung ste gum par 'gyur/_khyos las ci bgyis na sbrul gyis 'tshal nas dus las 'das/_bu gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na gcig ni 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]was 'tshal gcig ni chu bor lhung ste dus las 'das par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pas tshogs rnyed cing rkyen smin pa ni chu bo bzhin du nye bar gnas pa ni gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag gis las byas shing bsags pa 
[\[133b.2\]]ni gzhan sus kyang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi 
[\[133b.3\]]dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par smin to/_/las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur ba/_/bskal pa dag ni brgyar lon kyang /_/dus dang 'phrod nas 'thob pa ni/_/lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba na bskal pa bzang po 'dir skye bo tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na 'od srung zhes bya ba'i ston 
[\[133b.4\]]pa 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi mkhan po/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[133b.5\]]'das yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer gyi drang srong bzhin gyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i dus na yul 'khor mo 'jig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas te phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_gnas yangs shing rgya che ba/_ngal bso po'i bzhin nor 'dus pa/_ngal 
[\[133b.6\]]bso po'i nor la sdo ba des chu bo ba ra ka ya'i pha rol tu gtsug lag khang zhig brtsigs te der yul so so na gnas pa'i dge slong dag gnas te/_khyim bdag de las skyes bu grong mi dag gis zong blangs shing 'dong ngo /_/de la gcig gis lan gsum gyi bar du zong chud gsan pa dang /_des 
[\[133b.7\]]de la smras pa/_'di ltar drin med pa khyod kyis brnogs te bdag gi zong lan gsum du chud gsan gyis ma byin gyi bar du ma 'gro shig_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag nga lan gcig stsal la de chud gsan na bdag gi bu gsum dang /_bdag chung mar bcas pa khyod kyi bran du snoms shig des yang 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]tshigs rgya bris nas de la zong byin no/_des yang cung zad kyang mi nus pa zhig ste/_de yang chud gsan nas khyim bdag des de chung ma dang bur bcas te gtsug lag khang de'i las byed par phul lo/_/de yul 'khor mo 'jig na gnas pas nyi ma re re zhing chu bo rgal nas 
[\[134a.2\]]gtsug lag khang der dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'bras chan 'tshed de/_chung ma dang bu dag ni phyag tshang byed do/_/gtsug lag khang de na dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig dge 'dun gyi zhal ta byed de/_de nas dus phyi zhig na char pa bab pas chu bo ba ra ka chus gang ste/_las byed pa bu dang chung mar 
[\[134a.3\]]bcas te ring du thogs pa dang dge slong dgra bcom pa de 'ongs nas smras pa/_kye skyes bu gdugs tshod 'di tsam 'das kyi bar du da dung yang khyod mi 'ong na ci dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos rnams gcad par bya'am/_de skad smras pa dang chung ma dang bcas nas khros te smras pa/_'di 'ong ba na klad par 
[\[134a.4\]]ci'i phyir gnam lcags ma bab/_bu phos smras pa/_'di sbrul gdug pas ci'i phyir ma zos/_bu 'bring pos smras pa 'di ci'i phyir chu bor lhung ste dus las ma 'das/_bu chung ngus smras pa/_'di was ci'i phyir ma zos/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_gang khyim bdag chung mar 
[\[134a.5\]]bcas pa de gnyis ni skem mo gau ta mI pha ma'o/_/gang bu chen po de ni 'di'i khyo'o/_/gang bu 'bring po de ni 'di'i bu chen po'o/_/gang bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de ni 'di'i bu chung ngu ste/_de ltar dgra bcom pa la ngan sems kyis tshig rtsub po phyung ste/_de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas gnam lcags dang /_
[\[134a.6\]]sbrul gdug pa dang /_wa la sogs pas bsad/_chu bor lhung ba dang bzhi char dus las 'das so/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag shin tu gnag pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang shin tu gnag go/_/shin tu dkar ba'i las ni shin tu dkar ba/_'dres pa las ni 'dres pa/_de lta 
[\[134a.7\]]bas na dge slong dag shin tu gnag pa dang 'dres pa'i las spangs te/_shin tu dkar ba'i las la nan tan bya'o/_/de bzhin du dge slong dag khyed kyis bslab par byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs pa dang /_dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]gsungs pa la mngon par dga'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po sum bcu rtsa dgu pa/_gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/_nam skyes bu glen pa 'phags skyes pos shAkya rnams la nyes pa med cing gnod pa med par bsad pa dang shAkya'i chung ma rnams kyi ming po dang /_
[\[134b.2\]]khyo dang /_pha rnams las bral bar gyur nas sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs te legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ngo /_/sdug bsngal ni dril gyi sgra dang 'dra ste/_nam de dag mya ngan gyi bral ba dang de'i tshe 'dod chags rab tu che ba'i nyon mongs pas gzir te bzod par bya ba ma nus 
[\[134b.3\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_sbrul nag po la nyes pa'i dmigs lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_khro ba can dang /_khon du 'dzin pa can dang /_snying ring ba dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_dug rno ba'o/_/de ltar de bzhin du bud med kha cig la yang nyes dmigs rnam pa lnga ste/_
[\[134b.4\]]lnga gang zhe na/_khro ba can dang /_khon du 'dzin pa can dang /_snying ring ba dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_dug rno ba'o/_/de la bud med kyi dug rno ba gang zhe na/_bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags che'o/_/de dag gcig la gcig gros byas nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo gang na ba der dong 
[\[134b.5\]]ste phyin pa dang sbom dga' mo'i rkang pa la phyag byas te mdun du 'khod nas 'phags ma nyon mongs pa rnams ni gzung bar dka' ste/_bud med rnams la bslu bar bgyid na ji ltar bdag cag gis bzlog par bgyi ba bshad du gsol/_des smras pa/_nu mo dag de la shes 
[\[134b.6\]]par bya ba ci zhig yod khyed cag ni na chung dar la bab pa yin gyis nged la khrims phul te nor can dang /_tshong dpon dang /_ded dpon dang /_gzhan yang nal gyi bu dang /_su'i bu gtol med pa rnams dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod cig_/de ste nga yang gzhon na ni khyed cag dang lhan cig 
[\[134b.7\]]tu 'gro'o/_/des de dag bslus pa dang rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te dong nas smras pa/_che zhe 'phags ma sbom dga' mo na re 'di la shes par bya ba ci zhig yod ces zer ro/_/de dag las kha cig gis che zhe des smras pa legs kyis 'dod la yongs su spyod do zhes smras pa dang /_kha cig 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gis smras pa/_nu mo bud med rnams kyis legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni rnyed par dka' na skad cig 'phags ma skem mo gau ta mI la yang dri'o/_/de dag gis che zhe legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras te/_de dag skem mo gau ta mI'i drung 
[\[135a.2\]]du dong ste rkang pa la phyag byas nas 'phags ma nyon mongs pa ni gzung bar dka' ste/_bud med rnams slu bar bgyid na bdag cag gis ji ltar bzlog par bgyi ba bshad du gsol/_des smras pa/_che zhe dag 'dod pa rnams kyi ming yang ma 'dzin cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dod pa ni bde 
[\[135a.3\]]ba chung la sdug bsngal che/_nyes pa'i dmigs mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_nyes pa'i dmigs lnga yang dag par mthong zhing mkhas pas ni 'dod pa la bsten pa'i mi rigs so/_/lnga gang zhe na/_'dod pa ni dga' ba chung zhing sdug bsngal che la nyes pa'i dmigs mang 
[\[135a.4\]]por yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so/_/'dod pa la bsten pas sbyor ba'i rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so/_/'dod pa la bsten na gtong ba dang /_ngoms pa dang /_chog pa med par 
[\[135a.5\]]mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so/_/'dod pa la bsten pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ni cung zad kyang med par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so/_/'dod pa ni rnam grangs du ma las kyang sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos 
[\[135a.6\]]dang /_mkhas pa dang /_yang dag par song ba'i skyes bu dam pa dag gis smad par mthong ba'i mkhas pas 'dod pa la bsten par mi rigs so/_/yon tan lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pa ni rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rang gi don ma 'dres pa 
[\[135a.7\]]mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag gang bran mo dang /_mngag gzhug ma dang /_skyo ba dang /_dbang byed pa dang /_gar dgar 'gror med pa las de dag gis mchod pa dang /_bsngags par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor bde ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba 'thob pa dag ma thob na yang 
[\[135b.2\]]lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/rnam grangs du ma las kyang rab tu 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang /_mkhas pa dang /_yang dag par song ba dang /_skyes bu dam pa dag gis bstod 
[\[135b.3\]]par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so/_/ci bdag gis tshe gzhan du 'dod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal myong bar de mnyan par 'dod dam/_'on te tshe 'di la myong ba'i rnams mnyan par 'dod/_de dag gis 'phags ma khyod kyis tshe gzhan du 'dod pa'i 
[\[135b.4\]]phyir sdug bsngal myong ba ni re zhig zhog la gang tshe 'di la myong ba rnams gsung shig ces smras pa dang /_des de dag la ma dang /_pha dang /_khyo dang /_bu rnams las bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_bu'i sha zos pa'i sdug bsngal ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras pa dang /_de dag skyo nas ba spu kun 
[\[135b.5\]]khung nas g.yos te rna ba byo nas skem mo gau ta mI'i gdong du bltas pa dang /_des de dag gi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin rnams shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad do/_/de thos pa nas 
[\[135b.6\]]de dag gis 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu gyen du byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/de dag bden pa mthong ste 'phags ma bdag cag do zhig go/_/bdag cag rab tu do zhig go/_/'phags ma sbom dga' mos bdag 
[\[135b.7\]]cag 'dod pa'i 'dam du do bcug go zhes smras pa dang /_skem mo gau ta mIs nu mo dag ci byas zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis kyang zhib tu smras so/_/des nu mo dag 'di la ci zhig bya/_de ni nyes pa sbom po la spyod pa ste/_des bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa chu 'gram gyi gad pa 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]bzhin 'dor ro zhes smras pa dang /_don chung ngu'i dge slong ma dag 'phya spang ste/_kha ngan du 'dzer ba ni dge slong mas dge slong ma dag slar khyim du bskrad pa ga la srid ces 'dzer to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras so/_/dge slong dag 
[\[136a.2\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong ma khyim du 'jug par ma byed cig_/'jug par byed na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong ma gzhan zhig dge 
[\[136a.3\]]slong la spyos pa dang /_dge slong de skrag par gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong pha la spyo bar byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dge slong mas 
[\[136a.4\]]dge slong pha la mi bya ba bzhin du dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma la mi bya'o/_/dge slob mas dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma la mi bya'o/_/dge tshul mas dge slong pha dang /_dge 
[\[136a.5\]]slong ma dang /_dge slob ma dang /_dge tshul pha dang /_dge tshul ma la yang mi bya'o/_/mdor na/_/mdun du 'gro bar mi bya ste/_/ldang bar bya'o dge slong ma/_/zhus nas 'dug par bya ba dang /_/skyil mo krung dang rnam grangs med/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[136a.6\]]mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mnyan du yod pa'i sngon gyi skyed mos tshal [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i khang pa na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon 
[\[136a.7\]]lhung bzed khyer te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/dge slong ma sbom dga' mo yang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon lhung bzed khyer nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mthong nas glen pa 'di la mi 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]dga' bar bya'o snyam bsams nas khyim gang du tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'gro ba der mo thog mar dong ste/_sgo'i nang logs su 'dug nas 'phags pa da ltar ni sbyar ba cung zad kyang med kyis song shig ces smras pa dang /_de khyim gzhan du song ngo /_/der yang mo sngar song ste 
[\[136b.2\]]snga ma bzhin du gtses so/_/'di bzhin du yang gcig nas gcig tu byas pa dang /_ma dgongs par ni dgra bcom pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs pa mi 'jug ste/_su zhig bdag la 'tshe snyam dgongs na/_sbom dga' mo yin par gzigs nas des smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyis ni 
[\[136b.3\]]ma nyes kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nyes te/_nyes pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med dag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por gnang bar byas pas nyes so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas 
[\[136b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gang cung zad dge slong mas dge slong pha spyod yul du 'gro ba'i mdun du song na nyes pa'i dmigs su 'gyur te/_de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms mi bslang bar 
[\[136b.5\]]dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung gis dge slong ma la rigs par spyos so/_/de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms ma bslang shig_/dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms bslangs na 'das pa dang bcas 
[\[136b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul du bsod snyoms ma bslang shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong mas dge slong gi spyod yul spangs pa dang /_de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma rnams kyis 
[\[136b.7\]]dge slong rnams la smras nas/_dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong spyod yul du 'dong ba'i mdun du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/gang spyod yul dge slong dag gis spangs par dge slong ma dag de dag 'dong bar byos 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]shig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sbom dga' mo 'khor brgya du ma'i mdun na 'dug cing chos 'chad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lam der song ba dang 'khor de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mthong nas langs so/_/
[\[137a.2\]]sbom dga' mo ni rkub kyang ma bskyod pa dang /_de dag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po lha dang mis mchod pa de mthong ba dang /_bdag cag ni langs na khyod stan las kyang ma 'phags pa ni ma legs so zhes smras pa dang /_des 'di ni mu stegs can las rab tu byung ste/_blun pa rab 
[\[137a.3\]]tu blun pa/_glen pa/_rab tu glen pa na bdag shAkya mo rab tu byung ba sde snod gsum pa/_chos kyi gtam can/_rig pa dang grol ba la spobs pas ci phyir 'di mthong ba dang stan las ldang zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis thos te bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_/bcom ldan 
[\[137a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dad pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni rigs par 'phya'o/_/de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong mthong ma thag tu stan las longs shig_/ma langs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[137a.5\]]pa/_/dge slong mas dge slong mthong ma thag tu stan las longs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dus phyi zhig na dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ma dbyar mo khang gi phyi rol na 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na 'dug ste chos 'chad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs dang 
[\[137a.6\]]chos gos gyon lhung bzed khyer te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa las mnyan du yod pa nas bsod snyoms las slar bskor te/_gang na dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang yod pa der song ba dang /_dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ma tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mthong ste/_
[\[137a.7\]]mthong ma thag tu stan las langs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan la 'dug go/_/'dug nas sring mo khyod kyis mdo sde gang zhig brtsams zhes dris pa dang des smras pa/_'phags pa 'di zhes bgyi ba'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos mdo sde rgyas par bshad par 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]brtsams pa dang /_ut+pa la'i kha dog ma 'greng bzhin du rna ba byo ste nyan to/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo chos 'chad pa la chags pas de la 'dug ces ma smras pa dang /_de ring zhig 'greng bas nyi ma'i 'od zer tsha bas rmya ste brgyal bar gyur nas sa la 'gyel ba dang ma dad pa dag 
[\[137b.2\]]gis smras pa/_kye dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ma 'dod chags dang bral lo zhes thos na shAkya gzhon nu gzugs sdug pa mthong ba dang 'dod chags kyis bskyod pa'i rtog pas sa la 'gyel to zhes 'dzer ba dge slong dag gis thos te bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[137b.3\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang khyim bdag dag rigs par 'phya ste/_de lta bas na dge slong dag chos 'chad na 'phags ma 'dug ces smros shig_/de ste dge slong brel te ma dran na dge slong mas zhus la 'dug shig_/'phags pa mkhyen par mdzod cig 
[\[137b.4\]]bdag mchis so zhes brjod cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nyi ma ni shar/_bya rog ni skad 'byin/_zhing 
[\[137b.5\]]pa ni zhing rmed/_mi rgod ni ngu'o/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag don 'di ni dpe yin par shes par bya'o/_/de'i don yang 'di ltar blta'o/_/dge slong dag nyi ma shar ro zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[137b.6\]]so/_/bya rog sgra 'byin to zhes bya ba ni chos 'chad pa'i gang zag gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/zhing pa zhing rmed do zhes bya ba ni gtong ba sbyin pa dag gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/mi rgod ngu'o zhes bya ba ni bdud kyi 'khor gyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar 
[\[137b.7\]]ston pa rjes su brtse ba can thugs rje can don du bzhed pa/_phan par bzhed pa/_thugs rje ba ngas nyan thos khyed rnams la bya ba ni byas zin gyis da ni khyed cag gis dgon pa dang /_shing drung dang /_khyim stong pa dang /_lung ba dang /_brag phug dang /_sog ma spungs 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]pa bla gab med pa dang /_dur khrod dang /_nags dang /_ri dang /_bas mtha' 'di dag tu gnas shing sgoms shig_/dge slong rnams bag med par ma byed cig_/phyis 'gyod pa can du gyur ta re 'di ni nga'i bstan pa'o/_/dge slong dag mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_brag 
[\[138a.2\]]phug dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_chu mig dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bus brgyan pa'i shing de lta bu'i steng na khyad par can du dga' ba'i gnas su dong nas yid la byed pa sgrub pa la rtsom mo/_/dge slong ma yang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba dang nye ba'i tshal stug por gzhan yang bud med dang 
[\[138a.3\]]mthun pa'i gnas dag tu dong ste yid la byed pa sgrub pa la rtsom mo/_/de sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas bsgyur bas bud med ces bya ba'i rma'i sgor srog chags dag zhugs par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong ma yid la byed 
[\[138a.4\]]pa sgom pa na skyil mo krung bcas te ma 'dug par skyil mo krung phyed du chos la 'dug pas yid la byed pa sgoms shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas skyil mo krung phyed chos te 'dug pas yid la byed pa sgoms shig ces gsungs na/_dge slong ma dag gis skyil mo krung phyed du 
[\[138a.5\]]bcas te 'dug nas yid la byed pa bsgom pa la rtsom pa dang /_'on kyang de'i mo mtshan du srog chags phra mo dag zhugs pa gsan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas der 'dab ma'am lo ma srab mo lhung bas glon la skyil mo krung phyed du chos te 'dug shig_/
[\[138a.6\]]gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa nam dge slong mas khrims phul nas babs par gyur pas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la slar rab tu phyung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'tshal 
[\[138a.7\]]na rab tu 'byung ngam rab tu mi 'byung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li rab tu mi 'byung ngo /_u pA li lan gcig babs pa'i dge slong mas phyir legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por dbyung du med 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]do/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gang bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di na dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa'o 
[\[138b.2\]]zhes gleng bar mi bya/_dran par mi bya'o zhes gsungs na/_btsun pa ci dge slong mas dge slong pha la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa'o zhes gleng bar bgyi ba dang /_dran par bgyi ba'i rnam grangs 'ga' tsam mchis sam/_
[\[138b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li dge slong mas dge slong la tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_spyod pa nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa'o zhes gleng bar bya ba dang /_dran par bya ba'i rnam grangs gang yang med do//_//mdor na/_tshong dpon gyis kyang 
[\[138b.4\]]zas lhag ma/_/bzhag pa dag ni mi spang ste/_/bar chad chos ni mi dri ba/_/gzhan phyir dag dang khrag 'dzag pa'o/_/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na tshong dpon gzhan zhig gnas pa phyug la nor mang zhing longs spyod che ba des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig 
[\[138b.5\]]blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' spyod kyang bu pho yang ma byung /_bu mo yang ma byung ngo /_/de dus phyi zhig na nor zad par gyur/_longs spyod kyang zad par gyur nas des chung ma la bzang mo da ni bdag rgas pas nor btsal bar mi nus kyis dze 
[\[138b.6\]]ta'i tshal du song ste rab tu 'byung ngo zhes smas pa dang /_des jo bo de ste khyod rab tu 'byung na/_bdag su'i drung na 'dug gis bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des bzang mo legs kyis 'dong zhes smras nas/_de khrid de gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo'i drung du 'ongs nas 
[\[138b.7\]]rkang pa la phyag byas te/_'phags ma rang gi slas 'di legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal gyis rab tu phyung shig_/bdag dze ta'i tshal du mchis la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes smras nas des smras pa/_bu khyod chung ma dang bcas te sems bskyed pa ni legs te rab 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]tu byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yon tan lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la mos par bya ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba nas/_snga ma bzhin du sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_yang dag par song ba dang /_
[\[139a.2\]]skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rnam grangs du mas kyang rab tu 'byung ba ni bstod kyis legs te rab tu dbyung gis song shig ces smras nas de rab tu phyung ngo /_/de yang dze ta'i tshal du song nas dge slong dag las rab tu byung ste/_de mnyan du yod pa'i tshong dpon zhig rab tu byung ngo zhes 
[\[139a.3\]]ming du gyur te/_bsod nams chen pos thob pa ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad kyi rkyen sman dpyad dang /_yo byad rnams so/_/de dus phyi zhig na bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/de'i chung ma de yang bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_de'i dus 
[\[139a.4\]]na mu ge chen po byung ste de bsod snyoms kyis phongs so/_/des de mthong nas smras pa/_sring mo ji ltar 'tsho zhing 'dug_/des 'phags pa mu ge'i dus la bab pas bsod snyoms kyi zas su yang mi ster te sdug bsngal zhing 'tsho mod ces smras pa dang /_des sring mo nga la bsod snyoms 
[\[139a.5\]]'byor mod kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bsod snyoms kyi phyed sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar dbyar mo khang du song nas ji lta bur gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras pa/_de dag gis dge slong la smras pa/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[139a.6\]]ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong gis bsod snyoms zhig 'byor na dge slong des mu ge'i dus na de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed sbyin par bya ste/_de la the tshom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i dge slong ma la gang dge slong 
[\[139a.7\]]gis bsod snyoms zhig 'byor na dge slong des mu ge'i dus la bab pa dang /_de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed byin cig ces bka' stsal nas/_des de la bsod snyoms kyi phyed bzhag pa dang /_des de za shing song ngo /_/de la dus phyi zhig na 'phral byin pa'i bsod snyoms zhig rnyed de/_dge 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]slong de'i drung du ma song ba dang /_dge slong des bsams pa/_de ni gud nas zas rnyed du nges te/_de'i phyir 'dir ma 'ongs na 'di su'i phyir gzhag snyam du bsams nas/_des de ma bzhag pa dang /_ji tsam zhig na dge slong ma de yang 'ongs te des sring mo khyod mi 'ong snyam nas/_bdag gis 
[\[139b.2\]]bsod snyoms ma bzhag ste/_zas 'di ni bzhag pa zhig na/_de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na ni 'di bdag gis sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_des de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas dbyar mo khang du song ste/_des ji lta bur gyur pa dge slong ma dag la smras nas de dag gis dge slong 
[\[139b.3\]]dag la smras te/_dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag gis bzhag pa dge slong mas byin len byos la bza' bar gnang ngo /_/gang yang dge slong mas bzhag pa de ni dge slong 
[\[139b.4\]]gis byin len byos shig_/'di la the tshom ma byed par dge slong mas ni dge slong la byin len bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma las byin len bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su thun mong ma 
[\[139b.5\]]yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dris pa dang /_de ngo tsha nas gdong smad de 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis dge slong ma dang thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos dri 
[\[139b.6\]]ba mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma nyid kyis dris shig_/dge slong gis dge slong ma la dge slong ma de thun mong ma yin pa'i bar chad kyi chos 'dri na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong pha dag gis thun mong gi dri bar brtsams na 'on kyang ngo tsha nas ma smras pa dang /_bcom 
[\[139b.7\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma drung du zhog la dris shig_/des ni dge slong ma la smros shig_/dge slong ma des kyang dge slong la smros shig_/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la dge slong ma gzhan zhig bsnyen par rdzogs te/_'di 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]ltar khyod shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la bsnyen par rdzogs nas ji ltar khom pa phun sum tshogs pa rnyed par dka' ba 'di la skyo bar ma byed cig ces bsgo ba de'i bar du der khrag zags nas/_de la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sring mo longs te song shig ces 
[\[140a.2\]]smras pa dang /_de khrag zags te ngo tsha nas yid la gnod bsam langs pa dang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de shes nas song ngo /_/de la dge slong ma dag gis nu mo dkyil 'khor nyid du khyod kyis slob dpon la ma dad par bya'am longs zhes bsgo na khyod ci phyir mi ldang zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[140a.3\]]des phu nu mo dag 'di ni yon tan chen po dag 'di lta bu'i las med na khyod kyang 'di skad smra'am/_bdag tsog pur 'dug pas khrag zags na ji ltar ldang zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa de dag gis dge slong dag la byas nas dge slong dag 
[\[140a.4\]]gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa tsog pur ma 'dug par pha gu'am/_rtswa'am/_stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du bzhag par bya ste bud med lto snyi ba'i phyir ro/_/mdor na/_
[\[140a.5\]]dge slong lhag ma mi rung ste/_mi gtsang ba ni rked chings dang /_/nu rten dang yang nu mchings kyi/_/bar chad de dag bcang mi bya/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[140a.6\]]mo chen mo 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing dong ba las nyi ma nub kar dze ta'i tshal du phyin nas/_des mnyan du yod par 'dong du ni dus las yol na 'di nyid du 'di ji lta bu pa de lta bur nub mo gnas te nang par nam nangs nas 'dong ngo snyam bsams te/_de sa la nyal bas de'i chos gos 
[\[140a.7\]]rnams rdul gyis gos par gyur to/_/de nang par nam nangs nas phyir yang 'ong dgos kyis/_cig char ston pa la phyag byas te 'dong ngo snyam bsams nas/_de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te spyan sngar 'khod pa 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i chos gos la rdul gos pa gzigs nas gau ta mI khyod kyi chos gos la rdul sus bsgos zhes smras pa dang /_des ji lta bur gyur pa zhib tu gsol te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' 
[\[140b.2\]]bo dge slong dag gis dge slong ma la dge slong gis mal stan gyi lhag ma ma byin nam/_ma stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas na gnang ba ni dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma dge slong ma la byin cig_/de la the tshom ma byed cig_/bcom 
[\[140b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis dge slong gi mal stan gyi lhag ma dge slong ma la byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong gzhan gyis mal stan shin tu bzang po blangs te de'i lhag ma dge slong dag gis dge slong ma de dag la byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[140b.4\]]pa/_/bzang po las ma sbyin par gos rnying pa'am/_snam bu'am/_ras lta bu las byin cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir 
[\[140b.5\]]zhugs so/_/dge slong ma sbom dga' mo yang gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/_ston gyi dus su gyur pas chu bo rnams chus gang bas na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po zam pa la rgal ba dang /_sbom dga' mos mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_blun po 'di mi dga' bar 'gyur ba 
[\[140b.6\]]zhig bya'o snyam nas/_des 'gros mgyogs shing myur du song ste de zam pa rgal ba la des zam pa de bsgul ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lhung nas de'i sbyar ma dang sham thabs dag chus gsher lhung bzed shor bas chur nub po/_khar gsil ni khyer ro/_/des smras pa/_
[\[140b.7\]]sring mo 'di khyod kyis ni ma nyes kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nyes te/_'di ltar nyes pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por rjes su yi rang bas lan/_de ltar gyur pa dge 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]slong dag gis thos te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gang su zhig dge slong ma dang /_dge slong dang lhan cig tu zam pa gcig rgal na nyes pa'i dmigs yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong pha dang lhan cig tu 
[\[141a.2\]]zam pa gcig la ma rgal cig_/rgal na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dge slong dang lhan cig tu zam pa gcig la ma rgal cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_zam pa brtan pa [(]zhing [,]zheng [)]chen po gzhan la yang de dag ma rgal nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[141a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_zam pa gang brtan zhing zheng che ba la ni de dag rgal bar bya ste/_de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod 
[\[141a.4\]]snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/_rim bzhin du btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i drung du song ba dang /_des bde bar 'ongs pa'i tshig snyan par smras nas stan bting ngo /_/de gtam zer zhing skad cig 'dug nas phreng ldan ma khyod kyi rked pa phra zhing phra'o zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma 
[\[141a.5\]]khyod kyis 'di dris te cir dgos/_bdag ni ji nas kyang rnam pa gang gis lha'i sems mnyes par byed do zhes smras pa dang /_des phreng ldan ma de bzhin mod kyi 'on kyang the tshom dgrol ba tsam du dris smros shig ces byas pa dang /_des 'phags ma bdag ni rked chings bcangs 
[\[141a.6\]]so zhes smras pa dang /_des legs te de'i phyir khyod la skye bo mang po dag gi yid mgu ba dang dga' bar byed do zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/sbom dga' mo dbyar mo khang du song nas rked bcings bcangs so/_/dus phyi zhig na sbom dga' mo chu bo a 
[\[141a.7\]]dzir ba ti'i drung na dge slong ma dag dang lhan cig khrus byed pa na de dag gis mthong nas/_'phags ma bdag cag gi rked pa ni sbom zhing sbom la/_khyod kyi phra zhing phra ba 'di ci'i phyir zhes dris pa dang /_des nu mo dag bdag ni rked bcings bcangs so/_/de bas na bdag gi 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]rked pa 'di 'dra'o zhes smras so/_/de dag gis 'phags ma khyod rked chings bcang du rung ngam zhes dris pa dang /_des nu mo dag rung yang bla mi rung yang bla ste bdag gis ni bcangs so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong ma dag 'phya zhing smod do/_/ngan du 'dzer ba ni dge slong mas rked 
[\[141b.2\]]chings 'chang ba lta ga la srid/_de ltar gyur pa de dag gis dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong mas rked chings ma 'chang shig_/dge slong mas rked chings 
[\[141b.3\]]'chang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mos snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te snga ma bzhin du/_skad cig 'dug pa'i bar du gtam byas pa dang /_phreng ldan ma khyod kyi nu ma ci 
[\[141b.4\]]phyir mtho zhing 'greng zhes dris pa dang /_'phags ma 'di dris te khyod la ci dgos/_bdag ni rnam pa ci dang cis kyang lha'i sems mnyes par byed do zhes smras pa dang /_des phreng ldan ma de bzhin mod kyis the tshom dgrol ba'i phyir dris pa smros shig ces smras pa dang /_des 
[\[141b.5\]]'phags ma bdag ni nu rten 'chang ngo zhes smras so/_/des legs so de lta bas na lha mo khyod ni bud med rin po che'o zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/sbom dga' mo dbyar mo khang du song ngo /_/des dbyar mo khang du song nas nu rten bcangs pa nas/_snga ma dang 
[\[141b.6\]]'dra ba'i bar du ste/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas nu rten ma 'chang shig_/dge slong mas nu rten 'chang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed 
[\[141b.7\]]thogs te snga ma dang 'dra ba nas/_skad cig gtam zer zhing 'dug pa'i bar du phreng ldan ma ci phyir khyod kyi nu ma 'phyar ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma khyod kyis 'di dris te ci dgos bdag gi rnam pa ci dang cis lha'i sems mnyes par bgyid do zhes smras pa dang /_phreng ldan ma de 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]bzhin mod kyi the tshom dgrol ba'i phyir dris pa smros shig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma bdag ni nu ma'i bar chad 'chang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des legs so zhes byas na/_khyod la nang gi btsun mo dga' zhing yid mgu'o zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi zer 
[\[142a.2\]]bar 'dug go/_/sbom dga' mo yang dbyar mo khang du song ngo /_/des dbyar mo khang du song nas nu ma'i bar chad bcangs pa nas snga ma dang 'dra ba'i bar du ste/_de lta bas na dge slong mas nu ma'i bar chad ma 'chang shig_/dge slong ma nu ma'i bar chad 'chang na 'das pa dang bcas 
[\[142a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rked chings ma 'chang shig ces gsungs pa dang /_sbom dga' mos ras ci dang ci yang rung des rked pa bcings pa dang /_de nas dus phyi zhig na sbom dga' mo chu bo a dzir ba tir dge slong 
[\[142a.4\]]ma dang lhan cig tu khrus byed pa de dag gis de mthong nas/_'phags ma dge slong ma'i rked pa rked chings kyis bcing du bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang na/_khyod kyi rked pa phra ba phra ba zhes dris pa dang /_des nu mo bdag ni ras ci dang ci yang rung bas dkris so zhes smras pa dang /_
[\[142a.5\]]de dag gis khyod ras ci dang cis kyang dkris rung ngam zhes dris pa dang /_des nu mo dag rung yang bla mi rung yang bla ste/_bdag gis ni bcings so zhes zer ba dang /_dge slong ma dag 'phya smod ngan du 'dzer ba ni dge slong mas ras ci dang cis kyang rked pa dkri ba ga la rigs/_de ltar 
[\[142a.6\]]gyur pa de dag gis snga ma dang 'dra ba'i bar du ste/_dge slong mas ras ci dang cis kyang rung rked pa ma dkri shig_/dge slong mas ras ci dang cis kyang rung /_rked pa dkris na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_btsog pa'i gnas su mi dor te/_mngal dang 
[\[142a.7\]]mi gtsang mi btung ngo /_/bdag gi bu la reg par bya/_/gzhan gyi bu la reg mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]bgos lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/dge slong ma sbom dga' mo yang bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bshang sa'i chu khung dang nye ba zhig nas mar song ba dang /_sbom dga' mos mthong ste/_des 
[\[142b.2\]]bsams pa/_blun po 'di mi dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig bya'o snyam nas myur zhing rings par song ste/_bshang sa'i chu khung gi nang du pha gu 'phangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi snod rnams ma rung bar byas nas des smras pa/_sring mo khyod 
[\[142b.3\]]kyis ni ma nyes pa nas snga ma bzhin te de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba'i bar du ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas dge slong pha la mi gtsang bas ma rung bar ma byed cig_/dge slong pha 
[\[142b.4\]]la mi gtsang bas ma rung bar byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na khyim bdag gzhan zhig phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' 
[\[142b.5\]]yang yongs su spyod do/_/de dus phyi zhig na zong khyer nas yul gzhan du song ba dang /_des chung ma la smras pa/_bzang mo nga zong khyer te yul gzhan du 'gros khyod mi g.yeng zhing bag yod par khyim srungs shig_/des jo bo legs te de bzhin du bgyis/_dus dus su
