[\[142b.6\]]gtam springs shig ces smras so/_/de zong khyer te yul gzhan du song ba dang /_de'i chung ma de gos dang zas bzang ba'i phyir nyon mongs pas gzir bar gyur te/_des skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyad pas sems can dang ldan par gyur nas bsams pa/_mngal 
[\[142b.7\]]na gnas pa bsad do/_/bdag gi khyo 'ongs pa dang ma rung bar byed do snyam nas/_des mngal na gnas pa bsad nas ltung bar bya ste/_'di ji ltar dor/_gang du dor mi shes te rab tu sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa dang /_sbom dga' mo khyim der bsod snyoms la 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]zhugs te/_des mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bsod snyoms byin cig ces smras pa dang /_des bdag mi dga' bas gzir bas bsod snyoms sbyin du su yang med kyis bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma shi ba'am cig med dam/_des 
[\[143a.2\]]'phags ma su yang ma shi mod kyi bdag las bu zhig byung ste/_ji ltar dor/_gang du dor ba bdag gis mi shes so zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma de bdag gis dor na bdag la bsod snyoms sbyin nam/_'phags ma gsol lo/_/phyi bzhin 'brang 
[\[143a.3\]]ba'i dge slong ma la yang sbyin nam gsol lo/_/dge skos la yang sbyin nam/_gsol lo/_/legs kyis dor ro/_/des de lhung bzed chen por bcug ste/_khang pa stong par khyer nas der dor ba la zhugs pa dang /_khyim stong pa der sngon skyes pa zhig zhugs pa des 
[\[143a.4\]]mthong nas des mgo reg dge sbyong ma ci byed ces smras pa dang /_des khyed cag lta bu nal gyi bu dang su'i bu gtol med pas rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med 'di 'dra ba'i las byas pa de 'dor ro zhes smras pa dang /_des de la brgyad bkag ste song ngo /_/des dge slong ma zhig 
[\[143a.5\]]mthong nas dge slong ma mi srun pa khyod kyi sbom dga' mos 'di dang 'di lta bu byas so zhes smras pa dang /_de lan med nas cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong pha dag la smras te/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[143a.6\]]nas/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_'di ltar dge slong mas lhung bzed chen po 'chang na nyes pa'i dmigs yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed chen po mi bcang bar mkhyen nas dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge sbyong ma ma yin 
[\[143a.7\]]pa'i sbom dga' mos dge slong ma ma yin pa byas te/_de lta bas na dge slong mas 'di 'dra ba'i las mi bya ste/_lhung bzed chen po yang ma 'chang shig_/dge slong mas de 'dra ba'i las byed dam/_lhung bzed chen po 'chang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong mas lhung bzed chen po ma 'chang shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang dge slong gi lhung bzed chung ngu ni dge slong ma'i chen po'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_nam dge slong ma gub tas gcin 
[\[143b.2\]]gyi thigs pa cig ni khar blugs/_cig ni mngal gyi sgor bcug pa dang /_sems can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas gzhon nu 'od srung byung ste/_de la gub tas ma reg pa dang de ngu nas/_/de'i gnyen bshes dag gis gub ta khye'u ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris pa 
[\[143b.3\]]dang /_de cang mi zer nas dge slong ma dag gis tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bcas te/_dge slong mas skyes pa la ma reg shig_/'dis de la ma reg ste/_de bas na ngu'o zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje can na ci'i 
[\[143b.4\]]phyir na rang gi bu reg pa la 'gog par 'gyur/_byis pa khye'u 'di la de ste mas ma reg na 'di dus byed par nges so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis legs kyis de bas na bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par bya'o zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong 
[\[143b.5\]]dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis reg par bya'o/_/bsnyod par bya'o/_/gso bar bya'o/_/bskyed par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom 
[\[143b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bsnyod par bya'o/_/gso bar bya'o/_/bskyed par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_bud med ni sred pa can te dge slong ma dag gis pang par khyer te/_pang pa nas pang par spos pas rid cing nyam chung ste rke nas lus rmya zhing ma rtas par gyur pa dang /_de'i gnyen 
[\[143b.7\]]bshes dag gis mthong nas/_de dag gis ci'i phyir khye'u 'di rid cing nyam chung la rmya ste lus ma rtas par gyur ces dris pa dang /_des de dag la zhib tu smras na gnyen de dag byams pas 'phya ba la zhugs pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag dge slong mas gzhan gyi bu la ma reg shig gzhan gyi bu la reg na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/phra mo'i sgo drug rdzogs so//_//'dul ba phren tshegs 
[\[144a.2\]]kyi gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu pa/_bsdus pa'i mdo sde/_the tshom dang yang dgon pa la/_/sang kAg k+Shi dang gnyis kyi phyir/_/dge slong chang tshong ba dag gam/_/dge slong ma dang phyi rol gyi/_/mdor na/_the tshom lhan cig nyal ba yang /_/gzhan du gcig pu ma gnas shig_/
[\[144a.3\]]khye'u dang bu mo de bzhin te/_/nye gnas dang yang ra da'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma skyes pa dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu ma nyal cig ces bka' 
[\[144a.4\]]stsal pa dang /_dge slong ma gub ta'i bu 'od srung gzhon nu phyi rol du bsnyal ba dang de gcig pu ngu nas/_de'i gnyen bshes dag gis thos te/_de dag gis gub ta la khye'u 'od srung gzhon nu ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris pa dang /_de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas dge slong ma dag gis tshe dang 
[\[144a.5\]]ldan pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dge slong ma skyes pa dang /_lhan cig khyim gcig gi nang du nyal du mi rung bar bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pas na/_gub ta 'di dang lhan cig khyim gcig gi nang du nyal du mi rung ngo /_/de dag gis 'phags ma bcom ldan 'das ni thugs rje 
[\[144a.6\]]can te de ste gzhon nu 'od srung gub ta dang lhan cig tu nyal du ma gnang na ni gcig pu gdon mi za bar don med par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis kyang de ltar na bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gsol lo zhes smras nas/_de ltar gyur pa de dag gis dge slong 
[\[144a.7\]]la smras pa/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong ma gub ta bu dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal bar dge slong ma'i dge 'dun las sdom pa gsol cig_/gsol pa yang 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]'di ltar bya'o/_/stan bting la gaN+DI brdungs te dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma thams cad 'dus shing 'khod pa dang /_dge slong ma gub ta ji ltar rgan rims nas phyag byas te/_rgan mo'i drung du pha gu'am rtswa'am stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du 'dug ste thal mo sbyor la 'di skad rjod 
[\[144b.2\]]cig_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_bdag gub ta las bu khye'u zhig btsas te/_bdag bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams la gsol na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun gyis gub ta bu dang lhan cig khang pa 
[\[144b.3\]]gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa brtse ba can brtse ba'i phyir stsol cig_/'di bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge slong ma cig gis gub ta thos pa'i gnas spangs te mthong ba'i gnas su zhog la 'di skad smros shig_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun 
[\[144b.4\]]ma rnams/_gub ta 'di las khye'u zhig btsas te/_/de yang bu dang lhan cig khyim gcig na nyal ba'i sdom pa 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams las gsol na/_de ste 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_gnong shig_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun 
[\[144b.5\]]ma rnams kyis gub ta bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa stsal to/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di bzhin bya'o/_/gson cig 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams/_gub ta 'di las khye'u zhig btsas te/_'di bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal 
[\[144b.6\]]ba'i sdom pa 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams la gsol te/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gub ta 'di bu dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa gsol na/_'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams las gub ta bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig na nyal 
[\[144b.7\]]ba'i sdom pa stsal bar bzod pa rnams ni ma gsung shig_/mi bzod pa rnams ni gsung shig_/'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyis gub ta bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa stsal te/_dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang bas na cang mi gsung ste/_de 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/dge slong ma gang la 'phags ma'i dge 'dun ma rnams kyi bu dang lhan cig khang pa gcig tu nyal ba'i sdom pa byin par gyur pa de ni bu dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal bar rung ste/_'di la the tshom ma byed cig_/gub tas 
[\[145a.2\]]dge slong ma gzhan zhig kyang de nyid du bsnyal ba dang de lta bur gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma gang gi bu de nyid du lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal bar 
[\[145a.3\]]rung ste/_gcig pu'o/_/der dge slong ma gzhan ni ma gnas shig_/gnas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gub ta nam gzhon nu 'od srung chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yang de dang lhan cig tu khang pa gcig tu nyal bar byed do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge 
[\[145a.4\]]slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas nam bu cher gyur pa de'i tshe de dang lhan cig tu nyal bar mi rung ste/_ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa bzhin slobs shig ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[145a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na sa ta zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin zhig gnas te/_des yul mnyam dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu 
[\[145a.6\]]dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul gyi mi rnams la srung ba dang /_skyong ba dang /_skyob par byed do/_/de'i mthus yul mnyam dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul gyi mi rnams la longs 
[\[145a.7\]]spyod 'phel bar gyur cing /_de dag la rtag tu shing gi me tog dang 'bras bur ldan/_char pa ni dus dus su 'bab/_sa ni 'bru dang ldan par gyur te/_zas bslang ba rnams ni mod pas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul dang /_pho brang 'khor de dang de dag gi dang /_yul so so 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa thams cad yul mnyam dgar lhags te de dag la yang gnod sbyin sa tas srung ba dang /_skyong ba dang /_skyob par byed do/_/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod 
[\[145b.2\]]do/_/yul gan d+ha ra na yang pany+tsa la zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin zhig gnas te/_des kyang yul gan d+ha ra'i rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul gyi mi rnams la srung ba dang /_skyong ba dang /_skyob par byed do/_/de'i mthus yul 
[\[145b.3\]]gan d+ha ra'i rgyal po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul gyi mi rnams la longs spyod 'phel bar gyur cing /_de dag la rtag tu shing gi me tog dang 'bras bur ldan/_char pa ni dus dus su 'bab/_sa ni 'bru dang ldan par gyur te/_zas 
[\[145b.4\]]bslang ba rnams ni mod pas na der yang grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul dang /_pho brang 'khor de dang de dag gi dang /_yul so so na gnas pa'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_bkren pa dang /_phongs pa thams cad yul gan d+ha rar lhags te/_de dag la yang gnod 
[\[145b.5\]]sbyin pany+tsa las srung ba dang /_skyong ba dang /_skyob par byed do/_/des kyang rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/_de yang de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta dang /_gnod sbyin pany+tsa la gnyis gnod sbyin 
[\[145b.6\]]rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'dus par dong nas/_der de gnyis phan tshun mdza' bor gyur te/_gnod sbyin sa tas de la dus dus su yul mnyam dga'i me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa skyes su bskur ro/_/gnod sbyin pany+tsa las kyang gnod sbyin sa ta la yul gan d+ha ra'i me 
[\[145b.7\]]tog dang 'bras bu skyes su bskur ro/_/de gnyis 'di bzhin phan tshun du rab tu mdza' bar gyur nas/_de gnyis phyir gnod sbyin 'dus par dong ste/_gnod sbyin sa tas grogs po yu bu gnyis dus las 'das kyang bu dang /_tsha bo dang /_yang tsha dang /_sum tsha rnams 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]mdza' ba rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i thabs ci yod ces smras pa dang /_gnod sbyin pany+tsa las smras pa/_grogs po legs so/_/bdag kyang 'di snyam sems te/_de lta bas na ma skyes pa las gnyen du byas te/_de ste bdag la bu pho zhig btsas la khyod la bu 
[\[146a.2\]]mo zhig yod pa dang /_khyod kyis bdag gi bu la byin cig_/'on te khyod la bu pho zhig ste bdag la bu mo zhig na bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no/_/des smras pa/_grogs po legs kyis de bzhin bya'o/_/de gnyis phan tshun du ma btsas par gnyen byas te dong ngo /_/de nas dus 
[\[146a.3\]]phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang bu mo zhig btsas te/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang mo zhig ste/_de btsas pa dang gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad dga' bar gyur to/_/de bdag gi rigs 
[\[146a.4\]]dang 'dra ba dang rgyud gcig pa rnams kyis btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas te ming 'dogs pa la zhugs so/_/bu mo 'di ming cir gdags zhes gros byas na gnyen bshes dag gis 'di btsas pa'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi rigs thams cad dga' bar gyur gyis de bas na bu mo 'di ming 
[\[146a.5\]]dga' byed mar gdags so zhes smras te/_de'i ming dga' byed mar btags so/_/yul gan d+ha ra'i gnod sbyin pany+tsa las 'di ltar rgyal po'i khab tu gnod sbyin sa ta las bu mo zhig btsas so zhes thos nas des bsams pa/_bdag gi grogs po la bu mo zhig btsas te bu mo 
[\[146a.6\]]de bdag gi mna' mar 'gyur yang dag gis rgyan rnams bskur ba'i rigs so snyam nas/_des gnod sbyin sa ta la grogs po mdza' bo bdag gis khyod kyi bu mo btsas par thos nas shin tu dga' ste/_bdag gis grogs po'i bu mo la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur ba 'di blang ba'i 
[\[146a.7\]]rigs so zhes yi ge spring ngo /_/des yi ge bklags te slar yang grogs po bdag cag ni gnyen yin gyis de ste khyod la bu pho zhig btsas na 'di ni de nyid kyi yin no zhes spring ngo /_/gnod sbyin pany+tsa las de bklags nas bu nam rnyed ces rtag tu sems shing chung ma dang lhan cig 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]tu rtse dga' ste yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas bu pho zhig btsas te/_de yang bdag gi rigs dang mthun pa rgyud gcig pa dag gis btsas pa'i btsas ston cher byas te/_ming 'dogs pa la zhugs so/_/khye'u 'di ming cir gdags zhes 
[\[146b.2\]]bgros pa las gnyen bshes dag gis khye'u 'di gnod sbyin pany+tsa la'i bu ste/_de bas na khye'u 'di'i ming pAny+tsi kar gdags so zhes smras nas de'i ming pAny+tsi kar btags so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi gnod sbyin sa tas 'di ltar yul gan d+ha ra'i gnod sbyin pany+tsa la'i bu pho zhig btsas 
[\[146b.3\]]par thos te/_des bdag gi grogs po las bu pho gcig btsas te gdon mi za bar bdag gi mag par 'gyur ro snyam bsams nas/_des de la gos dang rgyan rnams bskur te/_grogs po bdag gis khyod kyi bu zhig btsas so zhes thos nas shin tu dga' ste/_bdag gi 
[\[146b.4\]]grogs po'i bu la gos dang rgyan zhig bskur gyis de blang ba'i rigs so zhes yi ge spring ngo /_/des yi ge bklags te slar gyi lan bag ma blang ba'i ston mo'i sta gon gyis shig ces spring ba dang /_gnod sbyin sa tas yi ge bklags te legs kyis bu mo dga' byed ma ni bdag 
[\[146b.5\]]gis sngar byin no snyam bsams nas/_des de skyed cing chung ma dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_gang gi tshe sems can dang ldan par gyur pa de'i nyin mo nyid du ri la khrung khrung gis skad 
[\[146b.6\]]phyung ngo /_/de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang bu khye'u zhig btsas te gzugs legs shing blta na sdug pa bzang ba zhig ste btsas ma thag tu yang ri las khrung khrung gis skad phyung ngo /_/de bdag gi rigs dang mthun pa rgyud gcig pa btsas pa'i btsas ston cher byas te ming 'dogs pa la zhugs 
[\[146b.7\]]so/_/khye'u 'di ming cir gdags zhes bgros na gnyen bshes dag gis 'di mngal du zhugs pa na yang ri las khrung khrung gi skad phyung /_btsas pa na yang khrung khrung gi skad phyung la pha yang sa ta zhes bya ste/_de bas na khye'u 'di ming yang sa ta gi rir gdags so zhes smras nas/_de'i ming 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]sa ta gi rir btags so/_/khye'u sa ta gi ri de gsos skyed de cher gyur pa dang ji tsam dus phyi zhig na gnod sbyin sa ta chung ma dang bcas par dus las 'das nas sa ta gi ri khyim gyi bdag por gyur pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dga' byed mas sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i 
[\[147a.2\]]khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar 'dod do zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_sring mo yu bu cag gi phas yul mnyam dga'i rgyal po mkhas pa can gzugs can snying po dang /_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_
[\[147a.3\]]blon po dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul gyi mi rnams la rtag tu srung ba dang /_skyong ba dang /_skyob par byed do zhes thos nas yu bu cag gis rab tu bsrung bar bya ba'i rigs te/_'di ni yu bu cag gi spyod yul yin gyis 'di la gzhan dag cig kyal ka byed na yang de la yu bu 
[\[147a.4\]]cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na ci'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin bya mi rigs par khyod kyis sems bskyed pa de slar zlog ces bsgo'o/_/de log pa'i smon lam gyi bag chags kyis bgos pas gcugs su ma btub ste/_yang sa ta gi ri la ming po rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po 
[\[147a.5\]]dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_sa ta gi ris de'i dus kyis rten pa las na gcugs su mi btub par shes te/_'di phyi phyir rtag tu dgag mi nus kyi 'di phas kyang sngar byin te bag mar gtang ngo snyam bsams nas des 
[\[147a.6\]]gnod sbyin pany+tsa la la bu mo dga' byed ma ni na chung du gyur gyis tshur sheg la bag ma long shig ces yi ge spring ba dang /_gnod sbyin pany+tsa la des gnod sbyin gzhon nu pAny+tsi ka la dpal chen po dang sbyar te bag ma blangs nas yul gan d+ha rar khrid do/_/gnod sbyin gzhon nu pAny+tsi ka 
[\[147a.7\]]de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/mo nam mdza' zhing spobs pa dang dga' zhing yid bde ba mang por gyur pa de'i tshe mos jo bo rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag 'phrog cing phrogs te bza' bar 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang /_des 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]smras pa/_bzang mo de ni khyod kyi gnyen gyi gnas yin te/_der gzhan dag cig kyal ka byed na yang de bdag cag gis dgag pa'i rigs na khyod kyis ci'i phyir de ltar bya/_khyod kyis mi rigs pa sems bskyed pa de slar zlog shig ces bsgo na de sngon gyi log pa'i smon lam gyis bag 
[\[147b.2\]]chags bsgos pas sdod cig ces smras te cang mi zer bar 'dug go/_/de gnod sbyin gzhon nu pAny+tsi ka dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyad pas bu pho zhig btsas te de'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so/_/de bzhin lan gnyis lan gsum 
[\[147b.3\]]nas bu lnga brgya'i bar du btsas te de dag thams cad kyi tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]ni ming dga' byed du btags so/_/de nas bu las mthu rnyed par gyur pa de na pAny+tsi kas bzlog kyang ma zlogs nas de mi dga' bar gyur te mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas gnod sbyin mo dga' byed ma gar dga' bar rang nyam 
[\[147b.4\]]du 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang gnas par gyur to/_/des rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag phrogs shing phrogs nas bza' bar brtsams pa dang /_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la lha bdag cag gi bu btsas 
[\[147b.5\]]shing btsas pa dag cig gis phrogs na su zhig bdag cag la gnod par bgyid pa rma ba'i rigs so zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos gnas thams cad dbang ba rnams la kye rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag gi bu btsas shing btsas pa dag sus phrogs pa rmos 
[\[147b.6\]]shig ces bsgo nas/_de dag gis nan tan du bag yod par rmed pa la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam na de dag gis yang phrogs par gyur nas gnod pa cher gyur nas gnod pa cher gyur te su gang gi bud med sems can dang ldan par gyur pa des yul gzhan du phyung ste bzhag pa 
[\[147b.7\]]dang /_blon po dag gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la lha gnod pa cher gyur te su gang gi bud med dag sems can dang ldan par gyur na des yul gzhan du phyung ste bzhag go zhes gsol pa dang /_rgyal pos ltas pa bkug ste smras na/_de dag gis lha gnod sbyin khros kyis 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma stsal la mchod pa dang bkur sti mdzod cig ces gsol to/_/rgyal pos blon po rnams la kye song la rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du dril bsgrags pa byos shig_/rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po thams cad dang /_yul so so 
[\[148a.2\]]nas lhags pa thams cad kyis gnod sbyin gyi gnas su gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang bkur sti byos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de dag gis kyang de bzhin dril bsgrags te/_kye rgyal po'i khab dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo dag nyon cig_/lhas 
[\[148a.3\]]'di skad bka' stsal to/_/bdag gi yul na grong khyer dang /_yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po gnas pa thams cad kyis gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du gtor ma byin la mchod pa dang bkur sti byos shig ces bsgo ba dang /_rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang 
[\[148a.4\]]po dag gis grong khyer de dag rdo ba dang /_gyo mo dang /_sa rdo dag phyags te tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab nas dri zhim po'i pog phor dag so sor dpyangs/_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i 'phan sgreng /_dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni dpyangs te me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor nas lha rnams kyi skyed mos 
[\[148a.5\]]tshal dga' ldan bzhin du mdzes par byas so/_/de nas gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad gtor ma byin zhing mchod pa dang bkur sti byas te 'on kyang dga' byed ma zhi bar ma gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i lha dag gis rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag kye khyed 
[\[148a.6\]]la gnod sbyin mo dga' byed mas khyod kyi bu rnams phrogs kyis khyed thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul bar mdzad do zhes bstan to/_/de dag gis kye de ni dga' byed ma ma yin gyi de ni 'phrog ma ste/_des bdag cag gi bu btsas 
[\[148a.7\]]shing btsas pa rnams phrogs zhes smras pa dang /_de'i ming dga' byed ma zhes bya ba ldog ste gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mar ming du gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma 'di rgyal po'i khab na skye bo mang po la yun ring po nas ma 'khon pa dang ni 'khon/_dgrar ma gyur pa dang ni dgrar gyur/_snying ma rings pa la ni snying ring bar gyur/_des bu btsas shing btsas pa'i rnams 
[\[148b.2\]]phrogs na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje can thugs brtse ba'i phyir gnod sbyin ma 'phrog ma gdul bar ci gnang zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba bzhin rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag la gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas 
[\[148b.3\]]pa'i skye bo mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung ba bzhin gnang bar shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas snga dro bcom ldan 'das kyis sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs/_lhung bzed 
[\[148b.4\]]bsnams nas rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs te rgyal po'i khab nas bsod snyoms las slar bskor nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/_bsod snyoms phyis len pa spangs te gshegs nas gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma'i gnas gang na ba der gshegs te/_de'i tshe na gnod 
[\[148b.5\]]sbyin mo 'phrog mas bu dga' byed khyim du bzhag ste spyod yul du song ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de lhung bzed kyis bkab ste bzhag nas/_ji ltar bu pho dag gis ni de mi mthong gis/_des de dag thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/_/
[\[148b.6\]]de ma thag tu gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma spyod yul nas 'ongs pa dang bu dga' byed mi snang nas de spangs te de phan tshun khyim kho ra khor yug tu bltas na 'on kyang mi snang nas bu dag dga' byed mi snang na ga re/_de dag gis kyang ma mthong /_bdag cag gis kyang ma mthong ngo zhes smras 
[\[148b.7\]]pa dang /_des brang brdungs nas mdog nyams shing mi dga' ste mig mchi mas gang nas 'gros myur bar brgyugs te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong dang /_tshong dus dang /_srang dang /_lam gyi bzhi mdo dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]dang /_mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_rdzing dang /_lha khang dang /_'dun khang dang /_gzhan yang khyim dog pa'i gnas dag tu btsal na 'on kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas bla gos med par smyos nas ngu zhing smre ba kyi hud bu/_kyi hud pha/_kyi hud dga' byed ces yang 
[\[149a.2\]]dang yang sgra 'byin cing grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 'dab dang /_pho brang dang /_pho brang 'khor rnams su bltas te 'on kyang ma rnyed do/_/de nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por song ngo /_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi rgya mtshor song ngo /_/shar 
[\[149a.3\]]phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs de dag na yang mi snang ngo /_/de nas skra zhig cing sgren mor gyur/_'gros kyang 'khyam/_yar mchong mar lhung sa la 'gre'o/_/pus mos 'gro tsog pur 'dug pa de lta bu'i thabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi ri nag po 
[\[149a.4\]]bdun rgal nas gser lta bu'i ri bdun dang /_gangs kyi ri dang /_ma dros pa'i mtsho chen dang /_ri dri rgyas dag tu yang btsal te de nas skad cher ngu zhing shar gyi lus 'phags gling dang /_nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams kun tu btsal na yang ma rnyed de/_de 
[\[149a.5\]]nas yang sos dang /_thig nag po dang /_'dus gtub dang /_'o dod 'bod pa dang /_'o dod cher 'bod pa dang /_sreg pa dang /_rab tu sreg pa dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur dang /_shin tu chu bur dang /_a ha ha zhes zer ba dang /_ha ha pa dang /_hu hu pa dang /_ut+pal lta bu 
[\[149a.6\]]dang /_pad ma chen po lta bu la sogs pa dang sems can dmyal ba dag tu yang btsal na ma rnyed do/_/de nas ri rab kyi bang rim dang por 'dzegs/_des gnyis pa dang /_gsum par 'dzegs/_de nas gnod sbyin gyi bdag po ngal bso po la ma dris par sum bcu rtsa gsum 
[\[149a.7\]]lha'i gnas su btsal te skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs zhes bya ba dang /_rtsub por 'gyur ba dang /_'dres pa dang /_dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal du yang btsal/_pa ri ya tra ko bi dA ra'i drung du yang song ngo /_/de nas lha'i 'du ba chos [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba grong khyer 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bzang por snang du zhugs te/_de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i khang pa rnam par rgyal du 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /_der gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gnod sbyin du ma dang /_lha stong gis bzung ba dang /_de myur du mgyogs par grong khyer bzang por snang nas byung ste/_
[\[149b.2\]]phyogs gzhan zhig tu ring zhig ngus nas mdor na yi chad par gyur te gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ngal bso po'i drung du song nas rdo leb la bdag gi lus brdabs nas kyi hud bu/_kyi hud pha/_kyi hud dga' byed ces smre zhing smra ba ste/_sde dpon chen po sus phrogs mi dga' na bu 
[\[149b.3\]]slong na stsal du gsol zhes smras pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso pos smras pa/_che zhe mya ngan thong la mchi ma phyis shig_/khyod kyi gnas su nyin par gnas shing su 'ongs pa soms shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_sde dpon dge sbyong gau ta ma lags so/_/
[\[149b.4\]]des de song la bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song shig dang khyod la bu dga' byed de bcom ldan 'das kyis ston to zhes smras pa dang /_de srog stor ba las slar rnyed pa bzhin du rings shing myur du rang gi gnas su song ba dang /_gnod sbyin ma 'phrog mas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu 
[\[149b.5\]]chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan/_dpe byad bzang pos sku spras/_nyi zer stong las 'das pa'i 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i ri 'gro ba bzhin kho ra khor yug nas bzang ba mthong ma thag tu dga' ba skyes te bu dga' byed rnyed do snyam nas bcom ldan 
[\[149b.6\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma khyod kyis bdag gi bu dga' byed 
[\[149b.7\]]bstan du gsol/_bdag gi bu dga' byed ma mthong nas ring zhig lon no zhes smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo 'phrog ma la 'phrog ma khyod la bu mang zhe na ji snyed yod ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das bu lnga brgya mchis so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]'das kyis 'phrog ma de ste khyod kyi bu lnga brgya las gcig cig med pa lta ci nyes/_zhes gsungs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dga' byed ma mthong na khrag dron por skyugs te gdon mi za bar dus bgyid do zhes gsol pa dang /_'phrog ma khyod kyi bu lnga 
[\[150a.2\]]brgya las gcig ma mthong na yang 'di 'dra bar sdug bsngal na gang la bu gcig pu yod pa yang khyod kyis bsad de zos na de'i sdug bsngal ji 'dra bar 'gyur/_des bcom ldan 'das de bas sdug bsngal ba rab tu che'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[150a.3\]]'phrog ma khyod bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'di 'dra ba shes bzhin du gzhan gyi bu ci phyir bza'/_des bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshur shog nga la skyabs su song ste bslab pa'i gzhi zung la rgyal po'i khab na 
[\[150a.4\]]gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la mi 'jigs pa byin cig dang /_gal te 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du bu dga' byed mthong bar gdon mi za'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_des btsun pa 'di ltar deng phan chad bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ste rgyal po'i khab na gnas 
[\[150a.5\]]pa'i skye bo mang po la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bu dga' byed bstan nas des kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gzhi bzung ste rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la mi 'jigs pa byin no/_/nam gyi tshe 'phrog ma bcom 
[\[150a.6\]]ldan 'das la skyabs su song ste bslab pa'i gzhi bzung nas rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag la mi 'jigs pa byin pa de'i tshe dge slong dag the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas 
[\[150a.7\]]las ci bgyis/_las gang gi rnam par smin pas na mdangs 'phrog ma'i gnod sbyin mor skyes la 'di las bu lnga brgya btsas zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gnod sbyin mo 'phrog mas las byas shing bsags pas tshogs rnyed pa 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]dang /_rkyen smin pa ni chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas te gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/'phrog mas las byas shing bsags pa ni gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong rnams las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i 
[\[150b.2\]]khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/_zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las byas pa ni rnam par smin to/_/las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur ba/_/bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang /_/dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa ni/_/
[\[150b.3\]]lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na byung ba ni rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid na grong khyer gzhan zhig tu ba lang rdzi zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma zhig blangs te/_de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' 
[\[150b.4\]]yongs su spyad pas dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba na rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_nyams shing dman pa la thugs brtse ba gnas pas mthar tsha ba 'jig rten pa'i yon gnas gcig pa'o/_/ji tsam na rang sangs 
[\[150b.5\]]rgyas gzhan zhig yul rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs te de'i tshe na rgyal po'i khab kyi grong du dus ston nye bar gyur to/_/der sngon zan pa lnga brgya tsam zhig gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba khyer te gos sna tshogs kyis ni bklubs/_me tog ku su ma dri zhim pos brgyan te gar 
[\[150b.6\]]byed glu len rnga rdung zhing skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ba'i bar du ba lang rdzi mo zhig dar ba bum pa gang thogs te lam de nas mar song ba dang /_sngon zan pa de dag gis de mthong nas grogs mo tshur shog_/glu blang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des kyang de dag gar ji lta ji ltar byed pa de lta de ltar 
[\[150b.7\]]byas pas de'i mngal zhig par gyur to/_/de khros nas rang sangs rgyas la a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa lnga brgya phul nas smon lam btab pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der mdangs 'phrog ma'i gnod sbyin mo zhig tu skyes la rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyi bu dang bu 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]mo bdag gis phrogs te za bar gyur cig_/bdag la bu yang lnga brgya btsa' bar gyur cig ces smras so/_/dge slong dag de'i tshe ba lang rdzi'i chung mar gyur pa ni da ltar gyi 'phrog ma yin te smon lam btab pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bur skyes pa yin no//_//
[\[151a.2\]]'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dgon pa la gnas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_de dag tshong dus dang /_srang dang /_lam gyi sum mdo dag tu bsam gtan 
[\[151a.3\]]la zhugs pa na de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma dag dbyar mo khang na gnas par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dad pa'i bram ze dang /_khyim 
[\[151a.4\]]bdag dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams la dbyar mo khang gnang ngo zhes thos nas/_de dag gis grong khyer gyi phyi rol du dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang brtsigs pa dang /_dge slong ma dag la de bzhin du mi rgod dang /_nal gyi bu dang /_su'i bu gtol med pa 
[\[151a.5\]]dag glags lta bar gyur nas de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang grong khyer gyi phyi rol du ma brtsig par grong khyer gyi nang du brtsig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni 
[\[151a.6\]]mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mos dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug ste bram ze dang khyim bdag dag la 'phyas pa dang /_de dag 'phya zhing smod ngan du 'dzer to/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[151a.7\]]dgongs pa/_gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug pa'i phyir te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug par mi bya bar dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong rnams bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]'phya ba ni gnas yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug par mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo na 'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dbyar mo khang gi sgo

[\[151b.3\]]'dug na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_sang kAg k+Shi ni gnang ba'o/_/skyes pa 'khru bar khrus mi bya/_/srang dag tu ni mi 'gro ste/_/de dag bsnyen par des rdzogs so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'

[\[151b.5\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong ma sang kAg k+Shi gnang gis gyon te dbyar mo khang gi las kun byos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dbyar mo khang du 'ongs nas yang de dag de bzhin du sang kAg k+Shi gyon pa la las byed de dag chags 
[\[151b.6\]]par gyur to/_/gzhan dad pa dag ni 'phya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 'phya ba dag ni gnas yin te/_de lta bas na 
[\[151b.7\]]dge slong ma bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi mdun na sang kAg k+Shi gyon te las ma byed cig_/dge slong mas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi mdun du sang kAg k+Shi gyon la las byed na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar nam bram ze dang /_khyim bdag gi mdun du 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]las byed pa de'i tshe sang kAg k+Shis dpung pa g.yogs la sang kAg k+Shi gyon te las kun byos shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_sbom dga' mo skyes pa 'khru ba'i sar des khrus byas pa dang /_khye'u gzhon nu dag gis de mthong nas gcig la gcig

[\[152a.7\]]pA lis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni gau ta mI skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/_ci btsun pa dge slong ma lnga 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]brgya de dag gis kyang bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por gyur lags sam/_u pA li dge slong ma lnga brgya de dag kyang bla ma'i chos khas blangs pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por gyur to//_//
[\[152b.2\]]mdor na/_ji ltar mtshan gnyis pa dang yang /_/de bzhin gle yang 'dams gyur pa/_/rtag tu khrag rab zag pa dang /_/tha ma yi ni khrag med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_mnyan du

[\[152b.5\]]skye ba'i chos can du mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na gang su zhig rab tu byung bar 'dod de de 'ongs na de la de dag gis khyod mtshan gnyis pa ma yin nam zhes dris shig_/ma dris par rab tu phyung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan 
[\[152b.6\]]du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis gle 'dams ma zhig rab tu byung nas/_de chab khung sar song ste gcis pa dang /_de yang bshang gci gnyis ka phyung ste de slar phyung ba dang /_dge slong ma gzhan zhig der zhugs pa dang /_chab khung sa bshang bas ma rung bar gyur pa des 
[\[152b.7\]]mthong nas des nu mo chab khung sa 'di bshang bas ma rung bar sus byas zhes dris pa dang /_des che zhe bdag gis bag ma mchis pas ma rung bar bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_des nu mo khyod kyis bag med ci zhig byas zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_che zhe bdag ni 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]gle 'dams ma ste/_gci bar bsams pa dang de na bshang ba yang byung na bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge

[\[153a.3\]]pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig gis rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa zhig rab tu phyung ste/_de'i smad g.yogs kyi gnas su khrag gis ma rung bar gyur te sbrang bu dag gis gang ba dang /_de la dge slong ma zhig 
[\[153a.4\]]gis nu mo khyod ci khrag rtag tu 'dzag gam zhes dris pa dang /_phu mo ji ltar bya/_bdag ni rtag tu khrag 'dzag pa'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

[\[153a.6\]]ma ma yin nam zhes dris shig_/ma dris par rab tu phyung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_mnyan du yod pa na dge slong ma gzhan zhig khrag med ma zhig rab tu phyung nas 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas na dge slong ma dag ni dus su 
[\[153a.7\]]khrag 'dzag pa dang des de mthong nas dpyas pa phu mo dag ci khyed cag log par rtog pa la rtog gam/_ci'i phyir khyed cag khrag 'dzag_/nu mo ci zhig 'phyar yod/_bud med ni chos nyid kyis 'di bzhin na khyod ci mi 'dzag gam/_des bdag ni khrag med na bdag la khrag 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]'dzag tu ci yod ces smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khrag med pa ni ma ning mo yin te khyed kyis skrod cig_/dge slong dag khrag

[\[153b.5\]]ba ma lags te/_ji ltar bgyi zhes smras so/_/des nu mo khyod mtshan ma tsam pa ma yin nam zhes dris pa dang /_des phu mo bdag ni mtshan ma tsam mo de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras te/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom 
[\[153b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mtshan ma tsam pa ma ning yin te/_khyed kyis skrod cig dge slong dag chos 'dul ba 'di mtshan ma tsam pa la rab tu skye ba'i chos can du mi 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na gang su zhig rab tu 'byung bar 'dod de drung du 'ongs na de dag la mtshan 
[\[153b.7\]]ma tsam pa ma yin nam zhes dris shig_/ma dris par rab tu phyung na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas na dge slong ma sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas skabs skabs su mo mtshan nas khrag zags pas de'i 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]smad g.yogs kyi gnas gnas su ma rung bar gyur te/_sbrang bu dag gis gang ba dang mi mdzes te dge slong mas bkrus nas bcos kyang slar de 'dra bar gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong dag la smras nas/_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[154a.2\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas sme gab chongs shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas sme gab chongs shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong ma dag sme gab 'chang bar gyur nas/_de nas 
[\[154a.3\]]dus phyi zhig na sbom dga' mo bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /_srang du sme gab lhung nas/_srang na khye'u dang bu mo dag cig rtse ba dag gis mthong ste/_de dag gis 'phags ma 'di ci zhig lhung zhes dris pa dang /_de skad smras pas khros te bu zan mo'i bu mo dang /_sring mo'i drung 
[\[154a.4\]]du deng la dris shig dang /_de dag gis ston to zhes smras so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis thos te/_dge slong dag la smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag 
[\[154a.5\]]de lta bu kho nar mo mtshan gyi sme gab bcang bar mi bya'o/_/srad bus thogs la rked par chongs shig_/de ltar na nyes pa'i dmigs su mi 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung 
[\[154a.6\]]bzed thogs te/_mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_de sbom dga' mos mthong nas myur zhing rings par de'i drung du song ste/_glen pa rab tu glen pa zhes smras nas mchil mas btab pa dang /_des smras pa/_sring mo khyod kyis ni nyes pa med kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[154a.7\]]pa kun dga' bos gal te nyes pa sbom po spyod pa'i bud med rnams legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por gnang bas lan no/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag sbom dga' mo ni dge sbyong ma ma yin/_dge slong ma ma yin/_smad 'tshong ma yang ji ltar sbom dga' mos byas pa bzhin dge slong la mi byed do/_/de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong la thu zhes bya bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to/_/dge 
[\[154b.2\]]slong mas dge slong la thu zhes byas na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na dge slong gzhan zhig la nyes pa byung ste/_des dge slong ma zhig mthong nas 'phags ma cung zhig 'dug ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags pa ci 'tshal/_
[\[154b.3\]]des 'phags ma bdag la nyes pa zhig byung ste 'chags so zhes smras so/_/de 'dug nas des de'i mdun du 'dug ste smras nas/_dgongs shig 'phags ma bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong la 'di lta bu 'di 'dra ba'i nyes pa zhig byung ste/_bdag gis 'phags ma'i 
[\[154b.4\]]mdun du mthol lo/_/'chags so/_/mi 'chab bo/_mthol lo bshags pas bde bar 'gyur gyis ma mthol ma bshags pa ni ma yin no/_/mos 'phags pa ci 'dra ba'i nyes pa yang khyod la byung ngam de ni ma legs pa byas so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong de 
[\[154b.5\]]skyengs par gyur te/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong gis dge slong ma'i mdun du nyes pa bshags par mi bya ste yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa'i 
[\[154b.6\]]dge slong gi mdun du bshags par bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma'i mdun du nyes pa bshags na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i dus na dge slong ma gzhan zhig la nyes pa byung nas des dge slong zhig mthong ste/_des 
[\[154b.7\]]bsti stang du bya ba dang bcas te rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas 'phags pa thugs rjer dgongs te cung zhig bzhugs shig ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma ci dgos zhes dris na/_des 'phags pa bdag la nyes pa zhig byung ste/_de 'phags pa'i spyan sngar bshags so zhes 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]smras pa dang /_de 'dug go/_/des kyang de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'phags pa dgongs shig_/bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i dge slong ma la 'di lta bu 'di 'dra ba'i nyes pa zhig byung ste/_de bdag gis 'phags pa'i spyan sngar nyes pa 
[\[155a.2\]]byung ba bshags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/mthol zhing bshags na bde bar 'gyur ro ma bshags ma mthol na ni ma yin no/_/des 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi nyes pa byung ba ni 'phags mas ma legs par byas so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong ma de skyengs par gyur to/_/de ltar 
[\[155a.3\]]gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas dge slong pha'i mdun du nyes pa mthol bar mi bya ste/_dge slong ma yongs su dag pa lta ba mthun pa'i mdun du nyes pa 
[\[155a.4\]]mthol bar bya'o/_/dge slong mas dge slong gi mdun du nyes pa mthol na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_dge slong phas ni las brjod cig_/dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o/_/khri dang khri'u yang sbyin par bya/_/g.yogs pa dag la mi gzhag go/_/sangs 
[\[155a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong pha'i las kyang so so/_dge slong ma'i yang so so/_spyi las ni ma gtogs so zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong ma dag dge slong pha'i 
[\[155a.6\]]mdun na las byas pa dang /_'jigs par gyur te las byed par ma spobs so/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gis las byos shig_/dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o/_/
[\[155a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bas na dge slong dag gis ni las byos shig_/dge slong mas ni brtag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong ma dag gis ji ltar brtag pa mi shes te de dag gis de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag la smras nas dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma dag gis bag yod par yid la bya ste/_'di ni gsol ba'o/_/'di ni las dang po'o/_/'di ni gnyis pa'o/_/'di ni gsum pa'o zhes shes par bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa 
[\[155b.2\]]na ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos nyan pa bsgrags par byos shig ces gsungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis stan ma bting nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stan thing shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na chos bshad pa bsgrags par gyur pa na/_dge slong ma dag 
[\[155b.3\]]'ongs nas g.yogs pa'i khri'u la 'dug ste chos nyan par brtsams pa dang /_der dge slong ma gzhan zhig dran pa nye bar ma bzhag ste khrag zags nas g.yogs pa'i khri'u ma rung bar gyur to/_/de nas chos bsgrags pa zin pa dang /_dge skos kyis stan bsdu bar 
[\[155b.4\]]brtsams na ji tsam na g.yogs pa'i khri'u ma rung bar gyur te/_sbrang bus gang ba mthong nas de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong ma dag chos nyan pa'i 
[\[155b.5\]]phyir 'ongs pa la g.yogs pa'i khri'u mi sbyin no/_/des kyang khri'u g.yogs pa la 'dug par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma chos nyan du 'ongs pa la khri'u g.yogs pa ma sbyin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de dag gis de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 
[\[155b.6\]]lhags pa rnams la khri'u ma g.yogs pa byin pa dang /_ji tsam na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pa dang /_de la yang khri'u ma g.yogs pa zhig byin pa dang /_des 'phags pa bdag sngon khyim na gnas pa na yang khri'u ma g.yogs pa la cung 
[\[155b.7\]]zad kyang ma mchis so zhes smras pa dang /_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_gau ta mI bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ste/_dge slong ma chos nyan pa'i phyir lhags pa la khri'u g.yogs pa ma sbyin cig ces bka' stsal to/_/des 'phags pa dge slong ma gang dag dran pa nye 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]bar mi 'jog pa de bzhin du bdag kyang nyes pa'i dmigs pa ci bgyid dam zhes smras pa dang /_de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag de lta bas na gnang ba ni dran pa nye bar 'jog pa'i dge slong ma 
[\[156a.2\]]de dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs na de dag la ni khri'u g.yogs pa sbyin par byos shig_/'di la the tshom ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to//_//mdor na/_chang 'tshong ma dang smad 'tshong ma/_/bran mo dang yang reg mi bya/_/gnod pa'i gos dang brang mi brdung /_/dge slong dag gi nang 
[\[156a.3\]]du gzhag_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas dge slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro'i dus na sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir 
[\[156a.4\]]zhugs so/_/de bsod snyoms la zhugs nas khyim mi mo zhig mthong ste bgo ba bzang zhing smad g.yogs dang rgyan bzang po zhig ste/_des de mthong nas nu mo khyod kyi gos dang /_rgyan dag ga las rnyed ces dris pa dang /_des 'phags ma bdag ni chang 'tshong ste/_de las 
[\[156a.5\]]'di dag thams cad rnyed do zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos thabs 'di ni legs pa zhig ste de ltar 'grub bam mi 'grub pa blta'o snyam bsams nas/_des de la dmigs shing dran bzhin du song nas ji tsam du mthong ba gnas gzhan zhig na bud med gcig gos 
[\[156a.6\]]dri ma can gyon la zas med cing de rid la gom pa dal gyis 'gro ba zhig mthong nas bu mo khyod su'i zhes dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_su'i yang ma yin te/_gang bdag bza' ba dang /_bgo ba ster ba de'i las bdag gis bya'o/_/des bu mo de ste de bzhin na chang 'tshong ba ci'i 
[\[156a.7\]]phyir mi spyod ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma ci 'di bzhin nyid du chang 'tshong pa spyod du rung ngam/_der thog mar nor mang du dgos so/_/zong yod kyang snod dang chang 'thung ba dag bde bar 'dug pa'i khang pa rgya chen po rnams kyang med do ces smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]bu mo de ste bdag gis de dag thams cad sbyar la khyod kyi bza' ba dang bgo ba yang sbyin gyis rnyed pa thams cad bdag la byin cig ces so/_/des 'phags ma legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/sbom dga' mos dbyar mo khang dang nye bar de'i khang pa zhig brtsigs te/_zong dang snod dang yo byad rnams byin 
[\[156b.2\]]pa des der chang 'tshong ba la zhugs te/_chang yang zhim por gyur nas chang 'thung ba dag der mang du 'dus shing tshogs pa dang de dag mthong nas chang 'tshong ba gzhan dag phrag dog skyes par gyur to/_/sbom dga' mos kyang rnyed pa dag 'phel to/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang du chang zhig 
[\[156b.3\]]dgos par gyur nas rgyal po'i skyes bu dag gis chang 'tshong ba thams cad bsdus pa na de dag phrag dog langs te de rnams kyis rgyal po'i skyes bu dag la 'di na sbom dga' mo'i chang 'tshong ma zhig dbyar mo khang dang nye ba na chang 'tshong zhing 'dug gis chang ma de yang khrid cig ces smras pa dang /_de 
[\[156b.4\]]dag gis de bzung ste khrid do/_/de ngu bar gyur te 'phags ma sbom dga' mo rgyal po'i skyes bu 'di dag gis bdag khrid do zhes smras pa dang /_de myur du gom pa mgyogs par song nas bu zan mo'i bu dag bdag gi bu mo 'di gar bkri zhes smras so/_/de dag gis ci 'phags ma chang 'tshong 
[\[156b.5\]]ngam mi mdza' ba rnams kyi gnya' bar rdog pas mnan la chang yang 'tshong ngo /_/ci 'phags ma la yang dgra yod dam zhes smras pa dang /_khyed cag nyid nga'i dgra chen po yin te de'i phyir bdag gi bu mo khrid do zhes sma zhing de dag 'thab pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong ste/_de dag 
[\[156b.6\]]gis kye 'di dag ci zhes dris pa dang de dag gis zhib tu smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya zhing smod ngan du 'dzer ba ni dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag ni tshig pa'o/_/de 'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ma yang chang 'tshong ba la zhugs pas na dge sbyong dang tshangs pa yang rab tu tshig pa'o/_/de lta bur gyur 
[\[156b.7\]]pa dge slong dag gis thos te bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sbom dga' mos dge sbyong ma yin pa cher byas te/_de lta bas na dge slong mas chang 'tshong ba ma byed cig 'tshong na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas dge 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]slong ma sbom dga' mo snga dro'i dus na sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de bsod snyoms la 'jug pa'i tshe smad 'tshong ma gcig gos dang sham thabs rab tu bzang ba zhig gyon/_rgyan 
[\[157a.2\]]rab tu bzang bas brgyan pa zhig mthong nas des mthong ba dang /_phu nu mo 'di lta bu gos dang rgyan dag ga las 'byor ces dris pa dang /_des 'phags ma bdag gis smad 'tshong byas pas na de la 'di lta bu dag rnyed do zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos thabs de ni legs 
[\[157a.3\]]pa zhig na 'grub bam mi 'grub pa blta'o snyam bsams nas/_de la dmigs shing dran bzhin du song ngo /_/ji tsam na gnas gzhan zhig na bu mo zhig gos dri ma can zas kyis kyang mi 'byor bar gyur/_'gros kyang dal bus 'gro ba zhig la bzhin byad bzang mo 
[\[157a.4\]]zhig mthong nas bu mo khyod su'i zhes dris pa dang /_des 'phags ma gang sus bdag la zas dang gos byin pa de'i las kyang bdag gis bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/des bu mo de ltar na smad 'tshong ma ci'i phyir mi byed ces byas pa dang /_de rna ba bkag nas 'phags ma 
[\[157a.5\]]de skad ma gsung shig_/mi mdzes pa de lta bu dag ni bdag gi rigs la sngon chad sus kyang ma bgyis so zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos bu mo bud med kyi spyod pa ni de lta bu yin na rgyal po 'di zhes bya ba'i bu mo yang de bzhin du smad 'tshong bas na de lta bur gyur/_
[\[157a.6\]]bram ze 'di zhes bya ba'i bu mo yang de bzhin du'o/_/rigs mchog las kyang de lta bu mang du byung na bud med ni skyes pa la sems pa yin mod kyi/_bdag rab tu ma byung na de lta bu bya ba zhig na rab tu byung bas mi bde'o zhes smras te/_des de bslus nas smras pa/_'phags 
[\[157a.7\]]ma smad 'tshong ma 'di 'dra ba spyod dam/_'phags ma smad 'tshong ma 'di lta bu spyad na de la yang yo byad mang por dgos te/_skyes pa mang po 'du ba'i khang pa rgya chen po dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dag kyang mang du dgos so/_/sbom 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]dga' mos bu mo de ltar na bdag gis thams cad sbyar na khyod kyis rnyed pa thams cad bdag la byin na ni khyod kyi zas dang gos la sogs pa bdag gis sbyar ro zhes smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma legs kyis de bzhin du rnyed pa sbyin no zhes smras so/_/sbom dga' mos dbyar 
[\[157b.2\]]mo khang dang nye ba zhig tu de'i khang pa zhig brtsigs nas des ci smras pa bzhin du byin te des phyis bkrus te gos dang /_rgyan bzang po dag byin nas zhag du ma zhig gi bar du chas te/_de gzugs gzhon zhing mdzes nas smad 'tshong ma'i gzugs su byas te 'dug go/_/nyon mongs pa'i dbang 
[\[157b.3\]]gis gzir nas thams cad kyang der 'dus so/_/de smad 'tshong ma gzhan zhig gis mthong nas phrag dog langs te ma bzod par gyur to/_/sbom dga' mos rnyed pa dag cher gyur to/_/de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po'i pho brang du dus ston chen po zhig byung ste/_der dri mang po 
[\[157b.4\]]zhig dgos nas rgyal po'i skyes bu dag gis dri btab pa'i phyir smad 'tshong ma thams cad bsdus pa dang /_de dag gi phrag dog gis de yang rgyal po'i skyes bu dag la dbyar mo khang gi drung du sbom dga' mo'i smad 'tshong ba zhig gis de yang khrid cig ces smras so/_/de dag 
[\[157b.5\]]gis de bzung ste khrid pa dang /_de yang ngus nas 'phags ma sbom dga' mo bdag ni rgyal po'i skyes bus khrid do zhes smras pa dang /_de myur bar brgyugs nas bu zan mo'i bu 'di dag bdag gi bu mo 'di gar bkri/_de dag gis smras pa/_ci 'phags ma yang smad 'tshong 
[\[157b.6\]]ma spyod dam/_dgra rnams kyi gnya' bar rdog pas mnan la byed do/_/ci 'phags ma la yang dgra yod dam/_nga'i bu mo khrid pas na khyod nyid dgra'i nang na chen po yin no/_/de dag 'thab pa bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas/_de dag gis kye 
[\[157b.7\]]ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_des ji ltar gyur pa zhib tu smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya zhing smod ngan du 'dzer te/_shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong ni rab tu tshig go/_/dge sbyong dang tshangs pa yang tshig go/_/da ni dge sbyong mgo reg mas kyang smad 'tshong ma yang byed do zhes 'phya'o/_/
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]de ltar gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_sbom dga' mos ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa zhig byas so/_/de lta bas na dge slong mas smad 'tshong ma byed du mi gzhug par dgongs nas/_
[\[158a.2\]]dge slong dag sbom dga' mos dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa cher byas pa la bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya ba dang /_smod pa dang /_ngan du smra ba ni gnas yin te/_de bas na dge slong mas smad 'tshong ma byed du mi gzhug go/_/dge slong mas smad 'tshong ma byed du bcug na nyes pa 
[\[158a.3\]]sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas sbom dga' mos snga dro'i dus na sham thabs dang chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_bran mo zhig mthong nas de 
[\[158a.4\]]gos bzang /_smad g.yogs bzang /_rgyan bzang pos brgyan pa/_des mthong nas nu mo khyod gos dang rgyan bzang po gang nas rnyed ces dris pa dang /_des 'phags ma bdag ni logs shig na smad 'tshong bas na de nas 'di dag rnyed do zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos 
[\[158a.5\]]thabs de ni legs so/_/de ltar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur ba blta'o snyam bsams nas/_de la dmigs shing dran bzhin du song nas ji tsam zhig na/_bu mo gos dri ma can kha zas med pa 'gros kyang dal nas 'gro la byad bzhin ni bzang ba zhig mthong nas des bu mo khyod su'i zhes 
[\[158a.6\]]dris pa dang /_des smras pa/_bdag ni su yang ma yin gyi/_gang gis gos dang zas sbyin pa de'i las byed do/_/des smras pa/_bu mo de ltar na logs shig na smad 'tshong ba ci phyir mi byed ces byas pa dang de rna ba bkag ste 'phags ma de skad ma gsung shig_/mi rigs 
[\[158a.7\]]pa 'di lta bu bdag cag gi rigs la sngan chad sus kyang de lta bu ma byas so zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos bu mo bud med kyi chos ni de yin te/_rgyal po'i bu mo yang de bzhin/_'di zhes bya ba'i bram ze'i bu mo yang de bzhin te/_de bzhin du rigs chen po mang po dag 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]las kyang de lta bu byung na/_bud med ni skyes pa la sems te/_bdag gis kyang bya ba zhig na rab tu byung bas mi rung ngo zhes zer zhing de des bslus pa dang /_'phags ma de ltar na logs shig na smad 'tshong ji ltar bya/_de la yo byad mang po dag dgos so/_/dang por ni gos 
[\[158b.2\]]dang rgyan dgos so/_/de'i 'og tu sbra dang /_dra ba chen po dang /_zhal ta byed pa'i skyes pa yang gzhan la/_kyal ka byed pa 'ongs na yang grogs bya dgos/_bdag dang skyes pa mang po dag bsdu zhing mgu bar bya ba'i phyir chang dang /_dri dang /_byug pa dag dgos so zhes smras pa 
[\[158b.3\]]dang /_sbom dga' mos de ltar na bdag gis gos dang zas la sogs te thams cad sbyar gyis/_khyod kyis rnyed pa de thams cad nga la byin cig ces smras pa dang /_legs kyis de bzhin du sbyin no zhes smras pa dang /_sbom dga' mos de phyis nas khrus byas te/_gos dang /_rgyan 
[\[158b.4\]]dang dgon pa la gnas pa'i yo byad la sogs pa byin nas zhag nyung zad cig gi bar du gsos nas sbra yang byin/_zhal ta byed pa'i skyes pa byin nas zhal ta byed pa'i mi dang 'grogs te/_dgon pa la song nas logs shig na smad 'tshong ba la zhugs pa dang /_ji tsam 
[\[158b.5\]]zhig nas bsel pas bzung ste khrid pa dang /_sbom dga' mo la sbran to/_/de nas sbom dga' mos rings par myur bar song nas brgyugs te/_bu zan mo'i bu dag bdag gi bu mo gar bkri zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis 'phags ma ci khyod kyang logs shig na smad 
[\[158b.6\]]'tshong ba byed dam zhes smras pa dang /_dgra'i gnya' bar rdog pas mnan la byed du gzhug go/_/'phags ma ci khyod la yang dgra yod dam/_bdag gi bu mo khyod kyis khrid pas na bdag gi dgra chen po khyod nyid yin no/_/de dag 'thab mo byed pa bram ze dang /_khyim 
[\[158b.7\]]bdag dag gis mthong nas/_kye 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /_de dag gis ji lta bur gyur pa zhib tu smras pa dang /_de dag 'phya zhing smod ngan du 'dzer te/_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong rab tu tshig pa'o/_/dge sbyong dang tshangs pa yang rab tu tshig pa'o/_/
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]da ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ma 'di ni logs shig na smad 'tshong ba byed do zhes 'phya'o/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong rnams kyis thos nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma sbom dga' mos dge sbyong 
[\[159a.2\]]gi bya ba ma yin pa cher byas te/_de bas na dge slong mas logs shig na smad 'tshong ba mi bya bar dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag 'phya la smod cing ngan du zer ba ni gnas yin te/_sbom dga' mos dge sbyong ma yin pa'i 
[\[159a.3\]]las byas so/_/de bas na dge slong mas logs shig na smad 'tshong ma byed du ma gzhug shig_/dge slong mas logs shig na smad 'tshong ba byed du bcug na ltung ba sbom por 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/_
[\[159a.4\]]gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na ste/_nam gar mkhan dag gis mi mang po'i dbus su drug sde dag la dpyas pa'i tshe de'i dus na de dag gcig la gcig gros su byed de/_de dag gi nang nas gcig gis kye gar mkhan dag gis mi mang po'i dbus su bdag cag la dpyas pa de 
[\[159a.5\]]thams cad bcu gnyis sdes lan na/_bu zan mo'i bu de la de dag gis lhung bzed dang chos gos dag ma byin dang /_des bdag cag la dpya bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_da ni de'i dus la bab ste/_de dag thabs ji ltar bya ba smros shig ces smras pa dang /_nye dga' bos 
[\[159a.6\]]smras pa/_de la gzhan zhig ni ci byar yod/_de bdag cag gis rab tu brdeg par byas 'dong ngo /_gcig gis yang legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag gros bcad de de'i drung du dong ba dang /_sbom dga' mo mthong ngo /_/de rnams kyis 
[\[159a.7\]]kye de dag gi nang na gtso mo 'di yin gyis 'di la brdeg par bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag gis de thal mo dang /_dbyug pa dang /_rdog pa dang /_dbyug gu dang /_khu tshur dag gis brdegs so/_/de brdegs zin pa dang /_des lus yungs mar gyis byugs nas 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]khri dra ba can gyi steng du nyal zhing 'dug go/_/dge slong ma dag gis mthong nas 'phags ma 'di ltar ci zhig nyes zhes dris pa dang /_des bdag ni brdegs so/_/des su zhig gis zhes dris pa dang /_'phags pa drug sde dag go/_/khyod kyis ci zhig byas/_phu nu mo chos kyi ming po de 
[\[159b.2\]]dag la ngan du brjod pa'i mi rigs te/_sring mo la bslab cing bstan pa lta ga la yang yod mod ces smras pa dang /_dge slong ma dag 'phya bar gyur te/_dge slong phas dge slong ma dag la rdeg pa lta ga la yod/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras pa dang /_dge 
[\[159b.3\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong dag gis dge slong ma la rdeg pa'o/_/de bas na dge slong phas dge slong ma la rdeg tu mi gnang bar dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[159b.4\]]dag dge sbyong drug sde dag gis byas pa la dge slong ma dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/_de bas na dge slong dag dge slong phas dge slong ma la rdeg tu mi gnang ngo /_/dge slong phas dge slong ma la rdeg na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_
[\[159b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag sme ba'i sme gab chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_des sme ba'i sme gab bcangs pa dang /_de las kyang thal te sham thabs la zags nas thig ler gyur pa las de'i gnas gnas su sbrang ma dag gis gang zhing 'khor ba dang /_de 
[\[159b.6\]]dag ngo tsha bar gyur nas 'jigs bzhin du 'khod do/_/de ltar gyur pa dge slong mas dge slong la smras pa dang /_dge slong phas bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong dag dge slong mas gnod pa'i gos 
[\[159b.7\]]chongs shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag la gnod pa'i gos chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis gnod pa'i gos ci lta bur bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nang gi smad g.yogs chongs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]gis nang gi smad g.yogs 'chang bar brtsams pa dang /_de la yang khrag gis tig tig por song ngo /_/de yang de ltar gyur pa dge slong mas dge slong pha la smras pa dang /_dge slong phas bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[160a.2\]]stsal pa/_dus dus su khrus la tshos la chongs shig_/dge slong ma dag rtag tu dran pa nye bar zhog la nyol cig_/dge slong mas dran pa nye bar ma bzhag par nyal na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de'i tshe na dge slong pha mu la pa la 
[\[160a.3\]]gu na bya ba zhig dus las 'das nas/_de na bcu gnyis sde dag gis de la mchod pa byas te bsregs nas de dag gis brang brdungs pa dang /_dge slong ma dag 'phya ste dge slong ma dag brang rdung ba ga la rigs/_de ltar gyur pa dge slong ma dag gis dge slong la smras so/_/dge 
[\[160a.4\]]slong pha dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong ma bcu gnyis sdes mi rigs pa zhig byas te/_de bas na dge slong mas brang mi brdung bar dgongs te bka' stsal pa/_dge slong pha dag dge slong ma bcu gnyis sdes 
[\[160a.5\]]mi rigs pa dge slong ma dag 'phya ba ni gnas yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag brang brdung bar mi bya'o/_/de ste dge slong ma dag gis brang brdungs na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis sangs rgyas 
[\[160a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa dge slong ma las mtshan gyur na/_de la ji lta bur bgyi zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li de ni lo du lon pa de bzhin du dge slong gi nang du zhog shig_/de yang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong pha'i dngos 
[\[160a.7\]]por 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_dge slong ma las dge slong nang du gzhag_/rnam pa thams cad du yang gzhag mi bya/_/pho nyas yang ni de bzhin bsnyen rdzogs par/_/drang srong chen po yis ni gnang ba yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas u pA lis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dge slong ma mtshan gyur na dang po nas lo grangs du lon pa de bzhin dge slong pha'i nang du chug shig ces gsungs na/_ci dge slong 
[\[160b.2\]]pha mtshan gyur na yang dang po nas lo grangs du lon pa de bzhin du dge slong ma'i nang du gzhug par bgyi'am zhes zhus pa dang /_u pA li dge slong pha las mtshan gyur na de lo grangs du lon pa de bzhin dge slong ma'i nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/de ste btsun pa dge slong pha'am dge 
[\[160b.3\]]slong ma yang rung /_der bzhag pa las de nas kyang mtshan gyur na de la thabs ji lta bur bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li de nas yang ci rigs pa bzhin du zhog shig ces bka' stsal to/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa u pA lis 
[\[160b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ni dge slong pha'am/_dge slong ma lan gnyis su mtshan gyur nas de yang gar rigs par zhog shig ces bka' stsal na/_btsun pa de ste der bzhag pa las mtshan lan gsum du gyur na de la thabs 
[\[160b.5\]]ji lta bur bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_u pA li rnam pa thams cad du mi gzhag pa yin te/_u pA li mtshan lan gsum du gyur na dge slong pha'i dngos po dang /_dge slong ma'i dngos po de ma thag tu rnam pa thams cad du mi gzhag par byas/_
[\[160b.6\]]de la the tshom du ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/mnyan du yod pa'i phyogs gcig na khyim bdag byin pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de rab tu phyug cing nor mang la longs 
[\[160b.7\]]spyod che/_yangs shing rgya che ba ni ngal bso po'i nor dang 'dra ba ngal bso po'i nor la sdo ba zhig 'dug ste/_des rigs dang mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/yang phyogs gzhan zhig na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra zhes bya ba'i khyim bdag 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]cig gnas pa de yang phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che la yangs shing rgya che ba ni ngal bso po'i nor dang 'dra ba ngal bso po'i nor la sdo ba zhig 'dug ste/_des kyang rigs dang mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de dag 
[\[161a.2\]]gcig la gcig phyug pas 'gran te/_gcig na re khyod pas ni longs spyod kyi rgyu bdag gi khyad zhugs so/_/gcig na re khyod pas longs spyod kyi rgyu bdag gi khyad zhugs so zhes smra'o/_/de gnyis phan tshun mdza' bar gyur te/_gcig gis kyang dus dus 
[\[161a.3\]]su skyes bskur/_gcig gis kyang de bzhin slar bskur nas de gnyis phan tshun mdza' bar gyur to/_ji tsam dus phyi zhig na mnyan du yod pa na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po dag cung zad bya ba zhig yod de/_de dag thams cad skyed mos tshal du dong ste 'dus nas der grong khyer 
[\[161a.4\]]gyi don rnams bsgrubs nas dong ngo /_/khyim bdag byin pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra zhes bya ba gnyis de na gcig la gcig mdza' ba'i gtam 'dzer cing 'khod do/_/khyim bdag byin pas mdza' bo grogs po bdag cag gnyis dus las 'das kyang phyi nas bu dang /_tsha bo dang 
[\[161a.5\]]yang tsha dang /_sum tsha dag gi bar du mdza' ba'i rgyun mi gcad par bya na/_de la thabs ji lta bu zhig bya zhes dris pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras smras pa/_grogs po legs te bdag kyang de lta bur sems na tshur shog_/ma btsas par gnyen sngar bya ste/_bdag la bu pho 
[\[161a.6\]]zhig skyes/_khyod la bu mo zhig byung na khyod kyis bdag gi bu la byin cig de ste khyod la ni bu pho zhig byung /_bdag la ni bu mo zhig byung na bdag gis khyod kyi bu la sbyin no/_/des grogs po legs kyis de lta bur bya'o zhes smras so/_/de dag gcig la gcig ma btsas 
[\[161a.7\]]par gnyen byas te dong ngo /_/de nas dus phyi zhig na khyim bdag byin pa'i chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa na/_bu mo zhig btsas te/_dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa/_bzang mo yan lag dang nying lag tu ldan pa zhig ste 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]de rtag tu ngu'o/_/de nas khyim bdag byin pa'i khyim du dge slong dag 'ongs te chos bshad pa dang /_de'i tshe rna ba byo ste nyan to/_/de nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu rgya cher btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas nas de'i ming 'dogs pa la zhugs te/_bu mo 'di'i ming 
[\[161b.2\]]cir gdags zhes bgros pa dang /_gnyen rnams kyis bu mo 'di rtag tu chos 'dod pa chos la rna ba byo ste nyan la khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo yin pas na de'i phyir bu mo de'i ming chos sbyin zhes gdags so/_/bu mo chos sbyin ma ma ma brgyad la gtad de/_gnyis ni snun pa'i 
[\[161b.3\]]ma ma'o/_/gnyis ni 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o/_/gnyis ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o/_/gnyis ni rtse ba'i ma ma'o/_/ma ma de brgyad kyis gsos bskyed de 'o ma dang /_zho dang /_mar sar dang /_mar dang /_gzhan yang des shing des pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par gyis myur du bskyed pa ni rdzing 
[\[161b.4\]]na gnas pa'i 'dam las skyes pa bzhin no/_/de nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra zhes bya ba khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo btsas par des thos pa dang /_des grogs po'i bu mo btsas na de la gos dang rgyan dag bdag gis bskur ro snyam bsams te/_/bdag gi mna' ma yin 
[\[161b.5\]]par yid la yod pas des de la gos dang rgyan dag bskur nas mdza' bo grogs po khyod la bu mo zhig byung bar thos nas bdag rab tu dga' ste/_mdza' bo'i bu mo'i gos dang rgyan bskur ba 'di yin gyis blang ba'i rigs so zhes spring ba dang /_des de blangs nas slar 
[\[161b.6\]]lan spring ba/_mdza' bo de ltar byas pa legs kyis gnyen yang byas khyod las bu pho zhig byung na de la sbyin no/_/khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras de'i lan thos pa dang /_de bu 'dod par sems bzhin du des chung ma la rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa 
[\[161b.7\]]las phyi zhig na de'i chung ma mngal sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/_/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang bu pho zhig btsas so/_/de btsas nas de la yang zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du rgya cher btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po byas te/_khye'u 'di ming ci zhig tu 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]gdags zhes dpyad pa dang /_de'i yang gnyen dag gis khye'u 'di skar ma sa ga'i tshe btsas pas na de bas na khye'u 'di'i ming sa gar gdags so zhes zer nas de'i ming sa gar btags so/_/khye'u sa ga de yang ma ma brgyad la gtad de/_gnyis ni snun pa'i ma ma'o/_/
[\[162a.2\]]gnyis ni 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o/_/gnyis ni dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma'o/_/gnyis ni rtse ba'i ma ma'o/_/ma ma de brgyad kyis gsos bskyed de 'o ma dang /_zho dang mar sar dang /_mar dang /_gzhan yang des shing des pa'i yo byad kyi khyad par gyis myur du bskyed pa ni rdzing na gnas pa'i 'dam las 
[\[162a.3\]]skyes pa bzhin no/_/khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra las bu pho gcig byung bar khyim bdag byin pas thos nas des bsams pa/_mdza' bo las bu pho zhig byung ba de gor ma chag par bdag gi mag par 'gyur gyis/_de la gos dang rgyan dag cig bskur ro snyam nas/_des de la gos 
[\[162a.4\]]dang rgyan dag bskur nas phrin spring ba/_mdza' bo khyod la bu zhig btsas par bdag gis thos nas rab tu dga' ste/_mdza' bo'i bu la bdag gis gos dang rgyan bskur ba 'di yin gyis 'di blang ba'i rigs so/_/des de blangs nas phrin lan mdza' bo khyod kyi bu mo skyed cig dang /_
[\[162a.5\]]skyes nas blang ngo spring ngo /_/des smras pa/_bu mo sbyin gyis legs te/_de ltar bya'o/_/nam bu mo chos sbyin skyes pa dang /_de rab tu 'byung bar 'dod nas des pha'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_pha bdag legs par bshad pa chos 'dul ba la rab tu dbyung bar gsol lo 
[\[162a.6\]]zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo khyod [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i bu sa ga la sngon khyod btang zin te/_khyod kyi khyim thab de yin te/_da ni gnang du mi rung ngo zhes zer nas ma gnang ngo /_/khyim der dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ces bya ba rigs dag ston par byed de dus dus su 'ong ngo /_/
[\[162a.7\]]chos sbyin gyis 'phags ma bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po thob par 'tshal ba bdag gi phas mi gnang zhing bsrungs te phyir 'byung du yang mi ster na khyod kyis 'di nyid du rab tu mi 'byung ngam zhes smras pa 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]dang /_des bu mo sems de ltar bskyed pa legs so/_/'dod pa ni bde ba chung la sdug bsngal che zhing nyes pa mang ste/_rab tu byung na ni dge ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni mkhas pas nyes pa lnga mthong na des 'dod pa lnga la bsten pa'i mi rigs zhes gsungs te/_lnga 
[\[162b.2\]]gang zhe na/_bde ba chung la sdug bsngal che zhing nyes pa mang bar mkhas pas yang dag par mthong nas/_des 'dod pa la bsten pa'i mi rigs so/_/'dod pa la bsten pas kun du sbyor ba 'phel bar 'gyur bar mkhas pas yang dag par mthong nas des 'dod pa la bsten pa'i mi rigs 
[\[162b.3\]]so/_/'dod pa la bsten na cung zad kyang mi rigs pa'am/_ngoms pa'am/_chog pa med par mkhas pas yang dag par mthong nas des 'dod pa la bsten pa'i mi rigs so/_/'dod pa la bsten na sdig pa cung zad kyang mi bya ba med par mkhas pas yang dag par mthong nas 
[\[162b.4\]]des 'dod pa la bsten pa'i mi rigs so/_/'dod pa ni rnam grangs de lta bu sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang /_mkhas pa dang /_yang dag par song ba skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis spangs par mkhas pas mthong nas 'dod pa la bsten pa'i mi rigs so/_/mkhas 
[\[162b.5\]]pas yon tan lnga mthong nas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so/_/lnga gang zhe na/_bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i don rjes su thob par 'gyur bar mthong nas mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bdag gang dag gi bran dang /_mngag gzhug 
[\[162b.6\]]pa dang /_bsgo ba dang /_bkol ba dang /_ci dga' mgur byed pa de dag gis slar mchod pa dang /_bstod par 'gyur bar mthong nas mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bla na med pa rnal 'byor bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa rjes su 'thob par mthong 
[\[162b.7\]]nas mkhas pas bdag nyid rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so/_/bla na med pa rnal 'byor bde ba mya ngan las 'da' ba rjes su 'thob pa ma grub kyang bdag lhar skye bar 'gyur bar mthong nas mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs so/_/rab tu byung ba'i yon 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]tan ni sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang mkhas pa dang /_yang dag par song ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis bsngags par mthong nas mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba la dad par bya ba'i rigs te/_khyod kyis sems de ltar bskyed pa legs kyis 
[\[163a.2\]]da song nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol te bya'o zhes smras nas/_dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 
[\[163a.3\]]dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog mas bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa khyim bdag byin pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo chos sbyin zhes bgyi ba legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos por 'tshal na/_de khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i bu sa 
[\[163a.4\]]ga zhes bgyi ba la stsal nas/_khyim bdag byin pa des ma gnang ba'i steng du rtag tu bsrungs shing slad rol du 'byung du ma ster to zhes gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song la dge slong ma dag la 'di skad 
[\[163a.5\]]smros shig_/khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo chos sbyin ma zhes bya ba khyim de nyid du ut+pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par gtang gis skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi lnga byin la gnas de nyid du rab tu dbyung bar ngas gnang ngo /_/btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_
[\[163a.6\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te dge slong ma rnams la bsgo'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mas dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ma la bsgo ste phrin par gtang ngo /_/de der song nas bu mo bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gnang bar bka' stsal to/_/
[\[163a.7\]]dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang skyabs su 'gro ba gsum dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang byin no/_/khyod rab tu byung ste bslab pa bcu'i gzhi yang byin gyis 'di dang 'di dag ni 'di ltar bslab pa'i gnas nas 'byung ba bzhin du zung la bsdam par gyis shig ces 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]smras pa dang /_de rab tu dga' ba skyes so/_/de nas rab tu dga' ba skyes pa dang /_dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog mas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu bshad nas chos sbyin mas thos ma thag tu 'jig tshogs su lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu gyen du 
[\[163b.2\]]byung ba rdo rje ye shes kyis bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/de nas dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog mas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ste/_dge slong ma dag la 'di skad ces bsgo shig_/
[\[163b.3\]]chos sbyin ma gnas de nyid du ut+pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par thong la lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa byin cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te dge slong 
[\[163b.4\]]ma rnams la bsgo'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis ut+pa la'i kha dog ma bsgos te phrin par gtang ngo /_/de der song nas bu mo dge slong ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug bslab pa'i sdom pa byin te/_khyod ni dge slong mar gyur gyis 
[\[163b.5\]]'di dang 'di ni khyod kyis byos shig_/ji ltar bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa bzhin du bsdam par gyis shig_/de nas de lta bu'i chos bshad pa thos pa dang /_chos sbyin mas lan gcig phyir ldog pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas so/_/de ltar chos sbyin mas lo gnyis su chos drug dang rjes su 'brang 
[\[163b.6\]]ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa dag bslabs pa de na de gzhon nu mar gyur to/_/de gzugs gzhon zhing bzang mo la nang gi skye bo thams cad kyis yid dga' zhing phyi phyir zhing lta'o/_/de nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras bu mo chos sbyin de gzhon nur gyur pa thos pa dang /_des khyim bdag byin 
[\[163b.7\]]pa la mdza' bo khye'u yang gzhon nur gyur bu mo yang gzhon nur na nyi ma nam bzang ba brtags nas khye'u yi chung mar blang ngo zhes spring ba dang /_des mdza' bo legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes lan spring ngo /_khyim bdag byin pas ltas mkhan dag bsogs te/_kye bu mo 'di nam bag 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]mar btang na rung ba rtogs shig ces byas pa dang /_de dag gis yid mthun par brtsis te bag mar gtang ba'i nyi ma bstan to/_/de bzhin du khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras kyang bag ma blang ba'i zhag bstan to/_/de nas khyim bdag byin pas mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_
[\[164a.2\]]gnyen dag gi gnas su dus 'di tsam na bu mo chos sbyin ma bag mar gtang bar bya ste/_phu nu dang gnyen 'khor dang chas te grogs byed pa'i phyir shog shig ces yi ge spring ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras kyang mdza' bo dang phu nu dang /_gnyen rnams la de bzhin du yi ge spring ngo /_/
