[\[164a.3\]]khyim bdag de gnyis kyi skye bo dang /_'khor dag rgya cher gnas nas mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen rnams lhags pas mnyan du yod pa'i nang thams cad gang ngo /_/yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nang gi btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_skye bo mang po 
[\[164a.4\]]dang /_ljongs dag gi mis khyim bdag byin pa'i bu mo [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra la byin te/_de bag mar len par byed cing de dag gi gnas nas mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen rnams dang /_skye bo mang po dag lhags so zhes thos so/_/des blon po la kye khyed kyis kyang de gnyis kyi grogs 
[\[164a.5\]]gyis shig par bsgo'o/_/de dag gis kyang gnas gnas kyi dbang po rnams dang /_rgyal po'i rigs su gtogs pa rnams la so sor gang gi yul na yo byad ci yod pa rnams deng bdag gis khyer te 'dus/_'di na kun phyin par 'dus shig ces yi ge spring ngo /_/de dag gis 
[\[164a.6\]]kyang de ltar thos ma thag tu bdag gis 'byor ba rnams sbyar te mnyan du yod par lhags so/_/de nas sems can mang po brgya stong yang 'dus te/_de nas blon po rnams kyis mnyan du yod pa'i skyed mos tshal dang /_nye ba'i tshal dang /_de'i 'khor du bcas pa thams cad phyi bdar 
[\[164a.7\]]byas/_rdo dang /_gyo mo dang bong ba dag phyags nas med par byas so/_/tsan dan gyi chus ni chag chag btab/_bdug spos zhim po'i pog phor da sbyangs te/_g.yas g.yon du bzhag_/'phan dang rgyal mtshan bsgrengs nas/_dar gyi lda ldi dpyangs/_me tog rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]kyis bkram/_yid du 'ong ba'i lha rnams kyi dga' ba'i tshal dang /_skyed mos tshal bzhin no/_/de nas chos sbyin mas yo byad sbyar ba rnams mthong nas nang gi skye bo dag la kye dus ma yin pa'i dus ston 'di ci zhig yin zhes smras pa dang /_de dag gis khyod kyis sngon gyi legs pa'i 
[\[164b.2\]]tshogs rnam par bsags pa'i mthus na dus la ma bab pa'i dus ston chen po byas te/_khyod bag mar gtang ba'i phyir dus la ma bab pa'i dus ston chen po byas te/_de dag nye bar 'ongs so zhes smras pa dang /_des thos nas skrag ste pha'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/_yab bdag 
[\[164b.3\]]'dod pa 'tshal ba ni ma lags na rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du mchir ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu mo khyod ma skyes par khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i bu sa ga la byin pas/_da ni nga la dbang med do/_/khyod kyi khyim thab de yin 
[\[164b.4\]]te/_de lta bur ni yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /_nang gi btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_skye bo mang po dang /_yul so so nas lhags pa'i skye bo mang po dag kyang shes na ngas khyod da ji ltar gnang bar bya/_ci bdag mdza' bo dang /_phu nu 
[\[164b.5\]]dang /_/gnyen rnams btson rar bcug ste 'chi bar 'dod dam/_khyod ni sang bag mar 'gro ba ltar gyis shig_/mdza' bo dang /_bdag gi mi dang /_gnyen dang /_skye bo mang po dag kyang 'dir 'dus na/_de skad ma zer cig_/khyod rab tu gzhon pas ma rtogs te/_
[\[164b.6\]]tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa thong shig ces bsgo ba dang /_de brtson pas lam yid la byed pa sgom pa la zhugs na 'dod pa dang bral bar bya ba'i thabs ma rnyed do/_/de'i bar du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mi mkhyen pa'am/_mi gzigs pa'am/_ma rig pa'am/_
[\[164b.7\]]rnam par mi rig pa cung zad kyang med de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs rje chen po can 'jig rten pa la phan 'dogs par 'dug pa/_srung ba gcig pu dpa' bo gcig pu/_gnyis su med pa gnyis su ma yin par gsung ba zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]gnas pa/_'dul ba'i dngos po gsum la mkhas pa chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil la rab tu rtag pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa med pa/_yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/_skye ba lnga las yang dag par 'das 
[\[165a.2\]]pa/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/_spyad pa drug la rtag tu spyod pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis brgyan pa/_lam yan lag brgyad 'chang ba/_dgu mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa la mkhas pa/_stobs bcu'i 
[\[165a.3\]]stobs dang ldan pa/_phyogs bcur snyan pa rgyas par grags pa/_brgya phrag bcu las dbang sgyur ba khyad zhugs pa/_mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs nas ye shes kyi mthong ba la 'jug ste/_gang 'grib/_gang 'phel/_
[\[165a.4\]]gang sdug bsngal bar gyur/_gang dog par gyur/_gang gnod par gyur/_gang dka' ba dang /_dog pa dang /_gnod par gyur/_gang ngan song la gzhol/_gang ngan song la 'bab/_gang ngan song la rab tu bab/_gang ngas ngan song nas phyung ste/_mtho ris dang thar pa la rab tu 
[\[165a.5\]]gzhag par bya/_gang dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya/_gang skyes pa rnams yongs su smin par bya/_gang yongs su smin pa rnams rnam par grol bar bya snyam du gzigs so/_/yang smras pa/_rgya mtsho chu srin gnas de ni/_/dus las gal te 
[\[165a.6\]]yol kyang srid/_/'dul ba yi ni bu rnams la/_/sangs rgyas dus la 'da' mi mdzad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang /_chos nyid kyis nam gyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das der 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/_zhal nas 'od zer kha dog sngon po 
[\[165a.7\]]dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams phyung ste/_kha cig ni 'og tu dong /_kha cig ni steng du dong ngo /_/gang 'og tu dong ba de dag gis ni yang sos dang /_thig nag po dang /_'joms pa dang /_'o dod 'bod pa dang /_'o dod cher 'bod pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]tsha ba dang /_mnar med pa dang /_chu bur can dang /_shin tu chu bur can dang /_a ha ha dang /_ha ha ba dang /_hu hu ba dang /_ut+pa la lta bu dang /_pad mo lta bu dang /_pad mo chen po lta bu dag gi sems can dmyal bar song nas gang tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba der bab na ni bsil bar 
[\[165b.2\]]gyur/_gang grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba der bab na ni dro bar gyur te/_des sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par slar bde bar gyur pas de dag 'di snyam du sems so/_/kye ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/_'on te gzhan zhig tu skyes snyam mo/_/de dag dad pa 
[\[165b.3\]]bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa der btang ngo /_/de dag sprul pa mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems so/_/kye bdag cag ni tshe 'di las 'chi 'phos pa'am/_gzhan du skyes pa ni ma yin mod kyi sngon chad ma mthong ba'i sems can 'di'i mthus na bdag cag gi sdug 
[\[165b.4\]]bsngal gyi khyad par bde bar gyur to/_/snyam nas/_de dag sprul pa la mngon par sems dad pa las de dag sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi las zad nas gang du bden pa rnams kyi snod du 'gyur ba der lha dang mi'i phyir gyi mtshams len to/_/gang steng gi phyogs su dong ba des 
[\[165b.5\]]ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum dang /_mtshe ma'i dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs ris dang /_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od snang dang /_dge chung gnas dang /_
[\[165b.6\]]tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams 'phel dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che dang /_mi gdung dang /_shin tu snang dang /_gya nom mthong dang /_'og min gnam gyi lha dag gi drung du song nas/_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag 
[\[165b.7\]]med pa'o zhes sgra 'byin cing tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang brjod do/_/'byung ba la ni btsal bar byos/_/sangs rgyas bstan la nan tan gyis/_/'chi bdag sde rnams gzhom pa ni/_/bal glang dag gis rtswa khyim bzhin/_/chos kyi 'dul ba 'di la gang /_/bag yod pa ru 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]su spyod pa/_/skye ba 'khor ba stong pa ste/_/sdug bsngal ba yi mthar byed 'gyur/_/de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam gyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'ong ngo /_/de ste bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa la lung bstan 
[\[166a.2\]]par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ma 'ongs pa la lung bstan par bzhed na ni mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/byol song du skye bar lung bstan 
[\[166a.3\]]par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi rting par mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mir skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni pus mo gnyis su mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal 
[\[166a.4\]]por lung bstan par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas pa'i mthil du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/lhar skye bar lung bstan par bzhed na ni lte bar mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/nyan 
[\[166a.5\]]thos kyi byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed na ni zhal gyi nang du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed na ni mdzod spur mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed na ni gtsug tor gyi nang 
[\[166a.6\]]du mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas 'od de dag bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_rnam pa sna tshogs kha dog stong 
[\[166a.7\]]gis brgyan/_/zhal gyi nang nas mang po 'byung ba dag_/thams cad phyogs su gang gis snang mdzad pa/_/snang byed shar bas ji ltar de bzhin no/_/yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'phyar ba med cing mi dga' dregs spangs pa/_/sangs rgyas skye bo mchog gi rgyur gyur 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]te/_/rgyu ma mchis par dung dkar pad ma'i rtsa/_/mgon po brtan pa rgya mtsho ri bo bzhin/_/rgyu med par ni sangs rgyas bzhad mi mdzad/_/'dzum pa mi ston rgyal ba dgra pham mdzad/_/de tshe nyid kyis rtogs shing bstan pa'i blo/_/nyan pa rgyal dbang las ni thos par 'tshal/_/
[\[166b.2\]]thub pa khyu mchog brtan tshig dam pas ni/_/the tshom skyes pa mchog gis bsal bar mdzod/_/brtan pas gang gis phyir ni 'dzum bstan pa/_/skye bo mang po 'di dag thos par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_/de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo rgyu med rkyen 
[\[166b.3\]]med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis bu mo chos sbyin ma la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun dang nga'i bkas dge slong ma ut+pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par btang ste/_skyabs su 'gro ba 
[\[166b.4\]]gsum nas rim bzhin du rab tu phyung la lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa'i sdom pa yang byin no/_/de ni sang bag mar gtong ste/_de'i phyir skye bo mang po 'dus pa rnams mthong ngam/_btsun pa mthong ngo /_/kun dga' bo bu mo 
[\[166b.5\]]de slar khyim du mi mor gnas pa'i skabs ma yin/_gnas ma yin te/_dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i longs spyod la yongs su spyad pa'i gnas su 'di mi 'gyur gyi 'di ni da phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu thob ste dgra bcom pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro/_/kun 
[\[166b.6\]]dga' bo song ste dge slong ma rnams 'di ltar chos sbyin mas ni lo gnyis kyi bar du chos drug dang rjes su 'brang ba'i chos drug gi bslab pa bslabs zin gyis de da ut+pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par thong la de tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa byin cig par bsgo shig_/btsun pa 
[\[166b.7\]]de bzhin du 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te dge slong ma dag la bsgo ba dang /_dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang ut+pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par bsgos te btang ngo /_/de song nas bu mo khyod ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]tshangs par spyad pa skyed pa'i sdom pa gnang gis da ni khyod bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/ci nas 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa des thos ma thag tu slar mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas rdzu 'phrul bsgrubs so/_/ut+pa la'i kha dog ma song nas bcom ldan 
[\[167a.2\]]'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo song ste/_dge slong ma dag la 'di ltar ngas gnang gis dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis ut+pa la'i kha dog ma phrin par thong ste/_bu mo chos sbyin ma bsnyen par rdzogs par 
[\[167a.3\]]gyis shig ces bsgo shig/_/btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan te dge slong ma dag la bsgo'o/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun sde gnyis ka bsdus te chos sbyin ma khyim de na 'dug bzhin du ut+pa la'i kha 
[\[167a.4\]]dog ma las phrin gyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te ut+pa la'i kha dog ma song ste/_de la khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so zhes bsgo'o/_/'di lta bu'i chos kyang bshad de de thos pas na dge slong ma chos 
[\[167a.5\]]sbyin mas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo dum bu lnga po 'di g.yo ba dang mi g.yo bar shes te/_'dus byas kyi ngo bo thams cad 'jig pa/_ltung ba rnam par 'gyes pa/_rnam par zhigs pa'i chos nyid kyis rab tu bcom ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_dgra bcom pa mngon du byas 
[\[167a.6\]]nas dgra bcom par gyur te khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/_gser dang bong ba 'dra ba/_nam mkha' la lag mthil chags pa med pa de bzhin du mnyam pa'i sems ste'u dang tsan dan du 'dra ba rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/_rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /_
[\[167a.7\]]so sor rig pa rnams thob pa srid pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa dang /_bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs/_dbang po dang nye dbang po dang lhar bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_tshig gis snyan pa rjod par gyur to/_/dgra bcom pa'i dge slong ma zag pa zad pa 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]khyim par khyim na gnas pa'i skabs ma yin gnas ma yin te/_dga' bar bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i longs spyad pa yongs su spyod pa'i gnas ma yin no/_/nam chos sbyin ma dgra bcom pa mngon du byas pa dang de'i tshe pha ma la yab dang yum bdag gis ni dgra bcom pa mngon du bgyis kyis 
[\[167b.2\]]rgyal po'i kun dgar dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du mchi na gnang bar mdzod cig ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag byin pa dang /_chung ma dang gnyis gros byas nas bu mo de ltar na bdag cag la rgyal pos gyod rmas par mi 'gyur ram/_de la rim bzhin du byas te bcom ldan 'das 
[\[167b.3\]]dang lhan cig tu song shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa legs kyis de ltar bgyi'o/_/de nas khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dag khyim du spyan drangs te/_khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra la mdza' bo bu mo chos sbyin ma ni 
[\[167b.4\]]khyim du gnas su mi btub ste/_rab tu 'byung du gdon mi zas tshur shog la/_de nan gyis blang bar gyis shig ces spring ngo /_/khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras kyang yul ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la gsol nas/_mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dang /_skye bo mang po dag 
[\[167b.5\]]sdud pa la zhugs so/_/khyim bdag byin pas de'i nub mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dag sbyar nas/_nang par sngar langs te gdan bting chu bum pa bkang ste bzhag_/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren pas btsun pa bshos kyang lags gdugs tshod 
[\[167b.6\]]la yang bab na bcom ldan 'das da dus la bab par dgongs shig ces dus gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus na sham thabs gsol lhung bzed dang /_chos gos bsnams te/_dge slong mang po dag gis bskor/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun 
[\[167b.7\]]du byas nas khyim bdag byin pa'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs so/_/der phyin pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du stan bting ba la bzhugs so/_/de nas khyim bdag byin pas mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dag gis bskor te/_sangs rgyas dang /_dge 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]slong gi dge 'dun dag bde bar bzhugs par shes nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /_bca' ba bdag nyid kyi lag gis dar te tshim pa dang /_yang dag par bstabs so/_/de'i skabs su khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgras mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_
[\[168a.2\]]gnyen dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_ljongs kyi skye bo mang po dang /_lhan cig bu sa ga bsrung ba dang /_bkra shis dang zhi ba dag byas te bag ma len par chas te khyim bdag byin pa'i sgo drung nyid la 'khod do/_/khyim bdag byin pas sangs rgyas dang 
[\[168a.3\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag nyid kyi lag nas dar te tshim par byas/_yang dag par bstabs nas/_bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/_phyag bcabs lhung bzed blangs par shes nas stan dma' ba zhig bting nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos 
[\[168a.4\]]nyan pa'i phyir mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen du bcas te 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag byin pa mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par bskul/_yang dag par gzengs bstod/_
[\[168a.5\]]yang dag par mgu bar byas so/_/chos kyi gtam rnam grangs du mar yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par gzengs bstod/_mgu bar byas te gdan las bzhengs nas bzhud do/_/dge slong ma chos sbyin ma yang khams gsum gyi gnyen po thob/_mi 'jigs pa thob bo/_/de 
[\[168a.6\]]dag bag mar blang ba'i dus la bab nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i bu sa gas kyang mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer pa dang /_ljongs kyi skye bo mang po dang lhan cig tu der sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa gsol to/_/chos sbyin ma 
[\[168a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'byung bar 'dod pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i bu sa gas 'phral la dpung pa brkyang nas chos sbyin gyi lag pa nas gzung bar bshams pa dang /_chos sbyin ma sems can grangs med pa brgya stong gis mthong bzhin du ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]ma brkyang pa bzhin nam mkha' la 'phur te rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa dang /_de nas khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i mdza' bo dang /_phu nu dang /_gnyen dag dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang grong khyer pa dang /_ljongs kyi skye bo mang po dang /_khyim bdag [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]sgra'i bu 
[\[168b.2\]]sa ga dang /_gzhan yang ltad mo la lhags pa'i sems can dag ngo mtshar cher gyur nas shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/_sring mo 'di 'dra ba'i yon tan mang po 'thob na khyod 'dod chags la spyod pa'i skabs ma yin gnas ma yin te/_bzod par 
[\[168b.3\]]gsol lo zhes smras pa dang /_de nas chos sbyin ma nam mkha' las babs te/_skye bo mang po dag gi mdun du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i chos bshad de sems can mang po brgya stong gis thos nas khyad par cher rtogs te/_kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du 
[\[168b.4\]]byas so/_/kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas so/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos 
[\[168b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/_/'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol la/_chos la 'bab dge 'dun la rab tu bab par bkod do/_/
[\[168b.6\]]de nas dge slong ma chos sbyin gyis thob pa dang /_phun sum tshogs pa rnyed sems can gyi don chen po byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas 
[\[168b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar nga'i bka' thob ste bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i nga'i dge slong ma nyan thos ma chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na dge slong ma chos sbyin ma 'di ni mchog yin no/_/dge slong pha dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/_btsun pa dge slong ma chos sbyin mas las ci zhig bgyis na de khyim na mchis bzhin du phrin pas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos po thob nas de nyid du dgra bcom pa mngon du bgyis nas/_
[\[169a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu gsungs zhes gsol pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma chos sbyin mas las byas shing bsags pas tshogs rnyed pa dang /_rkyen sbyin pa ni chu bo bzhin du nye bar gnas 
[\[169a.3\]]te gdon mi za'o/_/chos sbyin gyis las byas shing bsags pa ni gzhan gyis myong bar mi 'gyur te/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par mi smin/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma 
[\[169a.4\]]yin gyi zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched 'di nyid la dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las byas pa rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/las rnams stor bar mi 'gyur ba/_/bskal pa dag ni brgya lon kyang /_/dus dang 'phrod nas thob pa ni/_/lus can rnams 
[\[169a.5\]]la 'bras bur smin/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba na bskal pa bzang po 'di'i tshe skye dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag nyi shu thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang rkang par ldan pa bde 
[\[169a.6\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer na bzhugs shing drang srong gnas kyi [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshal na bzhugs so/_/de'i dus na 
[\[169a.7\]]yul 'khor mo 'jig na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa des rigs dang mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' yongs su spyod do/_/de la rtse dga' yongs su spyad pa dang /_de dus phyi zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/_de zla ba brgyad dam 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]dgu 'das pa dang /_de las bu mo zhig byung ste de zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig gi bar du btsas pa'i btsas ston chen po rgya cher byas te/_rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas/_de nas lus cher gyur pa de na rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pas de'i pha ma dag gis rab tu 'byung du mi 
[\[169b.2\]]ster ro/_/khyim de ni dge slong ma rgan mo gzhan zhig rigs la ston par byed cing /_de'i khyim du dus dus su 'ong ngo /_/bu mo des dge slong ma rgan mo de la 'phags ma bdag ni legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong ma'i dngos por 
[\[169b.3\]]'tshal na/_bdag gi pha mas mi gnang zhing khyim las phyir 'byung du yang mi ster na/_gnas 'di nyid du rab tu 'byung bar nus sam zhes smras pa dang /_des bu mo bcom ldan 'das la zhus te bya'o zhes smras nas/_bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[169b.4\]]'od srung la zhus pa dang /_de nyid phrin par btang ste/_khyim na 'dug bzhin du rab tu phyung nas dge slong ma'i sdom pa gnang nas dge 'dun sde gnyis kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/_dge slong ma rgan mo des de la chos bshad pa dang /_de khyim na 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom 
[\[169b.5\]]pa mngon du byas so/_/de nas dge slong ma rgan mos bsams pa/_bu mo 'dis khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin gyis rab tu byung ste slob pa'i sdom pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob/_khyim na 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byas pa de thams cad kyang bdag las gyur te/_
[\[169b.6\]]bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi tshe tshangs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i bu khyod skye dgu lo brgya thub pa'i tshe de bzhin 
[\[169b.7\]]gshegs pa bla na med pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la 'di ltar bdag khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin gyis rab tu phyung /_bslab pa'i sdom pa dang /_dge slong ma'i dngos po thob 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]cing khyim na 'dug bzhin du dgra bcom pa mngon du byed pa dang /_ji ltar bdag gi mkhan mo bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya thub pa/_
[\[170a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i rgyal pos chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags par shog shig ces smras so/_/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_dge slong ma rgan mo de ni da ltar gyi dge slong ma chos sbyin ma 'di nyid yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[170a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi drung na 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_smon lam gyi mthus na khyim na 'dug bzhin du phrin pas rab tu byung /_bslab pa'i sdom pa dang /_bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ma'i dngos po yang 'thob/_khyim na 'dug bzhin du des nyon mongs pa 
[\[170a.4\]]thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon du byas/_de bzhin gshegs pas kyang chos kyi gtam smra ba'i nang na mchog tu bsngags so/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag las gcig tu gnag pa ni rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu gnag go/_/dkar ba ni gcig tu dkar ro/_/'dres pa ni 
[\[170a.5\]]gcig tu 'dres pa'o/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag gcig tu gnag pa dang /_'dres pa'i las spongs la gcig tu dkar ba'i las nyid la bsgrub par bya ste/_dge slong dag de lta bur bslab par byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[170a.6\]]de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la yi rangs te mngon par dga'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa/_mdor na/_phyi rol dge slong bzod mi gsol/_/gcig pu 'breg mkhan gyis mi breg_/dbyar mo khang ni glar mi gtang /_/
[\[170a.7\]]pha gus yang ni lus mi phyi/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_dge slong ma gcig gis dge slong pha la klog slob pa dang /_de nas dus phyi zhig na nyes pa zhig byas nas des spyos pa dang /_de dbyar 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]mo khang du song nas 'phres te 'dug go/_/de'i mkhan mos mthong nas gzhon nu ma khyod ci zhig nyes na 'phres te 'dug ces smras pa dang /_des mkhan mo slob dpon gyis spyos na ji ltar bya mi shes so zhes smras so/_/bu de la gzhan ci zhig byar yod/_slob dpon dang /_mkhan 
[\[170b.2\]]po ni bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar zad kyi song la bzod pa gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_des legs kyis de ltar byas bzod pa gsol du 'gro'o zhes zer te dze ta'i tshal du song ste mi snang ba dang /_des de btsal nas ji tsam zhig na de gtsug lag khang gi phyi 
[\[170b.3\]]rol gyi 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa dang /_des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba dang /_dge slong de ma gus par song ngo /_byis pa dag gis mthong nas de dag nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis gzir te/_'phags ma khyod kyi don ci'i phyir khyod kyis bzod pa bya ba bdag cag shes te/_
[\[170b.4\]]des ni ma bzod na tshur shog_/bdag cag gis khyod kyis don bsgrub bo zhes smras pa dang /_de ngo tsha nas cang mi smra bar song ngo /_/de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_gang nyes 
[\[170b.5\]]pa'i dmigs su gyur pa ni dge slong ma la spyos nas bzod pa gsol na yang rim gro mi byed par 'gro ste/_byis pa dag gis kyang phyi phyir mi dge ba gzhan du rtog gis de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong pha la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du bzod pa ma gsol zhing dge slong phas dge slong 
[\[170b.6\]]ma la ma gus pa bzhin du 'gro bar mi bya bar dgongs shing mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byis pa rnams phyi phyir mi dge ba la rtog par 'gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong mas dge slong khros pa la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du bzod pa ma gsol cig_/de lta yang 
[\[170b.7\]]dge slong mas dge slong pha la bzod pa gsol nas ma gus par byas te ma 'gro shig_/dge slong mas dge slong pha la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du gsol lam/_dge slong mas dge slong la bzod pa gsol ba la ma gus par song na gnyis ka la yang 'das pa dang bcas par 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong dag 'breg mkhan gyis skra bregs pa dang /_de nas 'breg mkhan gzhon nur gyur pas dran pa nye bar mi 'jog go/_/des de dag mthong ba dang chags par gyur to/_/rnam pa de lta bur gyur pa dge slong 
[\[171a.2\]]dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sems ni rgod pa ste/_dran pa nye bar ma gzhag pas na bslus par 'gyur/_bud med ni phal cher 'dod chags rab tu che ste/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag 
[\[171a.3\]]gcig pu 'breg mkhan gyi drung du skra 'breg par ma byed par de'i drung du dge slong ma gzhan zhig zhog la de ste 'breg mkhan de chags par gyur na de'i drung na dge slong ma 'dug pas 'di skad smros shig_/bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong ma 'di'i lus ni rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor/_'di ni rgyan med la 
[\[171a.4\]]lus dri ma can/_'di ni rab tu byung ba yin gyis de lta bu'i sems zlog shig sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/_de ste dge slong ma chags par gyur na yang 'di skad du smros shig_/phu nu mo khyim pa'i las ni khyod kyis spangs na ci khyod kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe dge 'dun 
[\[171a.5\]]sde gnyis la khyod kyis khas blangs pa de soms shig_/'dod pa ni bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal mang la nyes pa'i dmigs mang bar ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gyis/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa spangs la rab tu byung ba'i sems nye bar zhog shig_/des de la 
[\[171a.6\]]de skad du smras na ni legs/_de ste ma smras na drung na 'dug pa'i dge slong ma la 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mo khyim bdag gzhan zhig dad par byas te dbyar mo khang rtsig tu bcug nas de na dge slong ma mang zhig 
[\[171a.7\]]gnas par gyur to/_/ji tsam zhig na lho phyogs nas tshong pa lnga brgya tsam zhig zong khyer te mnyan du yod par lhags so/_/tshong pa de dag nor gzhag pa'i khang pa glas btsal ba dang ma rnyed de/_de nas de dag gis mnyan du yod par kun du btsal kyang ma rnyed de/_tshong dus dang srang dang 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]lam gyi bzhi mdor nor rnams bsogs te 'khod na 'brug kyang zer nyi ma yang nub tu nye nas de'i tshe char pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig bab pa dang /_de dag lag pas 'gram pa la brten nas rab tu sems shing 'khod pa dang /_sbom dga' mos mthong ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]char 
[\[171b.2\]]pa yang bab na srang du 'khod de ci byed nor rnams gnas zhig tu gzud na ci nyes/_de dag gis 'phags ma bdag cag gis mnyan du yod par khyab par btsal te 'jig rten pa mi srun pas khang pa glar yang ma rnyed na ji ltar bgyi zhes smras pa dang /_des bu rnams mtshan mo'i tshe 
[\[171b.3\]]ci 'dra ba shes par byos la gla yang lhag par byin te khyim tshol cig_/'di ni zong du ma rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_char pas gsher na su zhig nyo ba yod ces smras pa dang /_des 'phags ma 'jig rten 'di dag mi srun te/_de dag la bdag cag gis khyim gyi gla nyi rim du 
[\[171b.4\]]byin kyang su yang ma ster to/_/bdag gi las byung ba lta ste/_ji lta bu yang rung ste/_zhag gcig lon nas gzhan du 'dong ngo zhes byas pa dang /_des smras pa/_bu de ltar khang pa'i gla lhag par byin la bdag gi dbyar mo khang gi nang du 'khod cig_/de dag gis 'phags 
[\[171b.5\]]ma legs kyis des mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /_de nas sbom dga' mos dge slong ma dag nub mo dbyar mo khang nas bskrad de dbyar mo khang de tshong pa de dag la glar btang ngo /_/dge slong ma de dag char pa bab nas chos gos gsher bzhin du dbyar mo khang gzhan du song ngo /_/
[\[171b.6\]]de'i dge slong ma dag gis che zhe 'u bu cag nub mo chos gos gsher bzhin du 'dir ci la 'ongs zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis zhib tu smras so/_/don chung ngu ma'i dge slong ma dag gis 'phya zhing smod la ngan du 'dzer ba ni sbyin bdag gis dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du byas pa'i 
[\[171b.7\]]khang pa glar btang ba ga la rigs/_de lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma dag 'phya ba ni gnas te/_de bas na dge slong ma dag dbyar mo khang glar ma btang 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]zhig/_dge slong mas dbyar mo khang glar btang na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan du yod pa na ste/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mos byis pa gzhon nu dag lus 'khru ba'i nang du zhugs te/_so phag gis lus drud cing khrus byas pa dang /_
[\[172a.2\]]de dag chags par gyur te kun tu lta zhing gtam du 'dzer ba ni kye ltos shig_/dge sbyong mgo reg ma pha bi gyad chen po go char bgos pa dang 'dra ba zhig lus pha gus phyi zhing phyis nas 'phyi zhing 'dug go/_/de dag de la 'phya bar gyur to/_/de 'phya ba dang de la de dag rab tu dgod de/_de 
[\[172a.3\]]lta bur gyur pa dge slong dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa byis pa gzhon nu de dag ni 'phya ba gnas yin te/_mi rigs pa'i las byas pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag sbom dga' mos mi mdzes shing las 
[\[172a.4\]]ngan pa byas te byis pa gzhon nu de dag 'phya ba'i gnas yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag lus pha gus ma phyi shig_/dge slong ma dag gis lus pha gus phyis na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro//_//mdor na/_lus la pha gus phyi mi bya/_/rdo leb dag kyang de bzhin te/_/
[\[172a.5\]]gos dkris dang ni khu tshur gyis/_/ci dang cis kyang mi phyi'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag lus pha gus ma phyi shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rdo leb 
[\[172a.6\]]kyis phyis te de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo leb kyis ma phyi shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis gos dkris pas phyis so/_/de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gos dkris pas ma phyi shig ces 
[\[172a.7\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag khu tshur gyis phyis nas de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis khu tshur gyis ma phyi shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag gis ci dang cis kyang phyis pa dang /_de yang nyes pa'i dmigs su gyur nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lag pa gcig pu ma gtogs par gzhan ci dang cis kyang rung ste/_ma phyi shig 'phyi na 'das pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/'dul ba phra mo'i dngos po'i sgo bdun pa rdzogs so//_//bsdus pa'i mdo sde/_dge slong ma yi 
[\[172b.2\]]bkur sti bri/_/bsgo ba dang ni lcags kyi snod/_/bud med gnyis kyis blta ba dang /_/de bzhin nag po u di ka//_//mdor na/_bsti stang med dang kun ma yin/_/lus bstan pa ni ma gtogs so/_/bkyigs pa las kyang mi sbyin pa/_/gso sbyong dang ni tshul nas byung /_/sangs 
[\[172b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa gre las skyes dus las 'das pa de'i tshe dge slong ma bcu gnyis sdes de'i rus pa rnams bsdus nas bkur sti chen pos sa phyogs yangs par mchod rten brtsigs te/_
[\[172b.4\]]de la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag kyang btags/_dri dang me tog gis brgyan te snyan par smra ba'i dge slong ma gnyis kyang bskos nas der nyin gcig bzhin du sa dang /_chu dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog dag 'jog par byed do/_/de nas dge slong gang dag 
[\[172b.5\]]yul gzhan nas 'ongs pa de dag la lag pa bkru ba byin te/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal bar byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa chu 'thung 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing mnyan yod du phyin to/_/
[\[172b.6\]]dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma dgongs par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas des mchod rten de rgyang ring po nas mthong ba dang /_'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi skra dang /_sen mo'i mchod rten sar pa yin pas song la phyag bya'o snyam du bsams te/_de dag der song ba dang /_dge 
[\[172b.7\]]slong ma de gnyis kyis de dag la lag pa dang /_rkang pa bkrus pa'i sa dang chu dag byin no/_/de nas me tog dang /_bdug pa byin pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag byas so/_/de la 'khor lnga brgya dang phyag byas nas song ngo /_/mchod 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]rten de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na tshe dang ldan ma ut+pa la'i mdog shing drung zhig na nyin par gnas pa'i phyir 'dug pa des de dag mthong nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa chu 'thung khyed kyis su'i mchod rten la phyag bgyis pa dgongs shig_/des bsams pa 
[\[173a.2\]]ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan ma ut+pa la'i mdog can 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa chu 'thung khyod kyis su'i mchod rten la phyag bgyis pa dgongs shig ces smras snyam nas des smras pa/_re zhig bsam par bya'o/_/re zhig sems pa la zhugs pa na dge slong gre las skyes kyi rus 
[\[173a.3\]]pa'i mchod rten yin par mthong nas de rgyud zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pas slar log ste/_tshe dang ldan ma ut+pa la'i mdog can la smras pa/_bstan pa la chu bur byung na khyod 'di na 'dug bzhin du yal bar bor ro zhes byas pa dang /_de cang mi 
[\[173a.4\]]zer bar 'dug go/_/des slob ma dang nye gnas de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa la sdug pa dang phangs par byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis de'i phyir rus pa dang rus gong gi phung po 'di las so phag re re phyung la drel cig_/de 'khor mang ba yin pas de dag gis 
[\[173a.5\]]rus pa dang /_rus gong gi phung po las so phag re re phyung ste bor nas skad cig nyid la bshig go/_/dge slong ma de gnyis ngus nas rings pa rings par dbyar mo khang du song ste dge slong ma rnams la smras pa dang /_dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dang /_de la yid gzhol 
[\[173a.6\]]zhing mdza' ba 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gzhan dag gis thos nas/_bdag cag gi ming po deng gdod shi ba lta zhes ngu zhing 'khod pa las sbom dga' mos smras pa/_phu nu mo dag de la su zhig gis bstan/_de dag gis smras pa/_de ni glo bur du 'ongs pas snying nas mi shes 
[\[173a.7\]]kyi 'phags ma ut+pa la'i mdog can phyogs de na 'dug pa des de dag la smras yang dag go/_/sbom dga' mos smras pa/_phu nu mo dag de ni 'breg mkhan las rab tu byung ba yin la/_de yang de rang bzhin nyams pa yin pas de'i las yin pa bdag gis ni smras pa tsam kho nas 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]shes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor sun 'byin par byed pa 'khor gyi nang du gzhag par mi bya'o zhes legs par gsungs pa yin pas/_de'i phyir de la bsam du ci yod kyis tshur shog 'dong bar bya'o/_/de dag khro bas kun nas dkris pa de dag de gsad pa'i phyir 
[\[173b.2\]]mtshon cha dang khab dang /_seng ldeng gi phur bu dag blangs nas dong ngo /_/des de dag rgyang ring po nas rings pa rings par 'ong ba mthong nas bsams pa/_de dag shugs de lta bus 'ong ba las na gdon mi za bar de dag bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang de dag 
[\[173b.3\]]bsam pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'ong ba bsam par bya'o snyam nas re zhig bsam pa la zhugs pa na gsad pa'i bsam pa can du mthong nas des snam sbyar byin gyis brlabs te 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de dag gis de'i snam sbyar la mtshon cha 
[\[173b.4\]]dang /_khab dang /_seng ldeng gi phur bu dag gis bsnun pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis shi ba bzhin du dbugs phyi nang du mi rgyu bar 'dug go/_/de dag gis smras pa/_phu nu mo spyod pa ngan pas 'tsho ba 'di bsad pas sha lon zin gyis tshur shog 'dong ngo zhes smras nas 
[\[173b.5\]]dong ngo /_/de dag dong ba dang /_tshe dang ldan ma ut+pa la'i mdog can ting nge 'dzin de las langs pa dang /_re zhig na de dag gis bdag la gnod pa byas pa mthong ngo /_/de gnas skabs de bzhin du gtsug lag khang du song ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas de dag 
[\[173b.6\]]gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan ma ut+pa la'i mdog can ci'i phyir 'di ltar gyur/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ma rnams kyis bdag de'u bsad pa la gzigs su gsol/_de dag gis smras pa/_ci'i phyir des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyas par smras pa dang /_
[\[173b.7\]]don nyung ba'i dge slong rnams khros nas gnas dang gnas dag na btsun pa dag dge slong ma ni shin tu khros par gyur kyang de la phyag mi bya ba tsam du bya'i 'di ltar tshe dang ldan ma ut+pa la'i mdog can gsad par byas pa ni mtshar gyi gzu lums byed do zhes 'phya bar byed do/_/de la gcig 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]gis smras pa/_kye shes ldan dag de ltar der zad nas 'di lta ji ltar bsgrub par dpyad par bya'o/_/gcig gis smras pa/_bsgrub tu ci yod bcom ldan 'das la gsol du zad mod/_gcig gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol ci dgos/_bdag 
[\[174a.2\]]cag 'dus la ci ltar dge slong ma 'ga' yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ong bar mi gzhug par khrims su bya'o/_/de dag 'dus nas dge slong ma rnams gtsug lag khang du 'ong du ma gzhug par de lta bur khrims su byas so/_/dge slong ma rnams gtsug lag khang du 'ong du mi gzhug 
[\[174a.3\]]par brtsams pa dang bkur sti bri bar gyur to/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI'i kun du spyod pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mngon par phyag 'tshal du 'ong ba yin pa las/_de la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_gau ta mI dge slong gi dge 
[\[174a.4\]]'dun gyis dge slong ma rnams gtsug lag khang du mi 'jug par khrims su byas kyis ma 'gro bar sdod cig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa dag de dag gis nongs pa bgyis pa bzhin du bdag gis kyang bgyis sam ci/_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_dge 'dun rnams de ltar 
[\[174a.5\]]bzhed pa la kho bo cag gis byar ci yod/_de slar log nas dbyar khang du song ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mkhyen bzhin du 'dri bar mdzad pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo nad kyis 
[\[174a.6\]]thebs sam ci btsun pa ma lags so/_/'o na ci'i phyir mi 'ong /_des bcom ldan 'das la skabs de dag rgyas par gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis khrims su byas pa thog tu bab po/_/'on kyang 
[\[174a.7\]]dge slong ma rnams ni dge slong rnams la rag lus pa mang ba yin zhing /_gal te de dag 'ong du ma bcug na bkur sti med par 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir dge slong mas dge slong sgo ba la dris te 'ong du bcug la gdams ngag mi sbyin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mas dge slong 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]sgo ba la dris nas gtsug lag khang du 'ong du bcug la gdams ngag ni bkyig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis ji skad du dris nas nang du 'jug par mi shes pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong mas gtsug lag khang 
[\[174b.2\]]du mi 'jug par 'di skad ces 'phags pa dag bdag cag gtsug lag khang du 'jug gis mkhyen par mdzod cig ces smros shig_/dge slong gis kyang sring mo dag 'khon can mtshon cha dang khab dag 'chang ba ma yin nam zhes dris shig_/dge slong mas ma dris par zhugs na/_
[\[174b.3\]]'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong gis ma smras na yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gdams ngag bkyig par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_drug sde rnams kyis ma bkyigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 
[\[174b.4\]]ma nyes pa dang bcas pa la dge slong gi dge 'dun mi bzod bzhin du dge slong gis gdams ngag brjod par mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma nyes pa dang bcas pa la dge slong gi dge 'dun mi bzod bzhin du dge slong gis gdams ngag rjod par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[174b.5\]]gdams ngag la ji lta ba bzhin du gso sbyong dang dgag dbye la yang de bzhin no//_//sdom la/_dge slong mas ni bzod gsol dang /_/dgag dbye las ni gso sbyong min/_/gcig la gcig kyang bzod pa gsol/_/gnyis ni rgan rims ji bzhin no/_/sangs 
[\[174b.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/dge slong ma gzhan zhig dge slong zhig las klog par byed do/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de la nyes pa zhig byung nas des de spyos pa dang /_de dbyar khang 
[\[174b.7\]]du song nas glos phab ste 'dug go/_/de nas mkhan mos mthong nas smras pa/_gzhon nu ma khyod ci'i phyir glos phab ste 'dug_/des smras pa mkhan mo slob dpon gyis bdag la spyos na ci ltar bgyi ba ma 'tshal to/_/bu mo mkhan mo dang slob dpon ni bstan pa 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]gnas par bya ba'i phyir gshe ba yin pas bzod pa gsol du zad mod/_de la ci zhig shes par byar yod/_legs kyis bzod par gsol du mchi'o/_/de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas dge slong de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs pa dang /_dge 
[\[175a.2\]]slong des de la 'gongs te song ngo /_/dge slong ma de spobs pa med par gyur nas dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du 'ongs pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyis smras pa/_phu nu mo khyod kyis slob dpon la bzod pa gsol na de bzod par gyur tam/_des smras pa/_de lta bu ni 
[\[175a.3\]]nams kyang slob dpon du ma gyur cig_/smras pa/_ci nyes des ji ltar gyur pa rnams bsnyad pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams phu nu mo dag bu mo dag bud med la brnyas pa'i phyir re zhig bzod pa gsol yang ji ltar bzod pa mi byed pa dang /_gnyis su na rkang pa la 
[\[175a.4\]]phyag byas kyang 'gongs te/_'gro bar byed pa la ltos zhes 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong pha la smras so/_/dge slong phas kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma rnams 'phya ba ni thog 
[\[175a.5\]]tu bab po/_/de'i phyir dge slong gi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol ba na 'gongs te 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong gi rkang pa la dge slong mas phyag 'tshal nas bzod pa gsol ba na 'gongs te 'gro bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong 
[\[175a.6\]]mas mod kho na la bzod pa mi gsol to/_/'on kyang bags kyis bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bags kyis bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_ji ltar bags kyis bya ba mi shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dang por dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am 
[\[175a.7\]]dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gzhan gyis mang du sbyang ba byas la/_de mthun par byed na de'i 'og tu bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dogs pa'i gnas gsum gyis dgag dbye bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dbyar gnas pa'i dge slong gis dge 'dun la gnas gsum gyis dgag dbye byas nas yang gso sbyong byed do/_/de las kha cig gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir gso 
[\[175b.2\]]sbyong bya ba ji lta bar dgag dbye yang de lta bu yin par bdag gis mthong ngo /_/de'i phyir gso sbyong gang yin pa de ni dgag dbye yang yin no/_/gzhan dag gis smras pa/_gso sbyong yang gzhan la dgag dbye yang gzhan yin no zhes bya ba'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la gsol 
[\[175b.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag gso sbyong yang gzhan la/_dgag dbye yang gzhan pa bden mod kyi dgag dbye las gso sbyong gzhan du byar med pas de'i phyir dge slong dgag dbye byas nas gso sbyong bya mi dgos so/_/'di ltar rnam par 
[\[175b.4\]]dag pa'i phyir gso sbyong bya ba yin la dgag dbye yang thams cad du rnam par dag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/dge slong dag 'khon yod pas sems mnyam par 'jog pa btang ste gcig la gcig glags tshol zhing dgag dbye byed pa'i tshe dge 
[\[175b.5\]]'dun gyi nang du zhugs nas/_de dag dge 'dun gyi nang der gcig la gcig 'gran byed cing tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_lta ba nyams pa dang /_cho ga nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa dag gleng bar byed cing de dag gzhan du gtam 'dres pa dang /_phebs par smra ba 
[\[175b.6\]]dang /_smon 'grin dang /_grogs bshes dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gcig pa dang /_mkhan po gcig pa rnams phyogs phyogs su chad nas 'dug go/_/de'i tshe dge 'dun gyi dbyen chen por gyur nas dge 'dun ca co 'don/_dge 'dun 
[\[175b.7\]]gnyis su gyur/_dge 'dun mi mthun par gyur pa na de dag la gzu bo byed pa rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod mi dgos kyis rab tu byung ba'i sems so sor thob par gyis shig ces 'chugs par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag phyogs gang na dge slong 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]rnams 'khod pa na 'thab par byed/_mtshang 'dru bar byed/_'gyed par byed/_rtsod par byed/_'thab krol byed pa'i phyogs der ni mang du nyan par yang nga mi 'dod na 'gro zhing gnas pa lta ci smos te/_der ni nga mi 'gro'o/_/dge slong dag gang na chos 
[\[176a.2\]]gsum po rnam par spangs shing chos gsum po mang du byed pa ste/_chos gsum po rnam par spangs pa gang zhe na/_ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spangs pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spangs pa dang /_gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam 
[\[176a.3\]]par spangs te/_chos gsum po rnam par spangs pa dang /_chos gsum po mang du byed pa gang zhe na/_chags pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du byed pa dang /_zhe sdang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du byed pa dang /_gti mug mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du byed pa ste/_chos gsum po 'di dag mang du 
[\[176a.4\]]byed pa dang /_phyogs gang na dge slong rnams gnas shing 'thab par byed/_mtshang 'dru bar byed/_'gyed par byed/_rtsod par byed/_'thab krol byed pa dang /_dge slong dag de na chos gsum po 'di dag rnam par spangs shing chos gsum po 'di dag mang du byed pa dang /_phyogs 
[\[176a.5\]]gang na dge slong rnams gnas shing 'thab par byed/_mtshang 'dru bar byed/_'gyed par byed/_rtsod par byed/_'thab krol byed pa dang /_dge slong dag de na chos gsum po rnam par spangs shing chos gsum po mang du byed pa ste/_chos gsum po rnam par spangs pa gang zhe na/_
[\[176a.6\]]ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spangs pa dang /_zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spangs pa dang /_gti mug med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spangs pa ste/_chos gsum po 'di dag rnam par spangs pa dang /_dge slong dag phyogs gang na dge slong dag rnam 
[\[176a.7\]]par gnas shing 'thab par byed/_mtshang 'dru bar byed 'gyed par byed rtsod par byed/_'thab krol byed cing dge slong dag de na chos gsum po rnam par spangs nas chos gsum po mang du byed pa ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_chags pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du byed pa dang /_zhe sdang 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du byed pa dang /_gti mug mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du byed pa ste/_chos gsum po 'di dag mang du byed pa dang /_dge slong dag phyogs gang na dge slong rnams gnas shing 'thab par byed/_mtshang 'dru bar byed/_'gyed par byed/_rtsod par byed/_'thab krol bar 
[\[176b.2\]]byed pa dang /_dge slong dag de na chos gsum po rnam par spangs shing chos gsum mang du byed pa der ni nga thos par yang mi 'dod na 'gro zhing gnas pa lta ci smos te/_nga der mi 'gro zhes gsungs pas tshe dang ldan pa dag rtsod mi dgos kyis rab tu byung ba'i sems so sor thob par gyis 
[\[176b.3\]]shig ces bcug pa na/_de dag kun nas dkris pa phyir 'phel bar gyur nas ldog tu ma btub pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas shes ldan dag dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni dgag dbye byas kyang rab tu byung ba'i sems so sor ma thob ste/_rgyun kho nar 'thab 
[\[176b.4\]]mo byed do zhes 'phya bar byed smod par byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag 'phya bar byed pa ni thog tu bab po/_/de'i 
[\[176b.5\]]phyir dge slong dag dge slong 'khon can rnams kyis dgag dbye mi bya'o/_/'on kyang bzod pa gsol nas dgag dbye bya'o/_/de dag gis gang gi nyin par dgag dbye byed pa'i nyin par bzod pa gsol kyang /_kun nas dkris pa phyir 'phel zhing de'i tshe rang gi sems so sor 
[\[176b.6\]]thob par mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de nyid kyi nyin par gzod pa gsol bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang zhag bdun nam brgyad na dgag dbye byed par 'gyur ba na bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun nam brgyad na 
[\[176b.7\]]dgag dbye byed par 'gyur ba'i tshe bzod pa gsol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_'di ltar de dag thams cad kyis bzod pa gsol lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thams cad kyis bzod pa gsol bar mi bya'o/_/'on kyang mi mthun pa rnams 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]kyis bzod pa gsol lo/_/gzhan dag gis ni gcig la gcig yang dag par dga' bar byos la dgag dbye gyis shig_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis lo lnga pa dang /_gtsug phud kyi dus ston chen po bya'o zhes bka' 
[\[177a.2\]]stsal pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can rnams phan tshun 'gran cing byed do/_/de'i tshe dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams kyi 'dus pa chen por gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug shig ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong ma rnams 
[\[177a.3\]]rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug pa na ca co 'don pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gnyis gsum tsam zhig rgan rims ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[177a.4\]]'khod par bya'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni 'khor ji lta ba dang /_smon 'grin ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod cig/_//sdom la/_sgo yi drung na 'khod pa dang /_/gnyis kyis gso sbyong lung nod dang /_/dge slong ma ni mkhas gyur kyang /_/gcig pus gso sbyong mi mnod pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[177a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis thun mong gi las ma gtogs par dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams kyi las so sor gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge 
[\[177a.6\]]slong ma thams cad 'dus nas gso sbyong la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs nas gso sbyong byed de dge slong rnams dang /_de dag rnams lhan cig tu sgo khang na gso sbyong byed pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams de la ltad mo lta zhing 'dug pa'i skabs de gsan nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[177a.7\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams lhan cig tu sgo khang du gso sbyong mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams lhan cig tu sgo khang du gso sbyong mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong rnams nang du zhugs te de dag dang lhan 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]cig tu gso sbyong byed pa dang /_de dang de dag lhan cig tu 'du 'dzi'i gtam zer zhing /_yun ring du 'dug par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams 
[\[177b.2\]]lhan cig gtsug lag khang du gso sbyong ma byed cig_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams lhan cig tu gtsug lag khang du gso sbyong ma byed cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong ma rnams gso sbyong la gtsug lag khang du phyis mi 'ong bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[177b.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_de'i phyir dge slong yang lam gyi phyed du song la dge slong ma yang lam gyi phyed du song ste/_der de dag lhan cig tu gso sbyong byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong yang lam gyi phyed du song la/_dge slong ma la yang lam gyi phyed du song ste/_der de dag dang lhan 
[\[177b.4\]]cig tu gso sbyong byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de dag de bzhin du gtam byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_re zhig na bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams lam der song ba dang /_de dag gis dge slong ma rnams dang lhan cig de dag gso sbyong byed pa mthong ngo /_/de nas de dag 
[\[177b.5\]]yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pas rtog cing gcig la gcig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag dge slong ma mgo reg 'di dag dang /_dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ci dag smra/_gcig gis smras pa/_shes ldan dag de dag gis khyim du gsang ste/_gsang gtam 
[\[177b.6\]]ci byas pa de dag bdag cag gis thos pas 'di dag dgon par song ste/_'ongs nas gsang ba ci yod pa smrar zad mod/_gzhan ci smrar yod/_'di dag gis kyang rgyal po la smras pas bdag cag rgyal pos chad pas cung zad ci bcad pa de thams cad ni dge slong mgo reg 
[\[177b.7\]]'di dag gis ma lan grang zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma rnams kyi lam gyi phyed du gso sbyong mi bya'o/_/de lta mod kyi gso sbyong len 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]pa'i dge slong ma gnyis gtang bar bya'o/_/de dag gis zla ba phyed cing song la yongs su dag pa brjod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gso sbyong len pa'i dge slong ma gnyis gtang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong ma spobs pa med pa dag btang ste/_de 
[\[178a.2\]]dag bag khums nas yongs su dag pa brjod ma nus pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa spobs pa can la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/spobs pa can gnyis med nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[178a.3\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_spobs pa can gcig la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/de dag gtsug lag khang du 'ongs par gyur pa dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gang la brjod pa de dag gis ma shes nas/_de dag de nyid nas log ste dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis gso 
[\[178a.4\]]sbyong ma byas pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gcig la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_gan du 'ongs nas de la brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis dge 
[\[178a.5\]]slong gcig la gsol ba btab pa de dag gis de ma shes te/_de bzhin du nyes dmigs su gyur pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong gang la gsol ba btab par gyur pa des nan tan gyis sgo khang du 'dug par bya'o/_/de dag gis song ste/_de 
[\[178a.6\]]la brjod par bya'o/_/des kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la brjod par bya'o/_/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang ston pa'i dge slong gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar bya'o/_/des kyang dge slong ma rnams la gdams ngag sbyin par bya'o//_//sdom ni/_mi 
[\[178a.7\]]'bros par ni bsgo ba dang /_ming rus dag ni dri ba dang /_/zhwa dang lhung bzed kha g.yogs dang /_/phreng ba rgyud pa dge slong ma'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/bcom 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis gsol ba btab pa'i dge slong gang yin pa'i mdun du dge slong ma de dag yongs su dag pa rjod cig ces bka' stsal nas/_gsol ba btab pa'i dge slong de sgo khang na sdod do/_/ji tsam na dge slong ma dag de'i drung du nye bar 'ong bar brtsams pa dang /_des ma 
[\[178b.2\]]reg ma reg shig ces smras nas 'bros par brtsams so/_/de dag gis de'i rjes su skad cig tsam zhig 'brangs te/_slar log nas dge slong ma'i dbyar mo khang du 'ongs te/_dge slong ma rnams kyis de bzhin du gso sbyong ma byas pa'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge 
[\[178b.3\]]slong rnams la smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gsol ba btab pa'i dge slong gis de kho na bzhin du ma 'bros par sring mo ma reg par 'dug shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/_/dge slong gis dge slong ma de 
[\[178b.4\]]dag la ma bsgo bar de kho na bzhin du ring du bros na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma la gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i dge slong la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/des kyang nan tan gyis bsdad par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/ji tsam na gzhan 
[\[178b.5\]]zhig la gsol ba btab pa de myur bar sgo khang du ma song ba dang /_der 'tsho ba pa zhig dgos pa zhig gi phyir 'ongs te sgo khang na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa la rtog cing 'dug go/_/dge slong ma de dag gis bsams pa/_'di ni bdag cag gi gdams ngag 'bogs 
[\[178b.6\]]pa yin no snyam ste de dag de'i rkang pa la gtugs te 'dug nas smras pa/_'phags pa dgongs su gsol des bsams pa re zhig dge sbyong mgo reg ma 'di dag ci smra ba lta'o snyam ste cang ma smras pa dang /_de dag gis yang smras pa/_'phags pa dgongs su gsol/_rgyal 
[\[178b.7\]]po'i kun dga' ra ba'i dge slong ma'i dge 'dun ma rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]reg par gnas sam zhes zhu zhing gso sbyong gis yongs su dag pa yang brjod par bya'o/_/des ji skad brjod par bya ba ma shes nas cang ma smras so/_/de dag gis smras pa/_kye ma 'phags pa thabs yin no zhes kyang mi gsung ngam/_gyi na mjal to zhes 
[\[179a.2\]]smras nas song ngo /_/dge slong ma de dag kyang dbyar khang du 'ongs so/_/gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i dge slong de yang phyi zhig na sgo khang du 'ongs te yud tsam zhig dus su bsdad nas song ngo /_/ji tsam na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis gsol ba 'ba' zhig byas te dge slong 
[\[179a.3\]]dge skos byed pas dge slong rnams la smras pa/_dge slong ma rnams kyis yongs su dag pa sus blangs/_dge slong 'gas kyang bdag gis shes ma smras so/_/dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa/_gdon mi za bar dge slong ma dag su yang ma 'ongs la gang gis kyang yongs su 
[\[179a.4\]]dag pa ma blangs so/_/de dag gis dge slong gzhan la yang gsol ba ma btab par dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon pa bton te dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong mdzad do/_/ji tsam na gso sbyong phyi ma'i tshe yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong ma dag 'ongs na lung 
[\[179a.5\]]'bogs pa mi snang nas de dag gis ring zhig bsdad de dbyar khang du 'ongs so/_/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang gso sbyong ma byas so/_/ji tsam na phyi de nyin par dge slong ma thams cad 'dus te lhags nas smras pa/_ci'i slad du 'phags pa dge 'dun gyis bdag cag gis 
[\[179a.6\]]lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong gsol ba mi gdab/_dge slong dag gis smras pa/_sring mo dag 'das pa'i gso sbyong de'i tshe ston pa'i dge slong gang la khyed rnams gang gis yongs su dag pa brjod/_yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong ma dag gis smras pa/_kha dog ni 'di lta bu 
[\[179a.7\]]bong tshod ni 'di tsam pa'i 'phags pa zhig sgo khang na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rtog cing 'dug par gyur pa de la bdag cag gis yongs su dag pa brjod do/_/dge slong de dag gis 'tsho ba pa yod pa yin par mtshan ma las shes te smras pa/_de ni dge slong ma yin mod kyi 'tsho ba pa 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]gang 'dug pa de kho na la khyod kyis brjod do zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma'i gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i dge slong de'i ming ma dris pas yin no/_/de lta bas 
[\[179b.2\]]na dge slong ma'i gdams ngag 'bogs pa de'i ming dri bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_dge slong dag la dge slong ma de dag gis smras pa la ltung ba med do/_/de lta bas na yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong ma dag gis gdams ngag 'bogs pa'i dge slong de'i ming dri bar bya'o/_/
[\[179b.3\]]bdag cag gi lung 'bogs pa'i slob dpon gyi ming ci zhes ma dris par smras na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su dag pa len pa'i dge slong ma dag gis lung 'bogs pa'i dge slong de'i ming dri bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_de dag gis yang lung 
[\[179b.4\]]'bogs pa'i dge slong de ming shes bzhin du yang dris pa de'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de dag gis de'i ming shes na de dag gis dri bar mi bya'o/_/de dag gis mi shes na dri bar bya'o/_/gleng 
[\[179b.5\]]gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo gau ta mI na zhing 'dug pa de'i drung du dge slong ma rnams 'ongs nas dris pa/_'phags ma ji lta zhing bzhugs/_des smras pa/_bu mo bdag bro 'tshal lo/_/de rnams kyis smras pa/_'phags ma khyod kyis ci zhig 
[\[179b.6\]]bcangs/_des smras pa/_bu mo bdag sngon khyim pa mo'i tshe khyim gyi nang na gnas shing zhwa bcangs so/_/'phags ma da ltar ci'i slad du mi bcang /_bu mo da ltar bdag rab tu byung ste bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang na ji ltar bcang bar bya zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong 
[\[179b.7\]]ma rnams kyis dge slong la bzlas so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong ma dag gis dbyar khang du zhwa bcang bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab na'o/_/rgyal po'i 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]khab kyi bram ze slong mo pa gzhan zhig 'khyam zhing khyim gzhan zhig tu zhugs nas smras pa/_bde legs su gyur cig_/slong mo byin cig ces smras pa dang /_khyim bdag mos smras pa bram ze cung zad kyang med kyis song shig ces byas pa dang /_de phyir byung 
[\[180a.2\]]ste song ngo /_/skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI yang khyim der bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/bram ze des bsams pa/_dge sbyong mgo reg ma 'di yang zhugs na re zhig 'di la yang ma ster ram/_bdag gcig pu la yin blta bar bya'o snyam ste/_de de la skabs tshol zhing 
[\[180a.3\]]yud tsam zhig de na sdod do/_/des sangs rgyas kyi yum gshegs so zhes rings pa rings par langs nas stan bting ste rab tu dga' nas song ste gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo/_/bram ze de ser sna dang mi bzod pa skyes nas 
[\[180a.4\]]song ste smras pa/_'phags ma des re zhig lhung bzed du phun sum tshogs pa ci mchis blta'o/_/de yang drang bas des nye bar bstan to/_/bram zes lhung bzed der mchil ma blugs so/_/skye dgu'i bdag mo gau ta mIs smras pa/_bu ci'i phyir khyod kyis bsod snyoms 
[\[180a.5\]]ma rung bar bya/_gal te khyod kyis gsol ba btab par gyur na ngas de bzhin du byin par gyur pa zhig_/bram ze de spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa de'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la bzlas so/_/dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/
[\[180a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_bud med kyi rang bzhin la ni skyes pa phal pa gzhan yang 'tshe ste/_ji ltar skyes bu bram ze gti mug des kyang 'di bzhin du bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed do/_/de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kha g.yogs bcang bar 
[\[180a.7\]]bya bar mkhyen nas gsungs pa/_dge slong dag bud med kyi rang bzhin la ni skyes pa phal pa gzhan yang 'tshe ste/_skyes bu bram ze gti mug des kyang 'di bzhin du bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bskyed do/_/de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kyi 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]kha g.yogs bcang bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_dge slong ma dag gis lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs ci 'dra ba de ma shes te/_de'i skabs dge slong dag la bzlas so/_/dge 
[\[180b.2\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lhung bzed kyi kha g.yogs ni lhung bzed kyi snod de der lhung bzed bcug nas dge slong ma dag bsod snyoms la 'gro bar bya'o/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/shar phyogs kyi mi mang po rnams 
[\[180b.3\]]skyed mos tshal na dga'o/_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston la bab ste de rnams gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba khyer te skyed mos tshal du song ngo /_/de rnams kyis chung ma dag la me tog gi phreng ba rgyus la skur cig ces spring ba dang /_de rnams kyis 
[\[180b.4\]]ra ba na me tog bzang po sna tshogs pa dag skyes te/_de dag kyang de rnams kyis spring ngo snyam nas rings pa rings par me tog gi ra ba dag nas me tog btus na rgyud ma shes so/_/de dag gis me tog phreng rgyud ma la me tog brgyus tshur shog ces spring na/_de dag de'i nyin par me tog 
[\[180b.5\]]nyo ba yod de de dag ma 'ongs pa dang /_de rnams sems khong du chud cing 'dug ste/_je dag gis bdag cag la me tog phreng ba rgyus la skur cig ces spring na de bdag cag gis ni rgyud mi shes phreng rgyud ma bos na yang 'ong du ma btub ste/_ji ltar bsgrub snyam mo/_/sbom dga' 
[\[180b.6\]]mo yang bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing khyim gzhan zhig tu zhugs te/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bsod snyoms bslang ngo zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_'phags ma je bzhud cig bdag cag ni sems khong du chud cing mchis te bsod snyoms dang tshig ga la zhig ster te su yang ma 
[\[180b.7\]]mchis so/_/des smras pa/_ci 'di skad du smra'am ngas cung zad ci nyes des ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod do/_/sbom dga' mos smras pa/_khyed nyid ci'i phyir mi rgyud/_des smras pa/_'phags ma bdag cag ni ma 'tshal na/_mkhyen pa lta mchis sam/_sbom 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]dga' mos smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma de shes te/_de'i dus las 'das pas bzo'i gnas dang /_las kyi gnas nges par ngas mi shes pa med do/_/de dag gis 'phags ma de bzhin du brgyus te stsal bar ci gnang des smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma 
[\[181a.2\]]gal te bza' ba'i rin sbyin nam/_des smras pa/_'phags ma legs par 'bul lo/_/shin tu dbul gyis rgyus shig des lhung bzed bzhag ste/_rkang pa brkyang nas 'dug ste myur bar de bzhin du brgyus pa khyim bdag gi chung ma de dag gis de mthong ste/_ngo mtshar skyes nas 
[\[181a.3\]]de dag yongs su mgu ste sbom dga' mo la bza' ba'i rin mang du byin no sbom dga' mo des 'gran pas khyim gzhan du yang phreng ba brgyus te/_der yang bza' ba'i rin byin pa dang /_sbom dga' mo rnyed pa mang du rnyed de thob nas byung ste dbyar khang du song ngo /_/ji tsam na phreng rgyud ma 
[\[181a.4\]]'ongs te/_smras pa/_me tog de dag 'on cig brgyu'o/_/des smras pa/_khyed cag da gzod ga shed nas 'ongs kyi phreng ba de dag brgyus te skyed mos tshal du bskur zin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_sus brgyus de dag gis smras pa/_'phags ma sbom dga' mos so/_/de dag 
[\[181a.5\]]dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong rnams ni tshig pa/_tshangs par spyod pa ni tshig pa yin te/_gang gi phyir da ltar gzhan dag gi 'tsho ba 'phrog go zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed do zhes dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/_skabs de bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[181a.6\]]gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa phreng rgyud ma rnams kha zer ba'i nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba ni dge slong mas phreng ba brgyus pa'i gzhi las gyur pa yin gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar mi bya'o snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/_
[\[181a.7\]]dge slong dag phreng rgyud ma rnams 'phya ba'i gzhir gyur gyis/_de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag phreng ba rgyu na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams phreng ba brgyu bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]pa dang /_gtsug phud kyi dus ston dang /_dus ston chen po dang lo lnga'i dus ston dag byung bar gyur te ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /_rgyal rigs dbyar byed ma dang /_khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi ma sa ga dang /_zhal 
[\[181b.2\]]ta ba rgan rabs dang /_dge bsnyen ma rdzu 'phrul can gyi ma dang /_khyim bdag gtum po dang /_shAkya ming chen dang /_gzhan yang dad pa can mang po dag gong nas gong du mchog khyad par can gtsug phud la sogs pa dus ston chen po dang dga' ston byed do/_/yul tha dad 
[\[181b.3\]]pa na gnas pa'i skye bo dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag 'dus par gyur te me tog mang du brngas pa dang /_phreng rgyud ma rnams kyis phreng ba legs par rgyud ma nus te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag tu phan 
[\[181b.4\]]tshun du bskor kyang me tog dag legs par rgyud ma nus so/_/de dag gis dge slong ma rnams la smras pa/_kye ma bdag cag ni me tog rgyud ma 'tshal na e ma'o 'phags ma dag ni mkhyen te/_khyed cag ston pa mchod cing phreng ba brgyu ba'i dus la bab bo/_/de dag gis smras pa/_
[\[181b.5\]]shes ldan dag khyed cag mi shes sam 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma rnams phreng ba mi brgyu'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi bcas nas de ji ltar brgyu zhes pa de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[181b.6\]]de lta bas na rjes su gnang ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi ched du dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gyi ched du dge slong ma rnams kyis phreng ba brgyu bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_de 
[\[181b.7\]]rnams sgo khang dang khyams dag tu rkang pa brkyang nas 'dug ste me tog brgyu bar brtsams pa ma dad pa dag gis mthong ste/_kye ma 'phags ma dag khyed cag phreng rgyud ma kho na las rab tu byung ngam zhes dpyas pa dang /_de dag spa gong ste cang mi smra bar 'dug pa de'i skabs de dge 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ma dad pa rnams 'phya ba'i gzhi ni tshul ma yin pa de dag ste/_de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo khang dang /_khyams su 'dug ste me tog brgyu bar 
[\[182a.2\]]mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag sgo khang dang khyams su 'dug ste phreng ba rgyud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gang shes pa yod na dben pa'i phyogs su brgyu bar bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag sgo khang dang khyams su 'dug ste/_me tog rgyud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur 
[\[182a.3\]]ro//_//sdom ni/_khar ba'i snod dang chang gi las/_/khyim gyi gzhi rnams 'tshong pa dang /_/de bzhin tshong khang gzhi dag dang /_/lha 'dra'i gzugs ni mi bcang ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin 
[\[182a.4\]]gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/sbom dga' mo khar ba mkhan gyi drung du song ste smras pa/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]khar ba'i lhung bzed byed nus sam des smras pa/_'phags ma de bzhin du shes na tshad ji tsam du bgyi chen po zhig bya'o/_/'phags ma la khar ba'i lhung bzed chen 
[\[182a.5\]]po ci dgos/_bkren pa khyod la rin med par ni byed du mi 'jug na rin tshang bar sbyin gyis byos shig_/des bsams pa bdag la 'god pa ni ci yang med na bya'o snyam nas des khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so/_/des smras pa/_'dir gzhug tu rung ba gzhan gcig 
[\[182a.6\]]kyang byos shig des gzhan zhig kyang byas te/_des gzhan bdun gyi bar byas so/_/sbom dga' mos de dag dge slong ma rnams byi dor byed du bcug nas tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'i dra bar des de rim bzhin du bcug ste/_dge slong ma'i mgo la bskur nas gang du mgron du bos pa der 
[\[182a.7\]]song ste phyin nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag gis smras pa 'phags ma khyod khar ba mkhan gyi tshong khang 'grims sam ci/_des smras pa/_bkren pa khyed cag ci shes/_re zhig 'dir ni zan blang ngo /_/'dir ni khur ba'o 'dir ni 'bras chan 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]no/_/'dir ni tshod ma blang ngo /_/'phags ma de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang zhog dang /_gal te na tshod ma mang du rnyed kyang srid do zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug pa de'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos te bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[182b.2\]]dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang yin pa ni dge slong mas khar ba'i snod bcangs pas yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis khar ba'i snod bcang bar mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong ma rnams kyis khar ba'i snod bcang bar 
[\[182b.3\]]mi bya'o/_/dge slong ma dag khar ba'i snod bcangs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/yang gzhan kha gzar dang /_tshwa snod dang /_phul ba'i btung phor dag ni bcang bar bya'o//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa/_gleng gzhi ni mnyan 
[\[182b.4\]]yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/_dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do/_/de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo g.yas zhar ma zhig btsas te 
[\[182b.5\]]g.yas zhar ma de bkra mi shis pas sus kyang ma blangs so/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis chung ma gcig blangs pa dang /_de rang gi las kyis dus las 'das so/_/de de bzhin du gnyis pa nas gsum pa dang bdun pa'i bar du blangs na de dag kyang rang gi las kyis 
[\[182b.6\]]dus las 'das te/_de'i ming chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes kun du grags so/_/des gzhan zhig gi bu mo zhig bslangs pa dang /_des smras pa/_ci bdag gi bu mo yang yongs su gtang ngam/_yugs sa mo zhig bslangs pa dang /_ci bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid yongs 
[\[182b.7\]]su gtong ngam zhes smras so/_/des rang nyid khyim gyi 'tsho tshis dag bya bar brtsams pa dang /_de'i sten grogs shig khyim du 'ongs te de'i ming nyid nas ga re zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_de nang du zhugs te khyim gyi 'tsho tshis dag byed do/_/sten grogs kyis smras pa/_
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]khyod kyis chung ma dag bza' ba dang /_bsgo ba sbyar zhing las byed du gzhug mi nus sam gang gi phyir rang nyid khyim gyi 'tsho tshis dag byed/_des smras pa/_sten grogs bdag gis nus mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag gis chung ma gcig blangs na de rang gi las kyis 
[\[183a.2\]]dus las 'das so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang bdun gyi bar du chung ma blangs na de dag kyang rang gi las kyis dus las 'das te/_gang dag bdag gi ming chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes kun du grags so/_/des ci gzhan yang mi bslang ngam/_bdag gis 
[\[183a.3\]]bslangs na de dag bdag cag gi bu mo yang yongs su gtang ngam ci zhes zer ro/_/ci yugs sa mo mi bslang ngam/_de yang bdag gis byas mod kyi ci bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid yongs su gtang ngam zhes zer ro/_/sten grogs de lta na g.yas zhar ma ci ste mi bslang /_de dag gi bu mo 
[\[183a.4\]]yang mi ster ro/_/sten grogs song dang /_khyim bdag de kun du skyo bas ster ro/_/des de bskul nas khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste des bde legs bde legs zhes smras pa dang /_nang mi dag gis smras pa/_ci slong /_bu mo slong ngo /_/bu mo gang yin/_g.yas zhar 
[\[183a.5\]]ma'o/_/de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/_/blang ba'i dus bya'o/_/de bzhin du dus bya'o/_/gang gi nyin par bzang ba 'di la'o zhes smras nas song ngo /_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma de bu mo bag mar btang ngo snyam ste/_chang btsos so/_/tsha ba'i dus la bab ste de dros nas ma rung 
[\[183a.6\]]bar gyur to/_/de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des chang 'tshong ma la bdag gi bu mo bag mar gtong ste chang 'di tsam zhig dgos kyis sbyor cig ces smras pa dang /_de dag gis legs kyis dbul lo zhes smras so/_/des re zhig chang dag sta gon byas pa dang /_ji tsam na sbom dga' mo 
[\[183a.7\]]bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu zhing de'i khyim zhig tu zhugs te/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma bsod snyoms byin cig_/khyim bdag gi chung ma de yang yang dang yang du chang dag lta ste brel nas smras pa/_'phags ma ji bzhud cig_/bdag ni sems khong du chud cing mchis te/_bsod snyoms lta ga 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]la zhig su yang mi 'bul to/_/des smras pa/_ci 'di skad zer ba las ngas cung zad ma nyes sam/_des 'di ltar rgyas par bshad pa dang /_sbom dga' mos smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma de lta na ci'i phyir slar mi bcos/_des smras pa/_'phags ma bdag ni ma 'tshal na mkhyen 
[\[183b.2\]]pa lta mchis sam/_sbom dga' mos smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma shes te de'i dus las 'das pas bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas gang yin pa nges par ngas mi shes pa med do/_/'phags ma slar bcos te stsal bar ci gnang des smras pa/_mtshan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma ngas slar bcos 
[\[183b.3\]]na gal te bza' ba'i rin sbyin nam/_des smras pa/_'phags ma legs par dbul lo/_/shin tu dbul gyis slar chos shig_/sbom dga' mos smras pa/_khyer te shog blta'o/_/des chang gi rdza ma dag bstan pa dang /_sbom dga' mos 'di ji ltar ma rung /_chang rdza dag la 
[\[183b.4\]]phan tshun brtags nas dro ba las ma rung bar mthong nas des skar khung dag phye nas chang rdza'i 'og tu bye ma mang du bting ste/_ngos la chus btab nas nya lcibs kyis kun du dkris te des bsil yab dag blangs nas g.yab par brtsams pa dang /_bsil ba'i khyad par gyi sbyor bas chang slar 
[\[183b.5\]]rung bar gyur to/_/bag ma len pa yang nye nas grogs po dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_skye bo dag 'dus pa dang /_chang 'tshong ma de yang chang dag sta gon byas te/_'dug nas gang gi tshe sbron pa gang dag 'ongs na sbyin no snyam pa dang /_khyim bdag des kyang chang 
[\[183b.6\]]de nyid kyis bag ma gtang ba grub par byas so/_/de nas chang 'tshong ba de 'ongs nas smras pa/_khyim bdag chang longs shig_/des smras pa/_shes ldan chog ste chang de nyid slar bcos nas chang de nyid kyis bag ma gtang ba grub par byas so/_/smras pa/_khyim bdag de ni der 
[\[183b.7\]]zad na de slar sus bcos zhes dris so/_/des de 'phags ma sbom dga' mos slar bcos te/_de nged la phan 'dogs pa'o zhes bshad pa dang /_dge sbyong shAkya'i bu'i dge slong ma rnams ni tshig pa'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa tshig pa ste/_gang gi phyir da ltar gzhan gyi 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]'tsho ba 'phrog pa'o zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos te bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_dge slong ma sbom dga' mo'i spyod pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma 
[\[184a.2\]]yin pa byed do/_/de lta bas na dge slong mas chang gi las mi bya'o snyam du mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong ma sbom dga' mo'i spyod pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong ma dag gis chang gi las mi bya'o/_/dge slong mas chang gi las 
[\[184a.3\]]byed na ltung ba sbom por 'gyur ro/_/gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o/_/mnyan yod na khyim bdag sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs par gyur te/_de'i lus kyi tshe yongs su 'chad cing ji ltar bdag ni 'chi'o snyam ste/_des gang cung zad 
[\[184a.4\]]bdag dbang zhing khyim na yod pa de thams cad dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_gzhan yang grogs po dang /_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dag la byin te/_khyim gcig pu lus pa sbom dga' mos thos nas de rings par song ste brgyugs nas der 'ongs te phyin pa dang /_des khyim 
[\[184a.5\]]bdag la khyim bdag bud med ni rnyed pa nyung ba'o zhes mtshan ma zhig nye bar bstan pa dang /_khyim bdag des kyang rig nas smras pa/_'phags ma khyod 'phyi ste 'ongs pas gang cung zad ci yod pa de thams cad ngas byin te/_khyim gcig pu las ma lus par cung zad sbyin du yang med 
[\[184a.6\]]do/_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag glang po che'i sna ltar 'phang bstod de/_khyod kyi drung du 'ongs na ji ltar re thag chad de 'gro/_des smras pa/_'phags ma khyim gcig pu las ma lus zhes ma smras sam/_gal te de bzhed na khyim de snoms shig_/des smras pa/_khyim bdag 
[\[184a.7\]]de bzhin du blang bar bya'o/_/nad med par gyur cig ces smras nas byung ste song ngo /_/ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag de dus las 'das te de'i nye du dag gis ras sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dag gis khyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te song 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]ngo /_/ji ltar khyim bdag de dus las 'das pa sbom dga' mos thos nas de rings pa rings par 'ongs te des de'i khyim du sgo bcad nas rgyas btab ste/_de phyogs gcig tu gnas te 'dug go/_/ji tsam na de dag gis bsregs te 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa/_khyim 'di
