[\[224b.6\]]par byed/_gang ji ltar yang rung 'dir gnas te mchod rten la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su 'gro'o zhes smras pa dang /_shAkya'i bu'i dge slong rnams kyi tshul khrims ni snyoms pa'o zhes thos na/_de ji ltar snyoms pa'i tshul khrims de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa glo bur du 
[\[224b.7\]]'ongs pa la yang gnas khang sbyin par mi byed do zhes de dag smod par byed/_'phya bar byed/_phyar ka gtong bar byed pa de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pa'i kun du spyad 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]pa'i chos ngas bca' bar bya ste/_dge slong glo bur du 'ongs pas rgan pa bzhi la phyag byos la de'i mdun du 'dug par bya'o/_/de dag gis kyang de la gus par gyis la ngal sor gzhug par bya zhing gnas khang dang mal stan gyi zhal ta bas kyang mal stan sbyin 
[\[225a.2\]]par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge slong gis rgan pa bzhi la phyag byas te mdun du 'dug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_ji tsam na dge slong gzhan zhig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba las rgyal po'i khab tu phyin te/_des dge slong dag la tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan kun shes 
[\[225a.3\]]kauN+Di n+yas gang na zhes dris pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_'od ma'i tshal na'o/_/de 'od ma'i tshal du song ste/_de'i gnas khang gi sgo dal nas dal nas brdungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas sgo rdung ba 'di su yin zhes smras so/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan bdag ni glo 
[\[225a.4\]]bur du mchis pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/des tshe dang ldan pa nang du zhugs la ngal sos shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la phyag 'tshal na/_de gang na bzhugs pa gsungs shig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shing pib pa la'i phug na 'dug 
[\[225a.5\]]gis song shig ces smras pa dang /_shing pib pa la'i phug tu song ste bags kyis dal nas dal nas sgo brdungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos sgo rdung ba 'di su yin zhes smras so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa bdag ni glo bur du mchis pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/tshe dang 
[\[225a.6\]]ldan pa nang du zhugs la ngal sos shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gnas brtan chen po skul byed la yang phyag 'tshal na/_de gang na bzhugs gsungs shig des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'dug gis der song shig_/de bya rgod phung po'i ri la song ste de'i gnas 
[\[225a.7\]]khang la bags kyis dal nas dal nas sgo brdungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos sgo rdung ba de su yin zhes smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gnas brtan bdag ni glo bur du mchis pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/des kyang tshe dang ldan pa nang du zhugs la ngal sos shig ces smras pa dang /_
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]des smras pa/_gnas brtan stobs bcu 'od srung la phyag 'tshal na/_de gang na bzhugs gsungs shig_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sde can gyi phug na 'dug gis song shig_/de sde can gyi phug tu song ste bags kyis dal nas dal nas sgo brdungs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa stobs bcu 
[\[225b.2\]]'od srung gis sgo rdung ba su yin zhes smras so/_/des smras pa/_bdag ni glo bur du mchis pa ming 'di zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/des kyang tshe dang ldan pa nang du zhugs la ngal sos shig ces smras pa dang /_des smras pa/_gnas brtan da ni nam yang nangs te bsod snyoms la 'jug dgos na ji 
[\[225b.3\]]ltar ngal so mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag cag glo bur du lhags pa lam gyis dub pa rnams la chad pas dgum pa'i las kyi don du rgan pa bzhi la glo bur du 'ongs pas phyag byos shig ces gsung ngo zhes de'i skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom 
[\[225b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ngas sa la 'dug go cog gi gnas brtan la ma gsungs mod kyi/_'on kyang gtsug lag khang na gnas pa de nyid kyi gnas brtan la phyag bya'o//_//sdom ni/_ston la ngag ldan gyis zhus nas/_/mkhan po'i rjes su spyad pa dang /_/ri 
[\[225b.5\]]dgas la ni lnga brgya dang /_/tha mar gyur pa bdun brgya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ngag ldan dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste 
[\[225b.6\]]phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa ngag ldan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams 
[\[225b.7\]]kyis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_ngag ldan dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis kun du spyad pa'i chos ngas yang dag par bca' bar bya'o/_/dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis nang par sngar langs te/_mkhan po 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]dang slob dpon la khams mnyam mam zhes dri bar bya'o/_/gal te mkhan po khams mi mnyam mo zhes zer na de'i nad dris te sman pa la bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag gi mkhan po 'di 'dra ba na bar gyur na sman ston cig ces dris la ji ltar bsgo ba de ltar bya'o/_/de ltar 'byor na legs/_
[\[226a.2\]]gal te ma 'byor na de'i nye du dag la bslang bar bya'o/_/gal te nye du mang por gyur na des mkhan po'i nye du gang las sman bslang bar bgyi zhes dri zhing gang la bstan pa de'i drung nas bslang bar bya'o/_/nye du dag med na bram ze dang khyim bdag gang la bstan pa de las bslang bar bya'o/_/gal te de 
[\[226a.3\]]lta bu yang med na sman khang nas bslang bar bya'o/_/gal te de nas kyang ma rnyed na rang gi las la blta zhing bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_myang ba tsam la gnas par bya'o/_/ji ste min par gyur pa zhig na so shing bza' bar bya zhing phyogs gang du mkhan pos so shing bor ba'i phyogs su phyag dar 
[\[226a.4\]]dang /_dkyil 'khor byas nas stan gding zhing /_chu snod dang /_chol zangs dang /_'dag chal dang /_so shing bor nas chol zangs blang bar bya'o/_/gal te mig nad can zhig na sman pas bsgo ba'i mig sman sbyar bar bya ste/_mig sman sbyar nas sbyin par bya zhing de slar yang blang bar bya'o/_/
[\[226a.5\]]chos gos dag kyang sbyin par bya zhing nam chos gos bgos nas mchod rten dag la phyag byed na/_de nas gnas khang chag chag gis gdab cing phyag dar bya'o/_/gal te rdul yod par gyur na ba lang gi lci ba'am/_lo ma sngon pos ji tsam pa de byug par bya'o/_/de nas mchod rten la phyag 
[\[226a.6\]]bya zhing tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la yang ci nus kyis phyag bya'o/_/de nas bsam gtan dang bklag pa'i sbyor bas gnas par bya'o/_/dus tshod shes nas lhung bzed gnyis bkrus te/_gal te bsod snyoms pa zhig yin na lhung bzed lci ba de bdag gis bkur bar bya zhing /_gang 
[\[226a.7\]]yang ba de mkhan po la sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te grang ba'i dus su gyur na snam sbyar gang lci ba de mkhan po la sbyin par bya zhing /_gang yang ba de bdag gis bgo bar bya'o/_/ji ste dro ba zhig tu gyur na gang yang ba de mkhan po la sbyin par bya zhing /_gang lci ba de bdag gis bkur 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/gal te lam mi bde bar gyur na sngon du 'gro bar bya zhing /_ji ste bde ba zhig na phyi bzhin 'gro bar bya'o/_/gal te chu rgal bar gyur na mkhan po'i lag pa nas gzung bar bya'o/_/spyod yul du 'gro na mkhan po la mkhan po bsod snyoms la lhan cig gshegs sam/_'on 
[\[226b.2\]]te so sor zhes dris shig_/gal te lhan cig go zhes zer na de bzhin lhan cig tu 'gro bar bya zhing song ba las gal te phye zhig rnyed na bdag gi lhung bzed du blang bar bya'o/_/ji ste 'bras can zhig na ni mkhan po'i lhung bzed du lugs shig ces smra bar bya'o/_/mon sran gre'u las byas 
[\[226b.3\]]pa'am/_'bras phye las byas pa'i bza' ba rnyed na bdag gi lhung bzed du blang bar bya'o/_/ji ste bza' ba khan da zhig na mkhan po'i lhung bzed du lugs shig ces smra bar bya'o/_/gal te dar ba bskol ba'am/_rtsab mo'i khu ba zhig rnyed na bdag gi lhung bzed du blang bar bya'o/_/ji ste 'o 
[\[226b.4\]]ma'am/_zho'am/_khur ba sbyar ba zhig na mkhan po'i lhung bzed du lugs shig ces smra bar bya'o/_/de nas gnas khang du phyin nas dkyil 'khor gnyis bya zhing lo ma lhags pa dag blangs nas stan gnyis gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya'o/_/ji ste bsod snyoms 
[\[226b.5\]]la so sor song na bsod snyoms blangs pa dag mkhan po la mkhan po bsod snyoms 'di ni bdag gis rnyed do/_/de las gang bzhed pa de blang du gsol zhes smra bar bya'o/_/des kyang de la tshod rig par byos shig_/ji ste dge 'dun las 'thob par 'gyur ba zhig na snod dag bkrus la tshang mang 
[\[226b.6\]]du song ste/_gtsang sbyor la dri bar bya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag deng dge 'dun gyi skyu rum ci zhig byas/_des kyang gus par gyis la de la smra bar bya'o/_/de nas des mkhan po la mkhan po dge 'dun gyis skyu rum 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig bgyis na/_de las gang bzhed pa de blang du gsol zhes 
[\[226b.7\]]smros shig_/des kyang tshod rig par byos shig_/de nas phyogs gang du mkhan pos lag pa bkrus pa'i sa phyogs der dkyil 'khor byas la stan dang /_ril ba spyi blugs dang /_'dag chal dang /_so shing dag nye bar gzhag par bya zhing mkhan po'i rkang pa yang bkru bar bya'o/_/rkang 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]pa bkrus nas lham byi dor byas te sbyin par bya'o/_/khrus mi byed na chu dang /_sa dang /_'bru mar gyi snod dag sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas zas kyis snyom pa grub nas mkhan po la ci 'di nyid du dge ba'i phyogs mdzad dam/_'on te nyin par gnas par gshegs zhes dri bar bya'o/_/
[\[227a.2\]]gal te nyin par gnas par 'gro zhes zer na/_de stan blangs nas 'gro zhing nyin par gnas par phyag dar dang chag chag byos la stan gding bar bya zhing dus dus su ba lang gzhon nu'i lci bas bsku bar bya'o/_/gal te bklag pa rgyas par byed na de la bstan par bya'o/_/ji ste bsam gtan rgyas par 
[\[227a.3\]]byed na yid la bya ba bstan par bya'o/_/nyin par gnas pa nas 'ongs na mal stan brtags nas lag pa dang rkang pa bkrus te mchod rten la phyag bya'o/_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la yang phyag byos la mkhan po'i khri'u dang /_chu dang /_lham dang /_'bru mar gyi snod dag nye bar gzhag 
[\[227a.4\]]par bya'o/_/gal te rkang pa 'khru na bkrus la bsku bar bya'o/_/de lta ma yin na chu dang sa sbyin par bya'o/_/gal te grang ba'i dus su gyur na du ba byin gyis rlobs la me bud par bya'o/_/dro bar gyur na glor bsil yab gzhag par bya'o/_/des kyang dus shes par byas te bzlas pa 
[\[227a.5\]]dang kha ton byed du gzhug go/_/lhung bzed la sogs pa las gang cung zad ci bya ba de thams cad sngar mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyi byas la phyis bdag gi bya'o/_/ngag ldan lhan cig spyod pa dang /_nye gnas dag gis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la de ltar bsgrub par bya ste/_rnam pa 
[\[227a.6\]]de lta bus mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la lhan cig spyod pa dang /_nye gnas rnams kyis bsgrubs na chu'i nang na me tog uta pa la bzhin du de dge ba'i chos mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po bzhi bcu dgu pa/_gleng gzhi ni rgyal po'i khab 
[\[227a.7\]]na'o/_/de nas yang de'i tshe ri nag po la dge slong 'gro mgyogs dang /_nab so dang /_dge slong dmar skya dag khyim sun 'byin pa sdig pa'i chos kun du spyod pa dag gnas so/_/de dag bud med dag dang lhan cig 'dug_/lhan cig kha dpya zer/_lhan cig rtse bar byed/_lhan cig ca co 'don/_
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]phyar g.yeng dang /_lus kyis snyogs par byed/_stan gcig la 'dug par byed/_snod gcig tu longs spyod par byed/_phor bu gcig tu chang rnam pa mang po 'thung bar byed/_me tog 'thog par byed/_'thog tu 'jug_/phreng ba rgyud par byed/_rgyud du 'jug_/me tog rgyan dag 'ching zhing 'ching du 
[\[227b.2\]]'jug par byed/_byed du 'jug_/glu len par byed/_rol mo'i cha spyad 'bud par byed/_'bud du 'jug_/gar mkhas pa dang /_glu snyan pa dang /_rol mo cha spyad 'bud mkhas pa la gla sbyin par byed/_gos rnams brdzes nas rgyug par byed/_mchong bar byed/_rgal bar byed/_rkang pa 
[\[227b.3\]]gcig bskums te skor bar byed/_lag 'gros kyis kyang skor bar byed/_nya tshar gyis kyang skor bar byed/_chu bgags shing gtong bar byed/_chu la sbal ba'i skad kyang 'byin/_chu la rnga'i sgra yang 'byin/_glang po che'i sgra skad kyang 'byin/_khrung khrung gi skad kyang 'byin/_rta'i skad 
[\[227b.4\]]kyang 'byin/_khyu mchog 'gying ba'i skad kyang 'byin/_khas rdza rnga'i sgra yang 'byin/_khas dung dang /_khas rnga dang /_rma bya'i skad kyang 'byin/_khu byug gi skad kyang 'byin/_glang po che'i 'thab mo yang byed/_rta'i 'thab mo dang /_khyu mchog gi 'thab mo dang /_ma he'i 'thab mo dang /_
[\[227b.5\]]ra'i 'thab mo dang /_lug thug gi 'thab mo dang /_bud med kyi 'thab mo dang /_skyes pa'i 'thab mo dang /_gzhon nu ma'i 'thab mo dang /_bya gag gi 'thab mo dang /_sreg pa'i 'thab mo dang /_'ur pa'i 'thab mo dang /_bya gag dang /_sreg pa dang /_'ur pa dag gi 'thab mo yang 
[\[227b.6\]]byed du 'jug cing /_gzhan yang dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byed de/_de dag gi tshul dang /_spyod pa dang /_log par sgrub pa des ri nag po la dge slong ma 'ongs pa rnams ni mi 'ong zhing /_'ongs pa rnams kyang mi sdod pas ri nag po'i gnas 'dor bar byed do/_/ri nag po na gnas 
[\[227b.7\]]pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di ltar dge slong 'di dag ni dge sbyong gi las ma yin pa byed do zhes kha zer bar byed/_'phya bar byed/_phyar ka gtor bar byed do zhes skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]pa/_dge slong dag bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag kha zer zhing 'phya ba dang /_phyar ka gtong ba ni gnas yin te/_de lta bas na dge slong gis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa'i las de lta bu mi bya zhing byed du mi gzhug go/_/dge slong dag gis de lta bu'i dge sbyong gi tshul 
[\[228a.2\]]ma yin pa'i las byas sam byed du bcug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/_/de nas yang de'i tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_yul spong byed pa rnams phan tshun mi mthun 
[\[228a.3\]]par gyur nas/_des 'khor de rnams la tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/ngas yul spong byed pa rnams 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 'di gzhom par bya/_thal mar bya/_tshul ma yin pas rmeg med par bya'o zhes smras so/_/
[\[228a.4\]]de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bram ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dbyar byed tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la song nas nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag byos la/_gnod 
[\[228a.5\]]pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba mi mnga' 'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' 'am zhes snyun gsol la 'di skad ces btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_yul spong byed pa rnams phan 
[\[228a.6\]]tshun du mi mthun par gyur te/_des 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/des spong byed pa rnams 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 'di gzhom par bya/_thal mar bya/_tshul ma yin pas rmeg med par bya'o zhes mchi 
[\[228a.7\]]na/_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ci stsal zhes zhus la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung zhig_/dbyar byed/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni log par gsung ba ma 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]yin no zhes smras nas/_yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shing rta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/_gser gyi khar 
[\[228b.2\]]ba dang /_ril ba spyi blugs thogs bzhin du rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/_de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa de'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/_bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas bya rgod phung po'i 
[\[228b.3\]]ri la 'dzegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 
[\[228b.4\]]'das la yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma khyod kyi zhabs la lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba mi mnga' 
[\[228b.5\]]'am/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' 'am zhes snyun gsol lags so/_/lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_dbyar byed khyod kyang bde legs su gyur cig_/kye gau ta ma lus 'phags ma'i 
[\[228b.6\]]bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang /_yul spong byed pa rnams lhan cig mi mthun par gyur nas/_des 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces mchi'o/_/des yul spong byed pa rnams 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba 
[\[228b.7\]]'di gzhom par bya thal mar bya/_tshul ma yin pas rmeg med par bya'o zhes mchi na/_kye bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma bka' ci stsal/_dbyar byed 'di ni gcig tu nges pa ma yin te/_dbyar byed nga dus gcig cig na yul spong byed tsa pa la'i mchod rten gyi drung na bzhugs pa na 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]ngas yul spong byed kyi gnas der yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun bshad do/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed pa dag yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun yang dag par blangs nas spyod cing /_yul spong byed pa rnams la yongs su nyams 
[\[229a.2\]]par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun kun du snang na/_yul spong byed pa rnams 'dod pa'i dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur gyi nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/gau ta mas 'di ltar mdor bka' stsal gyi/_de rnam par ma phye bas bdag gis don rgyas par ma 'tshal na/_gau ta mas mdor gsungs pa'i don 
[\[229a.3\]]de rnam par phye ste rgyas par bshad na 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas rnam par phye ste rgyas par gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis legs par 'tshal bar gyur lags so/_/de nas yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsil yab thogs te bcom ldan 
[\[229a.4\]]'das la g.yob cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_ci kun dga' bo yul spong byed pa rnams yang dang yang du 'du zhing /_yang dang yang du 'du ba las ring du gnas par thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags 
[\[229a.5\]]te/_yul spong byed pa rnams yang dang yang du 'du zhing /_yang dang yang du 'du ba las ring du gnas lags so/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed pa rnams yang dang yang du 'du zhing ring du gnas pa las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas 
[\[229a.6\]]par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/ci kun dga' bo yul spong byed pa rnams mthun par 'dug cing mthun par 'gro'am/_yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dgos pa dang bya ba mthun par byed par thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags te/_yul spong byed pa rnams mthun 
[\[229a.7\]]lags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed pa rnams mthun par 'dug cing mthun par 'gro ba dang /_yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dgos pa dang bya ba mthun par byas pa las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/ci kun dga' bo yul spong byed pa rnams smon pa ma yin pa la ni smon par mi byed/_smon pa ni kun du 'dor bar mi byed cing /_ji ltar yul spong byed pa rnams kyis khrims bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas spyod do zhes 
[\[229b.2\]]thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags te/_yul spong byed pa rnams smon pa ma yin pa la ni smon par mi byed/_smon pa ni kun du 'dor bar mi bgyid cing ji ltar yul spong byed pa rnams kyis khrims bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs nas spyod lags so/_/dbyar byed ji srid 
[\[229b.3\]]du yul spong byed pa rnams smon pa ma yin pa la ni smon par mi byed/_smon pa ni kun du 'dor bar mi byed cing /_ji ltar yul spong byed pa rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa bzhin du yang dag par blangs nas kun du spyod pa las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing 
[\[229b.4\]]rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/ci kun dga' bo khyod kyis yul spong byed pa rnams kyis spong byed kyi bud med rnams dang /_spong byed kyi gzhon nu ma gang dag 'di lta ste/_phas bsrungs pa mas bsrungs pa/_ming pos bsrungs pa/_phu nu mas bsrungs pa/_sgyug mos bsrungs pa/_
[\[229b.5\]]gyos pos bsrungs pa/_nye dus bsrungs pa/_rus kyis bsrungs pa/_chad pa dang bcas pa/_sgrib pa dang bcas pa/_gzhan gyi chung ma gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba dag dang /_chung ngu na me tog gi phreng ba bor ba de lta bu dag la yang /_yul spong byed pa rnams 'phral la khyad du 
[\[229b.6\]]bsad nas mthus 'dod pa kun du mi spyod par thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags so/_/yul spong byed pa rnams spong byed kyi bud med rnams dang /_spong byed kyi gzhon nu ma gang dag 'di lta ste/_phas bsrungs pa dang /_mas bsrungs pa zhes bya ba nas/_chung ngu na me 
[\[229b.7\]]tog gi phreng ba bor ba de lta bu dag la yang yul spong byed pa rnams 'phral la khyad du bsad nas mthus 'dod pa kun du mi spyod pa lags so zhes bya ba gong ma bzhin no/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed pa rnams kyis spong byed kyi bud med rnams dang /_spong byed kyi gzhon nu ma gang 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dag ces bya ba nas/_chung ngu na me tog gi phreng ba bor ba de lta bu dag la yang yul spong byed rnams 'phral la khyad du bsad nas mthus 'dod pa kun du mi spyod pa las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par 
[\[230a.2\]]bya'o/_/ci kun dga' bo khyod kyis yul spong byed pa rnams spong byed kyi rgan rims rnams dang /_ya rabs rnams dang /_pha ma'i rgyud gang dag la yul spong byed pa rnams kyis bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_de dag gis tshig la dad 
[\[230a.3\]]pas nyan par byed/_sems par byed pa thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags te/_yul spong byed pa rnams yul spong byed kyi rgan rabs rnams dang /_ya rabs rnams dang /_pha ma'i rgyud gang dag la yul spong byed pa de dag bkur sti bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_ri mor bgyid/_
[\[230a.4\]]mchod par bgyid cing de dag gi tshig la dad pas nyan par bgyid/_sems par bgyid lags so/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed pa rnams yul spong byed kyi rgan rabs rnams dang /_ya rabs rnams dang /_pha ma'i rgyud gang dag la yul spong byed pa de dag bkur sti byed/_bla mar 
[\[230a.5\]]byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing de dag gi tshig la dad pas nyan par byed/_sems par byed pa las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/ci kun dga' bo khyod kyis yul spong byed kyi phyogs 
[\[230a.6\]]bzhi po gang dag na yul spong byed kyi mchod rten de dag la yul spong byed pa rnams bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_de dag gis sngon gyi mtshan mar bzung ba mi 'dor bar thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags te/_yul spong byed kyi phyogs 
[\[230a.7\]]bzhi po gang dag na yul spong byed kyi mchod rten de dag la yul spong byed pa rnams bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing de dag gis sngon gyi mtshan mar bzung ba mi 'dor lags so/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed kyi phyogs bzhi po gang dag na yul spong 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]byed kyi mchod rten de dag la yul spong byed pa rnams bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing de dag gis sngon gyi mtshan mar bzung bar mi 'dor ba las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[230b.2\]]ci kun dga' bo khyod kyis spong byed pa rnams dgra bcom pa rnams la dad pa'i sems drag pos kun du bsrungs pa dran pa nye bar gnas te/_dgra bcom pa ma byon pa dag ni spyan 'dren par byed/_byon pa dag la ni mngon par dga' bar byed cing /_de dag la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms 
[\[230b.3\]]dang /_mal stan dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar byed pa thos sam/_btsun pa bdag gis thos lags te/_yul spong byed pa rnams dgra bcom pa rnams la dad pa'i sems drag pos kun du bsrungs pa dran pa nye bar gnas te/_dgra bcom pa ma 
[\[230b.4\]]byon pa dag ni spyan 'dren par bgyid/_byon pa dag la ni mngon par dga' bar bgyid de/_de dag la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis mi brel bar bgyid lags so/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong 
[\[230b.5\]]byed pa rnams dgra bcom pa rnams la dad pa'i sems drag pos kun du bsrungs pa dran par nye bar gnas par gyur cing /_gang dgra bcom pa ma 'ongs pa dag ni spyan 'dren par byed/_'ongs pa dag ni mngon par dga' bar byed cing de dag la chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal 
[\[230b.6\]]stan dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis mi brel ba las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dbyar byed ji srid du yul spong byed pa rnams nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun 
[\[230b.7\]]yang dag par blangs nas kun du spyod cing /_yul spong byed pa rnams la nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang ba las yul spong byed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/kye gau ta ma re zhig yul spong 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]byed pa rnams yan lag 'di gcig dang ldan na yang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras thub par mi 'gyur na/_thams cad dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas kye gau ta ma bdag la bgyi ba mang ba dang /_bgyi bar 'gyur ba mang bas da 
[\[231a.2\]]mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/dbyar byed de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par dga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas langs te song ngo /_/de 
[\[231a.3\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dga' bo song la bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams 
[\[231a.4\]]cad rim gro'i gnas 'dir sdus shig_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsdus nas/_bcom ldan 
[\[231a.5\]]'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong ji snyed nye bar 
[\[231a.6\]]rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su 'dus shing mthun par gyur lags na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung 
[\[231a.7\]]la gdan bshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed la ngas nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ji srid du yang dang yang du 'du zhing yang dang yang du 'du ba las ring du gnas na/_dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong ji srid du 
[\[231b.2\]]mthun par 'du shing mthun par 'gro ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi don dang dge 'dun gyi bya ba mthun par byed na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du smon pa ma yin pa la ni smon par mi byed/_
[\[231b.3\]]smon pa na kun du 'dor bar mi byed cing ji ltar bslab pa bcas pa gzhan yang dag par blangs te spyod na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du yang 'byung ba'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyis mod 
[\[231b.4\]]las skyes shing 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dang de dag la mngon par dga' ba'i dbang du ma gyur na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gnas brtan rgyal po lta bu rab tu byung nas yun ring du lon pa/_tshangs par 
[\[231b.5\]]spyod pa goms par byas pa ston pas bsngags pa kun du bsgoms pas rnam par rig pa'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de lta bu de dag la bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_de dag gi tshig la dad pas nyan par byed/_sems par byed na dge slong dag 
[\[231b.6\]]dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du dgon pa dang /_nags khrod dang /_bas mthar gnas mal 'cha' bar byed na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes 
[\[231b.7\]]par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la dad pa'i sems drag pos kun du bsrungs pa dran pa nye bar gnas par gyur cing gang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa ma 'ongs pa de dag ni 'bod par byed cing /_'ongs pa dag la ni mngon par dga' 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]bar byed de/_de dag 'di ltar chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang /_yo byad de dag gis mi brel bar byed na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[232a.2\]]dge slong dag ji srid du nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun yang dag par blangs nas spyod cing /_dge slong dag nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge 
[\[232a.3\]]slong dag gzhan yang ngas khyed cag la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun bstan par byas/_de rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ji srid du ston pa la bkur sti byed/_
[\[232a.4\]]bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_ston pa la bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas nas nye bar rten cing gnas pa las/_dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[232a.5\]]bslab pa'i chos kyis rjes su bag yod par ston cing rab tu rnam par 'byed pa las ting nge 'dzin du byed/_bkur sti byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing /_ting nge 'dzin du byas/_bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas nas 
[\[232a.6\]]nye bar rten cing gnas pa las dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun yang dag par blangs nas kun du spyod la/_dge slong dag yongs su 
[\[232a.7\]]nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang ngas khyed cag la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun bstan par byas/_de rab tu 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ji srid du las la mi dga' ba dang /_smra ba la mi dga' ba dang /_gnyid la mi dga' ba dang /_bre mo'i gtam la mi dga' ba dang /_'du ba la mi dga' 
[\[232b.2\]]ba dang /_'du 'dzi la mi dga' bar gyur te/_gnas pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_'du shes gzhan rab tu spangs nas sbyor ba rjes su brtson par gnas shing cung zad tsam dang /_ngan ngon tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing /_des gong 
[\[232b.3\]]nas gong du bya ba sgrub pa las dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun yang dag par blangs nas kun du spyod la/_dge slong dag yongs su 
[\[232b.4\]]nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang ngas khyed la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun bstan par byas/_de rab tu 
[\[232b.5\]]nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ji srid du dad pa dang /_ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhog pa dang /_mnyam 
[\[232b.6\]]par gzhog pa dang /_shes rab dang ldan par gyur pa las dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun yang dag par blangs nas kun du 
[\[232b.7\]]spyod la/_dge slong dag yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gzhan yang ngas khyed cag la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]ba'i chos bdun bstan par byas/_de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ji srid du chos shes pa dang /_don shes pa dang /_dus shes 
[\[233a.2\]]pa dang /_tshod shes pa dang /_bdag nyid shes pa dang /_'khor shes pa dang /_gang zag mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes par gyur pa las dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid 
[\[233a.3\]]du yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun yang dag par blangs nas kun du spyod la/_dge slong dag yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/
[\[233a.4\]]dge slong dag gzhan yang ngas khyed cag la yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun bshad par byas/_de rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos bdun gang zhe na/_dge slong dag ji srid du dran pa yang 
[\[233a.5\]]dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas rnam par sgyur ba sgom zhing /_chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 
[\[233a.6\]]'dzin dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa 'gog pa la gnas pa/_rnam par spong bas rnam par sgyur ba sgom na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar 
[\[233a.7\]]shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ji srid du yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun yang dag par blangs te spyod la/_yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i chos 'di bdun kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur bar 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]shes par bya'o/_/dge slong dag ngas khyed cag la kun du dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos drug bstan par byas/_de rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/kun du dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos drug gang zhe na/_rang gi byams pa'i lus kyi las nye bar gnas 
[\[233b.2\]]par gyur cing sgom la/_ston pa dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams la dga' bar byed/_bla mar byed/_yid dga' bar byed cing dga' bar byas/_bla mar byas zhe sa byas/_bsgoms te kun du bsdu ba dang /_yang dag par bsdus nas 'thab rtsod 
[\[233b.3\]]med cing gcig tu byed la kun du spyod pa 'di ni kun du dga' bar byed pa'i chos yin no/_/byams pa'i ngag gi las dang /_byams pa'i yid kyi las kyang yin no/_/gang chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyis thob pa chung ngu na lhung bzed kyi nang du 'ongs pa dang /_lhung bzed kyi nang du 
[\[233b.4\]]thob pa de lta bu'i rnyed pa de rang dben par za bar mi byed cing tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dang lhan cig dga' bas thun mong du za bar byed la/_dga' bar byed/_bla mar byed/_yid dga' bar byed de/_dga' bar byas/_bla mar byas/_zhe sa byas/_bsgoms te 
[\[233b.5\]]kun du bsdu ba dang /_yang dag par bsdus nas 'thab rtsod med cing gcig tu byed la kun du spyod pa 'di ni kun du dga' bar byed pa'i chos yin no/_/gang tshul khrims ma nyams pa skyon med pa/_'dren mar ma gyur pa/_thun tshags ma yin pa/_rang dbang can/_nag 
[\[233b.6\]]nog ma yin pa/_rab tu brtsams pa/_shin tu mthar phyin pa/_mkhas pa rnams kyis bstod pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis ma smad pa'i tshul khrims de lta bu la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong du byas 
[\[233b.7\]]te/_tshul khrims spyod par gyur cing gcig tu byed la kun du spyod pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_'di ni kun du dga' bar byed pa'i chos yin no/_/gang 'phags pa'i lta ba 'di ni nges par 'byin pa dang /_nges par 'byed pa dang /_yang dag par 'byin pa 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]ste/_rgyu des sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par byed cing /_sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par byed pa'i lta ba de lta bu de la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig thun mong du byas te lta zhing gcig tu byed la kun du spyod pa zhes bya 
[\[234a.2\]]ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_'di ni kun du dga' bar byed pa'i chos yin no/_/dge slong dag ji srid du kun du dga' bar byed pa'i chos 'di drug yang dag par blangs nas kun du spyod/_dge slong dag kun du dga' bar byed pa'i chos 'di kun du snang na dge slong dag dge ba'i 
[\[234a.3\]]chos rnams nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_rgyas par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//_//bar sdom ni/_ston pa dang ni 'dul ba dang /_/las dang dad dang chos nyid dang /_/byang chub yan lag kun du dga'/_/dbyar byed pa dang yang dag bshad/_/de nas 
[\[234a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[234a.5\]]dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu yul ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can na mtshan mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 
[\[234a.6\]]slong rnams pa bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag mi shes shing ma mthong la khong du ma chud cing so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing kun du 'khor bar gyur to/_/bden pa bzhi po de dag gang 
[\[234a.7\]]zhe na/_nga dang khyed cag kho nas sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mi shes shing ma mthong la khong du ma chud cing so sor ma rtogs pas lam ring po 'dir rgyug cing kun du 'khor 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]bar gyur to/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[234b.2\]]'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de rjes su rtogs shing so sor rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zad de da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bde bar gshegs pas de skad 
[\[234b.3\]]gsungs te/_ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga dang khyed cag kho na yis/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag_/ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas/_/lam ring du ni 'khor bar gyur/_/bden pa de dag mthong nas ni/_/srid pa'i 
[\[234b.4\]]sred pa bcad nas su/_/'khor ba'i skye ba zad pa yis/_/da ni srid pa gzhan med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_da kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong gang na bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal 
[\[234b.5\]]zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/_dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so/_/dmar bu can 
[\[234b.6\]]gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te dmar bu can gyi grong du byon nas dmar bu can gyi mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang /_khyu nas khyur phrad 
[\[234b.7\]]cing 'dus nas dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]khyim bdag rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bram ze dang khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag 'di la bag med pa dang ldan zhing 
[\[235a.2\]]bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing /_bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par gyur pa gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes 
[\[235a.3\]]dmigs dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag med pa dang ldan zhing /_bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du yang rung /_bram ze'i 'khor du yang rung /_khyim bdag gi 'khor du yang rung /_dge sbyong gi 'khor 
[\[235a.4\]]du yang rung /_'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu zhum zhum por gyur nas dga' ba med pa dang /_bag tsha bas 'gro bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag med pa dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus gang dang gang du zhes 
[\[235a.5\]]bya ba nas/_bag tsha ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/_/'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag med pa dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa 
[\[235a.6\]]dang /_bsngags pa ma yin pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su sdig pa dang /_bsngags 
[\[235a.7\]]pa ma yin pa dang /_grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur ba 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]la gcags bzhin du dus byed par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags bzhin du dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no/_/
[\[235b.2\]]gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag med pa dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag med pa 
[\[235b.3\]]dang ldan zhing bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs lnga pa yin no/_/bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni 
[\[235b.4\]]bag yod pa'i phan yon yin te/_lnga gang zhe na/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag 
[\[235b.5\]]yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no/_/gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du 
[\[235b.6\]]yang rung /_bram ze'i 'khor du yang rung /_khyim bdag gi 'khor du yang rung /_dge sbyong gi 'khor du yang rung /_'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhum zhum por ma yin pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_bag tsha ba med pas 'gro bar 'gyur 
[\[235b.7\]]te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba nas bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dag bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dge ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dag bag yod 
[\[236a.2\]]pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su dge ba dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang 
[\[236a.3\]]bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa med par dus byed par 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la gcags pa 
[\[236a.4\]]med par dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no/_/gzhan yang bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams 
[\[236a.5\]]su skye bar 'gyur te/_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bag yod pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa yin no/_/de nas 
[\[236a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad 
[\[236a.7\]]de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi gnas 
[\[236b.2\]]'dir do mod bzhugs su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung 
[\[236b.3\]]bas gnang bar rig ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu 
[\[236b.4\]]can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen te gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /_'dug gnas kyi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir 'dug gnas kyi nang du gshegs so/_/de nas 
[\[236b.5\]]yang de'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed yul spong byed pa rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson par gyur pa dang /_de'i tshe dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams 'di lta ste/_gnas 
[\[236b.6\]]kyis 'dre bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin mo'i spyod pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'dre bar gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dgongs 
[\[236b.7\]]ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas 'dug gnas kyi grib ma la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong khyer rtsig par brtson pa de su yin ci thos/_btsun pa bdag gis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed yul spong byed pa rnams gzhom pa'i phyir dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig 
[\[237a.2\]]par brtson par thos lags so/_/kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed mkhas pa yin te/_'di ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig bgros pa lta zhig_/kun 
[\[237a.3\]]dga' bo nga 'di na nyin mo'i spyod pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'dre bar gzigs so/_/kun dga' bo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas 
[\[237a.4\]]kyis dres pa'i phyogs der 'di lta ste/_gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang du lha bar ma dang /_phal pas gnas kyis dres pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta ste/_gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma dang /_phal pa 
[\[237a.5\]]rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong 'dir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis dres pa'i phyogs 'dir 'di lta ste/_gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo ya 
[\[237a.6\]]rabs kyi gnas dang /_ya rabs kyi tha snyad ji snyed pa dang /_tshong pa ya rabs rnams kyi lam dang /_zong dgram par yang 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dmar bu can gyi grong khyer 'di mchog tu 'gyur ro/_/'di la bar chad gsum 'byung bar rig par bya ste/_me dang /_
[\[237a.7\]]chu dang /_nang 'khrug gis so/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis dge sbyong gau ta ma yul ma ga d+hA nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/_dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rten gyi drung na bzhugs 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]te/_de la dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par 
[\[237b.2\]]dga' ba dang /_yang dag par mgu ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag 
[\[237b.3\]]par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/
[\[237b.4\]]yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[237b.5\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/shes ldan gau ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyar zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze 
[\[237b.6\]]dbyar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu pa/_de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[237b.7\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs nas mngon par bstod de stan las langs te song ngo /_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]te gdan bshams nas chu snod nor bu can gzhag ste/_bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/_gau ta ma gdugs tshod lags te da de'i dus la bab na shes ldan gau ta mas de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[238a.2\]]'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe na bza' sham thabs mnabs chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/_yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge 
[\[238a.3\]]slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang 
[\[238a.4\]]bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod gsol nas phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar 
[\[238a.5\]]rig nas gser gyi bya ma bum thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma sbyin pa 'di las bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rgyu mthun pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi gang lags pa de dmar bu can 
[\[238a.6\]]gyi grong na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig ces de nyid la yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang ba 'dis 
[\[238a.7\]]rjes su yi rang ngo /_/skyes bu gang zag dad pa can/_/gang zhig lha rnams mchod byed pa/_/sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed gyur pas/_/de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags/_/mkhas shing yid ni gzhungs pa yis/_/gang gi phyogs su gnas 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]'cha' ba/_/tshul khrims ldan la bshos gsol nas/_/de yi 'og tu yon bsngo bya/_/de rnams rjed pas rjed 'gyur zhing /_/mchod pas yang ni mchod par 'gyur/_/de nas lto nas byung ba yi/_/bu la ma bzhin 'di la brtse/_/lha rnams brtse 
[\[238b.2\]]ba'i skyes bu de/_/bde ba bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par 
[\[238b.3\]]gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas stan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis der rgyu lhag pa gang yin pa de thams cad sbyin par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes 
[\[238b.4\]]bzhin du 'brang zhing 'di snyam du sems la mngon par 'du byed do/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo nas phyir gshegs pa de ni bdag gis gau ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags so/_/chu bo gang gA'i 'jug ngogs gang nas rgal ba de yang gau ta ma'i 'jug ngogs 
[\[238b.5\]]zhes gdags so snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag tu gshegs nas nub phyogs kyi sgor byung ste byang phyogs su rgyus 
[\[238b.6\]]nas chu bo gang gA gang na bar gshegs so/_/de nas yang de'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA'i mi rnams kyis chu bo gang gA la phan tshun rgal bar byed de/_kha cig ni shing shal ma la'i spang leb/_kha cig ni ku ba'i gru zam/_kha cig ni sngas nang tshangs can/_kha cig ni ra rkyal gyis so/_/
[\[238b.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/_ci chu bo gang gA'i rgyun las bzlog ste 'gro'am/_'on te tshu rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang zhing pha rol gyi 'gram du bzhugs par bya snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]tu tshu rol gyi 'gram nas mi snang zhing pha rol gyi 'gram na bzhugs par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kha 
[\[239a.2\]]cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran bor te rgya mtsho rgal/_/skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye bo rnams su rgal/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bram ze rgal bar gyur nas skom la bzhugs/_/dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 
[\[239a.3\]]'cha'o/_/gal te kun na chu yod na/_/khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya/_/sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas ni/_/su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo khang nas 
[\[239a.4\]]byung ba de la gau ta ma'i sgo zhes btags so/_/chu bo gang gA'i 'jug ngogs gang nas rgal ba de yang gau ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes btags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo grong khyer spyil po 
[\[239a.5\]]can du 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan te/_bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas grong khyer spyil po can du byon te/_grong khyer spyil po can du grong gi byang 
[\[239a.6\]]phyogs shing sha pa'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag tshul khrims ni 'di lta bu'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni 'di lta bu'o/_/shes rab ni 'di lta bu ste/_tshul khrims goms par bya 
[\[239a.7\]]ba las ting nge 'dzin la ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin la goms par byas pas shes rab la ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/shes rab goms par byas pas 'di lta ste/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las yang dag pa 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]ji lta ba bzhin sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams 'di ltar sems yang dag par rnam par grol te/_bdag ni skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi 
[\[239b.2\]]shes so zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo grong khyer sgra can ga la bar 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[239b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/_bcom ldan 'das dang yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon te/_sgra can gyi kun dzi ka'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo phal po che la mi ngas byung bar gyur te/_'di ltar dge 
[\[239b.4\]]bsnyen ud ka ta yang dus las 'das par gyur/_dge bsnyen nye ba dang /_rab brtson dang /_ka t+ya'i khyu mchog dang /_mdzes pa dang /_nye mdzes dang /_'chi ltas dang /_nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_bzang po dang /_shin tu bzang po dang /_grags pa dang /_
[\[239b.5\]]grags byin dang /_grags mchog kyang dus las 'das par gyur to/_/de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos chos gos dang lhung bzed blangs nas sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so/_/dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du 
[\[239b.6\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang /_sgra can 'dir skye bo phal po che shi bar gyur te/_'di ltar dge bsnyen ud ka ta yang dus las 'das/_dge bsnyen nye ba dang /_rab brtson dang /_ka t+ya'i khyu mchog dang /_mdzes pa dang /_nye mdzes dang /_'chi ltas dang /_nye 
[\[239b.7\]]ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_bzang po dang /_shin tu bzang po dang /_grags pa dang /_grags byin dang /_grags mchog dag kyang dus las 'das so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms brgyus te zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]snyoms spangs te lhung bzed dang /_chos gos mkhos su phab nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs 
[\[240a.2\]]gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te sgra can 'dir bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/_btsun pa 
[\[240a.3\]]bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na sgra can 'dir skye bo phal po che gum par gyur te/_'di ltar dge bsnyen ud ka ta dus las 'das/_dge bsnyen nye ba dang /_rab brtson dang /_ka t+ya'i khyu mchog dang /_mdzes pa dang /_nyi mdzes dang /_'chi 
[\[240a.4\]]ltas dang /_nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_bzang po dang /_shin tu bzang po dang /_grags pa dang /_grags sbyin dang /_grags mchog dag kyang du las 'das par thos lags na/_btsun pa de dag gar mchis lags/_'jig rten pha rol gyi gnas gang du skyes lags/_dge 
[\[240a.5\]]slong dag dge bsnyen ud ka ta ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs te/_de nyid du rdzus te skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te 'jig rten 'dir slar mi 'ong zhing mi 'byung ba'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dge bsnyen nye ba dang /_rab brtson dang /_ka t+ya'i khyu 
[\[240a.6\]]mchog dang /_mdzes pa dang /_nye mdzes dang /_'chi ltas dang /_nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang /_bzang po dang /_shin tu bzang po dang /_grags pa dang /_grags sbyin dang /_grags mchog rnams kyis kyang gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs te/_de nyid 
[\[240a.7\]]du rdzus te skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das te 'jig rten 'dir slar mi 'ong zhing mi 'byung ba'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag sgra can 'dir dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lha gcig dus las 'das pa gang yin pa dag kyang gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i kun du 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]sbyor ba lnga spangs te/_de nyid du rdzus te skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten 'dir slar mi 'ong zhing mi 'byung ba'i chos nyid du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag sgra can 'dir dge bsnyen sum brgya lhag cig gis ni kun du sbyor ba gsum po gang yin pa spangs te/_'dod 
[\[240b.2\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bsrabs nas lan gcig phyir 'ong ste 'jig rten 'dir lan gcig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag sgra can 'dir dge bsnyen lnga brgya lhag cig dus las 'das pas kyang kun du sbyor ba gsum 
[\[240b.3\]]po gang yin pa spangs te rgyun du zhugs pa las phyir mi ltung ba'i chos nyid du gyur cing nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur te/_re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun las mi 'da' ste lha'am mi rnams kyi nang du srid pa lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyar nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed 
[\[240b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed de bzhin gshegs pa la dus las 'das/_dus las 'das zhes zhu ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mtho btsam pa yin te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa la bde bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/_skye ba yod na nges par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur 
[\[240b.5\]]ba ni de la ngo mtshar mi che ste/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos kyi tshul ni gnas pa/_chos kyi dbyings 'di dag ni chos nyid kyi gnas pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen cing yang dag par thugs su chud de 'chad cing rab 
[\[240b.6\]]tu 'dogs par mdzad/_rab tu 'jog par mdzad/_rnam par 'byed par mdzad/_rnam par gsal bar mdzad/_ston par mdzad/_rab tu ston par mdzad pa ni 'di lta ste/_'di yod pas 'di 'byung la/_'di skyes pas 'di skye ste/_'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 
[\[240b.7\]]rnams/_'du byed rnams kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 
[\[241a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'di med pas 'di mi 'byung la/_'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di ltar ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag_/'du byed rnams 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas 
[\[241a.3\]]ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len 
[\[241a.4\]]pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 
[\[241a.5\]]'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag de lta mod kyi/_chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs ngas bshad par byas/_de rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/_/chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas la shes nas dad pa ni 
[\[241a.6\]]chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs so/_/chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims la shes nas dad pa ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/dge slong dag ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do zhes gsungs pa de ni 
[\[241a.7\]]bshad pa de yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yangs pa can du 'dong ngo /_/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_de nas bcom ldan 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas yangs pa can du byon te/_yangs pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te/_yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi bdag nyid 
[\[241b.2\]]kyi tshal na bzhugs par thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/_bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor nas bzhon pa bzang po la zhon te yangs pa can nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 
[\[241b.3\]]song ste/_des ji ltar bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du zhon te song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar song ngo /_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor gyi gung la chos ston cing bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po 
[\[241b.4\]]nas 'ongs pa gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag a mra skyong ma 'dir 'ong gis brtson pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pas gnas par gyis shig_/dge slong dag ngas de skad du rjes su bstan pa brtson pa la gnas pa gang 
[\[241b.5\]]zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/rab tu 'jog go/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad 
[\[241b.6\]]do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/rab tu 'jog go/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/rab tu 'jog go/_/dge ba'i chos skyes 
[\[241b.7\]]pa rnams gnas pa dang /_phyir zhing 'byung ba dang /_nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'phel zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/rab tu 'jog go/_/dge slong 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dag 'di ni brtson pa la gnas pa yin no/_/dge slong dag shes bzhin du gyur cing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i tshe shes bzhin du gnas pa gang zhe na/_lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_bskum pa dang /_brkyang ba dang /_chos gos snam sbyar gyon pa dang /_lhung bzed 
[\[242a.2\]]thogs pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_'dug pa dang /_nyal ba dang /_langs pa dang /_smra ba dang /_mi smra ba dang /_gnyid dang /_ngal ba dang /_ngal bso ba'i tshe shes bzhin du gyur pa ste/_dge slong dag 'di ni shes bzhin du gnas par gyur pa yin no/_/dge slong 
[\[242a.3\]]dag ji ltar dran par gyur pa yin zhe na/_dge slong dag 'di la nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang /_yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/_/phyi'i lus dang /_nang gi dang /_phyi dang 
[\[242a.4\]]nang gi lus dang /_phyi'i tshor ba dang /_nang gi dang /_phyi dang nang gi tshor ba dang phyi'i sems dang /_nang gi sems dang /_phyi dang nang gi sems dang /_phyi'i chos dang /_nang gi chos dang /_phyi dang nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta/_brtson 'grus dang /_shes bzhin dang /_
[\[242a.5\]]dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang /_yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so/_/dge slong dag 'di ni dran pa la gnas pa yin no/_/dge slong dag a mra skyong ma 'dir 'ong gis brtson pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_dran pas gnas par gyis shig ces 
[\[242a.6\]]ngas gang gsungs pa ni de yin no/_/de nas a mra skyong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma 
[\[242a.7\]]la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas a mra skyong ma stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[242b.2\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyar zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas a mra skyong ma la gnang bar mdzad do/_/de nas a mra skyong ma 
[\[242b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs te mngon par bstod nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI 
[\[242b.4\]]rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can gyi a mra skyong ma'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rang rang gi shing rta la zhon te/_kha cig ni rta sngon po/_/shing rta sngon po/_srab skyogs dang /_
[\[242b.5\]]lcag sngon po/_/thor tshugs dang /_gdugs dang /_ral gri shubs sngon po dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa sngon po dang /_'khor sngon po dang /_kha cig ni rta ser po/_shing rta ser po/_srab skyogs dang /_lcag ser po/_
[\[242b.6\]]thor tshugs dang /_gdugs ser po/_ral gri shubs dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa ser po/_'khor ser po dang /_kha cig ni rta dmar po/_shing rta dmar po/_srab skyogs dang lcag dmar po/_thor tshugs dang gdugs 
[\[242b.7\]]dmar po/_ral gri shubs dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa dmar po dang /_'khor dmar po'o/_/kha cig ni rta dkar po dang /_shing rta dkar po dang /_srab skyogs dang lcag dkar po dang /_thor tshugs dang /_gdugs dkar 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]po dang /_ral gri shubs dang /_rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_gos dang /_rgyan dang /_byug pa dkar po/_'khor dkar por chas te/_skad mthon po dang skad chen por slar khyer slar khyer ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[243a.2\]]la blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed cag 
[\[243a.3\]]las gang gis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la ltos shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji ltar da ltar yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI dag bzhin du rdzu 'phrul 
[\[243a.4\]]'di dang /_'byor pa 'di dang /_cha lugs 'dis skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro'o/_/ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te/_rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas bcom ldan 
[\[243a.5\]]'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par 
[\[243a.6\]]mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/_rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu 
[\[243a.7\]]dga' bar mdzad do/_/de nas yang de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u ser skya 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni spobs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i bu spobs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skyas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_
[\[243b.2\]]ang+ga'i rgyal po nor bu go 'chang ba/_/ma ga'i dbang pos rnyed pa legs rnyed de/_/de yi yul du byung ba'i sangs rgyas ni/_/grags pa'i sgra dag gangs kyi ri bo bzhin/_/ji ltar pad ma bzang po legs 'khrungs pa/_/dgongs ka kha 'bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin/_/bar snang la ni nyi 
[\[243b.3\]]ma lhag gi bar/_/snang ba lta bu'i nyi ma'i rgyud la ltos/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab stobs/_/ji ltar mtshan mo me 'bar lta bu ltos/_/de ni mig byed snang bar byed pa ste/_/lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom rnam par 'dul/_/lits+tsha bI lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[243b.4\]]ser skyas legs par smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u ser skyas legs par smras so/_/zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir byin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/_
[\[243b.5\]]yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/_yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo /_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[243b.6\]]gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyar zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_gnas 'jog dag nga 
[\[243b.7\]]sngar a mra skyong mas spyan drangs so/_/btsun pa a mra skyong ma dman pa shes rab dman pa des bdag cag bslus lags te thog mar bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi bar mchis pa'i rngo ma thog mod kyi da dung bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gnas 'jog dag legs par smras so zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi 
[\[244a.2\]]rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/bram ze'i khye'u ser skya ni de nyid du 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skyas yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams dong nas ring por ma lon par shes nas stan 
[\[244a.3\]]las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 'dir bdag la lits+tsha bI lnga brgyas bla gos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das 
[\[244a.4\]]kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bzhes su gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste bla gos lnga brgya bzhes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u ser skya la bka' stsal pa/_ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[244a.5\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_ser skya'i bu 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang 
[\[244a.6\]]zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/_de'i chos bstan pa thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar 
[\[244a.7\]]dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_tshangs par spyod pa rab tu ston te/_ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du byung ba dang po yin no/_/ser skya'i bu gzhan yang gang chos de gus pa dang bcas pas nyan cing bla mar byed/_dam par byed/_yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te rna ba blags nas sems thams cad bsdus te nyan par 
[\[244b.2\]]byed pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du byung ba gnyis pa yin no/_/ser skya'i bu gzhan yang chos de gang dag gis thos nas dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_nges 
[\[244b.3\]]par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba rgya chen po thos pa 'di ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du byung ba gsum pa yin no/_/ser skya'i bu gzhan yang gang dag gis 
[\[244b.4\]]chos de thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du byung ba bzhi pa yin no/_/ser skya'i bu gzhan yang gang dag gis chos de thos 
[\[244b.5\]]nas don zab mo'i gzhi so sor rtogs par byed pa ni ser skya'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du byung ba lnga pa yin no/_/ser skya'i bu skyes bu dam pa dag ni byas pa gzo 
[\[244b.6\]]ba dang byas pa tshor ba can yin te/_gang gis cung zad tsam byas pa yang chud gzon par mi byed na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos/_ser skya'i bu de lta bas na 'di ltar byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor ba can du bslab par bya ste/_cung zad tsam byas pa yang chud gzon par mi bya 
[\[244b.7\]]na mang po lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_ser skya'i bu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/de nas a mra skyong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/_nang par sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod dag bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[245a.2\]]spyan 'dren gyi gdugs tshod gsol pa/_btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags na da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/_na bza' chos gos dang /_lhung bzed bsnams te/_dge slong gi tshogs kyis 
[\[245a.3\]]bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas te/_a mra skyong ma'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/_/de nas a mra skyong mas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[245a.4\]]bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/_rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol 
[\[245a.5\]]zin nas phyag bcabs te/_lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma'i sbyin pa de la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_sbyin la dga' 'gyur 
[\[245a.6\]]de la skye bo sten/_/snyan pa thob cing de yi grags pa 'phel/_/ser sna med cing tshogs par 'gro ba na/_/zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/de lta bas na mkhas pa bde 'dod pas/_/ser sna'i dri ma spangs te sbyin pa gtong /_/de dag yun ring sum 
[\[245a.7\]]bcu rtsa gsum gnas/_/lha dag dang yang skal ba mnyam par dga'/_/sbyin gtong dge byed de ni shi 'phos nas/_/rang gi 'od kyis dga' ba'i tshal na rgyu/_/de na de dag rtsen cing dga' byed pa/_/'dod pa'i yon tan mang po dag dang ldan/_/ma bcings skyob pa 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]de yi gsung thos nas/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i nyan thos mtho ris dga'/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu
