[\[266a.1\]]byug pa sbyin par byed do/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po ku sha can gyi pho brang na gang dag ra ro ba dang /_g.yon can dang /_chang 'tshong rnams rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_dga' mgur spyod par 'dod pa de dag ta la de dag gi bar bar du shin tu rtse zhing /_dga' ba 
[\[266a.2\]]dang /_dga' mgur spyod par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po rtswa can gyi pho brang na ta la de dag las sgra yid du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/_glang po che'i sgra dang /_rta'i sgra dang /_shing rta'i sgra dang /_dpung bu chung gi sgra dang /_dung gi sgra dang /_rnga bo che'i sgra dang /_tshogs pa'i sgra dang /_rnga 
[\[266a.3\]]pa Ta ha'i sgra dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_glu'i sgra dang /_gling bu'i sgra dang /_sbyin pa ni byin/_bsod nams ni byas/_za gcig pa ni smyung ba byas te tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa'i sgra ste sgra bcu gnyis dang ldan par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po rtswa can gyi pho brang na 'khor 
[\[266a.4\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang mi rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi dang ldan te/_rin po che sna bdun gang dang ldan zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor lo rin po che dang /_glang po rin po che dang /_rta rin po che dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_bud med 
[\[266a.5\]]rin po che dang /_khyim bdag rin po che dang /_bdun pa ni blon po rin po che'o/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong chen po mi rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi gang dang ldan zhe na/_tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa yin te/_gzhon nu rtsed mo rtse ba la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/
[\[266a.6\]]rgyal tshab byed pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/rgyal po chen po byed pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong chen po tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa yin te/_des 
[\[266a.7\]]lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ni gzhon nu dga' bas rtsed mo rtses/_lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ni rgyal tshab byas/_lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ni rgyal po chen po byas/_lo brgyad khri bzhi stong ni rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa byas pa gang yin pa 'di ni kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong chen 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob ste/_kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_
[\[266b.2\]]blta na sdug pa/_mi'i kha dog las ni 'das/_lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa yin te/_kun dga' bo 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po gnod pa chung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin yin te/_pho ba ha 
[\[266b.3\]]cang bsil ba ma yin zhing /_ha cang dro ba ma yin pa/_drod snyoms pa dang /_dus kun du bde ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar gyur te/_kun dga' bo rgyal po legs 
[\[266b.4\]]mthong chen po gnod pa nyung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can/_pho ba ha cang bsil ba ma yin zhing /_ha cang dro ba ma yin pa/_drod snyoms pa dang /_dus kun du bde ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas zos pa dang /_'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa rnams legs 
[\[266b.5\]]par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni grong mi dang yul mi rnams la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa yin te/_dper na bu 
[\[266b.6\]]rnams la pha bzhin no/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyi snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa dper na pha la bu rnams bzhin te/_kun dga' bo dus gcig cig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro ba na kha lo 
[\[266b.7\]]sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba shing rta rim gyis dal bu dal bus sgyur cig ngas grong mi dang yul mi rnams la yun ring du blta bar bya'o/_/grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis kyang kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba shing rta rim gyis dal bu dal bus sgyur cig_/nged kyang lha 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]la yun ring du blta bar bya'o/_/kun dga' bo gang gi tshe rgyal po legs mthong chen po grong mi dang yul mi rnams la snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa ni dper na bu rnams la pha bzhin no/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen po la grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyi 
[\[267a.2\]]snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa ni dper na pha la bu rnams bzhin te/_kun dga' bo 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che mang po dag khyer 
[\[267a.3\]]te rgyal po legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i slad du bdag cag gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che mang po dag 'tshal te mchis lags na/_lhas thugs brtse 
[\[267a.4\]]ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes su gsol/_sna bo dag nga'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas/_len du ma btub pa dang /_grong mi dang /_yul mi rnams kyis rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i slad du bdag cag 
[\[267a.5\]]gis gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che mang po 'tshal te mchis pa 'di dag lhas thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/_rgyal po legs mthong chen pos kyang grong mi dang yul mi rnams la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du 'di skad ces smras 
[\[267a.6\]]so/_/sna bo dag nga'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas/_len du ma btub bo/_/de nas grong mi dang yul mi rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis lha'i phyir gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po 
[\[267a.7\]]che mang po khyer te 'ongs pa 'di dag bdag cag gis 'di dag blangs te rang rang gi gnas su 'dong ba ni bdag cag gi tshul ma yin pas ma la bdag cag gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i mdun du gser dang /_dngul gyi phung po cher spungs la mtha' gcig tu nor bu 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che dag bzhag ste/_'di ni lha'i dkor gyi rigs yin no zhes smras te/_btang snyoms su bor la 'dong ngo snyam nas/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_la ba rin po che dag rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i mdun du nye bar 
[\[267b.2\]]bzhag nas btang snyoms su bor te dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi nor gyi rigs ni chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa yin gyis chos ma yin pas ni ma yin pas ma la bdag gis chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]brtsig go snyam pa dang /_
[\[267b.3\]]mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig par spro'o zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha 
[\[267b.4\]]chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig pa la thugs kyi phrin las bskyung du gsol/_lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o/_/sna bo dag nga'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi dgos so zhes smras nas ma gnang ngo /_/
[\[267b.5\]]mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig pa la thugs kyi phrin las bskyung du gsol/_lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gis

[\[267b.7\]]rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i rkang pa la gtugs nas kha cig gis ni lag pa nas bzung /_kha cig gis ni gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung /_kha cig gis ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_rgyal 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rtsig pa la thugs kyi phrin las bskyung du gsol/_lha'i chos kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po legs mthong chen pos mtha'i

[\[270a\]]

[\[270a.3\]]bo gser las byas pa'i ta la la ni lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dngul las byas pa btsugs so/_/dngul las byas pa la ni gser las byas pa'o/_/bai DUr+ya las byas pa la ni shel las byas pa'o/_/shel las byas pa'i ta la la ni lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_

[\[270b.1\]]dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i ta la'i tshal gyi bya ba thams cad zin par rig nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i rdzing dang /_chos

[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/dngul las byas pa'i khri las babs te gser las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma nas byung nas dngul las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma'i nang du zhugs te gser las byas pa'i khri la 'dug go/_/khri la 'dug nas 'dod pa dag las dben

[\[271a.3\]]'dug go/_/khri la 'dug nas 'dod pa dag las dben pa zhes bya ba nas/_bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/_/shel las byas pa'i khri las babs te bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma nas byung nas shel las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg

[\[271a.5\]]der dong ste lhags nas btsun mo rin po che la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag cag ni lha ma mthong nas ring zhig lags te/_bdag cag ni lha mthong bar shin tu skom pas bdag cag ni lha blta bar 'tshal lo/_/phu nu mo khyed cag de'i phyir sdod cig dang /_
[\[271a.6\]]ci tsam ngas blon po rin po che la dri bar bya'o/_/de nas btsun mo rin po ches blon po rin po che pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/dmag dpon shes par byos shig_/nged kyis lha ma mthong nas ring zhig lon te/_nged lha la blta bar shin tu skom pas deng ni lha blta bar 'dod 
[\[271a.7\]]do/_/de'i phyir sring mo dag khyed thams cad rgyan ser po/_gos ser po/_phreng ba dang /_phyang phrul dang /_byug pa ser po/_/'khor rnams ser por chos shig dang /_ji tsam bdag gis mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i gso sbyong la sogs 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]pa glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/de nas btsun mo thams cad rgyan ser po dang /_gos ser po dang /_phreng ba dang /_phyang 
[\[271b.2\]]phrul dang /_byug pa ser por 'khor rnams ser por chas so/_/de nas blon po rin po che mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i gso sbyong la sogs pa glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri 
[\[271b.3\]]bzhi stong dang /_shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong bsdus so/_/bsdus nas btsun mo rin po che ni shing rta dga' dbyangs su zhugs/_bud med lhag ma gzhan ni rang rang gi shing rtar zhugs te chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ga la bar dong ngo /_/de'i tshe chos 
[\[271b.4\]]dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]'og nas skye bo phal po che'i sgra mang po dang /_sgra chen po dag grag pa dang /_rgyal po legs mthong chen pos chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]'og na skye bo phal po che'i sgra grag pa thos so/_/thos nas skyes bu nye gnas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[271b.5\]]kye skyes bu chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di'i 'og na skye bo phal po che'i sgra mang po dang /_sgra chen po grag pa 'di ci zhig yin/_lha de na btsun mo rin po che la sogs pa bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]'og nas lha blta bar 'tshal te/_blon po rin po che 
[\[271b.6\]]la sogs pa mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i gso sbyong la sogs pa glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong chos dang mthun pa'i 
[\[271b.7\]]khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di'i 'og nas mchi ba lags so/_/kye skyes bu khyod kyis de'i phyir chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]shod du gang la nga 'dug nas skye bo mang po lta ba gser las byas pa'i stan bzang po shoms shig_/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes bu des rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i ltar 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]mnyan nas chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]shod du gser las byas pa'i gdan bzang po bshams te rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la bar song nas phyin te rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]shod du gser 
[\[272a.2\]]las bgyis pa'i gdan bzang po bshams lags na/_lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/_de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas 'bab pa na bud med de thams cad rgyan ser po dang /_gos ser po dang /_phreng ba dang /_phyang phrul dang /_byug 
[\[272a.3\]]pa ser po dang /_'khor ser por chas pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang kye ma bud med 'di dag ni chags par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas gnam du lta zhing 'dug pa dang /_btsun mo rin po ches rgyal po legs mthong chen po gnam du lta zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 'di snyam du 
[\[272a.4\]]sems te/_ji ltar lhas bdag cag mthong nas gnam du lta zhing 'dug pa dang sbyar na/_lhas bdag cag la gnod pa zhig byed par mi 'gyur grang snyam mo/_/de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas babs nas gser las byas pa'i stan bzang po 
[\[272a.5\]]bshams pa la 'dug pa dang /_btsun mo rin po che rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas btsun mo rin po ches rgyal po legs mthong 
[\[272a.6\]]chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bud med brgyad khri bzhi [(]stang [,]stong [)]po 'di dag ni lha'i lags kyis/_lha 'di dag la dgyes pa bskyed pa dang 'tsho ba'i slad du gzigs su gsol/_blon po rin po che la sogs pa mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i 
[\[272a.7\]]gso sbyong la sogs pa glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang rtswa can la sogs pa grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_khang 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pa rtseg ma ba gam can la sogs pa khang pa rtseg ma brgyad khri bzhi stong 'di dag ni lha'i lags kyis/_lha 'di dag la dgyes par bskyed pa dang /_'tsho ba'i slad du gzigs su gsol/_sring mo khyod sngon ni nga la mdza' bshes bzhin byed na da ni khyod kyis 'gran zlar byas so/_/
[\[272b.2\]]de nas btsun mo rin po che rgyal po legs mthong chen pos sring mo zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bos pas ngus te mchi ma phyung nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar lhas bdag cag la sring mo zhes bka' stsal te bos pas da ni bdag cag ring po mi thogs par lha dang thabs cig tu mi 'gyur te 
[\[272b.3\]]'bral ba dang /_'gyes pa dang /_rnam par 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas btsun mo rin po ches rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i gos kyi mtha' ma nas bzung ste/_mchi ma blags nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lhas bdag cag la sngon mdza' bshes bzhin 'gran zla ma mchis par bgyis pa de 
[\[272b.4\]]ji lta bu lags/_sring mo khyod tshur shog 'di skad ces mi rnams ni yun thung ngur 'tsho ba skyes nas mi 'chi ba med cing tshe rabs gzhan du 'gro bar 'gyur bas dge ba byos shig_/tshangs par spyad pa la spyod cig ces smros shig_/lha gang dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam la lha'i sku thams cad 
[\[272b.5\]]nas thams cad du 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi dga' ste/_gang lha'i bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dgyes pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du lhas spang bar mdzad du gsol/_gang dag lhas blon po 
[\[272b.6\]]rin po che la sogs pa khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i gso sbyong la sogs pa glang po che brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_
[\[272b.7\]]rgyal po'i pho brang rtswa can la sogs pa grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_khang pa rtseg ma ba gam can la sogs pa khang pa rtseg ma brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dgyes pa dang /_yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de lha 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]slad du spang zhing yal bar dor du gsol/_de dag gis smras pa/_'di ltar bdag cag ni lha la mdza' bshes bzhin bgyid de 'gran zlar mi bgyid na/_lhas mi rnams ni yun thung ngur 'tsho ba skyes nas mi 'chi ba med cing tshe rabs gzhan du mchi bar 'gyur bas 
[\[273a.2\]]dge ba bgyi'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/_/lha gang dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam la lha'i sku thams cad nas thams cad du 'jig par 'gyur zhing mi dga' ste/_gang lha'i bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dgyes pa dang /_
[\[273a.3\]]yid du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag lha 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du spang zhing btang snyoms su mdzad du gsol/_gang dag lhas blon po rin po che la sogs pa mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po nye ba'i gso sbyong la sogs pa glang po che brgyad 
[\[273a.4\]]khri bzhi stong dang /_rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la sogs pa rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_shing rta dga' dbyangs la sogs pa shing rta brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang rtswa can la sogs pa grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_khang pa rtseg ma ba gam can la 
[\[273a.5\]]sogs pa khang pa rtseg ma brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'dun pa dang /_chags pa dang /_sdug pa dang /_dgyes pa dang /_yid du mchi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de lha 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du spang zhing btang snyoms su mdzad du gsol/_de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po 
[\[273a.6\]]la btsun mo rin po ches gdams pa 'di btams pa dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]'dzegs te/_gser las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg mar zhugs nas/_dngul las byas pa'i khri'i steng na 'dug go/_/khri'i steng du 'dug nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[273a.7\]]sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_bla dang /_'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas 
[\[273b.2\]]phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/dngul las byas pa'i khri las babs nas gser las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma nas byung ste/_dngul las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg mar zhugs nas gser las byas pa'i khri la 'dug go/_/khri la 'dug 
[\[273b.3\]]nas snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[273b.4\]]gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu 
[\[273b.5\]]bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/gser las byas pa'i khri las babs te dngul las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma nas byung nas bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg mar zhugs te shel las byas pa'i khri la 'dug go/_/khri la 
[\[273b.6\]]'dug nas dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de 
[\[273b.7\]]bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/shel las byas pa'i khri las babs te bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg ma nas byung nas shel las byas pa'i khang pa rtseg mar zhugs te bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i 
[\[274a.2\]]khri la 'dug go/_/khri la 'dug nas btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/
[\[274a.3\]]de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /_de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /_steng dang /_'og dang /_thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa/_'gran zla med pa/_gnod pa med pa/_yangs 
[\[274a.4\]]pa/_rgya chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas shing bsgoms te/_de lan mang du byas pas 'dod pa rnams dang /_
[\[274a.5\]]'dod pa la 'dun pa spangs te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po legs mthong chen po 'chi ba'i tshe 'di 'dra ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ste/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa kha zas bzang po zos nas de'i mod la kha zas kyis dub par 
[\[274a.6\]]gyur pa bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo grong khyer rtswa can nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /_shing sA la zung gi tshal gyi bar dang /_gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis kho ra khor yug 'di dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus 'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[274a.7\]]rgyal po mdzad pa'i tshe lan drug btang bar gyur cing /_kun dga' bo der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang lan bdun te/_kun dga' bos phyogs de las gang shar phyogs sam/_gang lho phyogs sam/_gang nub phyogs sam/_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gang byang phyogs dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lus 'dor bar 'gyur ba brgyad pa ni ngas ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_srid pa'i sred pa bcad cing 'khor bar skye bar zad pas 'di las srid pa gzhan mi 'byung ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dpe can bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan 
[\[274b.2\]]snga na 'dug pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dpe can la kwa'i dge slong nga'i mdun na ma 'dug cig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis dgung lo nyi shu lhag gi bar du 
[\[274b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring nye gnas bgyis na 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa dpe can la bka' drag tu phab cing smad pa ni sngan chad bdag gis ma thos so/_/'di ltar kun dga' bo tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub pa'i lha rnams 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[274b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni brgya lam na res 'ga' zhig ci zhig ltar 'jig rten 'dir 'byung ste/_dper na me tog u dum bA ra bzhin la/_bcom ldan 'das de yang deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur 
[\[274b.5\]]la/_dge slong dbang che bar grags pa de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'dug ste/_des bdag cag la rgyab kyis bltas pas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ma nus so zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/btsun 
[\[274b.6\]]pa bcom ldan 'das lha ji snyed cig mchis mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_kun dga' bo ji tsam grong khyer rtswa can nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /_ji tsam shing sA la zung gi tshal gyi bar nas gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis kho 
[\[274b.7\]]ra khor yug tu dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa'i lha rnams kyis ma khyab cing ma gang ba cung zad kyang med de chung ngu na khar ba gzugs pa'i khyon tsam yang med do/_/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]btsun pa ci lags/_tshe dang ldan pa dpe can 'dis las ci zhig bgyis na dbang che bar grags par gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag dge slong dpe can 'dis las tshogs rnyed pa/_rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin 
[\[275a.2\]]nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dag ni dge slong dpe can gyis las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/_dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_chu'i 
[\[275a.3\]]khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_me'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/_rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/_'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/_
[\[275a.4\]]las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba yin/_/dge slong dag bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde 
[\[275a.5\]]bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_yul bA rA Na sI grong khyer drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs pa de'i tshe de de'i gsung 
[\[275a.6\]]rab la rab tu byung bar gyur te/_ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dge skos kyi res bab pa dang /_dge slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te yul bA rA Na sIr bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /_dgun gyi dus su dus ma yin par sprin chen po las 
[\[275a.7\]]char bab par gyur pa dang /_des bsams pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams dus ma yin pa'i char bab pas gsher nas grang bas nyen te 'ong bas me bud par bya'o snyam ste/_des bsro gang du zhugs nas me bus te/_khyams kho ra khor yug tu gzar thag bres nas gtsug lag khang 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]gi sgo na slar 'ong ba lta zhing 'dug go/_/ji tsam na dge slong rnams slar 'ong ba dang /_de nas bsro gang du stan bting ngo /_/dge slong de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos gzhan la byin nas gang char gyis gsher ba de dag gzar thag la gzar to/_/de nas dge slong de dag bsro gang du zhugs 
[\[275b.2\]]te me la bskor nas me 'de zhing 'dug pa dang /_ji tsam na grang ba med par gyur te/_de dag me'i 'od tsha nas rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug go/_/de nas dge skos de dad pa skyes nas dge slong de rnams kyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smon lam bya bar brtsams pa gang bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa 'di 
[\[275b.3\]]dag grang bas nyen pa'i skyabs byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gang su dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes 
[\[275b.4\]]bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thob pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas/_ji ltar de dag gis me'i 'od mi bzod pa de bzhin du bdag gi gzi brjid la lha rnams kyis kyang mi bzod par gyur cig ces de skad 
[\[275b.5\]]smon lam btab pa'i dbang gis 'di nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa mngon du byas te dbang che bar grags pas lha rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid zil gyis gnon mi nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[275b.6\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la bdag cag gis mchod pa ji snyed cig brtson par bgyi lags/_kun dga' bo khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig_/'di ni bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag sgrub par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bram ze 
[\[275b.7\]]dang /_khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis 'di la ji ltar sgrub par bgyid lags/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin du byed do/_/btsun pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la ji ltar bgyid lags/_kun dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni lus shing 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bal gyi 'da' bas dkri zhing shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris nas ras zung lnga brgyas g.yog par bya/_ras zung lnga brgyas g.yogs te lcags kyi sgrom du bcug nas 'bru mar gyis bkang ste steng nas lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab nas dri zhim po'i shing thams cad 
[\[276a.2\]]spungs te/_des bsregs nas me de dag 'o mas bsad de de'i rus pa gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs te/_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i 
[\[276a.3\]]sgras bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing dus ston chen po yang byed do/_/kun dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de bas kyang lhag par bya'o/_/kun dga' bo song 
[\[276a.4\]]la grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la gnas 'jog dag khyed kyi ston pa ni deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bas gyad khyed kyi bya ba dang sgrub pa dag der byos la/_da phyin chad grong gi nyen kor pa bdag 
[\[276a.5\]]cag gi ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das te/_bdag cag gis de la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ma nus so zhes 'gyod par ma byed cig ces smros shig_/bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 
[\[276a.6\]]kyi ltar mnyan nas snam sbyar blangs te/_dge slong gzhan dag dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dang bcas te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyi 'dun khang ga la bar song ste/_phyin pa dang /_de'i tshe grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyi 'dun khang na gyad lnga brgya tsam zhig bya ba dag 
[\[276a.7\]]cig gi don du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig_/ston pa ni deng gi mtshan mo'i gung 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]thun 'di la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur bas gyad khyed kyi bya ba dang sgrub pa dag der byos la/_da phyin chad grong gi nye 'khor pa bdag cag gi ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das te/_
[\[276b.2\]]bdag cag gis de la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ma nus so zhes 'gyod par ma byed cig_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ltar mnyan nas de dag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 
[\[276b.3\]]'tsho ba dang /_de dag gi mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_blon po dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams grong khyer rtswa can nas byung nas shing sA la zung gi tshal ga la bar song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_grong 
[\[276b.4\]]khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad gtso bo gtso bo dag stan las 
[\[276b.5\]]langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag cag ni 'di ltar grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad ces bgyi ba lags te/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 
[\[276b.6\]]slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchis te bslab pa'i gzhi rab tu gzung bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_dge bsnyen gyi so sor bshags pa byar/_
[\[276b.7\]]grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams nam phyed na slar yang 'gro dgos te/_so sor bshags par mi 'gyur bas ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams dge bsnyen gyi so sor bshags pa cig car gdon par bya'o snyam mo//_//'dul ba 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu bzhi pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa 
[\[277a.2\]]'di ltar grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams dang /_de dag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed ma dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams 'di rnams sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[277a.3\]]skyabs su mchi ste/_bslab pa'i gzhi rab tu 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad de dang de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/_de'i mtshan mo gung thun ma 'das par dge bsnyen gyi so sor bshags par byas so/_/de nas 
[\[277a.4\]]grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo /_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na 
[\[277a.5\]]bzhugs pa'i tshe gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher bstan te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab dga' shes par gyis shig_/
[\[277a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher bstan te yum gyi lhums su zhugs kyis de bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo /_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni re zhig glu dbyangs len gyis 
[\[277a.7\]]kau shi ka song shig_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab dga' shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums nas byung gis de'i zhal ta dang /_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]g.yog bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo /_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni re zhig glu dbyangs len gyis kau shi ka song shig_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nus rol cing rol pa de'i tshe yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab dga' shes par gyis 
[\[277b.2\]]shig_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu rol pas rol cing bzhugs kyis de la bdag cag gis bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo /_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni re zhig glu dbyangs len pas kau shi ka song shig_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba gzigs nas thugs byung ste 
[\[277b.3\]]dka' thub kyi nags tshal du zhugs so/_/gang gi tshe dka' ba spyad nas dka' thub las bzhengs pa de'i tshe grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas lan bcu drug tu nying khur byas pa'i 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba gsol nas ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /_ci bder 'bras chan 
[\[277b.4\]]dang /_zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing sku til mar dang /_mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab dga' shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rga ba dang /_na ba 
[\[277b.5\]]dang /_'chi ba gzigs te thugs byung nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal du zhugs nas dka' ba spyad do/_/gang gi tshe grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /_dga' stobs mas lan bcu drug tu nying khur byas pa'i 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba gsol nas ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /_ci bder 
[\[277b.6\]]'bras chan dang /_zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing sku til mar dang /_mar sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku 'khru bar mdzad kyis de la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo /_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni re zhig glu dbyangs len gyis kau shi ka song shig_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 
[\[277b.7\]]'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug btul te bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud pa de'i tshe tshangs pas gsol te yul bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gang dang gang dag na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_ljongs de dang de dag tu gdul ba rnams btul te grong khyer rtswa can du gshegs nas tha ma'i gzims mal du zhugs pa de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dri za'i rgyal po shes 
[\[278a.2\]]par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba phrag sum bcu rtsa drug btul te bla na med pa'i ye shes thugs su chud nas tshangs pas gsol te yul bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor nas de'i tshe phyogs gang dang gang dag na grong 
[\[278a.3\]]dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_ljongs de dang de dag tu gdul ba rnams btul te grong khyer rtswa can du gshegs nas tha ma'i gzims mal du zhugs kyis de la chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'deng bar bya'o/_/des smras pa/_kho bo ni re zhig glu dbyangs len gyis kau shi 
[\[278a.4\]]ka song shig_/de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rab dga' shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das tha ma'i gzims mal du zhugs te yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur gyis de la bdag cag bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo /_/des smras 
[\[278a.5\]]pa/_kho bo ni re zhig glu dbyangs len gyis kau shi ka song shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/_kun du rgyu rab bzang ni ngas gdul bar rung na dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' ni gdul bar dka' ste/_nyan thos kyis gdul ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul bar spyod kyi sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba 
[\[278a.6\]]la ni nyan thos kyis 'dul mi nus pas de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas gdul bar bya ba'i mkhyen pa ni bla na med de/_ma la 'di bdag gis gdul bar bya gor ma chag snyam du dgongs nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par snyoms par zhugs na tha ma'i gzims mal du sprul pa bzhag nas pi bang rgyud 
[\[278a.7\]]stong pa khog pa bai DUr+ya las byas pa bsnams te tha ma'i gzims mal nas byung nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang dri za'i rgyal po rab dga'i sgo na bzhugs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' yang gang nga lta bu ni med do zhes dri za'i rgyal po 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]rab dga' dregs par gyur te/_des pi bang snyan pa snyan pa blangs nas yid rab tu dga' bar gyur cing 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo srung gi skyes bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kwa'i skyes bu song la dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la sgo gar dri za zhig shes ldan blta ba'i phyir 'ongs so 
[\[278b.2\]]zhes byos shig_/de song nas smras pa dang /_de dregs pas myos nas smras pa/_kwa'i ci zer cing las gzhan pa'i dri za yang yod dam/_des smras pa/_gzhan dag lta re zhig smos kyang mi 'tshal gyi sgo drung 'di kho na na mchis lags so/_/dri za de dregs pas myos pa'i shugs kyis mod la sgor byung ste/_des smras 
[\[278b.3\]]pa/_kwa'i skyes bu khyod dri za yin nam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kwa'i nga dri za te por yin no/_/des smras pa/_gal te de lta na glu dbyangs blang gis tshur shog_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kwa'i legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes ji tsam bcom ldan 'das dang de lhan cig 'gran to/_/bcom 
[\[278b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis rgyud gcig bcad pa dang /_des kyang rgyud gcig bcad de pi bang gnyis ka'i rgyud dang sgra mnyam mo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gnyis bcad pa dang /_de bzhin du sgra dang gdangs khyad par med do/_/de bzhin du gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa nas/_rgyud gcig pa'i bar du bzhag pa dang /_rab [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]
[\[278b.5\]]kyang gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa nas/_rgyud gcig pa'i bar du bzhag na de bzhin du pi bang gnyis ka skad dang gdangs khyad par med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud gcig pa yang bcad de/_nam mkha' kho na la yang sgra dang gdangs de bzhin du gyur pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' ngo 
[\[278b.6\]]mtshar skyes nas nga rgyal gyis dregs pa med par gyur nas des bsams pa/_bdag pas 'phags pa'i dri za gzhan yang yod pa lta snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za'i cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu 
[\[278b.7\]]dang ldan zhing /_sku nyi ma stong gi 'od bas lhag pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/_rin po che'i ri ltar kun nas bzang ba/_rang gi sku nyid du bzhugs pa dang /_dri za'i rgyal po rab [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]mthong ste/_de dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_khams dang /_rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad de/_gang thos pas dri za'i rgyal po rab [{]dga'as [,]dgas [}]'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu 
[\[279a.2\]]mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas/_des bden pa mthong ste lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/_btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas ma bgyis te/_mas kyang ma lags/_rgyal pos ma lags/_lhas ma lags/_mdza' bos ma 
[\[279a.3\]]lags/_rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/_sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/_khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/_rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/_ngan song gi sgo ni 
[\[279a.4\]]bkum/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste/_bdag lha dang mi'i gnas su bzhag pas/_btsun pa bdag nam bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/_deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa las log 
[\[279a.5\]]ste/_mngon par dad nas skyabs su mchi lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za'i rgyal po rab dga' la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug_/yang dag par gzengs bstod/_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do/_/ji 
[\[279a.6\]]ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur cing tha ma'i gzims mal du zhugs pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer rtswa can na kun du rgyu rab bzang zhes bya ba/_rgas pa/_rnyings pa/_'khogs pa/_lo 
[\[279a.7\]]brgya nyi shu lon pa de la grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed de dgra bcom par grags pa zhig gnas so/_/de grong khyer rtswa can rdzing dal gyis 'bab pa'i 'gram u dum bA ra'i tshal gyi drung na nyin par gyi spyod pas gnas pa dang /_gang 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]gi tshe bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa gzigs pa lngas gzigs te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher bstan te yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa de'i tshe u dum bA ra'i tshal sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[279b.2\]]gi tshe yum gyi lhums nas byung ba de'i tshe sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe gzhon nu rol pas rol pa de'i tshe me tog kha 'bus par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba gzigs te thugs byung nas dka' thub kyi nags tshal du zhugs pa de'i tshe me tog kha bye bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[279b.3\]]gang gi tshe dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe me tog kha bye ba rnyings par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe dka' ba spyad pa don med par mkhyen nas ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /_ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /_ci bder 'bras chan dang /_zan dron gyi zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing /_sku til mar dang /_mar 
[\[279b.4\]]sar gyis byugs te zhes bya ba nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_de'i tshe me tog thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gsol te yul bA rA Na sIr gshegs nas lan 
[\[279b.5\]]gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i tshe u dum bA ra'i tshal lam me lhan ne lhang nger 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs gang dang gang dag na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_ljongs de dang 
[\[279b.6\]]de dag tu gdul ba rnams btul te grong khyer rtswa can du tha ma'i gzims mal du bzhugs pa de'i tshe yang u dum bA ra'i tshal rnyings par 'gyur ba de thams cad kun du rgyu rab bzang gis mtshan mar byas pa dang /_grong khyer rtswa can na gnas pa'i lha zhig gis grong khyer rtswa can pa la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[279b.7\]]pa ni deng gi nam gyi gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa/_de kun du rgyu rab bzang gis thos so/_/thos nas kyang dge sbyong gau ta ma deng gi nam gyi gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur na bdag ni chos rnams la the tshom yod par gyur te/_bdag gi the tshom yod pa de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas bdag gi the tshom sel spyod par 'gyur ro snyam du bdag sems shing 'dug ste/_ma la bdag bcom 
[\[280a.2\]]ldan 'das gau ta ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_gal te zhus nas lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o snyam nas grong khyer rtswa can nas byung ste shing sA la zung gnyis kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo /_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyi rol du byung ste/_bla gab 
[\[280a.3\]]med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa dang /_kun du rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyi rol tu byung ste/_bla gab med pa'i 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[280a.4\]]kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye kun dga' bo bdag gis dge sbyong gau ta ma deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes thos nas bdag ni chos rnams la the tshom yod par gyur te/_bdag 
[\[280a.5\]]gi the tshom yod pa de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas bdag gi the tshom sel spyod par 'gyur ro snyam du bdag sems shing mchis na/_gal te btsun pa kun dga' bos nang du mchi bar gnang ste/_gal te zhus nas lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs [(]phya na [,]phye na [)]phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar bgyi'o/_/rab 
[\[280a.6\]]bzang de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tshe bar ma byed cig chog go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni dub bo/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni dub bo/_/kun du rgyu rab bzang gis lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye kun dga' bo bdag gis kun du 
[\[280a.7\]]rgyu spyod pa can rgan po rgan po slob dpon snga rabs dag las de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni/_brgya lam res 'ga' na/_'di ltar me tog u dum bA ra bzhin no zhes thos te/_bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun 
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]la phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur la/_bdag ni chos rnams la the tshom du gyur te/_bdag gi the tshom yod pa de 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das gau ta mas bdag gi the tshom sel spyod par 'gyur ro snyam du bdag sems shing mchis te/_gal te 
[\[280b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nang du mchi bar gnang na/_gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar bgyi'o zhes lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du kun du rgyu rab bzang gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa dang /_rab bzang de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tshe bar ma 
[\[280b.3\]]byed cig chog go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ni dub bo/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni mnyel to/_/de ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_kun du rgyu rab bzang gnyis lhan cig bar skabs kyi gtam zer ba bcom ldan 'das kyi lha'i snyan rnam par dag cing mi'i las 'das pas 
[\[280b.4\]]gsan te/_gsan nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo kun du rgyu rab bzang 'di ma dgag par ci dang ci 'dod pa 'drir thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga dang mu stegs can lhan cig bar skabs kyi gtam gleng ba'i tha mar 'gyur ba 
[\[280b.5\]]ni 'di yin no/_/'di lta ste kun du rgyu rab bzang 'di nyid ngas mngon sum du tshur zhes byas pas nga'i nyan thos dge slong rab tu byung ba rnams kyi tha mar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de nas kun du rgyu rab bzang bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye ba dang dga' mgu rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang /_
[\[280b.6\]]yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_
[\[280b.7\]]kun du rgyu rab bzang gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/kye gau ta ma gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phye na phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar bgyi'o/_/rab bzang ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig_/kye gau ta ma 'jig rten 'di dag na mu steg can tha dad du gnas pa 'di 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]lta ste/_'od srung rdzogs byed dang /_kun du rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /_smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /_mi pham skra'i la ba can dang /_ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /_gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams kyi rang rang gi khas 'ches shing /_so sor 
[\[281a.2\]]rig pa dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab bzang ngas ni na tshod nyi shu dgu lon te/_/rab tu byung nas lo grangs lnga bcu lhag gcig tu/_/dge ba gang yin ci zhes btsal bar byas gyur cing /_/rab bzang ngas ni rab tu 
[\[281a.3\]]byung ba de yi tshe/_/tshul khrims dang ni ting 'dzin spyod pa rnam rig dang /_/nga yis rtse gcig sems ni kun du bsgom byas te/_/rigs pa'i chos ni phyogs tsam bshad par byas gyur na/_/'di las phyi rol dag na dge sbyong gzhan yang med/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam 
[\[281a.4\]]yan lag brgyad pa mi snang ba de la dge sbyong dang po yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_dge sbyong bzhi pa yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa snang ba de la dge sbyong dang po yang snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyis 
[\[281a.5\]]pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_dge sbyong bzhi pa yang snang bar 'gyur ro/_/rab bzang chos 'dul ba gang la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa snang na dge sbyong dang po ni 'di yin no/_/gnyis pa ni 'di yin no/_/gsum pa ni 'di yin te/_dge sbyong bzhi pa 'di las phyi rol na dge sbyong ngam bram 
[\[281a.6\]]ze med de/_phas kyi rgol ba'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams kyis stong ngo zhes 'di ltar 'khor rnams la nga seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas kun du rgyu rab bzang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar gyur to/_/de nas kun du 
[\[281a.7\]]rgyu rab bzang chos mthong ba dang /_chos thob pa dang /_chos rtogs pa dang /_chos kyi gting slebs te/_som nyi las rgal ba dang /_the tshom las rgal ba dang /_gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /_gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba dang /_ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_gang gi phyir btsun pa kun 
[\[281b.2\]]dga' bo ni slob dpon chen pos dbang bskur bas dbang bskur mod kyi bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/_gang gi phyir bdag gis kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed par gyur cig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[281b.3\]]dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa kun du rgyu rab bzang 'di ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/_de 
[\[281b.4\]]rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du rgyu rab bzang la tshur dge slong tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pas/_tshe dang ldan pa de rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos por gyur to/_/de ltar de 
[\[281b.5\]]rab tu byung nas/_tshe dang ldan pa de gcig tu brtul ba dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dka' thub la gnas te/_de gcig tu brtul ba dang /_bag yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dka' thub la gnas pas gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu 
[\[281b.6\]]bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_bla na med pa'i tshangs par spyad pa mthar phyin nas mthong ba'i chos 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/_/tshangs par spyod 
[\[281b.7\]]pa la bsten to/_/bya ba byas so/_/'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes rab tu bsgrags nas tshe dang ldan pa de yang dag par sems shin tu rnam par grol nas kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang dgra bcom pa thob ste/_rnam par 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba kun du myong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis ston pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba blta ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyi ci nas kyang thog ma kho nar bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[282a.2\]]ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gis rngo thog mod kyi yongs su mya ngan 
[\[282a.3\]]las 'da' bar 'tshal lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab bzang mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir smra'am/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/rab bzang 
[\[282a.4\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir smra'am/_bde bar gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/rab bzang mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir smra na ngas ci zhig smrar yod de/_'dus byas thams cad kyi chos nyid yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gis ma la bdag 
[\[282a.5\]]gis gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs te mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas bdag tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni skra bregs te snam sbyar gyon pa dang /_mu stegs can rnams kyis ni mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa mthong bar gyur cig_/bdag gi khyogs 
[\[282a.6\]]mu stegs can rnams kyis ni 'degs mi nus par gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni 'degs nus par gyur cig_/rdzing bu gcig sprul nas bsams pa/_'di ltar mu stegs can rnams kyis ni rdzing bur bying zhing spyod par mi nus par gyur cig_/tshangs 
[\[282a.7\]]pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni spyod nus par gyur cig_/mu stegs can rnams la ni nya dang ru sbal gyis gnod pa byed nus par gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la ni gnod pa byed mi nus par gyur cig_/mu stegs can rnams kyis ni bdag sreg cing me spor mi 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]nus par gyur cig_/tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni me spor nus par gyur cig ces des gnas 'di lnga byin gyis brlabs te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/mu stegs can kun du rgyu gzhan dag 
[\[282b.2\]]gis kun du rgyu rab bzang yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes thos te thos nas kyang ras kyi rgyal mtshan chen po btsugs te/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi lam po che dang /_khyams dang /_bzhi mdo dang /_sum mdo dag tu bskor nas shes ldan dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di skad ces smra ste/_dge sbyong 
[\[282b.3\]]dang po ni 'di yin no/_/gnyis pa ni 'di yin no/_/gsum pa ni 'di yin te/_bzhi pa ni 'di las phyi rol na dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze med de/_phas kyi rgol ba'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams kyis stong ngo zhes 'di ltar 'khor rnams la seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs na/_bdag cag 
[\[282b.4\]]gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa kun du rgyu rab bzang ni mya ngan las 'das par gyur to zhes smras pa dang /_de dag la dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te 'di khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin na tshur shog 'di khyogs kyi steng du zhog la theg shig dang blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[282b.5\]]de dag gis khyogs kyi steng du bzhag nas gdegs par brtsams na bsgul yang ma nus pa dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag nged kyis gdeg gam/_theg shig_/de dag gis bteg pa dang /_de dag spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de dag rdzing bur dong ba 
[\[282b.6\]]dang /_yang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te 'di khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin na tshur shog_/rdzing bu der zhugs shig dang blta bar bya'o zhes smras nas/_de dag zhugs pa dang /_bying nas nya dang ru sbal dag gis gnod pa byas te spyod ma nus 
[\[282b.7\]]nas rings pa rings par slar byung ba dang /_dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_nged 'jug gis ltos shig_/blta bar bya'o/_/de dag zhugs nas ma bying zhing nya dang ru sbal dag gis gnod pa byed ma nus te der spyod nus par gyur pa dang /_de dag spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/_shes ldan dag gal te 'di khyed kyi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin na me spor la sregs shig blta bar bya'o/_/de dag gis me sbar zhing bsreg par brtsams pa dang /_me spar ma nus nas dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[283a.2\]]shes ldan dag nged kyis spar bar bya'o zhes smras te/_de dag gis me spar nas 'bar bar gyur pa dang /_de dag de bzhin du spobs pa med cing cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas skye bo mang po rnams kyis tshar bcad nas dong ngo /_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams ngo mtshar cher skyes 
[\[283a.3\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das la rgya cher mngon par dad par gyur to/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das tha ma'i gzims mal na gnad rnams ni chad/_tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du/_rab bzang ni dgra bcom pa la bzhag par gyur/_
[\[283a.4\]]grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad mang po ni chos la bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/_the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gnad rnams ni chad/_tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab par 
[\[283a.5\]]byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du/_kun du rgyu rab bzang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bton te/_de gcig tu grub pa dang /_bde ba mthar phyin par mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bkod pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji nga da ltar 
[\[283a.6\]]'dod chags dang bral/_zhe sdang dang bral/_gti mug dang bral/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las kun du grol te/_thams cad mkhyen pa dang /_rnam pa thams 
[\[283a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa/_kun du rgyu rab bzang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bton te/_de gcig tu grub pa dang /_bde ba mthar phyin par mdzad nas mya ngan las 'das pa la rab tu bzhag pa lta ngo mtshar ci che/_gang nga sngon 'das pa'i dus 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]na 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa las ni kun du ma grol/_brtag cing 'jig nus pa dang ni 
[\[283b.2\]]bral/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ni skyes/_rang gi srog la yang mi lta ba na kun du rgyu rab bzang gi skyabs byas shing grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing nyon mongs pa las kyang kun du bskyabs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par bya'o/_/dge 
[\[283b.3\]]slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na lung pa zhig gi nang na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu dpon [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]mang po'i tshogs stong gis bskor ba/_mkhas shing gsal ba/_yid gzhungs pa zhig gnas te/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu dpon de rngon pas brtags nas/_rgyal po la smras pa dang /_de nas rgyal po dpung 
[\[283b.4\]]gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te byung nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu dpon de thams cad bskor to/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu dpon des bsams pa/_ma la bdag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'di rnams ma bsrungs na thams cad med par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu dpon gyis phyogs gang du ri 
[\[283b.5\]]dgas kyi tshogs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba kun du brtags na/_lung pa de na chu bo zhig 'bab pa de mthong ste chu bo'i rgyun de yang drag po 'phrog cing rab tu 'phrog pa zhig la/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag kyang nyam chung nas/_de nas khyu dpon gyis mod la chu bo der zhugs nas dbus su 'dug ste skad 
[\[283b.6\]]phyung nas khyed cag tshur shog_/'gram 'o ni nas nga'i rgyab tu rkang lag zhog la pha rol gyi 'gram du song shig dang /_'tsho ba'i thabs ni de las med de gzhan du na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]des de bzhin du byas pa dang /_de'i rgyab tu rmig pa dag gis phog 
[\[283b.7\]]ste/_phags pa yang ral/_sha dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dag byung yang 'on kyang brtson 'grus ma btang ngo /_/de nas thams cad kyis rgal nas/_gang kha cig slar rgal bar ma gyur tam zhes de dag la snying rje bskyed de slar rgyab tu bltas pa dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu gcig ma 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rgal bar des mthong nas/_de nas khyu dpon gnad rnams ni chad/_tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing /_chu 'gram 'dir tshogs rnams la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu de rgyab tu bkal nas chu bo las bsgral te 
[\[284a.2\]]'gram du bzhag go/_/des [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshogs mang po brgal bar rig nas 'chi ba'i dus su smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/_ji ltar bdag gis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'di dag dang /[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu 'di la srog sdug pa'i skyabs byas shing nyon mongs pa las kyang kun du bskyabs pa 'dis 
[\[284a.3\]]bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las 'don cing /_gcig tu grub pa dang /_bde ba mthar phyin par byed cing mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god par shog shig ces smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[284a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/_de'i tshe de'i dus na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi khyu dpon gang yin pa de ni nga yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]de dag ni grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad 'di rnams yin no/_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi phru gu gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 'di nyid yin no/_/dge 
[\[284a.5\]]slong dag gzhan yang gang gi tshe nga brtag cing 'jig mi nus pa dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa dang /_gnad rnams ni chad/_tshigs rnams ni 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung zhing bzhugs bzhin du kun du rgyu rab bzang gi skyabs byas pa de nyon cig_/dge slong dag sngon 
[\[284a.6\]]byung ba 'das pa'i dus na yul bA rA Na sIr rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed pa 'byor pa dang /_rgyas pa dang /_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_skye bo dang /_mi mang pos gang ba/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_phas kyi rgol ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams rab 
[\[284a.7\]]tu zhi ba/_rkun ma dang /_nad dang bral ba/_'bras dang /_bu ram dang /_ba lang dang /_ma he phun sum tshogs pa/_chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa/_chos bzhin rgyal po byed pa de'i rta cang shes shi ba dang /_khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis 'di ltar rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rta cang 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]shes shi'o zhes thos te/_de dag gis der pho nya btang nas yang na ni dpya gcol cig_/yang na ni grong khyer gyi sgor ma 'byung shig_/gzhan du na nges par skye nas btags la 'dir dgug go zhes bsgo ba dang /_der dpya yang ma gcal/_grong khyer gyi sgor yang ma byung mod kyi/_
[\[284b.2\]]'on kyang grong khyer nyid na gnas shing rta cang shes tshol lo/_/de dus gzhan zhig na rta cang shes rnyed nas/_de de bzhon te/_dpyid kyi dus la bab pa dang /_shing rnams me tog gis rgyas shing /_ngang pa dang /_khrung khrung dang /_rma bya dang /_ne tso dang /_ri skegs dang /_khu byug dang /_
[\[284b.3\]]shang shang te'u'i sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te dong nas/_de de na rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur cha ba'i sbyor bas bag med par gnas te/_grong khyer du yang ma zhugs pa na/_ji ltar rgyal po tshangs sbyin/_skyed mos tshal na 
[\[284b.4\]]bag med par gnas te grong khyer du yang ma zhugs so zhes khams kyi rgyal phran dag gis thos te/_de dag gis gros byas nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang chas te/_yul bA rA Na sI'i sgo bskor ba dang /_blon pos rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/_lha khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis 
[\[284b.5\]]grong khyer sgo bskor lags na bde bar bgyi ba dgongs su gsol/_rgyal pos thos nas shes ldan rta cang shes gang na 'dug pa yang long shig_/dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi yang go skon cig_/de dag dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed par bya'o zhes bsgo'o/_/des rta cang shes 
[\[284b.6\]]kyang bsnyen/_dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang go bskon te/_de de dag dang lhan cig g.yul bshams te g.yul 'gyed par brtsams pa dang /_khams kyi rgyal phran gzhan zhig gis rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rta cang shes kyi glor mdung gcig bsnun nas de'i rgyu ma dag byung 
[\[284b.7\]]ste/_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gzer nas/_gnad rnams kyang chad/_tshigs rnams kyang 'bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung bzhin du des sems sran bskyed pa ma la 'di ltar rgyal po ni sdug bsngal dog pa nyam nga bar phyin la bdag gis dor bar bya ba ni bdag gi tshul ma yin 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]pas brtson 'grus kyis sdug bsngal bzlog la/_thabs ci dang cis sge'u chung nas grong khyer du phyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_phan tshun du grong khyer du 'gro ba'i glags bltas na/_bA rA Na sI'i skyed mos tshal gyi bar na rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi rdzing 
[\[285a.2\]]bu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dag gis brgyan pa/_ngang pa dang /_bya kA ra N+Da ba dang /_ngur pa dag gis mtsho gling brgyan pa/_kho ra khor yug tu me tog dang /_'bras bu sna tshogs dang /_nags tshang tshing gis 
[\[285a.3\]]brgyan pa/_bya rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byin pa zhig yod de/_de shugs drag pos nags tshal stug po de'i nang du song ste/_rdzing bu tshangs ldan gyi pad ma'i 'dab ma'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas brgal te sge'u chung nas byung nas/_de nas rgyal po babs pa dang /_de yang sa la 'gyel 
[\[285a.4\]]te dus las 'das so/_/de nas rgyal po dang /_blon po de rnams kyis phan tshun kun du btsal bar brtsams nas/_kha cig ni skyed mos tshal du song /_gzhan dag gis ni phyogs bzhir brgyugs na/_gang gis kyang de ma rnyed nas/_rang rang gi rta dang /_glang po che dag 
[\[285a.5\]]bzung nas slar song ngo /_/rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis srog 'byin pa'i phyir yul bA rA Na sI na gnas pa'i grong mi dang /_ljongs kyi mi dang /_blon po lhag ma dag bsdus nas smras pa/_gang rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i srog 'byin na/_de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_de dag 
[\[285a.6\]]gis smras pa/_lha rgyal srid kyi phyed stsal bar bgyi'o/_/des smras pa/_nga'i srog 'byin pa ni rta cang shes yin na/_de ni dus las 'das te/_de la byin yang des ci zhig byar yod/_de dag gis smras pa/_lha de'i slad du grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin pa dag gtang par bgyi 
[\[285a.7\]]zhing /_dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston dag bgyi la bsod nams dag bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_shes ldan dag legs kyis de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_yul mi dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]nas de bsregs so/_/gzhan yang grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs nas grong khyer de na rdo dang /_gseg ma dang /_gyo mo dag sel du bcug ste/_tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/_dri zhim po'i pog phor dag ni bzhag_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ni 
[\[285b.2\]]bsgreng /_dar gyi lda ldi mang po ni btags/_lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhin du me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sil ma nyams dga' ba ni bkram ste/_dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston byas nas grong khyer du 'di skad dril bsgrags pa/_shes ldan yul bA rA Na sI na gnas 
[\[285b.3\]]pa'i grong mi rnams dang /_yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag nyon cig_/'dir lha'i rta cang shes kyi phyir grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir sbyin pa gtong zhing dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston dang bsod nams byed kyis/_de'i phyir khyed cag rnams kyis gos sna tshogs dang /_
[\[285b.4\]]rgyan dang /_phreng ba dang /_'byor pa mchog gis chos la byung shig ces bsgo'o/_/de nas grong mi dag dang /_yul mi dag 'ongs nas dus ston ma yin pa'i mchod ston chen po byas te/_grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir yang 'dod pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pa dag byin no/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam 
[\[285b.5\]]du sems/_rta cang shes gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na yang nga gnad rnams ni chad/_tshigs rnams ni bye ba'i tshor ba gnad du bab pa byung bzhin du de'i srog gi skyabs su byas so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu lnga pa/_de 
[\[285b.6\]]nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rab bzang gis las ci zhig bgyis na des na nyan thos rnams kyi tha mar mngon sum du bgyis lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[285b.7\]]dge slong dag dge slong rab bzang nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dang /_tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/_'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa myong bar nges pa rab bzang gis las byas shing bsags pa dag ni gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_dge 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur te/_chu'i khams la ma yin/_me'i khams la ma yin/_rlung gi khams la ma yin mod kyi/_zin pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched rnams la las byas pa'i dge ba dang mi dge ba dag 
[\[286a.2\]]rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/_/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/_/rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/_/dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe 
[\[286a.3\]]lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de yul bA rA Na sI'i 
[\[286a.4\]]grong khyer [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]'dzin gyi tshal na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dpon po mya ngan med ces bya ba de thar bar bya ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das 'od srung las rab tu byung ste/_de thar cing rang dbang thob bo snyam nas 'bad pa ma bskyed do/_/ji tsam dus shin tu 
[\[286a.5\]]ring ba zhig na mya ngan med ces bya ba ljongs rgyu zhing 'dug par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par mdzad nas bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs so/_/dge slong mya ngan 
[\[286a.6\]]med shing a sho ka'i drung na nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas te/_ji tsam shing a sho ka de la lha zhig gnas pa des bcom ldan 'das 'od srung mya ngan las 'da' bar thos nas ngus te/_de ngus pa'i mchi ma thigs pa gcig mya ngan med kyi lus la ltung bar gyur pa dang /_de nas mya ngan med 
[\[286a.7\]]kyis gyen du bltas na lha de ngu zhing 'dug nas/_lha ci'i phyir ngu zhes smras pa dang /_lhas deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung mya ngan las 'da'o zhes smras so/_/de nas mya ngan med lha'i tshig thos nas gnad du phog pa bzhin 'gyel te/_de snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing 'dug 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]par gyur to/_/de nas lhas ci'i phyir ngu zhes dris pa dang /_mya ngan med kyis smras pa/_gnyen dang bral ba dang /_bla ma dang bral ba'i phyir te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni bdag gi zhang po yin no/_/bdag gis shin tu sbyangs shing gnas pa la ma 'bad pas 
[\[286b.2\]]bdag ni so so'i skye bor gyur la lam shin tu ring bas blta ma nus so/_/lhas smras pa/_btsun pa gal te de lta na bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bkri na/_ci khyad par rtogs par nus sam/_mya ngan med kyis smras pa/_ji ltar lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong 
[\[286b.3\]]bar bgyis na bdag gi blo ni kun du smin te/_de bzhin du khyad par rtogs par bgyi'o/_/de nas lhas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mya ngan med rdzu 'phrul gyis khrid de/_de nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas dad pa skyes so/_/dad pa skyes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 
[\[286b.4\]]gis chos rnam pa 'di lta bu dag bshad de/_de thos ma thag tu dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/_dang por tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan med mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ngo /_/de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa mya ngan 
[\[286b.5\]]med mya ngan las 'das par mthong ste/_dga' ba skyes nas des bsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pas gang cung zad khyad par rtogs pa de thams cad ni bdag las rten pa yin pas bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u khyod 
[\[286b.6\]]skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs pa na/_bdag de'i nyan thos rnams kyi tha ma la mngon sum du byas 
[\[286b.7\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon logs su mya ngan las 'das te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_lha gang yin pa de ni rab bzang 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]'di nyid yin no/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang gi phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_dge ba la bsten par bya zhing /_sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten/_sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/_sdig pa la mi 
[\[287a.2\]]bsten par dge slong rnams kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bdag gcig pu dben pa la lkog tu mchis te nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa'i tshe sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu skyes te/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i 
[\[287a.3\]]bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten/_sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/_sdig pa la ma bsten na 'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed lags so/_/kun dga' bo khyod 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten 
[\[287a.4\]]pa dang /_dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi bsten/_sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/_sdig pa la ma bsten na/_'di ni tshangs par spyod pa'i phyed yin no zhes de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo de ni tshangs par spyod pa 
[\[287a.5\]]kun du mthar phyin pa/_ma 'dres pa/_yongs su rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yin no/_/'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten/_sdig pa'i grogs po dang lhan cig 
[\[287a.6\]]mi gnas/_sdig pa'i grogs po la bsten par mi bya'o/_/kun dga' bo de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas sems can skye ba'i chos dang ldan pa rnams skye ba'i chos las rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don 
[\[287a.7\]]pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_sems can 'khrug pa'i chos dang ldan pa rnams 'khrug pa'i chos las rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo rnam grangs de lta bu de shes par bya'o/_/gang tshangs par spyod pa mthar phyin pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_yongs su byang ba 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /_dge ba dang lhan cig gnas pa dang /_dge ba la bsten nas sdig pa'i grogs po la mi bsten/_sdig pa dang lhan cig mi gnas/_sdig pa la bsten par mi bya ba ste/_kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[287b.2\]]kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na deng phan chad nye du shAkya dang /_me ba ral pa can ma gtogs pa mu stegs kun du rgyu gzhan rnams rab tu dbyung bar mi bya/_bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 
[\[287b.3\]]bya'o/_/nye du shAkya dag mu stegs kyi rgyal mtshan thogs te 'ongs nas/_gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'dod na dge slong rnams kyis de rab tu dbyung bar bya'o/_/bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe 
[\[287b.4\]]na/_dge slong dag de ni bdag cag gi nye du rnams la nye du'i gnang ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/mu stegs kun du rgyu gzhan dag 'ongs nas/_gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos po thob par 'dod na/_de la dge slong rnams kyis 
[\[287b.5\]]mkhan pos gos sbyin zhing zla ba bzhi'i bar du gzhag par bya'o/_/de bsnyen bkur byed cing dge slong rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nus na/_dge slong rnams kyis rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/dge slong dag me ba ral pa can yang rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par bya'o/_/dge 
[\[287b.6\]]slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/_me ba ral pa can ni las su smra ba yin no/_/dge slong dag me ba ral pa can ni byed par smra ba/_rgyur smra ba/_brtson 'grus su smra ba yin no/_/de lta bas na dge slong dag gis 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/_gang las su smra ba dang /_byed par smra ba dang /_rgyur smra ba dang /_
[\[287b.7\]]brtson 'grus su smra bar 'gyur ba de lta bur dge slong khyod kyis kyang bslab par bya'o/_/de lta bas na dge slong khyed kyis chos gang zhig mthong ba'i chos 'di la phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshe rabs gzhan du phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba de dge slong rnams kyis gzung bar bya/_kun 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]chub par bya'o/_/ji lta ji ltar bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /_bklags pa de ltar tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du 
[\[288a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_mdo'i sde dang /_dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /_lung du bstan pa'i sde dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde dang /_ched du brjod pa'i sde dang /_gleng gzhi'i sde dang /_rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang /_de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang /_skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde dang /_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang /_
[\[288a.3\]]rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang /_gtan la bab par bstan pa'i sde 'di dag ni dge slong dag mthong ba'i chos 'di la phan pa dang /_mthong ba'i chos 'di la bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshe rabs gzhan du phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur ba dag ste/_dge slong dag gis gzung bar bya/_kun chub par bya'o/_/ji lta ji ltar 
[\[288a.4\]]bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /_bklags pa de ltar tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag khyed kyis ston pa nga
