[\[288a.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das te med pa'i 'og tu bdag cag gi ston pa dang /_ston pa med do snyam du de ltar blta bar mi bya ste/_gang gi phyir ngas zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdo gdon par bstan pa de deng phyin chad khyed kyi ston pa dang /_ston pa yin no/_/dge slong dag bslab pa'i gzhi phra mo dang /_
[\[288a.6\]]phran tshegs gang yin pa de dag ni dge 'dun tshogs nas skabs dbye zhing bde ba la reg par gnas par bya'o/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na deng phyin chad dge slong gsar bu dag gis dge slong rgan rabs rnams la ming nas bod par mi bya/_rus nas bod par mi bya ste/_btsun pa zhes brjod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[288a.7\]]zhes brjod pa ma gtogs par kun du spyad par mi bya'o/_/dge slong rgan rabs rnams kyis dge slong gsar bu rnams la lhung bzed dang /_chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dag gis bsdu bar bya/_nye bar gnas par bya/_bklag pa dang /_kha ton dang /_lung bsgo nas rnal 'byor yid 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]la byed du gzhug par bya'o/_/dge slong dag gis sa phyogs 'di bzhi rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rjes su dran par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[288b.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[288b.3\]]pa ste/_dge slong dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir mchod rten skor ba dang /_mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba 'ong gis de dag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[288b.4\]]sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/zhes bya ba'i bar dag yin te/_kha cig 
[\[288b.5\]]nga la sems dad pas dus byas pa de thams cad mtho ris su 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas par ro/_/dge slong dag sa phyogs 'di bzhi rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'gro bar 'gyur bar bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[288b.6\]]'das 'dir ni 'khrungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni phung 
[\[288b.7\]]po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_dge slong dag nga 'das pa'i 'og tu mchod rten bskor ba dang /_mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba 'ongs pa rnams la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni 'khrungs so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]'das 'dir ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dir ni lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'dir ni phung po lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan 
[\[289a.2\]]las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes bya ba'i bar dag yin te/_kha cig ni nga la sems dad pas dus byas pa de thams cad mtho ris su 'gro'o/_/kha cig ni phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas par ro/_/ji ltar mngon du 'gro bar bya ba de ltar rjes su dran par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[289a.3\]]'das kyis dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams la gang som nyi dang yid gnyis yod pa ma dgag par zhus shig dang dris pa de ngas lung bstan par bya'o/_/khyed 
[\[289a.4\]]kyis 'di ji ltar bdag cag gis ston pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du lan gdab par ni mi spobs so snyam du blta bar mi bya ste/_dge slong dag gis dge slong dag la/_rogs dag gis rogs dag la smra bar bya zhing dris na de lung bstan par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[289a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/'di ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_dge slong gi 'khor ji snyed 'dus shing mchis pa 'di rnams las gang dge slong dag gcig la yang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog 
[\[289a.6\]]pa dang /_lam rnams la gang som nyi dang yid gnyis su gyur pa ma mchis lags so/_/kun dga' bo legs so legs so/_/kun dga' bo khyod ni dad pas 'di skad smra mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs pa ni bla na med par 'jug pa yin te/_dge slong gi 'khor ji snyed 'dus 
[\[289a.7\]]shing 'khod pa rnams la ni gang dge slong gcig la yang sdug bsngal dang /_kun 'byung dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam rnams la som nyi dang yid gnyis med mod kyi/_'on kyang 'di'i dgos pa ni dus phyi ma'i sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thugs brtse ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]'das kyis rang gi sku las stod g.yogs bsal te/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ltos shig_/dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rnam par ltos shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[289b.2\]]sangs rgyas blta ba ni rnyed par dka' ste/_dper na me tog u dum bA ra bzhin no/_/dge slong dag re zhig cang ma smra zhig dang /_'di ltar 'dus byas thams cad ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin te/_de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung tha ma'o zhes gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan 
[\[289b.3\]]dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms 
[\[289b.4\]]par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las bzhengs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las bzhengs nas ci yang med 
[\[289b.5\]]pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ci yang med pa'i skye mched las bzhengs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las bzhengs nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[289b.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces smas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma yin te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[289b.7\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs te/_zhi ba mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang ldan pa brnyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum du thos shing mngon sum du bzung ngo /_/de nas 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa las bzhengs te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las bzhengs nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/ci yang med pa'i skye 
[\[290a.2\]]mched las bzhengs nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las bzhengs nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las bzhengs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[290a.3\]]so/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam 
[\[290a.4\]]gtan dang po las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so/_/bsam gtan gsum pa las bzhengs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs te/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[290a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs nas zhi ba mi g.yo ba'i spyan dang ldan pa brnyes te yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur/_skar mda' yang lhung /_phyogs kyang tshig_/bar 
[\[290a.6\]]snang las lha dag gis rnga'i sgra yang bsgrags so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'dug pa de sa g.yos pas sad de/_'di ci zhig ces bsams na/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ngo /_/des 
[\[290a.7\]]'dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra'o zhes chos nyid la brten nas des bsams pa/_'di ltar lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa des bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de thos par gyur na khrag dron por skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar rig nas de la thabs zhig bsgrub par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dbyar byed shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur te/_gal te lus 'phags 
[\[290b.2\]]ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa des bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thos na de khrag dron po skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur na/_de la khyod kyis thabs bsgrub par rig par gyis shig_/des smras pa/_'phags pa thabs gang lags pa rim bzhin du gsungs 
[\[290b.3\]]shig_/des smras pa/_dbyar byed tshur shog_/khyod myur ba myur bar rgyal po'i skyed mos tshal du song la/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs shing gzigs pa lngas gzigs te 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug la lan gsum du sbyang ba mdzad nas glang po cher 
[\[290b.4\]]bstan te yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /_gshegs nas ji ltar byang chub kyi shing drung du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das yul bA rA Na sIr lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba 
[\[290b.5\]]dang /_ji ltar mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa dang /_ji ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su skrun pa'i yum gyi thad du gshegs nas chos bshad de grong khyer sgra can du bab pa dang /_ji ltar phyogs gang dang gang na gdul ba de dang de dag btul nas/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin te/_grong khyer 
[\[290b.6\]]rtswa can du tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs pa de lta bu'i ri mo dag bri bar bya zhing /_khyod kyis gzhong [{]rings [,]ring [}]bdun ni mar gyi mar sar gyis/_brgyad pa ni tsan dan go shir Shas bkang ste skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs der gzhag go/_/ji tsam rgyal po sgor byung bar gyur pa dang /_de la lha re zhig skyed mos tshal gzigs 
[\[290b.7\]]su gshegs zhes smras nas/_gal te ri mo mthong nas dbyar byed 'di ci yin zhes 'dri ba dang /_rgya cher bshad par bya ste/_lha 'di ni grong khyer ser skya can lags te/_phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das 'khrungs so/_/'di ni chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram lags te/_phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni yul bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer lags te/_phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor to/_/
[\[291a.2\]]'di ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer lags te/_phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul chen po bstan to/_/'di ni grong khyer sgra can lags te/_'dir ni bcom ldan 'das sum bcu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyi gnas nas babs so/_/'di ni grong khyer rtswa can lags te/_phyogs 'dir ni phyogs 
[\[291a.3\]]gang dang gang na 'dul ba de dang de dag btul nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mthar phyin te/_tha ma'i gzims mal du gshegs so zhes gyis dang /_thos nas thos ma thag tu lha brgyal te sa la lhung bar 'gyur gyis/_de la khyod kyis gzhong [{]rings [,]ring [}]mar sar gyis bkang ba'i nang du gzhug par bya'o/_/gang 
[\[291a.4\]]gi tshe mar sar de zhu bar gyur pa dang /_de gnyis pa nas/_bdun pa'i bar du gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas phyung nas tsan dan go shir Shas bkang ba'i gzhong [{]rings su [,]ring du [}]chug shig dang /_de sos par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po grong khyer rtswa can du song ngo /_/dbyar byed kyang myur ba myur bar 
[\[291a.5\]]ri mo'i las thams cad rgya cher bris te/_bris nas rgyal po phyi rol du byung ba dang /_lha skyed mos tshal du gshegs zhes smras te/_de skyed mos tshal du zhugs pa dang /_ri mo dag mthong nas dbyar byed 'di ci yin zhes dris te/_des 'di ni grong khyer rtswa can lags te/_phyogs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis tha 
[\[291a.6\]]ma'i gzims mal du gshegs so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bshad do/_/des smras pa/_dbyar byed ci zer ci bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das sam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra brgyal te sa la lhung ba dang /_dbyar byed kyis 
[\[291a.7\]]gzhong [{]rings [,]ring [}]mar sar gyis bkang ba'i nang du lan bdun gyi bar du bcug nas/_de nas phyung ste/_tsan dan go shir Shas bkang ba'i gzhong [{]rings kyi [,]ring gi [}]nang du bcug pa dang de sos par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu shing sA la zung gnyis kyi tshal sA la'i ljon shing mchog 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]las me tog 'thor ba'i drung du bcom ldan 'das seng ge lta bur gzims pa dang /_de'i tshe dge slong gzhan zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_sA la zung ni rab mdzes pa'i/_/ljon shing mchog gi tshal bu 'dir/_/ston pa mya ngan 'das pa la/_/me tog dag gis rab tu gtor/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[291b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_kye ma 'du byed mi rtag ste/_/skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin/_/skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste/_/de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu mi mjed kyi 
[\[291b.3\]]bdag po tshangs pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'byung po kun gyis 'jig rten 'dir ni bsags pa'i mtha'/_/'dod 'gyur 'jig rten 'di na gang zag zla med cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa stobs rnams brnyes pa spyan ldan pa/_/ston pa 'di lta bu yang yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[291b.4\]]'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_brtan pa'i thugs kyis skyob mdzad cing /_/mi g.yo zhi ba brnyes gyur pa/_/dbugs dbyung ba dang rngub 'gags nas/_/spyan ldan yongs su mya ngan 'das/_/rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan 
[\[291b.5\]]pa/_/gang tshe ston pa dus mdzad de/_/de tshe rab tu sngangs gyur cing /_/de tshe spu yang langs par gyur/_/zhum pa med pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/tshor ba dag la lhag par gnas/_/de yi thugs ni rnam grol ba/_/sgron ma de 'dra mya ngan 'das/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan 
[\[291b.6\]]las 'das ma thag tu dge slong kha cig ni sa la 'gre ldog_/kha cig ni dpung pa la bzung nas ku cho 'don/_/kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis sems gzer cing 'dug_/kha cig ni chos nyid la brten nas gang 'di ltar bdag cag la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhib tu bstan te thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing phangs 
[\[291b.7\]]pa/_dga' ba/_yid du 'ong ba dang bral nas med pa dang /_zhig pa dang /_bye bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong rnams rim gyis dal bu dal bus zil gyis ma mnan na/_tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]thub pa'i lha rnams 'di ltar legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams so sor mi rtog par mang du gnas so zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa la lha ji snyed yod pa shes sam zhes dris pa dang /_kun dga' 
[\[292a.2\]]bo ji tsam grong khyer rtswa can gyi bar nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /_ji tsam shing sA la zung gnyis kyi tshal gyi bar nas/_gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis kho ra khor yug tu dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa'i lha rnams kyis ma khyab cing ma gang ba cung zad kyang 
[\[292a.3\]]med de/_chung ngu na khar ba gzugs pa'i khyon tsam yang med par lha kha cig ni sa la 'gre ldog_/kha cig ni dpung pa nas bzung nas ku cho 'don/_kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis sems gzer cing 'dug_/kha cig chos nyid la brten nas/_gang 'di ltar bdag cag la bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du 
[\[292a.4\]]mar kun du bstan te/_thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing phangs pa/_dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba dang bral nas med pa dang /_zhig pa dang /_gyes par gyur to/_/de'i nub mo tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam smras nas 'phags pa'i ngo bor cang mi smra 
[\[292a.5\]]bar 'dug go/_/de nas de'i mtshan mo nam nangs nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song la grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces gnas 'jog dag deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la ston pa 
[\[292a.6\]]phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyis/_khyed kyi bya ba dang sgrub pa dag der byos la da phyin chad 'di skad ces grong gi nyen kor ba dag bdag cag gi ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan 
[\[292a.7\]]las 'das te/_bdag cag gis de la mchod pa bya zhing brtson par bya ma nus so zhes yid la gcags par ma byed cig ces smros shig_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas de skad smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa'i ltar mnyan nas snam sbyar 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]blangs te dge slong gzhan dag dang /_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong dag dang /_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyi 'dun khang ga la bar song ste phyin pa dang /_de'i tshe grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyi 'dun khang na gyad lnga brgya tsam zhig bya ba dag cig gi phyir 'dus shing 'dug 
[\[292b.2\]]par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig_/deng gi mtshan mo'i gung thun la ston pa phung po lhag ma 
[\[292b.3\]]med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das kyis/_gang khyed kyis bya ba dang sgrub pa dag der byos la phyin chad 'di skad ces grong gi nyen kor ba dag bdag cag gi ston pa phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_bdag cag gis de 
[\[292b.4\]]la mchod cing brtson par byed ma nus so zhes yid la gcags par ma byed cig ces smras nas/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kha cig ni sa la 'gre ldog_/kha cig ni dpung pa nas bzung nas ku cho 'don/_kha cig ni sdug bsngal gyis sems gzir cing 'dug_/kha cig ni chos nyid 
[\[292b.5\]]la brten nas gang 'di ltar bdag cag la bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar kun du bstan te/_thams cad kyi snying du sdug cing phangs pa/_dga' ba dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang bral nas med pa dang /_zhig pa dang /_bye bar gyur to/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams ji tsam 
[\[292b.6\]]grong khyer rtswa can gyi dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i cha byad dag thogs te/_de dag gi bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_de dag gi mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_blon po dang /_snag gi 
[\[292b.7\]]gnyen mtshams rnams grong khyer rtswa can nas byung nas shing sA la zung gnyis kyi tshal ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das seng ge lta bur gzims pa la dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mos bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]so/_/de nas gzhan yang grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la bdag cag rnams kyis mchod par bgyi ba dang /_brtson pa ji lta bur 
[\[293a.2\]]bsgrub par bgyi lags/_gnas 'jog dag 'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba bzhin no/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la ji ltar bgyid lags/_gnas 'jog dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la ni lus shing bal gyi 'da' 
[\[293a.3\]]bas dkri zhing shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris nas ras zung lnga brgyas dkri bar bya'o/_/ras zung lnga brgyas dkris nas lcags kyi sgrom bur bcug ste/_'bru mar gyis bkang nas steng nas lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste/_dri zhim po'i shing thams cad spungs te/_des 
[\[293a.4\]]bsregs nas/_me de dag 'o mas bsad de de'i rus pa gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor rus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs te/_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol 
[\[293a.5\]]mo'i sgras bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod par byed cing dus ston chen po yang byed do/_/gnas 'jog dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la bya ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la de bas kyang 
[\[293a.6\]]lhag par bya'o/_/btsun pa kun dga' bos gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na gang gi phyir bdag cag gis gdugs gcig gam/_gnyis sam/_gsum gyis mi tshogs te sbyar bar dka' na zhag bdun tshun chad kyis bdag cag gis de bzhin du 
[\[293a.7\]]sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la gzims pa la dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_ri mor bgyi/_mchod par bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du gyis shig ces tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]bo las thos nas/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams nyi ma bdun pa nyid la shing bal gyi 'da' ba dag bsags te/_shing bal gyi 'da' ba dag bsags nas ras zung lnga brgya yang bsags/_ras zung lnga brgya yang bsags nas/_lcags kyi sgrom yang bshams/_lcags 
[\[293b.2\]]kyi sgrom bshams nas/_dri zhim po'i shing thams cad kyang spungs/_dri zhim po'i shing thams cad spungs nas gser gyi bum pa yang sta gon byas/_gser gyi bum pa sta gon byas nas gser gyi khyogs dag kyang bshams te/_gser gyi khyogs bshams nas grong khyer rtswa 
[\[293b.3\]]can nas chu bo dbyig ldan gyi bar dang /_shing sA la zung gi tshal nas gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi bar dpag tshad bcu gnyis thog thag ji tsam dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i cha spyad dag thogs nas grong khyer rtswa can nas byung ste/_
[\[293b.4\]]shing sA la zung gi tshal ga la bar song nas phyin pa dang /_seng ge'i khri la gzims pa la dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas so/_/gzhan yang grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad 
[\[293b.5\]]gtso bo gtso bo dag gis grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig_/gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad kyi bu mo dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi bla 
[\[293b.6\]]re bres shig_/gyad rnams dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs zung shig_/nged cag gis ni dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya ste/_
[\[293b.7\]]grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub sgo nas dbus thog thag tu zhugs nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung ste chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol la zhugs la bzhen par bya'o/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis de bzhin 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad kyi bu mo dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi gdugs dag bres/_gyad rnams dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdeg par 'dod na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs 
[\[294a.2\]]gdeg par ma nus pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdeg par ma nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha rnams 
[\[294a.3\]]kyi bsam pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa lha rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu yin/_lha rnams kyis ni gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad kyi bu mo dag gis na bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi bla re bre zhing /_gyad rnams dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni bcom ldan 
[\[294a.4\]]'das kyi khyogs la bzung nas bdag gis lha'i dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod pa byas te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas dbus thog thag zhugs la grong khyer rtswa 
[\[294a.5\]]can gyi shar sgo nas byung ste/_chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol la zhugs la bzhen par bya'o zhes bsams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du bya'o/_
[\[294a.6\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan gnas 'jog dag bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs gdeg ma nus pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha rnams kyis bsams pa yin no/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo lha rnams 
[\[294a.7\]]kyis ji ltar bsams lags/_lha rnams kyis ni gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad kyi bu mo dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gos kyi bla re bre zhing gyad rnams dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs btegs te/_bdag cag gis lha'i 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par byas nas/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas dbus thog thag zhugs la grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung ste/_chu bo dbyig ldan rgal 
[\[294b.2\]]nas/_gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol la zhugs la bzhen par bya'o zhes sems so/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo ji ltar lha rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad kyi bu mo dag gis ni bcom ldan 
[\[294b.3\]]'das la gos kyi bla re bres/_gyad rnams dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khyogs bteg ste/_khyogs bteg ma thag tu bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dag gis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_ku mu da dang /_a 
[\[294b.4\]]ga ru'i phye ma dang /_ta ma la'i phye ma dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba la sogs pa dag gis ni gtor/_lha'i rol mo'i sgra dag ni blangs/_gos mang po dag ni bor ro/_/gzhan yang grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad gtso bo gtso bo dag gis grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 
[\[294b.5\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/shes ldan gnas 'jog dag bdag cag gi mi'i rol mo'i cha spyad dag bor la/_bdag cag gis lha'i dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod pa byas la/_
[\[294b.6\]]grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung la/_chu bo dbyig ldan rgal nas gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol la zhugs la bzhen par bya'o zhes smras so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs 
[\[294b.7\]]kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/_de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis mi'i rol mo'i cha spyad dag bor te/_lha'i dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]par byas te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi nub sgo nas dbus thog thag tu zhugs te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi shar sgor byung nas chu bo dbyig ldan brgal te/_gyad kyis dbu rgyan btags pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bzhugs su gsol lo/_/de'i tshe grong khyer 
[\[295a.2\]]rtswa can du lha'i me tog man dA ra ba mang po pus mo nub tsam du bab par gyur to/_/de'i tshe 'tsho ba can gzhan zhig gis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba de las mang du blangs te yul sdig pa can du bya ba zhig gi ched du song ba dang /_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga 
[\[295a.3\]]brgya dang chas te/_yul sdig pa can gyi bar nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi bar du lam du zhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'dod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'tsho ba can de lam kar mthong ngo /_/mthong 
[\[295a.4\]]nas 'tsho ba can de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'tsho ba can khyod gang nas 'dir 'ongs/_gang du 'gro/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag ni grong khyer rtswa can nas 'dir mchis te/_bgyi ba zhig gi ched la yul sdig pa can du mchi'o/_/tshe 
[\[295a.5\]]dang ldan pa 'tsho ba can khyod kyis nga'i ston pa shes sam/_'phags pa 'tshal lags te/_dge slong gau ta ma lags so/_/'phags pa 'od srung chen po ston pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas deng du dgung bdun lon lags te/_de'i sku gdung la 
[\[295a.6\]]mchod pa bgyis pa'i lha'i me tog man dA ra ba bdag gis blangs pa 'di lags so/_/de'i tshe rgan zhugs gzhan zhig tshul ma yin pa'i tshig 'di skad du smra ste/_'di ltar bdag ni 'gyod pa dang rgan zhugs kyis 'di ltar kye dge slong dag 'di ni bya ba'o/_/'di ni bya ba 
[\[295a.7\]]ma yin pa'o zhes smra ba las thar bar gyur te/_da ni bdag cag gis gang nus pa de ni bya/_gang mi nus pa de ni mi bya'o zhes de skad du mi rigs par smra ba dang /_bar snang la gnas pa'i lha dag gis bsgribs te/_ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ma 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]gtogs pa dge slong gi 'khor de gcig gis kyang thos par ma gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshul ma yin pa'i tshig de lta bu smra ba gdul ba'i don du lam las gyur te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go/_/'dug nas 
[\[295b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa/_mi brtan pa/_yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'gyur ba'i chos can yin te/_ji srid du 'di ltar 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad la yid dbyung bar bya/_
[\[295b.3\]]rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/kye tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa blta bar rings par 'gro'o/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris/_shing bal gyi 'da' bas 
[\[295b.4\]]dkris nas/_ras zung lnga brgyas dkris so/_/ras zung lnga brgyas dkris nas/_lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'bru mar gyis bkang ngo /_/lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'bru mar gyis bkang nas/_steng nas lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste/_dri zhim po'i shing 
[\[295b.5\]]thams cad spungs nas zhugs la bzhen par 'dod na me spar bar ma nus so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung 
[\[295b.6\]]zhugs la bzhen par ma nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha rnams kyis bsams pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams/_'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te yul sdig pa can gyi bar nas grong 
[\[295b.7\]]khyer rtswa can gyi bar du lam du zhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'dong ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa ji ltar lha rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos grong khyer rtswa 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan gnas 'jog dag nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung zhugs la bzhen par ma nus pa de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha rnams kyis 
[\[296a.2\]]bsams pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo lha rnams kyis ji ltar bsams lags/_de ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang chas te yul sdig pa can gyi bar nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi bar du lam du zhugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa 
[\[296a.3\]]la phyag 'tshal bar 'dong ba yin no/_/de dag gis smras pa/_btsun pa kun dga' bo ji ltar lha rnams kyis bsams pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po grong khyer rtswa can du phyin pa dang /_'khor dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 
[\[296a.4\]]rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i cha spyad dag thogs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 
[\[296a.5\]]'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang /_'khor stong phrag du ma dang /_'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_
[\[296a.6\]]dri zhim po'i shing thams cad bsal to/_/dri zhim po'i shing thams cad bsal nas lcags kyi sgrom kha phye'o/_/lcags kyi sgrom kha phye nas ras zung lnga brgya bshus so/_/ras zung lnga brgya bshus nas shing bal gyi 'da' ba yang bshus so/_/shing bal gyi 'da' 
[\[296a.7\]]ba bshus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung ma nyams pa la phyag byas so/_/de'i tshe na sa chen po 'di'i steng na nyan thos chen po bzhi yod de/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa stobs bcu 'od srung dang /_tshe 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'o/_/de dag gi nang na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ye shes dang ldan pa/_bsod nams che ba/_chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal stan dang /_na ba'i rkyen sman dang /_yo byad dag rnyed pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[296b.2\]]chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/_ma la bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya'o snyam du spro ba bskyed nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos shing bal gyi 'da' ba gzhan dag sta gon byas te/_shing bal gyi 'da' ba gzhan dag sta gon byas nas/_
[\[296b.3\]]gzhan yang ras zung lnga brgya sta gon byas so/_/ras zung lnga brgya gzhan dag sta gon byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung la shing bal gyi 'da' bas dkris so/_/shing bal gyi zla bas dkris nas ras zung lnga brgyas dkris so/_/ras zung lnga brgyas dkris nas/_
[\[296b.4\]]lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'bru mar gyis bkang ngo /_/lcags kyi sgrom du bcug ste 'bru mar gyis bkang nas steng du lcags kyi kha gab gnyis kyis bkab ste shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs so/_/spungs nas phyogs gcig tu song ba dang /_ji ltar de sangs 
[\[296b.5\]]rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus de rang 'bar bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung spungs pa de dag la bskor ba byas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rnam par 'dren pa rin 
[\[296b.6\]]chen sku mnga' ba/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gshegs/_/sangs rgyas sku la ras zung lnga brgya dang /_/chos gos stong snyed kun du dkris gyur pa/_/nyid kyi gzi brjid kyis ni sku gdung dang /_/kun du dkris pa rab tu tshig par gyur/_/
[\[296b.7\]]de la chos gos gnyis ni ma tshig pa/_/nang rim dang ni phyi rim 'di rnam gnyis/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis me de dag 'o mas bsad pa dang /_de nas 'o ma las shing bzhi skyes par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_gser can dang /_ser 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]skya dang /_rta don dang /_u dum bA ra zhes bya ba yin no/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis de'i sku gdung gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/_gser las byas pa'i khyogs kyi steng du bzhag nas dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug 
[\[297a.2\]]pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te grong khyer rtswa can du phyin nas/_der grong khyer mchog gi dbus su bzhugs su gsol nas dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[297a.3\]]rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/de nas yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams kyis grong khyer rtswa can du bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas deng du zhag bdun lon nas sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa 
[\[297a.4\]]byed do zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi 
[\[297a.5\]]gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan dag nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das ni nged la yun ring po nas phangs shing sdug pa yin te/_de khyed kyi grong khyer gyi nyen kor du rten pa las yongs su mya 
[\[297a.6\]]ngan las 'das na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal ba de nged la byin cig dang /_de nged kyis yul sdig pa can du bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gzugs shing /_dri dang /_
[\[297a.7\]]phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya ste/_mchod pa byas nas dus ston chen po yang bya'o/_/gnas 'jog dag bcom ldan 'das de ni nged la yang phangs shing sdug pa yin la/_
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]nged kyi grong gi nyen kor du rten pa las 'das par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal ba nged kyis sbyin par mi bya'o/_/gal te byin na de lta na ni legs/_ji ste ma byin par gyur na dmag gis dbrog go/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis de bzhin du bya'o 
[\[297b.2\]]zhes mnyan to/_/yul rtog pa g.yo ba na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs krod T+ya dang /_khyab 'jug gling na gnas pa'i bram ze dang /_grong khyer ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /_yul 
[\[297b.3\]]yangs pa can na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs lits+tsha bI rnams kyis kyang thos/_yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgras kyang bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams dang /_yul rtog pa 
[\[297b.4\]]g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod T+ya dang /_khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /_yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /_yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs lits+tsha bI rnams dpung gi tshogs 
[\[297b.5\]]yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_grong khyer rtswa can du sku gdung la mchod pa byed cing der sku gdung gi skal ba len du song ngo zhes thos so/_/thos nas kyang yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dbyar byed 
[\[297b.6\]]ngas ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams dang /_yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod T+ya dang /_khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /_yul ser skya na 
[\[297b.7\]]gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /_yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs lits+tsha bI rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_grong khyer rtswa can du sku gdung la mchod pa byed cing der sku gdung gi skal ba len du song ngo zhes thos na/_khyod 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]kyis shes sam/_de bas na bdag cag kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi skal ba blang bar bya'o/_/des lha de bzhin du go bskon par bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_des dpung gi 
[\[298a.2\]]tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang glang po che la zhon pa dang /_des bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran pas brgyal bar gyur to/_/de nas glang po che las phab ste rta la bskyon pa dang /_der yang brgyal bar gyur te/_des 
[\[298a.3\]]smras pa/_dbyar byed ngas ni mi nus kyis/_khyod nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_song la grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la nga'i bkas gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang 
[\[298a.4\]]bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes nad dris la 'di skad ces/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de ni nga la yun ring po nas phangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te/_de khyed kyi grong gi nyen kor du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na/_shes ldan dag 
[\[298a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal ba nga la byin cig dang /_des na nga rgyal po'i khab tu bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gzugs shing /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_
[\[298a.6\]]bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya'o/_/mchod pa byas nas dus ston chen po yang bya'o zhes bsgo shig_/lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis 
[\[298a.7\]]rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_grong khyer rtswa can ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ldan dag nyon cig_/shes ldan dag la yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho'am/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes nad 'dri zhing /_'di skad ces shes ldan dag 
[\[298b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni nga la yun ring po nas phangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te de khyed kyi grong gi nyen kor du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gyi skal ba nga la byin cig dang /_des na nga rgyal po'i khab tu 
[\[298b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gzugs shing /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya/_bla mar bya/_ri mor bya/_mchod par bya'o/_/mchod 
[\[298b.4\]]pa byas nas dus ston chen po yang bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/dbyar byed bcom ldan 'das de ni nged la yang yun ring po nas phangs shing sdug pa bla mar gyur pa yin te/_de nged kyi grong gi nyen kor du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas nged kyis de'i sku gdung sha ri ram 
[\[298b.5\]]gyi skal ba sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de nas yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te byin na de lta na ni legs/_ji ste ma byin par gyur na dmag gis dbrog par bya'o/_/grong 
[\[298b.6\]]khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyan nas/_de dag gis rgyal po'i 'khor mang po 'dus pa mthong nas gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag kyang mda' 'phong bslabs so/_/ji tsam na yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams dang /_yul rtog 
[\[298b.7\]]pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod T+ya dang /_khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /_yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /_yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs lits+tsha bI dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyi drung du dmag 
[\[299a.2\]]brgal ba'i phyir lhags so/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis gyad kyi chung ma dang /_gyad gzhon nu dag grong khyer gyi phyir bkod de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung 
[\[299a.3\]]bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te/_pha rol po'i dmag gi tshogs bdun po dag gi drung du dmag brgal ba'i phyir byung ngo /_/de'i tshe bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'ongs te/_de nas bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pas phan tshun 
[\[299a.4\]]gnyis ka nas g.yul mang po bshams pa 'thabs par gyur na ring po mi thogs par gcig la gcig 'chi bar 'gyur bar rig nas g.yang gzhi bskor te/_grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces 
[\[299a.5\]]smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan dag nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ni yun ring po nas bzod pa dang ldan pa/_bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin no/_/shes ldan dag bcom ldan 
[\[299a.6\]]'das gau ta ma de bzod pa dang ldan zhing bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin na sku gdung gi phyir phan tshun gcig la gcig gsod par byed pa ni mi rigs pas kho bos bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de'i sku gdung cha brgyad du bgo bar spro bar byas/_gang gi phyir bum 
[\[299a.7\]]par sku gdung bcug pa'i bum pa de kho bo la byin cig dang /_des na kho bos bre bo'i grong khyer du bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gzugs shing /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pa dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod pa bya'o/_/mchod pa byas nas dus ston chen po yang bya'o/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa la de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyan to/_/de nas 
[\[299b.2\]]bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams dang /_yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs pu lu ka dang /_grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod T+ya dang /_khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze dang /_yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya dang /_
[\[299b.3\]]yul yangs pa can gyi rgyal rigs lits+tsha bI dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dbyar byed shes par gyis shig_/
[\[299b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de ni yun ring po nas bzod pa dang ldan zhing bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de bzod pa dang ldan zhing bzod pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa yin na/_shes ldan dbyar byed khyed sku gdung gi phyir phan tshun gcig 
[\[299b.5\]]la gcig gsod par byed pa ni mi rigs pas kho bos bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de'i sku gdung de cha brgyad du bgo bar spro bar byas/_gang gi phyir bum par sku gdung bcug pa'i bum pa de kho bo la byin cig dang /_des na kho bos bre bo'i grong khyer du bcom ldan 
[\[299b.6\]]'das gau ta ma de'i sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gzugs shing /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/mchod par 
[\[299b.7\]]bya'o/_/mchod par byas nas dus ston chen po yang bya'o/_/yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la sogs pas bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa la de bzhin du bya'o zhes mnyan to/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pas bcom 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]ldan 'das kyi sku gdung cha brgyad du bgos te/_cha gcig grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la byin no/_/des na grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs nas gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[300a.2\]]btsugs nas dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dus ston chen po yang byas so/_/cha gnyis pa ni yul sdig pa can gyi gyad rnams la/_cha gsum pa ni 
[\[300a.3\]]yul rtog pa g.yo ba'i rgyal rigs bu lu ka la/_cha bzhi pa ni grong khyer sgra sgrogs kyi rgyal rigs krod T+ya la/_cha lnga pa ni khyab 'jug gling gi bram ze la/_cha drug pa ni yul ser skya na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs shAkya rnams la/_cha bdun pa ni yul yangs pa 
[\[300a.4\]]can na gnas pa'i rgyal rigs lits+tsha bI rnams la/_cha brgyad pa ni yul ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la byin te/_des na yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten 
[\[300a.5\]]brtsigs te gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs nas dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dus ston chen po yang byas 
[\[300a.6\]]so/_/de nas grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis gang gi phyir bum par sku gdung bcug pa'i bum pa de bram ze'i rigs bre bo dang mnyam pa la byin no/_/de nas bram ze'i rigs bre bos bre bo dang mnyam pa'i grong khyer du bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten 
[\[300a.7\]]brtsigs te gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs nas dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_dus ston chen po yang byas so/_/de nas 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+ha skyes 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'ongs te/_de nas bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+has grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad kyi 'khor mang po tshogs shing 'dus pa shes ldan dag nyon cig_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[300b.2\]]gau ta ma de ni yun ring po nas bdag la phangs shing sdug pa yin te/_/de khyed kyi grong khyer du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/_shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das de'i sku gdung zhugs la bzhen pa'i sol ba de bdag la byin cig dang /_des na bdag gis yul n+ya gro d+ha 
[\[300b.3\]]can du bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma de'i sol ba'i mchod rten brtsigs la/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs shing dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur sti bya'o/_/bla mar bya'o/_/ri mor bya'o/_/
[\[300b.4\]]mchod pa bya'o/_/mchod pa byas nas dus ston chen po yang bya'o/_/grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+ha la sku gdung gi sol ba byin te/_bram ze'i khye'u n+ya gro d+has yul n+ya gro d+ha can du bcom ldan 'das kyi sol ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te gdugs 
[\[300b.5\]]dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan btsugs nas dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_bdug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_rol mo'i sgras bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas te/_dus ston chen po yang byas so/_/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[300b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gdung gi mchod rten brgyad dang /_bum pa'i mchod rten dang dgu/_sol ba'i mchod rten dang bcur gyur to/_/spyan ldan sku gdung bre bo brgyad dag las/_/bdun ni 'dzam bu gling ba'i mchod par thob/_/skyes bu mchog de'i bre bo gang zhig ni/_/
[\[300b.7\]]grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod/_/skyes mchog de yi mche ba bzhi dag las/_/mche ba gcig ni rtsa gsum 'jig rten mchod/_/gnyis pa tshig 'dzin grong khyer yid 'ong na/_/gsum pa ka ling rgyal po'i yul na ste/_/skyes mchog de yi mche ba 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]bzhi pa ni/_/grong khyer sgra sgrogs klu yi rgyal pos mchod/_/mya ngan med rgyal skya snar bu gnas pas/_/mchod rten bdun po rgya cher spel byas te/_/de yi mthu yis dbyig 'dzin 'dir yang ni/_/smon lam dngos pos mngon par brgyan gyur te/_/'di 
[\[301a.2\]]ltar spyan ldan sku gdung de la ni/_/lha dbang klu dbang mi yi dbang po dang /_/mi dang klu dang gnod sbyin bdag po yis/_/rab tu bkur nas bkur sti mchod pa byas/_/rab mkhyen thugs rjes ldan pa stobs mnga' ba/_/shAkya 'khrungs ma ga d+hAr ni byang chub ste/_/ka shir 
[\[301a.3\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur nas/_/grong khyer rtswa can brten nas mya ngan 'das/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe dge slong brgyad khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yongs su 
[\[301a.4\]]mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe dge slong bdun khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe dge slong khri brgyad stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_lha'i tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub pa dag ci bcom 
[\[301a.5\]]ldan 'das kyi gsung rab ni dud pa tsam du gyur te/_dge slong dbang yod pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang /_ma mo dag mi sgrogs so zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed do/_/de 
[\[301a.6\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag shes par gyis shig_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe dge slong brgyad khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[301a.7\]]maud gal gyi bu chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe dge slong bdun khri yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/da 'dir bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe yang dge slong khri brgyad stong yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_dge slong de snyed 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]cig yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas lha'i bu tshe bskal pa brgya phrag mang po thub pa dag ci bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab ni dud pa tsam du gyur te/_dge slong dbang yod pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_ma 
[\[301b.2\]]mo dag mi sgrogs so zhes 'phya bar byed/_smod par byed/_kha zer bar byed pas de lta bas na 'dir shog la 'dus shig_/dge slong dag gis legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/dge 'dun gyi dge skos gang yin/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po lags 
[\[301b.3\]]so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang po tshur shog_/khyod kyis gaN+DI rdungs la dge slong gi dge 'dun dag sdus shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de skad bsgo ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 
[\[301b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gi ltar mnyan nas rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas ji tsam ye shes mthong ba la zhugs pa de tsam du rnam par bltas nas/_de nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te gaN+DI brdung bar brtsams so/_/des gaN+DI 
[\[301b.5\]]de brdungs pa dang /_gcig ma gtogs pa yul tha dad na gnas pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dgra bcom pa lnga brgya 'dus nas/_dge slong 'dus shing 'dug pa la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[301b.6\]]'dus pa las gang dag su ma 'ongs pa rtogs shig_/dge slong dag gis yul tha dad pa na gnas pa'i dge slong dag la phan tshun rnam par bltas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la/_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag ma gtogs pa dge slong mang po thams cad 
[\[301b.7\]]'dus shing mchis lags so zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag shing shi ri sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong pa na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang po tshur shog_/tshe dang 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]ldan pa ba lang bdag ga la ba der song la phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la 'di skad ces smros shig_/'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'di skad du nad med par gyur cig_/dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad cig yod pas myur du bos 
[\[302a.2\]]shig ces byos shig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gis de skad smras pa dang tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung las mnyan nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na grong khyer rtswa can nas mi snang zhing /_shing shi ri sha ka'i gzhal med khang stong pa na 'dug pa de lta bu'i 
[\[302a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[302a.4\]]'od srung la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag nad med par gyur cig_/dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zad cig yod kyis myur du bos shig ces de skad zer ro/_/de 'dod chags dang bral ba yin yang byams pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos 
[\[302a.5\]]pas tshe dang ldan pa gang po bcom ldan 'das gdul ba'i don du 'jig rten gzhan du ma gshegs sam/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_mtshang mi 'dru'am/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mu 
[\[302a.6\]]stegs kyis kun du ma bzlog gam de dag 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gnod pa ma byas sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma dang 'dra ba la nyon mongs pas dkris pa'i dbang du gyur pa dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_spyod pa pa 
[\[302a.7\]]dang /_kun du rgyu dag gis brnyas par ma gyur tam/_ma rig pa'i mun pas yog pa'i blo gros can dag gis dge 'dun 'dus pa'i dbyen ma byas sam/_gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la chos dang 'dra ba'i tshig dang yi ge dang lta 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]ba'i dra ba ma byung ngam/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_yid la byed pa dag las blo bsgyur nas 'dus shing bre mo'i gtam byed par ma gyur tam/_gang the tshom dang /_yid gnyis la zhugs pa'i sems kyis chos ma yin pa la ni chos su 
[\[302b.2\]]chos la ni chos ma yin par 'dul ba ma yin pa la ni 'dul bar/_'dul ba la ni 'dul ba ma yin par ma bshad dam/_dge slong dag ser sna'i dri mas yog pas tshangs pa mtshungs pa glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams la kun du dga' bar bya ba'i chos drug la sogs pa mi byed 
[\[302b.3\]]cing khyad du gsod par mi byed dam/_gang rab tu byung ba ngan pa dag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag bstan pa la ma dad par byas nas mu stegs can la rten par ma gyur tam/_gang dag log par 'tsho ba kun du spyod pa zhing rmo ba dang /_nyo tshong byed pa dang /_
[\[302b.4\]]rgyal po la rten cing 'tsho ba ltos par ma gyur tam/_gang dag sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs nas bas mtha'i gnas mal du brten pa las sbyangs pa'i yon tan de dag bor bar ma gyur tam/_dge sbyong ma yin pa dge sbyong du khas 'ches nas tshangs pa mtshungs 
[\[302b.5\]]par spyod pa 'khrug par mi byed dam/_de lta mod kyi jo bo gang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes smras pa'i rigs na 'od srung la sogs pa zhes smra'am/_thugs rje chen po la goms par gnas pa kun du spyod pa la zhugs pa'i ston pa phung po lhag ma 
[\[302b.6\]]med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa la ma zhugs sam/_'gro ba'i ru skya 'dzin pa med pas 'jig rten 'khrugs par ma gyur tam/_stobs bcu dang ldan pa mi rtag pa'i stobs kyis non par ma gyur tam/_sems can 
[\[302b.7\]]thams cad kyi ston pa bdag cag sad par byed pa'i mgon po ma gzims sam/_sangs rgyas nyin byed ma nub bam/_thub pa'i dbang po zla ba sgra can gyis bcom nas snang ba med par ma gyur tam/_sum bcu rtsa gsum na dbang phyug dpag bsam gyi shing dri zhim po 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog gis mdzes par byas pa dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzang po bzhi dang ldan pa mi rtag pa'i glang po che smyon pas ma bcom mam/_ye shes kyi sgron ma mi rtag pa'i rlung gis bdas nas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das sam zhes smras so/_/de nas 
[\[303a.2\]]de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_blo ldan bstan pa gnas bya'i phyir/_/nyan thos dge 'dun tshogs nas ni/_/de dag der ni 'dus gyur te/_/khyod la sdod cing de brtson byed/_/gru chen rgyal ba de zhig ste/_/ye shes ri yang rnam par rnyil/_/bstan 
[\[303a.3\]]pa rab mchog ldan pa yi/_/dge slong mang po rnam par zhi/_/gyi na ma lags legs par ni/_/bdag ni pho nyar 'dir 'ongs na/_/bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_/de bas khyod ni nges par bzhud/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa gang po la 'di 
[\[303a.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/gang po chog gis de skad ma smra shig_/'gro ba'i dus ma yin no/_/'on kyang jo co gang po/_/'gro ba'i sgron ma mgon po bzhugs na der/_/bdag ni 'gro bar bya ba'i blo yod kyang /_/de nas pha rol rab zhi gshegs gyur na/_/blo ldan gang zhig 
[\[303a.5\]]'jig rten de dag 'gro/_/lhung bzed chos gos rnam gsum mchog 'di dag_/khyod kyis dge 'dun dag la dbul bar gyis/_/bdag ni zhi ba yang srid med par 'gros/_/bdag gis bsams pa 'phags pa bzod par gsol/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag 
[\[303a.6\]]gis spar ba dang /_dro ba dang /_char dbab pa dang /_gsal ba mchog dag gi cho 'phrul chen po bstan te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de'i lus rang las byung ba'i me'i khams kyis rnam par tshig ste de las chu'i rgyun rnam pa bzhi bab po/_/
[\[303a.7\]]chu'i rgyun gcig las sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs kyi rjes su bstan pa/_/da ltar dus rnams ngan gyur te/_/sems can rang gi las la brten/_/'gro ba'i sgron ma de 'das pas/_/thams cad 'gro bar 'jug par rtogs/_/gnyis pas smras pa/_'dus byas bsags pa 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]skad cig 'jig 'gyur te/_/skye la sogs pa sdug bsngal nyon mongs ldan/_/so so'i skye bo bdag tu nga rgyal te/_/de dag byed pa med par rig par byed/_/gsum pas smras pa/_mkhas pa rtag tu dogs pas bag yod cing /_/bsod nams yid la bya ba de brtson bya/_/'byung po'i 
[\[303b.2\]]tshogs kun song zhing 'jig 'gyur te/_/srog dang bcas pa'i dpal ni g.yo bar gyur/_/bzhi pas smras pa/_thub pa de la slob mchog yang dag btud/_/rang gi dgos pa ma lus thams cad byas/_/gus shing rab tu dad pas bla ma de'i/_/phyi bzhin ba lang bdag kyang de ltar song /_/de 
[\[303b.3\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag gi rus pa la rus pa'i mchod pa byas nas lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na shing shi ri sha ka'i gzhal med khang nas mi snang zhing grong khyer rtswa can gyi gyad rnams nye bar rten pa dang /_shing 
[\[303b.4\]]sA la zung gi tshal du gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'od srung la sogs pa dge slong lnga brgya ga la ba der song ste phyin nas ji ltar rgan rims la phyag 'tshal te lhung bzed dang chos gos rgan pa la byin nas 'di skad 
[\[303b.5\]]ces smras so/_/mgon po'i sku ni med par des thos nas/_/bsod nams las kyis rab tu zhi bar song /_/de yi lhung bzed chos gos 'di yin te/_/des bsams dge 'dun dag la bzod par gsol/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[303b.6\]]so/_/kye tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag nyon cig_/ji ltar de ni 'phags pa'i tshul gyis 'das/_/gzhan gyis de bzhin rab zhir 'gro mi bya/_/de bas ji srid dgos pa'i don bya zhing /_/dbang chen tshogs nas de srid bgro bar bya/_/de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[303b.7\]]chen pos dge slong de dag brtan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa/_/ji ltar bsod nams las kyis zhi gyur pa/_/shi ri sha ka'i sems mchog ba lang bdag_/de ltar khyed kyis de bzhin mi bsam ste/_/'gro don dgos phyir tshogs nas blo gros bya/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]chen pos dge slong lnga brgya po de dag la khrims su bcas nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag ji skad smra ba gson cig_/ji ltar bdag cag gis chos kyi tshul ji lta ba bzhin bshad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang rnam par bral ba'i sdug bsngal can gyi 
[\[304a.2\]]dge slong phyogs dang ljongs gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de dag gis thos nas 'dir 'ongs te/_de dag gis bdag gi sems g.yeng bar byed mod kyi/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hAr byang chub cing /_gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku brnyes pa der chos 
[\[304a.3\]]kyi tshul bgro bar bya'o/_/de na dge slong gcig gis legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/gzhan zhig kyang tshe dang ldan pa ci byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dong ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags 
[\[304a.4\]]ma'i bu ma skyes dgra rtsa ba med pa'i dad pa dang ldan pa de dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang /_chos kyi tshul rab tu sbyor bar byed cing zhal ta yang byed pas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ngo /_/de dag gis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi na/_de lta na yang tshe dang 
[\[304a.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo ni slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas pa yang yin na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde mtha' dag gtad na/_de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gal te de lta na slob pa'i bya ba dang bcas 
[\[304a.6\]]pa'i dge slong gzhan 'khod pa de dag kyang 'khrug par 'gyur bas de la thabs kyi rnam pa zhig byas la/_'di chu'i zhal ta bar bsko ba'i spro bas bskos la lhag ma ni bzlog par bgyi'o/_/de dag gis smras pa/_legs kyis de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od 
[\[304a.7\]]srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi chu'i zhal ta bar spro'am/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po spro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol ba dang gnyis kyi 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]las bya bar brtsams nas/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ta ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nye ba na 'dug cing /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde mtha' dag gtad de/_de lta bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[304b.2\]]dge 'dun gyi chu'i zhal ta bar bsko ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo chu'i zhal ta bar bsko na/_gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_dge slong kun dga' bo chu'i zhal lta ba chu 'brim par bsko ste/_dge slong kun dga' bo chu'i zhal ta ba 
[\[304b.3\]]chu 'brim par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ta ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nye ba na 'dug cing /_de la bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde mtha' dge gtad de/_
[\[304b.4\]]de lta bas na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyis dge 'dun la chu 'brim par bsko ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim na/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim par bsko zhing /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim par tshe dang 
[\[304b.5\]]ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge 'dun la chu 'brim par bskos lags te/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to//_//
[\[304b.6\]]'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kun dga' bo khyod tshur shog_/dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig ci dga' bar ljongs rgyus la rgyal po'i khab tu song shig_/
[\[304b.7\]]nga ni lam drang po nas 'gro'o/_/btsun pa de bzhin bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong gi dge 'dun dang ci dga' bar ljongs rgyu zhing song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yang snga ma bzhin lam drang po nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo /_/yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]ma'i bu ma skyes dgra'i spyod pa ni gang du glang po che la zhon te/_bcom ldan 'das mthong na de ma thag tu rang lhung nas/_de bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus ma nyams par sa la 'jog go/_/yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mthong ste/_mthong nas bcom 
[\[305a.2\]]ldan 'das rjes su dran nas de bzhin du rang sa la lhung ba dang /_de tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bzung nas smras pa/_rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa lags la/_nyan thos dag ni mnyam par ma bzhag par ye shes mthong ba 
[\[305a.3\]]mi 'jug ste/_de res 'ga' ni de bzhin du mnyam par bzhag nas gnas/_res 'ga' ni mnyam par ma bzhag par gnas pas da phyin chad khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mthong na glang po che dang rta las rang lhung bar ma byed cig ces der khrims bcas so/_/des smras pa/_
[\[305a.4\]]'phags pa ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/'phags pa 'on kyang gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti bgyid na/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/_da bdag gis gang zhig la bkur sti bgyi lags/_
[\[305a.5\]]de lta bas na bdag la bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gtad do zhes smras nas/_blon po la shes ldan 'phags pa 'od srung chen po'i dgos pa thams cad sbyor cig ces bsgo'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 
[\[305a.6\]]'das ni yul ma ga d+hAr byang chub ste/_der bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku brnyes pa/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams lam du zhugs te lha'i gnas 'dir chos kyi tshul bgro bar 'tshal lags so/_/des smras pa/_'phags pa legs kyis bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[305a.7\]]la yo byad thams cad bstabs par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po rnams mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]dgras dgra bcom pa lnga brgya rgyal po'i khab tu phyin par thos so/_/thos nas kyang grong khyer dag byi dor byas te lam dag bstan nas/_btsun mo dang /_gzhon nu dang /_blon po dang /_pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyis bsu'o/_/de nas skyes bu bzang po stong gis zhabs 'bring byas nas rab tu 
[\[305b.2\]]mdzes par byas te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams grong khyer du phyin nas yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so/_/de nas rgan rims kyis 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa phyogs gang du bgro bar bgyi/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[305b.3\]]'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir yang dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral te sdug bsngal skyes pas phyogs dang ljongs dang gang dang gang na gnas pa de dang de dag 'dir mchis te/_des bdag cag gi sems g.yeng ba'i skyon mchis so/_/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 
[\[305b.4\]]yang de bzhin du nyes dmigs mchis te/_shing n+ya gro d+ha'i phug 'di ni rab tu dben mod kyi 'on kyang mal stan ma mchis lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa khyod kyis sems skyed cig dang mal stan mchis so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rgyal 
[\[305b.5\]]po ni 'di skad ces/_shing n+ya gro d+ha'i phug 'dir 'gro bar bya'o zhes zer ro/_/dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po rnams kyang cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo /_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'phags pa 'od srung chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bdag la ma sbran pa kho nar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/
[\[305b.6\]]khyod kyis kyang ma brtags par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma mdzad cig_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos kyang de bzhin du gnang ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos je dang por dbyar sbyor ba ral ba dang /_'drums pa dag bcos nas/_phyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs 
[\[305b.7\]]te chos bgro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas des dang por dbyar sbyor ba ral ba dang /_'drums pa dag bcos nas phyis dbyar gnas par khas blangs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems la kun tu bltas nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags 
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dgongs shig_/'khor 'di de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu bsngags pa'i nang na dge slong 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa/_sred pa dang bcas pa/_len 
[\[306a.2\]]pa dang bcas pa slob pa dag yod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs te rnam par brtags na/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gcig pu 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas/_sred pa dang 
[\[306a.3\]]bcas/_len pa dang bcas te slob pa yin par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams ni snying po med pa dang bral ba/_dag pa/_gtsang ba/_snying po 
[\[306a.4\]]can/_bla na med pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing /_'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin mod kyi/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni 'dod chags dang bcas/_zhe sdang dang bcas/_gti mug dang bcas/_sred pa dang bcas/_len pa dang bcas pa yin te slob pa yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[306a.5\]]'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la ci spro ba byas pas gdul bar 'gyur ram/_/'on te spyo bas 'dul bar 'gyur ba rnam par brtags na/_ji tsam spyos nas 'dul bar mthong nas des de la nged ni 'dus pa'i mchog yin la/_kun dga' bo khyod dang nged lhan cig chos 
[\[306a.6\]]bgro bar mi byas/_khyod longs shig ces smras pa dang /_de gnad du phog pa bzhin du rab tu g.yos nas smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po chog go/_/bdag gis tshul khrims nyams par ma byas/_lta ba nyams par ma byas/_spyod pa nyams par ma byas/_'tsho ba nyams par ma 
[\[306a.7\]]byas te/_bdag gis cung zad kyang dge 'dun la nyes pa ma byas mod kyi/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po bzod pa mdzod cig_/des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring nye ba na 'dug 'dug pas tshul khrims nyams par ma byas pa dang /_lta ba nyams par ma 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]byas pa dang /_spyod pa nyams par ma byas pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams par ma byas pa lta ngo mtshar ci che/_ngas dge 'dun la nyes pa cung zad kyang ma byas so zhes smra bar byed dam/_longs la tshul shing zung shig dang /_khyod kyi nyes pa bstan par bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[306b.2\]]dga' bo langs so/_/de langs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lan gsum du g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_kun du g.yos/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun du rab tu 'gul te/_nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig phye ste a la la 
[\[306b.3\]]zhes smras nas/_kye ma 'phags pa 'od srung chen po bden par smra ba/_phan par smra ba yin na/_da ltar thub pa lus 'phags kyi gnas 'di na 'phags pa kun dga' bo la rab tu drag pas spyo bas spyo bar byed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 
[\[306b.4\]]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod na re ngas dge 'dun la gnod pa ci yang ma byas so zhes zer na/_ji ltar khyod kyis dge 'dun la gnod pa ma byas pa yin/_bcom ldan 'das ni bud med rnams gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pas rab tu dbyung bar mi bzhed na 
[\[306b.5\]]khyod kyis gsol ba btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo bud med rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te/_dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob par 'gyur ba nga la ma smra shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo chos 'dul ba la bud med rab tu phyung na 'di ltar chos 
[\[306b.6\]]'dul ba yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur te/_dper na 'bras sA lu phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing la ser ba bab na 'bras sA lu gang yin pa de lhag cing med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du chos 'dul ba 'di la bud med rab tu phyung na chos 'dul ba yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[306b.7\]]ma gsungs sam/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po chog gis bzod pa mdzod cig_/ngo tsha med pa dang /_'dzem pa med pa ni ma lags mod kyis/_'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi sru skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mIs dka' ba spyad de/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyi yum ni dus las 'das 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]te rang gis nu ma bsnun nas gsos shing bskyed pa dang /_gzhan yang sngon gyi dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la 'khor bzhi yod pa de bzhin du gang bcom ldan 'das 'di la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam pa dang /_bdag gis byas pa gzo ba dang /_
[\[307a.2\]]nye du dang gnyen pas bud med rab tu dbyung bar gsol ba bgyis te de gcig pu nongs pa ni bzod pa gsol lo/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de ltar byas pa gzo ba ni chos kyi sku la gnod pa byed pa yin te/_ji ltar khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa la ser ba bab 
[\[307a.3\]]pas lo stong tshang bar gnas pa'i yun thung ngur lhag ma tsam du byas na ji ltar nye du dang gnyen gyi phyir zhes smra/_gnyen gyi phyir rab tu phyung ba ni tshul ma yin zhing legs pa ma yin te nyes pa yin no/_/ji ltar sngon gyi dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'khor bzhi yod par 
[\[307a.4\]]ngas thos te/_gang bcom ldan 'das 'di la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes smra ba yang de sngon gyi dus na mi rnams ni 'dod pa chung ba/_nyes pa chung ba/_'dod chags chung ba/_zhe sdang chung ba/_gti mug chung ba/_kun tu sbyor ba srab pa yin te/_de dag ni de ltar rigs kyi 'di ni 
[\[307a.5\]]rigs pa ma yin te/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das mi bzhed bzhin du ji lta ji ltar khyod kyis gsol ba btab pa de bzhin du grub par gyur to/_/de bas na 'di ni nyes pa dang po yin te/_tshul shing zhog shig_/khyod la nyes pa gzhan yang yod de/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis kun 
[\[307a.6\]]dga' bo gang dang gang du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po la bsten cing bsgoms te lan grangs mang du byas na 'dod na bskal pa'am bskal pa las lhag par yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs na/_'di ltar khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten la phan par 
[\[307a.7\]]bgyi ba'i slad du bskal pa'i bar du bzhugs su gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa bskal pa bas lhag par bzhugs su gsol zhes gsol ba ma btab bo/_/des smras pa/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha med pa dang /_'dzem pa med pa ni ma lags mod kyi/_'on kyang bdag de'i tshe 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]bdud sdig can gyis khyab par gyur to/_/de ltar de nyid khyod kyi nyes pa chen po yin te/_ston pa ni dri nga ba spangs pa/_bdud kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa yin na/_ji ltar khyod bdud sdig can gyis khyab par gyur/_de ltar 'di ni khyod kyi nyes pa gnyis pa yin no/_/gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di 
[\[307b.2\]]dag yod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di lta bu'i zhes bka' stsal te gzhan smras pa na lan gzhan du 'debs te/_de ltar 'di yang khyod kyi nyes pa gzhan gsum pa yin no/_/gzhan yang khyod kyi nyes pa 'di dag yod de/_
[\[307b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi na bza' gser gyi kha dog can phrugs gcig la rkang pas brdzis so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po bdag des ngo tsha med pa'am/_rab tu ngo tsha ba ni med pa ma lags mod kyi/_de'i tshe na g.yas g.yon nas dge slong grogs byed pa med do zhes smras pa dang /_des 
[\[307b.4\]]khyod kyis nam mkha' la ci nyes te mi dor/_'on kyang lha rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur na zhes smra ste/_'di ni khyod kyi nyes pa bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang khyod kyi nyes pa 'di dag yod de/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan 'da' bar zhugs te/_shing sA la zung gi drung du skyems pa dang /_
[\[307b.5\]]chu rnyog pa can gsol to/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha ba med pa'am/_rab tu ngo tsha ba med pa ni ma lags mod kyi/_de'i tshe na shing rta lnga brgya tsam zhig chu bo ka kus sta brgal bas rnyog pa can du gyur to/_/de'i phyir khyod kyis nyes pa yin mod/_de na khyod kyis lhung bzed 
[\[307b.6\]]nam mkha' la ji ste mi bzung /_lha dag gis chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dag gis bkang bar 'gyur ba 'di yang khyod kyi nyes pa lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di dag yod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ngas zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i 
[\[307b.7\]]mdo 'don pa de'i tshe gang gis tshul khrims phra mo dang /_phran tshegs dag 'don na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis phyir klod la bde ba'i reg pa la gnos shig ces byung na de'i tshe khyod kyis tshul khrims bslab pa phra mo dang /_phran tshegs gang lags zhes ma zhus pa'i phyir ro/_/de 'dir 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]bdag gis smra ba ni phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma bcu gsum gyi chos dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi 
[\[308a.2\]]dang /_bslab pa'i chos mang po rnams las lhag pa rnams ni phra mo dang phran tshegs rnams so/_/gzhan yang 'di skad zer te/_phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_snga ma bzhin du so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi'i bar dang /_de bas lhag pa rnams ni phra mo dang phran 
[\[308a.3\]]tshegs rnams so/_/gzhan yang 'di skad zer te/_phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu rnams lhag pa ni phra mo dang phran 
[\[308a.4\]]tshegs rnams so/_/gzhan yang 'di skad zer te/_phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu rnams las ma gtogs pa lhag pa rnams ni phra mo dang phran tshegs 
[\[308a.5\]]rnams so/_/gzhan yang 'di skad zer te/_phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi dang /_dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum dang /_ma nges pa'i chos gnyis las lhag pa rnams ni phra mo dang phran tshegs rnams so zhes bya'o/_/de ltar dge slong gis khong du chud pa nas phas 
[\[308a.6\]]pham par 'gyur ba bzhi la gnas shing /_kha cig ni dge 'dun gyi lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum la gnas pa mu stegs can gyis skabs rnyed de/_dge slong gau ta ma'i chos ni dud pa bzhin du gyur to/_/dge sbyong gau ta ma bzhugs pa'i tshe ni nyan thos kyi bslab pa yang dag par sdom zhing /_da 
[\[308a.7\]]ltar ni ci dga' bar spyod cing lhod par gyur te/_'dod na ni de bzhin du byed/_mi 'dod na ni mi byed do/_/de bas na khyod kyis ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la ma zhus pa nyes so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha ba med pa'am/_rab tu ngo tsha ba med pa ni ma 
[\[308b\]]
