[\[308b.1\]]lags mod kyi/_bdag de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i mya ngan dran pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir to/_/de yang khyod kyi nyes par gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring byed la/_'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa yin na/_khyod kyis mya ngan byas pa de yang 
[\[308b.2\]]nyes so/_/gzhan yang nyes pa 'di dag yod de/_khyim pa'i 'khor dang /_bud med spyod pa ngan pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa bstan to/_/btsun pa 'od srung ngo tsha ba med pa'am/_rab tu ngo tsha ba med pa ni ma lags mod kyi bdag gis 'di 
[\[308b.3\]]snyam du bsams so/_/bud med ni rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags che bas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa mthong na mo mtshan dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod de lta bu'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ga las byung /_mdoms kyi sba 
[\[308b.4\]]ba sbubs su nub pa bstan na bud med dag bud med kyi mo mtshan ji ltar spong bar 'gyur ba 'di dang nyes pa rnam pa bdun no/_/gzhan yang khyod la nyes pa 'di dag yod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gser gyi kha dog ltar ser ba bud med dag la bstan pas/_de la mchi mas dri 
[\[308b.5\]]ma can du gyur pa'o/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po ngo tsha med pa'am/_rab tu ngo tsha med pa ni ma lags mod kyi bdag gi blo skyes pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i kha dog dang ldan pa mthong na/_sems can mang po dag kha dog dang ldan par sems kyis 
[\[308b.6\]]smon lam bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo khyod gcig tu shes pa ma yin zhing /_gzhan gyi sems shes pa ma yin pa 'di dang /_nyes pa brgyad do/_/khyod 'dod chags cung zad dang ldan pas/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i mchog 
[\[308b.7\]]'dus pa'i nang du ma 'dug par/_da langs te song shig_/khyod dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i bzlas pa mi bya'o/_/de ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos nyes pa byas pa/_rnam pa brgyad 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]glengs pa dang /_phyogs bzhir bltas te snying rje dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i tshig gis dal bus smras pa/_kye ma'o nga'i dus ni 'di 'dra bar gyur te/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pas ni spangs/_mgon dang skyabs byed pa ni med/_snang ba yang med na su 
[\[309a.2\]]la brten par bya/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i nyes pa rnam pa brgyad glengs pa dang /_de nas nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha dag gis a la la zhes smras nas/_kye da ltar lha rnams kyi lus ni rgyas par 'gyur/_lha ma yin gyi lus 
[\[309a.3\]]rnams ni rmas par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni rgyas par 'gyur te/_de ltar ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen pos ston pa dang 'dra ba'i nyan thos chen po la nyes pa rnam pa brgyad glengs pas so/_/de nas yang tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[309a.4\]]dga' bos 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa chen po 'od srung de ltar lags pas bzod pa mdzod cig_/ji ltar chos bzhin du bgyid cing slan chad kyang mi bgyid mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag khyod la gtad do/_/bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[309a.5\]]'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na kun dga' bo khyod mya ngan dang /_yid glong ba dang /_smre sngags 'don par ma byed cig_/khyod dge slong 'od srung chen po la gtad do/_/khyod nyes pa chung ngu la mi bzod pa med par dka' bzhin byos la bzod pa gyis shig_/kun dga' bo ma ngu bar khyod kyi 
[\[309a.6\]]dge ba'i chos dag 'phel te 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ngas ni bstan pa la brtson par bya ba'i phyir mchog 'dus pa'i nang nas langs te song shig_/khyod dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i bzlas pa mi bya'o zhes chad pas gcad pa byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas tshe dang 
[\[309a.7\]]ldan pa chen po 'od srung la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa chen po 'od srung ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo med na bdag cag gis yang dag par ji ltar bshad par bgyi/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dge slong kun dga' bo yon tan dang ldan du zin kyang de dang lhan cig 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]mi gnas so/_/de ni 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pas bslab dgos te/_khyod dang yang dag par bzlas pa mi bya'o zhes smras nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[309b.2\]]longs la song shig_/khyod kyis rab tu brtson pas bya ba byas te dgra bcom par gyur na lhan cig tu yang dag par bzlas par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mig mchi mas gang bar gyur te/_ston pa dang bral ba dran pas yid mi dga' ste/_de nas mchog 'dus pa'i nang 
[\[309b.3\]]nas byung ste/_yul br-i dzi'i grong khyer du song nas dbyar der tshul du zhugs so/_/de nas kun dga' bo'i g.yog tshe dang ldan pa br-i dzi'i bus byas pa de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos shin tu brtson pas 'khor bzhi la chos 'chad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa br-i dzi'i bus 
[\[309b.4\]]'di snyam du bsams so/_/bdag gis mkhan po 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral te slob bam/_'on te 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral bar slob pa/_bdag gis ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs la/_de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems kyis 
[\[309b.5\]]mkhan po'i sems blta'o snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa br-i dzi'i bus rnam pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems bltas pas/_tshe dang ldan pa br-i dzi'i bus tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[309b.6\]]dga' bo'i sems shes te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'i slob par mthong ba dang /_de nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song nas phyin te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i mdun 
[\[309b.7\]]du 'dug nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gau tam khyod ni bag med ma mdzad par/_/shing drung thibs por brten nas mya ngan 'das/_/thugs la bzhag ste bsam gtan mdzod cig dang /_/ring por mi thogs zhi ba'i gnas thob 'gyur/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo tshe dang ldan pa spong byed kyi bus gdams ngag 'dis btams nas/_nyin par gyi 'chag pa dang 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong bar byed de/_de nyin par gyi 'chag pa dang 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams 
[\[310a.2\]]la sems yongs su sbyong ngo /_/mtshan gyi thun dang po la 'chag pa dang /_'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong bar byed de/_de mtshan gyi thun dang po la 'chag pa dang 'dug pas sgrib par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams las sems yongs su sbyong ngo /_/
[\[310a.3\]]mtshan gyi gung thun la gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du rkang pa bkrus nas gtsug lag khang gi nang du zhugs te/_glo g.yas pas phab nas rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag ste/_snang ba'i 'du shes dang /_dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang ldan pa'i 'du shes kho na yid la byed cing nyal bar byed 
[\[310a.4\]]do/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sngas nang tshangs can la mgo ma bzhag pa kho nar/_'di ltar yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dga' ba dang bde ba so sor myangs nas rnam par 
[\[310a.5\]]grol te/_dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rgyal po'i khab tu phyin te/_'od srung la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgya po shing n+ya gro d+ha'i phug na chos sdud cing 'dus pa ga la bar phyin to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[310a.6\]]dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rnams brjed ngas pa dang /_lus nyam chung bas mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa ma yin par mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa 'dzin par mi nus pas de bas na snga dro'i dus su mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/_/phyi dro ni mdo sde dang /_
[\[310a.7\]]'dul ba dang /_ma mo bgro bar bya'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de skad smras pa dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po las thos nas/_dge slong de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po mdo sde dang /_
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]'dul ba dang /_ma mo dag las gang sngar bgro bar bgyi/_des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag je re zhig mdo sde sngar bgro bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas chos bsdu bar gsol ba btab nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/_tshe 
[\[310b.2\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la spro bar byas pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod ni sgrub pa yin na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde bsdu bar spro'am spro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las bya bar brtsams te/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du 
[\[310b.3\]]gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub par spro na gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na/_dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /_'di ltar dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub par bsko ste/_
[\[310b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde sdud pa sgrub bo/_/'di ni gsol ba'o/_/las ni 'di ltar bya ste/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub par spro ste/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[310b.5\]]pa kun dga' bo sgrub par bskos nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sgrub par bskos nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub par tshe dang ldan pa gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang 
[\[310b.6\]]ma gsung shig_/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsung shig_/dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde bsdu ba sgrub par bsko ste/_'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to/_/tshe 
[\[310b.7\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bo chos smra ba'i seng ge'i khri'i steng du dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas snam sbyar lnga brgya bting ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas nas sems can rnams la ni snying rje'i sems nye bar bzhag_/chos la ni gus pa bskyed/_
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la ni zhe sar dmigs nas seng ge'i khri g.yas phyogs su bskor te/_mgo bos gtugs nas/_rgan rims su ji ltar 'os par phyag byas nas mi rtag pa yid la byas te seng ge'i khri zil gyis mnan nas 'dug go/_/de nas rgya 
[\[311a.2\]]mtsho ltar zab pa'i 'khor mi g.yo ba la bltas nas gal te ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde ma lus par gsungs pa bdag gis bzung ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gang dag klu'i gnas su bshad pa dag kyang yod/_gang dag lha'i gnas su bshad pa dag kyang yod/_
[\[311a.3\]]gang dag bdag la mngon sum du bshad pa dag kyang yod de/_gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de 'ongs pa gang dag de bzhin du thos nas bzung ba dang /_'di ltar thos pa thams cad bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams pa dang /_lha dag gi shes pa dang mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin 
[\[311a.4\]]te/_gcig la gcig kye ma lus 'phags ma'i thub pa 'phags pa kun dga' bo ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'chad pas sems rtse gcig tu byas nas mnyan to zhes smra'o/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu gzhan zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang 
[\[311a.5\]]la chos rnams rab gnas pa/_/'jig rten gsum pos rtag tu mchod/_/'phags pa 'di ni dogs med pas/_/seng ge bzhin du chos rnams sgrogs/_/kye ma zhi ba de bshad la/_/khyed rnams bde bar 'dod pa yis/_/nges par snying po snying po'i mchog_/de 
[\[311a.6\]]dag pa ni gus pas nyon/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ston pa 'jig rten phan bzhed pa/_/rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos rnams kyi/_/rnam pa mchog ni gar bshad pa/_/tshe dang ldan pas mdo sde 
[\[311a.7\]]gsungs/_/ston pas gang dag yongs su bsgrags pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rtogs pa yid la bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang du rab tu zhi zhing thugs su chud pa der mngon par bltas te 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te sgras khyab par byas nas smras pa/_'di 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul bA rA Na sIr drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshal na bzhugs so zhes tshig gis rab tu brjod pa de'i tshe de ma thag kho nar nam mkha'i dkyil dang /_gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dag dang /_'dod chags dang ma 
[\[311b.2\]]bral ba'i dge slong la sogs pa rnam pa mang po stong dag gis gnod pas btsir cing gnad du phab ste sdug bsngal tshor bzhin du a la la zhes tshig tu brjod cing smra ba ni/_kye ma 'jig rten 'di dag tu/_/mi rtag par ni khyad par med/_/gang gis rin chen gter de yi/_/yon tan 
[\[311b.3\]]rgya mtsho dag kyang bskams/_/gang las bdag gis mngon thos pa/_/chos ni thar pa'i bde ba byed/_/'di skad thos shes rab sbyar te/_/de yang de ring bsgrags pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lnga po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_dge slong dag 
[\[311b.4\]]sngon ma thos pa'i chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i sdug bsngal bden pa'o zhes chos kyi 'khor lo rgya cher bskor nas mdo sde bshad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bdag gis chos kyi 
[\[311b.5\]]rnam grangs 'di mngon sum du thos te/_bdag gi don du mdo sde 'di bshad cing rjes su bstan pas bdag gi khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/_rus pa'i ri las ni rgal/_ngan song gi sgo ni bcad/_mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo ni phye ste/_mdo sde rin po che 'di bshad pas 
[\[311b.6\]]bdag dang lha stong phrag brgyad bcus chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de ring 'dir 'di skad thos nas bshad de/_kye ma thams cad mi rtag pas khyad par med do zhes smras nas stan las babs te sa la 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo de 
[\[311b.7\]]blta ba'i phyir dgra bcom pa de dag thams cad sdug pa'i bag chags kyis bsgos pa'i yid kyis rang rang gi stan las babs nas sa la 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye ma ji ltar bdag cag gis chos 'chad pa mngon sum du mthong ba las/_mi rtag pa'i stobs kyis 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de yang da ni thos pa'i lam du gshegs par gyur to/_/smras pa/_lha dang mi dang lha min klu rnams kyi rgyal zhir gshegs na/_/khyed cag ci phyir 'tsho zhing zhi ba'i gnas su 'jug mi byed/_/skye bo'i nang na thams cad mkhyen pas stongs par 
[\[312a.2\]]mngon mthong na/_/dge ba'i blo gros gang dag srog la chags shing dam por byed/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba bas mtha'i gnas mal du bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas smon lam gyi shes pas rnam par bltas te/_dga' ba'i yid kyis 
[\[312a.3\]]'di ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi lung de yin nam/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gi lung de lags so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag gi lung de lta bu lags sam/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[312a.4\]]kun dga' bo de kho na'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang po bsdus na tshangs par spyod pa gang gis kyang ma bzlog cing gshe bar ma gyur to/_/de lta bas na 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston 
[\[312a.5\]]pas bstan pa'o snyam du shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gnyis pa gang du bshad/_des gsal bar yul bA rA Na sI kho nar dge slong lnga po'i ched du ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_
[\[312a.6\]]'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul bA rA Na sI drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshal na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ste/_sdug 
[\[312a.7\]]bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog pa dang /_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ste/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'o/_/sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]rga ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_na ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_gang 'dod pa btsal te mi rnyed pa sdug bsngal ba dang /_mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga ni 
[\[312b.2\]]sdug bsngal ba ste/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang 'byung ba'i sred pa dang /_dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa de dang de dag la mngon par dga' ba ste/_'di 
[\[312b.3\]]ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_yang 'byung ba'i sred pa dang /_dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi mod las skyes pa de dang de dag la mngon par dga' ba lhag ma ma lus par spong ba 
[\[312b.4\]]dang /_rab tu 'dor ba dang /_mtha' med par byed pa dang /_zad pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro 
[\[312b.5\]]ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad de/_'di lta ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtogs pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang 
[\[312b.6\]]dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya len pa med par zag pa las sems 
[\[312b.7\]]rnam par grol lo/_/lhag ma dge slong bzhi po yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so zhes smras so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+yas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bdag 
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mngon sum du thos te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa de'i tshe len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/lhag ma dge slong bzhi po yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/_/de nas 
[\[313a.2\]]gcig gis ma tshang ba zhes bya ba nas/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde gnyis pa bsdus nas tshangs par spyod pa gang gis kyang ma bzlog cing gshe bar ma gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de lta bas na 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan 
[\[313a.3\]]pa'o snyam du shes nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gsum pa gang du bshad/_des gsal bar yul bA rA Na sI kho nar dge slong lnga po'i ched du ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_'di skad 
[\[313a.4\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul bA rA Na sI drang srong smra ba [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi tshal na bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong lhag ma bzhi po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no/_/dge slong dag 
[\[313a.5\]]gal te gzugs bdag yin par gyur du zin na/_gzugs la gnod pa 'am/_sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing /_gzugs 'di lta bu dang /_'di lta bur ni gyur cig_/'di lta bur ni ma gyur cig ces pa 'di 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag 
[\[313a.6\]]ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa'am/_sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /_gzugs 'di lta bu dang /_'di lta bur ni gyur cig 'di lta bur ni ma gyur cig ces pa'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed ni bdag ma yin te/_
[\[313a.7\]]dge slong dag gal te 'du shes la sogs pa bdag yin par gyur du zin na zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/_rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig ces pa'ang mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_gzugs rtag pa'am mi rtag pa zhig yin/_btsun pa 'di ni 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]mi rtag pa lags so/_/gzhan yang de mi rtag na sdug bsngal ba'am/_sdug bsngal ba ma yin/_btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal ba lags so/_/gzhan yang de mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yongs su 'gyur ba'i chos can yin mod kyi 'on kyang de thos pa dang 
[\[313b.2\]]ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos bdag tu khas len cing 'di ni bdag go 'di ni bdag gi'o/_/bdag gi ni 'di'o zhes zer ram/_btsun pa de lta ma lags so/_/dge slong dag 'di ji snyam du sems/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa 
[\[313b.3\]]bdag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin du 'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag gi'o/_/bdag gi ni 'di'o zhes zer ram/_btsun pa de lta ma lags so/_/dge slong dag de lta bas na gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba 'am/_
[\[313b.4\]]nang gi'am/_phyi rol gyi'am/_rags pa'am/_phra ba'am/_ngan pa'am/_gya nom pa'am/_gang rgyang ring ba'am/_nye ba de dag thams cad 'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni bdag gi'o/_/bdag gi ni 'di'o zhes bya ba 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes rab 
[\[313b.5\]]kyis blta bar bya'o/_/de ltar de bzhin du gang dag tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta 
[\[313b.6\]]bar bya'o/_/dge slong dag gang gi phyir thos pa dang ldan pa'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag la bdag dang bdag gi med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ste/_des de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bas 'jig rten la cung 
[\[313b.7\]]zad tsam yang nye bar len pa med de/_nye bar ma blangs pas yongs su gdung ba med pas rang nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_bdag gi skye ba ni zad/_tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad/_bya ba ni byas te/_'di las srid pa gzhan med do zhes rab tu shes so/_/
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong lhag ma bzhi po len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dgra bcom pa gcig gis ma tshang ba zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde gsum pa bsdus na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 
[\[314a.2\]]gang gis kyang ma bzlog cing gshe bar ma gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de lta bas na 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_
[\[314a.3\]]rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang du bshad pa de dang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bzlas nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang bas mdo sde byas te/_de'i tshe gang phung po dang rab tu ldan pa'i mdo sde ni de phung por bsdus te bzhag go/_/gang skye mched 
[\[314a.4\]]dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa ni skye mched drug tu bsdus so/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pas rig pa dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa ni de gleng gzhi dang yang dag par rab tu ldan par bsdus so/_/gang nyan thos kyis bshad pa mang ba ni de nyan 
[\[314a.5\]]thos kyi bshad par bsdus so/_/gang sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa mang ba ni de sangs rgyas kyi bshad par bsdus so/_/gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang 
[\[314a.6\]]chub kyi yan lag dang lam gyi yan lag de dag dang yang dag par rab tu ldan pa ni de lam gyi yan lag tu bsdus so/_/gang yang dag par brjod pa mang ba'i mdo sde ni de yang dag par brjod pa'i sder bsdus so/_/tshigs su bcad pa dang bcas par yang dag par ldan 
[\[314a.7\]]pa ni yang dag par ldan pa'i lung zhes bsdus so/_/gang mdo sde ring po ni de lung ring por bzhag go/_/gang bar ma bar ma'i mdo sde dag ni de lung bar mar bzhag go/_/gang tshig gcig dang tshig gnyis zhes bya ba nas/_tshig bcu zhes bya ba'i bar ni gcig las 'phros pa'i lung 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo khyod kyi lung de snyed cig gam/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po de snyed cig lags te/_'di las lhag pa med do zhes smras nas seng ge'i khri 
[\[314b.2\]]las babs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde ni ma lus par bsdus zin pas da ni 'dul ba bgro bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor mkhas par gyur pa 'dul ba'i gleng 
[\[314b.3\]]gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor ni mkhas pa/_'dul ba'i gleng gzhi dang byung ba la mkhas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog tu 
[\[314b.4\]]lung bstan na/_de bas na de spro bar byas nas 'dul ba sdud par bsko'o/_/de bzhin du bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor khyod ni sgrub pa yin na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[314b.5\]]pa'i 'dul ba ma lus pa dag bsdu bar spro'am/_spro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos gsol pa dang gnyis kyi las bya bar brtsams te/_dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi 'dul ba ma 
[\[314b.6\]]lus pa dag bsdu bar sgrub cing spro na zhes bya ba nas cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po seng ge'i khri las babs nas tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od 
[\[314b.7\]]srung chen pos tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa/_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis dang por bslab pa'i gzhi bcas/_des gsal bar smras pa/_
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]yul bA rA Na sIr ro/_/gang gi don du dge slong lnga'i ched du ste/_gang gi phyir 'di lta ste/_sham thabs zlum por bgo bar bya'o zhes bslab pa bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan 
[\[315a.2\]]bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas smon pa'i shes pas bltas na zhes bya ba nas/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di snyam du bsams te zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi dang po de ltar yang dag par bsdus na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa 
[\[315a.3\]]gang gis kyang ma bzlog cing gshe bar ma gyur te/_de lta bas na 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i 
[\[315a.4\]]gzhi gnyis pa bcas pa gsung shig_/des gsal bar smras pa/_yul bA rA Na sIr ro/_/gang gi ched du dge slong lnga po'i don du ste/_gang gi tshe 'di ltar de chos gos zlum por bgo bar bya'o zhes bslab pa bca' ba mdzad do/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar 
[\[315a.5\]]gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams rab kyi mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba nas/_bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis pa zhes pa snga ma bzhin te/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gang gis kyang ma bzlog cing gshe bar ma gyur te/_de lta bas na 'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston 
[\[315a.6\]]pas bstan pa'o snyam du rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi gsum pa bcas pa gsung shig_/des gsal bar smras pa/_ka lan da ka'i grong du'o/_/
[\[315a.7\]]gang gi ched du ka lan da ka'i bu bzang sbyin gyi ched ste/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams dang lhan cig bslab pa mtshungs shing mnyam pa las bslab pa ma phul/_bslab pa nyams par ma byas par mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos sten pas 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]tha na byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa la yang rung ste/_dge slong de phas pham par gyur pa yin pas gnas par mi bya'o/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams rab kyi mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma 
[\[315b.2\]]bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang du bshad pa de dang de dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis bzlas nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma 
[\[315b.3\]]tshang bas gzhung du byas so/_/'di dag ni phas pham pa rnams so/_/'di dag ni dge 'dun lhag ma rnams so/_/'di dag ni ma nges pa'i chos gnyis dang /_spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum bcu dang /_ltung byed dgu bcu'i chos dang /_so sor bshags par bya ba bzhi'i 
[\[315b.4\]]chos dang /_bslab pa mang po'i chos dang /_rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun dang /_'di ni bcas pa'o/_/'di ni rjes su bcas pa'o/_/'di ni so sor spang ba'o/_/'di ni gnang ba'o/_/rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni 'di ltar bya'o/_/gsol 
[\[315b.5\]]ba dang las ni 'di ltar bya'o/_/gsol ba dang gnyis dang /_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las ni 'di ltar bya'o/_/'di 'dra ba ni rab tu dbyung ngo /_/'di 'dra ba ni rab tu mi dbyung ngo /_/gso sbyong ni 'di ltar bya'o/_/dgag dbye ni 'di ltar bya ste/_tshul 'di 'dra ba nas 
[\[315b.6\]]phra mo ni 'di/_gleng gzhi ni 'di/_mos pa ni 'di'o zhes de de bzhin du 'dul bar yang dag par bsdus nas/_tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor seng ge'i khri las babs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi rnams shes rab zhan pa yi ge tsam gyi 
[\[315b.7\]]rjes su 'brang la/_zab mo'i don la mos par gyur pa de rnams la ma la bdag kho nas mdo sde dang 'dul ba'i don srung bar gsungs pa ma mo bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas don du gnyer bas gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las byas te/_seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas dge slong 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag ma mo lta bu ma mo lta bu zhes bya ba de bdag kho nas smra bar bya ste/_ma mo lta bu ni shes bya'i mtshan nyid rab tu gsal bar byed pa yin te/_'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_yang dag par spong ba 
[\[316a.2\]]bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /_chos kyi tshig bzhi dang /_
[\[316a.3\]]nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_smon nas shes pa dang /_rab kyi mthar phyin pa dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa nyid mtshan ma med pa dang /_'dris pa bsgom pa'i bsam gtan dang /_mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba dang /_kun rdzob shes 
[\[316a.4\]]pa dang /_zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs kyi phung po yang dag par bsdus pa dang brtags pa ste/_'di dag ni ma mo lta bu zhes bya'o/_/de nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba rnams rab kyi mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba nas/_'di ni chos so/_/
[\[316a.5\]]'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni ston pas bstan pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/_/de nas sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gis mdo sde dang /_'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa dag yang dag par bsdus pa dang sgra phyung ste dbyangs kyis rab tu bsgrags pa/_kye ma 'phags pa 'od 
[\[316a.6\]]srung la sogs pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas bde bar gshegs pa'i sde snod gsum yang dag par bsdus pas lha rnams kyi lus ni mngon par 'phel bar gyur/_lha ma yin gyi lus rnams ni yongs su 'gribs par gyur to zhes smras te/_sa bla'i gnod sbyin dag gi sgra bar snang la rgyu ba'i 
[\[316a.7\]]gnod sbyin dag gis thos nas/_rgyal chen ris bzhi dang /_sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]pa chen po dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_gya nom snang dag gis skad 
[\[316b.2\]]cig de dang /_thang cig de dang /_yud tsam de dang /_skad cig dang /_thang cig dang /_yud tsam de la 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du sgra grags te/_'og min gyi lha rnams kyis kyang sgra bsgrags pa nas/_lha ma yin gyi lus yongs su 'gribs par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/_
[\[316b.3\]]dgra bcom pa lnga brgyas yang dag par bsdus pas/_lnga brgyas yang dag par bsdus pa lnga brgyas yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos yang dag par bsdu ba byas nas smras pa/_kye ma stobs bcu mnga' ba'i gsung ni tshad 
[\[316b.4\]]med pa/_/'gro la phan phyir chos kyi bstan bcos 'di bsdus pas/_/gang na 'jig rten blo ngan mun byed chud zos pa/_/blo gros rab rib bsal bas sgron mar yang dag ldan/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di snyam du sde snod gsum yang dag par bsdus te smon pa'i shes 
[\[316b.5\]]pas brtags nas ji tsam bzhag pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas par 'gyur ro zhes ji skad gsungs pa dag kyang bdag gis rnam pa thams cad du byas/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal cing lung bstan pa ci nus su byas/_bcom ldan 'das chos nyid 
[\[316b.6\]]chos kyi rje la bdag gis mdza' bo bzhin du byas shing bltas te/_byas pa gzo bar byas shing phyir phan gdags pa yang cung zad tsam byas pas 'jig rten gyi mgon po de la ma lus par lan du phan 'dogs par ni gang zhig gis nus te/_chos dang ldan pa la tshangs par 
[\[316b.7\]]spyod pa ni kun tu spyad/_'jig rten rnams la ni phan btags te yun ring po nas bla mas bskos pas phung po'i khur dang lus rnag can 'dis yang skyo bas/_bdag ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab ste 'gro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_bdag 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]gis thub pa'i mdo sde ni/_/yang dag bsdus nas chos lam bzhag_/gcig nas gcig tu yun ring bar/_/ston pa'i gsung rab 'di gnas 'gyur/_/ngo tsha med rnams chad pas bcad/_/ngo tsha byed ni yongs su bzung /_/bdag gis phan dang dge 
[\[317a.2\]]byas pas/_/bdag ni mya ngan 'das dus bab/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i drung du nye bar 'ongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bstan pa lag tu gtad de yongs su mya ngan 
[\[317a.3\]]las 'das so/_/da ni bdag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas bstan pa khyod kyis yongs su skyongs shig dang /_rgyal po'i khab tu ded dpon gzhan gyi bu zhig skye bar 'gyur te/_de sha na'i gos kyis g.yogs pas de'i ming sha na'i gos can zhes 'dogs so/_/des 
[\[317a.4\]]rgya mtsho chen po rgal nas slar 'ongs te bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la lo lnga'i dus ston byed par 'gyur bas de rab tu phyung la de la bstan pa yongs su gtod cig ces smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[317a.5\]]thugs rje chen pos dka' ba mdzad pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yon tan mtha' yas pas yongs su bsgos pa de'i sku gdung sha ri ram gang dang gang na bar mchod la rab tu zhi bar 'gro'o snyam bsams so/_/de nas mchod rten chen po bzhi'i drung du song nas sku gdung 
[\[317a.6\]]gi mchod rten brgyad la bsnyen bkur gyis rab tu mchod nas klu'i gnas su song ste bcom ldan 'das kyi mche ba la mchod nas nam mkha' la gyen du 'phags te sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su phyin to/_/de brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_lha gzhan dag mngon par 
[\[317a.7\]]dga' nas mchod pa byas te ci'i slad du gshegs/_bzhed pa mchis na bka' stsol cig ces smras so/_/kau shi ka kho bo ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mche ba la sogs pa mtshan ma rnams tha mar mchod par 'dod de 'ongs so/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang lha 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]gzhan dag gis tha ma zhes thos pas yid mi dga' bar gyur te zhes bskyed nas cung zad kyang mi smra bar de dag gis de phyung ba dang /_de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos mche ba de lag pas bzung nas mig mi 'dzums par bltas te spyi bo la bzhag nas me tog man dA ra ba dang /_ku she sha 
[\[317b.2\]]ya dang /_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye mas rab tu gtor nas/_brgya byin la sogs pa lha brgya stong mang po rnams la bag yod par byos shig ces mdor bsdus te chos bshad pa byas nas ri rab kyi steng nas mi snang bar gyur te rgyal po'i khab tu phyin pa dang /_des 'di snyam du bdag 
[\[317b.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra la sbran par bya'o snyam nas de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ste/_chab sgo ba'i mi la 'di skad ces kwa'i skyes bu khyod song la/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'od srung ni sgo na sdod de lha blta bar 'tshal gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig ces 
[\[317b.4\]]smras so/_/de nang du zhugs pa dang ji tsam rgyal po nyal te chab sgo bas smras pa/_'phags pa lha ni gzims so/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_song la slong shig_/chab sgo bas smras pa/_'phags pa rgyal po ni gtum pa zhig pas chad pas gcod du mchi'o/_/'o na 
[\[317b.5\]]nam gnyid sad par gyur pa de'i tshe 'od srung ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar sbron to zhes smros shig_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po lho phyogs kyi ri bo bya gag rkang gi ri la 'dzegs te/_ri gsum gyi dbus su rtswa gding ba byas nas bsams pa/_ma la bdag 
[\[317b.6\]]la bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag dar khrod pa byin pa 'di lus la bgos la byams pa'i gsung rab rgyas kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs te/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyi slob ma'i tshogs sems can gyi mchog de dag kun tu skyo bar byas la/_ji tsam ting nge 'dzin de lta bu bskyed 
[\[317b.7\]]de/_bdag gi lus 'di ri gsum gyis g.yogs pa'i khang pa'i nang 'dir 'dug la byams pa'i bstan pa rgyas kyi bar du ma nyams par byas te/_gang gi tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'ongs na sgo bye bar gyur te/_gal te des bdag gi lus ma mthong na khrag dron por skyugs nas 
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]dus byed pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar rig cing ji tsam na tshe'i 'du byed kyang spangs/_tshe'i 'du byed spangs ma thag tu sa yang rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_skar mda' yang lhung /_phyogs kyang 'tshig_/bar snang la lha dag rnga yang rdung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[318a.2\]]'od srung chen pos sbyar ba dang /_bsreg pa dang /_glog dbyung ba dang /_cho 'phrul chen po rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas rang gi lus byin gyis brlabs nas glo g.yas pas phab ste/_rkang pa'i steng du rkang pa bzhag nas nyal te phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 
[\[318a.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'di snyam du ci'i phyir bdag cag gis 'di g.yos par gyur ces bsams pa dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes nas/_yang brgya byin dang /_
[\[318a.4\]]tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams dang /_lha brgya stong du mas me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_pun da ri ka la sogs pa dang /_tsan dan sa mchog dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma thogs te/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i sku gdung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_gnas 
[\[318a.5\]]brtan gyi sku la me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po bzang po dag dang /_tsan dan sa mchog dang /_a ga ru'i phye ma dag gis mchod cing gtor nas ri gsum sbyar nas bkab bo/_/de nas lha rnams gnas brtan dang bral bas mya ngan skyes 
[\[318a.6\]]te/_de ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang bral ba'i mya ngan skyes pa yang ma byang bar 'dir shing n+ya gro d+ha'i phug 'di na gnas pa'i lha rnams dge ba'i chos kyi bar chad kyang byung bar gyur/_yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po'i yul yang stongs nas snang ba med par gyur/_da ni bkren 
[\[318a.7\]]pa dang /_dbul po dang /_mgon med pa'i srang du byams pas phan 'dogs pa'i mgon yang med/_skye bo rnams dge bas dbul bar gyur te/_da ni bcom ldan 'das gnyis kho na yongs su mya ngan las 'das so snyam sems te/_da ni dam pa'i chos kyi ri'i rtse mo yang 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]lhung /_da ni dam pa'i chos kyi gru yang rab tu g.yos/_da ni dam pa'i chos kyi snang ba yang nub/_da ni dam pa'i chos kyi rgya mtsho yang 'khrugs/_da ni ston pa phan 'dogs pa mi snang bar gyur pas bdud dag kyang dga' bar gyur to zhes bya ba la sogs pa smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton 
[\[318b.2\]]nas phyag byas te mi snang bar gyur to/_/ji tsam na rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i rmi lam du rgyal rigs kyi zhang po'i rgyud chad par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang skrag nas sad pa dang /_sgo srung gis gnas brtan 'od srung chen po ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar sbron to zhes smras pa thos 
[\[318b.3\]]so/_/thos nas rgyal po brgyal te sa la 'gyel ba dang /_ji tsam na chus gtor nas bslang ste 'od ma'i tshal du song nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la lus thams cad kyis gtugs nas ngus te/_bdag gis de ring gnas brtan 'od srung chen po yongs su 
[\[318b.4\]]mya ngan las 'das par thos so zhes smras pa dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po ma skyes dgra khrid nas ri bya gag rkang la 'dzegs pa dang /_ji tsam na gnod sbyin dag gis ri phye ba dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgras de'i sku me tog man dA ra ba dang /_ku she 
[\[318b.5\]]sha ya dang /_tsan dan sa mchog gi phye mas g.yogs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas lag pa bsgreng ste/_shing drung rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la lus thams cad kyis gtugs nas langs te bsreg shing bsag par brtsams pa dang /_gnas brtan kun 
[\[318b.6\]]dga' bos smras pa/_rgyal po chen po ci zhig rtsom/_rgyal pos smras pa/_gnas brtan gyi sku zhugs la bzhen par bgyi'o/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni byams pa'i gsung rab byung gi bar du byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/_byang chub sems 
[\[318b.7\]]dpa' byams pa nyan thos bye ba phrag drug bcu rtsa dgus bskor ba phyogs 'dir byon nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po'i lus 'di bzung ste 'di ni 'od srung zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos 'dod pa chung ba/_chog shes pa/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'chang 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]ba'i mchog tu gyur nas des bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par bsdus so zhes nyan thos rnams la bstan pa dang /_ji tsam na de dag 'di snyam du de'i dus kyi mi rnams ni lus chung bar gyur te/_nges par bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub 
[\[319a.2\]]pa'i sku ni chen por gyur pa zhig yin no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das des de'i lus las snam sbyar blangs nas 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i snam sbyar yin no zhes nyan thos rnams la bstan pa dang /_de dag gis de thos nas 
[\[319a.3\]]de nyid kyis dge slong bye ba drug bcu rtsa dgus sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs nas ci nus kyis byas shing bsgrubs nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par des byin gyis brlabs pas lus 'di me la bsreg par mi nus mod kyi/_'on kyang 'di'i steng du mchod rten brtsig 
[\[319a.4\]]par bya'o/_/ji tsam na rgyal po sgor byung ba dang ri 'byar cing de'i lus bkab par gyur to/_/de'i 'og tu rgyal pos steng du mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa yang byas so/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/_gnas 
[\[319a.5\]]brtan bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma mthong /_gnas brtan 'od srung chen po yang ma mthong ste/_'di ltar gnas brtan yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gnas brtan gyis khas blangs 
[\[319a.6\]]so/_/ji tsam na sha na'i gos can rgya mtsho chen po nas bde zhing legs par 'ongs te des nor rnams gter du sbas te 'od ma'i tshal du 'ongs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dri gtsang khang gi sgo na 'chag pa la phyag byas nas/_btsun pa mkhyen par mdzod cig_/bdag 
[\[319a.7\]]ni lo lnga'i dus ston bgyid de/_bdag gis rgya mtsho chen po brgal nas bde zhing legs par mchis te/_de bas na sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la lo lnga'i dus ston bgyid par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das gang na bzhugs/_gnas brtan gyis 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]bu bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes smras pa sha na'i gos can gyis thos nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel to/_/ji tsam na chus gtor nas bslang ba dang /_des sems kyi 'du shes slar rnyed nas smras pa/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gang na/_de yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[319b.2\]]'das te/_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'od srung chen po yang de bzhin no/_/de shin tu mi dga' ba skyes nas dad pas lo lnga'i dus ston byas te mjug tu phyin pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la zang zing gis bsdu ba ni byas zin na/_da ni 
[\[319b.3\]]chos kyi bsdu ba byos shig ces smras pa dang /_sha na'i gos can gyis gnas brtan ci zhig bka' stsal/_ci tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bos bu bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung shig ces smras pa dang /_des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras nas/_ji tsam na tshe dang 
[\[319b.4\]]ldan pa kun dga' bos rab tu phyung ste/_gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa zin par byas nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sha na'i gos gyon zhing 'chang ba yang dag par len du bcug go/_/de thos pa 'dzin pa zhig ste/_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das las dge slong sde 
[\[319b.5\]]gnyis dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thos shing bzung ba thams cad tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis kyang bzung ste/_rig pa gsum dang /_sde snod gsum rgyas par byas so/_/ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal na 'dug pa dang /_dge slong 
[\[319b.6\]]zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang na lo brgyar 'tsho ba ni/_/nges par chu la bya gar bzhin/_/chu la bya gar mthong ba ltar/_/bdag nyid gcig pu'i 'tsho ba dge/_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad thos nas/_de ga la bar song ste smras pa/_bu 
[\[319b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis ni de skad ma gsungs mod kyi/_'on kyang gang na lo brgya 'tsho ba ni/_/nges par skye dang 'jig pa yin/_/gang zag gnyis la ston pa yis/_/sa 'dir rtag par bshad pa ni/_/ma dad zhe sdang blo can dang /_/dad la phyin ci log gyur pa'o/_/
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]mdo sde log par bzung gyur pas/_/ba lang 'dam du song ba bzhin/_/de ni nye bar 'jig 'gyur te/_/rang gi mchi blos blo med pa/_/thos pa mi shes 'bras bu med/_/log par shes pa dug dang 'dra/_/thos pa yang dag nyid shes pa/_/bral ba 'bras bu blo ldan 
[\[320a.2\]]yin/_/des de'i mkhan po la smras pa/_kun dga' bo yang rgas gyur te/_/de yi dran pa'ang nyams par gyur/_/smras pa/_rga ba dag gis gzir gyur pa/_/lus can de yi dran pa nyams/_/yang dag rjes su mi dran pa/_/de yi blo ni rgas pas gnon/_/khyod song la 
[\[320a.3\]]de skad smros shig ces byas pa dang /_gnas brtan kun dga' bo slar log ste/_dge slong de yang de skad 'don pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bu bcom ldan 'das kyis ni de skad ma gsungs so zhes ngas ma smras sam/_dge slong des mkhan po'i tshig bzhin smras pa 
[\[320a.4\]]dang /_ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bos gal te bdag nyid kyis dge slong la smras na ni 'thab mor 'gyur/_de ni drung du 'ong du mi btub/_de'i drung du ni bdag 'gro ba'i cha ma yin no snyam du brtags nas des bsams pa/_'di ltar shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu chen po dang 
[\[320a.5\]]'od srung la sogs pa chen po de dag kyang 'das zin na ma la bdag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul lo stong du gnas par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas smras pa/_rnying pa gang dag sngar 'das te/_/gsar bu de dang bdag mi 
[\[320a.6\]]mthun/_/bdag ni gcig pu bsam gtan la/_/sgo nga las skye bzhin du gnas/_/bdag gi grogs dang mdza' bo kun/_/sngon du 'das shing song bar gyur/_/ji ltar bsam gtan gnas dran pa/_/de 'dra'i bshes gnyen 'di na med/_/dri ma byang nas zhir song 
[\[320a.7\]]'gro ba'i sgron ma ste/_/bdag nyid chen pos gti mug mun gnag rab rib bsal/_/de dag gis ni gdul ba tshad med btul gyur nas/_/gcig pu dgon pa mchod rten tshal shing lhag ma 'dra/_/de nas sha na'i gos can la bu bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung chen po la 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/des kyang nga la gtad de da ni ngas bstan pa khyod la gtad nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_khyod kyis kun du skyongs shig dang /_grong khyer bcom brlag ri mu run da zhes bya ba der yul bcom brlag gi tshong dpon gyi bu na ta dang /_
[\[320b.2\]]pha ta zhes bya bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas/_gtsug lag khang gi yon bdag tu 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan te ri mu run dar gtsug lag khang brtsigs zin nas/_yul bcom brlag na spos 'tshong sbas pa zhes bya ba de'i bu nye sbas zhes bya ba zhig yod par 
[\[320b.3\]]'gyur te/_de rab tu phyung shig dang /_de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang mtshan med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_des sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/sha na'i gos can gyis mkhan pos ji skad 
[\[320b.4\]]bka' stsal pa bzhin bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste khyod la sbran to zhes smras so/_/de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bos bsams pa/_bdag 'dir yongs su mya ngan las 'das na/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra 
[\[320b.5\]]dang /_yul spong byed pa gnyis phan tshun rtsod par 'gyur te/_yul yangs pa can pa dag la yang sha ri ram gyi skal ba mi byin/_gal te yangs pa can du mya ngan las 'das na ni de dag gis kyang mi byin te/_ma la bdag ni chu bo gang gA'i dbus su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[320b.6\]]bya'o snyam nas de der song ngo /_/de nas yang rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i rmi lam du rgyal po'i steng du gdugs 'dzin pa de'i yu ba chags par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas skrag ste sad pa dang sgo srung gis lha gnas brtan kun dga' bo ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar sbron to zhes smras so/_/
[\[320b.7\]]de thos nas rgyal po brgyal te 'gyel ba dang /_ji tsam na chus gtor te bslang nas sems kyi 'du shes rnyed pa dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang du yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes song sras su mngon 'khrungs nas/_/dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod ni yongs bsrung nges pa'i bdag nyid can/_/srid pa 'gog par mdzad pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros ni/_/grong khyer yangs pa can du mngon par rab tu gshegs par 
[\[321a.2\]]gyur/_/ji tsam na rgyal po ma skyes dgras dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du chas te song ba dang /_yangs pa can pa dag la lha dag gis smras pa/_'phags pa kun dga' 'gro ba'i sgron ma ni/_/skye bo phal po che la thugs rje mdzad/_/thub 
[\[321a.3\]]pa 'di ni mya ngan mun bsal nas/_/rang zhi brtan par yangs pa can du gshegs/_/ji tsam na yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon te/_chu bo gang gA'i 'gram du 'ongs pa dang /_gnas brtan kun dga' bo yang grur zhugs 
[\[321a.4\]]nas chu bo gang gA'i dbus su 'dug go/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/_'dab ma brgya pa lta bur kha bye sangs rgyas yangs pa'i spyan/_/srid pa gsum gyi sgron mar gyur pa zhi bar gshegs gyur pas/_/
[\[321a.5\]]bdag cag khyod la skyabs 'ongs gal te zhi bar gshegs gyur na/_/bdag cag don du tshur gshegs khyod kyi sku ni 'dir 'or cig_/ji tsam na yangs pa can pa dag gis kyang de skad smras pa dang /_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang 'di ltar bsam pa bskyed de/_
[\[321a.6\]]gal te ma ga d+hA yi grong du bdag gi lus bor na/_/lits+tsha bI rnams gdon mi za bar sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/gal te grong khyer spong byed dag tu bdag gi lus bor na/_/ma ga d+hA yi bdag po nges par mi dga' bas/_/de bas lus phyed mi yi dbang po la/_/lus kyi phyed ni 
[\[321a.7\]]tshogs la byin byas nas/_/'di ltar de dag gnyi gas yang dag par/_/rtag pa kho nar mchod pa nyid du 'gyur/_/ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bo yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de'i tshe drang srong gzhan zhig 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]'khor lnga brgyas bskor nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ongs te thal mo sbyar nas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la bdag cag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs te dge slong gi dngos po gsol lo zhes smras 
[\[321b.2\]]pa dang /_ji tsam na gnas brtan kun dga' bos slob ma rnams lhan cig tu bdag gi drung du tshur shog ces bsam pa bskyed nas des bsam pa de bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du slob ma lnga brgya der 'ongs so/_/gnas brtan kun dga' bos chu'i dbus sa gzhir sprul nas lam med 
[\[321b.3\]]par byas so/_/ji tsam na drang srong 'khor lnga brgya po rab tu byung nas bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba byas pa dang /_'khor lnga brgya pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/las gsum pa brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob ste/_
[\[321b.4\]]de dag chu bo gang gA'i dbus dang nyi ma'i gung la rab tu byung bas kha cig ni chu dbus/_kha cig ni nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bar kun du grags te/_de dag gis bya ba byas nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[321b.5\]]thams cad kyi tha mar rab tu phyung na dang por yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas mkhan pos bka' stsol cig dang bdag cag ni sngar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_mkhan po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba lta bar ni bdag cag mi 'tshal lo/_/gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bu 
[\[321b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_/gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos kyang nga la gtad de/_da nga ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su srung shig_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[321b.7\]]kyis kha che'i yul ni bsam gtan dang mthun pa dang gnas mal gyi mchog go zhes 'di ltar kha che'i yul lung bstan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des 'dir 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de bas na bu khyod kyis bstan pa la 'jug par byos shig_/des de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan par brtsams pa/_ma ga d+hA pa snying 
[\[322a.2\]]rjes ngu zhing mgon po tshur gshegs zhes/_/spong byed pa yang snying rjes ngu zhing mgon po tshur gshegs 'bod/_/chu 'gram dag na skye bo gnyis kyis tshig brjod pa/_/gsan nas blo gros can gyi sngon gyi sku ni so sor byas/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lus 
[\[322a.3\]]byin gyis brlabs nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan te me la chu gtor ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lus phyed ni yangs pa can pas/_lus phyed ni rgyal po ma skyes dgras thob nas smras pa/_ye shes rdo rje rnon po yis/_/rang gi lus kyi ri bcom ste/_/phyed 
[\[322a.4\]]ni mi yi dbang po byin/_/phyed ni thub pas tshogs rnams byin/_/de nas lits+tsha bI rnams kyis yangs pa can du mchod rten brtsigs nas bzhag go/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras kyang grong khyer skya snar can gyi bur mchod rten brtsigs nas bzhag go/_/de nas nyi ma'i gung gi bsam pa skyes 
[\[322a.5\]]pa/_/bdag gi mkhan pos kyang kha che yul du bstan pa zhog shig ces bsgo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des kha che'i yul du klu mi srun pa hu lun ta btul nas bstan pa 'jog par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan 
[\[322a.6\]]pas ma la bdag gis ston pa'i dgongs pa yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam nas/_tshe dang ldan pa nyi ma'i gung gis kha che'i yul du song ste skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go/_/de nas nyi ma'i gung gis kha che yul gyi klu 'di zil gyis mnan la/_klu de dag 'khrugs 
[\[322a.7\]]par byas na 'dul bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams na de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_'di ltar kha che'i yul rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/_klu de dag kyang 'khrugs shing rab tu rngam nas rdzi char drag po dag phab ste gnas brtan la gnod pa bya bar chas pa dang /_
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]gnas brtan gyis byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas klu de dag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos kyi mtha' ma yang g.yo bar ma nus so/_/de nas klu dag gis mda'i char phab pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis kun tu gsal ba'i me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu 
[\[322b.2\]]da dang /_pad ma dkar por phab bo/_/klu dag gis rdo rje rtse gcig dang /_mda' bo che dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_dgra sta dag 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /_gnas brtan gyi steng du me tog ku su ma'i char bab nas smras pa/_gangs ri rtse mo de ni nyi ma'i 'od kyis rab tu bzhu ba 
[\[322b.3\]]na/_/ri bo'i rtse mo de dag kun ni med par song gyur mthong ba ltar/_/phyag dar char phab ku su ma yi char pa sna tshogs bab par byas/_/gnam las mda' yi char phab me tog phreng bar kun tu gnas par gyur/_/de nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas lus la 
[\[322b.4\]]mes ma tshig_/mtshon gyis ma tshugs/_dug gis ma tshugs te/_klu rnams ngo mtshar skyes so/_/de nas klu de dag gnas brtan gyi drung du song ste 'phags pa bka' ci stsal ces smras pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_gnas 'di nga la byin cig_/klu dag gis 
[\[322b.5\]]smras pa/_dbul bar rngo mi thog go/_/gnas brtan gyis gnas 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i gnas su lung bstan te/_gang kha che yul 'di bsam gtan dang mthun pa'i gnas mal yin pas deng phan chad nga'i yin no zhes smras pa dang /_klu rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas 
[\[322b.6\]]brtan bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal tam/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to/_/klu rnams kyis smras pa/_gnas ci tsam zhig dbul bar bgyi/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_skyil mo krung bcas pa tsam mo/_/klu rnams kyis btsun pa 
[\[322b.7\]]dbul bar bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis skyil mo krung bcas pas lung pa dgu'i mdo skyil mo krung gis non pa dang /_klu rnams kyis gnas brtan 'khor ji snyed cig mnga' zhes smras pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis dge slong ji snyed cig 'du bar 'gyur snyam bsams 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]pa dang /_ji tsam na dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o snyam du gnas brtan gyis bsams nas dgra bcom pa lnga brgya'o zhes smras pa dang /_klu rnams kyis de bzhin du gyur cig_/gal te dgra bcom pa gcig cig gis ma tshang na de'i tshe kha che yul bdag cag gis slar dbrog par 
[\[323a.2\]]bgyi'o zhes smras pa dang /_gnas brtan nyi ma'i gung gis kha che yul gyi klu rnams la smras pa/_de yin mod kyi 'on kyang gang na sbyin bdag gnas pa de na len pa yod pas ngas khyim bdag kyang 'jug par bya'o/_/klu rnams kyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras pa dang /_ji tsam na gnas 
[\[323a.3\]]brtan gyis skye bo rang nyid kyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul 'khor dag byas te skye bo'i tshogs dag zhugs pa dang /_de dag gis gnas brtan ji ltar bdag cag 'phel bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /_ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis skye bo'i tshogs dag khrid nas ri spos kyi ngad ldang du 
[\[323a.4\]]phyin nas gur gum dag thon cig ces smras pa dang /_ji tsam na ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi klu rnams 'khrugs pa dang /_de dag kyang gnas brtan gyis btul nas de dag gis smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ji srid cig gnas par 'gyur/_gnas brtan gyis smras pa/_lo 
[\[323a.5\]]stong ngo /_/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ji srid du gnas pa de srid du gnang bar bya'o zhes dam tshig byas pa dang /_gnas brtan gyis de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas/_ji tsam na gnas brtan gyis kha che yul du gur gum gzhag par byin gyis brlabs so/_/ji 
[\[323a.6\]]tsam na gnas brtan nyi ma'i gung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa kha che yul du bzhag cing rgya cher byas nas cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sbyin pa po dang /_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyad pa'i yid dga' bar byas nas me la chus btab pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das par song nas de'i 
[\[323a.7\]]lus tsan dan sa mchog dang a ga ru la sogs pa'i shing gis bsregs nas mchod rten brtsigs te bzhag go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha na'i gos can gyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas rab tu phyung nas des bstan pa rgya cher byas te tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]ldan pa nye sbas shes par byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das/_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos mkhan po la/_mkhan pos ni nga la bstan pa gtad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/bu nga yang

[\[323b.3\]]bar byas nas spar ba dang /_bsreg pa dang /_char dbab pa dang /_glog 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/gnas brtan nye sbas kyis kyang /_tshe dang ldan pa d+hi ti ka la/_tshe dang ldan pa d+hi ti kas bstan 
[\[323b.4\]]pa'i dgos pa byas nas tshe dang ldan pa nag po la/_tshe dang ldan pa nag pos tshe dang ldan pa legs mthong la ste/_de ltar glang po chen po dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya dang bcu lon te rgyal ba'i nyi ma 
[\[323b.5\]]nub pa dang /_yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa'i gzhi bcu po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal ba phyung ste/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi 
[\[323b.6\]]dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod/_rab tu spyod de/_bcu gang zhe na/_yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis a la la zhes bya ba ni rung bar byas nas mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun 
[\[323b.7\]]pas chos kyi las byed de/_'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]su ston cing kun tu spyod/_rab tu spyod do/_/gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar byos shig ces nyan kor gyi dge slong rnams rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug cing rjes su yi rang ba rung bar byas nas mi

[\[324a.5\]]gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshwa dus su rung ba dang lhan cig bsres nas kun du spyod cing tshwa rung ba'o zhes byed pa ste/_'di ni gzhi bzhi pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_

[\[324a.7\]]tshad phyed du song ste 'dus shing zas zos nas lam gyis rung bar byed de/_'di ni gzhi lnga pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa la rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod/_rab tu spyod do/_/gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhag mar ma byas pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sor mo gnyis byas te zos nas sor mo gnyis rung bar byed do/_/'di ni gzhi drug pa mdo sde las

[\[324b.3\]]pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis srin bu pad pa bzhin du chang bzhibs te 'thungs nas nad pas rung bar byed de/_'di ni gzhi bdun pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de

[\[324b.6\]]can gyi dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis 'khor bas gding ba sar pa la ma glan par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing gding bas rung bar byed de/_'di ni gzhi dgu pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang 
[\[324b.7\]]bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod/_rab tu spyod do/_/gzhan yang yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed gang dag zlum po 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]dag pa spyad par 'os pa de dag dris bskus nas bdug pa zhim pos bdug ste/_me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dge sbyong gi mgo bo la khri'u stan dang chas pa'i steng du bzhag nas lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dag bskor nas 'di skad ces bsgrags 
[\[325a.2\]]so/_/grong khyer dang yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po yangs pa can na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig_/lhung bzed 'di ni lhung bzed bzang po yin te/_'dir byin zhing shin tu byin nam/_gang gis 'dir blugs pa byas na de dag gis blugs pa byas pas 'bras bu che ba 
[\[325a.3\]]dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_brtson pa che ba dang rgya che bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang /_der dbyig dang /_gser dang /_rin po che gzhan de dag kyang snyed cing thob nas de la longs spyod cing gser dngul gyis rung bar byed de/_'di ni gzhi bcu pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_
