[\[325a.5\]]lhan cig gnas pa gnas brtan thams cad 'dod pa zhes bya ba de dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhes bya ba snying las chung bar gnas pa zhig 'dug go/_/grong khyer nor can na de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i gnas brtan grags pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de yang dgra bcom 
[\[325a.6\]]pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhig ste de 'khor lnga brgya dang ljongs rgyu zhing grong khyer yangs pa can du 'ongs so/_/ji tsam na rnyed pa dag 'god de der 'ongs pa dang /_dge skos kyis gnas brtan dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa 'god kyis longs shig ces smras pa dang /_des tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[325a.7\]]rnyed pa byung ba ci zhig sus byin zhes smras so/_/des rgyas par brjod pa dang /_des chu bur 'di gcig pu byung bar zad dam/_gzhan yang yod snyam brtags pa dang /_ji tsam na bslab pa lhod cing rung ba ma yin pa'i dngos po bcu kun tu spyod pa 'phel bar mthong nas des bstan pa gnas par 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]bya ba'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa thams cad 'dod pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa thams cad 'dod pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa thams cad 'dod pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan a la la zhes rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa a la la 
[\[325b.2\]]zhes rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pas chos kyi las byed de a la la zhes bya ba rung bar byed do//_//'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/_bam po lnga 
[\[325b.3\]]bcu rtsa dgu pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gnas brtan gang du bcas/_grong khyer tsam par ro/_/gang las brten te/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i 
[\[325b.4\]]bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun tu spyod/_rab tu spyod na de dag khyod kyis btang snyoms gzhag gam zhes smras pa 
[\[325b.5\]]dang de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa 'di rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi mthun pas 
[\[325b.6\]]chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pas chos kyi las byed de/_tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang bar byos shig ces nyen kor gyi dge slong rnams rjes su yi rang bar byed du 'jug cing rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe 
[\[325b.7\]]dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gnas brtan gang du bcas/_grong khyer tsam par ro/_/gang las brten te/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi gnyis pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la grong khyer yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de dag khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang /_de 
[\[326a.2\]]cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste kun du spyod pas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa kun du spyod pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rang gi lag gis sa rko zhing 
[\[326a.3\]]brkos nas kun du spyod pas rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_mnyan yod du'o/_/gang las brten/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi gsum pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 
[\[326a.4\]]'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag 
[\[326a.5\]]gam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/_tshwa rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa tshwa rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i 
[\[326a.6\]]bar gyi tshwa rung ba dus su rung ba dang lhan cig bsres nas yongs su spyod cing tshwa dus su rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/gang las brten/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas 
[\[326a.7\]]brtan 'di ni gzhi bzhi pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu 
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste lam gyis rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa lam gyis rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi 
[\[326b.2\]]dge slong rnams kyis dpag tshad dang dpag tshad phyed du song ste 'dus shing zan zos nas lam gyis rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_rgyal po'i khab tu'o/_/gang las brten/_lhas byin las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas brtan 'di 
[\[326b.3\]]ni gzhi lnga pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu 
[\[326b.4\]]spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/_sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa sor mo gnyis kyis rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_
[\[326b.5\]]gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhag mar ma byas pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba sor mo gnyis kyis rung bar byas te zos nas sor mo gnyis rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_mnyan yod du'o/_/gang las brten/_dge slong 
[\[326b.6\]]mang po las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi drug pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams 
[\[326b.7\]]kyis rung ba ma yin par rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su bzhag gam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste nad pas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]nad pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis srin bu pad pa bzhin du chang bzhibs te 'thungs nas nad pas rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_mnyan yod du'o/_/gang las brten/_tshe dang ldan pa legs 
[\[327a.2\]]'ongs las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi bdun pa zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste/_bsres pas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa bsres pas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong 
[\[327a.3\]]rnams kyis 'o ma bre gang dang zho bre gang dkrugs nas dus ma yin par za zhing dkrugs pas rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_mnyan yod du'o/_/gang las brten/_dge slong mang po las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas brtan 'di ni 
[\[327a.4\]]gzhi brgyad pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na 
[\[327a.5\]]de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste gding bas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa gding bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can 
[\[327a.6\]]gyi dge slong rnams kyis gding ba rnying pa bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gis 'khor ba gding ba sar pa la ma glan par longs spyod par byed cing gding bas rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_mnyan yod du'o/_/gang las brten/_dge slong mang po 
[\[327a.7\]]las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_ltung byed do/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dgu pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba 
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam zhes smras pa dang /_de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/des smras pa/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste gser dngul gyis rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_gser dngul gyis rung ba zhes 
[\[327b.2\]]bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan 'di ltar yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed gang dag zlum po dag pa spyad par 'os pa de dag dris pa skus nas bdug pa dri zhim pos bdugs te me tog dri zhim po sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa dge sbyong gi mgo bo la khri'u stan dang chas pa'i steng du bzhag 
[\[327b.3\]]nas lam po che dang /_srang dang /_bzhi mdo dag bskor nas 'di skad ces bsgrags so/_/grong khyer dang yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i skye bo mang po yangs pa can na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig_/lhung bzed 'di ni lhung bzed bzang po yin te 'dir byin nam shin tu byin nam gang gis 'dir blugs pa byas 
[\[327b.4\]]pas 'bras bu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_brtson pa che ba dang rgya che bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang /_der dbyig dang /_gser dang /_rin po che gzhan de dag kyang rnyed cing thob nas de la longs spyod cing gser dngul gyis rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_
[\[327b.5\]]'dul ba las te spang ba'i ltung byed dang yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bshad par gtogs pa dang /_gtsug na nor bu'i mdo sde dang /_lung ring po dang /_tshul khrims kyi phung por gtogs pa dang /_lung bar ma dang /_zung du gtogs pa dang /_sra brkyang gi mdo sde dang /_
[\[327b.6\]]gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang /_bzhi pa dang lnga par gtogs pa de dag las so/_/gang las brten/_drug sde dang /_dge slong gzhan dag dang /_khyim na gnas pa dag las te/_gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi bcu pa mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang 
[\[327b.7\]]bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/_des tshe dang ldan pa da song la phyogs tshol 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]cig dang ngas chos bzhin du grogs bya'o zhes smras pa dang /_gnas brtan de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes tshe dang ldan pa grags pas gnas brtan thams cad 'dod pa las mnyan nas rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs nas rab tu gnas so/_/de'i tshe grong khyer 
[\[328a.2\]]nor can na tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan g.yo ldan tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhig gnas te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas gnas brtan g.yo ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan gyi rkang 
[\[328a.3\]]pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan a la la zhes rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa a la la rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa 
[\[328a.4\]]dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_tsam par ro/_/gang las brten/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/gnas brtan 'di 
[\[328a.5\]]ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de 
[\[328a.6\]]khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang ba zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te gzhi bcu po de dag rgyas par brjod pa dang des tshe dang ldan pa phyogs tshol cig dang ngas 
[\[328a.7\]]chos bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas tshe dang ldan pa g.yo ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te grong khyer sang kA sha zhes bya bar song ngo /_/de'i tshe grong khyer sang kA sha zhes bya ba na tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan nor can tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas gnas pa dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom pa zhig gnas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas tshe dang ldan pa nor can gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te tshe dang ldan pa nor can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gnas brtan a la la zhes rung bar bgyid 
[\[328b.2\]]par rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung ba ci yin/_gnas brtan grong khyer yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pas chos kyi las byed de a la la zhes bya bas rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[328b.3\]]a la la zhes bya ba rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_tsam par ro/_/gang las brten/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul 
[\[328b.4\]]ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/_gnas brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa rung 
[\[328b.5\]]ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bar byed zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin te/_gzhi bcu po de dag rgyas par brjod pa dang /_des song la phyogs tshol cig dang ngas chos bzhin du phyogs bya'o zhes smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas tshe dang ldan pa nor can gyi rkang pa gnyis 
[\[328b.6\]]la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas grong khyer dmar bu can du 'ongs so/_/de'i tshe gang grong khyer dmar bu can na tshe dang ldan pa yid dga' dang /_tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur gnas te de dag de'i tshe 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa yid dga' la gzhi bcu po 
[\[328b.7\]]rgya cher brjod nas tshe dang ldan pa yid dga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas srug nar son pa dang /_de'i tshe srug na na tshe dang ldan pa ma pham pa gnas te des gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas de ma he ldan du song ba dang 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]de'i tshe ma he ldan na tshe dang ldan pa yang dag skyes gnas te des de la yang gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas lhan cig skyes su son pa dang /_de'i tshe lhan cig skyes na tshe dang ldan pa nam gru gnas te/_des de'i rkang pa gnyis 
[\[329a.2\]]la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te smras pa/_gnas brtan a la la zhes bya ba rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/_gnas brtan yangs pa can na yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos 
[\[329a.3\]]ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_tsam par ro/_/gang las brten/_drug sde las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/gnas brtan 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul 
[\[329a.4\]]ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung bar yongs su ston cing kun du spyod rab tu spyod na de khyod kyis btang snyoms su gzhag gam/_gnas 
[\[329a.5\]]brtan de ni der bas na 'di zhu bar bgyi ste rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin du gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa nam grus ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di dang por bdag gi drung du 'ongs 
[\[329a.6\]]sam snyam bsams pa dang ji tsam na gzhan du yang song bar mthong nas/_des bsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de lam ring po nas 'ongs pas ngal so zhing de 'dug tu bcug la bdag phyogs tshol du 'gro'o snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[329a.7\]]pa grags pa khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs pas khyod ngal so la ngas phyogs btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas de ngal sor bcug ste/_tshe dang ldan pa nam gru phyogs tshol zhing song ngo /_/de nas yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dge 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]slong gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa tshe dang ldan pa'i mkhan po gar song zhes dris so/_/des smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de phyogs tshol du song ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa de ci'i phyir phyogs tshol du song /_tshe dang ldan pa dag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya ba'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa nged kyis 
[\[329b.2\]]ci zhig byas na des nged rnams gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya/_des rgyas par bzlas pa dang /_de dag gis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de legs pa ma yin pa zhig byed de/_ston pa 'das pa de'i gsung rab la rnam pa de dang de dag gis 'tsho bar rung na nged rnams ci'i phyir mtho btsam/_de 
[\[329b.3\]]dag las gzhan zhig gis drang ba'i sems dang phan pa'i brlang tshig gis de dag la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed ni rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa dang /_rung ba ma yin pa dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pas spyod de/_des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa lo stong du gnas par 
[\[329b.4\]]'gyur ro zhes sngon thos na khyod kyis ni ma 'ongs pa'i bstan pa nyid kyang mi snang bar byed pa la zhugs pa dang /_ji ltar gzhan dag kyang gang dag bslab pa lhod par zhugs shing chu bur gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu bskyed pas de bas na bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir khyed rnams nges par gnas 
[\[329b.5\]]nas dbyung ba'i las byed do zhes smras pa dang /_de dag skrag nas spobs pa med de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas gcig nas gcig tu song ste gtam brjod par brtsams pa/_tshe dang ldan pa grags pa ni phyogs tshol du song nas bdag cag gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed 
[\[329b.6\]]na ci'i phyir sems las chung ngur 'dug_/ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba smros shig_/de nas gcig cig gis smras pa/_ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/_gang de phyogs tshol du song na bdag cag gis kyang phyogs btsal mod/_ci'i phyir bdag cag mi gnas par bya/_gzhan zhig gis smras 
[\[329b.7\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa de dang bdag cag rtsod par 'gyur bar bros te 'gro bar bya'o/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag cag gang du 'gro ste gang du song ba der yang de bzhin du nyes dmigs su 'gyur bas bzod pa gsol bar bya'o/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_bdag cag 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]gis bzod pa gsol mi nus kyi dkris bzhin du 'dug go/_/gzhan zhig gis smras pa/_de 'di ltar de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas mang po de dag je lhung bzed dang chos gos dang /_dra ba dang /_phor bu dang /_ska rags dag gis bsdus la phyis gar rigs 
[\[330a.2\]]par bya'o/_/gzhan zhig gis bzang ste de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas/_de rnams kyis de dag la kha cig la ni snam sbyar byin/_kha cig la ni bla gos byin/_kha cig la ni mthang gos byin/_kha cig la ni rngul zan byin/_kha cig la ni gding ba byin/_kha cig la ni lhung bzed 
[\[330a.3\]]byin/_kha cig la ni chu tshags byin te/_de bzhin du de dag thams cad bsdus nas de dag bar na gnas par gyur to/_/ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa grags pa rim gyis phyogs btsal nas yangs pa can du 'ongs pa dang /_de dang lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dag 'ongs nas yangs pa 
[\[330a.4\]]can dag gi grong du ma song bar der lam gyi ngal bso ba dang /_lhan cig gnas pa'i nye gnas dag gis smras pa/_mkhan po phyogs de dag btsal tam/_bu phyogs de dag ring por mi thogs par 'ong ngo /_/mkhan po 'tshal to/_/thugs de lta bu kun bzlog pa'i rigs te/_
[\[330a.5\]]ston pa 'das pa de'i gsung rab la rnam pa de dang de dag gis 'tsho bar rung na/_ci'i slad du de dag la gnod pa bgyi/_des bsams pa/_'di dag sngon ma byung ba'i tshig ci smra ste/_nges par 'di dag gis de dag las rang gir bya ba blangs par rig nas/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 
[\[330a.6\]]sngon ma byung ba'i tshig smra ste/_tshe dang ldan pa dag gis de dag las bdag gir bya ba blangs so zhes smras pa dang /_de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas ji ltar gros byas pa de dag la smras pa/_bslab pa lhod pa'i phyogs dag 'phel bas 
[\[330a.7\]]rings par 'ong bar rigs pas bstan pa'i dgos pa la bshol bar ma byed cig ces tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_gang gis bshol bar bya ba [{]rings [,]ring [}]byed rigs pa shol byed pa/_/tshul bzhin bya ba rab spangs byis pa de ni sdug bsngal 'gro/_/de ni grags pa med pa'i 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]skal ldan grogs kyis rnam par spangs/_/de yi don ni mi 'phel mar gyi ngo yi zla ba bzhin/_/gang gis dgongs pa de bzhin rigs byed blo ldan mi shol ba/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa spangs mkhas pa de ni bde ba 'thob/_/de ni grags pa skal ldan grogs po rnams kyis spangs mi 
[\[330b.2\]]'gyur/_/de yi don ni 'phel ba yar gyi ngo yi zla ba bzhin/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa 'khor gyi khyams su zhugs te rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs nas smon nas shes pa brtags te/_gaN+DI de brdungs pa dang /_dgra bcom pa 
[\[330b.3\]]bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba de dag thams cad kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhan cig gnas pa dag 'dus so/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gaN+DI'i sgra ma thos so/_/de'i tshe dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams 'dus 
[\[330b.4\]]shing tshogs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de dag ni ming nas phyung ste brjod na ni 'khrug pa chen por 'gyur bas ma la bdag gis ming nas mi 'byung bar brjod par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_des ji ltar rgan rims su 'dud pa byas nas rgan pa'i mtha' logs su thal 
[\[330b.5\]]mo sbyar ba byas nas stan la 'dug go/_/dgra bcom pa bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang bas don du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang /_de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur yang 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa las langs te/_de la lha zhig gis 'phags pa zla sgur ci'i phyir thugs las 
[\[330b.6\]]chung ngus bzhugs/_khyod dang mkhan po gcig pa dgra bcom pa bdun brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba ni yangs pa can na bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par sdud par byed pas rings par bzhud cig ces smras pa dang /_des rdzu 'phrul gyis grong khyer dmar bu can nas 
[\[330b.7\]]mi snang bar gyur te/_yangs pa can du phyin nas 'khor gyi khyams kyi sgor 'dug ste sgo la brdungs pa dang /_dge slong dag gis khyod su yin zhes dris so/_/des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/_/dge slong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/_/
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/_/dbang po dul zhes bya ba sgo na 'dug_/dge slong dag gis smras pa/_dbang po dul ba ni gzhan dag kyang yod na khyod su yin smros shig_/des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/_/dge 
[\[331a.2\]]sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/_/de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/_/the tshom bcad ces bya ba sgo na 'dug_/dge slong dag gis the tshom bcad pa ni gzhan dag kyang yod do zhes smras pa dang /_des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang dag dmar bu can na gnas pa 
[\[331a.3\]]yi/_/dge sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/_/de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/_/'gyod pa med ces bya ba sgo na 'dug_/dge slong dag gis 'gyod pa med pa ni gzhan dag kyang yod na su yin zhes smras pa dang /_des yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_gang dag 
[\[331a.4\]]dmar bu can na gnas pa yi/_/dge sbyong mang du thos pa 'dul ba 'dzin/_/de dag las ni gzhan zhig 'dir 'ongs te/_/zla sgur zhes bya ba ni sgo na 'dug_/dge slong rnams kyis legs par 'ongs sam legs par 'ongs sam/_nang du zhugs shig ces smras pa dang /_de nang 
[\[331a.5\]]du zhugs so/_/de nas dge slong rnams 'khor gyi khyams nas byung nas tshe dang ldan pa zla sgur don du gnyer bar bskor te/_de'i 'og tu 'khor gyi khyams su zhugs nas 'di ltar rang rang gi stan la 'dug go/_/tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de bzhin rgan rims su 'dug pa la dngos po 
[\[331a.6\]]bcu bzlas par zhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag a la la zhes rung bar byed pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung ba zhes bya ba ci yin/_tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar dge slong kha cig mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun 
[\[331a.7\]]pas chos kyi las byas te a la la zhes rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_tsam par ro/_/gang las brten/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni gzhi dang 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong 'di rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su bsgrags nas kun 
[\[331b.2\]]du spyod rab tu spyod de/_de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni der bas te gzhan dag zhu bar bgyi'o/_/rjes su yi rang bas rung bar bgyid pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung bar byed pa ci yin zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma 
[\[331b.3\]]bzhin du gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod do/_/de dag gis yang dag par brjod nas 'khor gyi khyams nas byung ste/_yang gaN+DI brdungs nas yangs pa can na gnas pa'i dge slong dag dris pa'i tshig gis bsdus nas de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dug pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa grags 
[\[331b.4\]]pas de ltar rgan rims su 'dug pa la gzhi bcu po ming nas phyung ste bzlas pa bya bar zhugs te/_tshe dang ldan pa dag a la la zhes bya ba rung bar byed pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa a la la zhes rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin/_tshe dang ldan pa dag yangs pa 
[\[331b.5\]]can gyi dge slong rnams kyis mi mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mthun pas chos ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pas chos kyi las byas te/_a la la zhes bya ba rung bar bgyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa rung ba ma yin no/_/gang du bcas/_tsam par ro/_/gang las 
[\[331b.6\]]brten/_dge slong drug sde dag las so/_/ltung ba cir 'gyur/_nyes byas so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ni gzhi dang po mdo sde las 'das/_'dul ba las 'das/_ston pa'i bstan pa dang bral te/_mdo sde la mi 'jug_/'dul ba la 
[\[331b.7\]]mi snang /_chos nyid dang 'gal te/_de dag la yangs pa can gyi dge slong rnams kyis rung ba ma yin pa rung ngo zhes yongs su bsgrags nas kun du spyod pa rab tu spyod de/_de dag bdag cag gis dor bar bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag de ni der bas te 'di zhu 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]bar bgyi'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag rjes su yi rang bas rung bar byed pa rung ngam/_tshe dang ldan pa rjes su yi rang bas rung bar byed pa zhes bya ba ci yin zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du gzhi bcu po rgyas par brjod do/_/de dag bdag cag gis dor 
[\[332a.2\]]bar bya'o zhes dgra bcom pa bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pas bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pa/_bdun brgyas yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to//_//bar sdom ni/_a la la dang rjes su yi rang spyod pa dang /_/brtags pa dang ni 
[\[332a.3\]]lan tshwa dag dang lam dang ni/_/sor mo gnyis kyis rung dang dkrugs dang gding ba dang /_/gser dngul byas pa 'di ni bar sdom yang dag bsdus/_/grong khyer yangs pa can dang nor can dang /_/lha las babs dang de bzhin dmar bu can/_/srug na dang 
[\[332a.4\]]ni ma he ldan pa dang /_/lhan cig skyes gyur pa ni phyi ma yin/_/thams cad 'dod dang grags dang g.yo ldan dang /_/nor can dang ni yid dga' dag dang yang /_/zla sgur dang ni de bzhin ma pham pa/_/yang dag byung dang nam gru la sogs pa'o/_/'dir 'grel pa 
[\[332a.5\]]las sgo brgyad pa'o zhes sgo brgyad car tshang bar byas so/_/'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha dang /_d+har+m+ma shrI pra b+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban de dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur//_//
[\[332a.6\]]'dul ba lung phran tshegs kyi gzhi 'di sgyur ba'i dus su lots+tsha ba mang pos dum bu mang por bgos te so sor tha dad du bsgyur bas glegs bam du sdom pa'i dus su gnas tha dad du 'thor nas ma tshang bzhin du bsdebs pas/_lung phran tshegs phal che ba ma tshang bar 
[\[332a.7\]]bzhugs pa la/_slad kyis la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang du gnas brtan dar ma seng ges lung sde bzhi bzhengs pa'i tshe dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhing mo che ba byang chub seng ges phyag len mdzad nas spyir dbus gtsang gi gtsug lag khang 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]rnams na bzhugs pa dang /_khyad par du bsam yas mchims phu nas dgas chung ba dang /_dge slong tshul khrims yon tan gyis rnyed pa'i lung rnams dpe yon dang 'bad rtsol chen pos btsal te/_de dag la gtugs pas/_lung phran tshegs kha cig la mi 
[\[332b.2\]]bzhugs pa/_kha cig la bzhugs pa rnams kyis bskangs nas bsabs pa ni bam po sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dbu sman chen po'i gtam rgyud kyi skabs nas/_sman chen pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang /_bden nam [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]blta'o zhes 
[\[332b.3\]]smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbu/_ji tsam na de grong khyer nas byung ba dang /_bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos kyi mtha' ma nas 'jus nas zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po gcig chad pa bskangs//_//sdom ni/_nga yang sman gyis 
[\[332b.4\]]de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i 'og tu yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/_de nas bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad ne tso spyod gsal gyi skabs rdzogs pa'i/_e ma'o 'di ltar khyod mkhas pa sha stag dang phrad pa ni bsod nams dang ldan no zhes smras so/_/zhes 
[\[332b.5\]]bya ba nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod//_//spyi'i sdom ni/_dge slong ma'i bkur sti bri zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'i smad nas bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i stod kyi bar bam po dgu chad pa bskangs/_sdom tshig de'i 'og tu sdom tshig 
[\[332b.6\]]yig tshar gcig chad pa bskangs/_de nas bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'i mjug_/bram ze'i khye'u ma sdug gi gleng gzhi'i skabs kyi/_dge sbyong rnams kyi yon po'i spyad kyi log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no zhes bya ba nas/_bam po 
[\[332b.7\]]bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i dbu/_de nas de'i tshe/_bram ze pad ma'i snying po khyim mchog gi sa mthon po zhig na shas che ba'i bram ze rgan rabs rnams dang lhan cig 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du bam po bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa chad pa 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]bskangs so/_/de nas bam po lnga bcu pa'i mjug_/kun dga' bo la gdams pa'i skabs kyi/_kun dga' bo dge slong 'di lta bu ni bdag nyid gling dang /_bdag nyid skyabs dang /_chos kyi gling dang /_chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas 
[\[333a.2\]]par bya'i/_gling gzhan dang /_skyabs gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nas bam po lnga bcu gnyis pa'i stod//_//bar sdom ni/_tsa pa la dang tshe'i 'du byed mdzad ces bya ba'i bar du bam po gcig chad pa bskangs te/_spyir bsdoms na bam po bcu gnyis 
[\[333a.3\]]dang /_sdom tshig yig tshar gnyis chad pa bskangs pa gang yin pa de nyid gangs can gyi rgyud kyi gnas brtan chen po sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur cing /_'dul ba dang /_mdo sde dang /_sde snod kyi ma mo 'dzin pa shAkya'i dge slong shes 
[\[333a.4\]]bya'i nam mkha' la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas shing /_snyan grags kyi 'od zer gyis/_phyogs kun tu khyab par gyur pa mchims thams cad mkhyen pas/_la stod 'ol rgod kyi gtsug lag khang nas dpe phyi gdan drangs nas bstan pa'i 'byung gnas dpal 
[\[333a.5\]]snar thang gi gtsug lag khang du lung sde bzhi tshang la dag par bzhengs shing /_de nyid la dpe phyi byas shing /_khyad par du'ang ma tshang ba kha bskangs pa'i phran tshegs de nyid la dpe phyi byas nas/_shAkya'i dge sbyong 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bzhengs pa'i bka' 
[\[333a.6\]]'gyur dpe phyi la gdan drangs nas/_dpal ldan rgyal ba'i sde yis/_rgyal ba'i bstan pa phyogs dus kun du dar zhing rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_thub pa chen po'i bka'/_lung gzhi dang /_dge slong pha ma'i rnam 'byed rnam pa gnyis dang /_gzhung bla ma 
[\[333a.7\]]rnams kyi ma tshang ba kha bskong bar byed pa'i lung phran tshegs 'di dag cing tshang bar dpal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang du bzhengs so/_/slad nas lung bzhengs pa rnams kyis kyang bam po'i grangs dbu nas rim pa bzhin du grangs 'di bzhin du bri bar bya'o//_//
